
1a1(rgyud 'grel): */ (/byang chub kyi sems sgom pa bzhugs//)
1b1(rgyud 'grel): byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag
1b2(rgyud 'grel): med gnyis nyid bde gshegs mi rtog ye shes chos dbyings sku brnyes pa/ /kun gyi rang bzhin zhi ba 'di la gsal zhing bla med
1b3(rgyud 'grel): lam mchog ste/ /mi ldog sa la sogs te dbang bcu rgyal ba kun dang gcig brnyes pa/ /gnas gsum mnyam nyid de la
1b4(rgyud 'grel): mtshan med yid kyis rab tu dad pas mos/ /ston pa 'jig rten sgron mar gyur pa kun gyis mtshungs par rab bsngags pa/ /
2a1(rgyud 'grel): chos la chos kyi snying por gyur pa 'jam dpal gzhon nu snying po nyid/ /bde gshegs ma lus yum du gyur pas
2a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyal ba kun gyi lam gcig go /tshul khrims la sogs pha rol phyin lam spyod pa rgya mtsho'i gzhir gyur pa/ /rnam dag byang chub sems
2a3(rgyud 'grel): kyi ngang tshul bsgoms dang yon tan khyad par ni/ /blo ldan nam zhig sems kyi dam pa de ni mngon du gyur pa na/ /de la sku gsum mchog
2a4(rgyud 'grel): tu gyur par chos kyi sku zhes rgyal bas gsungs/ /shes byed dam par gyur pa shes rab spyan zhes kyang ni de la bya/ /rdo rje rtse mo
2b1(rgyud 'grel): mchog nyid mi rtog ye shes de yang de nyid do/ /ji snyed 'phags pa'i rnam grol chos su brnyad pa de dag thams cad kyang/ /byang chub sems nyid rdzogs
2b2(rgyud 'grel): pas de yi yon tan de dag de las byung/ /'phags pa'i rigs chen 'chi med byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang/ /de med mi 'byung de phyir
2b3(rgyud 'grel): de ni rnam grol mchog gi lam nyid do/ /des na kun du rdo rje sems dpa' ci 'drar bsgom par bya bar 'gyur/ /phra zhing shes dka' drang song chen po'i
2b4(rgyud 'grel): lam 'di mi rtog rtog las 'das/ /brtag par dka' zhing bstan par dka' la brjod pa'i tha snyad rnams dang bral/ /tshig gis mi phebs gzhan dang
2b5(rgyud 'grel): byis pa kun gyi spyod yul ma yin yang/ /ston pa nges pa'i lung dang bla ma dam pa rnams kyi gdam ngag de nyid don 'dir blta/ /mngon sum la
3a1(rgyud 'grel): sogs rgyu yi dngos po 'jig cing grub pa'i mdza' spyod pa/ /de nyid rtog pa'i rgyun 'brangs dpyod yul tshang mar bzhag nas blo yis 'jig byed de/ /
3a2(rgyud 'grel): thog mdza' med phyir dpyod mdza' med de snying po med na tshad mar gang/ /de phyir 'jig rten rtags pa'i tha snyad rnal 'byor lam 'dir mi dgos so/ /dngos po
3a3(rgyud 'grel): mdza' yi rgyu ni lo rgyus dag las lam 'dir brtag par bya/ /skye bo kun gyi sems la mngon snang phyi nang grags pa'i chos 'di ni/ /'dzin pa drug gi ji ltar
3a4(rgyud 'grel): mthong zhing rtag pa de ltar ma yin 'khrul/ /rang gi rtog pas myos shing gzung ba de bzhin bden gyur na/ /de dag dngos po med rtogs dgra bcom 'dra bar grol
3a5(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa yi rigs/ /de dag dus dgras 'joms dang sdug bsngal nyen las des 'khrul mngon par 'gyur/ /gzhan du skye mched sgo nas rig pa de dag tshad mar
3b1(rgyud 'grel): gyur na ni/ /de nyid tshad dmar gyur pas 'phags pa'i lam de su la dgos mi 'gyur/ /lam de rnam grol lam du bstan cing dbang po'i shes pas mi thar te/ /sdug bsngal 'ga' yang mi 'jil rnam rig shes te nyon
3b2(rgyud 'grel): mongs 'byung ba'i gnas/ /de phyir skye bos mthong ba de dag 'khrul par mngon zhen rgyal bas gsungs/ /des ni de las 'di dag 'khrul pa'i dbang gis ji ltar snang bar 'gyur zhe na/ /kun tu rtog can yan lag
3b3(rgyud 'grel): ma yin kun tu rtog pas rtsol med nyams/ /blo gros phyin ci log tu gyur cing ma rig rkyen gyi dbang song bas/ /sems dang sems las byung ba de nyid lus gsum don du snang ba yin/ /'du byed sna tshogs dag
3b4(rgyud 'grel): gis bag chags bsags las gang goms mthu rtas tshe/ /sems nyid yul dang lus 'drar snang pa rus pas gang ba bzhin du snang/ /bag chags bsags pa'i rgyun la dmigs skyes yid la
3b5(rgyud 'grel): brtags pa'i bdag med pa/ /'du byed mthu yis bsgribs shing phra ba ma mthong de las rnam rig skye/ /rgyun dang bcas pa'i sems kyi mthu ni ma rtogs rtog pa'i rjes
3b6(rgyud 'grel): 'brangs nas/ /de las zag bcas rang bzhin rtog pas bdag dang chos rnams rgyas par byed/ /ldan par 'byung ba shin tu phra bar rgyu ba de ni ma mthong las/ /bdag tu lha la sogs pa mu
4a1(rgyud 'grel): stegs lta ba sna tshogs skye zhing thar pa rtog /sems 'di las rnams mdza' yas gnas gyur bag chags mdza' med nges pa med/ /bag chags rtas shing sad par byed pa'i rkyen yang rnam
4a2(rgyud 'grel): pa sna tshogs te/ /rkyen 'gags bag chags 'ga' zhig smin nas mi yi rgyud kyi lus snang ba/ /rkyen gzhan dag gis bag chags gzhan sad byas tshe 'gyur ba'i mthu mthong nas/ /dbang phyug la sogs byed par
4a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dod de nyes pa lam de ma zhi grol mi 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor lam slang the tshom rgyun yang rgyun 'di phra ba ma rtogs skyes/ /bdag tu btags pas bsgribs te 'phags pa'i rigs dang rnam par bral/ /chos su btags
4a4(rgyud 'grel): pas sdug bsngal sna tshogs 'byung zhing ngan song srid par 'gyur/ /rnam shes de yang 'du byed rgyun la mtshan ma tha dad 'dzin pas na/ /las kyi khyad par dag gis brgyad du snang gi rig la tha dad med/ /de phyir sems
4a5(rgyud 'grel): kyi skad cig dang po de la lus dang chos kun gnas/ /de la bsam pa zhen phyir phyi ma de 'byung de la snang/ /rang sems rgyun las 'phags pa skye bo'i chos ni gzhan na yod ma yin/ /rgyud drug rigs las de yang sna tshogs
4a6(rgyud 'grel): de dang rang gi ting 'dzin to/ /sems rgyud de la phyogs kyang cung zad med pas gcig la brten med de/ /de la phyogs med phyir na mdza' yas zhing rnams bdag gi lus/ /bdag gi lus ni mdza' yas zhing dang skye bo'i lus su rab snang
4b1(rgyud 'grel): yab sems dang bag chags gcig min tha dad ma yin brtags par rab tu dka' / /'di kun rten cing 'brel 'byung tshul te skye dang 'gag par 'gyur zhes pa/ /tshig pa'i sa bon bzhin du med las med pa mi 'byung rgyu 'bras med/ /dngos po zhen cing rgyu dang 'bras bur rtog pa'i sems nyid ni/ /rgya dang
4b2(rgyud 'grel): rkyen du snang ste de gnyis med phyir skye dang 'jig pa med/ /skye 'jig med phyir bdag gzhan med de 'chi 'pho med phyir brtag chad med/ /des na 'khrul 'khor med cing mya ngan 'das pa med pa nyid du mngon/ /gnas kyi skad cig nam yang mi 'bral de tshe mnyam gyur de med med/ /yang dag ma
4b3(rgyud 'grel): yin rtog pas bskyed phyir bag chags yod pa ma yin dang/ /spyod yul med phyir kun gzhi med cing rnam rig de yang med pa bzhin/ /phyogs rnams med cing dmigs dang gnas med rnam par rig pa ji ltar skye/ /de phyir sems 'di yod med mdza' las 'das shing gcig dang du mar bral
4b4(rgyud 'grel): bde gshegs byang chub med phyir de yi rdzu 'phrul rgyu 'dra''khrul la snang/ /de bzhin dag pa'i ye shes de dag shin tu dge ba'i rgyun nyid dang/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid la ni de dag dmigs shing skye bar btags pa yang/ /rdo rje'i gnas med phyir na mnyam gnas rang bzhin 'drar 'gyur dang/
4b5(rgyud 'grel): chos dbyings rdo rje rtse mo de dag phyogs nyid med pas skad cig min/ /dag pa'i dge rtsa gzugs brnyan med pas 'jig rten ye shes yod min 'gyur/ /de phyir byang chub ma chub mtshan nyid med par gcig pas blang dor med/ /don de'i tshul gyis don dam rnam grangs skye 'gag med
4b6(rgyud 'grel): dang mnyam nyid dang/ /gnyis med bsam 'das snying nyid chos dbyings brjod dang tha snyad bral la sogs/ /bstan pa de kun tha snyad yin te don dam med cing kun sgrib med/ /don dam tshul gyis lam nyid 'di 'dra zhes pa de nyid kun sgrib yin/ /the tshom yod med chos ni gang la 'ang spong zhing
4b7(rgyud 'grel): gnas par mi byed do/ /sgom pa dang ni chos dbyings med phyir som nyi med la dam par blta ba la'ang med/ /de ltar dngos po mdza' rnams btags dang rang bzhin sgyu ma'ang med 'gyur phyir/ /yod la ltos pa'i med pa'ang med de med pa'ang med/ /mdza' rnams med phyir dbus med
5a1(rgyud 'grel): dbus la'ang gnas pa mi byed la/ /gang la 'jig rten dbang phyug pad+ma kun kyang mi spong 'drar mnyam gnas/ /chos la 'khrul bar mthong ba de nyid 'khrul pa yin par rab rtogs te/ /drug gis bstan pa bdud kyi las kyang mi 'dor ngan du mi tog go/ shes rab thabs
5a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi spyod la mi gnas phyir na bdud kyi 'dra bar spyod/ /rang gi shes pa dam par byas te kun las rgyal te de bsnyems nas/ /'dod chags zhe sdang skyes nas rtsod 'byung gti mug yin te don mi mthong/ /ji srid yid kyi g.yo ba de srid bdud kyi yul te phra ba'i lam/ /g.yo dang mi
5a3(rgyud 'grel): g.yo tha snyad mi gnas gnas pa la'ang gnas par mi byed do/ /snang med dbu ma'i lam de byang chub sems zhes bde gshegs gsung/ /gzugs dang mtshan ma smon par 'dzin pa rab tu spangs nas ni/ /rnam thar gsum po bsgom pa'ang bdud kyi las te gzugs nyid stong pa'o/ /'khor ba'i
5a4(rgyud 'grel): lam gsum spong zhing mya ngan las 'das lam sgom pa'ang bdud nyid de/ /de nyid rang bzhin ma zhi rang bzhin rtsal spangs gar mi gnas/ /'phags pa kun gyi yul dang gnas kyang 'das sogs lam nyid gzhan na med/ /ldang dang mi ldang ched du mi spong sems rten mi 'cha' mngon du min/ 'jam
5a5(rgyud 'grel): dpal ma yin rdul tsam g.yo ba de yin der mi gnas/ /bsgom pa'i sa mi rnyes phyir bsgoms pas rnyed phrad mi 'gyur te/ /sems kyi spyod yul shes pa de dag chos rnams kyi ni chos nyid yin/ /rnam bral gang la mchog dang tha ma med par lam mchog 'di bsgom mo/ /'du byed ma skyes chos kun 'byung
5a6(rgyud 'grel): med bzhin du chos rnams mya ngan 'das/ /dngos med de tshe kun kyang chos kyi dbyings zhes dgra bcom rab 'byor yin/ /nam mkha' dmigs ming tsam dge dang mi dger 'byed med skye ba'ang med/ /rtsol ba yid la mi byed gang la'ang sems med shes dang mi shes bral/ /dran dang 'byed med gang la
5a7(rgyud 'grel): 'ang 'ga' dang mtshungs med mi gnas mi dmigs shing/ /mnyam nas gnyis su brtags med brjod bral bya dang mi bya med de sogs bri med/ /ched du rtsol bar yid la mi byed cis kyang mi 'khrugs mnyam shes dang/ /gang la'ang chags dang yul gyis myos skrag med de mi 'bral mi
5b1(rgyud 'grel): gnas shing/ /mi 'phrogs mnyam shes bzhi po phyogs dang pha rol phyin rnams der shes te/ /sems kyi dbyibs su bsgoms pas lam 'di gzhan du bsgom pas 'od gsal mi 'gyur ro/ /brda' can yang dag len pa'ang byang chub chen por yin zhes ston pas rab gsungs phyir/ /de la 'di ni byang chub sems
5b2(rgyud 'grel): nyid bskyed cing bsgoms pa'i gnas yin te/ /ting 'dzin gsum pa bstan par byas nas rtags kyi phyag rgya gsum bcings nas/ /chos kyi phyag rgya chen por sems nyid skyed de snying po brjod cing bsgom pa'i gnas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bsgoms pas lam kun ma nor bsgoms pa yin/ /kun tu bzang mo'i 
5b3(rgyud 'grel): spyod pas ma zin dge ba'i chos ni gang yang rung/ /kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'ang bdud kyi las te zad cing mthar thug 'gyur/ /de dang ldan pa'i las ni bdud kyi las kyang byang chub spyod par gsungs/ /don 'dir mos pa de yang byang chub chen po yin zhes rgyal bas rab tu sngags/ /gnas 'dir bskyed pa
5b4(rgyud 'grel): tsam gyis 'jig rten gsum por bla mar bcas pa yi/ /mchod nas nyan thos bdud kyi sde rnams zil gyis gnon zhes sangs rgyas gsung/ /thabs chen byang chub sems dpa' i gsang ba'i spyod pa 'di nyid do/ /'di med rgyal ba rnam par snang mdzad theg pa gsum ston mi srid do/ /skad cig tsam
5b5(rgyud 'grel): du dad pa'i shugs bskyed de yang myur du 'jam dpal gzhon nur 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor gsang bar zhugs shing theg pa chen dam tshig mchog kyang bsrungs pa yin/ /tshul khrims sdom pa kun kyang srungs shing sbyin gnas ngam par rab tu bsngags/ /de phyir byang chub sems kyi bsod nams de
5b6(rgyud 'grel): la gzugs yod na/ /nam mkha' bar snang de yang snod du chungs zhes rgyal bas mtshungs par gsungs/ /skye bo skye ba sna tshogs dag las skyes shing skye 'gyur skye ba'i rgyun gyis dbang song ba/ /rtogs mdza' mi shes rtog pas bslus shing rtog pa'i rgyun 'brangs 'khrul ba'i rtog las phyir
5b7(rgyud 'grel): ldog med sgyur pa/ /sgyu ma'i sgyu shes dag cing sgyu ma'i glang po 'dra bar sgyu mas rmongs pa'i sgyu ma rnams/ /rmi lam gyis klad bzhin du rmi yis bden pa nyams shing rmi lam dbang du song ba'i rmi lam ba/ /lam 'di spong zhing mdza' dang lam gzhan lam du bltas nas ma nor lam zhes
6a1(rgyud 'grel): ston pa de/ /de dag rdol gser bzhin thugs rjer rung zhing thugs rje'i thugs rjes kye ma 'phros pa yin/ /shin tu ma sbyangs dus kyis mnar ba'i skye bo lnga brgya tha ma la/ /gsung rab dri med rtogs dga' dag la sgra bzhin spyod dang tshul bzhin min/ /rang gi blo
6a2(rgyud 'grel): gros stobs bzhin 'jug pa la sogs pa lta ba sna tshogs dag /mi shes chu bos g.yangs shing gsung gi nying khu bdud rtsi rnal 'byor bral/ /de phyir rgyal bas gsungs pa'i thugs kyi gsang ba 'di/ /kun du rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs kyi spyod yul thun mong ma yin yang/ /goms
6a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mthu yis mi 'gal tshul du tshad ma dag las rab bsgrubs te/ /'gro ba'i don du mi gnyis lam mchog 'di ni rab bgyis pas/ /skye bos skye gnas thams cad du yang skad cig tu/ /mi mthun phyogs kyis mi nyams rgyal ba kun gyis thugs 'dir rab rgyas shog /
6a4(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs so// //'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad do// (// */ /mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i cho ga mdo dang bsres pa slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa bzhugs//) /rgya gar skad du/ Arya many+dzu sh+rI nA ma so g+hi ti/ bi d+hi suA tra pin+t+ra ta/ bod skad du/ 'phags
6a5(rgyud 'grel): pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i cho ga mdo dang bsres pa/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ye shes sku can gtsug gi nor bu mtshan/ /sangs rgyas gzugs kyi tshul gnas kun la khyab/ /lam mchog dam pa ston pa sman pa'i
6a6(rgyud 'grel): mchog /sdug bsngal bdud 'dul 'jam mgon phyag 'tshal te/ /mtshan brjod bdud mdzod shin tu rtogs dga' ba/ /bdag blo mun pas dgrol bar mi nus kyang/ /dad pas phyogs bzung thigs pas nor bu gcig /lung dang man ngag dag la brten pa bshad/ /
6a7(rgyud 'grel): theg ba rnams kyi gzhir 'gyur ba/ /dus gsum rnams kyi lam mchog 'di/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul dang ni/ /slob dpon rnams kyi dgongs pa yis/ /theg pa sna tshogs thabs tshul gyis/ /dpag bsam shing chen 'dir phyogs tsam/ /ye shes lus can 'jam dpal
6b1(rgyud 'grel): gcig bur grub/ /mdo dang bsres pa'i cho ga rim pa ste/ /de la dang por sgrub pa po rigs dang ldan pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir yin/ gzhan yang dam tshig ji lta ba bzhin ston ces pa mtshan nyid dang ldan pa dang/ dbang thob par ston to/ /gzhan yang gsang sngags rig sngags
6b2(rgyud 'grel): 'chang ba'i rigs zhes pa dang/ /bden par smra zhing tshig mi 'gyur/ /ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed/ /ces pas sgrub pa'i snod du rung bar bstan/ /yon tan lam ri dang chu klung dang/ nags tshang tshing na 'dug kyang rung/ /zhes pa dang gnas rig pa dang ldan pa'i yid dga' bston to/ /
6b3(rgyud 'grel): bzang ngan shes shing dus shes la/ zhes pas/ bsgrub dus gza' dang rgyu skar dang/ nyi ma shis pa la bya ba'i rim pa bstan to/ /dpal ldan 'byor ba phun sum tshogs/ /zhes pas bsgrub pa'i rdzas su don dam rab tu gnas par bya ba dang/ maN+Dal gsum dang me tog dang
6b4(rgyud 'grel): dri'i byug pa dang mchod bya'i khyad par mang po dang/ blo brtan pa dang yo byad dang/ tshogs par bya ba'i rim par bstan to/ /yon tan las ma rungs pa 'dul ba'i rgyal po zhes pa dang/ gshin rje gshed po bgegs kyi rgyal zhes pas mtshams kyi rim pa/ hUM mtshan
6b5(rgyud 'grel): ma las khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje'i gshed mdog nag pa zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis pa/ thod dbyug dang sdigs mdzub byed pa/ sprul dang thod pas brgyan pa bskyed la/ ya mAn+ta ka hUM zhes pa dang/ mig tu ma dang Ta bkod de/ 'od zer gyi rdo rje'i ra ba dang/ dra ba bya bar bstan to/ /snying rje
6b6(rgyud 'grel): chen po'i blo yi mchog ces pa dang/ phan 'dogs sems can mnyes gshin pa/ zhes pas/ sems can gyi don du bdag gis 'jam dpal thob par bya'o zhes sems bskyed par ston to/ /gnyis med gnyis su med par ston ces pa/ a ni yig 'bru kun gyi mchog /ces pas
6b7(rgyud 'grel): thogs pa med pa'i byang chub kyi sems thabs dang shes rab kyi brdar gyur pa'i snying kar ye shes sems dpa' bsam par bya ba ston to/ /bla ma gsang sngags che ba'i mchog /ces pa dang/ mchod 'os bstod 'os phyag gis gnas/ /rtag tu rim gro bya ba'i 'os/ /bkur 'os rjed par bya
7a1(rgyud 'grel): bya ba'i mchog /phyag byar 'os pa bla ma'i bdag ces pa 'di ston to/ /bdag gi snying kar a dang hUM bsams te/ de las 'od 'phros pas bla ma dang/ dkon mchog gsum dang/ rje btsun 'jam dpal dang/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams spyan drangs nas/ bdag gis
7a2(rgyud 'grel): bltas te/ lus kyi bkod pa yan lag gsum bskor ba byas te phyag byas la bstod do/ /bum pa bzang po che ba'i mchog /ces pa dang/ dpag bsam shing chen rgyas pa ste/ zhes pas mchod pa'i khyad par nam mkha' ltar mnyam par bsgrubs la/ snying kha'i lha mos dbul lo
7a3(rgyud 'grel): zhes ston to/ /spyin bdag chen po'i gtso bo ste/ /tshul khrims chen po 'chang ba'i mchog /bzod chen 'chang ba ston pa po/ /brtson 'grus chen po brtul ba yi/ /zhes pa 'dis ston te/ sngags dang phyag rgya dang ldan pas/ bdag gi snying ka nas lha mo bzhi spros te/ gnas
7a4(rgyud 'grel): pa rnam pa gsum du mchod par bya'o/ /de bas na dbugs 'byin chen po dga' ston che/ /dga' chen rol mo chen po ste/ /bkur sti rim gro phun sum tshogs zhes pas ston to/ /bsam gtan chen po ting 'dzin gnas/ zhes bya ba dang/ smon lam ye shes rgya mtsho
7a5(rgyud 'grel): ste/ zhes bya ba dang/ byang chub yan lag me tog spos zhes bya bas/ phyi'i lha mo bzhi ste snying kha nas gong gi tshul du sngags dang phyag rgya dang bcas pas gnas su 'bul lo/ /mchod pa chen po 'dod chags che/ zhes pa nas/ dga' ba chen po mgu ba che zhes pa'i bar
7a6(rgyud 'grel): gyis/ /gsang ba bzhi mchog tu gsang ba bzhis bstan to/ /oM rdo rje sems dpa' bsdus pa na/ /rdo rje rin chen bla na med/ /rdo rje chos kyi glu blangs pas/ /rdo rje las kun byed pa'o/ /zhes bya ba 'di'i rkang pa dang/ gsang ba'i mchod pa'i dus su sgeg mo
7a7(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa dang/ rim pa bzhin du rkang ba bzhi dang glu blang bar bya'o/ /gzhan yang mchog tu gsang ba'i mchod pa dang/ chags pa la sogs pas dbul lo/ /rgyas par ma bye'o/ /zhes bstan to/ /de nas 'dud nyi shus bstod de/ yang na ni thams cad kyang bstod par shes
7b1(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o/ /de nas sdom pa bzung ba'i mthar yang de nyid kyis shes par bya'o/ /byams pa dang snying rje ni shin tu gsal par ston pas/ tshad med pa bzhi bsgoms zhes so/ /rnam par mi rtog dbyings mi zad/ /yang dag bdag med de bzhin nyid/ /yang dag mdza' de yi/ /
7b2(rgyud 'grel): ge med/ /chos dbyings dam pa zad min bdag /ces pas de'i don sgom pa ni/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i sngags brjod do/ /phyi dang nang gi dngos po stong bar bsgom zhes ston to/ /stong nyid dam pa 'dod chags blo/ /srid pa'i 'dod chags spangs pa ste/ /zhes pas pad+ma'i steng na dngos
7b3(rgyud 'grel): gzhi las 'das te/ dang po dam tshig sems dpa' sgom pa dang/ chos kyi 'byung nas/ de'i tha ma 'od zer lngas bskor ba'i nang du/ pad+ma zla ba'i steng na muM dmar skya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i phreng bar 'gyur ba las/ sprin dkar dag pa bzhin du dkar/ /'od bzang ston ka'i zla
7b4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i 'od/ /nyi ma shar ka'i dkyil ltar mdzes/ /sen mo'i 'od ni shin tu dmar/ /cod pan bzang po thon ka'i rtse/ /skra mchog mthon ka chen po can/ /zur phung lnga pa me tog thod/ /rgyan kun gyis ni rnam par brgyan/ /sdug gu 'jig rten gsum na mdzes/ /shes rab ral gri
7b5(rgyud 'grel): mda' gzhu thogs/ /rdo rje skyil krung rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /dpal ldan sgeg dang bsgegs par ldan/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang ba/ /nyon mongs g.yul du gcig dpa' ba/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnams kyis/ /rje btsun gyi sku sprul pa'i cha lugs bstan pa yin no//
7b6(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya bzhi yi don bstan pa zhes bya bas/ /yum bzhi'i phyag rgya sku 'phro 'du dang bcas pas byin gyis brlab par bstan to/ /phyogs bcur sprul pa sna tshogs 'gyed/ /ces pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang/ khro bo dang lha mo rnams thugs kar spros zhes pa'o/ de nas mdun du
7b7(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma dang zla ba la/ /ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs te/ dbang bskur ba dang mchod pa dang/ bstod pa gong bzhin du byas te/ ye shes sems dpa' bltas la dgug cing rang gi lus la bsgoms zhes pas gnyis su med par bya'o/ /rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur dpal/ /sangs rgyas lnga
8a1(rgyud 'grel): bdag cod pan can/ /zhes pas snying ka'i 'od kyis bskul te/ bum pa'i chus dbang bskur bas rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan dang ldan zhes bstan to/ /sprul pa'i 'khor lo sna tshogs 'chang/ /zhes pas rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcas la/ sngags dang
8a2(rgyud 'grel): bcas pas/ dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du sangs rgyas thams cad sprul la zhes ston to/ /de'i don ni 'og nas 'chad do/ /bdag rigs gzhan rigs thams cad pas/ /shes dang shes bya'i bdag po mchog /ces pa thams cad sems kyi sprul par shes par bya'o/ /
8a3(rgyud 'grel): de ltar rdzogs pa dang/ gsang sngags zlos pa dang/ mtshan klog par byas te/ de ltar yon tan brjod pa las kyang/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gsang sngags kyi sgo'i spyad pa spyod pa gang la la/ bcom ldan 'das ye shes sems dpa' thams cad sku gnyis su med pa'i don dam
8a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i ming yang dag par brjod pa'i ming ni/ gtsug gi nor bu 'di thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang/ mnyams shing lhag chad med par tshigs su bcad pa'i tshig dang yig 'bru 'di dag nyid kyi nyin gcig bzhin dus gsum du 'chang ba 'am/ klog pa dang/ kun chub bar byed
8a5(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ gzhan dag la yang dam tshig ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa dang/ ming gi don gang yang rung ba de re nas kyang 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' i sku la dmigs te zhes bya ba dang/ sems rtse gcig tu bsgom pa de la ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang/ gzhan yang yon tan
8a6(rgyud 'grel): las/ nyin re bzhin du dus gsum du mnyam par yi dam du lan gsum 'don tam/ glegs bam du byas pa la klog cing brjod la/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' i gzugs brnyan la dmigs shing/ gzugs dang gnyis su mthun par bsam
8a7(rgyud 'grel): gtan du byed pa ni/ 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir ring po mi thogs par de nyid du sprul pa'i gzugs kyi lus mthong par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don 'di yin te/ mtshan nyid kyi cho ga rdzogs shing/ dmigs pa yun ring du gnas pa des/ rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcas la
8b1(rgyud 'grel): many+dzu sh+rI hAM oM wA gi shwa ri muM/ maN+Dal tsakra hUM/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rnam par sprul la/ phyag sngon du 'gro bas mchod pa la sogs pas bdag gi lus de dang mnyam par sprul te/ mtshan gyi don re re nas bstod na/ yon tan gyi rnam
8b2(rgyud 'grel): pa 'di ltar smos pas bdag gzhan dpag tu med par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /mdor na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ring por mi thogs par dam pa bsngags pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /dam pa brgyud pa'i bla ma bdud rtsi 'thung/ /'gro ba sdug bsngal nad kyis gzir 'gyur la/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas
8b3(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi bstod chog 'di/ /sman pa'i rgyal po bzhin du bdag gis bshad do/ /'phrod pa'i sman bzhin kun la phan 'gyur nas/ /mi rtog ye shes 'chi med thob par shog /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i mdo'i don mdor bsdus pa'i cho ga /slob dpon 'jam
8b4(rgyud 'grel): dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa/ sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud le'u khri drug stong pa las/ rdo rje glu gar blangs pa'i le'u'i sgrub thabs mdo dang bsres pa rdzogs so// (// */ /gsang ldan gyi bka' 'grel don bsdus sgron ma paN+Di ta de bA ka ra tsanda sa mdzad pa//) bcom
8b5(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thugs rje dang ni shes rab gnyis/ /sangs rgyas kun ltar gnyis med pa/ /dam pa lam ston lta bu yi/ /sku yi rnam par 'char mdzad pa/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /slob mas legs par
8b6(rgyud 'grel): phyir dang/ /bdag nyid kyis kyang dran bya'i phyir/ /gsang ldan bka' 'grel 'dir brtsam bya/ /de nas dkyus nyid la 'jug par bya ste/ /gang 'di la sogs pa'i tshig rkang pa bzhis mchod par brjod pa ston te/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal nyid sangs rgyas thams
8b7(rgyud 'grel): cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi ngo bo nyid du bzhugs pa yin la/ de la slob dpon nyid lus ngag yid gsum gus pas phyag 'tshal ba bstan pa'o/ /zab cing la sogs pa rkang pa bzhis bshad par dam bca' ston pa te/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan zab cing rgyas ba'i mtshan/ rnal
9a1(rgyud 'grel): 'byor ci'i rgyud la brten nas/ gzhan dang bdag gi don du la gyur ba'i phyir bshad pa'o/ /thig le bcu drug mi shigs dbus la sogs pa rkang pa bcu drug gis gang la zhus pa dang gang gis zhus pa dang/ gang gi
9a2(rgyud 'grel): don du zhus pa ston pa las/ gang la zhus na sku gsum la zhus pa ston te/ thig le la sogs pa rkang pa bdun gyis chos sku brtan/ /gsang sngags la sogs pa rkang pa gnyis kyis longs sku bstan la/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa rkang pa gnyis kyis sprul sku bstan/
9a3(rgyud 'grel): byang chub la sogs pa rkang pa bzhis gang gis zhus pa bston cing blo zhan don phyir rim pa gsungs/ zhes pa rkang pa gcig gis gang gi don du zhus pa bstan pa'o/ /de ltar slad kyi don bstan nas gzhung la 'jug par bya ste/ gang gis gang du thabs ji ltar bya ba dang
9a4(rgyud 'grel): gsum du gnas pa las/ de la dang por rdo rje 'chang chen por/ /slob dpon cha lugs gnas byas te/ zhes pa rkang pa gnyis kyis gang zag gang gis bya ba ston te/ slob dpon rig pa'i gnas lnga la sbyangs pa/ de nyid bcu shes shing 'jigs pa med pas cha rkyen
9a5(rgyud 'grel): lnga dang ldan par bya ste/ phyi nang gi khrus dang/ phyi nang gi bsrung ba dang/ phyi nang gi gos bgo ba dang/ phyi nang gi byug pa dang/ gnas dang stan sngags chus bsangs la 'dug pa'o/ /bsam gtan dang ni rjes 'thun par la sogs pa'i rkang pa drug gis gnas dang/
9a6(rgyud 'grel): bsnyen pa ston pa la/ gnas ni rkang pa lnga yis ston te/ zla yis phye ba gnyis te/ bsnyen pa dang sgrub pa'i gnas so/ /sogs pa'i sgras ni sgrub pa'i gnas bsdu'o/ /der chag chag skyang nul bya zhing me tog gis nyams dga' bar bya'o/ /grogs bzang btsal la snyen pa
9a7(rgyud 'grel): brtsam zhes pa rkang pa gcig gis bsnyen pa bya bar dam bca' ba bstan pa'o/ /bdag dang sa gzhi yongs srung zhing la sogs pa rkang pa bzhis tshogs gsog pa'i bar chod bsrung ba bstan te/ rdo rje 'chang hUM mdzad du bsgyur la/ /g.yas dang g.yon gser gyi rdo rje
9b1(rgyud 'grel): dang dril bu bsnams pa khro zhing rngam pa'i thugs khar ma las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du hUM sngon po bsams la de las 'od byung bas rdo rje'i sa gzhi dang ra ba dang gur dang bla res dang dra bar gyur par bsam mo/ /rgyas pa la dga' ba rnams kyis ni/ sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rjes su 'brang ba 'am/ rdo
9b2(rgyud 'grel): rje rtse mo dag gi rjes su 'brang ba las shes par bya'o/ /'dir ni bla ma'i man ngag bsdus pa'o/ /de nas shin tu rtser ldan pas/ sbyin sreg gis ni mnyes par bya zhes pa rkang pa gnyis kyis tshogs gsog pa'i yo byad sprul pa ston te/ de la spyir sbyang zhing bsreg pa dang/ so so'i sngags
9b3(rgyud 'grel): dang phyag rgya byin gyis brlab bo/ /spyir sbyang zhing bsreg pa ni rdo rje gnod sbyin nam/ rdo rje rtse mo yongs su bzlas pa'i spros chus bsang gtor bya ba ni spyir sbyang ba'o/ /rdo rje me'i sngags dang phyag rgya mi gtsang ba la sogs pa bsregs pa ni sreg pa'o/ /so so'i sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlab pa ni/ til dang
9b4(rgyud 'grel): nas dang ku sha dang/ 'bras yos dang dri bzang po dang/ me tog dkar po dang ldan pa'i mchod yon la sngon du rdo rje'i gar byas la rdo rje'i thal mo kha phye ba'i mchod yon gyi phyag rgya bcas pa la/ oM a ra pa tsa na ya te na ma 'am/ oM badzra satwa hUM/ lan gsum mam bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig gis
9b5(rgyud 'grel): byin gyis brlab bo/ de bzhin du me tog dang spos dang mar me dang dri dang byug pa dang lha bshos dang gtor ma la sogs pa rnams mi'i las 'das nas/ lha'i mchod rdzas khyad par can du bsam mo/ /de bzhin du sbyin sreg la yang bza' ba zas kyi mchod pa zhes bya ste/ gzhung bzhin du bsham
9b6(rgyud 'grel): zhing byin gyis brlab/ /sngon du bsnyen par ba 'bad de/ zhes bya ba la sogs pa rkang pa bco lngas rten gyi zhing sprul par ston te/ de yang sngon du bsnyen pa zhes pa rkang pa bzhi rten gyi zhing nam mkha' la sprul par ngam bca' bar ston la/ lag pa'i 'du byed ces pa rkang pa bcu gcig
9b7(rgyud 'grel): gis rnal 'byor pa bdag nyid kyi lus ngag yid kyi sbyor bas zhing spyan drangs pa ston te/ de yang bdag gis g.yas dang g.yon gyi sor mo la oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM trAM hI(rgyud 'grel): lta bkod la/ de nas mdzub mo gnyis mthe chung gnyis so sor mdud la de bkan la/ oM badzra tsakra hUM zhes brjod cing byon
10a1(rgyud 'grel): par bsams mo/ /gang byon zhe na rigs lnga 'am gcig gam drug gam rigs gsum mdun gyi nam mkha' la byon pa'o/ /gang gis byon zhe na/ lus ngag yid kyi sbyor bas so/ /de ltar mkha' la zhes pa rkang pa gnyis kyis bdag dang zhing du
10a2(rgyud 'grel): 'brel par bya ba ston te/ mdun gyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha de rnams yang bem po lta bu ma yin te/ rig pa can spyan rtsa rig rig pa snyan cha khrol khrol par bsam pa'o/ /dga' ba'i mchod pa glu yis bstod ces pa tshigs bcad sum cu rtsa lngas cho ga dag pa yan lag bcu'i
10a3(rgyud 'grel): sgo nas bsod nams kyi tshogs gsag par bya ba ston te/ de yang dag pas mchod ces pa rkang pa lngas phyag 'tshal ba dang/ mchod pa dang/ sdig pa bshags pa dang/ bsod nams thams cad la rjes su yi rang ba dang/ mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol ba gdab pa
10a4(rgyud 'grel): dang/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang/ bdag dbul ba dang/ dngos grub blang ba dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba dang dgu ste/ de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'breng ba dang sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rjes su 'breng ba las shes par bya ste/ tshigs bcad sngags dang phyag rgya yis me tog la
10a5(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa rnam pa lnga phul/ oM badzra lA sya hUM/ oM badzra mA le trAM/ oM badzra gI tI h+rI/ oM badzra nirtI a/ oM badzra satwa su saM gra haM/ badzra ratna ma nut+tA raM/ badzra d+harmA ka ya ne/ badzra karmA ka rodb+ha be/ oM badzra d+hu be hUM/ oM badzra puShpe trAM/ oM badzra A lo ke h+rI:/
10a6(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra gand+he a/ sgeg mo la sogs mchod pa brgyad kyis yang dag par mchod la/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta At+mA nAM niryA ta na pU dza spha ra Na karma badzri a/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta At+mA nAM nIryA ta na pU dza spha ra Na karmA gri dza/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta At+mA nI niryA tA nu rA ga Na pU dza spha ra
10a7(rgyud 'grel): Na karma pA ne hUM ho/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta At+mA nAM niryA ta na sA d+hu ka ra pU dza spha ra Na karma duSh+Ti a/ oM na ma(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga ta ka yA b+hi She ka ratne bo badzra ma ni oM/ oM na ma(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga ta sUrye b+hyo badzra to dza ni dza la h+ri/ oM sarba ta thA ga tA sha pa ri pU ra Na tsan+ta ma ni d+hA
10b1(rgyud 'grel): dzA gre b+hyo badzra d+hwa dzA gri traM/ oM nam(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga ta mahA pri ti pra mo rya ka re b+hyo badzra hAsya ha/ oM sarba ta thA ga tA nu ra ta badzra d+harma ta sa ma ti/ b+histu no mi mahA d+harme grI d+hi/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA nirha rai stu no mi mahA g+ho ShA nu g+he d+haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsakrA k+Sha ra pa ri barta d+hi? sarba su
10b2(rgyud 'grel): tran+ta na ye stu no mi sarba maN+Da le hUM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta sanb+ha b+ha Sha bud+d+ha saM g+hi hi/ b+hi yaM stu no mi badzre badzre paM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+hu pa me g+ha spha ra Na pU dza karma ka ra ka ra/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta puShpa pra sa spha ra Na pU dz+nyA kArme ki ri ki ri/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta A lo ke dzwa la
10b3(rgyud 'grel): spha ra Na pU dza karma pa ra pa ra/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ga d+ha sa mu tra spha ra Na pU dza karme ku ru ku ru/ zhes bya ba sems dpa' bcu drug dang 'dra ba'i rig ma las kyi phyag rgya dang ldan pa rnams kyis mchod par bya'o/ /de'i phyag rgya ni 'di rnams te/ rdo rje bsdams pa bskur bzhag ste bcings
10b4(rgyud 'grel): la/ gnyis su byas pa'i khu tshur gnyis/ /bsgyings bcas gsor la gnyi ka yis/ /lcags kyu 'dzin ltar gnas pa dang/ /mnga' 'phang ba yi tshul dang ni/ /legs so zhes pa snying khar bzhag /dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje gnyis/ /snying khar nyi ma bstan par bya/ /
10b5(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa la ni gru mo gzugs/ /de bzhin kha phyogs bskor bar bya/ /g.yas pa yis ni g.yon pa dbye/ /snying khar g.yon pa ral gri mdud/ /mgal me'i 'khor lo bskor ba dang/ /rdo rje gnyi ka kha nas dbyung/ /rdo rje gar bskor bgrol ba yi/ /thal mo 'gram ba spyi bor bzhag
10b6(rgyud 'grel): go cha mthe chung mche ba dang/ khu tshur gnyis ni mnan pa'o/ /de nas phyogs thams cad nas dkyil 'khor la yan lag lngas phyag btsal bar bsam zhing 'dis phyag bya ba ni/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya wa k+tsit+ta pra na me na badzra band+ha naM ka ro mi/ /de nas phyag bzhi bya ste/
10b7(rgyud 'grel): 'di ltar shar phyogs nas rdo rje thal mo rkyang ba lus thams cad phab ste/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dzo pha snyA nA ya At+mA nAM niryA ta yA mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta badzra satwA d+hi tiSh+Tha swA mAM/ zhes bya ba 'dis phyag bya'o/ /de nas lho phyogs nas de bzhin du gnas pa las rdo rje thal mo snying
11a1(rgyud 'grel): khar sbyar te/ /dpral bas la reg par byas la/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dzA bi She ka ya At+mA nAM niryA ta yA mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta badzra ratNA b+hi Shany+tsa maM/ zhes pa 'dis phyag bya'o/ /de nas nub phyogs nas ji skad bshad pa bzhin rdo rje thal mo spyi bor bzhag ste kha sa la
11a2(rgyud 'grel): reg pa dang/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza pra barta nA ya At+mA nAM niryA ta yA mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta badzra d+harma pra barta ya mAM/ zhes bya ba 'dis phyag bya'o/ /de nas byang phyogs nas de bzhin du gnas pa las rdo rje thal mo spyi bo nas phab ste/ 1 snying khar sbyar la spyi bo sa la reg par
11a3(rgyud 'grel): byas te/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza karma Ne At+mA nAM niryA ta yA mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta badzra karma ku ru maM/ zhes bya ba 'dis phyag bya'o/ /de nas me tog gi phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ gang yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'am/ gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi
11a4(rgyud 'grel): khams thams cad na lha dang mi rnams kyi me tog gi bye brag yid las byung ba 'am/ chu las skyes pa 'am/ thang las skyes pa gang dag yod pa de dag rnams 'di lta ste/ ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i las bya pa'i phyir
11a5(rgyud 'grel): phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rigs lnga dang bcas par bzhugs pa thams cad dang/ snying po dang phyag rgya dang gsang sngags dang/ rig sngags kyi lha'i khyad par thams cad la dbul bar bgyi'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta puShpa pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra spha ra Na
11a6(rgyud 'grel): sa ma ye hUM/ bdug pa'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/ /gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na lha dang mi rnams kyi bdug pa'i bye brag lhan cig pa 'am/ yang dag par sbyar ba 'am/ /yongs su gyur pa gang dag yod pa de
11a7(rgyud 'grel): rnams 'di lta ste/ ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir/ phyogs bcu sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rigs lnga dang bcas par bzhugs pa thams cad dang/ snying po dang phyag rgya dang gsang sngags
11b1(rgyud 'grel): dang rigs sngags kyi lha'i khyad par thams cad la dbul bar bgyi'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+hu pa pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ mar me'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ gang yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'am/ gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams
11b2(rgyud 'grel): cad na lha dang mi rnams kyi snang ba'i bye brag yid las byung ba 'am/ rin po che'i 'od dam mar me'i snang ba la sogs pa gang dag yod pa de rnams 'di lta ste/ ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang
11b3(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' rigs lnga dang bcas pa thams cad dang/ snying po dang phyag rgya dang gsang sngags dang rig sngags kyi lha'i khyad par thams cad la dbul bar bgyi'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta A lo ke pU dza me g+ha sa mu da spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ dri'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces
11b4(rgyud 'grel): brjod par bya ste/ gang yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'am gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na lha dang mi rnams kyi dri'i bye brag lhan cig skyes pa 'am/ yang dag par sbyor ba 'am yongs su gyur pa gang dag yod pa de rnams 'di lta ste/ ma lus shing
11b5(rgyud 'grel): lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rigs lnga dang bcas par bzhugs pa thams cad dang/ snying po dang phyag rgya dang gsang sngags dang rig sngags kyi lha'i khyad par
11b6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad la dbul bar bgyi'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta gand+hya pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas bzhad pa'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ gang yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'am/ gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na lha dang mi rnams
11b7(rgyud 'grel): kyi rgod pa dang sgeg pa dang dga' ba dang rtse 'jo'i bde ba'i bye brag gang dag yod pa de rnams 'di lta ste/ ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rigs lnga dang bcas par
12a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs pa thams cad dang/ snying po dang phyag rgya dang gsang sngags dang rig sngags kyi lha'i khyad par thams cad la dbul bar bgyi'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta ha syo lA sye ra ti kri Ta sau khyA nurt+ta ra pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ bzhad pa'i phyag rgya de
12a2(rgyud 'grel): nyid thal mo bskor ba 'di spyi bo bzhag la/ yang thal mo khong stong du sbyar ba bcings nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ gang yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'am/ gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na/ dpag bsam gyi shing ngam gos kyi shing gar
12a3(rgyud 'grel): dag yod pa de rnams 'di lta ste/ ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rigs lnga dang bcas par bzhugs pa thams cad dang/ snying po dang phyag rgya dang gsang sngags
12a4(rgyud 'grel): dang rig sngags kyi lha'i khyad par thams cad la dbul bar bgyi'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga tA nut+tar bo d+hya laM ka ra bastwa pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ sgeg mo'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ sems can thams cad yo byad thams cad kyi yang
12a5(rgyud 'grel): dag par 'byor cing phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 'dod pa tsam la rag lus par gyur cig /oM sarba ta thA ga ta mahA badzro db+ha ba dA na pA ra mi tA pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ rdo rje phreng ma'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ sems can thams
12a6(rgyud 'grel): cad kyi mi dge ba'i lus dang/ ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mdza' thams cad dang yang dag par bral bar gyur cig /dge ba'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mdza' thams cad dang yang dag par ldan par gyur cig /oM sarba ta thA ga tA nut+ta ra mahA bo d+hi ha ra shI la
12a7(rgyud 'grel): pA ra mi ta pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ rdo rje glu mkhan ma'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ sems can thams cad mtshan dang dpe byad thams cad kyis lus la yang dag par brgyan par byas pa dang/ rtag tu phan tshun 'jigs pa med
12b1(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ zhe 'bras pa med par bzhugs shing mig dang yid mngon par dga' ba dang/ chos zab mo la bzod pa dang ldan par gyur cig /oM sarba ta thA ga tA nut+ta ram hA d+harmA wa bo d+hi k+ShAn+ti pA ra mi tA pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ rdo rje gar mkhan ma'i phyag rgya bcings la/ 'di skad
12b2(rgyud 'grel): ces brjod par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa' i spyod pa la mngon par brtson pa dang ldan pa dang/ sangs rgyas nyid du yongs su gzhol zhing 'khor ba yongs su mi spong ba'i brtson 'grus dang ldan par gyur cig /oM sarba ta thA ga ta saM sa rA pa ri tya kA nutpa ? hA
12b3(rgyud 'grel): pAryi bA ra mi ta pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM zab mo khong stong sbyor ba bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/ /gang yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'am/ gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na/ rin po che'i ri bo 'am/ rgya mtsho'i rin po che'i tshigs?
12b4(rgyud 'grel): gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang 'di lta ste/ ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rigs lnga dang bcas par zhugs pa thams
12b5(rgyud 'grel): cad dang snying po dang phyag rgya dang/ gsang sngags kyi lha'i khyad par thams cad la dbul bar bgyi'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta bo d+hyaM ga ratnA lo ka ra pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan sna tshogs pas rnam par bkram
12b6(rgyud 'grel): pa/ brgya stong la sogs pa'i grangs snying dam/ 'byor pa ci yod pa ltar dbul bar bya ba dang/ ro brgya pa'i lhag ba'i zhal zas dang/ swasti ka la sogs pa'i bza' ba rnam pa sna tshogs 'bum mam brgya stong snyed dbul bar bya ste/ oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA tAM/
12b7(rgyud 'grel): A ba nutpan+na twA ta zhes brjod pa dbul bar bya'o/ /rol mo bcu phrag stong ngam rol mo brgya phrag stong ngam rol mo su/ oM hUM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): mngon par zlas la dbul bar bya'o/ /rnam pa bcu ni 'di lta ste/ gling bu dang/ pi wang dang/ rdza rnga dang/ rdza rnga chung ngu dang/ cha lang dang rnga bo che dang/
13a1(rgyud 'grel): mri taM ga dang/ rnga ring dang/ rnga skad nyer dang/ ta mi la zhes bya'o/ /shin tu brtags pa'i rta dang/ glang po che dang ba lang gi khyu rnams kyang/ oM badzra spha ra Na kham zhes bya bas mngon par bzlas la dbul bar bgyi'o/ /chos thams cad ni dngos po
13a2(rgyud 'grel): med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang/ stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa'i rnam par lhag par mos pa byas la/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta gu hya pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de nas pus mo'i lha nga gnyis sa la btsugs te/ rdo rje
13a3(rgyud 'grel): thal mo snying khar sbyar nas sdig pa thams cad bshags par bya ste/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang rdo rje dang/ rin po che dang/ pad+ma dang/ las kyi rigs su bzhugs pa thams cad dang/ snying po dang
13a4(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya dang gsang sngags dang/ rig sngags kyi lha thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /bdag ming rdo rje 'di zhes bya ba phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ rdo rje dang rin po che dang/ pad+ma dang las
13a5(rgyud 'grel): kyi rigs su bzhugs pa thams cad dang/ snying po dang phyag rgya dang/ gsang sngags dang rig sngags kyi lha thams cad kyi spyan sngar sdig pa thams cad bla na med par so sor bshags pas so sor bshags par bgyi'o/ /phyogs bcu na 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar
13a6(rgyud 'grel): byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang 'phags pa nyan thos yang dag par song ba dang/ yang dag par zhugs pa rnams dang/ sems can thams cad kyi tshogs thams cad kyi bsod nams thams cad la rgya cher rjes su yi rang
13a7(rgyud 'grel): bar bgyi'o/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar mi mdzad pa thams cad la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya ba'i phyir bskul bar bgyi'o/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bzhed
13b1(rgyud 'grel): pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad la mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol 'tshal lo/ /de nas bdag nyid dbul bar bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la dag nyid dbul gyis/ bdag dus thams cad dang rnam pa thams cad du so sor bzhes su
13b2(rgyud 'grel): gsol/ /thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa'i mgon po khyed rnams kyis dam tshig chen po'i dngos grub bdag la stsal du gsol/ /bdag gi dge ba'i las rnams 'di dag gis/ /'jig rten du ni myur du sangs rgyas shog /'gro la phan phyir chos rnams ston bgyid
13b3(rgyud 'grel): cing/ /sems can sdug bsngal mang pos gzir las dgrol/ /zhes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos la/ de nas bstod pa ni 'khrugs sdeb par bya ste /tshigs bcad glu yis bstod par bya/ /byang chub sems ni ral 'byung
13b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs bcad sum cu rtsa gnyis dang rkang pa gcig gis bstod pa ston pa ni/ tshigs bcad glu yis bstod par bya/ /byang chub sems ni rang 'byung ba'i/ /'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ /don chen yi ger ma
13b5(rgyud 'grel): dam pa yin/ /mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog khyod 'dud/ /sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad che/ /gti mug blo ste gti mug sel/ /mgon pos bcu'i dbang phyug ste/ /rdo rje chags pa khyod la 'dud/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed 'jigs par byed/ /gdong drug mig drug
13b6(rgyud 'grel): lag drug po/ /mche gtsigs gdong brgya kun 'dul ba/ /sangs rgyas rol ston khyod la 'dud/ /yang dag bdag med de bzhin nyid/ /stong nyid smra ba'i khyu mchog ste/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang ba/ /med pa las byung khyod la 'dud/ /'dod pa'i don
13b7(rgyud 'grel): grub ngan song sbyong/ /mgon po nyon mongs dra ba 'joms/ /sa gzhi tshangs gnas rkang bas gnon/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rtog bya ba/ /thig le chen po yi ge med/ /longs spyod rdzogs sku kun gyi rgyal/ /sangs rgyas rol ston khyod
14a1(rgyud 'grel): la 'dud/ /me long ye shes ngo bo nyid/ /a ni yig 'bru kun gyi mchog /khong nas byung ba skye ba med/ /sems ma rdo rje mchog khyod 'dud/ /mnyam nyid ye shes ngo bo nyid/ /a ni 'byung ba 'gog pa ste/ /tshig tu brjod pa rnam spangs pa
14a2(rgyud 'grel): rin chen 'byung ba khyod la 'dud/ /so sor kun rtog ngo bo nyid/ /ma ni brjod pa'i rgyu yin te/ /brjod pa kun gyi rgyu yi mchog /chos kyi rdo rje 'dzum khyod 'dud/ /bya ba nan tan ngo bo nyid/ /a ni tshig 'bru gsal bar byed/ /tshig kun gsal bar byed pa yin//
14a3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dra ba khyod la 'dud/ /stong pa rang bzhin 'dod chags che/ /sangs rgyas 'dod la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /phyi nyid ma grub bde ba che/ /sangs rgyas rol la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /gnyig med par dga' ba che/ /sangs rgyas chags pa khyod la 'dud//
14a4(rgyud 'grel): stong pa'i don ldan mgu ba che/ /sangs rgyas dgyes pa khyod la 'dud/ /gzugs che lus kyang che ba ste/ /sangs rgyas 'dzum pa khyod la 'dud/ /kha dog che la gzigs brjid ldan/ /med pa las byung khyod la 'dud/ /ming che mtshan bzang rgya che ba/ /sangs
14a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyas thugs la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /bzhad cing dkyil 'khor yangs khyab pa/ /sangs rgyas bzhad pa khyod la 'dud/ /chos kyi shes rab mtshon byang ba/ /sangs rgyas gsung ba khyod la 'dud/ /nyon mongs dra ba gcod pa'i mchog /sangs rgyas 'byung
14a6(rgyud 'grel): ba khyod la 'dud/ /grags pa rdo rje rgyu yi bdag /nam mkha' las byung khyod la 'dud/ /snang ba chen po gsal ba che/ /ye shes las byung khyod 'dud/ /mkhas shing 'phrul 'chang rdo rje las/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba khyod la 'dud/ /sgyu 'phrul chen po go cha sra/ /
14a7(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas rol ston khyod la 'dud/ /sgyu 'phrul bdag nyid gnod sbyin gtso/ /thams cad thams cad khyod la 'dud/ /sgyu 'phrul khu tshur bstan zhing sdud/ /ye shes sku nyid khyod la 'dud/ /sbyin bdag chen po'i gtso bo ste/ /rdo rje sgeg mo khyod la 'dud
14b1(rgyud 'grel): tshul khrims chen po 'chang ba'i mchog /rdo rje dpal 'phreng khyod la 'dud/ /bzod chen 'chang ba ston pa po/ /rdo rje dbyangs mkhan khyod la 'dud/ /brtson 'grus chen po brtul pa yi/ /rdo rje gar mkhan khyod la 'dud/ /bsam gtan chen po'i ting 'dzin gnas/ /rdo rje me tog
14b2(rgyud 'grel): kyang la 'dud/ /shes rab chen po lus 'chang ba/ /rdo rje bdug pa khyod la 'dud/ /smon lam ye shes rgya mtsho ste/ /rdo rje mar me gsal la 'dud/ /stobs po che la thabs che ba/ /rdo rje dag byed khyod la 'dud/ /rdo rje lcags kyu 'dren pa che/ /rdo rje 'gugs byed khyod la
14b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dud/ /rdo rje zhags pa rnam par rgyal/ /rdo rje 'dren byed khyod la 'dud/ /rdo rje lcags sgrog 'dzin pa che/ /rdo rje sdom byed khyod la 'dud/ /rdo rje 'bebs pa rnam rgyal zhags/ /rdo rje 'bebs pa khyod la 'dud/ /byams chen rang bzhin dpag tu med/ /snying rje chen po blo
14b4(rgyud 'grel): yi mchog/ shes rab chen po blo chen ldan/ /mkhas pa chen po thabs che ba/ /ye shes cha grub sems dpa' i tshogs/ /stong pa nyid kyi sgor gnas pa/ /bag la nyal la byams sems can/ /shes rab snying rjer ldan la 'dud/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs dang
14b5(rgyud 'grel): ldan/ /shugs chen mgyogs pa chen po ste/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po cher grags pa/ /stobs chen pha rol gnon pa'o/ /stobs chen rdzu 'phrul bzhir ldan pa'i/ /goms shugs ye shes bzhir ldan pa/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing stobs kyis gnon/ /tshogs
14b6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis rdzogs pa khyod la 'dud/ /srid pa'i ri bo chen po 'joms/ /mkhregs shing rdo rje chen po 'dzin/ /drag po chen po mun pa 'joms/ /'jigs chen 'jigs par byed pa'o/ /phung po lnga dag lha chen 'dul/ /mi shes ri 'joms sra ba po/ /mya ngan
14b7(rgyud 'grel): kun sel drag po ste/ /che bas che ba khyod la 'dud/ /mgon po rigs mchog chen po ste/ /bla ma gsang sngags che ba'i mchog /theg pa chen po'i tshul la gnas/ /theg pa chen po'i tshul gyi mchog /'khor ba mya ngan skyob pa'i mchog /theg pa'i tshul mchog
15a1(rgyud 'grel): lam gnas pa'i/ /phyag rgya'i mchog tu grub byed pa'i/ /pha rol sa bcu gtso la 'dud/ /'dud nyi shu dang spyi bstod kyis kyang bstod/ /de ltar bstod pa byed pa de/ /'khor lo 'dud pa'i gtso mcho 'grub/ /zhes pa rkang pa gnyis kyis
15a2(rgyud 'grel): bstod pa byas pa'i phan yon ston te/ de ltar bstod pas rigs thams cad kyi thun mong gi dngos grub thams cad dang mchog gi dngos grub 'grub par 'byung ngo/ /dgyes nas bdag la lha rnams kyis/ /snyan pa'i tshig gis bstod par bsam/ /zhes
15a3(rgyud 'grel): bya ba rkang pa gnyis kyis/ /lha rnams kyis bdag la bstod par ston to/ /lha rnams thams cad kyi zhal nas rigs kyi bu bdag gzhan gyi don du lha rnams la bstod pa legs so/ /legs so zhes gsungs par bsam mo/ /drin gyi tshul
15a4(rgyud 'grel): gyis slar bstod pa/ /zhes pa rkang pa gcig gis slar lha rnams la bdag gis drin la lan gyi tshul gyis bstod pa thams cad dam/ 'dud nyi shus bstod pa'o/ /de dag ni mchog gi rgyal po sbyor ba dang po'i 'khor lo'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /zhes rkang
15a5(rgyud 'grel): pa gcig gis sbyor ba dang po'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par bstan pa'o/ /de nas rim pa 'di ldan pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshig bcad nyi shu rtsa brgyad rkang pa gsum gyis yongs su dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ston te/ phyag bya zhing smon pa byang chub
15a6(rgyud 'grel): mchog gi sems bskyed sdom pa bzung ba dang/ 'jug pa byang chub mchog gi sems bskyed pa/ ye shes lnga bsgom ston te/ go sla ba'i phyir 'dir ma spros so/ /de nas da la mngon 'byung gzugs/ zhes pa nas/ de dag ni gzhi'i ting nge 'dzin te/ /
15a7(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba'i bar gyis gzhi'i ting nge 'dzin ston te/ rdo rje dang mchod rten dang chos 'byung dang rgya gram dang/ gzhal yas khang dang gdan rnams bskyed pa ston pa'o/ /de yang de ni yi ge rdzogs pa las zhes bya bas chos 'byung nang du yi ge a kha dog sna
15b1(rgyud 'grel): tshogs pa 'am kha dog dkar pos sna tshogs rdo rje bsgom par 'brel to/ /de yang slob dpon la la dag rgya gram khong du 'dod la/ 'dir sa gzhi'i tshul du brtag par bya'o/ /de nas rkyen gyis slong ba ni/ zhes pa nas dang po'i sangs rgyas sgom pa'i ting nge 'dzin to
15b2(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa'i bar gyis gzhi'i sangs rgyas dang/ dang po'i sangs rgyas bskyed pa bstan pa'o/ /de yang dang po'i sangs rgyas zhal lnga pa zhes pa ni/ shar la sogs pa'i zhal bzhi ni sngon po dang/ ser po dang dmar po dang/ ljang gu rnams so/ /steng gi zhal
15b3(rgyud 'grel): rnams ni lha zhal dkar po 'am/ rta zhal dkar po la rdog ma sngon po can no/ /dang po'i sangs rgyas thugs ka ru/ /zhes pa nas de dag ni rigs kyi dbang gis 'khor lo'i rim pa bstan pa yin no/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gyis shes rab kyi 'khor lo'i rim pa rnams
15b4(rgyud 'grel): ston te/ rigs kyi dbang gis 'khor lo bdun 'gyur du shes par bya'o/ /da ni dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i ngo bo gsang sngags kyi sgo nas de dag gi rim pa bskyed par bya ste/ zhes pa nas de dag ni dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin te/ /zhes
15b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bar gyis lha bsgom zhing dbyung ba dang/ dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog skyed pa bstan pa ste/ dkyus ma nyid gsal ba'i phyir 'dir ma dkrol lo/ /'on kyang sngags don rnam par gzigs pa las dkyil 'khor drug tu gsungs pa dang/ gsang ldan 'di
15b6(rgyud 'grel): nyid las sngon du shes rab kyi 'khor lo bdun 'gyur du gsungs pas/ dkyil 'khor gyi lhag ma gzhan yang bshad par bya ste/ mtshan brjod pa'i gsung rab kyi mtshan brjod pas/ dkyil 'khor pa rnams rdzogs par bskyed pa 'am/ yang na rdo rje
15b7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo'i sngags dang phyag rgya cig car du sprul pa'o/ /de yang thabs thun mong ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis dang/ thabs khyad par gyi dkyil 'khor lnga dang bdun du shes par bya'o/ /gsang sngags 'di'i dkyil 'khor ni rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i
16a1(rgyud 'grel): khongs su bsdu'o/ /khyad par ni gzhal yas khang sgo gnyis pa'o/ /de nas las kyi khyad par yang bskyed pa'i zhar las byung ba ste/ sgra las 'phel te rgyas bshad pas/ /'di ru bdag gis ma bshad do/ /las kyi khyad par gyi ting nge 'dzin to zhes las
16a2(rgyud 'grel): las rgyal mchog gi ting nge 'dzin bstan pa ste/ de nas las kyi khyad par yang/ /bskyed pa'i zhar las khyung ba ste/ /zhes bya bas dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog bskyed nas las rgyal mchog gi ting nge 'dzin bsgom par dam bcas pa'o/ /sgra las 'phel te rgyas bshad pas/ /'di ? ?
16a3(rgyud 'grel): gis ma bshad do/ /zhes bya ba las rgyal mchog gi ting nge 'dzin gyi rim pa bla mas zhes bya ba'i don te/ bla ma'i man ngag ni bcu'i sgo nas shes par byas te/ sgo bzhi'i dbye ba dang rang bzhin gyis sangs rgyas bsdu ba dang mdun gyi nam mkha' la ye shes sems dpa' byon te/ dam tshig gi
16a4(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor la phyag btsal ba dang/ ched du brjod pa dang/ spyi'i gtso bo byin gyis brlab pa dang/ sgon bkur gyi gtso bo byin gyis brlab pa dang/ dbang nod pa dang/ ye shes bstim pa dang/ phyag rgyas gdab pa dang/ lha las sbyar ba'i rim par shes par bya'o/ /de las de yang las mkhan rang
16a5(rgyud 'grel): byed la sgo bzhi dbye ba ni/ dang po'i sangs rgyas kyi nga rgyal gyi sdig mdzub kyi se gol gtog cing/ /phreng sngags brjod pas sgo bzhi dbye bar bsam mo/ /yang na bdag nyid dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bdug par bsam ste/ khro bo hUM mdzad du bsgoms la khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis bcings te
16a6(rgyud 'grel): mdzub mo gnyis lto sprang la drag tu brdab pa ni sgo dbye ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /oM badzra dg+ha ta sa ma ya pra be sha ya hUM zhes brjod pas dkyil 'khor gyi sgo bzhi dbye bar bsam mo/ /de ni sgo dbye ba'o/ /de nas rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor bsdu ba ni/ /sgrub pa po'i snying khar a las sna tshogs rdo rje
16a7(rgyud 'grel): bsams te/ mthe bo mdzub mo la zla ba'i steng du dza bsams te/ lag par gnyis rdo rje rgya bla ma gyi tshul du bsnol te/ dpung pa gnyis su se gol gtog cing/ rdo rje bsdu ba'i snying po oM badzra sa mA dza(rgyud 'grel): dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho/ zhes brjod cing/ mtheb mdzug gi dza las ye shes kyi 'od zer lcags kyu lta
16b1(rgyud 'grel): bur 'phros te/ rang bzhin gyi gnas nas ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor dam tshig pa dang 'dra ba byon par bsam mo/ /de yang gzhung las rdo rje sems dpa' i sbyor bas bdag/ lag dar gnyis ni rdo rjer bcing/ /rdo rje se gol brdabs pa yis/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bya zhes 'byung bas so
16b2(rgyud 'grel): byon te phyag 'tshal ba bstan pa ni/ /de nas ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyis/ /dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab par bya ba'i phyir/ dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor la/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya wik+tsat+ta/ pra Na me na badzra banda naM ka ro mi zhes brjod cing dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor la
16b3(rgyud 'grel): phyag btsal bar bsam mo/ /de nas ched du brjod pa ni/ e ma'o kun tu bzang po yi/ /byang chub sems dpa' i spyod pa'i mchog /de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo yis/ /dbus na de bzhin gshegs pa mdzes/ /zhes ched du brjod par bsam mo/ /de nas spyi gtso bo byin gyis
16b4(rgyud 'grel): brlab ba ni/ /rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor nas spyan drangs pa'i lha lnga bcu rtsa gsum po thams cad dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo rdo rje 'chang chen po'i thugs khar zhugs nas/ spyi'i gtso bo rdo rje 'chang chen po lha thams cad kyi rang bzhin du byin gyis brlab par bsam /
16b5(rgyud 'grel): de nas rdo rje 'chang chen po'i thugs kha nas ye shes lha tshogs thon te/ nam mkha' la gnas so/ /de nas sngon bkur ba'i gtso bo byin gyis brlab pa ni/ e ma sangs rgyas thams cad ni/ /rgya chen gdod nas skyes pa min/ /rdul gran ji snyed thams cad kyis/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni
16b6(rgyud 'grel): gcig tu gyur zhes brjod nas/ /shar phyogs pa rnams kyis ye shes kyi lha tshogs ni mi bskyod pa'i thugs khar zhugs te/ mi bskyod pa byin gyis brlabs nas/ mi bskyod pa'i thugs kha nas slar thon ate/ rang rang gi dam tshig gi lha byin gyis brlabs par bsam mo/ /de bzhin du lho
16b7(rgyud 'grel): phyogs dang nub phyogs dang byang phyogs kyang shes par bya'o/ /de nas dbang nod pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ste/ dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor la ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyis dbang bskur bar bsam pa dang/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha la sgrub pa pos dbang nod pa'o/ /dam tshig la
17a1(rgyud 'grel): ye shes kyis dbang bskur bar bsam pa ni/ rigs lnga la rin po che'i cod pan dang dar dpyangs kyis dbang bskur ba'o/ /de nas rigs kyi sems dpa' bcu drug mchod pa brgyad yum bzhi sgo ba dang sum cu rtsa gnyis la sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan dang
17a2(rgyud 'grel): ? kyis dbang bskur bsam/ bskal pa bzang po'i sems dpa' rnams la rin po che'i cod pan dang dar dpyangs kyis dbang bskur bar bsam mo/ /de nas sgrub pa pos dbang nod pa ni lugs gnyis te/ ye shes pa rnams dam tshig pa rnams kyi thugs kha nas slar thon te/ gdan
17a3(rgyud 'grel): re re la snang ba gnyis gnyis kyi tshul du bzhugs pa la/ sgrub pa pos rigs pa'i dbang lnga 'am drug nos nas/ dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod de slar thim par bsams pa 'am/ yang na dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor dang/ ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor chu dang 'o ma ltar gcig tu 'dres
17a4(rgyud 'grel): nas bzhugs pa la sgrub pa pos dbang nos par bsam mo/ /ye shes pa slar thon te nam mkha' la bzhugs par bsam mo/ /de yang dbang rtags ni sgrub pa po de bzhin gshegs pa'i zlos pa po yin na rin po che'i cod pan dang dar dpyangs kyis dbang bskur bar bsam/ sems
17a5(rgyud 'grel): dpa' i zlos pa po yin na de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i cod pan dang dar dpyangs kyis dbang bskur bar bsam mo/ /de nas sgrub pa po byin gyis brlab pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i zlos pa po yin na yum rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug mas gnas bzhi byin gyis brlab par bsam mo/ /
17a6(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' i zlos pa po yin na sems ma rdo rje ma la sogs pa yum bzhis gnas bzhi byin gyis brlab par bsam mo/ /de nas ye shes dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang dgyes par bya ba ni/ sgo bzhi'i sngags dang phyag rgyas gzhal yas khang gi nang du spyan drangs pa ste/
17a7(rgyud 'grel): de yang rdo rje lcags kyu'i sngags dang phyag rgyas so so'i sgo nas nang du bkug par bsam mo/ /rdo rje zhags pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya so so'i sgo nas bcug par bsam/ rdo rje lcags sgrog gi sngags dang phyag rgyas so so'i sgo nas bcing bar bsam/ rdo rje 'bebs pa'i sngags dang phyag
17b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyas so so'i sgo sgo nas mnyes par bsam mo/ /de nas phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa ni gnyis te/ rgyas pa dang bsdus pa'o/ /rgyas pa ni sgyu 'phrul dra ba dang rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brengs pa las shes par bya'o/ /bsdus pa ni de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgyas gdab/ sgrub pa po'i snying khar rdo rje rtse lnga pa
17b2(rgyud 'grel): bsams la/ gtso bo'i sngags rings kyi 'jug la dri sh+ya dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): sa ma ya stwaM/ sa ma ya stwaM/ a haM/ many+dzu sh+rI/ zhes brjod pas/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad dam tshig gi phyag rgyas gdab bar bsam mo/ /chos kyi phyag rgyas gdab pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams ljags
17b3(rgyud 'grel): kyi steng du hUM dkar po las yongs su gyur pa'i rdo rje dkar po rtse lnga pa re chu rgyugs su yod par bsam/ de'i lte ba la lha rnams rang rang gi sku bskyed pa'i yig 'bru bkod la/ chos kyi phyag rgyas rgyas gdab par bsam mo/ /las kyi phyag rgyas rgyas gdab pa ni/ /sgrub pa po'i snying khar sna tshogs
17b4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje bsams la/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te/ rdo rje gar dgu sngon du 'gro ba'i tshul gyis phyag 'tshan med par lha rnams kyi phyag rgya chen po'i khyer thabs bsgom pa ni las kyi phyag rgyas rgyas gdab bo/ /phyag 'tshan med par lha rnams kyi phyag rgya chen po'i khyer thabs kyi phyag
17b5(rgyud 'grel): rgya bcings pa ni/ de nas las kyi phyag rgya bcings ba 'byung ste/ rdo rje khu tshur dam bcings te/ /mnyam par bzhag pas gnyis su bya/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgyas gnyis bcings te/ /de nas bcings ba rab tu bshad/ /g.yon pa'i rdo rje 'dzub mo ni/ /g.yas pa'i nang du sgreng bar bya/ /
17b6(rgyud 'grel): byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya che/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sbyin byed pa'o/ /mi g.yo ba yis reg pa'o/ /rin chen gyi ni mchog sbyin pa'o/ /tshe dpag med kyi ting 'dzin mchog/ gdon mi za bar mi 'jigs sbyin/ /de nas las kyi phyag rgya rnams/ /mdor bsdus rab tu bshad par bya
17b7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' rnams/ /rdo rje las rnams byed pa ste/ /sgyings bcas gsor ba gnyi ka yin/ /lcags kyu 'dzin ltar gnas pa dang/ /mda''phangs pa yi tshul dang ni/ /legs so zhes pa snying khar bzhag dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje gnyis/ /snying khar nyi ma bstan
18a1(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /g.yon pa la ni gru mo gzugs/ /de bzhin kha phyogs skor bar bya/ /g.yas pa yis ni g.yon par dbye/ /snying khar g.yon pa ral gri mdud/ /mgal me'i 'khor lo bskor ba dang/ /rdo rje gnyi ga kha nas dbyung/ /rdo rje gar
18a2(rgyud 'grel): gyis bskor ba yi/ /thal mo 'gram pa spyi bor bzhag /go cha mthe chung mche ba dang/ /khu tshur gnyis ni mnan pa'o/ /rdo rje sgyings pa'i tshul gyis su/ /bsam pa g.yos pas gdud pa bya/ /phreng ba bcings pas kha nas dbyung/ /rdo rje gar ni bskor ba yin/ /rdo rje khu tshur tshul gyis ni//
18a3(rgyud 'grel): bdug pa la sogs de bzhin sbyin/ /sangs rgyas kun la mchod pa yin/ /phyag rgya'i mchod pa byed pa po/ /mdzub mos lcags kyu bcings pa ni/ /mthe chung las de lcags kyu che/ /khrig ma mdud pa mdzub gnyis mdud/ /rgyab gnyis rkyang ni bsnyams te mnan/ /sgo gnyis
18a4(rgyud 'grel): pa dang gsum pa la sogs pa lnga'i las kyi phyag rgya bcings pa ni/ so so'i gtso bo bzhin du thabs re sgo re 'am/ /phyogs bzhir bcing ba'o/ /de rnams ni 'dir mang du spro mi dgos pa'i phyir mang du ma spros pa'o/ /de nas phyag rgya chen pos rgyas gdab pa ni/ /sgrub pa po'i snying khar
18a5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsams la/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyi'i snying po/ /oM hUM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): zhes yid la zlos shing/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis rdo rje gar ma byas par/ /rang rang gi phyag mtshan phyag na bsnams par bsgom pa ni phyag rgya
18a6(rgyud 'grel): chen po'i rgyas btab par bsgom pa'o/ /de nas lha las la sbyar ba ni/ /gzhung las/ de nas las kyi rgyal mchog ni/ /sgra las 'phel te rgyas bshad pas/ /'dir ni bdag gis ma bshad do/ /zhes 'byung bas sgra las 'phel te bshad pa na/ /gsang ldan nam sgo dang po'i
18a7(rgyud 'grel): lha las la bzhag pa ni/ lha'i dag pa dang mthun par las la bzhag ste/ sngags don rnam par gzigs pa'i lha'i dag pa dang mthun no/ /sgo gnyis pa'i gti mug sel ba ni rnam par snang mdzad de/ /bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ sems can
18b1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyi gti mug sbyongs shig pa'o/ /de bzhin du zhe sdang dang/ 'dod chags dang ser sna dang/ phrag dog sbyongs shig pa'o/ /yang na sngon gyi lha thams cad kyi spro bsdu dran bar byas pa ni las la sbyar ba'o/ /las kyi khyad par gyi ting nge 'dzin to zhes pa ni/ mtshams sbyar bar bya'o/ /de nas
18b2(rgyud 'grel): spros kyi chu dag la/ /sngags 'das pa yis bsang byas te/ /phung pos bsdu pa'i mchod pa lngas/ /rim bzhin byin brlabs mdun bzhag nas/ /'di dag rim pa'i go rims kyis/ /se gol rim pas brdab byas pas/ /rim bzhin bsdu pa'i phyag rgya ni/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): ldan byas te/
18b3(rgyud 'grel): mdun na mngon sum bzhin mthong nas/ sa ma ya dza(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod bya zhing/ /'khor lo tshogs mchog de dag la/ /mnyam med la sogs bstod par bya/ /de nas gtso bo sngags rings la/ /dri sh+ya zhes kyang brjod bya zhing/ /a hUM zhes dang ldan par ni/ /bzhi yis rgyas gdab don
18b4(rgyud 'grel): mchog grub/ /de nas mchod pa'i bye brag gis/ /mchod nas phyag bzhi bya ba ni/ /dang po'i sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i/ /gnas su bya ba'i rim pa'o/ /de dag ni yongs su rdzogs pa'i chos kyi ting nge 'dzin to/ /zhes bya bas yongs su rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin bstan pa te/ /de dag yang spyi don dbu'i
18b5(rgyud 'grel): sgo nas shes par bya ste/ /de nas spos kyi chu dag la/ /sngags zlas pa yis bsang bya ste/ /phung pos bsdus ma'i mchod pa lngas/ /rim bzhin byin brlabs mdun bzhag nas/ /zhes bya bas/ mchod pa byin gyis brlabs pa ston te/ /spyir sbyang zhing bsreg pa dang/ so so'i sngags dar
18b6(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs te/ /sngon bzhin no/ /'di dag rim pa'i go rims kyis/ /se gol rim pa brdab byas bas/ /rim bzhin bsdu ba'i phyag rgya ni/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): ldan byas te/ /mdun na mngon sum bzhin mthong nas/ /zhes bya ba rang bzhin gyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
18b7(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bsdu ba ston te/ de yang rdo rje bsdu ba'i sngags dang phyag rgyas rang bzhin gyi sangs rgyas spyan drangs la mdun gyi nam mkha' la byon par bsam mo/ /sa ma ya dza(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod bya zhing/ /'khor lo tshogs mchog de dag la/ /mnyam med la sogs bstod par bya/ /zhes pas bstod pa
19a1(rgyud 'grel): ston to/ /sngags sngon du 'gro bas/ de nas bstod pa ni mnyam med mi g.yo 'am 'dud nyi shus bstod pa bya'o/ /de nas dgug pa dang bcing ba dang mnyes par bya ba ni/ /sgo bzhi'i sngags dang phyag rgyas gzhal yas khang gi nang du spyan drangs pa la sogs pa ste
19a2(rgyud 'grel): sngon bzhin no/ /de nas gtso bo'i sngags rings la/ /dri sh+ya zhes kyang brjod bya zhing/ /a hUM zhes dang ldan par ni/ /bzhi yis rgyas gdab don mchog sgrub ces bya bas lha thams cad ni phyag rgya bzhis brgyas gdab pa ston te/ de yang phyag rgyas gdab pa ni/ /las mchog gi skabs bzhin
19a3(rgyud 'grel): shes par bya'o/ /de nas mchod pa'i bye brag gis mchod nas zhes bya bas mchod pa dbul ba ston te/ de yang mchod pa dbul ba ni thun mong gi mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang/ phyi nang gi lha mo brgyad kyi mchod pa dang/ bsgrub mchod bcu drug dang/ mchod pa gzhan yang ci 'byor tshad du 'bul lo
19a4(rgyud 'grel): phyag bzhi bya ba ni dang po sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i/ gnas su bya ba'i rim pa'o/ /zhes bya bas phyag btsal bar ston te/ de yang phyag bzhi btsal ba ni/ shar phyogs kyi sgo nas rdo rje rigs kyi phyag btsal ba dang/ lho phyogs kyi sgo nas rin che rigs kyi phyag btsal ba dang/ nub phyogs
19a5(rgyud 'grel): kyi sgo nas pad+ma rigs kyi phyag btsal ba dang/ byang phyogs kyi sgo nas las kyi rigs kyi phyag btsal ba ste/ lus kyi bca' thabs dang ting nge 'dzin gyi rim pa dang phyag rgya dang sngags dang phyogs dang lngas shes par bya ste/ sngon bzhin no/ /de'i 'og tu bla ma'i gdam ngag gi nyams pa gsum dang
19a6(rgyud 'grel): bsnyen pa ni bsgom pa dang/ mtshan brjod pa'i gsung rab gdon pa dang sngags bzlas pa rnams ston pa ni/ de yang mnyam pa rnam pa gsum gyis mnyam par bsres la/ bsgom bzlas bya ba ni/ oM badzra At+ma konyahaM/ zhes brjod pas dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad dang bdag sku
19a7(rgyud 'grel): gsung thugs rdo rje mnyam pas mnyam pa nyid du bsam/ oM swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+ha haM zhes brjod pas lha thams cad dang bdag rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag par mnyam pas mnyam pa nyid du bsgom/ oM sarba sa mo haM zhes brjod pas lha thams cad dang bdag med par mnyam pas mnyam pa nyid du sgom mo//
19b1(rgyud 'grel): de ltar mnyam pa nyid gsum gyis mnyam par bsres la/ lha thams cad kyi rang bzhin bdag yin no bar bsams la bsgom pa dang/ mtshan dang sngags kyis bzlas pa byed na yang lha thams cad kyi rang bzhin bdag yin no bar bsams la/ bdag gis mtshan dang sngags kyis bzlas pa byas pa'i
19b2(rgyud 'grel): dus su lha thams cad kyi zhal nas kyang bzlas pa'i sgra 'byung bar bsam/ de ltar byas nas rnam pa lngar 'gyur te/ bsgom pa'i bsnyen pa la dus kyi bsnyen pa dang/ mtshan ma'i bsnyen pa gnyis so/ /bzlas pa'i bsnyen pa la/ dus kyi bsnyen pa dang/ mtshan ma'i snyen pa dang/ grangs kyi bsnyen
19b3(rgyud 'grel): pa dang gsum mo/ /de ltar bsnyen pa rnam pa lnga'o/ /de la sngags nas 'di yin te/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA ye gi shwa ra hUM/ oM badzra satwa hUM/ oM badzra ratna hUM/ oM badzra d+harma hUM/ oM badzra karma hUM/ oM badzra badzri Ni hUM/ oM badzra ratna badzri Ni hUM/ oM badzra d+harma badzri Ni hUM/ oM badzra karma badzri ni hUM/ oM badzra lA sye hUM/
19b4(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra nA le hUM/ oM badzra gI ti hUM/ oM badzra nirti hUM/ oM badzra d+hu pe hUM/ oM badzra puShpe hUM/ oM badzra A lo ke hUM/ oM badzra gand+he hUM/ oM badzra satwa hUM/ oM badzra rA dza dzA/ oM badzra rA ga ho/ oM badzra sA d+hu sa/ oM badzra ratna oM/ oM badzra te dza oM/ oM badzra ke tu trAM/ oM badzra hA sA ha/ oM badzra d+harma h+ri/ oM badzra
19b5(rgyud 'grel): tIk+Sh+Na d+hAM/ oM badzra he tu maM/ oM badzra b+ha Sha raM/ oM badzra karma kaM/ oM badzra rak+Sh+Na haM/ oM badzra yak+Sha hUM/ oM badzra sand+hi baM/ oM badzra i ku sha dza:/ oM badzra pA sha hUM/ oM badzra spho Ta baM/ oM badzra a be sha a/ khyad par gyi snying po'i sngags so/ /oM badzra pradz+nyA dz+nyA na murta ye te na ma:/ oM du(rgyud 'grel): khats+tshe da ya
19b6(rgyud 'grel): te na ma:/ oM badzra tik+Sh+Na ya te na ma:/ oM wA gI shwa ra ya te na ma:/ oM dz+nyA na kA ya ya te na ma:/ oM a pa ra tsa na ya te na ma:/ thun mong gi sngags te/ go bzlog par shes par bya'o/ /oM sarba d+harmA b+ha wa swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+ha badzra a A aM a(rgyud 'grel): pra krit+ta pa ri shud+d+ha/ sarba d+harmA ya du ta/ sarba
19b7(rgyud 'grel): ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na kA ya/ many+dzu sh+rI pa ri shud+d+ha ti mu ba ta ya ti/ a A/ sarba ta thA ga ta h+ri da ya/ ha ra ha ra/ oM hUM h+rI:/ b+ha ga wAM dz+nyA na murti wA gI shwa ra/ mahA pa tsa/ sarba d+harma ga ga na/ a ma lA su pa ri shud+he/ d+harma d+hA tu dz+nyA na garbba a(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni lha thams cad kyi spyi'i sku'i sngags dang rtsa ba'i
20a1(rgyud 'grel): sngags dang phreng sngags so/ /bsnyen pa bstan pa'o/ /de nas bsgrub pa la 'jug pa ni/ /de nas rang dga' i gnas nyid du/ /gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /zhes bya bas bsgrub pa'i gnas bsgrub pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor bya ba'i spyir
20a2(rgyud 'grel): mdor bstan te/ de yang gnas ni nyams dga' zhing yid 'jug pa rgyal po dang theg pa dman pa la sogs pas dben par bya bar gsungs so/ sa de gzhung bzhin sbyar bya dang/ /gzungs dang ldan pa gzhung bzhin du/ /bya ba'i bye brag gzhan na 'o/ /zhes bya bas sa'i cho ga rgyas
20a3(rgyud 'grel): par bston te/ de yang bla mas gsang ba spyi dang rtsa rgyud chen po la sogs par sa'i cho ga spyi don brgyad kyi shes par bya ba ni/ tshes gcig nas bco lnga'i bar du gza' skar bzang po la zhugs te/ slob dpon slob ma'i spyod lam bya ba ni/ /za gcig gis bsnyung ba dang dkar gsum bza' 
20a4(rgyud 'grel): ba la sogs pa'i spyod lam bya'o/ /grong khyer chen po 'am gtsug lag khang ngam/ lha khang la sogs pa'i shar ram byang phyogs su bri bar bya'o/ /de nas ji tsam byed pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sa bcad la sa'i lto 'phye brtag par byas la/ lto nas sa brkos de sa'i ro lnga spangs pa dang
20a5(rgyud 'grel): ldan par bya'o/ /sa'i ro lnga ni sa'i ro gseg ma dang/ mi'i ro rus pa dang skra shad kyi dum bu dang/ rdza'i ro gyo dum dang/ shing gi ro mgal dum la sogs pa dang/ rtsa'i ro phub ma la sogs pa med par bya'o/ /rgyal pos ni dkyil 'khor khru brgya lnga bcu pa la bya'o/ /blon po 'am blon po
20a6(rgyud 'grel): chen po sa ni khru lnga bcu 'am de'i phyed la bya'o/ /sgrub pa pos ni khrus bcu gnyis sam drug la bya'o/ /sa brtag ba ni nyis 'gyur tshun du brtag go /de nas yul gyi rgyal po dang blon po la sogs pa la slang bar bya'o/ /sa'i lha mo la slang ba dang/ dkon mchog gsum la slang ba dang/ sa bdag la sogs
20a7(rgyud 'grel): pa la slang ba'o/ /de nas yid kyis sa'i lha mo gser gyi mdog can lag na gser gyi bum pa thogs pa zhig sa'i 'og nas sku phyed tsam 'thon par bsams la/ spos chus brlan par byas pa'i lag pas sa la lan gsum rdabs la/ skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /spyod pa'i tshul
20b1(rgyud 'grel): dang khyad par dang/ sa dang pha rol phyin pa la/ /lha mo khyod ni dpang du gyur/ /skyob pa shAkya seng ge yis/ /ji ltar bdud kyi sde bcom ltar/ /de bzhin bdag gis bdud las ni/ /rgyal bar byas te dkyil 'khor bri/ /zhes lan gsum brjod nas/ sa'i lha mo'i zhal nas khyod ci bde bar bris shig zer nas
20b2(rgyud 'grel): sa'i nang du thim par bsam mo/ /yang na dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su maN+Dal khru gang gru bzhi pa zhig byas la/ der mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang gtor ma cha gcig bshams la/ dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa rnam pa lnga phul te/ spos kyi snod thogs te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs
20b3(rgyud 'grel): te/ dgongs shig bdag la sangs rgyas dang /sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pa dang/ /sems can rnams la sman slad du/ rnam par snang mdzad chen po yi/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa 'bri bar 'tshal/ /rgyal ba sras dang bcas rnams kyis /bdag la byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ /de skad ces lan
20b4(rgyud 'grel): gsum brjod pas/ dkon mchog gsum gyis gnang ba byin par bsam mo/ /yang gtor ma a kA ro la sogs pas byin gyis brlabs la/ /dpung pa bzang po'i rgyud las byung ba'i tshigs su bcad pas gtor ma byin la/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te spos thogs te/ phyogs
20b5(rgyud 'grel): bcur bzhugs pa'i lha klu dang/ /gnod sbyin dri za lha ma yin/ /yang dag rdzu 'phrul cher ldan pa'i/ /'byung la gnas pa'i 'byung po kun/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis/ /sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa dang/ sems can rnams la phan don du/ /dam pa'i dkyil 'khor che
20b6(rgyud 'grel): byung pa/ /ji ltar bsam pa bzhin bri no/ /khyed kyis bar chad ma byed par/ /dge ba'i grogs po nyid du mdzod/ /da ltar bdag gis khyod la ni/ /bzod par gsol gyis ma slu par/ /rmi lam la sogs mtshan ma yi/ legs nyes bltas rnams bstan du gsol/ /lan
20b7(rgyud 'grel): gsum gsol ba btab pas/ /sa bdag la sogs pas dkyil 'khor gyis shig par gnang ba byin par bsam mo/ /de nas chag chag dang skya nul legs par bya ste/ rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sngags kyis yungs kar gtor zhing bgegs skrad nas/ oM hUM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa 'am/ oM badzra satwa
21a1(rgyud 'grel): hUM zhes bya ba lan gsum mam/ bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod par bya'o/ /de nas zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gis/ bgegs nye bar zhi bar bya'o/ /yang na dang por sa'i pra brtag par bya ba'i phyir/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su rdo rje slob dpon bdag nyid kyi pus mo nub tsam lte ba nub
21a2(rgyud 'grel): tsam brkos la/ de yang gong gi sa'i lha mo nam mkha' la oM badzro pa ta ya zhes brjod la brdeg /de nas dong gi nang du chus bkang ste/ me tog yang bcug la/ oM hUM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): 'am oM badzra satwa hUM/ zlos shing shar phyogs su gom pa mi drag mi dal ba brgya phyin te/ tshur log nas chu de ma skam na
21a3(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub yod par ston/ chu skams na gzhan du spro bar bshad/ de nas rdza so ma btang bzhig tu rin po che sna lnga 'bru lnga dang sman dang snying po dang spos dang lnga blug la/ dong gi nang du gzhug go /de nas rkos pa'i sa de rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sngags btab pa'i spos chus bral brul du sprus la nad
21a4(rgyud 'grel): dgang bar bya'o/ /lhag par gyur na dngos grub mchog yod par bstan/ /chang na gzhan du spo/ /de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin bzlas pa'i spos chus chag chag gdag 'thas par bcags la me long gi rgyab bzhin du byas pa ni sa las dang bya bas sbyang ba'o/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin nam rdo rje
21a5(rgyud 'grel): rtse mos bzlas pa'i spos chus gsang gtor bya ba dang/ zhi ba'i sbyin sreg byas pa'i thal ba dang yungs kar gyi gtor ma ni sngags kyis sbyang ba'o/ /ting nge 'dzin gyis sbyang ba ni/ slob dpon dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug la rdo rje chen po nas gzhal yas khang la thug pa'i
21a6(rgyud 'grel): bar du bsgoms la sgo bzhi rta babs dang bcas pa'i nang du sa chud par sgom par bya'o/ /sa sbyang ba'o/ /de nas slob dpon lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas sa phyogs 'di nyid du bdag rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po bri bar bya'o/ /zhes bsam pa sngon du btang ba ni/
21a7(rgyud 'grel): sems kyi dbang gis gzung ba'o/ /de nas slob dpon gyis rdo rje 'chang chen po'i phyag rgya chen por bsgoms nas/ ting 'dzin gsum dang ldan par byas la/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug ste/ oM badzra tik+Sh+Na du:/ bats+tshe da pradz+nyA dz+nyA na murti/ dz+nyA na kA ya/ wa gi shwa ra/ a ra pa tsa na/ ya te na ma/ zhes zlos
21b1(rgyud 'grel): shing 'dug pa yan chad ni/ slob dpon gyi ting 'dzin no/ /de nas bsgrub pa'i grogs mchog rigs bzhi'i nga rgyal dang ldan pa bzhis/ shar phyogs kyi sgo nas/ 'dud nyi shus bstod de/ mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad 'di dag gis/ bdag cag gis ni bstod pa yis/ /tshul chen yang ni rgyas par mdzad/ /mgon
21b2(rgyud 'grel): po khyod la gsol ba ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor lo che/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ /zhes bya ba ni bgegs tshar gcad par gsol ba gdab pa'o/ /de la mig byin gyis brlab pa ni/ /g.yas su ma las nyi ma g.yon du Ta las zla ba/ de gnyis kyi steng du hUM gis mig 'bras tshul du
21b3(rgyud 'grel): byas pa ni mig brlab pa'o/ /rkang mthil gnyis su a las sna tshogs rdo rje bsgoms pa ni rkang pa brlab pa'o/ /bdag nyid rang gi rdo rje can/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag rang nyid/ /bdag ni sangs rgyas rgyal po che/ /stobs chen rdo rje can bdag nyid/ /bdag po rdo rje chen por bdag /byin gyis brlab
21b4(rgyud 'grel): ba mi 'dor ro/ /rdo rje lta bas tshar gcad pa'i/ /mig g.yon gyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor g.yon phyogs su bskor bas/ bgegs thams cad gsal gdab par bsam/ g.yas kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi g.yas phyogs su bskor bas bgegs thams cad bsreg par bsam mo/ /de ni rdo rje lta
21b5(rgyud 'grel): bas tshar gcod do/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus nas byang shar mtshams su byis pa gzhon nu bzhin du mchongs te phyin la/ kha lho phyogs su bltas la/ dril bu dkur brten la rdo rje lan gsum gsor zhing tshig 'di skad ces brjod de/ rdo rje slob dpon ming 'di zhes bya ba/ slob ma che ge mo zhes bya
21b6(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dang/ sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i phyir sa phyogs 'dir rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po ngas 'bri yis/ lha dang lha ma yin dang gnod sbyin dang srin po dang yi dags dang/
21b7(rgyud 'grel): sha za dang 'byung po dang brjed byed dang mkha' 'gro ma dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang/ rig sngags 'chang grub pa dang rgan po dang rgan mo g.yog dang 'khor du bcas pa gang dag 'khod pa de dag dengs shig /'di ltar rdo rje 'chang gi bka' thos nas myur ba nyid du dengs shig
22a1(rgyud 'grel): gang dag mi 'gro ba de dag /de'i ye shes kyi rdo rjes mgo tshal ba brgyar 'gas par bya'o/ /zhes lan gsum brjod do/ /de nas rkang pa'i sor mos rdo rje rtse gcig pa sa la 'bri zhing/ hUM hUM zhes brjod cing dkyil 'khor bskor ba ni rdo rje 'gros kyis tshar gcad pa'o/ /dkyil
22a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyi phyogs bzhir rkang stabs mdun dang/ lag stabs bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis bya ba ni rdo rje stang stabs kyis thams cad thal kar gcig puAm/ yang na de bas mang yang rung/ /shar phyogs su gzug par bya/ /bog por kham pa las byas pa/ /so ma btang ba dkar po bcug /byas
22a3(rgyud 'grel): nas phyogs dang mtshams su ni/ /brgyad pa de bzhin bdun du bkod/ /pog por dgang du ma 'byor na/ /kham pa'i phor bu'i nad nas dbul/ /de dag kyang ni ma 'byor na/ /gcig gcig sgor ni bzhag nas dbul/ /me tog phreng bas brgyan pa yi/ /rta babs dag kyang phyogs bzhir bya/ /
22a4(rgyud 'grel): nas dang gro dang 'bru rnams kyis/ /myu gu legs par skye bar dgod/ /dril bu gdugs dang rnga yab dang/ /srad bu dag kyang phyogs bzhir ni/ /rta babs sogs las phyi rol du/ /mdzes par bya phyir mkhas pas gdags/ /'bras yos 'bru dang bcas pa yi/ /me tog sil mar
22a5(rgyud 'grel): tu dgram/ /dkyil 'khor dag gi phyi rol du/ /phyi ma'i ri mo sdug gu bri/ /'jig rten 'di na grags pa yi/ /bkra shis la sogs gang yin rnams/ /dkyil 'khor dag gi phyi rol du/ /phyogs bzhi dag tu mkhas pas dgod/ /yi ge brgya pa zlas pa'i chus/ /dbang ldan gyi
22a6(rgyud 'grel): phyogs nas brtsams nas/ /phyi dang nang du bcas la bsang gtor bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab par bya ba'i phyir/ /rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya'i? dbus su gzhag la/ /oM badzra tsakra hUM zhes bzlas brjod bya'o/ /de nas phyi dro'i dus su glu dang rol mo'i mchod pa rnams dang me
22a7(rgyud 'grel): tog dang/ spos la sogs pa rnams kyis dang po'i 'khor lo ji snyed pa dang/ ci 'dod pa de bzhin du mchod cing brtag par bya'o/ /de nas rnam par snang mdzad kyi dam tshig sems dpa' i sku gzugs lugs ma la sogs pa dkar pos ma ya stwaM zhes brjod la/ rang gi snying
22b1(rgyud 'grel): pos bzhugs su gsol te/ yang na phreng sngags sam/ yang na sangs rgyas kyi snying po oM hUM h+ri(rgyud 'grel): sa bzhugs su gsol la/ de bzhin du lha gzhan gyi yang sku bzhugs pa 'am/ mtshan ma rnams brtags la/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po 'bru gsum brjod cing 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcas la dkyil
22b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor blang la/ de nas ting nge 'dzin rnam pa gsum sngon bzhin bsgoms la/ de nas nam mkha' i lha bsre bar bya ste/ yi ge phyin ci log pas kha sbyar gyi sbyor ba gsal lo/ /bar snang la bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas bkug pa la sogs pa'i tshul gyis bkug la/ bcug
22b3(rgyud 'grel): ste/ bcings nas dbang du byas te/ phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab pa byas la/ byin gyis rlob cing mnyes par byas nas bzhag par bya ste/ de nas mchod pa rgya chen po mdo klog pa yan chod byas la/ spyi 'am so so'i sngags kyi bsnyen pa byas la phyis 'byung ba bzhin du slob dpon rang nyid
