22b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs shing dbang lha la blang ngo/ /de nas dkyil 'khor du gzhug cing dbang bskur bar bya bar bstan pa'i phyir dkyus ma nyid 'khrugs sdeb ste/ de yang de nas 'dir dbang dam par gsungs pa/ dbang skur med na 'grub pa med/ /yon tan ldan pa'i sngags pa yis/ /'di la dbang byin yon tan
22b5(rgyud 'grel): 'grub/ /ces bya bas dbang nos pa'i yon tan ston te/ dbang bskur zhing dam tshig dang ldan na/ dngos grub rnam pa gnyis 'thob par lung gis bstan pa'o/ /dang por khrus byas gos gyon te/ rgyal po'i cha lugs 'dra ba dang/ /bud med lta bu'i tshul ldan pas/ /slob dpon bla mar gyur pa
22b6(rgyud 'grel): la/ /dbang rnams nod par rab tu gsungs zhes bya bas/ dbang nod pa'i phyir dbang gi sngon du spyod lam de'i sgo nas dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa ston te/ de nas bzlos pa dang bsgom pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rnams byas la/ phyir byung la slob ma gzhug par bya ste/ /slob dpon du 'os pa'i
22b7(rgyud 'grel): slob ma las thams cad pa'i chus bsangs la/ rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlabs shing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa la/ rdo rje gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas pa'i dmar pos stod g.yogs dang/ smad g.yogs bskon la/ oM badzra tiSh+Tha hUM phaT/ zhes mngon par bsngags la
23a1(rgyud 'grel): gos dmar po las byas pa'i gtsug tor dang/ sgo srung bzhi'i snying po yongs su bzla ba'i gos dmar pos gdod bcings la/ yon gyi dam pa dag phul ba yongs su bzung ste/ de'i snying ka dang dpral ba dang lkog ma dang spyi bo rnams rdo rje dang rin po dang/ pad+ma dang sna
23a2(rgyud 'grel): tshogs rdo rje zla ba steng du de'i sa bon gyis rnam par dgod pa/ phyogs bzhi nas sngon bzhin phyag 'tshal du bcug la/ de de bzhin du rdo rje la sogs pas byin gyis brlabs la/ phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa byed du nus par byin gyis brlab par bsam mo/ /de nas shar phyogs kyi sgor bzhag
23a3(rgyud 'grel): la de bzhin du sdom pa byin no/ /oM sarba bu d+hi tsit+totpa tA ya mi zhes brjod do/ /byang chub sems ni bla med pa/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed nas su/ /snying pos rab tu bzhag par bya/ /de nas su ra te sa ma yastwaM ho/ /sid+d+hi badzra ya thA su khaM zhes bskul lo/ /de nas sa ma yastwaM zhes bya ba'i sngags
23a4(rgyud 'grel): kyis rnam par snang mdzad kyi dam tshig phyag rgya 'ching du gzhug cing/ de bzhin du phreng ba 'dzin du gzhug go /de nas sa ma ya hUM zhes brjod la slob ma nang du gzhug go /de nas 'di skad ces kyang bsgo'o/ /deng khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs kyis/ des
23a5(rgyud 'grel): khyod la ye shes gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'grub pa'ang thob na/ dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de lta bu'i ye shes bskyed par bya yis/ /khyod kyis dkyil 'khor chen po ma mthong ba rnams la ma smra zhig /dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re/ de
23a6(rgyud 'grel): nas rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya kha thur du bstan la/ rdo rje slob ma'i spyi bor bzhag ste 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/ /'di ni khyod kyis rdo rje dam tshig yin te/ gal te 'ga' zhig la smras na klad pa 'gas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid dang/ mna'i chu'i snying pos
23a7(rgyud 'grel): lan cig bsngags la/ slob ma 'thung ngu gzhug go /de la mna'i snying po ni 'di yin te/ rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyi/ snying la yang dag zhugs mdzad kyis/ /gal te tshul 'di smras na ni/ /de ma thag tu dral te gshegs/ /oM badzro tShtha? 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu/ /dam tshig 'das na
23b1(rgyud 'grel): sreg par byed/ /dam tshig srungs na dngos grub ni/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi chu 'dis 'grub/ /rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya rnams/ /gal te dkyil 'khor ma mthong smra/ /skye bo'i tshogs na 'dug pa 'am/ /dad pa med pa brgad par 'gyur/ /de nas slob ma de la 'di skad bsgo zhig /deng phyin chad khyod kyi phyag na rdo rje ni nga yin gyis
23b2(rgyud 'grel): ngas 'di gyis zhes bsgo ba gang yin pa de yang bya dgos so/ /khyod nga la brnyas par ma byed cig /mi bde ba ma spangs par khyod 'chi ba'i dus byas nas dmyal bar lhung bar gyur ta re/ zhes smras la 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs la/ rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la
23b3(rgyud 'grel): 'bab par gyur cig /ces smros shig ces bsgo'o/ /de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis myur du sems dpa' rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings la/ 'di skad du brjod du gzhug go /'di ni rdo rje'i dam tshig ste/ /rdo rje sems dpa' yin par grags/ /rdo rje ye shes bla med ni/ /de ring nyid du dbab par shog /oM badzra a be sha a zhes
23b4(rgyud 'grel): brjod do/ /de nas phyag rgya bcings pa las byung nas/ /de'i snying khar zhugs te/ rdo rje sems ma babs par gyur par bsams na babs par 'gyur ro/ /yang na ho a ho zhes bya ba rang gi snying kha'i zla ba la bkod de/ se'u me tog dang 'dra ba'i rdo rje sems dpa' rang gi dam tshig dang bcas pa rang gi snying po las
23b5(rgyud 'grel): nges par phyung ba/ badzra band+ha traT zhes bya bas de'i snying kha phye la/ der bcug ste/ rdo rje dbab pa'i phyag rgya bcings la sngags brjod de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gang las gyur par bsams na yang 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /khro bo'i khu tshur bcings la rdo rje sems dpa' phye na yang 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /theg pa chen po mngon
23b6(rgyud 'grel): par rtog pa'i rdo rje tshig lan bdun nam brgyad brjod pas kyang 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /slob ma'i gtso bo'i snying khar rdo rje bya/ /yi ge brgya pas brtan por byas nas ni/ /bdag lus kyi yin snod kyi sgo dbye zhing/ /snying la gnas pa'i rdo rje dbus su blta/ /sngags kyi bdag po yi ge a dmar gzugs
23b7(rgyud 'grel): brjod pas yang dag chags par g.yo bar lta zhes pas so/ /de nas oM pa ra ma su khA sha ya su la li ta/ bi sa la na mi ter/ na ma mi b+ha ga waM dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): hi hi hi hi hi(rgyud 'grel): pra tIts+tsha badzra ku su ma/ any+dza linA tha ho:/ zhes brjod pa'i sngags 'dis phreng ba de dkyil 'khor du dor ro/ /de nas dngos grub rab 'bring?
24a1(rgyud 'grel): me tog babs pa las brtag par bya ste/ lha rnams kyi khyad par dang/ gnas kyi khyad par las brtag par bya ste/ gang tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi/ /dbu la me tog babs gyur na/ /de tshe gtsug tor mdzod spu dag /'grub par 'gyur bar
24a2(rgyud 'grel): gdon mi za/ /zhal du babs na 'grub par 'gyur/ /stod du babs na mchog rnams 'grub/ /rked du babs na 'bring rnams 'grub/ /ro smad phyogs su babs na ni/ /dngos grub phal rnams 'grub par 'gyur/ /bar gyi sku la babs na ni/ /snying po la sogs 'grub
24a3(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur/ /smad du babs par gyur na ni/ /mngag gzhug la sogs 'grub par 'gyur/ /rim pa de dag thams cad ni/ /rigs bzhi rnams las shes par bya/ /de bzhin lha rnams gzhan la yang/ /dngos grub rnam pa gsum du bshad/ /gal te lha yi gzugs
24a4(rgyud 'grel): dag las/ /me tog ring du ltung gyur na/ /de ni dngos grub yun ring 'gyur/ /nye na dngos grub myur du 'grub/ /gsang sngags rnams kyi mchod pa dag /gang du 'gram pa tshun chod ni/ /de yi sa yi de yin te/ /me tog der lhung de yi rigs/ /lha gnyis kyi ni bar dag
24a5(rgyud 'grel): tu/ /gal te me tog babs gyur na/ /gang du nye bar gyur pa ni/ /de ni de yi rigs su bshad/ /gal te la la'i me tog ni/ /dkyil 'khor mang po 'das nas babs/ /de la dngos grub phal 'grub cing/ /de ni dad pa rab tu chung/ /gal te me tog bor bdag
24a6(rgyud 'grel): ra ba'i ri bo la bab na/ /zhi ba'i bya bas de nas sdod/ /nan tan bskyed de mdor du gzhug /de ste the tshom gyur na ni/ /mkhas pas 'des te 'dor mi gzhug /de ni gang yang nges med pas/ /de ni dngos grub 'thob mi 'gyur/ /gnyis kyi bar du mnyam pa dang/ /don med
24a7(rgyud 'grel): phyi rol lhung na ni/ /zhi ba'i sbyin sreg byas nas su/ /de nas me tog 'dor du gzhug /snying por me tog bab na ni/ /rtag tu don med mi 'gyur bshad/ /srad du dag gi cho ga bzhin/ /de yi nyen 'khor shes par bya/ /de la sogs pa'i rnam pa yi/ /me tog rnams ni bor
24b1(rgyud 'grel): pa la?/ /bdag gi mdun du gang lhung ni/ /de la zhi ba bsam par bya/ /sbyin sreg gis ni zhi byas nas/ /de ni slar la mdor du gzhug /lan gsum sogs te bor na yang/ /gal te legs par ma babs na/ /re thag chad de slar gtang ngo/ /de nas me tog babs pa las/ /lha yang
24b2(rgyud 'grel): yang dag par shes par byas nas/ phreng ba blangs te/ oM pra ti grih+na swa mi maM/ /satwaM ma hA ba la zhes brjod nas/ /de'i mgo la bcing ngo/ /ye shes babs pa'i mtshan ma las/ /nye bar mtshon nas de la mig gis ci mthong zhes dris te/ /de ji ltar mthong ba bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro//
24b3(rgyud 'grel): gal te dkar po snang ba mthong na ni/ /de la dngos grub mchog slob bo/ /gal te ser bo mthong na ni/ /de la/ don 'byung ba'i ye shes bslab par bya'o/ /gal te dmar po mthong na de la rjes su chags pa'i ye shes bslab bo/ /'on te nag por mthong na de la mngon spyod kyi ye shes kyi slab bo//
24b4(rgyud 'grel): gal te sna tshogs par mthong na/ /de la dngos grub thams cad kyi ye shes bslab par bya'o zhes rgya cher sbyar ro/ /de nas snying po 'dis gdong g.yogs bkrol te/ oM badzra satwa ya yan+te tya/ tsak+Shu g+ha ta na pa rodg+ha ta ma ti/ sarba k+Sho badzra tsak+Shu ma nut+ta raM/ de nas he badzra pA Sh+ya zhes brjod do//
24b5(rgyud 'grel): de nas gdong g.yogs bkrol nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor bzang po bstan par bya/ /de nas bla ma dgar gyur nas/ /slob ma de la 'di skad bsgo/ /dkyil 'khor bzang po 'di la ltos/ /da ni dad pa rab tu bskyed/ /khyod ni sangs rgyas rigs su skye/ /sngags dang rig pas byin gyis brlabs/ /'gro ba
24b6(rgyud 'grel): phun sum dngos grub kyang/ /thams cad khyod la mngon du 'gyur/ /dngos grub thob phyir dam tshig skyongs/ /gsang sngags la yang brtson par gyis/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid bstan par bya ste/ /mi mnyam med par zur bzhi snyoms/ /dran dang dbang po sgo bzhi ste//
24b7(rgyud 'grel): bsam gtan rnams kyi rta babs bzhi/ /ting 'dzin khyams su shes par bya/ /khyams las bden pa'i rdo rje dang/ /gzugs rnams lha mos mchod pa yin/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis bkra ba yang/ /bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed pa'o/ /gdul bya bskyod pa sna tshogs mchog /dar 'phan
25a1(rgyud 'grel): dril bu sgrogs pa yis/ /me long ye shes rtag mi rtog /byang chub yan lag me tog phreng/ /dra ba dra phyed rin chen mchog /nyi ma zla ba yang dag ldan/ /kun 'grub mi zad bde ba ste/ /bde ba chen po zhes grags pa'o/ /de ni nang gi dkyil 'khor
25a2(rgyud 'grel): gyi/ /ka ba dkyil 'khor brgyad pa yi/ /dngos grub bde ba kun ster ba'i/ /rnam thar brgyad po de nyid yin/ /theg pa chen po byang chub sems/ /mdo sde 'khor lo bskor bas na/ /rdo rje thig gis yongs gdab cing/ /thams cad du yang yongs su rdzogs/ /gang du
25a3(rgyud 'grel): 'jug pa tsam gyis ni/ /mi tshugs pa dang mi ldog dang/ /bde ba chen po rab 'grub phyir/ /de dag dag par yang dag 'gyur/ /de nas phyag rgya dang snying po yang bshad par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje 'bebs pa nas brtsams te/ mgon po rnam snang gi bar bstan par bya'o/ //
25a4(rgyud 'grel): dang po sdig pa sreg byas nas/ /de la dbab dang dral ba bya/ /de dag kun gyi rim pa yang/ /rtsa ba'i rgyud las gsungs pa ltar/ /'dir ni de dag bya ba yin zhes bya bas/ dbang bskur ba'i slob ma rgyud dag par bya ba'i phyir sdig pa sreg pa ni til gyi sreg blugs
25a5(rgyud 'grel): sdig pa bsreg pa'i sngags dang chas pa'i rgya rtsa brgyad kyis zhi ba'i sbyin sreg byas la/ /de nas thal mo dam du bsdams la sor mo thams cad bsnol ba ni/ /rdo rje thal mor bka' stsal te/ rab tu bsdams phyir rdo rje bsdams/ /badzrA ny+dza li zhes bya ba rdo rje thal mo'i sngags so/
25a6(rgyud 'grel): badzra band+ha zhes brjod cing slob ma'i snying khar lan gsum dral bar bya'o/ /de nas ye shes dbab pa ni/ badzra a be sha a zhes bya bas rdo rje dbab pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings pa la a a zhes bya a brgyas slob ma la dbab par bya'o/ /mchod pa'i lan dang sbyin
25a7(rgyud 'grel): pa dge zhes bya bas/ slob mas slob dpon la mchod pa rnam pa lnga dbul ba bstan pa'o/ /sbyin pa dang zhes bya bas dbang bskur ba'i sngon yon bzhin du slob dpon la dbul ba bstan pa'o/ /rim pa dang ldan pas dbang bskur te/ /de nas de la chu dbang bskur/ /gzhan
25b1(rgyud 'grel): yang phyag rgya'i dbang dang ni/ /cod pan dar dpyangs rdo rje dang/ /bdag po ming la sogs pa dang/ zhes bya bas rig pa'i dbang lnga dang/ rdo rje brtul zhugs kyi dbang dang drug bskur bar bstan pa ni/ gang du me tog bab par gyur pa de'i rigs/ dang gzugs su bskyed la/ de'i phyag rgya dang
25b2(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs te/ snying po 'di dang rdo rje byin gyis brlabs pa'i bum pa'i chus dbang bskur ro/ /oM badzrA b+hi Shiny+tsa/ de nas de dang rjes su mthun pa'i cod pan dang/ dar dpyangs kyis dbang bskur ba/ /rang gi mtshan ma'i dbang bskur ba lag tu byin te/ mtshan
25b3(rgyud 'grel): ma dang rjes su mthun par sngags 'dis brjod par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi rdo rje dbang/ /de ring khyod la bskur bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kun tu dbang bskur phyir/ /rdo rje 'di ni khyod kyis long/ /rang gi mtshan mas bdag po'i dbang gi snying po 'dis sbyin par bya ste/
25b4(rgyud 'grel): oM badzrA d+hi pa d+hi stwaM ma b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ tiSh+Tha badzra sa ma ya stwaM/ de nas snying po 'dis dril bu sbyin par bya'o/ /a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NAM/ a dya nutpa n+na twAt/ de nas snying po 'di rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur/ oM badzra satwa stwa ma b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ badzra nA mA bi She ka ta/ kye rdo rje zhes
25b5(rgyud 'grel): gang gis ming gang brjod pa dar skye zhes brjod par bya'o/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /rdo rje sems dpa' phyag na gnas/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bzung/ /phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan/ /zhes bya bas lag tu rdo rje byin la/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta sad+d+hi badzra
25b6(rgyud 'grel): sa ma ya/ tiSh+Thai Sha twaM d+ha ra ya mi hi hi hi hi hUM zhes so/ /de nas phyag rgya chen po'i tshul du bzhag la/ spos la sogs pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod la/ sngags kyis bskul ba'i tshig brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa'i sngags byin la/ phyag rgya bzhi'i ye shes bzlas par bya ba ni
25b7(rgyud 'grel): rig pa'i dbang bskur ba'o/ /slob mas kyang rdo rje thal mo skor ba byas la phyag bya ste/ phreng ba bcings pa la sogs thams cad bzung bar bya'o/ /rig pa'i dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'o// //dbang rnams rdzogs nas dbang byin pa/ /gsang ba'i dbang dang nges
26a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dbang/ /rim pa bzhin du rab tu bskur/ /de nas bkra shis brjod bya zhing/ /zhes bya bas rdo rje slob dpon du dbang bskur ba ston te/ de yang de nas slob dpon du 'os pa'i slob mas yon bzang po phul la/ /gsol ba gdab par bya ste/ /
26a2(rgyud 'grel): byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la/ /ji ltar mchog chen gsol mdzad pa/ /bdag la bsrung ba'i don gyi phyir/ /nam mkha' i rdo rje dang bdag gsol/ /slob dpon rnam par snang mdzad chen po nyid du gyur pas/ shar phyogs kyi sgo'i mthar sna tshogs pad+ma bris la/ /slob ma
26a3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'i skur zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du gnas par bsams la/ rdo rje sems ma la sogs pas byin gyis brlabs te/ dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /yang na dkyil 'khor las gru gsum tsam yongs su dor bar dbang bskur ba'i sgo la mngon par
26a4(rgyud 'grel): phyogs par byas par nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi byed kyi tshad tsam la/ zur bzhi pa la sgo nub phyogs su bltas ba'i dkyil 'khor tshon sna lngas bris la/ /de'i dbus su pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa bris/ de'i steng du seng ge'i gdan zla ba'i steng du dkyil 'khor
26a5(rgyud 'grel): ras kyis bkab pa dang seng+ge'i stan gyi steng du bla re bre zhing g.yas logs dar dang me tog gi phreng bas brgyan pa'i gdugs rtse mo dkar ba dang/ dmar ba la gtsug tor gdugs dkar pos yongs su bzlas la/ g.yon du dar dang/ ras sna tshogs pas bkra ba'i e rgyal mtshan dang ba dan oM yongs su bzlas pa'i legs par bzhag la mchod yon phul te/ me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod nas/ rnga bo che dang rnga rings dang/ dung la sogs pa'i rol mo phyag rgyas byin gyis brlab pa dang/ phyi'i gar dang glu la
26a6(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa dang/ sgeg mo la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod cing bkra shis kyi glu len cing/ dril bu dkrol bzhin du rdo rje 'bebs pa la sogs pa'i chu rnams kyis de'i sngags gdon pa sngon du 'gro ba nyid dang/ rdo rje slob dpon chen po nyid du dbang bskur bar bya ste/ oM
26b1(rgyud 'grel): badzrA b+hI Shiny+tsa zhes bya ba dang ji srid par rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa'i bar dang/ dbang bskur ro/ /de nas de'i mgor yang 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i sku gzugs de'i dam tshig gis phyag rgyas gzungs la/ oM mahA su ka badzra satwa dzdza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): su ra ta stwaM zhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas la rdo rje
26b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa chen po'i slob dpon du 'gyur ro/ /shes rab yan lag 'dus pa'i rdo rje las byung ba'i/ byang chub sems kyis 'jam dbyangs byang chub bde dbang bskur/ /rgyal mchog sras bcas rnams kyis lags gsung nges bkra shis gang/ de ni khyod kyi dbang bskur mchog
26b3(rgyud 'grel): la bkra shis shog /sangs rgyas kun gyi nam mkha' i khams/ /yongs su gang bar rnam par bsgom/ /phyi rol dri sogs dam tshig gis/ /sprin ltar brtul zhugs can gyis bsgom/ /yang na rdo rje dbyings kyi ni/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi rdo rje bsgom/ /dam tshig mchog gis
26b4(rgyud 'grel): bum pa yang/ /'dzin par mkhas pas bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje slob dpon bka' drin gyis/ /de tshe de la dbang bskur ba/ /rdzogs sangs rdo rje lha mo rnams/ /rang nyid gsol bar mdzad par 'gyur/ /de nas rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung
26b5(rgyud 'grel): nas ? dbang bskur bya ste/ oM dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho/(rgyud 'grel): mahA su ka badzra satwA pi She ka na twa ma b+hi tIShtsa mi/ sarba badzrA d+hi pa d+hi twi dri Dho me b+ha ba/ sid+d+ha na maste b+ha ga wa/ ma hA badzra d+ha ra su ra tastwaM/ ma hA badzra satwa oM g+hurg+hu ba swAhA zhes bya ba 'dis/ lag pa gnyis su rdo rje byin la phyi nang
26b6(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba'i mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod de/ sngags brjod par bya'o/ /me tog ma'i gzugs kyis/ /me tog gis gter la/ deng tshun chad sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bzhes pas/ mchod na khyed mchod pa yan lag rdzogs shing
26b7(rgyud 'grel): skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dang dpe byad rnams kyis brgyan pa byas pa'i skur mdza' bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes brjod do/ /de nas bdug pa ma'i gzugs kyis bdug pas bdugs la 'di skad ces brjod do/ gang gis sems can thams cad tshim par 'gyur ba'i de bzhin gshegs
27a1(rgyud 'grel): pa thams cad mkhyed la bdug par 'tshal bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas mar me ma'i gzugs su mar me nye bar bstan la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ deng nas brtsams te rdo rje chos dang 'dra bar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan la yang dag
27a2(rgyud 'grel): par 'bar bas/ ma rig pas khebs pa'i sems can rnams la ye shes kyi snang bas snang ba byed par 'gyur ro/ /de nas byug pa ma'i gzugs can gyi byug pas byugs la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ deng tshun chad khyod sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams
27a3(rgyud 'grel): cad dang/ 'jig rten thams cad du yang tshul khrims dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ shes rab la sogs pa'i dri'i rgyun ster bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas ho zhes bya bas gzhu byin nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par gyis shig ces brjod de/ phyogs bzhir mda' bzhi
27a4(rgyud 'grel): 'phen du gzhug cing steng dang 'og tu yang re re 'phen du gzhug go/ de nas sha d+ha b+hany+dza ga byin la/ 'dis dngos grub thams cad dang nye bar spyod pa thams cad sprul pa nye bar longs spyod cing/ gzhan dag la yang byin cig /de nas chos kyi 'khor lo rkang pa gnyis kyi dbus
27a5(rgyud 'grel): su bzhag cing/ dung yang lag pa g.yas par byin te chos kyi 'khor lo dang smra ba gnyis kyi chos kyi yi ge dang/ lhan cig byin la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ deng nas brtsams te sems bskyed ba tsam gyis chos kyi 'khor lo skor cig /di ring phan chad 'jig
27a6(rgyud 'grel): rten la/ /skyob pa rnams kyi 'khor lo bskor/ /chos kyi dung ni bla med pas kun tu ma lus gang bar gyis/ /som nyi yid gnyis mi bya zhing/ /dog pa med pa'i sems kyis su/ /gsang sngags spyod pa tshul gyis mchog /'jig rten 'di la rab tu sgrogs/ /de ltar byas
27a7(rgyud 'grel): na sangs rgyas la/ /phan 'dogs drin du bzo zhes bya/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa de kun kyang/ /kun tu khyod la srung bar byed/ /de nas/ 'jig rten kun la phan bya'i phyir/ /'jig rten khams ni thams cad du/ /ji ltar sna tshogs 'dul 'gyur ba'i/ /rdo rje 'khor lo bskor
27b1(rgyud 'grel): bar gyis/ /zhes brjod la/ rgyal bar gyur cig rgyal bar gyur cig /rdo rje rigs kyi bdag po'i rdo rje 'khor lo bskor cig ces brjod do/ /mdor na 'jig rten thams cad du/ /sems can kun la phan bya'i phyir/ /ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i/ /nor bu'i 'khor lo rab tu
27b2(rgyud 'grel): bskor/ /zhes brjod la/ rgyal bar gyur cig rgyal bar gyur cig /rin po che'i rigs kyi bdag po rin po che'i 'khor lo bskor cig ces brjod do/ /de nas/ mdor na 'jig rten thams cad du/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i/ /
27b3(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /zhes brjod la rgyal bar gyur cig rgyal bar gyur cig /pad+ma'i rigs kyi bdag po yis/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor gyur cig ces brjod do/ /de nas mdor na 'jig rten thams cad du/ /sems can kun la phan bya'i phyir/ /ji ltar 'dul
27b4(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams tshogs pa'i/ /las kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /zhes brjod la rgyal bar gyur cig rgyal bar gyur cig /las kyi rigs kyi bdag po'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor cig ces brjod do/ /de nas mdor na 'jig rten thams cad du/ /sems can kun la phan bya'i phyir/ /
27b5(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /zhes brjod la rgyal bar gyur cig rgyal bar gyur cig /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po'i chos kyi 'khor lo skyor cig ces brjod par bya'o/ /de nas slob mas rdo rje sems dpar bsgoms la de bzhin
27b6(rgyud 'grel): du bzhag ste/ gzengs bstod pas ni dngos po kun/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid de/ /rdo rje ming dbang bskur bas kyang/ /de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan to/ /oM nga yis 'di ltar khyod lung bstan/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /
27b7(rgyud 'grel): dngos po mchog tu grub pa'i phyir/ /srid pa'i ngan 'gro rnams las bstan no/ /kye rdo rje che ge mo zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa/ /sid+d+hi sa ma yastraM b+hurb+hu swa/ gzengs bstod pas ni 'di yin te/ /g.yon pa'i khu tshur snying khar bzhag la/ /g.yas pa
28a1(rgyud 'grel): mi 'jigs pa sbyin te/ 'dis phyag rgya chen po mchog tu gsang ba'i cho gas lung bstan par bya ste/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad dang/ byang chub sems dpa' i 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad rang gi dbang gis slob
28a2(rgyud 'grel): dpon dang/ mgrin gcig tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par mdzad de/ 'di lta ste/ 'di nyid kyang gzengs bstod pa'i phyag rgya chen pos mchog tu gsang ba'i dngos grub mchog 'grub pa'i byin brlabs dang/ gsang sngags 'di'i stobs la dad
28a3(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o zhes brjod par bya'o/ /mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ /mthong ba dang ni bzhugs pa yis/ /srid pa kun las rnam grol bar/ /khyod ni di ring gnas pa yin/ /bde chen theg pa 'di las ni/ /slar khyod 'chi ba yod min te/ /mi tshugs pa dang mi gsod
28a4(rgyud 'grel): pas/ /cis kyang mi 'jigs dga' bar gyis/ /dngos po mchog tu grub pa'i phyir/ /srid pa'i sdug bsngal las khyod 'das/ /srid pa shin tu grub pa'i phyir/ /ston pa'i mchog tu gyur pa yin/ /slob ma gus pas bla ma yi/ /rkang pa gnyis la phyag byas te/ /de nas
28a5(rgyud 'grel): ji skad gsungs pa kun/ /rjes su grub par khas blang ngo/ /de ltar dam bcas byas nas ni/ /cho ga 'di yis rang nyid kyis/ /rdo rje rtse mo lnga la ni/ /blangs nas kyang ni de la sbyin/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad de/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i lag na 'dug /khyod kyis kyang
28a6(rgyud 'grel): ni rtag tu bcad/ /phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs bstan/ /de nas oM sarba ta thA ga ta sid+d+hi badzra sa ma ya tiSh+Thai Sha twaM d+ha ra ya mi/ badzra satwaM/ hi hi hi hi hUM zhes brjod do/ /de nas/ 'di na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gro ba/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu yang
28a7(rgyud 'grel): byang chub rdo rje rgyal bas gsungs/ /zhes brjod la dril bu sbyin no/ /de ltar dbang bskur byas nas ni/ /de nas sar ba'i gos rnams bskon/ /me tog dri la sogs pas mchod/ /mchod phyir gdub bu bcad bar bya/ /de nas bla ma bdag nyid kyis/ /de yi spyi bor gdugs
28b1(rgyud 'grel): kyang gzugs/ /thal mo sbyar ba byas nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor legs par bskor du gzhug /gdugs dang bcas pa sgo phyogs/ /spyi bo btud phyag 'tshal gzhug /slob ma 'di ni phul ba lags/ /gsang sngags rgyud ni 'dzin par 'gyur/ /mkhan pos de skad smras nas su//
28b2(rgyud 'grel): gdugs bzhag nas ni slob ma de/ /lag par legs par blangs nas su/ /de nas 'di skad bsgo bar bya/ /de ni dkyil 'khor slob dpon 'gyur/ /gsang sngags rgyud kyang 'dzin par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang/ /lha rnams kun gyis dkur bar 'gyur/ /
28b3(rgyud 'grel): sems can rnams la snying brtse'i phyir/ /khyod kyis dkyil 'khor chog bzhin/ /nan tan skyed de bri bar gyis/ /sgrub pa po yang rgyud la sbyor/ /khyod kyis chos la ser sna dang/ /sems can rnams la mi phan pa/ /nyams pa chen por 'gyur kyang ni/ /bu khyod kyis ni mi
28b4(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /de nas bkra shis brjod bya zhing/ /zhes bya bas dbang bskur zin nas bkra shis brjod par bya ste/ /phun sum tshogs pa mnga' ba gser gyi ri bo 'dra/ /'jig rten gsum gyi mgon po dri ma gsum spangs pa/ /sangs rgyas pad+ma rgyas pa 'dra ba'i spyan mnga' ba
28b5(rgyud 'grel): bkra shis de ni skye dgu zhi byed dang po'o/ /de yis nye bar bstan pa mchog rab mi g.yo ba/ /'jig rten gsum na grags shing lha dang mis mchod pa/ /chos kyi dam pa skye dgu rnams la zhi byed pa/ /de ni 'jig rten dge ba'i bkra shis gnyis pa'o/ /dge 'dun dam pa chos
28b6(rgyud 'grel): ldan thob pa'i bkra shis phyug /mi dang lha dang lha ma yin gyis mchod pa'i gnas/ /tshogs kyi mchog rab ngo tsha shes dang dpal gyi gzhi/ /de ni 'jig rten dge ba'i bkra shis gsum pa'o// //rgyal ba bzhin du gying bcas pas/ /g.yog
28b7(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pas slob dpon la/ /lan gsum bskor bas tshigs bcad kyis/ /bla ma de ni gzengs bstod bya/ /kye bdag ni rim pas dbugs byung ste/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i lam la dgod/ /sa la nges par dbang bskur te/ /shin tu gzi ldan bkra shis mchog /ces brjod pas
29a1(rgyud 'grel): gshegs su gsol/ /de nas rang yang khyim du 'gro/ khyim du byin nas 'khor dag la/ /slob dpon 'di ni dam tshig pas/ /bdag kyang dam tshig mchog dang ldan/ /'di la rim gro phun sum tshogs/ /rta dang glang po nor dang 'bru/ /rin po che dang
29a2(rgyud 'grel): ci bzhed pa/ /khyed cag nga la ma 'dri bar/ /slob dpon 'di la de phyir phul zhes bya bas/ bla ma la yon dbul ba dang/ /dkyil 'khor gyi lha gshegs shing/ /sprul pa rang bsdu ba dang/ /tshon phyag cing dkyil 'khor gyi rdzas la sogs pa ji ltar bya ba'i rim pa
29a3(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa ni/ de nas bla ma'i ni gus bcas yon/ /rjes mthun khyod kyis sbyin par bya/ /des ni rims sogs gnod pa rnams/ /phyir zhing 'byung ba rmo 'gyur ro/ /rang gi dam tshig slob dpon ni/ /sbyin min bu dang chung ma dang/ /rang srog gis brtags brten bya na/ /longs spyod
29a4(rgyud 'grel): g.yos pas smos ci dgos/ /gang phyir bskal pa bye bar ni/ /grangs med par yang rnyed dka' ba'i/ /sangs rgyas nyid dang rtsod ldan la/ /tshe 'di nyid la ster bar byed/ /rtag tu khyod kyis dam tshig srungs/ /rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa mchod/ /rtag tu bla ma la yang dbul
29a5(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni sangs rgyas kun dang 'dra/ /de byin sangs rgyas thams cad la/ /rtag tu sbyin pa nyid du 'gyur/ /de byin bsod nams mchog dag gis/ /dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur/ /deng khyod skye 'bras bcas te/ /gang 'dir legs par gnas pas na/ /dam tshig lha
29a6(rgyud 'grel): rnams kun dang mnyam/ /rang byung du yang de skyes so/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bcas pa/ /kun gyis deng khyod dbang bskur bas/ khams gsum gyi ni rgyal po che/ /rgyal po'i bdag por bstan pa yin/ /des ni bdud las rnam rgyal te/ /grong khyer mchog tu rab tu
29a7(rgyud 'grel): zhugs/ /khyed rnams kyis ni sangs rgyas te/ de nyid thob par the tsho med/ /de nas me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod la legs par bstod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol ba btab cing bzod par gsol la/ nyi ma 'char ba'i dus su
29b1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya bcings la/ gyen du bkrol te snying po 'di brjod par bya'o/ /oM kri to la satwanwA/ sid+d+ha ma b+hi dwa ma thA nu ga ta/ gats+tsha twi ba? bi shi yaM/ su na ra ba ma na ya tu/ badzra satwa mu de/ mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams ni/ dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho:
29b2(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya bas rang gi lus la nye bar bsdu bar bya'o/ /de nas snying kha nas byung ba'i rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgyas rang gi dbang bskur ba'i gnas na 'dug pas dbang bskur la/ mdzub mo gnyis kyis phreng ba bcings la/ go cha bcing ba snying po 'dis bya ste/ oM badzra ratna b+hi ShaMny+tsa/
29b3(rgyud 'grel): sarba mu Ta me dri TaM ku ru pa ra ka ba ce na baM/ go cha'i mthar phreng ba bcing ba bgro ba la thal mo sbyar te/ bdag nyid mnyam pa'i thal mos dgyes pa'i snying po 'dis bya'o/ /oM badzra tu Sh+ye ho/ yi ge brgya pa brjod la/ rdo rje dga' bas lags so zhes bya ba byin de/ legs so rdo rje
29b4(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' khyod/ /rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so/ /rdo rje chos khyod legs pa ste/ /rdo rje las ni khyod legs so/ /theg pa chen po bla na med/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang/ /theg pa chen po mdor bsdus pa'i/ /mdo 'di yang ni legs par bshad/ /oM badzra kI li kI
29b5(rgyud 'grel): lA ya/ sarba bi g+hI badzra d+hA rA ny+dza ya hUM hUM hUM hUM phaT zhes bya bas phur bu ston pa 'o mas bkru'o/ /a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NAM A dya nutpan+na twat zhes 'dis/ tshon rtsi la rnam pa bsdus la 'bad bas/ /chu klung chen por dor bar bya'o/ /de nas gnas kyang ba glang gi lci
29b6(rgyud 'grel): bas nye bar byugs la/ bza' ba dang ni bca' ba rnams/ /ci dga' bar ni sbyin bar bya/ /khyi dang bya rog la sogs la/ /cung zad tsam yang ma sbyin no/ /yo byad rdzas rnams thams cad ni/ /slob dpon dag gis bsdus nas ni/ /slob ma rnams la bgor mi rung
29b7(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gyi ni yo byad kun/ /slob dpon bdag nyid dbang bar bshad/ /gal te slob mas spyod na ni/ /dam tshig las ni nyams bar 'gyur/ /gang zhig spyod par mi 'dod na/ /de yi cho ga'i go rim 'di'o/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi yo byad du/ /de dag chos
30a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du dbul/ /gdugs dang rnga yab dri la sogs/ /sang rgyas nyid la dbul bar bya/ /gdan dang 'dug spos dri la sogs/ /dam pa'i chos la dbul bar bya/ /gos dang yo byad snod la sogs/ /dge 'dun rnams la dbul bar bya/ /de dag la ni
30a2(rgyud 'grel): slob ma yis/ /cung zad tsam yang mi bskur ro dge 'dun med na dge slong sbyin/ /yang na dge slong ma la sbyin/ /gal te bdag nyid mi 'dod na/ /dge bsnyen dag la sbyin par bya/ /de nas de yi phye de nyin/ /nyes byas lhag ma zhi bya'i phyir/ /mkhas pa yi ni zhi ba yi
30a3(rgyud 'grel): sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o/ /slob mas bdag zhi bya'i phyir/ /spyan la sogs pa'i gsang sngags dang/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /byams pa chen po'ang bsgom par bya/ /nyes byas thams cad zhi bya'i phyir/ /de na zhi ba chen por bya/ /de dag ni gzhu
30a4(rgyud 'grel): cing dbang bskur ba'i rim pa'o// //gzhan yang sbyin sreg byed pa na/ /las bshad de dag bzhag la min/ /bdag gi las dang gzhan dag ste/ /shi dang gson gyi las su bstan/ /zhes bya bas/ /bdag don dang gzhan don du
30a5(rgyud 'grel): sbyin sreg bya la spyir mdor bstan pa'o/ /de yang shi dang gsom gyi las su bstan/ /zhes bya bas gzhan don bya ba khyad par du mdor bstan pa'o/ /de la bdag gi las bstan pa zhes bya ba nas/ de na bdag gi don bya ba la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /zhes
30a6(rgyud 'grel): bya ba'i bar gyis bdag gi don bya bar sbyin sreg bstan pa'o/ /de yang dbu gsum las lha rnams skyed ces bya bas yig 'bru dang phyag mtshan dang lha bskyed pa ste/ cho ga gsum la bya'o/ /de la a yig byin brlabs te/ zhes bya bas lha'i byin gyis brlabs pa ster
30a7(rgyud 'grel): dbul oM mgrin par A(rgyud 'grel): 'am h+Shi(rgyud 'grel): dang thugs kar hUM bsam pa la bya'o/ /'di las ma gsungs gzhan dag las/ /rgyas par bstan de der shes bya/ /zhes bya bas/ gzhung 'di sbyin sreg ma rgyas pas/ mtshan yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sbyin sreg rgyas pa dang/ rgyas
30b1(rgyud 'grel): pa gzhan dang gzhan bzhir 'dir bya bar gsungs pa'o/ /gzhan do bya ba'i rim pa yang/ /shi dang na ba gnyis yin te/ zhes bya bas/ gzhan don bya bas mdor bstan pa'o/ /de la na ba'i las bya ba zhes bya ba nas/ na ba las thar pa'i ting nge 'dzin to zhes bya ba'i bar gyis
30b2(rgyud 'grel): gang dag bgegs la sogs pa rnams kyis na ba la/ zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gis zhi ba'i las bya la/ gang dag zhi bar ma gyur pa rnams la drag po'i sbyin sreg gis las bya zhes pa'i don to/ /de nas shi ba la phan pa'i gdags pa'i rim pa 'byung ste/ ro'i sngon du bya ba'i cho ga dang/
30b3(rgyud 'grel): ro sta gon la gnas pa dang/ ro'i sbyin sreg chen pos sbyang ba dang/ gsum gyi rim pa ston te/ dkyus dkugs pa'i phyir gsal bar bya ba ni/ de nas shi la phan gdags na/ dang por gnod pa'i bgegs gsal nas/ /ro la phan pa'i cho ga ni/ /phan pa'i gnod sbyin chus
30b4(rgyud 'grel): btab la/ /dang por bkru ba'i las yin no/ /de nas rnam rgyal chus bkang ba'i/ /bum pas bkrus te bgegs bskrad la/ /de na de la bsrung bar bya'o/ /a yis kun khyab spyi stengs bsam/ /lhag 'gyur lha ni sngon bzhin bsam/ /a la ye shes lnga yis
30b5(rgyud 'grel): gang/ /de nas a yi spro bsdu bya/ /de na gang shi de nyid la/ /mig la a a zhes brjod de/ /de ni sngon gyi cho ga'o/ /zhes bya bas/ ro'i sngon du bya ba'i rim pa ni/ /dang por gnod pa'i bgegs bsal te/ /gang zhe na snang la bden pa bdar ba ni/ /dkon
30b6(rgyud 'grel): mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi bka' bden pa dang/ bden pa chen po'i byin gyis brlabs dang/ rig sngag dang gsang sngas dang snying po dang phyag rgya dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ rig sngags kyi lha thams cad kyi bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis
30b7(rgyud 'grel): tshe 'das pa 'di la gson gyi dus su rnyas byed pa/ gshin gyi dus su gcags byed pa'i bgegs dang log 'dren gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad skad cig kyang ma gnas par dengs shig ces byas la/ yungs kar brdeg cing/ hUM bzhi ba'i sngags bzlas par
31a1(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i bum pa'i chus bkrus la bgegs kyis mi tshugs par bsam/ /de nas rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa'i chus bkrus/ sgrib pa thams cad dag par bsam/ /de nas ro'i spyi bo'i steng du a bsams la/
31a2(rgyud 'grel): de gyur pa las kho na rang gi lhag pa'i lha ru bskyed/ de nas yang snying khar a bsams pa de las ye shes kyi 'od zer phros pas ro yi shes lnga dang ldan par gyur par bsam/ de nas ro'i lus ngag yid gsum byin gyis brlab par bya ste/ spyi bor zla ba'i steng du
31a3(rgyud 'grel): oM dkar po bsam/ mgrin par zla ba'i steng du h+rI(rgyud 'grel): dmar po bsam/ snying khar zla ba'i steng du hUM nag po bsam de nas skye mched du drug la dbyangs kyi yi ge zur re dgod do/ /de ni rten sbyad pa'o/ /de nas shes pa dgug pa ni/ gong gi bden pa bdab la tshes pas
31a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod 'di nas shi pa'i dus byas nas/ ngan song gsum la sogs pa 'gro ba gang na 'dug kyang rung/ skad cig gis 'dir khugs bar gyur cig /de nas sngags brjod pa ni/ oM sarba bit sarba pA paM A kaNA ya/ hUM dza(rgyud 'grel): a ni su tri pre du dzad
31a5(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod cing snying kha nas 'od 'phros pa las khugs par bsam mo/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): brjod la yang bstim par bsam ma/ /de nas bgegs dang dpral ba ni/ /gong gi bden pa bdar la/ /gong ma ltar 'dir yang bgegs bskrad do/ /de nas 'gro ba rigs drug nas
31a6(rgyud 'grel): drang bar ni/ 'gro ba rigs drug ni snying pos 'gro bas ris rug nas re'i shes pa drang ba nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'bras bu thob par bsam mo/ /de na gtang bar bya ba'i mtshon cha'i bye brag ro la dbul ba dang/ me tog gi char dbab pa'o/ /de dag ni sngon
31a7(rgyud 'grel): du bya ba'i rim pa'o// //de nas gnas pa'i cho ga bshad/ /shi ba dkyil 'khor dbus bzhag ste/ /zhag lnga slob dpon snyung gnas te/ /bgegs bskrad la sogs byas nas ni/ /'khor los lha rnams mdun sam ste/ /phyag 'tshal spro skyed la
31b1(rgyud 'grel): sogs bya/ /de nas tshig 'di ched rjod bya/ /deng dus bdag tshe 'bras bu yod /bdag gi gson pa 'am 'bras bur bcas/ /lha dang dam tshig gis mnyam par/ /gyur pa bdag ni the tshom med/ /byang chub sems dang sems gcig pas/ /mi ldog par ni bdag gyur te
31b2(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su ni/ /deng bdag skye bar the tshom med/ /deng bdag nyi ma dam pa ste/ /bdag gi mchod sbyin bla na med/ /sangs rgyas thams cad spyan 'dren pas/ /deng bdag 'dul ba'i mchog yin no/ /de nas sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin dang/ /rgyal mchog la sogs bsgom
31b3(rgyud 'grel): bya steng/ /bsgo dbye la sogs gnas 'dir bshad/ /de nas spos thogs la/ spyan drang tshig 'di brjod par bya/ /kye dbang bskur des ste bla na med/ /phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kun/ /ma lus bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba yis//
31b4(rgyud 'grel): 'di la phan gdags don ched du/ /gnas 'dir sangs rgyas kun gshegs te/ /'di la dbang ni stsal du gsol/ /de rjes gsang sngags 'di brjod bya/ /a a sarba ta thA ga ta h+ri da ya ha ra ha ra/ oM hUM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): b+ha ga waM/ dz+nyA na murti/ wA gI shwa ra mahA ba tsa sarba d+harma/ ga ga nA
31b5(rgyud 'grel): mA la su pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma d+hA tu dz+nyA na garb+ha a(rgyud 'grel): zhes ni brjod ba'i sngags bzlas so/ /dang po sangs rgyas nga rgyal dang/ /ldan pas dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir/ /tshigs bcad 'di yis bstod par bya/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis bstod bya ba/ /rang la bstod de nges pa'i mchog
31b6(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu 'byin pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ /shi la phan gdags don ched du/ /mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog khyod 'dud/ /des ni gsol ba gdab byas nas/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas nam mkha' la/ /mngon sum 'dra bar gang bar bsgom/ /de nas phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba dang/
31b7(rgyud 'grel): dang por sangs rgyas la sogs pa/ /nam mkha' gang bar 'di bzhes la/ /deng bdag 'dus pa'i mchog yin te/ /de na til gyis de la ni/ /bskor te sbyin sreg dbul bar bya/ /shi ba sta gon la gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin to zhes bya bas/ ro sta gon la gnas pa bstan te/
32a1(rgyud 'grel): de yang de nas ro sta gon la gnas pa ni/ /shin tu dben pa'i gnas su/ /dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi pa byas la/ lha rnams kyi gnas su me tog gi chom bu bkod de/ /dbus su khri byas la ras bzang po lug gcig gis dkris
32a2(rgyud 'grel): te/ /de'i steng du ro bzhag la rdo rje slob dpon gyis dkar gsum bza' zhing za gcig pa'i smyung ba byas la/ rdo rje 'chang chen po'i phyag rgya chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gsum dang ldan par bsgoms nas/ /de nas yang sngon bzhin ro'i bgegs bskrad la/ de'i 'og tu rdo
32a3(rgyud 'grel): rje 'khor lo'i sngags dang phyag rgyas dkyil 'khor nam mkha' la sprul la/ phyag dang mchod pa dang bstod pa yan chod sngon bzhin byas la/ de'i 'og tu tshig 'di brjod par bya ste/ deng dus bdag tshe 'bras bu yod/ /de bdag 'dus pa mchog yin no/ /
32a4(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa'i bar te/ de ltar zhag lnga'i bar du nyin zhag re la mthun bzhi'i sbyor bas lha la mchod pa dang rol yungs kar ram bye mas brab cing sngags ring gi bzlas pa bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu nam mkha' la bzhugs pa gshegs su gsol la/ de nas zhag nga'i nang
32a5(rgyud 'grel): bar slob dpon gyis ting nge 'dzin rnam pa gsum sngon bzhin bsgoms la/ de nas spos thogs la spyan drangs tshig 'di brjod pa bya/ /kye dbang bskur nges te bla na med/ /phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kun/ /ma lus bdag la dgongs su
32a6(rgyud 'grel): gsol/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba yis/ /'di la phan gdags don ched du/ /gnas 'dir sangs rgyas kun gshegs te/ /'di la dbang ni stsal du gsol/ /zhes brjod la ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur bar bsam mo/ /de nas zha
32a7(rgyud 'grel): drug pa la dkyil 'khor gyi shar phyogs su zhi ba'i thabs bcas te/ /til nag pos sdig pa sbyang ba'i sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de nas gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir 'dud nyi shus bstod pa'o/ /de dag ni ro sta gon la gnas pa'i cho ga'o// //
32b1(rgyud 'grel): de nas sngon gyi sbyor ba yis/ /cho ga rnams ni dpyad par bya/ /dang po'i cho ga'i rim pa nas/ /'khor lo rim pa 'dir gsungs te/ /pha rol phyung ste gtor ma sbyin/ /de nas khrus byas mchod pa'i tshogs/ /ma lus par ni 'dir bshad do/ /de nas phyi'i rim ldan pas/ /sngags pa ?
32b2(rgyud 'grel): gos ldan pa yis/ /shin tu bsgyings pas brgyan byas te/ /zhag bdun nad par sbyin sreg bya/ /mi nyid shi ba'i gnas byas te/ /shi? la phan pa'i dkyil 'khor ldan/ /gzhal yas khang la de 'dra ba/ /'di la gsungs te gzhan du min/ /'di ltar gsungs pa'i cho
32b3(rgyud 'grel): ga ni/ /bdag gis rang gzor ma byas te/ /'jam dpal sgyu 'phrul dra ba dang/ /cho ga 'dus pa'i rgyud las te/ /des na 'dir ni 'os pa yin/ /'di ni shi ba'i cho ga'o/ /shi ba la phan gdags pa'i ting nge 'dzin to zhes bya bas/ ro sbyin sreg chen pos sbyang ba ste/ de yang de
32b4(rgyud 'grel): nas zhag ?? dkyil 'khor chen por sbyang ba'i phyir/ slob dpon rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan la/ /dang por gtor ma gtad la/ /de nas sa'i cho ga dang thig gi cho ga dang/ /rdul tshon bri ba la gzhung bzhin du bya la/ /dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su sreg khang gcig pa dang
32b5(rgyud 'grel): rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya dgod pa dang/ rgyan dgod pa dang/ mchod pa'i yo byad la sogs pa gzhung bzhin du bkug la/ /de nas ro sreg khang du drangs te/ sreg khang la lan gsum bskor la shar phyogs nas nang du gzhug /de nas slob dpon gyis dang po'i
32b6(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin nas gzung ste/ yongs su rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin yan chad bsgoms la/ /dkyil 'khor gyi mchod pa rdzogs par byas te/ de nas rlung g.yab kyi me sbar la me'i spra brtag ste/ dam tshig gi me lha bskyed ba dang/ mtshan nyid kyi me lha spyan drang ba dang/
32b7(rgyud 'grel): mdun gyi nam mkha' la bstod pa dang/ dgug gzhug bcing ba dang phyag rgyas gdab ba dang/ byin gyis brlab pa dang/ dbang bskur ba dang mchod pa dang/ sreg rdzas phul ba yan tshod byas pa ni me lha ni mchod pa'o/ /de na me lha'i thugs khar yi ge hUM las pho brang rim
33a1(rgyud 'grel): pa gsum dang ldan pa'i gzhal yas khang bsgoms la thab tu me tog re dor zhing/ gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor nas me lha'i thugs kar/ re mos sam dus gcig tu spyan drangs te/ /sreg rdzas rnams dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas mjug
33a2(rgyud 'grel): gi cho ga ni/ bzod par gsol ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba dang/ phyag rgya dgrol zhing ye shes gshegs pa dang skyed pa snying khar bsdu ba dang phur bu gdon zhing phyogs skyong gos ba dang/ mchod rdzas la sogs pa bsdu ba dang/ sman ma dang rdul tshon phyags la
33a3(rgyud 'grel): gdugs dang rgyal mtshan la sogs pas spyan drangs la/ chu bo chen por ngor bar bya'o/ /de nas ba'i rnam pa lngas skyang nul byas la thig le la sogs pa mi mthong bar byas la/ dkyil 'khor gyi thog tu spyan gzigs dang sder bzang la sogs pa bzhag nas bkra
33a4(rgyud 'grel): shis brjod la/ /slob ma mgu bar bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor du phul ba'i yo byad rnams ni slob dpon bkyer bar bya'o/ de dag ni ngan song nas drang ba'i cho ga'o/ /byang chub kyi lam la dgod pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa dang/ dbang bskur
33a5(rgyud 'grel): ba'o/ de nas phyi de nang par ram zhag gsum na yang rung ste/ rus pa'o mas dkrus la dkyil 'khor bkod pa'i rgyud chen po 'am bye ma la uSh+Ni Sha'i gzungs rgyud chen po nas byung ba bzhin du tsha tsha btab la/ tsha tsha dang po btab pa dang ming byed la/ yid kyi dkyil 'khor
33a6(rgyud 'grel): du gzhug pa dang/ dbang bskur bar bya ba'am/ yang na slob ma gson po ji ltar 'jug pa ltar dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa dang/ rig pa'i dbang bskur ba dang/ slob dpon du dbang bskur ba dang/ rjes su gnang ba dbang bskur ba'o/ /de nas de la lam bstan bya/ /tshogs bdag
33a7(rgyud 'grel): dge ba'i don la sbyar zhes bya bas shi ba'i lam bstan bar bya ste/ slob dpon gyis me tog gcig gyen tu 'das? te/ sod cig sang cig rigs kyi bu/ tshogs kyi lam dang sbyor ba'i lam/ /mthong ba'i lam dang sgom pa'i lam/ /byang chub bar chad med pa'i lam
33b1(rgyud 'grel): mdor? na lam ni de rnams su/ /zhugs nas byang chub 'thob gyur cig /ces bya'o/ /de nas shi ba'i don du sbyin gtor rgya chen po bya ste/ cha tsha gshegs su gzhug go /ro sbyin sreg chen pos spyad ba'o/ /de yang lung las rdo rje dril bu lag par sbyin/ /mgo la dbu rgyan bskon bar bya/ /rdo rje sdom pa rnams
33b2(rgyud 'grel): byin te/ /bum pa'i dbang bskur rnams byin la/ /mig sogs rdo rje gti mug sogs/ /rdo rje gsum ni gnas gsum dgod/ /rdo rje thab khung rab sbyor gyis/ /'du byed rab tu bya bar bstan/ /nyi ma gsum ni yon pa na/ /rus pa'i phreng ba bsdus byas la/ /dri dang 'o mas bran nas ni
33b3(rgyud 'grel): de yis mchod rten du bya ba'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de mthar de nyid rtag bsgom dang zhes pa nas/ rim pa'i ting nge 'dzin to zhes bya ba'i bar gyi gong thams cad kyi rim bar bya ba'i phyir ting nge 'dzin ston to/ /spyir cho ga'i rim thams cad zin nas thun mtshams sam/ thun la mi 'jug kyang
33b4(rgyud 'grel): rung ste /ye shes pa gshegs shing/ de nas gzhal yas khang lha la bsdu ba dang/ lha thams cad gtso bo la bsdus la yig 'bru bsgom mo/ /yig 'bru ni thams cad kyi ngo bo a ste/ a stong pa nyid las skad cig mas lhar dran par byas nas dge ba'i las rnams
33b5(rgyud 'grel): byang bar bstan pa'o/ /de nas 'khor lo stan par bya zhes bya ba nas/ shes rab 'khor lor grags pa yin zhes bya ba'i bar gyis shes rab kyi 'khor lo bsgom ba stan pa ste/ dkyus nyid gsal pa'i phyir ma dkrol lo/ /de yang shin tu zab pa dang/ bla ma la rag las pa'i man
33b6(rgyud 'grel): ngag ston te de yang dang por bdag nyid khams dang zas snyoms bar 'du 'dzi spangs la gnas bsam gtan gyi tsher ma med par skyil krung bcas la/ lag pa g.yon gyi steng du g.yas bzhag la phang bar bkan te/ sgal ba'i steng du sgal ba bzhag la mig sna gong du bar
33b7(rgyud 'grel): la so 'byar la ma reg par byas la lha'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas rtsa'i 'khor lo bzhi ye rang chas su lus la yod pa dkyus bzhin gsal btab la/ de nas dang por lte ba'i 'khor lo la sems rtse gcig tu gtad la sgom/ /de gsal nas de bzhin du snying dang mgrin pa dang//
34a1(rgyud 'grel): mtshogs ma rnams rim gyis gsal bar bsgoms la/ de nas rkang pa dang mdoms mor rlung dang me bsams te/ rlung gi me spar te rtsa g.yas na mar zhugs/ lte ba'i 'khor lo bde ba'i thig ler zhu/ de bzhin du me rlung gis phul te snying kha dang
34a2(rgyud 'grel): mgrin pa dang mtshogs ma rnams rims kyis bzhu nas/ lus thams cad bde ba'i thig les gang bar bsam zhing/ blo bsam gtan gyi bde ba la gnas par bya ste/ me ni gnas der 'das so zhes bya'o/ /de nas spyi bo'i haM las mes zhu bas thig le'i bde ba rtsa
34a3(rgyud 'grel): g.yon na mar babs nas/ dang por mtshogs ma'i 'khor lo gsos de/ /sngon bzhin du 'khor lo nyid du gyur par bsam mo/ /de bzhin du mgrin pa dang snying kha dang lte ba'i 'khor lo rnams rims kyis gsal bar bsam mo/ /de ltar yang nas yang du rtse gcig
34a4(rgyud 'grel): gi sems kyis goms pas zhi gnas kyi bde ba skye bar 'gyur ba ni man ngag go /'di ltar rtag tu gang bsgoms pa zhes pa nas/ de dag ni shes rab kyi 'khor lo'i bsgom pa'i ting nge 'dzin to zhes bya ba'i bar gyis/ shes rab kyi 'khor lo bsgom ba'i phan
34a5(rgyud 'grel): yon bstan te/ dkyus nyid gsal bas 'dir ma dkrol lo/ /sangs rgyas kun dang thabs gcig pa'i/ zhes pa nas/ mi dbye dang mtshungs sems dang ldan par shog /ces bya ba'i bar gyis/ slob dpon gyis ji ltar brtsams pa dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba sngo ba bstan
34a6(rgyud 'grel): pa ste /sla bas de nyid phyir ma bkrol lo/ /'di bsdus dge rtsa gang yod des/ 'jam dpal dbyangs kyi zhal mthong shog /gsang ba'i dka' 'grel bshad pa don bsdus sgron ma rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po de wA ka ra tsan+d+ra dang/ lo ts+tsha ba glog
34a7(rgyud 'grel): sbyas bsgyud ba'o// (//*/ /gsang ldan gyi tho yig smri tis dz+nyA na kirtis mdzad pa bzhugs so/) /'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rigs kun bdag po 'jam dpal dang/ /bla ma de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchog dang thun mong sgrub 'dod pa
34b1(rgyud 'grel): gang zag rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ /bla ma rim pa brgyud pa yis/ /cho ga'i rim pa brjod par bya/ /dkyil 'khor bdun gyi cho ga la/ /bsnyen pa sa dang sta gon dang/ /dkyil 'khor zhag gi cho ga'o/ /bsnyen pa'i las su bya ba la/ /dang po las dang sbyor ba gsum/ /mchod
34b2(rgyud 'grel): bstod bsnyen par bya ba'o/ /dang po'i las su bya ba la/ /nye reg 'thor 'thung stong par bsgom/ /skur gyur lce dang lag pa brlab/ /bsrung dang tshogs bsag phyag lnga bya/ /sdom bzung lus bsreg skur ldang ngo/ /srung la bdag dang gnas srung ste/ /bdag nyid srung ba bya ba
34b3(rgyud 'grel): yang/ /bskyed brlab dbang dang go pa bsgo'o/ /gnas srung ba yi rim pa la/ /bsnun dang bsreg dang bcing ba bya/ /khro bo rdo rje'i ra ba bsgom/ /tshogs bsag pa yi rim pa yang/ /sbyin sreg bya zhing mchod pa brlab/ /rten sprul bstod de gsal por bsgom/ /dga' bar
34b4(rgyud 'grel): gyur pas bstod pa bya/ /phyag mchod sdig bshags yi rang bya/ /bskul dang gsol gdab dge ba sngo/ /skyabs 'gro lam bsten sems skyed do/ /bstod bya gnad sbyin bslar bstod bya/ /sbyor ba gsum la dang po dang/ /rgyal mchog dang ni las dag go /dang po'i sbyor ba
34b5(rgyud 'grel): bya ba la/ /ye shes bzhi dang gtso bo bskyed/ /ye shes me long mnyam nyid dang/ /so so chos dbyings nan tan no/ /gzhi la rdo rje mchod rten dang/ /chos 'byung rgya gram bsgom pa dang/ /gzhal yas gdan dang bcas pa'o/ /gtso bo bskyed pa dag la yang/ /cho ga
34b6(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa gsum las su/ /gzhi yi sangs rgyas bskyed ba dang/ /dang po'i sangs rgyas 'khor lo dang/ /ye shes sems dang zla ba a'o/ /dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog bsgom pa yang/ /dang por yig 'bru bskyed pa dang/ /de las phyag mtshan sku phra mo/ /thig ler gyur
34b7(rgyud 'grel): te sku rnams bskyed/ /las kyi rgyal po mchog la ni/ /sgo dbye bsdu bskrad yon dbul bstod/ /bstim la bskrad de sgo yang bcang/ /rgyas gdab dbang bskur las la sbyad/ /mchod cing bstod pa bya ba yang/ /dang po'i sangs rgyas bya byas la/ /mchod brlab sgo dbye snyan
35a1(rgyud 'grel): gsan dbab/ /spyan drangs bskrad la yon dbul bstod/ /nang du dgug gzhug bya ba dang/ /bskrad cing sgo bcang go yang sgo/ /rgyas gdab dbang dang ldan bar byas/ /mchod dang bstod pa rgyas par bya'o/ /bsnyen pa bya ba'i rim pa yang/ /
35a2(rgyud 'grel): phyag byas thugs bzhugs las sngags brjod/ /sngags dgod brtan byas zla ba bya/ /thun mtshams ngag tu rang bya la/ mchod bstod phyag rgya dge ba bsngo/ /bzod gsol lha bsdus spyod lam bya/ /thun la babs na nang zhugs skrad/ /sgo bcad lha dgod
35a3(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa brlab/ /mchod bstod phyag bya yon chab dbul/ /thugs kar zhugs te gong ltar bya/ /thun gsum dag la de dang 'bar/ /thun bzhi pa yi tha ma ru/ /gong ltar byas la don gsol gdab/ /smon lam gdab la ye shes gshegs/ /dkyil 'khor bsdus
35a4(rgyud 'grel): te rang la bsrung/ /brgya pa bzlas te spyod lam bya'o/ /de ni bsnyen pa rgyas pa'o/ /bsnyen pa bsdus pa bya ba yang/ /gtso bo yan chad sgom byas la/ /sbyor ba rnam gnyis bzhag pa ste/ /phyi ma gong ltar bya ba yin/ /grangs dang mtshan ma'i bsnyen pa yang
35a5(rgyud 'grel): bzlas dang bsgom pa'i khyad par ro/ /de ltar bya ba'i ces dag la/ /phran tshegs pa ni ci rigs gdags/ de rnams sngon du bsnyen pa'o/ /de nas sa'i cho ga ste/ /brtag dang bslang dang sbyang ba dang/ /gzung dang rdo rje'i sgrub pa'o/ /brtag pa phyogs dang mtshan
35a6(rgyud 'grel): nyid dang/ /gnas dang lto 'phye'i brtag pa'o/ /slang ba snang dang mi snang ste/ /mi snang ba la bslang ba yang/ /maN+Dal byas la dri tshom dgod/ /bdag nyid lhar bskyed lha tshogs sprul/ /de la mchod stod gtor ma sbyin/ /lha mo bskyed la spyan drangs
35a7(rgyud 'grel): te/ /bskrad bstim rgyas gdab dbang bskur bya/ /mchod dang gtor 'bul sa slang bya/ /ye shes gshegs la dam tshig bstim/ /sbyang ba las dang bya ba dang/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas sbyang byas te/ /pra brtag bum zhugs 'thas par bcag/
35b1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sgrub bar bya ba ni/ /slob dpon rgyan gyis brgyan byas la/ /stegs bu'i dbus su gnas byas te/ /dang por nye reg bya ba nas/ /bzlas la thug pa yan chod bya/ /mchod cing bstod la gsol ba gdab/ /dkyil 'khor bteg la rang yang babs/ /gnas
35b2(rgyud 'grel): gsum brlabs la spro ba bskyed/ /phyag byas spos thog spyan yang drang/ /bka' bsgo bskor te bsrung ba bya/ /b+h+ruM mam khaM las dkyil 'khor bskyed/ /khro bo gsang ba bstim byas la/ /phur bus gdab pa'i las bya'o/ /sta gon bya ba'i rim pa ni/ /lha dang bum
35b3(rgyud 'grel): pa sbyin sreg dang/ /lha mo dang ni slob ma'o/ /lha yi sta gon bya ba la/ /gnas su dri dang me tog dgod/ /de las lhar skyed bstim la mchod/ /bum pa mtshan nyid ldan bya la/ /mtshan bya mgul bcings kha rgyan te/ /bskrad bdug bsangs la bcud blug go /
35b4(rgyud 'grel): bum pa baM las bskyed byas la/ /nang du lha bskyed spyan yang drang/ /bstim la rgyas gdab dbang ldan bya/ /mchod cing bstod la bzlas par bya'o/ /sbyin sreg shar du thab byas la/ /shing gcer me spar me lha bskyed/ /de la mchod la thugs khar ni
35b5(rgyud 'grel): bum? rtsegs bskyed la spyan drangs bstim/ /mchod cing bstod la sreg rdzas dbul/ /spyan ma gnod sbyin dag la yang/ /sbyin sreg rim bzhin dbul bar bya/ /sa yi lha mo'i sta gon ni/ /gong ltar byas te mi gshegs so/ /de nas slob ma'i sta gon ni/ /
35b6(rgyud 'grel): phyi rol gtor ma byin byas la/ /khrus byas gos gon me tog thogs/ /phyag byas gsol gdab sna gtong bskul/ /sdig bshags yi rang skyabs su 'gro /sems bskyed lam gnas rdo rje lta bu bya/ /lhar bskyed byin brlabs de la mchod/ /so shing ku sha srung
35b7(rgyud 'grel): skud gdags/ /gzengs bstod nyal gzhug spro ba bskyed/ /lha la mchod cing bstod pa bya/ /phyag byas gsol ba lan gsum gdab/ /dge ba bsngo zhing bzod gsol bya/ /gsol ba gdab cing smon lam gdab/ /sangs rgyas dang por mtshan 'don
36a1(rgyud 'grel): gnas/ /dkyil 'khor zhag gi cho ga la/ /thig dang tshon dang sgrub pa dang/ /'jug cing dbang bskur bya ba'o/ /thig le las dang ye shes te/ /ye shes snal ma sar ba la/ /byin brlabs bsgril te snod bcug mchod/ bzlas te rim
36a2(rgyud 'grel): pas gdab par bya/ /gdab pa dang po gnam thig ste/ /de nas sa thig gdab pa'o/ /tshon ni byin brlabs bzlas te dgye/ /pan tsa ra ka phyogs tshon dang/ /mtshan ma'i bye brag bri bar bya/ /bsgrub ba bya ba'i rim pa yang/ /dkyil 'khor brgyan te mdo
36a3(rgyud 'grel): gdon bzhag /khrus byas gzhan la shar sgor gnas/ /bsrung dang gsang gtor dkyil 'khor bslang/ /sgo phye bum dgod lhar bskyed de/ /nam mkha' i lha tshogs phab la bsre/ /bdag nyid dang po'i lhar bskyed de/ /sngags bzlas phar spro tshud 'du bya
36a4(rgyud 'grel): lha rnams stong bsgoms slar la bskyed/ /de nas sgo dbye la sogs pa/ /sngon du bstan pa bzhin du bya/ /phyi rol dag? tu byung byas la/ /'jig rten pa la gtor ma byin/ /slob la nang du zhugs byas la/ /sbyin sreg dag gis tshim par bya/ /de nas slob
36a5(rgyud 'grel): ma 'jug par yang/ /lha la gsol gdab gnang bar bsam/ /slob mas khrus byas me tog thogs/ /yol bas bcad la phyi rol dgug /slob mas phyag byas gsol ba gdab/ /gdong dang stod dang smad g.yogs te/ nang bkug phyag bya sdig pa
36a6(rgyud 'grel): bshags/ /yi rang bskul dang gsol ba gdab/ /slob dpon 'dod phyir yang gsol gdab/ /de nas dam tshig dag ni dbog /dam tshig 'dzin par khas len gzhug /sems bskyed pa dang lhar bskyed brlab/ /dam tshig bsgrag cing de la mchod/ /las kyi bum
36a7(rgyud 'grel): pas dbang yang bskur/ /sgo bzhir bcug la slar yang ni/ /shar sger bzhag la mna' yang sgag /mna' chu blud la ye shes dbab/ /mchod cing smrar gzhug phreng ba dor/ /mgo la bcings te snang ba brtag /mi dbye ba dang dkyil 'khor bstan/ /dbang bskur
36b1(rgyud 'grel): ba yi rim pa dang/ /sgrub pa po dang slob dpon ni/ /sgrub pa po ru dbang bskur na/ /rang gi lhar bskyed de la mchod/ /dang po rig pa'i dbang bskur te/ /bkra shis brjod cing chu dbang bskur/ /dbu rgyan dang ni rdo rje sbyin/ /dril bu dang ni ming yang gdags/ /gsang ba'i
36b2(rgyud 'grel): ye shes sngags kyang sbyin/ /phyag rgya bzhi brlab brtul zhugs sbyin/ /slob dpon dag tu dbang bskur na/ /shar sgo sna tshogs pad+ma bri/ /slob ma sangs rgyas dang por skyed/ /rig pa'i dbang lnga bskur bar bya/ /dam tshig gsum dang gsang ba dang/ /gsang
36b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyal dang ni nges pa'i dpang/ /rim pa bzhin du bskur bar bya'o/ /dam tshig gsum la rdo rje dang/ /dril bu dang ni phyag rgya'o/ /gsang ba'i dbang la dkyil 'khor dang/ /lha dang slob dpon las rnams so/ /gsang rgyal dag gi dbang bskur ba/ /de bzhin rigs dang
36b4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dang/ /rin po che dang pad+ma dang/ /las kyi rigs kyi gsang ba'o/ /nges pa'i dbang la gzhan don dang/ /rang don nges pa'i dbang bskur ro/ /gzhan don nges pa'i dbang bskur na/ /bye brag ngag dang spyi ngag go /bye brag la yang 'di lta ste/ /de bzhin rigs dang
36b5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dang/ /rin chen rigs dang pad+ma dang/ /las kyi rigs kyi nges pa'o/ /rang don nges pa'i dbang bskur ba/ /gsang ba'i ye shes brlab cing sngags kyang sbyin/ /phyag rgya bzhin brlab lung yang bstan/ /gzengs bstod pa dang dbugs dbyung ba'o/ /de mthar dbang
36b6(rgyud 'grel): bstan bya ba'i phyir/ /brtul zhugs dag gi dbang bskur ro/ /de ltar dbang bskur rdzogs pa dang/ /dkyil 'khor lha la mchod cing bstod/ /dge ba bsngo zhing bzod gsol bya/ smon lam gdab la don gsal gdab/ /ye shes gshegs la dkyil 'khor
36b7(rgyud 'grel): bsdu/ /brgya pa bzlas shing gzugs brnyan bkru/ lhag chad bskang phyir sbyin sreg bya/ /mtshan brjod pa yi gsung rab bsgrag /gsang ldan ma yi pandi tha/ /dkyil 'khor bdun gyi tho yig 'di/ /bdag gis bsdebs pa'i dge ba yis/ /kun gyis 'jam
37a1(rgyud 'grel): mgon thob par shog /gsang ldan ma'i tho yig /pan+ti thar byas pa smri ti dz+nyA na kIrtas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //a hUM b+h+ruM h+rI:/ a bruM/ saM haM aM yaM khaM a a/ lha'i gtso bo bskyed do/ /dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog
37a2(rgyud 'grel): bsgom mo/ /las rgyal mchog bsgom // */ (/'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga paN+Di ta shAn+ta d+ha gar b+has mdzad pa/) /rgya gar skad du/ Arya many+dzu sh+rI nA ma saM gI ti maN+Dal bi d+hi/ bod skad du
37a3(rgyud 'grel): 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga /rje btsun 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ngo bo nyid kyi sku mnga' zhing/ /sgyu ma'i rang bzhin 'byung gnas che/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi sprul pa'i sku/ /'jam
37a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal te/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga bshad par bya/ /dang po re shig slob ma ni/ /dad ldan dam tshig brtul zhugs srung/ /rtog med rgyud gcig bla ma dang/ /'jam pa'i dpal la mos pa yis/ /khra med sngags dang rgyud la
37a5(rgyud 'grel): mkhas/ /thos ldan rgyud 'dir dbang thob pas/ /dam tshig gsum la gnas pa des/ /dang po 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi lha rnams sgrub pa'i thabs las 'byung ba bzhin du bsnyen pa bya ste/ sngags kyi phreng ba 'bum du bzlas pa ni sngon du bsnyen
37a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// //gzhung las bsam gtan dang ni rjes mthun pa'i/ /ri yi phug gam chu yi 'gram/ /rdzing ngam rang dga' i gnas dag gam/ /lha khang mchod rten la sogs par gsungs pas na/ /de lta bu'i gnas der song la/ /ci tsam 'byor pa'i
37a7(rgyud 'grel): tshad kyis byas la/ /sa yongs su brtag pa der/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i sngags bzlas pa'i chus gtor/ /dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa byas nas/ /der mchod pa dang gtor ma bshams la/ /sa'i lha mo las blang ba ni/ /skyobs pa sangs rgyas
37b1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyi/ /spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par dang/ /sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa la/ /lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur/ /skyob pa shAkya seng ge yis/ /ji ltar bdud kyi sde bcom pa/ /de ltar bdag gis bdud bcom nas/ /bdag gis dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /ces brjod nas thal mo sa la
37b2(rgyud 'grel): brdabs pas/ /sku phyed tsam sa las thon pa dang/ sems can thams cad kyi don du dkyil 'khor byed pas bdag byin ces brjod pas/ khyod kyis dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po gyis shig ces brjod nas sa la thim par bsam mo/ /sa blang ba'o/ /de nas drag po'i sbyin
37b3(rgyud 'grel): sreg gis bgegs bzlog la/ de nyid du bdag dang blo zhi ba'i phyir sbyin sreg byas la der sa sbyang bar bya ste/ 'dom gang tsam la sogs pa brkos la sa'i ro lnga gsal te/ der rin po che sna lnga dang ldan pa'i bum pa bcug la slar sas dgang ngo/ /de bzhin gshegs
37b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i ras bris la sogs pa ji tsam 'byor ba yang bris la dkyil 'khor gnyis 'gyur la spos kyis chag chag btab ste/ lag pas la reg par bya'o/ /rje btsun gyi yi ge brgya pa lan bdun bzlas par bya'o/ /sa gzung ba'i rim pa'o// //
37b5(rgyud 'grel): de nas bdag nyid ji snyed pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa byas te/ bkra shis pa'i dus su dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug la/ /sgrub pa'i thabs las 'byung ba bzhin du bdag srung ba nas bgegs gzhom pa la sogs pa bya ba dang/ de nas rten sprul pa tshogs
37b6(rgyud 'grel): bsags pa nas/ /ye shes par gyur pa'i bar du byas la/ der gong gi dang 'dra ba'i lha mo sta gon byas la/ de nas spro ba bskyed de/ deng du bdag tshe 'bras bu yod/ /bdag ni gson pa 'bras bur bcas/ /lha dang dam tshig mnyam pa ru/ /gyur par bdag
37b7(rgyud 'grel): ni som nyi med/ /byang chub sems dang sems gcig las/ /mi ldog par ni bdag gyur te/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi rigs su ni/ /der bdag skye bar the tshom med/ /de bdag nyi ma dam pa ste/ /mchod sbyin 'di ni bla na med/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas
38a1(rgyud 'grel): spyan 'dren pa/ /deng bdag 'dus pa'i mchog yin no/ /de nas phyag byas spos thogs la/ /kye dbang ni nges te bla na med/ /phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kun/ /ma lus bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba yis/ /
38a2(rgyud 'grel): 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor bri/ /deng 'dir sangs rgyas kun gshegs te/ /dngos grub 'di ni stsal du gsol/ /ces brjod la dang po'i sbyor ba dang/ /dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog dang las kyi rgyal po mchog rnam par bsgoms la/ /yang sgo dbye ba
38a3(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa sngon du 'gro ba nas bdag nyid ye shes pa'i gnas su 'dug pa'i bar du bya ste/ phreng ba'i sngags zlos pa la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i sgrub pa'i grogs lha'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir 'dud kyis bstod de/ de nas
38a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyud chen sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/ /rdo rje 'chang chen gsang sngags 'chang/ /dpag med rnams kyi bka' bzhin du/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ ces gsol ba btab la/ de nas langs te/ lha rnams la phyag 'tshal nas/ /bdag ni rang
38a5(rgyud 'grel): nyid ral gri can/ /dang po'i sangs rgyas bdag rang nyid/ /nga ni sangs rgyas rgyal po ste/ /stobs chen ral gri can bdag nyid/ /de nas mig dang rkang pa byin gyis brlabs te/ /bsgom pa'i dkyil 'khor steng du bteg la/ /byang shar mtshams nas bskor
38a6(rgyud 'grel): ba byas te/ /hUM ye shes zhi ba'i ngang las ma g.yos kyang/ /sku yi cha lugs za byed rngam stabs can/ /gsung gi nga ro 'brug stong ldir ba'i sgras/ /ma lus dbang du sdud la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gzhan yang tsham rngam gyi dbyangs brjod la/ /hUM dkyil 'khor
38a7(rgyud 'grel): chen po'i sa gzhi la gnas pa'i/ /lha la sogs pa'i bgegs tshogs kun nyon cig /gnas 'dir 'jam dpal dkyil 'khor nga 'bri yis/ /bgegs kyi rigs tshogs gang yin dbyer bar gyis/ /ci ste nga yi bka' las 'das gyur na/ /ye shes
38b1(rgyud 'grel): can gyi ral gri 'bar ba yis/ /mgo bo tshal ba brgyar ni 'gas byed cing/ /rnam par 'jig par 'gyur bar gdon mi za/ /de ngas phyogs nam mkha' ltar dri med pa 'di deng rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po 'di zhes bya bas/ /sems can thams cad rdzogs pa'i byang chub la
38b2(rgyud 'grel): dgod pa'i phyir/ /'jam dpal gyi dkyil 'khor 'bri yis/ /hUM lha klu gnod sbyin dri za dang/ /'byung po sha za srin po'i tshogs/ /'byung po thams cad sar song shig /'jam dpal bka' thos myur du song/ /gang dag mi 'gro de la ni/ /ral gri dang ni kha TwAM kas/ /spyi bo tshal
38b3(rgyud 'grel): pa brgyar 'gas 'gyur/ /lan gsum du brjod do/ /bskal pa me lta bu'i 'og nas byung nas/ /gdug pa can thams cad bsregs par bsam mo/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lte bar 'dug ste/ /bskal pa'i me lta bu'i khro bo'i 'byin pas gdug pa can thams cad bskrad
38b4(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o/ /de nas dag pa yongs su bskor ba'i tshul gyis shar du 'gro bar bya'o/ /de nas g.yon brkyang pas bgegs bskrad do/ /de nas gnod sbyin gyi 'gros kyis lhor song la/ /g.yas brkyang pas bgegs bskrad do/ /de nas rdo rje 'gros kyis nub tu song la/ /
38b5(rgyud 'grel): zlum pa'i stang stabs byas la bgegs bskrad do/ /de nas byang du rdo rje 'gros kyis song la/ /der sa ga'i 'dug stangs kyis bgegs bskrad la/ /de nas 'gying 'gros kyis shar du 'gro bar bya'o/ /yang rdo rje 'gros kyis dkyil 'khor gyi lte ba bskor la phur bu'i gros
38b6(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /dbus der hUM sgra rgyun mi bcad do/ /der phyed pas 'dug la rdo rje lta bas bgegs bsnun la/ /bsreg pa bcing ba phyogs dang mtshams ra ba dra ba byas la/ /oM badzra dzwA lA na lArka hUM/ hUM badzrA na ha na ha na da ha pa tsa ma tha b+hany+dza ra na hUM/ badzra ne tri band+ha sarba big+h+naM/ oM dri Dho me
38b7(rgyud 'grel): b+ha wa/ rak+Sha sarbaM swAhA/ oM hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ oM druM? band+ha hUM/ oM badzra pA sha h+rI:/ oM badzra pA taM ke bA taM ke ni ra Ta/ /h+rI(rgyud 'grel): badzra ka li ru Ta ma Ta oM badzra sh+ri ri ru Ta ma Ta/ hUM badzra karma badzra band+ha baM/ sarba maN+Da la hUM dza/ gsang ba 'dug la/ ma hA tsa kra maN+Da sya
39a1(rgyud 'grel): ti si ta hUM gis byin gyis brlabs la/ de nas seng ldeng la byas pa'i phur bu la/ tsan dan dmar pos byugs la/ srad bu dmar po dang me tog dmar pos bcings la stod khro bo la smad rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i dbyibs su 'dug la hUM las sprin sgral sogs
39a2(rgyud 'grel): pa bskyed la/ oM badzra kI li kI lA ya sarba big+h+nAM band+ha hUM phaT/ zhes brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pas/ g.yon pa khu tshur gyis bzung ste/ g.yas pa rdo rje thobs dbus dang gru bzhir brdung ngo/ /d+ha ma d+ha ma/ da ma da ma sa na tsu d+ha ya tsaM tsur+Na ya badzro t+maka ra hUM phaT/ rdo rje tho ba lan
39a3(rgyud 'grel): brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la brdung bar bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje'i go cha bskon/ /rdo rje'i rtse mo bzlas pa'i spos chus phyugs la gur gum dang/ a ka ru dang/ du ru ka dang tsan dan dang ga bur dang gla rtsi la sogs pa'i dri rnams kyis sngags gdab pa'i lha'i grangs par mnyam pa'i dri'i thig
39a4(rgyud 'grel): le zlum po byas la der me tog gi tshum bu la sngags bzlas te dam tshig sems dpa' bskyed la/ nam mkha' i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dgug pa dang gzhug pa la sogs pa byas la mchod pa'i bye brag sna tshogs pas mchod la/ bstod pa byas gsol ba gdab
39a5(rgyud 'grel): ste/ hUM bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal rdo rje ni/ /rigs sngags rgyal po snying rje yi/ /yid kyis dkyil 'khor bri bar 'dod/ /de nas byin brlabs mdzad par gsol dgongs shig sangs rgyas sde dang tshogs/ /gang gzhan sngags kyi lha tshogs dang/ /lha rnams
39a6(rgyud 'grel): bstan la mngon dga' ba/ /dkyil 'khor byin brlabs dngos grub stsol/ /ces lan gsum du'o/ /de nas dbul lam gser gyi bum pa la kha dog dkar por sgyur la lha'i grangs dang mnyam pa 'am/ yang na rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa 'am las thams cad
39a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bum pa ste/ las kyi bum pa la sogs rdo rje bri'o/ /rnam par rgyal ba'i bum la lha'i kun gyi mtshan ma dang/ gtso bo mtshan ma bri'o/ /gtso bo'i bum par sman lnga dang 'bru lngas bkang la mgul chings nyi rim du bya'o/ /me tog gi phreng ba dang gdugs
39b1(rgyud 'grel): dkar por nges g.yogs pa bya'o/ /yang na bum pa bcu dgod zer te 'thad do/ /gtso bo'i bum par gong gi gsum las lha tshangs par bskyed la/ /dgug gzhug dang mchod bstod dang bzlas pa bya'o/ /las kyi bum pa rdo rje gnod sbyin du bskyed pa dang gzhug pa dang/ mchod bstod dang
39b2(rgyud 'grel): bzlas pa bya'o/ /rnam rgyal bum pa ni zhu bar bya'o/ /las bum ni mi bzhu'o/ /yang na kun mi bzhu zer te/ de nas bum pa rnams gtsang sar sba'o/ /bum pa lhag par gnas pa'o/ /de nas bar chad thams cad zhi ba dang/ /dngos grub thams cad bsgrub pa'i phyir/
39b3(rgyud 'grel): gzhung bzhin du sbyin sreg bya/ /de nas phyi rol tu gtor ma btang ste/ /lha la mchod pa slob ma sta gon du gzhug pa bya ste/ shar ngos su maN+Dal byas pa'i rtsar 'dug ste/ bla ma la gsol ba gdab ste/ ston pa khyod la bdag dga' o/ /byang chub sems dpa' i tshul
39b4(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa/ /mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo/ /de nyid dam tshig rig pa dang/ /byang chub sems kyang bdag la stsol/ /thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu/ /mgon po bdag ni 'jug par mdzod/ /de nas bla ma yis/ /rtog pa rnams ni legs par bsdus pa
39b5(rgyud 'grel): yis/ /shin tu bsam pa bzang por ldan par nyon/ /rjed pas blo la 'jam pa'i dbyangs sogs rnams/ /bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi byin mi rlob/ /bag med bdag gis mi dge bgyis pa dang/ bgyid stsal rjes su yi rang gang yin pa/ /de dag thams cad byang chub
39b6(rgyud 'grel): mchog gi ni/ /spyan sngar ma lus de lha so sor bshags/ /bde gshegs sras kyis tshogs gnyis zab pa dang/ /rgya che 'gro ba ma lus pa yi don/ /sgrub par byed pa de las gzhan pa la/ /rtag tu bdag ni rjes su yi rang ngo/ /thugs rjes khyab pa'i thugs dang ldan
39b7(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa/ /blo gros sdig bral gti mug tshogs kun bcom/ /ma lus pad+ma'i rigs kyi nang zhugs pa/ /bde bar gshegs pa rnams la skyabs su mchi/ /blo mchog rnams kyi kun dga' i ra ba ste/ /dman pas 'jigs pa rnams kyi skyabs byed 'tshal/ /srid pa'i sbyor ba
40a1(rgyud 'grel): zil gyis gnon pa'i mchog /gsung mchog chos la bdag ni skyabs su mchi/ /'dod chags la sogs sbrul gyi dug bcom zhing/ /blo gros rnam rgyal thugs rjer ldan pa yi/ /brtul zhugs bzang po'i tshogs la skyabs su mchi/ /srid dang bral ba
40a2(rgyud 'grel): rnams la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /rgyu yi rjes la bdag po'i lus bdag nyid/ /'bras bu'i stobs kyis dgra las rgyal 'gyur ba/ snying rje'i rtsa ba zug cing yang dag rtogs/ /mnyam med byang chub bdag gis gzung bar gyis/ /de nas slob ma'i gnas gsum du
40a3(rgyud 'grel): dri'i thig le byas la/ /rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang pad+ma dang/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM gis bskyed de bzhag go /de nas spos dang me tog la sogs pa re re byin la da nas brtsams te/ bde ba thams cad nye bar gnas par bgyis shig ces brjod do/ /de nas so shing me tog gi phreng
40a4(rgyud 'grel): bas bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags zlas te byin la/ slob ma rang gi so drud maN+Dal gyi steng du bor te/ ltas lta ba so shing mdun drang por bor la/ /de tshe bdag la lta ba dang/ /rtse mo gyen du 'dren gyur na/ /de tshe dngos grub mchog thob 'gyur/ /de tshe shar
40a5(rgyud 'grel): du kha bltas na/ /de tshe dngos grub 'bring du 'gyur/ /mtshams dang byang du kha bltas na/ /'jig rten pa'i dngos grub thob/ /so shing bor ba brgya zhig la/ /thur du bltas na sa 'og go /de nas ku sha sar pa la rdo rje rnon po bzlas te/ /stan dar rngas su sbyin no/ /
40a6(rgyud 'grel): de srung skud la sngags kyi phreng ba de'i dpung pa g.yon par gdags so/ /de stan pa'i phyir yang rje btsun gyi yi ge brgya pa yang brjod do/ /de nas zab pa dang rgya che ba'i chos kyi gzengs bstod la bzhin bzangs rnams longs shig dang/ /dkyil 'khor chen po
40a7(rgyud 'grel): mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /nang par ji lta ba'i rmi lam bzlos shig brjod la gtang ngo/ /de nas nang par rmi lam dri bar bya'o/ /de nas 'dzem pa med par bzlas te/ /rmi lam sangs rgyas mthong ba dang/ /yon tan rgya mtsho mngon sum bzhin/ /mchod rten dang ni sku
40b1(rgyud 'grel): gzugs mthong/ /de la mchod pa rtsom pa dang/ /dge slong dag dang chos nyan rnams/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rmi lam brtags la/ /ngan par gyur na sbyin sreg bya/ /de nas dkyil 'khor yang dag mchod pa bzlas pa dang/ bsgom pa la sogs par ci nus par mchod bstod la sogs
40b2(rgyud 'grel): pa byas la/ de nas sngags dang phyag rgyas dkyil 'khor steng du bteg la/ de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams dang/ shel lta bu'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i nang du zhugs par kha sbyar byas la bzhag go /de nas slob ma'i gtso bo dang lhan cig tu bsam gtan la mnyam par nyal bar
40b3(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /de nas bdag nyid skya reng shar pa'i dus su lha'i sbyor ba byas la/ nyi ma 'char kar bdag nyid rgyan thams cad dang ldan par byas nas/ /dkyil 'khor dris nye bar byugs te/ tshon sna lnga'i skud pa so sor bkal la/ /rims pas bzhag ste/ oM hUM traM h+ri(rgyud 'grel): a rang
40b4(rgyud 'grel): gi sa bon rnams la mi bskyod pa la sogs pa/ rang gi phyogs na bzhugs pa rnams kyi gnas su gtang la/ 'bar ba'i lcags kyus drangs te/ lag pa g.yas pa'i srad bu bkal/ /a na la sogs pa'i sngags kyis bsgrims la/ tsan dan la sogs pa bsgos pa'i/ /
40b5(rgyud 'grel): snod du bzhag la mchod de/ /bzlas pa byas la de nas rang nyid rnam par snang mdzad du gyur pa'i snying kha nas/ grogs po rdo rje 'dzin pa dza dza zhes ba phyung la/ ma dang Tal sogs nyi ma dang zla ba ser po'i sna la bskyed la dza zhes pas sgrub pa'i grogs kyi lag tu gar
40b6(rgyud 'grel): la/ g.yon khu tshur gyi srad bu gzung la ci bder gdab par bya ste/ de yang tshangs dang logs dang zur logs thig rnams la/ de bzhin phyi dang nang gi cha chen po nyi shu brgyad du nam mkha' la gdab par bya'o/ /oM badzra sa ma ya sU tra ma ti kra ma hUM zhes pa
40b7(rgyud 'grel): gyen du btab pa'i sgras de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bskul/ yang na cha chen po bcu drug tu bya/ de nas kha dog gcig pa'i skud pa las thams cad pa'i skud par byin gyis brlab la/ sa thig gdab ste/ kha cig na re rdo rje dbyings bzhin du thig gdab bo zhes zer/
41a1(rgyud 'grel): kha cig na re cha chen po brgyad du thig gdab bo zhes zer/ /'dir ni nges pa kho nar cha chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad du gdab bo zhes phyi nang du phyi ste/ 'khor lo rim pa gsum gyis gdab bo/ /phyi dang nang du bcas pa'i sgo/ /phyi 'jig rten pa'i sgo skyang ba bya'o/ /
41a2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje ra ba dang me ri la sogs pa'i thig gdab bo/ /de nas dkyil 'khor na gnas pa'i phur bu hUM bzhis ston la/ tshon sna lngas bkang la thig bzhin du byin gyis brlabs te/ oM sa ma ya? tsi tra hUM zhes ba 'dis sba bar bya'o/ /des byang shar mtshams su tshan sna
41a3(rgyud 'grel): rnams 'dzum pa lag pa g.yon pas drangs te/ chos kyi dbyings de dag pas ni sems can khams kyi rang grol byas/ /rgyas pas 'jam dbyangs rdo rje nyid/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas zhes brjod la phur bus gdab/ /de nas dbus nas
41a4(rgyud 'grel): rim pas bris te/ de'i rim pa 'di yin te/ sngon po ser po dmar po dang/ /ljang gu dkar po rim pas dgye /de yang shar du sngo la lho ru ser/ /nub tu dmar po byang ni ljang/ /dkar po dbus su shes par bya/ /gsungs pas na de na de ltar
41a5(rgyud 'grel): bri'o/ /de ltar bris la mtshan ma dgong pa ni/ /sku 'am gsung ngam thugs su dgong pa ste/ /dbus su dpal rnam par snang mdzad do/ /'khor lo phyogs bzhir bde bar gshegs pa rigs bzhi'o/ /mtshams su yum bzhi'o/ /de'i phyi rol tu 'khor
41a6(rgyud 'grel): lo rtsibs bcu drug pa gru bzhi sgo dang bcas pa'o/ /rtsibs bcu drug la byang chub sems dpa' bcu drug go /grwa la lha mo brgyad do/ /sgo la sgo ba bzhi'o/ /de'i phyi rol tu 'jig rten pa'i yon tan brjod pa las dgod par bya'o/ /de nas dgongs ka'i
41a7(rgyud 'grel): dus su bab pa dang/ /yo byad dang dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan rnams bgram pa bya ste/ mchod pa lnga dang rgyan thams cad dang de bzhin du phur bu mda' dang/ tshan skud kyi dra ba dang/ ral gri la sogs pa dang me long la sogs pas dkyil 'khor brgyan
41b1(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i glegs bam bzhi yang phyogs bzhir bzhag go /phyogs mtshams su spos snod brgyad la sogs pas bdug par bya'o/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan cha zin nas/ /de nas rje btsun gyi yi ge brgya pa bzlas shing/ dkyil 'khor
41b2(rgyud 'grel): de dbang ldan nas brtsams te bsang gtor bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir/ rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya dang/ sngags bzlas so/ /de nas bdag nyid rgyan gyis brgyan pa khyams su 'dug ste/ /dang por bdag med pa nas sgrub pa'i thabs las
41b3(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ba bzhin du/ gtso bo'i sku bskyed cing ye shes sems dpa' dang gnyis su med par byas la rgyas bdab ste/ dbang bskur la dkyil 'khor de sngags dang phyag rgyas blang ba la/ sku dang yig 'bru phyag mtshan gang yin pa'i cho ga gsum gyi bskyed la/ kha sbyar gyi sbyor
41b4(rgyud 'grel): ba bsams la phab ste gnyis su med par bya'o/ /de nas bdag nyid dkyil 'khor lan gsum du bskor zhing lhag pa dang ma tshang ba zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ rje btsun gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa dang/ sngags kyi phreng ba brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la me tog dbul lo/
41b5(rgyud 'grel): de nas rdo rje 'jigs byed du byas la dbus su 'dug nas sgo dbye'o/ /yang na bar 'dir lha'i rnal 'byor byas la/ bum pa dang yo byad rnams nang du gzhug go /bum pa rnams la bzlas pa byas la gnas su bzhag go /de nas mchod pa byas la bdag nyid dbang dang dam
41b6(rgyud 'grel): tshig can du bya ba'i phyir rje btsun gyi mchod pa byas pas dbang dang dam tshig dang ldan par bsam mo/ /da nas mchod pa la sogs pa byin gyis brlabs la/ de nas sgo phye la sangs rgyas rnams spyan drangs la/ nam mkha' la byon pa la bgegs bskrad pa la sogs pa byas
41b7(rgyud 'grel): la dgug gzhug bya ste/ rgyas gdab pa dang dbang bskur ba dang mchod yon la sogs pa phul la/ mchod pa lnga dang nyi shu la sogs pas mchod la/ rje btsun gyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod do/ /rje btsun gyi sngags kyi phreng ba brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la
42a1(rgyud 'grel): gsol ba btab la de nas 'byung po dang chos skyong rnams la gzhung nas 'byung ba bzhin du gtor ma byin la/ de nas dkyil 'khor gyi 'gram du sbyin sreg rgyas par bya'o/ /dus 'di ru phyag rgya dang glu la sogs pa bya'o/ /de nas lha la phyag
42a2(rgyud 'grel): byas? la/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba yi/ /rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub che/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /slob ma rnams ni 'jug par bgyi/ /de nas gang zag gi rim pas zhu phul la brlab bo/ /ba'i bzhi lnga dang ldan pa'i slob ma gang yang rung ba'i rgyan dang
42a3(rgyud 'grel): ldan par byas te/ yol ba'i phyi rol tu bla ma la gsol ba gdab pa'o/ /dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas/ /slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol/ /byang chub sems dpa' i tshul bstan pa/ /mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo/ /dam tshig de nyid gsal du
42a4(rgyud 'grel): gsol/ /sdom pa rnams kyang bdag la stsol/ /de nas slob ma la/ /rdo rje bsrung ba bzlas pa yi/ /stod g.yogs smad g.yogs bskon byas la/ /sgo srungs kyi sngags bzlas la g.yogs te/ /me tog thogs te phyag bzhi 'tshal/ /bshags pa
42a5(rgyud 'grel): rjes su yi rang dang/ /bskul ba dang ni gsol ba bya/ /slob dpon 'dod na 'di skad brjod/ /gtso bo bdag la sdom pa stsol/ /thub pa nyi ma ma lus pa/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi bdag la gsol/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba yi/ /slob dpon dbang du gnas
42a6(rgyud 'grel): pa la/ /sangs rgyas rol mo las byung ba/ /mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo 'byor/ /thar pa'i rang bzhin grong khyer che/ /gsang ba chen por 'jug par bgyi/ /gsang ba thams cad bsdus par ni/ /slob dpon chen po bdag 'jug 'gyur/ /mi ldag pa'i dbang
42a7(rgyud 'grel): bskur ba/ /skal pa chen po bdag la stsol/ /mtshan rnams kun gyi rgyas gdab cing/ /dpe byad rnams dang yang dag ldan/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi yid 'ong ma/ /slob dpon chen po bdag la gsol/ /dbang chen po ni rmad byung ba/ /sems can kun gyi don
42b1(rgyud 'grel): gyi phyir/ /bdag ni rtag tu slob dpon 'gyur/ /slob dpon chen po bdag la gsol/ /de nas bla mas lha rnams la/ /che ge mo zhes bya ba 'di nyid ni/ /byang chub chen po 'di nyid ni/ /dam tshig mchog dang gsang ba yi/ /dkyil 'khor 'di ni 'jug par 'tshal//
42b2(rgyud 'grel): yang ni bla mas 'di skad brjod/ /gsang ba chen po'i rigs pa yi/ /gsang ba yongs su 'dzin pa ni/ /bdag nyid chen po khyod 'dod dam/ /de yang 'tshal zhes brjod par bya/ /de nas bla mas 'di skad brjod/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /dkon mchog gsum
42b3(rgyud 'grel): la skyabs su song/ /'di ni sangs rgyas rigs dag la/ /dam tshig brtan par gyur pa'o/ /rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya yang/ /blo chen khyod kyis gzung bar gyis/ /byang chub sems gang rdo rje che/ /shes rab dril bu zhes bshad do/ /slob dpon bdag kyang gzung ba
42b4(rgyud 'grel): bgyi/ /bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/ /'di ni rdo rje rigs dag pa'i/ /sdom pa dam tshig yin par gsungs/ /rin chen rigs mchog chen po la/ /nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du/ /zang zing mi 'jigs chos dang byams/ /sbyin pa rnam
42b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhi rtag tu sbyin/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum/ /dam chos khyod kyis gzung bar bya/ /'di ni pad+ma'i rigs dag pa'i/ /dam tshig sdom pa yin par gsungs/ /las kyi rigs mchog chen po la/ /sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni/ /yang dag  nyid du gzung par bgyi/ /mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus kyis/ /gzhan yang bcu bzhi 'di dag ni/ /phas pham par ni rab tu bshad/ /spang bzhi dor bar mi bya'o/ /rtsa ba'i ltung bar shes par bya/ /nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du/ /nyin re bzhin du zlas par bya/ /
42b6(rgyud 'grel): gal te nyams na rnal 'byor pa/ /kha na ma tho spom por 'gyur/ /khyod kyi srog chags bsad mi bya/ /ma byin par yang blang mi bya/ /'dod pa log par mi spyod cing/ /rdzun du smra bar mi bya'o/ phud khrol kun gyi rtsa ba ni/ /chad ni yang dag spang bar bya/ /sems
43a1(rgyud 'grel): can 'dul phyir ma gtogs par/ /bya ba ma yin thams cad spang/ /dam pa nye bar bsten bya zhing/ /rnal 'byor pa rnams bsnyen bkur bya/ /lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang/ /dag gi rnam pa bzhi dag dang/ /yid kyi rnam pa
43a2(rgyud 'grel): gsum dag ni/ /ci nus par ni rjes su skyongs/ /theg pa dman pa 'dod mi bya/ /'khor ba dag kyang yongs mi spang/ /rtag tu mya ngan 'das mi chags/ /lha dang lha min gsang ba la/ /khyod kyis brnyas par mi bya'o/ /phyag rgya bzhon pa mtshon cha
43a3(rgyud 'grel): dag/ mtshan ma bsgom par mi bya'o/ /'di dag dam tshig yin par bshad/ /khyod kyis rtag tu bsrung bar bya/ /des slob dpon 'dir ni bdag la gsol/ /gtso bo ji ltar bka' stsal pa/ /de dag bdag gis bgyid bar 'tshal/ /de nas sdom pa
43a4(rgyud 'grel): gzung ba brjod/ /sdom pa mi 'dod gang zag la/ /'jug pa tsam zhig mi bya'o/ /dbang bskur bar ni mi bya'o/ /bo d+hi tsit+taM tA da yA mi/ /byang chub sems ni bla med pa/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed nas su/ /de'i snying khar snying pos ni/ /rdo rje rab tu
43a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhag par bya/ /su ra te sa ma ya stwaM ho badzra sid+d+hi ya thA su khaM/ dang po'i sangs rgyas byin gyis brlab bo /mchod bas mchod de yon blangs nas/ /las kyi bum pas dbang bskur ro/ /sems mas bcings te sgo bzhir gzhug /de nas shar sgor 'dug
