43a6(rgyud 'grel): byas la/ /'dus 'di nyid du khyad? nyid ni/ /sangs rgyas rigs su chud pas na/ /nga yi rdo rje ye shes sbyin/ /sangs rgyas rigs su 'grub par gsungs/ /gang zhig 'di nyid ma mthong ba'i/ /mdun du smra bar ma byed cig /bag med smras na nyams par 'gyur
43a7(rgyud 'grel): de bas nan tan smra bar bya'o/ /snying khar rdo rje gtugs la smra'o/ /de nas rdo rje mgor bzhag la/ /'di ni khyod kyi dam tshig ste/ /'ga' la smras na klad pa 'gas/ /tsan dan gur gum la sogs pa'i/ /mna' chu byin la 'di skad brjod/ /'di ni khyod
43b1(rgyud 'grel): kyi dmyal ba'i chu/ /dam tshig 'das nas sreg par byed/ /dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub 'grub /'thung zhing rdo rje chu las 'thung/ /oM badzra ya ta hUM/ mna' bor ro/ /de nas 'di skad smras te/ /dus 'di nyid nas bu khyod kyi/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa nga yin
43b2(rgyud 'grel): gyis/ /nga yi ji ltar bka' stsal te/ /khyod kyis skyo ba med par gyis/ /gang yang nga la ma mos min/ /de bzhin mos par ma byas na/ /bdud kyis bcom nas myos par 'gro/ de bas dam tshig gnas par gyis/ /de nas yi ge brgya pa mnyam gzhag bstan byas  la/ /bdag lus gang yin snod kyi sgo phye ste/ /snying la gnas pa'i rdo rje'i dbus su blta/ /sngags kyi bdag po yi ge a gzugs dmar/ /brjod pas yang dag pas g.yo blta/ /slob ma'i lus 'di sgo nas dbye bar bya/ /zhugs nas rdo rje byams
43b3(rgyud 'grel): ma'i snying la gnas/ /ma lus kun la kun tu gang nas su/ /rkang pa g.yon pas g.yas pa mnan nas su/ /sngags pas slob ma'i rkang pa de la dbab/ /kun tu dril bu'i sgras ni yang dag dkrol/ /lag pa pad+ma 'dab ma'i phyag rgya bca' / /mi bskyod rin chen
43b4(rgyud 'grel): la sogs bde gshegs rnams/ /rang gi phyogs rtogs las byung 'di phab pas/ /legs phab gyur bar rang nyid lus la blta/ /gang zhig des kyang babs par ma gyur na/ /lag pa g.yas pas til gyi sa bon bzhag /dbus su yi ge hUM yang
43b5(rgyud 'grel): rnams bkod do/ /rdo rje 'od 'bar bar ni rnam par bsam/ /g.yon pa'i mtheb mdzub phyag brgyar bcas pa yis/ /bslang bar byas la sdig pa bsreg par bya/ /lus ni thal bar byas pa rnam dag pa/ /bsod nams lus la sngags kyis bgang/
43b6(rgyud 'grel): ye shes dbab pa nyid du bsam/ /rdzas bzhin dbab pa nyid du rab tu 'gyur/ /de nas babs par gyur pa dang/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rtags gsum 'byung/ /gar dang gar gyi las dang ni/ /glu dang glu lan yang dag bya/ /brtan par byas la 'di skad brjod
44a1(rgyud 'grel): 'di ltar bdag gi slob ma 'di/ /dkyil 'khor du ni legs btsud nas/ /lha'i rigs kyi rim pa dag /'di'i bsod nams ci 'dra bar/ /de bzhin du ni 'bab par 'gyur/ /'dis ni dngos grub gang grub dang/ /rigs ni gang gi snod  gyur dang/ /bsod nams mthu ni gang yod pa/ /dkyil 'khor 'di ni de bzhin 'gyur/ /pra tIts+tsha badzra ho:/ /phreng ba bor te bltas rnams blta/ /gal te bcom ldan dbul babs/ /dbu yi gtsug tor 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhabs la babs na sngags
44a2(rgyud 'grel): rnams 'grub/ /stod dang smad dang bar du babs/ /dngos grub rab 'bring gsum du shes/ /lha'i gzugs las ring du 'gyur/ /de la dngos grub rim par 'grub/ /mchod pa'i 'gram la tshun chang nas/ /de yi de rig de yin te/ /me tog btang ste de yi rigs
44a3(rgyud 'grel): lha gnyis kyis ni? dpag tu/ /babs na gang du nye ba yin/ /gal te dkyil 'khor las thabs na/ /lan gsum rab tu bskyor du gzhug /de la gal na re thag chad/ /de nas phreng ba blangs te 'di skad du/ /sems ni stobs chen 'di long cig /oM pra
44a4(rgyud 'grel): ta grih+na swa mi ma ma matwa ma hA ba la brjod la mgo la bcing bar bya'o/ /de nas mig gis ci mthong dri/ /dkar po mchog ni dngos grub la/ /ser po don 'byung dngos grub ste/ /dmar po thugs rje chags pa'o/ /nag po mngon spyod las su bshad/ /sna tshogs
44a5(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub thams cad do/ /gdong g.yogs bkrol te/ /rdo rje chags pas de khyod kyi/ /mig 'byed par ni brtson par mdzad/ /rdo rje mig ni? bla na med/ /he badzra pA sh+ya/ /gdong g.yogs bkrol la dkyil 'khor bstan/ /shar phyogs sgo nas lcags kyu
44a6(rgyud 'grel): ma'o/ /lho phyogs nas zhags pa ser po/ /nub phyogs nas lcags sgrog dmar skya'o/ /byang sgo nas dril bu ljang gu'o/ /shar khyams nas rim pas/ /byams pa dkar po/ /'jam dpal spos kyi glang po/ /ye shes tog /lho'i khyams la rim
44b1(rgyud 'grel): pas/ bzang skyong/ blo gros rgya mtsho/ spobs pa brtsegs pa/ bzhi sku mdog ser po/ nub kyi khyams la mthu chen 'thob/ /ngan song kun 'dren/ mya ngan kun 'joms /dra ba can gyi 'od/ /sku mdog dmar po/ /byang gi khyams la/ zla 'od gzhon nu/ 'od dpag med /
44b2(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' i mdzod/ sgrib pa kun sel/ sku mdog ljang gu'o/ /grwa la shar lhor bdug pa dkar mo/ da'i nub tu me tog ma ser mo/ /nub byang du mar me mdzad dmar skya/ /byang shar du byug pa ma ljang gu /shar gyi 'khor lo la rims pas rdo rje sems dpa' dkar po
44b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po ser ba/ chags pa dmar ba/ legs pa ljang gu'o/ /lho'i 'khor lo la rim pas rdo rje rin chen ser ba/ gzi brjid dmar ba/ rdo rje rgyal mtshan sngo ba/ rdo rje bzhad pa dkar po/ nub kyi 'khor lo rdo rje chos/ /dkar dmar rdo rje rnon po sngo ba/ /rdo rje rgyu ser ba/ /
44b4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje smra ba dmar ba'o/ /byang gi 'khor lo la rdo rje las khra bo/ /rdo rje srung gser ba/ rdo rje gnod sbyin nag po/ rdo rje khu tshur ser po/ gru chad la shar lhor sgeg mo dkar mo/ /lho nub tu phreng ba ma ser ba/ nub byang du glu ma dkar dmar/ byang shar gwa la gar ma ljang
44b5(rgyud 'grel): gu /de nas 'khor lo'i shar du mi bskyod pa sngon po/ rin chen 'byung gnas ser ba/ snang ba mdza' yas dmar ba/ /don yod grub pa ljang gu'o/ /mtshams kyi 'khor lo la rdo rje sems pa dkar ba/ rin chen ma sngo bsangs ma/ chos ma dmar mo/ las ma ljang gu'i
44b6(rgyud 'grel): dbus su rnam par snang mdzad dkar ba/ dang po sangs rgyas sku mdog sna tshogs pa'o/ /ye shes sems dpa' dkar/ /de ni dkyil 'khor bstan pa'o/ /kha cig 'dir rnam dag gsum ston te/ mi 'thad do/ /de nas dbang bskur te sgrub pa dang/ slob dpon no/ /
44b7(rgyud 'grel): de la sgrub ba ni/ de nas shar ngos zla ba'i dkyil la/ slob ma yi dam du bskyed pa la byin gyis brlabs la/ /las kyi bum pas dbang bskur la mchod pa dang/ /bkra shis brjod cing gdugs dang rgyal mtshan la sogs pas mchod la/ bum pa'i dbang skur te/ oM na 
45a1(rgyud 'grel): mo many+dzu sh+rI badzrA b+hi Shiny+tsa ces pas dbang bskur te/ rigs kyis dbu brgyan par bya'o/ /de nas dbu rgyan stong pa nyid sngon du 'gro bas yig 'bru lhar bskyed la/ de bzhin bcug la slob ma'i mgo la bskon la/ /oM ratna ku la mu ku TA b+hi Shiny+tsa zhes bas/
45a2(rgyud 'grel): dbu dar dpyangs dang bcas pas bskur ro/ /de nas rdo rje stong pa nyid las 'od dpag med du bskyed la ye shes bcug la/ de gyur ba las rdo rjer gyur te/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi rdo rje'i dbang/ /de ring khyod la bskur bar bya/ /sangs rgyas kun tu rab sgrub phyir/ rdo rje 'di ni
45a3(rgyud 'grel): khyod kyis long/ /oM badzra ti pa ti taM/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi tiSh+Tha badzra sa ma ya hUM/ de nas dril bu yang a mo ka si bskyed la/ ye shes bcug pas dril bur gyur pa de byin te/ oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NAM Adya nutpan+na twAt zhes pas sbyin no/ /de nas rdo rje dril bu spyi bor bzung
45a4(rgyud 'grel): la ming dbang rnam snang chos kyi ngo bo sbyin/ oM nA mA b+hi Shiny+tsa zhes pas byin te/ lha gang la babs ba'i ming sbyin no/ /de nas mchod pa rnams kyis mchod la/ sngags dang phyag rgya'i ye shes blang ba dang/ mchod pa dang brtul zhugs kyi dbang byin la/ slob mas thal mo
45a5(rgyud 'grel): skor te bla ma la yon 'bul ba la sogs pa bya'o/ /rig pa'i dbang bskur ba'o/ /de nas slob dpon du 'os pa'i slob mas yon phul la/ /gsol ba gdab ste/ bdag dang gzhan don byed ba yi/ /slob dpon gyi ni dbang yin pas/ /thugs rje'i bdag pos
45a6(rgyud 'grel): gsal te zhu'o/ /de nas slob ma rje btsun rnam par snang mdzad bskyed la/ dbang rtags shar ngos su gru bzhi pa sgo bzhi pa sgo nub tu bltas la tshon sna lngas pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad bris la de'i steng du seng ge bla res dang dar dang gdugs/ /me tog gi phreng ba
45a7(rgyud 'grel): ba dang rgyal mtshan la sogs pa rol mo'i cha byang glu gar sogs de ltar brgyan pa'i slob ma rnams la rnam rgyal bum pa nas bzung ste/ sgo'i bar du dbang bskur ro/ /'jam dbyangs sku gzugs nas bzung ste/ oM many+dzu sh+rI ma ta su kha badzra satwa dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho:
45b1(rgyud 'grel): su ra ta sa ma ya stwa/ zhes pas slob dpon chen por gyur bkra shis brjod de/ shes rab yan lag 'dus pa'i ral gri las byung ba/ /byang chub sems kyi 'jam dbyangs byang chub de dbang bskur/ /'jam dbyangs lha tshogs rnams kyis legs gsungs gang yin pa/ /des ni
45b2(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur mchog la dus kun bkra shis shog /'grub na lha kun la sbyar ro/ /byang sems rdo rje la sogs dkyil 'khor la 'jug cing/ /srid pa'i snying po rnam grol sgeg mo la sogs pa/ /bde byed rab mchog legs par glu blangs pa bkra shis gang/ /de ring khyod
45b3(rgyud 'grel): kyi dbang mchog 'di la bkra shis shog /shin tu zhi ba'i mdzad ba phul byung ma lus pas/ /sems can bde gshegs rtogs 'dzin dbang bskur ba/ /dpag med lha yi tshogs kyi legs gsungs bkra shis gang/ /des ni khyod kyi dbang bskur mchog la bkra shis
45b4(rgyud 'grel): shog/ dpal ldan khams gsum rnam rgyal dkyil 'khor rab mchog la/ /'jig rten gsum gyi rgyal mchog dbang bskur ba/ /lha yi tshogs kyis btud de dbang bskur gang/ /des ni khyed kyi dbang bskur mchog la bkra shis shog /'gro ba sna tshogs 'dul
45b5(rgyud 'grel): phyir phyag na pad+ma bsnams/ /rdzogs pa'i rin chen cod pan bdud rtsi'i chus dbang bskur/ /pad+ma'i 'dod chags so legs gsungs bkra shis gang/ /des ni khyed kyi dbang bskur mchog la bkra shis shog /nam mkha' i snying po nor bu rin chen 'byor bas nyams dga' ba'i
45b6(rgyud 'grel): don rnams kun 'grub bde byin dbang bskur chen po la/ /dge ba phun sum tshogs mdzad legs gsungs bkra shis gang/ /des ni khyed kyi dbang bskur mchog la bkra shis shog /de nas dbu rgyan dang rdo rje dang dril bu dang rdo rje dbang bskur byin la/ me tog la sogs
45b7(rgyud 'grel): pas mchod/ de nas dam tshig la sogs pa'i dbang byin te/ rdo rje byin la de kho na nyid bstan te/ thog mdza' med pa'i sems dpa' ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che/ /kun tu bzang po thams cad bdag /rdo rje snyems tshul bdag po'i bdag/ ho las dril bur bskyed
46a1(rgyud 'grel): la/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes la gror 'dod/ /rtag pa khyed kyis gzung pa yin/ /rgyal pa'i byang chub mchog rab kyi/ /srid pa'i ngo bo gyis bdag mdzod/ /phyag rgya chen pos de bzhag la/ /srid pa'i
46a2(rgyud 'grel): bde ba shin tu chung/ /sdug bsngal chen po dag bya'i phyir/ /shin tu bde ba dam pa'i thabs/ /de bas dam tshig srung bar gyis/ /'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad ni/ /ci 'dod par ni bsten bya bzhin/ /rang gi lha'i sbyor ba yis/ /bdag dang gzhan la mchod par bya/ /
46a3(rgyud 'grel): sku'i dam tshig go /de nas mchod pa rnams kyis mchod la/ /gsang ba'i dbang bskur te/ dkyil 'khor dang lha rnams dang slob dpon la brlabs te dkyil 'khor ni mi nyams med par zur bzhi ste/ /dran dang dbang po'i sgo bzhi dang/ /bsam gtan rnams ni rta babs
46a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhi/ /ting 'dzin kha khyer shes par bya/ /kha khyer la brten rdo rje'i mchog /gzugs rnams lha mos mchod pa yin/ /rgyan rnams kun gyi bkram pa yang/ /bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed pa'i/ /gdul bya bskyod pa sna tshogs mchog /dar 'phan dril bu sgrogs
46a5(rgyud 'grel): pa yin/ /me long ye shes rtag med rtog /byang chub yan lag me tog phreng/ /dra ba dra phyed rin chen mchog /nyi ma zla bar yang dag bshad/ /kun grub mi zad bde pa ste/ /bde ba chen po zhes grags so/ /de yi nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi/ /ka ba dkyil 'khor dra pa
46a6(rgyud 'grel): pa yin/ /dngos grub bde ba kun ster ba/ /rnam thar brgyad po de nyid yin/ /theg pa chen po'i byang chub sems /'di de'i 'khor lo bskor bas ni/ /rdo rje'i thig gis yongs bskor zhing/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bas na/ /'khor lo rnams dang ldan pa yin/ /gang
46a7(rgyud 'grel): du 'jug pa tsam gyis ni/ /mi mtshungs pa dang mi ldog pa/ /bde ba chen po rab sgrub phyir/ /de dag dang por yang dag 'gyur/ /de nas lha'i rnam par dag pa ni/ /rang rig pa'i sgyu ma gnyis su med ba'i ye shes de nyid lha lnga bcu rtsa gsum yin te/ de yang gzugs dang
46b1(rgyud 'grel): gti mug dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes spyi'i cha nas 'jam dpal rnam par snang mdzad do/ /'di la sku gsum du brtsi'o/ /rnam par shes pa'i phung po dang/ zhe sdang rnam par dag pa'i me long lta bu'i ye shes ni mi bskyod pa'o/ /tshor ba'i phung po dang ser sna ngag pas
46b2(rgyud 'grel): mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes ni rin chen 'byung ldan no/ /nga rgyal gyi sgrib pa 'du byed kyi phung po dang 'dod chags dag pa ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes ni snang ba mdza' yas so/ /sgrib pa dang 'du byed phung po dang/ khro ba dag pa bya ba nan tan don yod grub pa'o/ /dngos por 'dzin
46b3(rgyud 'grel): pa la sogs bzhi bkag pa'i rnam thar bzhi'o/ /mi bskyod pa'i me long lta bu'i ye shes des dgag bya nang dang phyin pa/ phyi dang nang snod bcud du zhen pa bkag pa'i rig pa'i cha me long lta bu'i me long/ me long lta bu'i mnyam pa nyid/ me long lta bu'i aso sor rtog pa/
46b4(rgyud 'grel): me long lta bu'i bya ba nan tan no/ /shar gyi 'khor lo ser po bzhi'o/ /de bzhin stong pa'i cha bzhi byang chub sems dpa' bzhi'o/ /des 'gre'o/ /dgag bya dgag pa'i rim pa'o/ /ye shes phye ba'i sems dpa' la/ /stong pa'i cha nas byang chub sems dpa' o/ /ser
46b5(rgyud 'grel): sna dag pa sbyin pa ste sgeg mo'o/ /tshul khrims 'chal pa spangs te phreng ba ma/ /khro ba spangs pa glu mkhan ma/ /phrag dog spangs pa gar mkhan ma/ /brnab sems spangs pa me tog ma/ /shes rab 'chal ba spangs pa bdug spos ma/ /log pa'i smon lam spangs
46b6(rgyud 'grel): pa mar me ma/ /shes bya'i sgrib pa dang phung po'i bdud spangs ba dang pa'i stobs lcags kyu ma/ /'dod pa'i sgrib pa dang/ nyon mongs pa'i bdud bcom pa brtson 'grus kyi stobs sgo ba zhags pa ma/ las kyi sgrib pa dang 'chi bdag gi bdud bcom pa'i dran pa'i stobs
46b7(rgyud 'grel): sgo ba lcags sgrog ma/ skye ba'i sgrib ba dang lha'i bu'i bdud spangs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs sgo ba dril bu ma/ lnga'i rnam par dag pa'o/ /de nas slob dpon gyi rnam dag ba rnams kyang ji ltar bslab pa'o/ /gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'o/ /mchod pa gser thur thogs la
47a1(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar mig mkhan mkhas pa yis/ /'jig rten ling thog gsal ba ltar/ /bu khyod kyis ni mi shes pa'i/ /rab rib rgyal ba rnams kyis gsal/ /oM badzra nai tA pa ha ra pa tra laM h+rI:/ me long blangs la/ chos kyi dbyings nyid bstan te/
47a2(rgyud 'grel): chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ /dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med/ /gzung du med cing brjod du med/ /rgyu dang las las kun tu byung/ /ngo bo nyid med gnas med par/ /de ltar chos 'di shes nas su/ /sems can don ni mnyam med myos/ /'on kyang
47a3(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas sras su skye/ /de nas dril bu dkrol te/ chos rnams nam mkha' i mtshan nyid de/ /nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med/ /nam mkha' dang mnyam sbyor ba yis/ /kun mchog mnyam pa nyid du gsal/ /a zhes pa dril bu'i snying po sbyin no/ /de nas
47a4(rgyud 'grel): ta thA mnyes par gyis zhes pas ho zhes pas gzhu byin la/ phyogs bzhi steng 'og tu 'phen du gzhug go /yang me long bstan la/ /rdo rje sems dpa' me long bzhin/ /dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med/ /sangs rgyas kun bdag rang bzhin gyis/ /bu khyod kyi ni snying
47a5(rgyud 'grel): la gnas/ /me long 'dzin pa oM many+dzu sh+rI a/ rkang pa'i bar du 'khor lo bzhag la/ /lag par dung byin la/ /de ring thams cad 'jig rten la/ /skyob pa rnams kyi 'khor lo bsgom/ /chos kyi dung ni bla med pa/ /kun tu ma lus gang bar gyis /
47a6(rgyud 'grel): som nyi yid gnyis mi bya zhing/ /dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis su/ /gsang sngags spyad pa'i tshul gyi mchog /'jig rten 'di la rab tu sgrogs/ /de ltar byas nas sangs rgyas la/ /phan 'dogs drin du gzo bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa de kun yang/ /
47a7(rgyud 'grel): khyod la rtag tu srung par byed/ /'khor lo dang po 'di byin yang/ /'jig rten kun la khyad par du/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /ji ltar sna tshogs 'dul 'gyur ba/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /de bzhin du rdo rje dang khro bo dang/ pad+ma dang nor bu'i 'khor lo
47b1(rgyud 'grel): skor ces rjes su gnang ba byin no/ /de nas gzengs bstod la lung bstan te /oM nga ni khyod la lung bstan yin/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /srid pa kun tu rab sgrub phyir/ /srid pa ngan 'gro rnams la ston/ /rdo rje che ge mo b+hurb+hu swa/ zhes pas gzengs
47b2(rgyud 'grel): stod de/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur bcings la/ //g.yon pas chos gos 'dzin pa ltar byas la brjod do/ /ngan song phyir mi ldog ces bya'o/ /de nas gsang ba'i ye shes bslab ste/ /'dod chags bral ba lta bu'i/ /khams gsum na ni sdig
47b3(rgyud 'grel): med de/ /de bas 'dod la chags bral ba/ /khyod kyi nam yang ma byed cig/ ma sa ma ya ha na phaT/ de lta'i sngags byin la/ phyag rgya bzhi yang bslab par bya'o/ /de nas khyod kyis mi mkhas pa'i gang zag la sngags dang phyag rgya ma ston cig/ de yi spyad
47b4(rgyud 'grel): na som nyi zos/ /gnyi ka ngan song nyid du lhung/ /der khas blangs la/ 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /rdo rje sems dpa' lag na 'dug/ khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang/ /lag na rdo rje brtul zhugs brtan/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta sid+d+ha badzra sa ma ya tiSh+Tha Sha
47b5(rgyud 'grel): twaM da ra ya mi badzra satwa hi hi hi hi hUM/ de nas 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gro ba/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang/ /byang chub rdo rje rgyal bas gsungs/ /dril bu sbyin no/ /rjes gnang mthar thug sbyin te/ /slob
47b6(rgyud 'grel): ma rgyan dang ldan pa/ spyi bor gdugs bzung thal sbyar nas/ /dkyil 'khor legs par bskor du gzhug /gdugs dang bcas pas bskor phyogs su /spyi bo btud de phyag 'tshal gzhug /slob ma 'di ni phul ba lags/ /sngags dang rgyud ni 'dzin par
47b7(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /mkhan pos de skad smras nas su/ /gdugs bzhag nas bu yi slob ma de/ /lag pas bzung ste 'di skad sgo/ /dkyil 'khor slob dpon nyid du 'gyur/ /sngags dang rgyud kyang 'dzin bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang/
48a1(rgyud 'grel): lha rnams kun gyis bskur bar 'gyur/ /sems can kun la snying rje'i phyir/ /khyod kyis dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhin/ /nan tan bskyed de bri bar gyis/ /sgrub pa po yang rgyud la sbyor/ /khyod kyis chos la ser sna dang/ /sems can rnams
48a2(rgyud 'grel): la phan pa'o/ /nyams pa che bar gyur kyang ni/ /bu khyod kyis kyang mi bya'o/ /de nas slob ma re re yis/ /lag pa bzung la sbyin sreg bya/ /de ltar byas la bdag bsrung ste/ /sngags pas yon blangs slob ma dag la sbyin/ /slob mas bskor ba phyag byas
48a3(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid dbul/ /bla mas mchod cing yid la gang 'thad dbul/ //dngos grub dam pa 'dod pa yis/ /de dang de kun bla ma sbyin/ /des ni bsod nams tshogs su 'gyur/ /tshogs las dngos grub chen po 'byung/ /de nas bla mas dkyil 'khor gyi lha
48a4(rgyud 'grel): rnams la gsang ba'i gsang bas mchod de/ /oM badzra satwa su saM ta haM/ badzra ratna ma nu ta raM/ badzra d+harma garti naM/ badzra karma ko sho ka rodg+ha wa/ d+hU be la sogs pas kyang mchod la/ thams cad la ci nus pas mchod ces bsgo la byed du gzhug /de nas bza' ba
48a5(rgyud 'grel): dang lhung ba rnams kyis/ bdag dang gzhan ci dga' bas mchod la longs spyad do/ /de mna' bsgegs la zhugs pa rnams la mchod pa dang/ bstod pa dang gsol ba gdab pa dang/ bzod pa gsol la nyi ma 'char kar rdo rje sems dpa' i phyag rgya gyen du
48a6(rgyud 'grel): bkrol te/ oM khyod kyis sems can don kun mdzad/ /rjes su mthun par dngos grub stsol/ /sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang/ /slar yang 'byon par mdzad du gsol/ /mi bskyod pa la sogs pa sprul pa rnam pa rang la dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): bsdus la
48a7(rgyud 'grel): de nas snying kha nas byung ba'i rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya rang la dbang bskur ba mdzub mo gnyis kyis phreng ba bcing ba la go cha bcing bar bya te/ oM badzra ratnA b+hi Shiny+tsa sarba mu tra me ti ku ru ba ra ka ra ba tse na baM/ go cha'i mthar phreng ba bcings la bkrol/ /thal mo
48b1(rgyud 'grel): sbyar te mnyam pa'i thal mo dang/ oM badzra tu sh+ya ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa dang/ yi ge brgya pa brjod la de dga' bas legs pa sbyin no/ /de nas oM badzra kI li kI lA ya sarba big+h+nAM badzra pha rA Na hUM hUM hUM hUM phaT zhes phur bu bton la 'o mas bkru'o/ /oM a kA ro mu/ baM sarba d+harmA NAM Adya nutpan+na
48b2(rgyud 'grel): twAt/ zhes pas tshon rtsi rnams bsdus la/ gang dang sil snyan ldan byas la/ chu klung chen po rgya mtshor bya/ /sdig pas mi gos ya ga med/ /dkyil 'khor ba yi lci bas byug /bza' ba dang ni bca' ba rnams/ /ci dga' par ni spyad par bya/ /khyi dang bya rog la sogs
48b3(rgyud 'grel): la/ /cung zad tsam yang mi sbyin no/ /yo byad rdzas rnams thams cad ni/ /slob dpon nyid kyis bsgrubs nas su/ /bdag rang nyid kyis spyad par bya/ /slob ma rnams la bgo mi bya/ /rgyud rnams kun las de skad gsungs/ /slob mas spyad na dam tshig nyams/ /gang
48b4(rgyud 'grel): zhig spyad par mi 'dod na/ /de yi cho ga'i go rims ni/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi yo byad du/ /cho ga bzhin du dbul bar bya/ /gdugs dang rnga yab sil snyan sogs/ /sangs rgyas rnams la dbul bar bya/ /gdan dang gdub sbos la sogs pa/ /dam pa'i
48b5(rgyud 'grel): chos la dbul bar bya/ /gos dang yo byad sgo la sogs/ /dge 'dun rnams la dbul bar bya/ /de dag la ni slob ma yis/ /cung zad tsam yang mi bskye'o/ /gal te bdag nyid mi 'dod na/ /dge slong dge bsnyen rnams la sbyin/ de nas de yi phyir de nyid/ /
48b6(rgyud 'grel): nyes byas lhag chad zhi bya'i phyir/ /byams pa chen po bsgom par bya/ /slob mas ma dag zhi bya'i phyir/ /spyan la sogs pa'i sbyin sreg bya/ /sems can kun la phan bya'i phyir/ /byams pa chen po bsgom par bya/ /dad pa med dang dman la 'jug pa dang
48b7(rgyud 'grel): 'dod la chags dang 'khor ba'i dbang phyug dang/ /g.yo rgyu can dang ser sna 'jur bgegs can/ /rtse gnyis blo zhan rtog pa can/ /rang gi bu nyid yin yang de la ni/ /sgrub ba'i cho ga 'di ni sbyin mi bya/ /mtshan ni yang dag brjod pa rgya mtsho lta bu'i don/ /bdag 'dra'i blo
49a1(rgyud 'grel): yis dpag par mi nus kyang/ /bla ma'i man ngag rim pa'i srub shing gis/ /cho ga'i rim pa bdud rtsi 'di rtsams pa/ /'di la dge ba ci thob des/ /'khor ba'i 'dam du bying ba yi/ /sems can rnams dang 'dir bzhugs pa/ /sku gsum
49a2(rgyud 'grel): sku lnga lhun grub shog /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga/ /paN+Di ta shAn+ta garb+has mdzad pa rdzogs so// ///lo ts+tsha ba smri ti dz+nyA na kIrtis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //
49a3(rgyud 'grel): */ (/'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgrub rabs gsang ba'i sgron ma slob dpon chen po pradz+nyA gu ru sa mdzed? pa bzhugs so/ /rgya gar skad du/ Arya many+dzu sh+rI nA ma saM gI ti gu hya sA d+ha pra dI pa nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod ba'i
49a4(rgyud 'grel): sgrub thabs gsang ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal dang po'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de la dang por bsnyen pa ni/ gnas dben par 'dug ste/ rnal 'byor pas khrus dang bsrung pa dang/ gos brje ba dang/ byug pas byugs te
49a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas dang stan bsangs te 'dug nas/ rang rdo rje 'chang du mos pa'i snying khar nyi ma/ de'i steng du hUM las rdo rje/ de'i lte pa la hUM las 'od 'phros pas gnas bsrungs te/ mchod pa byin gyis brlabs la/ rdo rje 'khor los zhing sprul nas/ bdag dang 'brel
49a6(rgyud 'grel): par bya la/ /tshogs bsag par bya'o/ /tshogs bsag pa ni/ phyag 'tshal zhing bdag spro ba bskyed pa dang/ mchod pa dang sdig pa bshags pa dang/ bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul ba dang/ /
49a7(rgyud 'grel): mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol pa dang/ bdag dbul ba dang/ dngos grub blang ba dang/ 'dud kyis bstod pa dang/ bsngo ba'o/ /lha rnams kyis drin lan gyi tshul du tshur bstod pa'o// de dag ni dang po sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// //de nas sdom
49b1(rgyud 'grel): pa bzung/ / de nas 'khor lo bdag la bsdu/ /stong par bsgom la ye shes kyi lus su ldang/ /de nas mngon par byang chub ba lnga bsgom mo/ /de dag ni yongs su dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas gzhal yas khang gdan dang bcas pa bsgom mo/ /de dag ni gzhi'i
49b2(rgyud 'grel): ting nge 'dzin to// //de nas khang bu'i dbus su seng ge dang pad+ma'i steng du/ a las rdo rje 'chang du bskyed de/ sku mdog dkar po zhal bzhi pa/ byang chub mchog gi phyag rgyas rdo rje lnga ba bsnams pa'o/ /de'i thugs khar dang po'i sangs rgyas so/ /de dag
49b3(rgyud 'grel): ni dang po'i sangs rgyas bsgom pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas snying ka'i ye shes sems dpa' la dmigs te/ mtshan yang dag par brjod pa mtshan ma bzang po ma byung gi bar du bzlas par bya'o/ /de dag ni thun mong gi bsnyen pa'o/ /de nas tshom bu'i dkyil 'khor du/ /ro la
49b4(rgyud 'grel): bsnyen pa zhag lnga bya ste/ /kun rig gi sngags bzlas pa'i spos chus bkru/ de nas bgegs bskyad pa ni/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba la sogs pa bden pa bdar la/ /tshe 'das pa 'di la /son gyi dus su brnyas byed cing/ gshin gyi dus su
49b5(rgyud 'grel): bgegs dang log 'dren gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad skad cig kyang ma gnas par dengs shig ces byas la yungs kar brdeg cing/ sngags khro bo'i snying po/ oM yAn+ta ka hUM phaT ces bzlas so/ /de nas shes pa dgug pa ni/ gong gi bden pa brdang la tshe 'das pa ming 'di zhes
49b6(rgyud 'grel): bya ba khyod 'di nas shi ba'i dus byas nas/ ngan song gsum la sogs pa 'gro ba gang na gnas kyang rung skad cig gis 'dir khugs par gyur cig /oM sarba bidya sarba pA paM A karSha hUM dza(rgyud 'grel): a ni su tri pri du dza zhes brjod cing snying ka nas 'od zer 'phros pas kyang dgug
49b7(rgyud 'grel): par bsam mo/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): sa bstim la bzhag /de nas yang dug gzhom pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dang/ kun rig gi sngags kyis bkrus la/ ro byin gyis brlab te rang gi lha ru bsgoms nas yi ge a spyi bor bsams nas 'od 'phros pas ye shes lnga
50a1(rgyud 'grel): yis gang bar bsam mo/ /de nas a'i sgro? bsdu'o/ /de nas rang gi mig la a A zhes bya ba dgod de bzhin du rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus la yang i a'i u a'u e i o aau dgod par bya'o/ /yid la aM a(rgyud 'grel): dgod par bya'o/ /lte ba dang
50a2(rgyud 'grel): snying ka dang mgrin pa dang mtshogs mar 'khor lo bzhi bsgom par bya'o/ /de ni sngon du bya ba'i cho ga'o/ /de nas ro sta gon la gnas ba ni/ tshom bu'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su khri dar gyis bkab pa'i steng du bzhag ste/ slob dpon smyung bar gnas pas gong du bstan pa
50a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du tshogs bsag pa'i cho ga byas la de nas dbang bskur ba'i phyir tshig 'dis gsol pa gdab par bya'o/ /de nas phyag byas spos thogs la/ spyan drang tshigs 'di brjod par bya'o/ /kye dbang bskur nges de bla na med/ /phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas
50a4(rgyud 'grel): rnams/ /ma lus bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba yis/ /'di la phan gdags dang ched du/ /gnas 'dir sangs rgyas kun gshegs te/ /'di la dbang ni stsal du gsol/ /zhes brjod la/ dang po'i sbyod pa dang/ dkyil
50a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor rgyal mchog dang/ las rgyal mchog rnams bsgoms la/ /sku'i phreng ba'i sngags kyis lha rnams gsal bya'o/ /de nas ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur la dam tshig la bzhag par bya'o/ /de nas zhag lngar ro'i lhag pa'i lha'i snying po 'aM
50a6(rgyud 'grel): sku'i phreng ba'i sngags kyis bzlas pa bya'o/ /de nas tshom bu'i dkyil 'khor gyi shar du khru gang dor bar zhi ba'i thab khung byas la/ til nag po la sdig pa'i gzugs brnyan byas te/ sdig pa sbyang ba'i sbyin sreg zhag gcig bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor bri
50a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i ched du 'dud nyi shus bstod par bya'o/ /de nas gsol ba gdab byas nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas nam mkha' la/ mngon sum 'dra bar gang bar bsgom/ /de dag ni shi ba sta gon la gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de dag ni khyad bar gyi bsnyen
50b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /de dag ni sngon du bsnyen pa'o/ /de nas zhag bdun gyi nang par sbyin sreg chen po bya ste/ slob mas gsol ba gdab pa dang/ slob ma yongs su bzung ba'i cho ga byas la/ de nas dang po sa'i cho ga bya ste/ dang pos brtag pa ni sa'i phyogs brtag pa dang/ mtshan nyid
50b2(rgyud 'grel): brtag pa dang chad brtag pa'o/ /bslab ba ni snang ba dang mi snang ba'o/ /sbyang ba ni las dang bya ba dang sngags so/ /gzung ba dang sems kyi dbang gis gzung ba dang/ rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi ting nge 'dzin gyis gzung ba'o/ /byin gyis brlab pa ni rdo rje rgyu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis so/
50b3(rgyud 'grel): srung ba ni rdo rje phur ba la sogs pa'i bya'o/ /de dag ni sa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /sta gon la yang dang po lha sta gon la gnas pa ni/ /dri'i thig le byas la der dam tshig pa bskyed nas/ ye shes kyi 'khor lo spyan drangs zhing bsres la mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod do/ /
50b4(rgyud 'grel): bum pa ni grangs tshangs bar bsags la/ /rgyan dang yo byad dang ldan par byas nas/ /nang gzhal yas khang du bsgoms nas/ der dam tshig pa bskyed la/ /ye shes kyi 'khor lo spyan drangs zhing bsres nas mchod de bzlas pa byas la bzhag go/ slob ma
50b5(rgyud 'grel): lhag par gnas pa ni 'jug pa rnams la sogs pa bya'o/ /de yang dgu ste/ /tshig gis dag par bya ba dang/ gsol ba gdab pa dang/ sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa dang/ byin gyis brlab pa dang/ mchod pa dang/ so shing sbyin pa dang/ bsrung skud gdags
50b6(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ ku sha sbyin pa dang/ zab mo'i chos bshad pa'o/ /de nas lha kha sbyar la gshegs su gsol te nyal bar bya'o/ /de nas nang par rmi lam dri bar bya'o/ /de dag ni sta gon gyi ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas thig gdab par bya'o/ /thig la bcu gcig ste/ rgyu dang
50b7(rgyud 'grel): mkhal mkhan dang/ tshad dang byin gyis brlab pa dang/ dbye ba dang nges tshig dang gdab pa'i gnas dang/ 'debs pa'i ting 'dzin dang/ gdab pa'i thabs dang/ cho ga nyams pa'i nyes pa dang/ bgegs bsal bas so/ /gdab pa'i thabs ni dang po tshangs
51a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i thig /de nas logs thig /de nas zur thig /de bzhin du cha dang cha bran dang/ skor thig dang sgo thig yan chad btab la/ pho brang 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad/ de'i phyi rol du rtsibs bcu drug /de'i phyi rol du lha'i snam bu'i thig gdab bo/ /de dag
51a2(rgyud 'grel): ni thig gi ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas tshon dgye bar bya'o/ /de la bcu gnyis te/ rgyu dang 'thag pa'i mkhan po dang tshad dang byin gyis brlab pa dang/ dbye ba dang/ nges tshig dang/ dgye ba'i gnas dang/ 'gyed mkhan dang dgye ba'i thabs dang/ cho ga nyams pa'i
51a3(rgyud 'grel): nyes pa dang/ bar chad kyi bgegs bsal ba'o/ /dgye ba'i thabs ni 'khor lo kun ser po/ lte pa dkar po/ shar sngon po/ lho ser po/ nub dmar po byang ljang gu'o/ /pany+tsa ra ga ni/ nang du dkar po de'i phyi rol sngon po/ /de nas ser po de nas dmar po
51a4(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi phyi rol ljang gu'o/ /de nas phyag rgya dgod pa ni/ 'khor lo'i lte ba la rdo rje 'dzin chen po 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad la rgyal ba rigs bzhi/ yum bzhi ste brgyad bri'o/ /rtsibs bcu drug po la sems dpa' bcu drug bri'o/ /grwa la mchod pa brgyad
51a5(rgyud 'grel): bri'o/ /snam bu la bskal pa bzang po bri'o/ /sgo bzhir srung ma bzhi bri bar bya'o/ /de dag ni tshon gyi ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas sngar bsnyen pa byas pa'i ro de bsreg khang du drang ste/ phur legs par bcas pa der bcug nas shing rta la sogs pas drangs nas/
51a6(rgyud 'grel): zhar la bgegs bzlog pa dang/ dug sbyor ba'i tshigs bcad glur len cing rol mo la sogs pas drangs la/ bsreg khang la sngags mkhan dang bcas pas skor ba lan gsum byas la/ shar phyogs nas gzhug par bya'o/ /nus na gzugs brnyan gyi
51a7(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa dang dbang yang bskur bar bya'o/ /de dag byas nas dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan dang yo byad rdzogs par bkod nas/ lhag chad bskang ba la sogs pa byas nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang chen po'i ting nge 'dzin du 'jug par bya'o/ /de dag ni slob dpon gyi
51b1(rgyud 'grel): ting nge 'dzin te/ /de nas dam tshig gi 'khor lo bsgom pa ni/ kha sbyar yang bsal la gzugs brnyan dang bsres te/ cho ga yan lag gsum gyi dam tshig gi lha rnams bsgom bar byed/ /de nas ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drangs la/ mdun gyi nam mkha' la bstod
51b2(rgyud 'grel): pa bya/ de nas dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho:/ /bzhis dgug gzhug pa ring ba byas la ting nge 'dzin dang byin gyis brlab pa dang/ dbang bskur ba dang/ mchod pa phul la bstod pa bya'o/ /de nas mthong ba nang gi 'jug pa bya'o/ /de nas ni lha bsgom zhing mchod pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas
51b3(rgyud 'grel): oM dzwA la dzwA la zhes me sbar la pra brtag par ba'o/ /pra legs na me dbus su 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' bskyed la de zhu ba las/ drang srong chen po me lha zhib pa/? zhes bya ba zhi zhing dkar po dbu gcig pa phyag bzhi pa mig gsum pa/ ral pa'i thor tshugs
51b4(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pa/ phyag dang po na bai ka /gnyis pa na mchog sbyin/ g.yon dang po na phreng ba gnyis pa na gande/ gos dang rgyan dkar po mchod phyir thogs dkar pa'o/ yan lag thams cad nas rdo rje dkar po 'byung ba mngon sum dang 'dra bar bsgom mo/ /de nas/
51b5(rgyud 'grel): mthor 'thung dang bsang ba byas la/ mtshan nyid med pa'i me lha spyan drang bar bya ste/ dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis/ /tshur gshegs tshur gshegs 'byung po che/ /lha'i drang song bram ze mchog /bsreg blugs zhas zas bzhes slad du/ /'bar ba'i nang du gshegs
51b6(rgyud 'grel): su gsol/ /zhes brjod la/ rang gi snying kha nas khro bo 'dod pa'i gyal po spros la/ Tak+ki hUM mdzad(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod do/ /de nas mdun gyi nam mkha' la/ /tshangs pa 'jig rten mgon gyi sras/ /bya ba la sogs pas bstod do/ /de nas nang du dgug gzhug cing dbang du
51b7(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /de nas badzra san+ti zhes brjod do/ /de nas ting nge 'dzin dang ldan par bya/ /byin gyis brlab dbang bskur/ /de nas oM ha nas ma ya hUM phaT ces brjod la dam tshig la bzhag par bya'o/ /de nas oM badzra band+ha baM zhes brjod la las 'di mdzod cig ces bsgo'o/ /de nas mchod
52a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i yan lag gis mchod/ /de nas bstod pa bya'o/ /de nas bsreg rdzas rnams dbul te/ rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bsangs la/ /ma lha'i lce dang gzar bu'i kha la/ /lha'i sa bon bkod la/ /pus mo'i bar du lag pa bzhag nas/
52a2(rgyud 'grel): dang po mar gyi dgang blugs gsum zhal cung zad gdangs bar dbul lo/ /oM agne ye hab bya kab bya ba ha ne di bya di bya d+hi pa ye shA n+tiM ku ru swAhA zhes dbul lo/ /bgegs kyi mtshan ma yang shes par bya'o/ /yang gsang gtor byas la mar gyi dgang? blugs bdun dbu'o?
52a3(rgyud 'grel): oM sarba pa da han swAhA til bgyi'o/ /oM sarba sa pa te swAhA/ zho'i 'o/ /oM sarba spri ku ru swAhA/ utpa la'i'o/ /oM badzra pu She swAhA/ dung ba'i 'o/ /oM badzra puSh+Ta ye swAhA/ 'bras ma chag pa'i 'o/ /oM badzrA pA ti ha ta badzra ya swAhA/ ku sha'i'o/ /
52a4(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra pI dzA ya swAhA/ 'bras kyi lag pan gyi'o/ /oM badzra ma le puSh+Ta ye swAhA/ mngar gsum dang dkar gyil?/ /oM mahA bai gA ya swAhA/ nas kye'o/ /oM mahA bA ya swAhA/ sran ma sha'o/ /oM badzra grasma re swAhA/ /gro'i 'o/ /oM badzrAny+dza na swAhA /
52a5(rgyud 'grel): yams shing dang dur ba'i myu gu'o/ /oM taM ti pri ya swAhA/ byang chub kyi shing la sogs pa'o/ /oM badzra ra tA ya swAhA/ n+ya gre d+ha'i'o/ /oM badzrA twa ra swAhA/ a mra'i'o/ /lan grangs ci nus dbul lo/ /de nas bstod pa bya/ de dag ni me lha'i ting 'dzin to/ /
52a6(rgyud 'grel): de nas gsang gtor byas la/ de nas me lha'i snying khar bzhal yas khang bsgoms la/ gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor nas bsreg khang du me tog gi ri mo 'am/ dus gcig tu spyan drangs zhing?  dbul lo/ /spyan drang ba ni/ hUM ma lus sems can kun gyi mgon byung? 'di?
52a7(rgyud 'grel): bdud sde dpung bcas ma lus 'joms mdzad pa/ /dngos rnams ma lus ji bzhin mkhyen gyur pa/ /bcom ldan 'khor bcas 'dir ni gshegs su gsol/ /de nas bstod pa dang/ de nas dgug gzhug bcing dbang du bya/ /oM badzra san+ti ba zhes brjod mchog
52b1(rgyud 'grel): yon dang zhabs bsil dbul/ phyag rgyas gdab/ bde bar gshegs pa rnams rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug mas byin gyis brlab/ sems pa rnams gnas bzhir yum bzhis brlab/ bde bar gshegs pa rnams rin po che'i cod pan dang dar dbyangs kyi dbang bskur/
52b2(rgyud 'grel): sems pa rnams rigs lnga'i cod pan gyis dbang bskur ro/ /de nas mchod pa rnam pa lnga la sogs pas mchod/ de nas gsang ba dang 'thor 'thung byas la gong ma lta bu rdzas sngags sam/ yang na sbyi sngags sam/ lha'i sngags kyis dbul lo/ /de nas bsang ba dang
52b3(rgyud 'grel): 'thor 'thung byin la/ mar gyi dgang blugs phul la 'dud nyi shus bstod pa bya'o/ /yi ge brgya pa bzlas/ oM badzra mu(rgyud 'grel): zhes phyag rgya bkrol la bskyed pa snying khar bsdu/ spyan drangs pa gshegs su gsol te/ 'gro ba 'di dag kun gyi dpung/ sems pa chen po brtan mdzod
52b4(rgyud 'grel): la/ sangs rgyas yul du gshegs? nas kyang/ slar yang gshegs pa mdzad du gsol de nas bsang gtor byas la/ slar yang me thab tu bsams la/ mchod yon la sogs pa byin la/ rdzas lhag ma kun sbyin sreg bya/ /tha mar yang dgang blugs dang 'thor 'thung
52b5(rgyud 'grel): phul la/ 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ phyag rgya dgram par byas la/ snga ma bzhin gshegs su gsol te/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM mu(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod la/ khro bo ti rin ti ri'i phyag rgya bcings/ gyen du bkrol la gshegs su gsol/ gtor ma btang phyag btsal
52b6(rgyud 'grel): mchod bstod bzod par gsol/ dngos grub blang dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo/ phyag rgyang grol bskor ba bya/ gshegs su gsol/ bskyed pa bsdu/ sman ma phyag /phyogs skyong gsol/ tha ma slob ma bsrungs la dgye'o/ /de nas skar ma bzang po la rus pa bsdus la
52b7(rgyud 'grel): tsha tsha 'debs par bzhag go /bdag gis sgrub thabs legs sbyar bas/ /'jam dpal mtshan mchog thob gyur cig /'phags pa mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgrub thabs gsang ba'i sgron ma/ slob dpon chen po bradz+nyA gu rus mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
53a1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ arya many+dzu sh+rI nA ma saM gI ti tsakra kra ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i 'khor lo'i rim pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thogs med dus
53a2(rgyud 'grel): mdza' nam mkha' bsod nams dpag med pa/ /mkha' mnyam sems can sgrol phyir thams cad mkhyen bsngos pa'i/ /'jam dbyangs mtshan ldan dus gsum bde gshegs dge ba'i bshes gnyen byang chub sems dpa' i tshul/ /kun tu gzigs par lung
53a3(rgyud 'grel): bstan bsam gyis mi khyab de la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /bla ma dam pa'i gzhung lugs las/ /man ngag rgyas par rab bstan pa/ /snyigs ma'i sems can blo zhan rnams/ /rnam rtag g.yang bas mos pa nyung/ /de la dran phyir bsdus pa 'dis/ /grub dang
53a4(rgyud 'grel): lung bstan ma thob kyang/ /sman pa phan par bzhugs pa bzhin/ /bdag gis 'di ni byas pa yin/ /dbang dang dam tshig ldan pa yis/ /yid dga' ba'i gnas dag tu/ /bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni/ /snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ /yi ge a ni rnam
53a5(rgyud 'grel): bsams nas/ /de yi 'od kyis bla ma dang/ /bde gshegs sras dang bcas pa rnams/ /mdun du mngon sum lta bur dmigs/ /lus ngag yid kyis yang dag par/ /sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgya chen 'dod pa thams cad kyis/ /sangs
53a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyas kun la mchod par bgyi/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems kun la/ /bdag sdig thams cad so sor bshags/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems bskyed pa'i/ /dge ba kun la rje yi rang/ /mngon sangs rgyas nas mi ring ba'i/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs
53a7(rgyud 'grel): rgyas thams cad la/ /chos kyi 'khor lo dam pa ni/ /bskor phyir bdag gis bskul bar 'tshal/ /yongs su mya ngan 'da' bzhed pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la/ /bskal pa rab mang bzhugs par ni/ /sangs rgyas kun la gsol ba 'debs/ /
53b1(rgyud 'grel): gang yang bdag gis mchod pa rnam drug dang/ /dge ba gzhan byas de dag thams cad ni/ /bla med rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid thob phyir/ /bdag gis chos bzhin yongs su bgyi/ /chos la dbang bskur sangs rgyas thams cad la/ /byang chub snying po'i bar du
53b2(rgyud 'grel): skyabs su mchi/ /e ma sems can bla med sgral bya'i phyir/ /bdag gis thams cad mkhyen pa thob gyur cig /bdag nyid dngos po dbul lags kyis/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnams kyis/ /ji ltar bzhed pa mdzad pa'i phyir/ /bdag lus so sor bzhes su gsol
53b3(rgyud 'grel): bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /khyad 'phags lam ni bdag gis bstan/ /de nas ye shes rnam lnga yi/ /gzugs brnyan tsam la rab dmigs la/ /rang bzhin gyis ni rnam dag pa/ /rang bzhin gyis ni byin gyis brlab/ /oM shU n+ya ta dz+nyA na badzra swab+hA wa
53b4(rgyud 'grel): at+ma konyahaM/ /nam mkha' lta bur rab dmigs la/ /yi ge b+h+ruM las gyur ba yi/ /stong gsum tshang dang mnyam pa yi/ /mchod rten bde gshegs gzhal yas khang/ /rim pa drug dang ldan par bsgom/ /mtshan nyid thams cad rdzogs par bsam/ /dbus
53b5(rgyud 'grel): kyi snying po'i pho brang du/ /dbus su seng ge'i gdan nyid de/ /gzhan yang rim pa ji bzhin bsam/ /de yi dbus ma'i gdan thog tu/ /a las bskyed pa'i bcom ldan 'das/ /mdog dkar ral pa'i thor gtsug can/ /zhi pa rgyan spangs byang chub mchog /kun
53b6(rgyud 'grel): tu zhal gyi rnam par mdzes/ /de thugs d+hI(rgyud 'grel): las bskyed pa yi/ /gdod lnga zur phud lnga pa me tog thong/ /g.yas pa bzhin ral gri ste/ /g.yon bzhi shes rab po ti bsnams/ /rgyan dang na bza' gzhon nu'i tshul/ /thugs kar a las byung ba yi/
53b7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo rim pa bzhi dang ldan/ /ji ltar gsang sngags dgod pa ni/ /'khor lo'i cho ga mthong ba yi/ /dang po'i sangs rgyas thugs khar bsam/ /lte ba a las byung ba yi/ /ye shes sems dpa' zhal drug pa/ /utpal dmar la sngon po ni/ /po tis mtshan
54a1(rgyud 'grel): pa bsnams pa'o/ /gzhon nu'i brgyan ldan thugs kar ni/ /zla ba'i steng du a kar bsam/ /de las so sor 'phros pa yis/ /rim bzhin thams cad snang byas nas/ nam mkha' i mkha' mnyam sems can gyi/ /ma rig mun pa bsal byas nas/ /
54a2(rgyud 'grel): slar 'dus rim bzhin rang nyid kyi/ /yi ge'i nang du 'dus par lta/ /de nas sngags kyi 'khor lo yi/ /mtshan brjod rim par klag pa yang/ /'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das /zhes pa dang po nas brtsams nas/ /don chen yi ge dam pa'i bar
54a3(rgyud 'grel): rang gi de nyid brjod pa yin/ /khong nas byung ba skye ba med/ /tshig kun rab tu gsal bar byed/ /de mthar thugs pa yum bzhi yin/ /mchod pa chen po 'dod chags che/ /zhes pa dang por brtsams byas nas/ /chags pa thams cad sel bar byed/ /
54a4(rgyud 'grel): de dag mthar ni rigs lnga ste/ /bde gshegs yab dang yum rnams kyang/ /mtshan gyi don la rab dmigs te/ /mnyam par bzhag nas mtshan brjod ni/ /rim bzhin klog pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /rang gi de nyid yi ge las/ /rim bzhin spro zhing bsdu ba yis/ /rang
54a5(rgyud 'grel): rang gdan la dgod par bya/ /'dod pa chen po bde ba che/ /zhes pa dang por bsnams nas ni/ /sgyu 'phrul chen po mig 'phrul can/ /de yi mthar thug sems dpa' ni/ /bcu drug 'khor lo rab tu dgod/ /yi ge a las bskyed pa dang/ /sems can don byas
54a6(rgyud 'grel): slar 'dus te/ /rang gi gdan la dgod par bya/ /sbyin bdag chen po gtso bo ste/ /zhes pa dang por brtsams byas nas/ /smon lam ye shes rgya mtsho'i bar/ /phyi nang lha mo bskyed par bya/ /byams pa chen rang bzhin dpag tu med/ /de bzhin theg chen
54a7(rgyud 'grel): tshul gnas par/ /yi ge a las bskyed pa yi /skal bzang phyi rol rim bzhin du/ /'khor lo gsum la dgod par bya/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor ni/ /ji srid sgom pa'i mthar thug pa/ /tshig bcad bcu bzhi dag gis ni/ /mtshan gyi don rnams bstan pa
54b1(rgyud 'grel): yin/ /'od zer 'phro zhing bsdu ba dang/ /gzugs su gyur nas lhar gnas pa/ /pho brang snying po'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /rim gnyis chos dbyings ye shes kyi/ /dkyil 'khor dgod pa bstan par bya/ /sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad che/ /zhes pa dang por brtsams byas
54b2(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa che/ /mthar thug oM gyis rnam par spro/ /gti mug spyod pa dag byas te/ /slar 'dus rim pa gnyis pa las/ /rnam par snang mdzad tshul gyis ni/ /mtshan gyi don rnam grangs bzhin du/ /phyogs bzhi dag nas bzhugs pa
54b3(rgyud 'grel): yin/ /tshig bcad nyi shu rtsa lnga ru/ /tshig rkang gcig gis ma tshang ba/ /'di yi don la dmigs shing dgod/ /de nas rim pa gsum pa ru/ /me long lta bu'i ye shes kyis/ /tshul nas rab tu bstod pa ni/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed 'jigs par byed/ /ces pa dang
54b4(rgyud 'grel): por brtsams nas ni/ /sgra dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog /ces pa yi ge mthar thug par/ /hUM gi rnam par spro zhing bsdu/ /mi skyong ba yi rnam par dgod/ /tshig rkang gcig gis lhag pa yi/ /tshigs bcad bcu yis phyogs bzhi ru/ /gsang sngags bdun cu rtsa
54b5(rgyud 'grel): gcig spros/ /zhe sdang btul nas rnam par gnas/ /de nas rim pa bzhi po ni/ /yang dag bdag med de bzhin nyid/ /ces pa dang por brtsams byas nas/ /ye shes me lce 'od 'bar gsal/ /de mthar thug pa spro bsdu ste/ /snang ba mdza' yas rnam pa yis?
54b6(rgyud 'grel): phyogs la ni dag tu rnam par gnas/ /so sor kun rtog ye shes ni/ /h+rI(rgyud 'grel): yi rnam par spro bsdu ste/ /'dod chags rnam par dag byas la/ /tshig bcad bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis gyis/ /mtshan don gzhung las byung ba bzhin/ phyogs bzhi rnam par dgod pa'o
54b7(rgyud 'grel): de nas rim pa lnga pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor bdag gis bshad par bya/ /'dod pa'i don grub dam pa ste/ /zhes pa dang por btsam byas nas/ /nor bu chen po rin chen rtog /de mthar thug pa mnyam nyid kyi/ /ye shes tshigs bcad nyi shu gnyis/ /'od zer 'phros
55a1(rgyud 'grel): shing 'dus pa yis/ /ser sna can ni rnam bcom zhing/ /mtshan gyi don ni grangs bzhin du/ rin chen 'byung ldan tshul du gnas/ /traM gi rnam par 'phro zhing 'du/ /de nas rim pa drug pa'o/ /don grub dkyil 'khor dgon pa yang/ /tshigs bcad
55a2(rgyud 'grel): bco lnga'i mtshan don ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rtogs bya ba/ /zhes pa dang por brtsams byas nas/ /'jam dpal dpal dang ldan pa'i mchog /de yi mthar thug mtshan rnams ni/ a yi rnam par spro zhing bsdu/ /bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyi/ /'gro ba phra
55a3(rgyud 'grel): dog rnam sbyangs te/ /don grub rnam par rim bzhin dgod/ /de lta bu yi tshul nyid kyis/ /'od zer spro zhing bsdus nas su/ /khams gsum sems can thams cad ni/ gang gi 'od zer reg gyur pa/ /de yi sangs rgyas rnams su 'gyur /sangs rgyas kun la reg
55a4(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur zhing/ /bsdu zhing bdag dang mnyam par sbyar/ /dkyil 'khor de dag thams cad kyang/ /dog dang gdan dang phyag rgya rnams/ /de bzhin dang po'i sangs rgyas kyang/ /'khor lo la sogs rim pa yang/ /ji ltar grags pa bzhin du dgod/ de nas dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM paM ho:
55a5(rgyud 'grel): yis/ /ye shes 'khor lo rnams bkug cing/ /bdag dang mnyam par sbyar byas nas/ /rang bzhin mchod pa'i sprin tshogs bstim?/ /bsdus pa'i sgo nas bstod pa yang/ /mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog khyod 'dud/ /ces pa dang por brtsams byas nas/ /ye shes sku nyid
55a6(rgyud 'grel): khyod la 'dud/ /ces pa'i tshig bcad bzhi bzhi yis/ /dkyil 'khor lnga la bsdus te bstod/ /de nas mtshan gyi yon tan ni/ /lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang/ /zhes pa dang por brtsams byas nas/ /chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur zhes pa/ /yon tan sgo nas bstod pa
55a7(rgyud 'grel): yin/ /lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang/ /zhes pa lnga yis rnams phye la/ /dkyil 'khor lnga yi yon tan ni/ /rim pa bzhin du khas pas dbye/ /de yi tshigs bcad mtshan rnams ni/ /dkyil 'khor lnga yi yon tan grags/ /oM sarba d+harma zhes pa nas/ dzanyA na garb+hA?
55b1(rgyud 'grel): oM yi bar/ /sku yi phreng ba'i sngags kyi ni/ /de la sen zhing rab gnas par/ /sngags kyi sgo nas bstod pa yin/ /de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang/ /zhes pa dang por brtsams byas nas/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyis bshad/ /de yi mthar bsdus pa yis/ /sgo nas yang dag
55b2(rgyud 'grel): ston pa yin// //de ltar gang zhig sgom byed cing/ /ngag gi 'khor lo rnam 'phros te/ /rnam gsum don la dmigs pa yis/ /ring por mi thogs 'dul dbang gis/ /yon tan gzhung sogs thams cad kyang/ /ma lus de yis thob par 'gyur/ /sa mchog bcu
55b3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis rab bgrod nas/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /thun bzhi 'am ni thun gsum gyi/ /mtshan ma brtan po byung gi bar/ /de ni rgyun tu klag par bya/ /de nas dkyil 'khor dbang bskur dang/ /zhi sogs las rnams brtsam par bya/ /gzhan yang shi la phan
55b4(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ /cho ga'i bye brag ma lus kun/ /cho ga chen por mthong bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor bsdu pa'i rim par yang/ /rim bzhin yi ge a las te/ /de nas thig le dmigs pa med/ /sgyu ma'i tshul du spyod lam brtag /dam pa'i gzhung lugs gsal mod kyi/
55b5(rgyud 'grel): bsdus la dga' ba'i bor byas nas/ /bdag 'dra ba rtsam par mi 'os te/ /khab len rdo yis lcags 'du bzhin/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs la mos pa yin/ /rang dbang med par brtsom pa la/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis bzod par mdzod/ /de las bdag
55b6(rgyud 'grel): gis dge ba gang thob des/ /'gro ba rnams kyis don rtogs zhi gyur nas/ /bdag sogs 'jam dpal dbyangs dang 'dra gyur te/ /nam mkha' i mdza' mnyam sems can grol bar shog /'phags pa mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i 'khor lo'i rim pa/ bla ma dam pa'i
55b7(rgyud 'grel): cho ga chen po'i gzhung rnams las/ blo zhan pa'i don du mos pa tsam las 'jug pa 'di dag gi rim pa phra mo rdzogs so// // */ (/'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par ljod pa'i sgrub thabs bzhugs so/) /rgya gar skad du/ Arya many+dzu sh+rI nA ma saM pI ti no pi
56a1(rgyud 'grel): ka bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgrub thabs/ 'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /shes rab ral gri mda' gzhu thogs/ /dang po'i sangs rgyas rgyu med pa/ /gdong lnga gtsug phud lnga dang ldan/ /gsang
56a2(rgyud 'grel): sngags rgyal po drug ldan 'dud/ /dang por bsngags pas/ dbang 'thob cing dam tshig dang ldan par byas te/ /yid dga' ba'i gnas su 'dug la/ /tho rangs ka kha'i sgo dag par byas la/ /snying khar zla ba'i steng du yi ge muM rnam par bsams la/ 'od zer gyis
56a3(rgyud 'grel): bla ma dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan drangs la/ phyag btsal ba dang/ mchod pa dang/ rjes su yi rang ba dang/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul zhing/ /mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol te/ dge ba'i rtse ba bsngo bar bya'o/ /de nas byams
56a4(rgyud 'grel): pa dang snying rje dang/ dga' ba dang/ btang snyoms bsgom par bya'o/ /de'i rjes la stong pa nyid bsgom te/ oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swA b+ha wa aSha ta ma konyahaM/ sngags 'di'i don la dmigs pas/ chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur bsgom mo/ /de nas yi ge h+rI(rgyud 'grel): las
56a5(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma'i gdan dmar po bsam zhing/ /de'i steng du a las zla ba'i gdan rnam par bsams te/ dbus su yi ge mu dmar skya 'od zer gyi tshogs 'phro zhing/ 'du ba bsam par bya'o/ /de nyid thig ler gyur pa las/ ye shes sems dpa' sku mdog dkar po sprin
56a6(rgyud 'grel): dkar dag pa lta bu rdo rje skyil krung can/ phyag bzhi dang ldan pa g.yas g.yon gnyis na/ mdzes pa'i ral gri 'debs shing shes rab kyi po ti 'dzin pa'o/ /de'i 'og ma gnyis na mda' gzhu rnams bsnams pa'o/ /gzhon nu'i rgyan can no/ /de ltar rnam par bsgoms
56a7(rgyud 'grel): te/ adma konyahaM zhes brjod la/ nga rgyal bskyed par bya'o/ /de'i rjes la snying kha'i 'od zer gyis ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs te/ yi ge las byung ba'i pad+ma dang/ /zla ba'i steng du bzhugs te/ mchod pa'i tshogs kyis rnam par mchod la/ rang dang gnyis su med
56b1(rgyud 'grel): pa bsres par bya'o/ /snying ka dang mgrin pa dang dpral ba dang spyi bo rnams su/ /rdo rje dang pad+ma dang rin po che dang sna tshogs rdo rjes rgyas btab ste/ thugs kha'i 'od zer gyis nam mkha' khyab pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa bskul bas lha mo'i tshogs kyis bdud rtsi'i rgyun
56b2(rgyud 'grel): gyis dbang bskur te/ sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan dang dar dpyangs dang bcas pas dbang bskur ro/ /de'i thugs khar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du h+rI(rgyud 'grel): yongs su gyur pa las dang po'i sangs rgyas sku mdog dkar po zhal lnga phyag brgyad pa/ zhabs gnyis skyil mo krung du bzhugs
56b3(rgyud 'grel): pa/ byis pa'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ rin po che sna tshogs pa'i na bza' can/ /g.yas bzhin mdzes pa'i ral gri/ g.yon bzhin shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam/ de'i thugs khar shes rab kyi 'khor lo rnam par bsnams te/ lce drug pa
56b4(rgyud 'grel): kha dog drug dang ldan pa/ mu khyud bzhi yis bskor ba/ /lte bar yi ge a dkar po bsams te/ de las 'od 'phros pas/ phyogs bcu'i sems can gyi khams thams cad khyab par byas te/ slar 'dus te de nyid la thim pas/ rtsa ba'i sngags dgod par bya'o
56b5(rgyud 'grel): oM sarba d+harmA b+hA wa bi shud+d+hu badzra a A aM a(rgyud 'grel): de'i phyi rol mu khyud la dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu gnyis dgod do/ /de'i phyi rol 'khor lo rtsibs drug pa ste/ dang po'i rtsibs la oM badzra tik+Sha ya te na ma(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa la oM du(rgyud 'grel): khats+tshe da ya te na ma/ gsum pa la
56b6(rgyud 'grel): oM pradz+nya dz+nyA na murta ye ya te na ma/ bzhi pa la oM dz+nyA na kA ya ya te na ma/ lnga pa la oM wA wI shwa ri ya te na ma/ drug pa la/ oM a ra pa tsa na ya te ma/ phyi'i mu khyud dang po la ye shes sems dpa' i phreng sngags/ sarba ta thA ga ta h+ri da ya zhes bya ba nas/
56b7(rgyud 'grel): dz+nya na garb+ha a zhes bya ba'i bar du dgod do/ /phyi'i mu khyud tha ma la yi ge ko nas ha'i bar gsal phyed kyi yi ge dgod do/ /de ltar snying gar bsam zhing/ de las 'khor lo de'i dbus su a las bskyed pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal ye shes sems
57a1(rgyud 'grel): dpa' zhal drug pa ston ka'i zla ba ltar dkar zhing/ in+d+ra nI la'i gtsug phud can/ /nyi ma 'char ka'i 'od 'dra bas bskor zhing/ zhi ba'i ngang tshul dang ldan pa/ phyag gnyis kyis utpal dmar po dang sngon po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
57a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i glegs bam gyis mdzes pa g.yas dang g.yon na rim pa bzhin bsnams pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan cing/ skyil mo krung gi bzhugs par bsam mo// //de'i thugs khar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor/ de'i dbus su yi ge a bkod de/ de las 'od
57a3(rgyud 'grel): zer 'phros shing 'khor lo'i sngags kyi kha dog ji lta ba bzhin 'od zer 'phros te/ rang dang 'jig rten gyi khams kun khyab par byas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad gsal bar 'gyur zhing/ sems can gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas te/ 'od kyi
57a4(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar bsdus nas/ bdag nyid la lan gsum bskor te/ snying ga'i sngags dang zla ba dang bcas pa gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ shes rab dang ye shes kyi me 'bar ba'i tshul gyis/ bdag med pa brtan por bsgom mo/ /
57a5(rgyud 'grel): de lta bu'i tshul gyis gsang sngags kyi bzlas pa rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang sngags bzlas pa dang/ mtshan yang dag par brjod pa klags pa yang rim pa des yang dang yang du bya'o/ /thun mtshams su ni ye shes sems dpa' gshegs su gsol
57a6(rgyud 'grel): zhing ji ltar bskyed pa'i rim pa bdag nyid la bsdu bar bya'o/ /bdag nyid kyang mi dmigs pa la lha'i rnal 'byor du langs te/ spyod lam thams cad kyang bden pa gnyis kyi tshul gyis dkyil 'khor dang gtor ma dang/ sbyin sreg dang/ mchod pa dang
57a7(rgyud 'grel): mdo gdon pa la sogs pa mchod rten gyi las dang/ sbyin pa la sogs pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang/ lus ngag gi spyod pa thams cad lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas/ sgyu ma'i tshul gyis sbyar bar bya'o/ /zas la sogs pa ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i
57b1(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi chen por sngags kyis btab la tshim par bya'o/ /phyi'i khrus don du gnyer ba'i tshe yang dbang bskur ba'i cho ga rang bzhin rnam par dag pas bkru'o/ /nyal ba'i tshe chos kyi dbyings la snyoms par zhugs pas nyal lo/ /ldang na gzugs kyi sku'i rim pas so/ /tshul
57b2(rgyud 'grel): 'di lta bur gang zhig sgom pa byed pa de ni/ 'dul ba'i dbang gis de nyid ring por mi thogs par nam mkha' i dkyil na bzhugs pa mthong ngo/ /ye shes sems dpa' sprul pa sku'i sgrub thabs 'di/ rgyud dang sgeg pa'i rdo rje byang chub mchog ldan dang/ /'jam
57b3(rgyud 'grel): dpal grags pa bla ma'i man ngag rim pa 'di/ /gsang ba'i mtshan lnga rdo rje las grub kyis/ /dam pa nyer bstan dan h+ri badzra las/ /byang chub sgyu 'phrul sbyor ba'i man ngag 'di/ /rnyed nas 'di la gus phyir bdag gis bris/ /'di yis 'gro kun ye shes 
57b4(rgyud 'grel): sems dpar shog /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //*/ (/'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga yid bzhin nor bu zhes bya ba slob dpon zla bzang grags pas mdzad pa bzhugs so/) /rgya gar
57b5(rgyud 'grel): skad du/ Arya many+dzu sh+rI maN+Dal pra ti tsind+ha ma Ni nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga yid bzhin nor bu zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas sku lnga'i bdag nyid can/ /khyab bdag ye shes
57b6(rgyud 'grel): lnga yi bdag /sprul ba'i 'khor lo sna tshogs 'chang/ /ye shes sku nyid la btud nas/ /'jam dbyangs kyis khyab dkyil 'khor ni/ /bsdus dang dbye ba'i bye brag gis/ /thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i/ /cho ga'i rim pa bshad par bya/ /dang po re
57b7(rgyud 'grel): shig rnal 'byor pas/ /'gro ba 'don pa'i bsam pa yis/ /yid dga' ba yis phyogs su/ /bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni/ /sgyu ma'i lus kyi snying ga ru/ /rang gi sa bon bsams nas su/ /'od 'phros pa yi sbyor ba dang/ /dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i phyag rgya
58a1(rgyud 'grel): yis/ /rang gi 'khor lo sprul bar bya/ /phyag lnga bya ba'i sbyor ba dang/ /mchod pa rnam pa lnga yis mchod/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba las gsungs ltar/ /gsum pa skyabs 'gro la sogs bya/ /de rjes bstod pas mnyes bya ba/ /thun mong dang ni de ma yin/
58a2(rgyud 'grel): thun mong rnam pa gnyis yin te/ /dang po mdo nyid ji bzhin pa/ /'chad pa'i 'dud pa nyi shu'o/ /thun mong min par rang gi'o/ /nyi shu pa yi rnam pa yang/ /mchog gi dang po sku gsum 'chang/ /sangs rgyas sku lnga'i bdag nyid can/ /khyab bdag ye shes
58a3(rgyud 'grel): lnga yi bdag /mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog khyed 'dud/ /yang dag nyid de de bzhin nyid/ /stong nyid smra ba'i khyu mchog ste/ /za bcing rgya che'i sgra sgrog pa/ /yang dag mthar gyur khyod la 'dud/ /stong pa nyid dga' 'dod chags blo/ /srid pa'i 'dod chags la
58a4(rgyud 'grel): sogs spangs/ /srid pa'i dga' ba chen po ba/ /stong nyid las byung khyod la kun 'dud/ /sangs rgyas byang chub bla na med/ /gsang sngags las byung yi ge med/ /gsang sngags don kun bskyed pa po/ /sangs rgyas byang chub khyod la 'dud/ /sems can
58a5(rgyud 'grel): kun la shas cher chags/ /nam mkha' lta bur chags pa med/ /sems can gyi yid la 'jug /sangs rgyas chags pa khyod la 'dud/ /'dod pa'i don grub dam pa ste/ /ngan song thams cad rnam sbyong ba/ /mgon po sems can kun gyi mchog /sangs rgyas
58a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dod la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /ha hi ha hi 'jigs par sgrogs/ /rdo rje gang mo cher sgrogs pa/ /gang mo chen po gad rgyangs can/ /sangs rgyas dgyes pa khyod la 'dud/ /gom pa'i stabs kyis gar byed pa/ /dpal ldan lag pa brgyas gang la/ /nam mkha' 
58a7(rgyud 'grel): khyab par gang byed pa/ /sangs rgyas rol phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /tshig tu brjod pa spangs pa ste/ /brjod pa kun gyi rgyu yi mchog /tshig kun rab tu gsal bar byed/ /sangs rgyas 'dzum pa khyod la 'dud/ /tshig gi dbang phyug smra ba che/ /smra ba'i skyes mchog
58b1(rgyud 'grel): smra ba'i rgyal/ /smra ba'i dam pa mchog gi gnas/ /sangs rgyas bzhad pa khyod la 'dud/ /tshig la dbang ba tshig mdza' yas/ /tshig bden pa dang bden par smra/ /bden pa bzhi po ston pa po/ /sangs rgyas gsung nyid khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs
58b2(rgyud 'grel): che ba/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs la gnas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs rig pa/ /sangs rgyas thugs la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /mya ngan 'das shing mya ngan 'das/ /legs par mya ngan 'das dang nye/ /bde sdug sel ba thar gyur pa/ /med pa las byung khyod la
58b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dud/ /theg pa chen po'i tshul la gnas/ /theg pa chen po'i tshul gyi mchog /sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad che/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba khyod la 'dud/ /nam mkha' las byung khyod la 'dud/ /nam mkha' las byung rang byung ba/ /shes rab ye shes me'o che/ /'od chen
58b4(rgyud 'grel): rnam par snang bar byed/ /nam mkha' las byung khyod la 'dud/ /dang po sangs rgyas rgyu med pa/ /ye shes mig gcig dri ma med/ /ye shes lus can de bzhin gshegs/ /ye shes las byung khyod la 'dud/ /sgyu 'phrul chen po don grub pa/ /sgyu 'phrul chen po dga' 
58b5(rgyud 'grel): bas dga' / /sgyu 'phrul chen po mig 'phrul can/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba khyod la 'dud/ /gom pa'i stabs kyis gar byed pa/ /dpal ldan lag pa brgyas gang la/ /nam mkha' khyab par gar byed pa/ /sangs rgyas rol ston khyod la 'dud/ /dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin
58b6(rgyud 'grel): mchog /dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin 'dzin/ /skye med chos de sna tshogs ston/ /thams cad thams cad khyod la 'dud/ /ye shes snang ba lam med pa/ /'gro ba'i mar me ye shes sgron/ /gzi brjid chen po 'od gsal ba/ /ye shes sku nyid khyod la 'dud//
58b7(rgyud 'grel): sngags pa rdo rje dril 'chang ba/ /bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di yis bstod/ /rab tu mos pas gus byed na/ /'jam dpal rdo rje ngo bor 'gyur/ /ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams/ /byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i/ /bla na med pa'i byang chub sems/ /dam pa
59a1(rgyud 'grel): bdag gis bskyed par bgyi/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa la/ /tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang/ /dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang/ /sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum/ /bdag gis brtan por bzung bar gyi/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/
59a2(rgyud 'grel): bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum/ /deng nas bsams te gzung bar bgyi/ /nam du yang ni mi spong ngo/ /rdo rje rigs mchog chen po la/ /rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya yang/ /yang bdag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ /slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi/ /rin chen rigs
59a3(rgyud 'grel): mchog chen po la/ /dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la/ /nyin re ji bzhin dus drug tu/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin/ /byang chub chen po las byung ba'i/ /pad+ma rigs mchog dag pa la/ /phyi dang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum/ /dam pa'i chos kyang gzung bar bgyi
59a4(rgyud 'grel): las kyi rigs mchog chen po la/ /sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni/ /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ /mchod pa'i las rnams ci nus bgyi/ /byang chub sems ni bla na med/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed bgyis nas/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi
59a5(rgyud 'grel): phyir/ /bdag gi sdom pa ma lus gzung/ /ma rgal ba rnams sgral bar bgyi/ /ma grol ba rnams grol bar bgyi/ /dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs phyung zhing/ /sems can mya ngan 'das la 'god/ /de ltar sdom pa 'dzin byed na/ /bdag nyid snod du
59a6(rgyud 'grel): rung bar 'gyur/ /de nas sa bon 'od kyis ni/ /dkyil 'khor rang gi sa bon gzhug /de las ye shes me 'bar bas/ /rnam smin phung po bsreg pa yi/ /skad cig gis ni sgyu 'drar 'gyur/ /de nas snying rje bskyed pa ni/ /sdug bsngal chos dang mi dmigs pa/
59a7(rgyud 'grel): byang chub rnam pa lnga sgom ste/ /gzugs brnyan gyi ni ye shes la/ sdug bsngal rnams ni snang ba ni/ /de las 'don pa'i bsam pa ni/ /sdug bsngal la dmigs snying rje'o/ /bdag stong sems can chos rnams kun/ /stong pa nyid du rab sbyor bas/ /kun
59b1(rgyud 'grel): gyi stong ba las 'jug pa/ /chos dmigs snying rje mnyam nyid do/ /de yang ma skyes pa'i phyir stong par shes pa ni/ /so sor rtog pa shes pa las/ /sems can thams cad dgod bsam pa/ /dmigs med shes rab so sor rtog /sems can don ni rtogs
59b2(rgyud 'grel): pa/ nam mkha' la ni 'ja' tshon bzhin/ /gang dang gang 'dod snang byed la/ /dmigs med snying rje bya grub pa'o/ /bdag dang gzhan sogs rtog pa rnams/ /slar zhing 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing/ /gang la chags dang rnam grol ba'i/ /chos dbyings ye shes rnam par
59b3(rgyud 'grel): sgoms/ /de dag ni tshogs gnyis kyis yongs su ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas nam mkha' stong pa la/ b+h+ruM byung 'khor lo'i dbus su ni/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par hUM ni 'jigs pa bsgom byas te/ /'od zer phyogs bcur 'phros pa las/ /hUM bcu 'khor
59b4(rgyud 'grel): lo'i rtsibs stengs su/ /khro bo bcu gcig skad cig rdzogs/ /hUM mdzad snod mdzes gtsug tor dang/ /gshin rje gshed dang gzhan mi thub/ /rta mgrin dang ni bdud rtsi 'khyil/ /'dod rgyal mi g.yo mgon po dang/ /dbyug sngon can dang stobs po che/ /
59b5(rgyud 'grel): zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs gnyis par/ /bskyed la de nyid rnam 'phrul ba'i/ /bgegs bcu dgug par bka' bsgo bas/ /bkug ste zhabs 'og phur bus gdab/ /rdo rje gsang sngags brjod bya bas/ /skad cig gis ni bgegs med 'gyur/ /hUM mdzad  
59b6(rgyud 'grel): thugs kha'i sa bon las/ /'od 'phros phyogs mtshams steng 'og tu/ /'phros pas dra ba gur dang ni/ /ra ba gnyis dang sa gzhi dang/ /rdo rje'i rang bzhin bsgom par bya/ /phyogs mtshams dkyil 'khor bcing ba yis/ /phyis kyang 'jug par mi 'gyur
59b7(rgyud 'grel): ro/ /de nas zhi ba'i bsam pa yis/ /kun tu bzang por hUM mdzad gyur/ /de las chos kyi 'byung gnas sam/ /dbus su b+h+ruM las gzhal yas khang/ spyi dang thun mong khyad par ni/ /rim pa bzhin du shes par bya/ /zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta
60a1(rgyud 'grel): babs kyis ni rnam par brgyan/ /dar dang me tog phreng bas brgyan/ /gra dang sgo yi mtshams rnams su/ /zla ba phyed la gnas pa yi/ /rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras/ /dkyil 'khor phyi rim thig gdab bo/ /de yi rim pa'i nang zhugs nas/ /dkyil 'khor phyi
60a2(rgyud 'grel): ma dang mtshungs pas/ /mtshan nyid thams cad shes bya ste/ /ka ba brgyad dang ldan pa ru/ /dbus kyi dkyil 'khor 'byung ba ni/ /kun gyi mthun mong yin par 'dod/ /bsdus dang so so'i mtshan nyid ni/ /phyi nas 'byung ba las shes bya/ /dbus su saM gaM taM d+h+raM? h+raM aM las/ /hUM gnyis
60a3(rgyud 'grel): ldan pas byung ba'i gdan/ /ming las mtshon te shes par bya/ /a las zla ba'i steng du bsam/ /de dag ni steng gi ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas sa bon las skyes pa/ /a las rnam par snang mdzad che/ mdog dkar zhal bzhi phyag gnyis pa/ /mnyam gzhag pa'am byang chub mchog /  
60a4(rgyud 'grel): rnam rgyan la sogs spangs pa ni/ rtag pa'i sangs rgyas bsgom pa'o/ /thugs kar pad+ma gnas pa las/ /h+rI las dang po sangs rgyas na/ /zhal lnga byis pa'i rgyan dang ldan/ /phyag brgyad g.yas bzhis ral gri 'dzin/ /g.yon bzhis shes rab po ti 'dzin/ /dang po sangs rgyas thun
60a5(rgyud 'grel): mong pa'o/ /sangs rgyas de'i thugs kha ru/ /a las gyur pa'i 'khor lo ni/ /rtsibs drug pa la mu khyud bzhi/ /lte bar a las 'od 'phros pas/ /don byas 'dus pa'i sngags su gyur/ /lte bar a ste ma khyud gnyis/ /nad ma'i mu khyud la dgod pa/ /oM sarba d+harmA b+ha wa bi
60a6(rgyud 'grel): shud+d+ha badzra a A aM a(rgyud 'grel): phyi rol tu ni dgod pa ni/ /rtsibs bcas sam rtsibs med par/ /dbyangs yig bcu gnyis dgod par bya/ /de yi phyi rim rtsibs drug la/ /gsang sngags rgyal po drug ldan pa/ /dang po'i rtsibs la dgod par bya/ /oM badzra tik+Sha ya te na ma
60a7(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa'i rtsibs la dgod bya ba/ /oM du(rgyud 'grel): khats+tshe da ya te na ma/ /gsum pa'i rtsibs la dgod bya ba/ /oM pradz+nyA dz+nyA na murta ye ya te na ma/ /bzhi pa la ni bsam bya ba/ /oM dz+nyA na kA ya ya te na ma/ lnga pa la ni bsam bya ba/ /oM wA gI shwa rA ya ya te na ma/ /drug pa la ni
60b1(rgyud 'grel): bsam bya ba/ /a ra pa tsa ya te na ma/ /'khor lo nu khyud bzhi pa la/ ye shes sems dpa' i sku yi sngags/ /a A sarba ta thA ga ta h+ri da ya/ ha ra ha ra/ oM hUM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): b+ha ga wan/ dz+nyA na murti wA gI shwa ra/ ma hA pa tsa sarba d+harmA/ ga ga na/ a mA la su pa ri shud+d+ha d+harmA d+hA tu dz+nyA na garb+ha
60b2(rgyud 'grel): a/ 'khor lo mu khyud bzhi pa la/ /ka sogs k+Sha la thug par dgod/ /shes rab 'khor lo'i ting 'dzin to/ /de'i lte ba'i a las ni/ /gnyis su med pa'i 'jam dpal dbyangs/ /zhal drug pa la phyag drug pa/ /'khor lo'i rtsibs dang yi ge'i zhal/ /dkar
60b3(rgyud 'grel): dmar sngo dang dkar ljang dkar/ /phyis kyang so sor bya ba yin/ /utpal sngo dmar dang po gnyis/ /mda' dang gzhu ni gnyis pa gnyis/ /mnyam par bzhag pas gsum pa gnyis/ /sku ni dung ltar dkar ba'o/ /thugs kar zla ba sa bon no/ /rnam snang chen po
60b4(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya bas/ /dang po sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /sgyu 'phrul dra bas byang chub pa'o/ /so sor dbye ba'i sbyor ba yang/ /dbus su rang gi gdan stengs su/ /h+rI(rgyud 'grel): hUM a a oM a las/ /pad+ma gar dang hUM byed dang/ /rnam snang rta mchog rdo rje nyid/ /rdo rje sems
60b5(rgyud 'grel): dpa' i go rims bzhin/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag gnyis te/ /ting 'dzin bdud 'dul byang chub mchog /skyabs mdzad mchog sbyin 'gying bcas pas/ 'on kyang khyad par yod pa'o/ /pad+ma rdo rje rdo rje dang/ /rdo rje sna tshogs rin chen dang/ /rdo rje dril
60b6(rgyud 'grel): bu 'dzin pa ste/ /mdog ni bsdus pa'i zhal gyis te/ /dang po sangs rgyas d+hi kar las/ /sngar gyi kun gyi thun mong gi/ 'jam dpal dag tu thams cad mchog /de yi thugs khar shes rab kyi/ /'khor lo sa bon rnams la bskyed/ /rtsibs brgyad yin te  
60b7(rgyud 'grel): rnam snang gi /rtsibs bcu bar ni yin par 'dod/ /mu khyud bzhi sogs snga ma bzhin/ /yi ge gyur pas sngags rnams na/ /rtsibs la dgod pa'i sngags rnams ni/ /ye shes sems dpa' i ming can du/ /sdus pa'i sngags rnams phye ba'o/ /kha dog sngar
61a1(rgyud 'grel): ye shes /bzhin shes par bya/ /shes rab 'khor lor bsgom par bya/ /lte ba rnams su sa bon gyis/ /smro bsdu las grub ye shes sems/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag gnyis pa/ /dmar po la sogs kha dog drug /rdo rje rnon po sdug bsngal gcod/ /shes
61a2(rgyud 'grel): rab ye shes sku/ /ngag dbang phyug dang pa tsa'i mdza' / /ral gri kun gyi g.yas pa ste/ /rang mtshan g.yon na 'dzin pa'o/ /ye shes sems dpa' bsgoms pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /dngos gzhi dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog ni/ /bsdus dang phye ba'i bye brag gis/ /thun
61a3(rgyud 'grel): mong thun mong ma yin pa/ /go rim bzhin du shes par bya/ /bsdus pa rnams pa gsum yin te/ /rnam snang gnyis dang rdo rje sems/ /de gsum gtso bo gang rung ngam/ /yang na rang bzhin gcig yin pas/ /gcig tu bsdus pas shes par bya/ /thugs bsdus
61a4(rgyud 'grel): ba la 'jam dpal dbyangs/ /so so'i la ni sngar bzhin 'dod/ /de'i thugs la sa bon bsnams/ /spros pa rang rang dkyil 'khor 'byung/ /las byas 'dus nas dkyil 'khor du/ /'og tu 'chad pa'i rim bas gnas/ /dbus dkar shar sngo ser zhing/ /
61a5(rgyud 'grel): ?? byang gi ljang gu ru/ /kha dog la sogs shes/ /kun gyi dbus kyi mtshan ma ste/ /'og kyang khro bo'i rdo rje dang/ /rin chen pad+ma sna tshogs mtshan/ /nyams dang de dang 'dra bar ram/ /yang na 'grel par bshad pa bzhin/ /ming dang gzhal mdog mtshan
61a6(rgyud 'grel): ??/ /tha dad par mi shes bar bya/ /gdul bya'i bsam pa'i dbang gi ste/ /sna sogs gzugs 'dzin nor bu bzhin/ /so so rang rang sa bon las/ /rang rig thams cad sprul byas nas/ /'dod chags can sogs gdul byas nas/ /'dus nas dkyil
61a7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor la zhugs pa/ /dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog yin par 'dod/ /rjes kyi las rgyal ting 'dzin ni/ /'od zer spro bsdu 'gro ba sbyong/ /kun gyi phrin las mthun pas ni/ /khyad par dbye ba ma bshad do/ /sprul pa byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir/ /rang gi gtso bo'i
61b1(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba yis/ /lag ngar gnyis ni rdo rje bcing/ /se gol gtog cing sngags brjod pas/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bya/ /de tshe sangs rgyas thams cad ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs bcas/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad 'dus par 'gyur/ /sngar bzhin
61b2(rgyud 'grel): bstod bas bstod nas su/ /lcags kyu la sogs rnal 'byor gyis/ /dgug pa la sogs pa byas nas/ /sgo bcad bsrung ba rdzogs pas 'grub/ /gtso bo dam tshig mchog bcings pa/ /snying khar hUM las rdo rje bsam/ /dri sh+ya dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes/ gtso bo'i sngags
61b3(rgyud 'grel): kyis rjes 'gro ba'o/ /lce la pad+ma bsam bya ste/ /gtso bo snying po bkod byas pas/ /chos kyi phyag rgya gsung bsgrub bo/ /gtso bo las kyi phyag rgya bcing/ /spyi bor rdo rje kun dngos bsam/ /las kyi phyag rgya phrin las 'grub/ /ye shes sems dpa' i snying kha ru/ /rang gi
61b4(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma bsam byas nas/ /phyag rgya chen po bsam byas nas/ /phyag rgya chen po bcings pa ni/ /'phrin las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /rigs kyi dbu rgyan bsams nas ni/ /mchod dang mnyam nyid la sogs bstod/ /de nas bzlas brjod bya ba ni/ /shes rab
61b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo'i sngags rnams las/ /'od zer de 'dra 'jig rten du/ /'gro ba'i don byas der 'dus thim/ /dang po'i zlas pa yin par 'dod/ /yang mtshan mchog brjod pa ni/ /gnyis pa yin te der yang gnyis/ /bsdus la kun de phye ba la/ /? bu drug tu gdon
61b6(rgyud 'grel): byas nas/ /phan yon drug tu rgyud bzhin 'gyur/ /bsdus pa'i man ngag 'di yin te/ /rnam snang che dang rnam snang dang/ /rdo rje sems dpa' mdo gnyis te/ /snying las mtshan rnams thon byas nas/ /sku yi grangs kyis 'jig rten du/ /chags can gti mug can don
61b7(rgyud 'grel): byas/ /'dus te dbyangs nas gsal byed la/ /thim pas 'od kyi 'khor lor 'gyur/ /dbus kyi cha la gnas pa'o/ /shar sogs mi bskyod pa la sogs pa/ /rang rang mtshan gyi gnas skabs su/ /sngags don rigs kyi lhar 'phros te/ /zhe sdang can sogs ?
62a1(rgyud 'grel): byas nas/ /'dus te rang gi 'khor lo ru/ /sngags la 'dus te sngar bzhin no/ /so so rang rang mtshan gyis so/ /dang po'i ming gi sbyor bas so/ /phyin nas sngags ni nus tshad bzlas/ /gal te gtong bar 'dod na yang/ /sngar bzhin mchod bstod
62a2(rgyud 'grel): sngon 'gro bas/ /lhag chad nye ba zhi ba dang/ bzod pa gsol dang gsal ba dang/ /sngar bcings dam tshig phyag rgya dgrol/ /oM khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad/ /rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub gsol/ /sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang/ /
62a3(rgyud 'grel): slar yang 'byon par mdzad par rigs/ /sprul pa'i 'od zer der bsdus la/ /stong pa'i nga rgyal brtan bsgoms nas/ /srung ba dam pa yin par 'dod/ /spyod lam bzhi yi dus su yang/ /'jam pa'i rdo rje'i nga rgyal 'chad/ /yid la yang ni sbyar bar
62a4(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /snying po'i ting 'dzin sbyar ba'o/ /de ltar bsnyen pa byas nas ni/ /gang 'dod las ni rdzogs 'dod pas/ /dkyil 'khor la sogs las rnams bya/ /grong la sogs pa'i phyogs bdun ni/ /rnal 'byor pa yis spang bar bya/ /yon tan kun dang
62a5(rgyud 'grel): yongs ldan pa'i/ /byan shar mtshams ni yongs su bzung/ /sems la nus pa dang ldan na/ /gang du yid dang mthun par bya/ /mngon par 'dod pa'i sa phyogs su/ /drag dang zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gis/ /sa ni sbyang ba 'grub par bya/ /gyo mo bsreg ma
62a6(rgyud 'grel): thal ba dang/ /rus pa phub ma la sogs 'grub/ /bsal bas gnod pa med par 'gyur/ /dbus su sa ni brkos byas la/ /dag pa'i chu yis bkan byas la/ /me tog dkar pos bkang byas la/ /shar du goms pa brgya phyin nas/ /log ste dngos
62a7(rgyud 'grel): grub rtag par bya/ /de nas maN+Dal sngon 'gro bas/ /bruM ser las byung lha mo la/ /bslang ba gzhung dang mthun par bya/ /sa yi dbus su ting 'dzin gsum/ /snga ma bzhin du bsgom bya ste/ /'on kyang khyad par dbye ba yod/ /rten gyi 'khor lo rdzogs
62b1(rgyud 'grel): byas nas/ /deng dus bdag tshe 'bras bu yod/ /bdag gi gson pa 'bras bu yod/ /lha dang dam tshig mnyam 'gyur bar/ /gyur par bdag nyid som nyid med/ /byang chub sems dang sems gcig pas/ /mi log par ni bdag gyur te/ /de bzhin gshegs
62b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rigs ni/ /deng bdag skye ba the tshom med/ /der bdag nyi mar pa ste/ /sangs rgyas thams cad spyan 'dren pas/ /deng bdag 'dus pa'i mchog yin no/ /spos snod lag tu thogs nas ni/ /ma lus phyogs na bzhugs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dgongs su gsol/ /bdag ming
62b3(rgyud 'grel): 'di zhes bgyi ba ni/ /sangs rgyas thams cad spyan 'dren pas/ /deng 'dir sangs rgyas kun gshegs te/ /dngos grub 'di ni stsal du gsol/ /de nas ting 'dzin gsum pa ni/ /snga ma bzhin du shes par bya/ /de nas gtso bo'i sbyor ldan pas/ /lag na rdo rje la sogs
62b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i/ nga rgyal 'dzin pas sngar bzhin bstod/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor lo che/ /sprul pa'i 'khor lo sna tshogs 'chang/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /dkyil 'khor chen po bshad du gsol/ de ltar bstod pa'i tshig gsan nas/ /phyogs rnams kun tu phyag
62b5(rgyud 'grel): byas nas/ /nga ni rang nyid rdo rje can/ /'jam pa'i rdo rje bdag rang gis/ /nga ni sangs rgyas rgyal po che/ /stobs chen sangs rgyas kun bdag nyid/ /bdag po rdo rje chen po'i bdag /byin gyis brlab pa mi 'dor ro/ /mig dang rkang pa byin brlabs nas/ /dkyil 'khor
62b6(rgyud 'grel): steng du bdag byas la/ /dengs shig ces ni brjod byas la/ /g.yas brkyang la sogs 'dug stangs kyis/ /bgegs kyi tshogs ni gzhom par bya/ /de nas phur bus gdab pa yi/ /'og gi bgegs ni bzlog par 'gyur/ /de nas sbyang? nul byas nas ni/ /spos
62b7(rgyud 'grel): kyi dkyil 'khyor bya ba ni/ /bdag po'i gnas su gru bzhi ste/ /lhag ma'i gnas su zlum po ru/ /rang rang gi ni snying po'am/ sku yi gsang sngags zlos pas so/ /de nas bum pa byas par yang/ /rnam par rgyal ba la sogs pa/ /rtsa ba nag por ri med/ /
63a1(rgyud 'grel): rang gi mtshan mas mtshan bcas pa'o/ /'bras chags lcug mas kha brgyan nas/ /ras zung gis ni mgul ba bcings/ /'bru sna rin chen sna lnga dang/ /snying po lnga dang ldan par bya/ /dri zhim chu yis rab bkang la/ /steng du mchod yon chu
63a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhag la/ /rang gi chos kyi sa bon las/ /rang gi lha ru rtags nas ni/ /bsdu dang bstod dang dgug pa dang/ /rgyas gdab la sogs sngar bzhin bya/ /de nas dam tshig phyag rgya yis/ /gzung ste sku yi sngags bzlas la/ /mchod yon phul la gnas su bzhag/
63a3(rgyud 'grel): lag bzangs zhus pa'i rgyud gsungs pa'i/ /tshogs gtor ma sbyin par bya/ /'og nas 'byung ba'i cho gas yis/ /sbyin sreg gis ni mnyes par bya/ /gson pa'i slob ma'ang lha gnas bya/ /'khor bzhi rnams kyi nang nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor cho gas rjes gzung
63a4(rgyud 'grel): bas/ /rang la bslab par shin tu ldan/ /theg pa che la rab tu mos/ /blo dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor gzhug /gzhan dag rjes su gzung mi bya/ /de nas slob mas phyag bya te/ /dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa ste/ /slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol/
63a5(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' tshul bstan pa/ /mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo/ /dam tshig de nyid gsal du gsol/ /sdom pa rnams kyang bdag la gsol/ /thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu/ /mgon pos bdag ni gzhug par mdzod/ /khu tshur theg pa chen po yi
63a6(rgyud 'grel): tshul chen snod ni khyod yin te/ /gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul gyi mchog /khyod la yang dag bstan par bya/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs dang/ /de bzhin gang dag ma byon dang/ /da ltar byung ba'i rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /'gro la phan phyir bzhugs
63a7(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams/ /de dag kun gyi gsang sngags kyi/ /cho ga bzang po 'di mkhyen nas/ /dpa' bos byang chub shing drung du/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i mtshan med pa brnyes/ /skyob pa 'jam pa'i rdo rje yis/ /bdud sde shin tu mi bzad pa/ /dpung chen dag kyang de yis
63b1(rgyud 'grel): bcom/ /de phyir kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir/ /bu yi blo gros 'di gyis shig /de nas slob mas brjod bya ba/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /don mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi/ /sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags/ /bsod nams kun la rjes yi
63b2(rgyud 'grel): rang/ /byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed bgyi/ /sems can thams cad mgron du gnyer/ /'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas 'grub par shog /sa ma ya a/ su ra tastwaM sa ma ya ho/ /badzra satwa ya thA su kham/ snying kha la sogs par byin gyis brlab/ /a shwa tha la sogs
63b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i shing/ /sor ni bcu gnyis me tog bcas/ /byin nas kha dang so yang brud/ /rtse nas bcas te dor ba dang/ /hub gsum chu yang sbyin par bya/ /dpung pa g.yon par srung skud bcing/ /ku sha byin la rmi lam brtag /nga la nang par smros zhes bsgo/ /'jig
63b4(rgyud 'grel): rten na ni kun mkhyen rnams/ /u duM wa ra'i me tog bzhin/ /brgya lam na ni res 'ga' zhig /'byung 'gyur yang ni mi 'byung ngo/ /gsang sngags kyi ni tshul 'byung ba/ /de bas kyang ni dkon pa ste/ /gang gi mnyam med sems can don/ mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus
63b5(rgyud 'grel): gang dag spyod pa'i mchog 'di lam/ /blo gros shin tu mi g.yo bas/ /de dag kun ni 'khor ba'i rgyun/ /sdug bsngal kun 'byung bden pa bcas/ /bdag nyid chen po khyed rnams kyis/ /rnyed pa mnyam med de ring rnyed/ /gang gis sangs rgyas sras bcas pa'i/ /
63b6(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid chen po kun gyis ni/ /bstan pa 'di la khyed rnams kun/ /yong su bzung nas skyob bzhin bar/ /sad ni rab tu 'dod bcas nas/ /theg pa chen po cher 'byung ba'i/ /lam mchog 'di ni dpal dang ldan/ /khyed rnams 'di ni 'dod pas na/ /rang
63b7(rgyud 'grel): byung skal pa che po la/ /'jig rten thams cad mkhyen pa yi/ /de bzhin gshegs par gyur pa yin/ /zhes bstan par bya'o/ /snyan gsan dbab pa brgyad bzhin bya/ /tho rangs dus su langs nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor steng du sngar bzhin bzhag /
64a1(rgyud 'grel): sku yi gsang sngags bzlas pa yis/ /dri yis dkyil 'khor byugs byas la/ /sar pa legs par bsgril ba la/ /kha dog lnga ni legs gyur nas/ /ye shes lnga las sangs rgyas lngar/ /byin gyis brlab pa byas nas ni
64a2(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan dkyil 'khor thig gdab phyir/ /rdo rje thig ni bdag la gsol/ /btang ba bsdus te bkang ba ni/ /legs par bsgril te mchod cing bzlas/ /sgrub pa'i grogs kyis lag gtad la/ /dkyil 'khor brtags te tshad gcal nas/ /phyi
64a3(rgyud 'grel): nas thig ni gdab par bya/ /nub nas shar du tshangs thig gdab/ /lho nas byang duAng de bzhin no/ /byang dang lho dang shar nub dang/ /rlung dang dbang ldan phyogs bltas nas/ /dbang po chu dang nor gshin rje/ /zur thig gnyis dang gdab byas nas
64a4(rgyud 'grel): ngos bzhin dkyil 'khor bzhin du 'gyur/ /so so'ang cha chen bcu drug tu/ /so sor rnam par phye par bya/ /dbang po phyogs nas btsal bya ste/ /cha dang po'i mdza' gnyis nas/ /bzhi cha gnyis ni gdab par bya/ /gnyis pa mnyam po bzhi ru'o
64a5(rgyud 'grel): gsum pa phyed kyi phyed ma gnyis/ /bzhi pa dang po'i tshad dang mtshungs/ /cha ni bcu gsum dag tu 'gyur/ /gdugs dang 'khor lo pad+ma dang/ /rim pa bzhi dang nam mkha' brgyad/ /dgu dang bcu gcig bcu gsum pa/ /de gsum lnga lngar bgo bar bya/ /yang phugs
64a6(rgyud 'grel): ? dang logs su 'gyur/ /de kun ring thung cha gnyis pa/ /bcu dang bcu gnyis gnyis pa ni/ /logs su gcig 'das gcig gis ni/ /bzhi cha logs te de yang yin/ /cha phyed 'das ni phyed kyi phyed/ /nang ma sngar byas khyung du 'dod/ /de'i nang
64a7(rgyud 'grel): du cha chen lha rnams yang/ /cha phyed gnyis byas phyi ma la/ /mdza' gnyis nas ni bzhi cha gdab/ /gdugs dang pad+ma 'khor lo'o/ /gnyis pa'i nang ma bzhin du bya/ /skas la sogs pa lta bur 'gyur/ /de'i nang gi cha chen po/ /de yang gnyis su byas
64b1(rgyud 'grel): nas su/ /phyi ma gnyis byas de yi nang/ /sngar byas ya phugs yin par 'dod/ /nang gi cha chen de yi ni/ /bzhi cha gnyis su byas pa la/ /mdza' gnyis dag tu byas pa yang/ /lnga char byas pas 'gram dang ni/ /ngos su gyur te de kun yang/ /cha gnyis nas ni
64b2(rgyud 'grel): ring ba med/ /khyud dang logs ni rang gi tshad/ /phyi las lpags pas nang gi tshad/ /phyed tshad gnyis kyis bzhi cher 'gyur/ /phyogs gsum yang ni des shes bya/ /kun gyi thun mong yin par 'dod/ /nang gi dkyil 'khor dbye bar yang/ /bsdus pas
