64b3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis te dbye ba drug /mkhas pa so sor shes byas te/ /bsdus bas 'dod ba brtsam par bya/ /sa chen rnam par bzhir gnas pa'i/ /re re'ang bzhi bzhir byas nas ni/ /tshangs pa'i thig las logs re ru/ /drug pa spyi'i ka bar 'gyur/ /bcu bcu nas
64b4(rgyud 'grel): ni mchog rnams 'dod/ /cha phyed pas ni zlum thig gis/ /bskor te cha phyed phyir bor ba'i/ /cha phyed par ni bskor byas pas/ /nang gi mu khyud dag tu 'gyur/ /dbus dang phyogs bzhi brgyad rnams ni/ /gnyis gnyis su ni byas pa yis/ /bcu drug dag
64b5(rgyud 'grel): tu 'gyur ba yi/ /dkyil 'khor lnga po kun gyi ni/ /rta bar sa sgo la sogs pa yang/ /phye bzhin te de der shes bya/ /kun gyi phrad gnas lugs dang ni/ /rdo rje dbyings dang khams te rgyal/ don grub 'gro 'dul las kyi rigs/ /de nyid 'dus pa rgyud kyi rtse/ 'di ru bya zhes
64b6(rgyud 'grel): mkhas pas 'dod/ /yang na thun mong min pa ste/ /'khor lo rtsibs brgyad lta bar bcas/ /ka ba brgyad dang rtsibs rten bcas/ /de phyir rim rtsibs bcu drug /rtsibs rnams rten dang bcas par bri/ /zur brgyad dkyil 'khor rnams dang ni/ /lha'i snam bu'i phyogs
64b7(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du/ /'khor lo'i rtsibs dang rtsibs rten dang/ /lte bar bca' ba'i thig gdab bya/ /phyir yang rdo rje me 'od bskor/ /so sor phye ba'i dkyil 'khor yang/ /sngar bzhin rnam pa gnyis shes bya/ /thig gdab pa'i rim pa'o/ /de nas tshon gyi las bshad de/
65a1(rgyud 'grel): sngo ser dmar po ljang gu dang/ /dkar po rnam pa rim bzhin du/ /hUM traM trI(rgyud 'grel): a A las ni/ /mi bskyod ri dbang tshe dpag med/ /gdon mi za dang rtag pa bskyed/ /mig gi ldan pa'i lcags kyu yis/ /rang bzhin gnas pa kun nas ni/
65a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dres pas ro gcig gyur bsams nas/ /bzlas pa bya ste dge ba rtsam/ /dang por rdo rje slob dpon gyis/ /g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis/ /dbang ldan mtshams nas brtsams par dgye/ /phyi nas kun tu slob mas so/ /shar phyogs su ni sngon po che/ /lho ni ser dang
65a3(rgyud 'grel): yang dag ldan/ /nub ni pad+ma rA ga ste/ /byang du ljang gu yin par 'dod/ /dbus kyi sa yi cha gnyis ni/ /shel ltar dkar ba bla na med/ /sngon po rdo rje rtse rang bzhin/ /gnyis pa gser la dmigs pa ste/ /pad+ma chags pa'i ngo bo bzhin/ /de bzhin gzhan
65a4(rgyud 'grel): ni mar gad de/ /dkar po nang du shes bya ste/ /'di ni tshon gyi rim par grags/ /de nas lha rnams dkod pa yang/ /dkyil 'khor lnga'i dbus su ni/ /rnam par snang mdzad rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya 'dzin/ /seng ge yi ni gdan la bzhugs
65a5(rgyud 'grel): yang na dbus ma dang po la/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dgod par bya/ /rdo rje dril bu yang dag 'khyud/ /yang na rnam snang chen po'o/ /lnga po kun gyi shar phyogs su/ /mi bskyod glang po la gnas shing/ /bdud 'dul rdo rje bsnams shing bsngo/ /kun gyi lho yi phyogs su ni//
65a6(rgyud 'grel): rin chen dbang gi rta la bcibs/ mchog sbyin rin chen bsnams shing ser/ /dkyil 'khor kun gyi nub phyogs su/ /tshe dpag med pa rma bya bcibs/ /ting 'dzin pad+ma bsnams shing dmar/ /lnga po kun gyi byang phyogs su/ /gdon mi za ba mkha' lding bcibs/ /
65a7(rgyud 'grel): skyabs mdzad sna tshogs bsnams shing ljang/ /rdo rje 'degs pa sngon 'gro bas/ /snying po brjod cing bri bar bya/ /de nyid 'dus pa'i rjes 'brangs nas/ /lnga la rang gi 'khor gyis bskor/ /yang na 'khor lo'i rtsibs bcu drug /rigs kyi mdog ltar dgod
65b1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i bya/ rdo rje sems ma rin chen chos/ /las mchog mas te dpal ldan ma/ /mtshams kyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs la dgod/ /bzhi'i mtshams bzhi po las ni/ /me mtshams 'khor lo'i rtsibs lnga ni/ /shar sngo lho ser nub dmar zhing/ /byang du ljang zhing
65b2(rgyud 'grel): dbus dkar la/ /rigs lnga'i sgeg mo rnam lnga ni/ /dbus su de bzhin gshegs rigs dkar/ /rdo rje shar du sngon po ste/ /lho ru rin chen ser mo ste/ /nub tu pad+ma dmar mo ste/ /byang du las ma ljang ba ste/ /de bzhin lho nub phreng ba dang/ /nub byang
65b3(rgyud 'grel): glu ma dbang ldan du/ /las ma la sogs de bzhin no/ /phyi yi lha rnams mtshams su ni/ /bdug pa la sogs de bzhin dgod/ /byams pa yang ni rigs lnga'i lha/ /'khor lo lag na de bzhin te/ /rigs kyi mdog gis dbye bar bya/ /'khor dang
65b4(rgyud 'grel): gtso bo phyogs sogs ni/ /lA sye la sogs bshad pa bzhin/ /bskal bzang gzhan yang de bzhin no/ /sgo rnams kun gyi nang du yang/ /sgo srung bzhi yang lnga lnga ru/ /gtso bo 'khor yang sngar bzhin brtag /phyag mtshan la sogs dbye ba ni/ /rgyud
65b5(rgyud 'grel): las ji skad gsung bzhin bya/ /'khor lo bcu tshan gsum dang gsum/ /brgyad dang brgyad cu rtsa lnga ru/ /mkhas pas bsgrims te dri bar bya/ /de ltar phyag rgya chen po 'am/ /yang na lag pa'i phyag rgyar bcas/ /yang na mtshan ma dgod pa 'am/ /
65b6(rgyud 'grel): / /yang na yi ge dgod pa 'am/ /yang na gdan gyi mtshan ma 'am/ /gal te 'byor pa med na yang/ /phyag rgyas yongs su bsgrubs te bsam/ /dkyil 'khor mdun du brtag pa'o/ /so sor phye
65b7(rgyud 'grel): la'ang de bzhin de/ /rang rang gi ni dkyil 'khor bzhin/ /de nas phyi dro'i thun dus su/ /khrus dang rgyan ni rab rdzogs pas/ /rdo rje dril bu rab bskul bas/ /dkyil 'khor lan bdun bskor byas pas/ /lhag par gang yin 'dor bar 'gyur/ /mkhas pas ma
66a1(rgyud 'grel): tshad yongs skong mdzad/ /'grub 'gyur smad par mi bya'o/ /lcags kyu la sogs rnal 'byor gyis /steng du bteg pa dgug pa dang/ /gzhug cing dbang du bya'o/ /de nas bum pa bya ba yang/ /rtsa ba nag po rab rib med/ /
66a2(rgyud 'grel): mgrin par ras mchog gis brgyan pa/ /'bru sna rin chen sna lnga dang/ /snying po lnga dang ldan par byas/ /dri zhim chu yis yongs bkang ba/ /bsgrubs te rang gi gnas su dbul/ /de nas dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /ting 'dzin gsum po sngon bzhin
66a3(rgyud 'grel): sgom/ /ye shes sems dpa' i nga rgyal gyis/ /mchod pa nyid dang gtor ma dang/ /sbyin sreg ci nus pa yis mchod/ /bdag nyid 'jug pa'i cho ga yang/ /slob ma 'jug pa'i tshul gyis bya/ /de nas slob ma 'jug pa yang/ /gson dang shi
66a4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i las yin te/ /re shig snang ba nod par bya/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba ni/ /rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub che/ /sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ /slob ma gang yin 'jug par 'tshal/ /de nas slob ma thams cad kyis/ /gson pa zhes bya ba'i
66a5(rgyud 'grel): khyad par ste/ /dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas/ /slob dpon nyid ni bdag la dgongs/ /byang chub sems dpa' i lam bstan pa/ /skyob pa chen po bdag phyag 'tshal/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /skyabs gsum song la bdag skyabs
66a6(rgyud 'grel): mchi/ /thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu/ /mgon pos bdag ni gzhug par 'tshal/ /khu tshur gshegs shig theg chen gyi/ /lam chen snod ni khyod yin te/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang 'das dang/ /de bzhin gang dag ma byon dang/ /de ltar bzhugs
66a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /de dag kun gyi gsang sngags kyi/ /chog bzang po 'di mkhyen na/ /'jig rten spyod pa rjes 'jug phyir/ /'khor lo bskor nas mya ngan 'das/ /de bas kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir/ /bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig /de nas rgyun bshags
66b1(rgyud 'grel): byed du gzhug ste/ /yol ba'i mdza' ru gnas pa las/ /gdod pa gos kyis g.yogs pa yis/ /dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi/ /sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags/ /bsod nams kun la rje yi rang/ /sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis
66b2(rgyud 'grel): gzung/ /byang chub mchog tu sems ni bskyed par bgyi/ /sems can rnams kyi bdag gi mgron du gnyer/ /'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas 'grub par shog /ces brjod du gzhug go /de nas oM su ra ta stwaM sa ma ya stwaM/ ho badzra sid+d+hi ya tha su khaM/ zhes pas
66b3(rgyud 'grel): sems ni bskyed par bya'o/ /de nas che ge zhes bya ba 'di nyid ni/ /byang chub sems ni yongs gzung nas/ /dam tshig mchog dang gsang ba yi/ /'khor lo 'di ni 'jug par 'dod/ /de nas slob ma la sgrags pa/ /sdom pa thams cad dpog pa ni/ /nus
66b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i nyams la sngags te sbyin/ /slob mas yang ni de bzhin gzung/ /deng khyod de bzhin gshegs rigs zhugs/ /tshul 'di gzhan lam brjod cig /gal te smras par gyur pa ni/ /'jam pa'i rgyal po rab khros nas/ /bdun rgyud rigs dang
66b5(rgyud 'grel): bcas par bzlog /de nas 'og tu 'gro bar 'gyur/ /oM badzrod ka chu glud do/ /gal te gsang na dngos grub ni/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi chu yis 'grub/ /de nas brtsams te bu khyod kyi/ /'jam dbyangs rgyal po nga yin gyi/ /brnyas mi bya zhing mnyam
66b6(rgyud 'grel): par bgyi/ /ye shes dag pa dpog pa dang/ /brtan pa'ang gzhug bzhin bya ba ste/ /phreng ba dor dang bcing ba dang/ /gdong g.yogs dgrol zhing dkyil 'khor bstan/ /bla ma brgyud pa shes par bgyi/ /'jug pa rdzogs nas dbang bskur ba//
66b7(rgyud 'grel): lhar bskyed chu dang cod pan dang/ /rdo rje dril bu ming dang ni/ /brtul zhugs rjes gnang gzengs bsod dang/ /lung bstan dbugs dbyung la sogs pa/ /chog mthong bas shes par bya/ /gson po'i las ni yongs rdzogs nas/ /gal te shi la phan
67a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dogs na/ /ro 'am rus pa gos la ni/ /sku phyi sngags kyi btab pa yi/ /chu mchog gis ni dkru dang gtor/ /de nas de la gnas pa yis/ /gnod pa'i bgegs rnams bsal ba ni/ /shin tu khros pa'i 'jam dpal du/ /bdag
67a2(rgyud 'grel): nyid rab tu bsams nas ni/ /gshin rje gshed dam bdud rtsi yis/ /gsang sngags drag por rab bzlas pa'i/ /yungs kar rdo rjer bsams nas ni/ /de la lan gsum rab tu brab/ /de nas de yi bgegs bral la/ /snying kha'i 'dod pa'i rgyal po yis
67a3(rgyud 'grel): bar do'i shes pa dgug par bya/ /a la sogs pa'i sa bon gyis/ /ye shes sems pa rab bskyed la/ /sems bskyed sdom bzung la sogs dang/ /dkyil 'khor du ni gzhug pa rnams/ /gson po'i tshul bzhin byas nas su/ /dbang bskur ba yang
67a4(rgyud 'grel): rim bzhin bya/ /rnam par dag pa de yi ni/ /lte ba snying kha lkog ma dang/ /spyi bo rnams ni rim bzhin du/ /shes rab 'khor lo lhag bya ste/ /lte bar shes rab 'khor lo ni/ /mu khyud bzhi dang rtsibs bcu gnyis mu khyud bzhi la sngags bzhin ni/ /sngar bzhin
67a5(rgyud 'grel): dgod par shes par bya/ /rtsibs la'ang dbyangs yig bcu gnyis te/ /lte bar a yig bsam pa'o/ /snying kha mgrin pa spyi bo yang/ /de bzhin bsam pa byas nas ni/ /spro dang bsdu ba'i 'od kyis ni/ /de'i lus kun khyab par bsam/ /de la sogs
67a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gzugs brten na/ /sbyin sreg tu ni dbul bar bya/ /de yang thab dang dgang gzar blugs gzar rdzas/ /shing dang sgrub pa po dang snod/ /rdzas gsang dgod dang me glang dang/ /bsang gtor dang ni me sbar dang/ /ku sha dgram dang gnas pa

67b1(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /kun bsreg bsang dang lha dgod dang/ /bsdus dang bstod dang dgug pa dang/ /sngon bzhin phyag rgyas dbang bskur dang/ /mchod dang mchod yon 'thor 'thung bas na/ /dgang blugs cig bshos las bskul dang/ /lha rnams gzi byin bskyed pa dang/ /me
67b2(rgyud 'grel): lha dgang blugs mchod yon bcas/ /bsang gtor sogs dang gshegs gsol ba/ /cho ga ji ltar mthong ba yi/ /gang na las kyi cho ga med/ /de ni ci yi cho ga las/ /rgyas pa'i cho ga sngags ngas bstan/ /de shes pa la nyes pa bral/ /de ltar
67b3(rgyud 'grel): byed pa'i slob dpon ni/ /rdo rje 'dzin dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor sngon bzhin mchod pa dang/ /yi ge brgya pa brjod pa dang/ /bzod pa gsol dang bsngo pa dang/ /phyag rgya dgrol ba'i rim pa bya/ /oM khyed kyi sems can don kun mdzad/ /rjes su mthun pa'i
67b4(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub gsol/ /sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang/ /slar yang 'byon par mdzad du gsol/ /oM badzra mu(rgyud 'grel): 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis khyab pa'i/ /bsdus dang rgyas pa'i cho ga ni/ /thun mong thun mong min par sbyar/ /nongs na mkhas rnams
67b5(rgyud 'grel): bzod par mdzes/ /gsang bar 'os pa sba ba'i phyir/ /bsdus dang rgyas pa'i cho ga byas/ /'di las dge ba ci thob pa/ /'gro kun 'jam pa'i dbyangs thob shog /'phags pa 'jam dpal rigs bsdus pa dang/ /phye ba'i cho ga yid bzhin nor bu zhes bya ba/ /slob
67b6(rgyud 'grel): dpon zla bzangs grags pas mdzad pa/ /kha phye'i mkhan po paN+Di ta mahA dz+nyA na dang/ lots+tsha ba dge slong tshul khrims gzhon nus bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la pheb ba rdzogs so// // */ (/'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgrub thabs
67b7(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs so/) /rgya gar skad du/ Arya many+dzu sh+rI nA ma saM gI ti sA d+ha naM nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rang bzhin gyis ni dag pa'i bdag /ngo bo nyid kyis
68a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams sangs rgyas/ /snying po'i don ldan sku yi mchog /dkyil 'khor gtso la phyag 'tshal nas/ /snying po don gyi rgyud nyid las/ /brten nas bdag gi sgrub thabs brtsam/ /de nas sa chen yid 'ong ba'i/ /nags tshal
68a2(rgyud 'grel): shin tu mdzes la sogs/ /dad dang dbang bskur rjes su ldan/ /byams sems ldan pas 'di brtsam mo/ /chos rnams sgyu ma lta bu'i blos/ /khro bo drug gis bsrung bar bya/ /oM badzra rak+Sha kA la rU pa hUM/ oM badzra ya mAn+ta ka hUM zhes bya bas bsrung bar
68a3(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /de nas byams pa'i sems ldan pa'i/ /bde ba'i stan la nyer 'dug nas/ /mdun du dkyil 'khor spyan drangs nas/ /phyag dang mchod pa bya ba ni/ /na mas sarba ta thA ga ta/ badzra d+hu pa pu ja me g+ha sa mu dra spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ na ma(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga ta badzra
68a4(rgyud 'grel): puShpe pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ na ma(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga ta badzra A lo ke pU ja me g+ha sa mu tra spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ na ma(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga ta badzra gand+he pU dza me g+ha sa mu pra spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ na ma(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga ta badzra nai wi ti pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra spha ra Na sa

68b1(rgyud 'grel): lo dang bcas pa'i/ /dbus su seng+ge gti mug gdan/ /shar du glang chen zhe sdang gdan/ /lhor ni rta ste nga rgyal klad na/ /nub tu rma bya chags pa'i gdan/ /byang du shang shang phrag dog gdan/ /lnga ye bdag nyid bcom pa'i gdan/ /zla ba'i gdan dang bcas

68b7(rgyud 'grel): can/ /pad+ma zla ba'i steng na bzhugs/ /brjod pa bral bas mtshan ma med/ /mnyam nyid ye shes mthing ka ste/ /rin chen bsnams pa 'gyid bag can/ /pad+ma zla ba'i steng na bzhugs/ /brjod pa 'byung ba smon pa med/ /so sor kun rtog dmar po ste/

70b4(rgyud 'grel): rol phyin pa'i bdag /mdzes pa'i me tog lha mo ni/ /dkar mo phyag na me tog 'dzin/ /sems dpa' i skyil krung zla ba'i steng/ /thabs kyi shes rab pha rol phyin/ /mdzes pa'i dri yi lha mo ni/ /dmar mo phyag na dri chab bsnams/ /sems dpa' i skyil
70b5(rgyud 'grel): krung zla ba'i steng/ /smon lam gsal ba'i pha rol phyin/ /ro dang ldan pa'i zhal zas ma/ /ljang gu phyag na ro mchog bsnams/ /sems dpa' i skyil krung zla ba'i steng/ /ye shes snying rje chen po yi/ /khros pa'i lha mo lcags kyu ma/ /mthing ka phyag

70b7(rgyud 'grel): khros pas lha mo lcag sgrog ma/ /dmar mo phyag na lcags sgrog bsnams/ /khros pa'i tshul gyis zla ba'i steng/ /ye shes zad med btang snyoms bdag /khros pa'i lha mo dril bu ma/ /ljang gu'i mdog can dril bu ma/ /khros pa'i tshul gyis zla ba'i
71a1(rgyud 'grel): steng/ /dang po'i dbyangs yig rang bzhin las/ /lha rnams de ltar bskyed par bya/ /oM pra kri ta pa ri shud+d+ha sarba d+harmA ya tu ta/ sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na kA ya many+dzu sh+rI pa ri shud+d+ha/ mu pa ta ye ti a zhes spyan drang bar bya'o/ /a A i
71a2(rgyud 'grel): a'i u a'u e i o aau aM a(rgyud 'grel): sti to h+ri dI dz+nyA na murd+hi/ ra haM bud+d+ho bud+d+hA nAM/ trya to warti naM/ oM badzra tik+Sh+Na/ du(rgyud 'grel): khats+tshe da/ pradz+nyA dz+nyA na murd+hi ya/ dz+nyA na ka ya/ wA gi shwa ra a ra pa tsa na ya te na ma/ zhes phyag 'tshal bar bya'o/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya bas
71a3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis su med par bstim par bya'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta h+ri da ya ha ra ha ra/ oM hUM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): b+ha ga wan dz+nyA na murti a zhes bya bas zla ba'i steng du sa bon gsum gyis byin gyi brlab par bya'o/ /a sarba ta thA ga ta h+ri da ya ha ra ha ra/ sarba d+harmA ga ga na/ A mA la su
71a4(rgyud 'grel): pa ri shud+d+ha d+harmA d+hA tu dz+nyA na garb+ha a zhes bya bas dbang bskur te/ rigs rnams kyis mtshan pa'o/ /de nas bsgom pa rab tu brtsam/ /ma yengs gsal bar byas te sgom/ /a ra pa tsa na a zhes bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas mtshan gyi sngags brjod par bya'o/ /
71a5(rgyud 'grel): mtshon rnams bsdus nas gtso bo la zhu ste kun tu zhal rnam par snang mdzad du'o/ /gzhan du ni gtso bo zhu ba dang rjes kyi gtso bo zhu ba'o/ /gti mug can sbyangs nas pradz+nyA dz+nyA na murti a zhes bya bas chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes sems dpa' las byung ba'i skur gsal
71a6(rgyud 'grel): bar byas te mtshan brjod par bya'o/ /zhe sdang can sbyangs nas du(rgyud 'grel): khats+tshe ta zhes bya bas me long lta bu'i ye shes sems dpa' las byung ba'i skur gsal te mtshan brjod par bya'o/ /'dod chags can sbyangs nas/ oM badzra tik+Sh+Na zhes bya bas so sor rtog pa'i ye
71a7(rgyud 'grel): shes sems dpa' las byung skur gsal te mtshan brjod par bya'o/ /nga rgyal can sbyangs nas wA gi shwa ra zhes bya bar mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes sems dpa' las byung ba'i skur gsal te mtshan brjod par bya'o/ /phrag dog can sbyangs nas dz+nyA na kA ya zhes bya
71b1(rgyud 'grel): bas bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes sems dpa' las byung ba'i skur gsal te mtshan brjod par bya'o/ /de ltar longs sku dang sprul sku'i sngags brjod nas bstod pa ni/ /mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog khyod 'dud/ /yang dag mthar gyur khyod la 'dud/ /stong nyid las byung
71b2(rgyud 'grel): khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas byang chub khyod la 'dud/ /ces bya bas stong pa nyid de dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang/ /rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'o/ /yum bzhis chos sku la bstod pa'o/ /sangs rgyas chags pa khyod la 'dud/ /sangs
71b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyas 'dod la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /sangs rgyas dgyes pa khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas rol la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /ces bya bas nang stong pa nyid phyi stong pa nyid dang phyi nang stong pa nyid dang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi sgo nas/ shar phyogs kyi sems dpa' bzhis
71b4(rgyud 'grel): chos sku la bstod pa'o/ /sangs rgyas 'dzum pa khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas bzhad la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /sangs rgyas gsung nyid khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas thugs la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /ces bya bas chen po stong pa nyid dang/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang
71b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid de lho phyogs kyi sems dpas chos sku la bstod pa'o/ /med pa las byung khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba khyod la 'dud/ /nam mkha' las byung khyod la 'dud/ /ye shes las byung khyod las 'dud/
71b6(rgyud 'grel): ces bya bas mdza' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang rang bzhin stong pa nyid de nub phyogs kyi sems dpas chos sku la bstod pa'o/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas rol ston khyod
71b7(rgyud 'grel): la 'dud/ /thams cad thams cad khyod la 'dud/ /ye shes sku nyid khyod la 'dud/ /ces bya bas chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de byang phyogs
72a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi sems dpa' chos sku la bstod pa'o/ /a b+hA wa swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+ha badzra tsakra aM a(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya bas bzlas pa bstan nas gtor ma gtang bar bya'o/ /de nas spyod lam gyis gnas par bya'o/ /bdag gis bla ma'i gdams pa la brten
72a2(rgyud 'grel): nas/ rgyud don dbang po rdo rje'i tshig don sbyar/ /mkha' 'gro'i rjes su 'brangs nas de brtsams pas/ /'gro kun ye shes sems dpa' rtogs par shog /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub thabs/
72a3(rgyud 'grel): u rgyan gyi slob dpon sh+rI a wa d+hu tI ba chen pos mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harmA sh+rI mi tra dang/ bod kyi lots+tsha ba dge slong chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o// //*/ (/'jam dpal gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga
72a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs so/) /rgya gar skad du/ Arya many+dzu sh+rI maN+Da la bi d+hi kri ta/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga /'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyab pa'i bdag po ye shes sku/ /de bzhin nyid bdag dri med pa'i/ /tshig
72a5(rgyud 'grel): la smra mkhas brjod pa'i gsung/ /khyab bdag sku lnga la bstod te/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi lam/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor bshad/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yis/ /dad ldan thos pa la brtson dang/ /dbang thob snang ba sbyin
72a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyir/ /dben pa'i gnas kyi bar chad bsal/ /byams sems ldan pas bsnyen pa brtsam/ /slob mas thal mo sbyar byas nas/ /maN+Dal me tog bcas phul nas/ /bdag ni mi shes rang bzhin gyis/ /lam gyi dam pa bstan du gsol/ /gsol
72a7(rgyud 'grel): btab gnang sbyin ched du ni/ /rdzas rnams la sogs gnang ba sbyin/ /byams ldan bsnyen pa la 'jug bya/ /gtso bo la 'bum gzhan la khri/ /oM badzra tik+Sh+NA du(rgyud 'grel): khats+tshe da/ pradz+nyA dz+nyA na murta ya/ dz+nyA na kA ya/ wa gi shwa ra/ a ra pa tsa na hUM d+hi/ phyogs
72b1(rgyud 'grel): skyong rnams la gtor ma gtang/ /bsod nams bsags pas sbyin sreg bya'o/ /sngon du bsnyen pa'i mtshan byung nas/ /dkyil 'khor bri ba'i las brtsam bya/ /dang po sangs rgyas skur langs la/ /lha mnyes sa bslabs brtag dang/ /nag tshal spang
72b2(rgyud 'grel): ljongs nyams dga' i gnas/ /sngar byas rang yid dga' bar brtsam/ /dri zhim chus gtor me tog dgram/ /de ltar sa brtag de ru ni/ /mchod pa lnga yis lha mo mchod/ /skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par
72b3(rgyud 'grel): gyis/ sa dang pha rol phyin pa la/ /lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur/ /skyob pa shAkya seng ge yis/ /bdud kyi sde rnams bcom pa ltar/ /de ltar bdag yis bdud kyi sde/ /pham par bya phyir dkyil 'khor bri/ /lan gsum brjod
72b4(rgyud 'grel): bas sa la thim/ /de yi rtags ni shar la sogs/ /mtho dman rtags kyis brtag par bya/ /brko ba lto 'phye lto bar brko/ /dri yi chu yis spangs la bzhag /de nas lag mthil ltar mnyam bya/ /lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas/ /sa gzhi rdo rje'i rang
72b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin bsam/ /logs dang steng yang de bzhin no/ /bdag ni dkyil 'khor lha mchod pas/ /lha rnams khyed ni dpang du gyur/ /bdag gzhan sgrib pa sbyang ba'i phyir/ /rin chen sna tshogs dkyil 'khor bri/ /de nas dbu rgyan stod g.yogs dang brgyan
72b6(rgyud 'grel): bgos nas rdo rje dril bu thogs nas/ /oM badzra d+hu pe A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ oM badzra puShpe A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ oM badzra A lo ke A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ oM badzra g+hand+he A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ oM badzra nai wa te A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ zhes mchod pa lngas mchod sbrul ba'i dkyil 'khor la bstod pa/ /sgyu ma sprul ba
72b7(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid kyis/ /'ja' tshon lta bur so sor gsal/ /thabs dang shes rab sku mnga' ba'i/ /dkyil 'khor ldan pa phyag 'tshal bstod/ /khong nas 'byung ba shes rab thabs/ /shes rab dkyil 'khor bshad du gsol/ /nyon mongs dug
73a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams sel mdzad pa'i/ /thabs kyi dkyil 'khor bshad du gsol/ oM pradz+nyA maN+Dal pra b+he sha /oM u pa maN+Dal pra b+he sha /de nas phyogs bcu khro bos bsrung/ /bka' bgo stang stabs bya bar bshad/ /gur dang bla re la
73a2(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa/ /rak+Sha'i sngags kyis bsrung bar bya'o/ ba yi rnam pa lngas byugs te/ de ni dri'i thig le dang/ /me tog tshom bu dgram par bya/ /tshogs gsag stong nyid bsgoms nas ni/ /b+h+ruM las gzhal yas as lha bskyed/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): sa dgug
73a3(rgyud 'grel): gzhug bya/ /'di ltar sangs rgyas skyed byed yum/ /khod nas 'byung ba skye med bdag /smra bsam brjod med spros bral yum/ /gsang ba'i yum la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /mchod pa chen po gti mug che/ /gti mug ma lus 'joms mdzad pa/ /ma
73a4(rgyud 'grel): rig sdu bas? 'byed 'khor lo 'dzin/ /rnam par snang mdzad phyag 'tshal bstod/ /mchod pa chen po zhe sdang che/ /zhe sdang ma lus 'joms mdzad cing/ /'khregs shing rdo rje chen po 'chang/ /rdo rje sems dpa' phyag 'tshal bstod/ /mchod pa chen po nga rgyal?
73a5(rgyud 'grel): che/ nga rgyal ma lus 'dul mdzad pa/ yid bzhin nor bu chen por 'dzin/ /rin chen 'byung ldan phyag 'tshal bstod/ mchod pa chen po 'dod chags che/ /'dod chags ma lus 'joms mdzad pa/ /sprin dkar dag bzhin pad+ma bsnams/ /snang ba mdza' yas
73a6(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal bstod/ mchod pa chen po phrag dog che/ /phrag dog ma lus 'joms mdzad pa/ /srid pa'i ri bo chen po 'joms/ /phyag 'tshal don yod grub la bstod/ /dang po sangs rgyas rgyu med cing/ /gdod lnga gtsug phud lnga dang ldan/ /glegs
73a7(rgyud 'grel): bam ral gri phyag na bsnams/ /dang po'i sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal bstod/ /shes rab ral gri mda' gzhu thogs/ /nyon mongs mi shes g.yul ngo sal/ /dpa' bo bdud dgra bdud 'dul ba/ /shes rab 'khor lo phyag 'tshal bstod/ /ye shes sems
73b1(rgyud 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' che/ /ye shes gnyis med gzugs 'chang ba/ ye shes dbang bskur cod pan can/ /ye shes sems dpa' phyag 'tshal bstod/ /'dod pa chen po bde chen ldan/ /dga' pa don ldan mgu bar byed/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i mdza' /
73b2(rgyud 'grel): shes rab sems dpa' bcu drug bstod/ /sbyin pa'i bdag nyid sgeg mo la/ /tshul khrims bdag nyid phreng ba ma/ /bzod pa brtson 'grus glu gar ma/ lha mo bzhi la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /shes rab mar me bsam gtan dri/ /thabs ldan me tog smon lam ro//
73b3(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal lha mo bzhi la bstod/ /sems can don la rab brtson pa'i/ /snying rje chen po blo mchog ldan/ /byams pa la sogs thabs kyi bdag /thabs kyi sems dpa' bcu drug bstod/ /stobs ldan lcags kyu zhags pa ma/ /ye shes lcags sgrog dril
73b4(rgyud 'grel): bu ma/ /thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid kyi/ /sgom bzhi la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /de nas sgrub pa'i las brtsams nas/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor lha rnams kun/ /ma lus bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /sems can kun gyi don sgrub phyir/ /sang ni dkyil
73b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bri bar 'chal/ /thal sbyar pus gtsugs dril bu gsil/ /spos thogs de ltar gsol ba gdab/ /de nas sgrub pa byas nas ni/ /gsol ba btab pa sngon song nas/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor mkha' la bdeg /nyi zla bar du mkha' la bdeg /de nas
73b6(rgyud 'grel): slob ma gzung bar bya/ /dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas/ /slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol/ /byang chub sems dpa' i tshul bstan pa'i/ /mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo/ /dam tshig de ni stsal du gsol/ /byang chub sems ni bskyed pa dang/ /
73b7(rgyud 'grel): dkon mchog gtso 'khor bcas pa dang/ /skyabs dang grong mchog 'jug par 'tshal/ /bu tshur lam chen 'dir zhugs pa'i/ /bu tshur theg chen rten yin te/ sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di/ /khyod la yang dag bshad par bya/ /lam 'di la ni
74a1(rgyud 'grel): brten nas ni/ /'das dang ma byon da lta rnams/ /byang chub shing gi gdan drung du/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i 'bras bu thob/ /bdud sde dag kyang 'di yi bcom/ /de bas 'bras bu thob bya'i phyir/ /bu yis lam 'di sgrub par bgyis/ /dkyil
74a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lnga dang dkon mchog gsum/ /dus ni rtag tu skyabs su mchi/ /dpa' bo dpa' mo slob dpon la/ /dus ni rtag tu skyabs su mchi/ /bla med dkon mchog dkyil 'khor lha/ /thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /bdag dus 'di nas gzung byas
74a3(rgyud 'grel): te/ /tshangs spyod dam tshig sdom pa gzung/ /phyogs bcu nam mkha' i khams bzhugs pa'i/ /bla ma slob dpon yi dam lha/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang/ /dam chos rnams la bdag sdig bshags/ /bla ma yi dam sangs rgyas dang/
74a4(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor chos dang dge 'dun gyis/ /yon tan yongs su rdzogs rnams la/ /de la bdag ni yi rang ngo/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang/ bde gshegs mya ngan mi 'da' bzhugs/ /phyogs bcu'i bla ma yi dam lha/ /dkyil 'khor gtso
74a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bcas pa dang/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la/ /snying po byang chub mchis bar du/ /di ring nyid du skyabs su mchi/ /bdag ni deng dus gzung du gsol/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis/ /byang chub tu ni sems bskyed ltar/ /de bzhin
74a6(rgyud 'grel): sems can phan don du/ /bdag gis byang chub sems bskyed do/ /sangs rgyas bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang/ /bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum/ /rnal 'byor sangs rgyas sdom pa bzung/ /rdo rje rin chen khyad par
74a7(rgyud 'grel): gyi/ /rdo rje dril bu'i sdom pa gzung/ /thabs dang shes rab bsam pas ni/ /slob dpon nyid du sdom pa gzung/ /rin chen 'dzin pa chen po yi/ /yid du 'ong ba'i dam tshig la/ /nyin re bzhin du dus drug tu/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi sbyin par bya/ /pad+ma 'dzin pa
74b1(rgyud 'grel): chen po yis/ /thabs dang shes rab las byung ba'i/ /phyir nang gsang ba'i theg pa yis/ /dam pa'i chos kyi sdom pa gzung/ /phrin las 'dzin pa chen po yi/ /tshul khrims sum ldan bya ba dang/ /rgya che gzhan gyi don gyi phyir/ /bdag gis sdom pa gzung bar bya/ /
74b2(rgyud 'grel): de ltar sdom par bzung nas/ /slob ma bsrung bar rab tu bya/ /'bru gsum sngags kyis rab bsrungs nas/ /gnas gsum byin brlabs rab brtan nas/ /mchod pas slob ma bstan phyir mchod/ /de nas maN+Dal ba ko tsam/ /bshams nas so shing dor bya ni/ /
74b3(rgyud 'grel): utpal pad+ma dri zhim ni/ /sor ni bcu gnyis 'bus ma zos/ /dri dang me tog shin tu bcings/ /shar bltas mi g.yo steng du dor/ /bcas zin nas ni mi g.yo dor/ /steng ltas mchog thob phyogs su ni/ /so so'i phrin las mtshams su ni/ /dngos grub tha ma 'og
74b4(rgyud 'grel): gi 'og /de nas dri ma dag pa'i phyir/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na kA ya bA gi shwa ra/ mahA pa tsa/ bi sho d+ha sarba pA paM rU pa tsit+ta bagA pa ya na hUM/ bzlas pa'i chu yis lus ngag yid/ /so so dag phyir hub gsum btung/ /de nas rgyud ni sbyang pa'i phyir/ /dar dang mi
74b5(rgyud 'grel): lus thob pa dang/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba shin tu dkon/ /me tog u dum wa ra bzhin/ /lam bzang rnyed pa de bas kyang/ /shin tu sdig pa zad byed pa/ /dkyil 'khor dbang ni thob par dka' / /dbang ldan nus pa thob dka' o/ /de nas oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM:
74b6(rgyud 'grel): Ni ba shud+d+ha hUM/ sarba pA paM bi shud+d+ha hUM/ ku sha'i byin brlabs sdus su gzhug /ldang ba'i stabs kyi rmi lam gdab/ /oM ya mAn+ta ka hUM/ oM kA la rU pa hUM/ gnyis kyis srung ba'i skud pa bya/ /byin brlabs srog gnas nyid du gdags/ /de nas gtor ma
74b7(rgyud 'grel): btang byas nas/ /slob ma so so'i? nyal thabs nyal/ /rmi lam brtags ni so sor brtag /rtags bzang spro ba ngan na ni/ /sbyin sreg gzhan gyi sdig pa sbyad/ /slob dpon dkyil 'khor nang bzhugs te/ /slob ma sta gon la gnas pa'o/ /de nas rin chen
75a1(rgyud 'grel): lnga las byas/ /bum pa kha dog dkar po ste/ pad steng so so'i mtshan ma bkod/ /mgul mchings kha dog so sor bcings/ /'bru dang rin chen lnga dang ni/ /snying po lnga dang spos lnga blug /'bras bu can gyi kha rgyan shing//
75a2(rgyud 'grel): sbyangs nas de nas dgram par bya/ /lha grangs mthun pa'i bum pa dgram/ /bi shud+d+ha'i sngags kyis sbyang/ /b+h+ruM las rin chen bum pa bskyed/ /nang du so so'i lha rnams bsam/ /dgug gzhug la sogs rdzogs pa dang/ mchod nas bstod cing 'dud
75a3(rgyud 'grel): gyi bstod/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ sarba ta thA ga ta h+ri da ya/ ha ra ha ra/ oM hUM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): b+ha ga wAM/ dz+nyA na murti ra haM bud+d+ho bud+d+hA nAM/ wA gI shwa ra/ ma hA pa tsa/ sarba d+harmA/ ga ga na/ a ma la su pa ri shud+d+ha/ d+harma d+hA tu dz+nyA na garba a(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra tik+Sh+Na A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ oM du(rgyud 'grel): khats+tshe
75a4(rgyud 'grel): da A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ oM pradz+nyA dz+nyA na murta ya A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ oM wA gi shwa ra A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ oM dz+nyA na kA ya A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ a ra pa tsa na A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ zhes pas ni rigs so so dang tha mas ni las thams cad pa byin gyis brlab bo/ /de ltar sgrub pa'i dus su maN+Dal byas la/ me tog go
75a5(rgyud 'grel): rim so sor dgram/ /mar me mchod pa so so'i grangs/ /zin nas ras kyi steng du bzhag /de nas dkyil 'khor las byas te/ /dang por thig gi las bya'o/ /sar pa tshad dang mtshan nyid ldan/ /dri zhim chu dang snod du bzhag /bdag nyid shar du 'dug
75a6(rgyud 'grel): nas ni/ /thig ni ye shes lnga ru bskyed/ /phyogs bcu'i ye shes lnga ru bstim/ /oM a ra pa tsa na ma ti kra ma hUM zhes brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so/ /de nas oM a h+ri zhes bya bas sum sgril du'o/ /de nas slob mas blangs la dang po gdab pa'o/ /sa'i thig gdab
75a7(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon nub/ /slob ma shar 'dug tshangs thig gdab/ /slob ma lhor 'dug slob dpon byang/ /slob dpon shar lho lho nub ste/ /de bzhin logs thig gdab par bya/ /zur thig de nas cha chen gdab/ /de nas cha chung bcu drug gdab/ /de nas phyi dang nang
75b1(rgyud 'grel): du dbyed/ /nang du bcu drug de bzhin dbye/ /phyi dang de bzhin cha yi dbye/ /cha rnams dbye bas sgo brgyan te/ nang gi phyed cha pho brang ste/ tshom bu lnga ldan pad 'dab bzhi/ /de ltar thig ni so sor gdab/ /ye shes skud pa mchod pa ni/ /ye shes gshegs
75b2(rgyud 'grel): la dam tshig bsdu/ /de nas rdul tshon dgye ba ni/ /rin chen lnga'i phye ma 'am/ /yang na 'bras kyi phye mas bri/ /kha dog so sor bkram nas ni/ /oM hUM swa a ha go rims su/ /ma dag bshig nas dag pa bskyed/ /ye shes lnga ni spyan drangs bstim/
75b3(rgyud 'grel): oM a ra pa tsa na sa ma yastwaM/ zhes lan bdun bzlas nas ni/ /de nas tshon rtsi rim bzhin du/ /dbus nas brtsams te bri bar bya/ /sgo ni shar nas dbye bar bya'o/ /dang po'i tshon la mchod pa ni/ /yid kyis mchod nas tshig 'di brjod/ /chos
75b4(rgyud 'grel): rnams rang bzhin rnam dag pa/ /sems can yongs dag zhing 'dir bri/ /nyes pa'i dri ma kun bral phyir/ /rdul tshon ye shes lnga yis bris/ /dang po dbus su pad+ma ni/ /sna tshogs shin tu ze 'bru dkar/ /shar gyi sna tshogs ze 'bru mthing/
75b5(rgyud 'grel): lho'i sna tshogs ze 'bru ser/ /nub tu sna tshogs ze 'bru dmar/ /byang du sna tshogs ze 'bru ljang/ /de yi gdung dang 'dra ba bskor/ /pad+ma nyi mas rab tu bskor/ /de ni nang gi pho brang ngo/ /gru chad ljang la sgo bzhi dang/ /rta babs la sogs bcas pa'o/ /de yi phyi rol
75b6(rgyud 'grel): cha chen gcig /rtsibs bcu drug pa'i 'khor lo'o/ /shar mthing lho ser nub dmar po/ /byang ljang gru chad ljang gu ste/ /sgo bzhi rta babs bzhi ldan pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor legs par rab tu bri/ /nam mkha' dang bsre thugs mtshan dgod/ /dbus su sa bon a
75b7(rgyud 'grel): bris nas/ /phyogs bzhi gzhan gyi don bzhin no/ /dbus kyi pad+ma 'dab bzhi la/ /rdo rje rin chen pad+ma rgya gram dang/ /gtso bo phye nas mtshan ma so sor sbas/ /shar gyi pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi po la/ /rdo rje lcags kyu mda' gzhu se gol dgod/ /lho'i pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi
76a1(rgyud 'grel): po la/ /rin chen nyi ma tog dang so phreng dgod/ /nub kyi pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi po la/ /pad+ma 'khor lo ral gri lce dgod do/ /byang gi pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi po la/ /rgya gram mche ba go cha khu tshur dgod/ /gru chad bzhi la nang gi lha mo ni/ /me long phreng
76a2(rgyud 'grel): ba pi wang phyag shing dgod/ /de ni nang gi mtshan ma dgod pa'o/ /de nas phyi'i mtshan ma dgod pa ni/ /shar du 'gu de utpal spos phor rgyal mtshan no/ /ltor ni rin chen 'bar ba spos phor po ti'o/ /nub tu pad+ma lcags kyu ral gri dra ba'o/ /byang du zla ba lcags kyu ral
76a3(rgyud 'grel): gri rin chen bsgom/ /phyi'i lha mo'i dgod pa ni/ /me tog mar me dri dang bshos/ /lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril bu'o/ /ye shes gnyis med bsres la dgod/ /lha rnams phyogs skyong rnams kyang dgod/ /de nas bla re ba dan sogs/ /bum pa mchod
76a4(rgyud 'grel): rdzas la sogs dgram/ /de nas rol mos bum pa ni/ /spyan drang bskor byas dgram par bya/ /de nas bdag nyid shar bltas te/ /bde ba'i stan la nyer 'dug nas/ /bgegs rnams yongs su bskrad nas ni/ /rten la mchod dang sdig bshags dang/ /byang
76a5(rgyud 'grel): chub tu bdag sems bskyed bya/ /stong nyid sngags kyis stong nyid bsgom/ /de nas hUM las rdo rje bsgom/ /khro zhal drug ldan bum par ni/ /bruM las chos sku nam mkhar ldan/ /gru gsum nam mkhar bruM bsams nas/ /gru bzhi sgo bzhi tshom bu bzhi/ /thabs dang
76a6(rgyud 'grel): shes rab dkyil 'khor bskyed/ /de nas tshom bu lnga la ni/ /seng ge glang chen rta dang ni/ /rma bya shang shang a las bskyed/ /pad+ma'i steng du rang sems a/ /de las rnam par snang mdzad ni/ /zhi ba mdog dkar zhal bzhi pa/ /phyag rgya byang chub mchog
76a7(rgyud 'grel): gi sku'o/ /thugs khar dang po sangs rgyas so/ /shes rab 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi ste/ /de steng ye shes sems dpa' o/ /phyag rgya ral gri po ti ste/ /gzhan ni so so'i phyag mtshan no/ /mthing kha ser po dmar dang ljang/ /rdo rje rin chen pad+ma las/ /sa gnon
76b1(rgyud 'grel): mchog sbyin ting 'dzin skyabs byin te/ /de bzhin yum gyi mdog dang phyag mtshan so so'o/ /mthing kha ser po dmar po dang ljang gu ste/ /rdo rje lcags kyu mda' gzhu se gol ni/ /so so'i phyag mtshan legs par bsnams/ /sems dpa' rgyal po chags pa legs pa'o
76b2(rgyud 'grel): gser mdog dmar dang ljang gu thon ka mdog /rin chen nyi ma tog dang sor phreng ba rnams/ /rin chen nyi ma tog dang bzhad pa'i dpal/ /so so'i rgyan ldan sku ni mdzes pa'o/ /dmar dang ljang khu mthing ka gser bsegs mdog /ma chags sems gcod sems
76b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyud gsal bar smra/ /kha dog so so gsal zhing ma 'dres 'dzin/ /pad+ma ral gri 'khor lo lce bsnams so/ /ljang gu mthing kha gser bsregs ma rgad mdog /las dang gnod sbyin go cha khu tshur dang/ /rgya gram cha ba go cha khu tshur te/ /bzhugs tshul zla ba'i gdan
76b4(rgyud 'grel): la legs par bzhugs/ /sgeg dang rin chen phreng ba glu ma gar/ /dkar dang ser dang dmar dang ljang gu dang/ /me long phreng dang pi wang chags shing bsnams/ /pad steng rgyan ldan sgeg pas bzhugs pa'o/ /byams pa 'jam dbyangs spos kyi glang po tog /
76b5(rgyud 'grel): dmar po ljang ser mthib kha dkar ba ste/ /'gu d+he utpal spos phor rgyan mtshan dang/ /so so'i phyag mtshan ma 'dres bsnams pa'o/ /blo gros rgya mtsho blo gros mi bzad bzang skyong spobs pa brtsegs/ /ser dang gser bsregs inda nI la thon ka chen po'i mdog /rin
76b6(rgyud 'grel): chen rin chen 'bar ba spos phor po ti bsnams/ /sems dpa' i skyil krung zla ba'i steng na bzhugs shing mdzes/ /mthu chen thob dang ngan song 'dren dang mya ngan dra ba can gyi 'od/ /dmar dang pad+ma rA ga dud mdog shin tu dkar dang utpal mdog /pad+ma lcags kyu
76b7(rgyud 'grel): ral gri dra ba rnams/ /shin tu mdzes pa'i rgyan 'dzin sku dang ldan/ /zla 'od gzhon nu thugs rje'i stobs dang nam mkha' i snying po nam mkha' i mdzod/ /zla ba lcags kyu dang ni ral gri 'bar ba rin chen sgrom ni g.yas g.yon 'dzin/ /dkar ser dkar dang ljang khu mthing kha'i
77a1(rgyud 'grel): mdog /sku mdog shin tu gsal bas ma 'dres gsal/ /bdug pa me tog dri dang ro/ /mthing kha dkar dang dmar po ljang/ /lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril/ /mthing ka ser dmar ljang khu'o/ /de ltar dam tshig lha
77a2(rgyud 'grel): bskyed nas/ /thugs kha mtshan ma rab tu gsal/ /pra kri ta pa ri shud+d+ha sarba d+hArmA/ ya tu ta/ sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na kA ya/ many+dzu sh+rI pa ri shud+d+ha/ mu ba ta ye ta a/ yongs su dag pa'i ye shes so/ /zhing nas ma lus spyan drang ngo/ /dkyil 'khor rim bzhin
77a3(rgyud 'grel): ye shes rim bzhin du spyan drang ngo/ /s+thi sto h+ri ti dz+nyA na murti naM ra haM bud+d+ho bud+d+ha naM/ trya d+ho wirta naM zhes pas sku bzhi la phyag bya'o/ /de nas dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): bstim zhing byin gyis brlabs pa ni/ oM hUM h+ri zhes pas so/ /da ni dbang bskur te gsol ba gdab pa ni/ /oM
77a4(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga ta h+ri da ya/ ha ra ha ra sarba d+harmA/ ga ga na a mA lA su pa ri shud+d+ha d+harmA d+hA tu dz+nyA na garb+ha pa a/ de ni slob dpon 'jug pa'o/ /slob ma 'jug pa ni/ /ras kyis gdong ni bkab nas su/ /las kyi rdo rjes lam bstan nas/ /shar sgor slob ma 'dug
77a5(rgyud 'grel): stangs ni/ /thal sbyar gus pa'i tshul gyis 'dug /de nas gsol ba btab byas te/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes sku/ /slob dpon la ni skyabs su mchi/ /dkyil 'khor gtso 'khor bcas la yang/ /bdag ni rtag tu skyabs su mchi/ /thar pa chen po'i
77a6(rgyud 'grel): grong mchog tu/ /mgon po bdag ni 'jug par 'tshal/ /zhes brjod la maN+Dal dbul/ /de nas slob dpon gyis gsol pa ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i grong mchog tu/ /bdag gis khyod ni gzhug par bya/ /
77a7(rgyud 'grel): snying po'i dkyil 'khor bstan par bya/ /gong gis sngags kyi dkyil 'khor lha la phyag byed du gzhug /de nas sdom pa'i cho ga sbyin pa ni/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun gsum/ /gsum la skyabs su mchi bar bgyi/ /'di ni sangs rgyas rigs
77b1(rgyud 'grel): yid 'ong/ /sdom pa rtag tu bzung bar bya/ /thabs ni rdo rje shes rab dril/ /thabs dang shes rab sdom pa bzung/ /de ni rdo rje rigs kyi mchog /sdom pa de ni bzung bar bya/ /nyin re bzhin ma dus drug tu/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin/ /rin chen rigs mchog
77b2(rgyud 'grel): chen po yi/ /sdom pa rtag tu bzung ba'o/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum/ /dam pa'i chos kyang ma lus bzung/ /pad+ma'i rigs mchog chen po ste/ /dam tshig yid du 'ong ba gzung/ /sdom pa thams cad ldan pa dang/ /mchod sbyin las kyang ci nus bya/
77b3(rgyud 'grel): las kyi rigs mchog chen po yi/ /sdom pa dag kyang bzung bar bya/ /da ni khyod kyis 'di gyis shig /las rnams su la smra mi bya/ /'di ni sems can dmyal ba'i chu/ /'di las 'das nas brlag par 'gyur/ /oM a mri ta hUM hUM hUM pany+tsa h+ri zhes pas lan
77b4(rgyud 'grel): gsum sbyin no/ /da ni dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo slob dpon nus pa dang ldan pas/ /slob dpon nyid la bstim nas srung/ /phrin las rnam bzhi'i kha dog brtag /s+thi sto h+ri ta/ dz+nyA na murti a zhes pas/ byin gyis brlabs/ /de nas me tog dor byas nas/ /
77b5(rgyud 'grel): spyan ni legs par dbye bar bya/ /ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po ltar/ /de bzhin du spyan dbye'o/ /oM a b+hA ba swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+ha badzra tsak+Shu a A aM a(rgyud 'grel): stod pa bzhin spyan dbye'o/ /gdong g.yogs phud la 'di skad do/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa 'di la ltos/ /
77b6(rgyud 'grel): de na deng ba rab tu skyes/ /sdig pa thams cad zhi ba dang/ /dngos grub rnam gnyis 'di las 'byung/ /de phyir 'di la nan tan gyis/ /dkyil 'khor lha dang sngags sgrub byos zhes byas nas/ /rang gi 'gu ha na ma dang yi dam lha rnams gsal bar bstan
77b7(rgyud 'grel): lha rnams phung po khams su bshad/ /de nas dkyil 'khor rab tu bshad/ /grub bzhi tshad med bzhi dang ni/ /sgo bzhi dran pa nyer gzhag bzhi/ /rta babs yang dag spong ba bzhi/ /dra ba dra pa phyed pa ni/ /yang dag spong dag bzhi pa'o/ /ka ba brgyad ni 'phags
78a1(rgyud 'grel): lam brgyad/ /tshom bu lnga ldan pha rol phyin/ /rdo rje'i gdung ni shes rab bo/ /'khor lo chos kyi 'khor lo te/ /stong pa bcu drug phyi yang ngo/ /de nas maN+Dal byas nas ni/ /yo byad rdzas kyi bla ma mchod/ /de rjes dbang ni rab bskur phyir
78a2(rgyud 'grel): sgo lhor sna tshogs pad+ma'i ste/ /slob ma blo ldan de steng bzhag /bdag nyid dkyil 'khor rab gsal bas/ /las kyi khro bo sprul pa spro/ /bdud rtsi chu yis bsrung bar gtor/ /oM ya mAn+ta ka hUM khaM/ oM ka lA ru pa hUM h+rI:/ bar chod bgegs rnams
78a3(rgyud 'grel): bsal nas ni/ /dra ba gur gyis bsrung ba dang/ /khro bo drug gis bsrungs pa la/ /rim pa bzhin du dbang bskur ro/ /bum pa'i chu rnams thams cad kun/ /gtso bo bum par kun bsdus nas/ /bdag nyid lha'i skur gsal bas/ /slob ma byin brlab
78a4(rgyud 'grel): bya ba'i phyir/ /de nas bum pa blangs nas ni/ /slob ma'i mgo la rab gtugs te/ /oM a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM hUM/ /ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ /dga' ldan gnas na bzhugs pa la/ /lha rnams kyis ni khrus gsol ltar/ /de bzhin bdag
78a5(rgyud 'grel): gis khrus gsol lo/ /oM du(rgyud 'grel): khats+tshe da hUM/ de nas dbu rgyan ni ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin gyi/ /so so yang dag rab gsal phyir/ /bstim nas mchod cing bstod nas ni/ /mnyam nyid gzung 'dzin spangs pas bskur/ /oM wa gi shwa ra twaM/ thabs
78a6(rgyud 'grel): dang shes rab gnyis med pa'o/ /ye shes lnga ldan log lta 'joms/ /stong nyid don stong rdo rje che/ /bu khyod thugs la gnas par bgyi/ /oM badzra tik+Sh+Na h+ri/ thabs dang shes rab gnyis med don/ /rgyun mi chad par 'gro don phyir/ /mchod bstod bstims
78a7(rgyud 'grel): nas dbang bskur phyir/ /di ring khyod la dbang bskur ro/ /oM dz+nyA na kA ya ha/ mtshan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs pa'i/ /shes rab ye shes gnyis med mtshan/ /po ti glegs bam mchod nas bstim/ /di ring bu khyod ming dbang bskur/ /oM pradz+nyA dz+nyA na murta ye
78b1(rgyud 'grel): oM/ ye shes lnga ldan drug rdzogs pa/ /sangs rgyas sras po dam pa'i mchog /sbyor lam rgyun du phreng ba'i dbang/ /di ring khyod la bskur bar bya/ /oM a ra pa tsa na hUM/ nyon mongs sdug bsngal gcod pa dang/ /shes bya ma rig gsal ba'i phyir/ /shes
78b2(rgyud 'grel): rab mtshon chen ral gri 'di/ /bu yis rtag tu bzung bar bgyi/ /oM pradz+nyA dz+nyA na mu rta ye/ badzra tik+Sh+Na/ du(rgyud 'grel): khats+tshe da d+ha ra hUM/ lha rnams mchod dang sems can mnyes/ /zhi dang rgyas la sogs pa rnams/ /las rnams thams cad khyod kyis gyis/ /bsam
78b3(rgyud 'grel): pa bzang pos de gyis shig /de nas da ni bdag gis ni/ /ri dags rna ba bzhin du gos/ /gyon nas khyod la lung bstan ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus pa yi/ /dngos grub rnams gnyis thob bya ba dang/ /'gro drug dug rnams gzhom pa'i phyir/ /'gro thar
78b4(rgyud 'grel): thar pa'i lam 'di thob/ /sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na kA ya b+hu rb+ha ba swAhA/ /chos kyi dung de sgra chen ldan/ /chos kyi gaN+De sgra bo che/ /phyogs bcu chos kyi rnga sgra sgrogs/ /chos kyi skyabs phyir gdugs dbug go /oM pradz+nyA dz+nyA na murta yo/ /si gi ti ni oM/ oM badzra tik+Sh+Na gan+ni h+ri/ oM
78b5(rgyud 'grel): dz+nyA na kA ya dundu ha/ oM du(rgyud 'grel): khets+tshe da tsha tre hUM/ oM wa ga shwa ra ratne hUM/ oM a ra pa tsa na dz+nyA ne ka tsak+Sh+Na bi mA la hUM/ de ltar dbang rnams rdzogs pa dang/ /mchod cing bstod la sbyin bsreg bya/ /de ltar rdzogs na gtor ma btang /ye shes gshegs su gsol
78b6(rgyud 'grel): ba ni/ /swa artha ny+tse wa/ pa ra artha tse wa/ sid+d+hi ta gats+tsha mu pa ta ya ti a/ de ltar gshegs nas mu(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod/ /dam tshig bdag la bsdu bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor rdul tshon mdza' nas bsdu/ /rab tu gnas par bya ba ni/ /dang po bsnyen par rdzogs par
78b7(rgyud 'grel): bya /de nas sa'i cho ga ni/ /bslang dang brtag dang bsrung ba dang/ /spyad zhing byin brlabs gzung bar bya'o/ /de nas bum pa lta gon bya/ /gser dngul zangs la sogs pa yi/ /sman lnga 'bru lnga rin chen blugs/ /'bras bu dri dang kha brgyan gdags/ /oM sarba ta
79a1(rgyud 'grel): thA ga ta h+ri ya/ ha ra ha ra/ oM hUM h+rI/ b+ha ga waM dz+nyA na murti/ wa gi shwa ra/ mahA pa tsa/ sarba d+harma ga ga nA? mA la su pa ri shud+d+ha/ d+harma b+ha hu dz+nyA na garba a(rgyud 'grel): lha rnams bum par gsal bar bskyed/ /sa bon mtshan ma so sor bris/
79a2(rgyud 'grel): maN+Dal du ni go rims dgod/ /rnam rgyal bum pa rdzogs par ro/ /de nas go rims bzhin du bzhag /maN+Dal dri'i thig le bya/ /mchod pa la sogs gzhung bzhin dbul/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo bskyed nas ni/ /ye shes spyan drangs bstim nas ni/ /
79a3(rgyud 'grel): mchod dang rtsa ba'i bzlas pa bya/ /oM a ra pa tsa na hUM/ de nas mkha' la gdegs par bya/ /rten ni sbyang ba legs byas nas/ /khrus ni yongs dag rdzogs byas nas/ /yar gyi ngo bo'i zla ba dang/ /snga dro dri med gtsang ma gos/ /gyon pa'i slob dpon thig
79a4(rgyud 'grel): las byas/ /tshon gyi las kyang rdzogs byas nas/ /bskyed dang mchod dang bstod rdzogs nas/ /de nas rab tu gnas par bya/ /thams cad sku gsum dag tu bskyed/ /de nas spyan ni drang bya ste/ /ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ /rang bzhin gnas
79a5(rgyud 'grel): na bzhags pa la/ /chos dbyings gnas su gshegs pa ltar/ /'di nyid du ni gshegs su gsol/ /ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ /'og min gnas na bzhugs pa las/ /bde ba can du gshegs pa ltar/ / /
79a6(rgyud 'grel): 'di nyid du ni bzhugs gsol/ /ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ /dga' ldan gnas na bzhugs pa la/ /sprul pa'i sku ru gshegs pa ltar/ /'di nyid du ni bzhugs su gsol/ /oM pra kri ta pa ri shud+d+ha/ sarba d+harmA/ ya tu ta/ oM pra kri ta pa ri shud+d+ha
79a7(rgyud 'grel): sraM bo ta dza? tut+ta?/ oM pra kri ta pa ri shud+d+ha ni rma na dza tut+ta?/ oM Sh+Thi? sto h+ri d+hi dz+nyA na mu b+hi naM/ ra haM shud+d+ho bud+d+ha naM/ tryai to warti ni/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+hu pa/ pu dza me g+ha sa mu dra spha ra Na sa ma ye a hUM/ zhes bya bas mchod nas de nas dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM(rgyud 'grel): baM ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya bas bstim par bya'o/
79b1(rgyud 'grel): oM a b+ha wa swa b+ha wa bi shud+d+ha/ badzra tsak+Shu badzra tsak+Shu a A aM a(rgyud 'grel): de nas a sarba ta thA ga ta h+ri de ya/ ha ra ha ra/ ga ga nA mA la su pa ri shud+d+ha/ badzra d+hA tu/ du(rgyud 'grel): khats+tshe da/ dz+nyA na garbba a/ sarba ta thA ga ta h+ri da ya/ ha ra ha ra/ ga ga na/ a mA la su pa ri
79b2(rgyud 'grel): shud+d+ha/ ratna d+ha tu wa gi shwa ra/ dz+nyA na garbba a/ a sarba ta thA ga ta h+ri da ya/ ha ra ha ra/ ga ga na/ a mA la su pa ri shud+d+ha/ pad+ma dz+nyA? tu/ badzra tik+Sh+Na/ dz+nyA na garbba a/ a sarba ta thA ga ta h+ri da ya/ ha ra ha ra/ ga ga na/ a mA la su pa ri shud+d+ha/ karma
79b3(rgyud 'grel): d+hA tu/ dz+nyA na kA ya dz+nyA na garbba a/ a sarba ta thA ga ta h+ra da ya/ ha ra ha ra/ ga ga na/ a mA la su pa ri shud+d+ha/ d+harma d+hA tu/ pradz+nyA dz+nyA na murta ye/ /dz+nyA na garbba a/ bum pa lngas dbang bskur te/ oM h+ri kA la ruA pa hUM zhes bya bas bgegs bskrad la phyag
79b4(rgyud 'grel): rgya ni lag pa mnyam par sbyar zhing bcings pa la mthe bo gnyis dang mthe chung gnyis nang du gzhan rtse mo ltar byas pa ni rdo rje sdug bsngal gcod pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag par mnyam par thal mo sbyar nas mdzub mo dang mthe bo dang gung mo gnyis rtse mo so sor
79b5(rgyud 'grel): byas pa ni/ rin po che ste dag gi dbang gi phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa thal mo sbyar nas phan tshun du bsnol ba la gung mo bsgreng te tshig bcag nas rtse sprad pa ni pad+ma ste rdo rje gnon po yi'o/ /lag pa thal mo mnyam par sbyar te gung mo gnyis nang du mnyam par sbyar
79b6(rgyud 'grel): te srin lag gnyis bsnol la mdzub mo dang mthe'u chung gnyis sbyar te/ /mtheb mo gnyis dang sbyar ba ni rdo rje rgya gram ste dz+nyA na kA ya yi'o/ /lag pa rgyab sbyar nas sor mo bsnol te mthe bong mthil du sbyar ba ni 'khor lo ste/ pradz+nyA dz+nyA na'i phyag rgyas bum
79b7(rgyud 'grel): pa blangs nas dbang bskur ro/ /de nas 'khor lo dbang bskur ba ni/ oM badzra satwa dz+nyA na tsakra hUM/ de nas dung gi dbang bskur ba ni/ /oM badzra shaM ka dz+nyA na satwa hUM/ de nas gdugs kyi dbang bskur ba ni/ oM badzra d+hwa dza tsha tre zhes pas so /de nas sbyin
80a1(rgyud 'grel): sreg mchod sbyin bya/ /gtor ma gtad nas dkyil 'khor bsdu'o/ /bdag gis 'di byas dge bas ni/ /thams cad 'bras bu thob par shog /shar nas lho ru za hor yul du ni/ /zla dang 'od kyis gang ba'i skal ldan la/
80a2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis su med cing sbas pa'i don la mkhas/ /chos kyi dam pa de nyid dpal du byung/ /chos kyi dam pa bzang gi gdams ngag 'di/ /rin chen lta bur 'grel pa rnam gnyis thos/ /de bsgrubs dngos grub 'bras bu thob gyur nas/ /thams cad bla med gnas su
80a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dren gyur cig /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga ye shes gsal ba zhes bya ba slob dpon gnyis med sbas pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harmA sh+rI mi tra dang/ lots+tsha ba dge slong chos kyis bzang pos
80a4(rgyud 'grel): bsgyur ba'o// //rgya gar skad du/ Arya dz+nyA na satwa many+dzu sh+rI ta tA sA d+ha nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' de kho na nyid ces bya ba'i sgrub thabs/ 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/
80a5(rgyud 'grel): nyon mongs rgya mtsho'i 'ching gcod pa'i/ /sdug bsngal gcod la phyag 'tshal nas/ /lam gyi rim pa yang dag don/ /dran nas bdag gis rab tu bshad/ /re shig yid 'ong gnas dag tu/ /bde ba'i stan la nye 'dug ste/ /mchod cing stod nas
80a6(rgyud 'grel): sdig bshags bya/ /tshad med bzhi ni rab tu bsgom/ /oM mahA shU n+ya ta dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa at+ma konyahaM zhes bsgom mo/ /dang por bdag nyid a bsgom ste/ /paM las pad+ma 'dab ma ni/ /chos 'byung rdo rje'i nang du bsgom/ /bdag nyid zla ba'i steng bsam mo//
80a7(rgyud 'grel): de las sdug bsngal gcod pa ni/ /sku mdog mthing ka'i 'gyid bag can/ /rdo rje utpal brtan pa'i sku/ /zla ba'i steng na a bsam mo/ /'dab bzhi zla ba'i steng na ni/ /a A aM a(rgyud 'grel): tshad med bzhi ldan yum bzhi ni/ /'gyid bag utpal
80b1(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa'i sku/ /rdo rje skyil krung mdun bdar nas/ /go rims bzhin du rab tu bsam/ /ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs nas/ /sku gsum byin brlab dbang bskur ro/ /de nas don dang rab ldan pas/ /mtshan rnams rab tu brjod par bya/ /oM du(rgyud 'grel): khats+tshe
80b2(rgyud 'grel): da/ na ma(rgyud 'grel): su pa ra da badzrA gra bud+d+ha ko Ti na mo stu te/ na ma strai shU n+ya ta ga ba/ bud+d+ha ba ta na maste ho(rgyud 'grel): de nas ldang bar 'dod na mu(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas pas gshegs su gsol/ /dam tshig gis ldang bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan dag gi dbang phyug ni/ /rin chen utpal
80b3(rgyud 'grel): gser gyi mdog /pad+ma 'dab bzhi zla ba'i steng/ /rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs/ /bad bzhi zla ba'i steng du ni/ /a a aM a yum bzhi'o/ /spyan drangs mchod dang bstim byas nas/ /byin brlab dbang bskur mtshan gdon no/ /oM wa gi shwa ra
80b4(rgyud 'grel): gu dwa ra ga na mo swa stu/ gu rwa ra ga nA mo nA ma/ bu dwa pri ti nA ma/ bu dwa byi bu tan ma/ mu(rgyud 'grel): zhes gshegs su gsol nas smon lam gyis gnas par bya'o/ /rdo rje rab tu 'bar ba'i nang/ /'dab bzhi dmar ba'i zla ba'i steng/ /a las byung ba rnon po ni/ /
80b5(rgyud 'grel): mdog dmar pad+ma utpal bsnams/ /rdo rje skyil krung zla ba'i steng/ /'dab bzhi zla ba'i steng du ni/ /a a i a yum bzhi ni/ /'gyid bag gtso bo la phyogs pa'o/ /spyan drang mchod dang bstim byas nas/ /oM badzra tik+Sha/ bud+d+ha nA mo nA ma/ bud+d+ha smi ta su tra byA
80b6(rgyud 'grel): nA ma/ bud+d+ha b+ha tsa nA ma swe stu/ /bu twa tsa ta na mo nA mo zhes brjod nas mu(rgyud 'grel): zhes gshegs su gsol nas spyod lam gyis gnas par bya'o/ /shes rab rang bzhin stong pa'i nang/ /snying rjes mtshon ba'i gnan bsams te/ /byang chub sems kyi sa bon te/ /
80b7(rgyud 'grel): shes rab ye shes a las bskyed/ /sku mdog dkar po rab tu mdzes/ /'khor lo utpal yang dag ldan/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor steng du ni/ /rdo rje skyil krung bcas par bsams/ /'dab bzhi zla ba'i steng du ni/ /a a aM a yum bzhi bsgom/ 
81a1(rgyud 'grel): pra kri ta pa ri shud+d+ha sarba d+harmA ya tu ta/ sarba ta thA ga ta d+hu pa pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ sarba ta thA ga ta puShpe pU dza me ga sa mu dra spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ /sarba ta thA ga ta a lo ke te pU dza me ga sa mu dra spha ra ? sa ma ye hUM/ sarba ta
81a2(rgyud 'grel): thA ga ta gand+ha pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ sarba ta thA ga ta nai bai te pU dza me gas mu dra spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ sarba ta thA ga ta shapta pU dza me ga sa mu dra spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ zhes mchod nas dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes bstim mo/ /oM hUM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): b+ha ga wa/ dz+nyA na murta/
81a3(rgyud 'grel): wA ri shwa ra/ ma hA pa tsa/ sarba ta thA ga ta h+ri da ya/ /sarba d+harmA ga ga na/ at mA la su pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma d+hA tu dz+nyA na garba a/ zhes brjod nas mtshan yang dag par brjod pa gdon par bya'o/ /oM pra dz+nyA dz+nyA na murta ye a ba bodb+ha ba na mo stu ste/ byA nA mA sre bu dwa saM
81a4(rgyud 'grel): b+ha nya/ ga ga na b+ha g+ha na mo stu bya/ nA ma ste dz+nyA ma saM b+ha ba zhes bstod nas su/ /:zhes brjod nas spyod lam gyis gnas par bya'o/ /shes rab kyi ni hUM las bskyed/ /snying rje ma chags pad+ma'i gdan/ /byang chub sems las byung ba'i steng/ /a ni
81a5(rgyud 'grel): rab tu gsal bar bya/ /ye shes sku ni ljang gu ste/ /rgya gram utpal bsnams pa yi/ /sems bskyed pa'i sa bon te/ /rdo rje skyil mo krung du bzhugs/ /'dab bzhi zla ba'i steng na ni/ /a a aM a yuM bzhi bskyed/ /ye shes gnyis med bstim
81a6(rgyud 'grel): byas nas/ /byin brlabs dbang bskur rdzogs pa dang/ /mtshan ni yang dag brjod par bya/ /de nas bstod pa 'di bstod do/ /oM dz+nyA na kA ya/ ma yA ra la na ma stu bya/ nA ma ste bu dwa na Da ka /na ma ster ba sa bo byaM/ dz+nyA na kA ya na mo stu ta/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM mu:
81a7(rgyud 'grel): zhes spyod lam gyi gnas par bya'o/ /dri med ye shes las byung ba/ /dge ba dri med gang thob des/ /'gro rnams srid pa las grol nas/ /bla med byang chub thob par shog /de kho na nyid kyi sgrub thabs slob dpon gnyis su med pa sbas pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
81b1(rgyud 'grel): paN+Ti ta d+harma sh+rI mi tra dang/ lots+tsha ba dge slong chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o// ` // */ /rgya gar skad du/ ho ma bi d+hi paT ti/ bod skad du/ sbyin sreg gi cho ga mdor byas pa/ 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de la
81b2(rgyud 'grel): dang po sngags pa ni/ rang lus 'jigs kyang gzhan phan brtson/ /rnyed dang bkur sti ma chags sems/ /sems can don dga' sbyin sreg bya/ /dang por sa'i cho ga dang sta gon cho ga bya ste/ rang yid du 'ong ba'i sa'i thig gdab ste/ /dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su thab
81b3(rgyud 'grel): khung rgyar khru gang zab su de'i khru phyed pa kha khyer sor bzhi byi dor bya/ /nang du pad+ma rdo rjes mtshan pa/ /byug pa dang dri dang me tog dkar pos brgyan pa/ /mtshams su rdo rje rtsa gsum pa/ /kha khyer la ku sha dgram par bya'o/ /shin tu sar pa'i ras kyis g.yog
81b4(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /de nas mchod rdzas dang sreg rdzas dang/ /yams shing bud shing dang dgang gzang la sogs pa bshams te/ /mchod rdzas g.yon du gzhag sreg rdzas g.yas su gzhag /dgang gzar dang blugs gzar mar ni mdun/ /de nas bsod nams
81b5(rgyud 'grel): tshogs bsags la/ /tshad med bzhi ldan sems bskyed bya'o/ /de nas stong pa'i ting 'dzin bsgom /oM a b+ha wa swa b+ha wa badzra tsakra a A aM a(rgyud 'grel): de nas bdag nyid lha ru bskyed/ /spyan drang byin brlabs dbang bskur bya/ /ye shes me lce 'od 'bar
81b6(rgyud 'grel): gsal/ de nas ri las me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum 'bar ba bskyed par bya'o/ /gzi brjid chen po 'od gsal ba/ /zhes pas de nas a las me lha ni/ /sku mdog dkar po tshangs pa'i gzugs/ /dbyug pa bgrang phreng 'dzin par bskyed/ /spyan drangs
81b7(rgyud 'grel): mchod bstod byas nas bstim/ /bum pa'i chu yis bgegs bskrad bya/ /de nas mar ni dgang blug gsum/ /me lha nyid la dbul bar bya'o/ /me mtshan ngan na spobs pa bya/ /de nas mchod rdzas dbul bya zhing/ /sreg rdzas phul nas bstod pa bya/ /
82a1(rgyud 'grel): nor bu chen po 'od chags dpal zhes pa ni/ /de nas thugs khar pho brang btsal/ /bgegs la sogs pa gong bzhin bya/ /sreg rdzas mchod rdzas thams cad dbul/ /gdags pa zhi ba shAn+tiM ngo/ //sprin dkar dag pa bzhin du
82a2(rgyud 'grel): dkar/ /nyi ma 'char ka'i dkyil ltar mdzes/ /de nas bum pa'i chus bsangs la/ /sreg rdzas mchod rdzas thams cad dbul/ /dgang blugs gnyis kyang dbul bar bya/ /de nas phrin las bcol bya zhing/ /bstod pa'i rim pa gzhung bzhin
82a3(rgyud 'grel): bstod/ /rtsa sngags mu(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas pas gshegs/ /bdag gis dge ba 'di brtsams pas/ /dge ba dri med gang thob des/ /bdag dang mdza' yas sems can rnams/ /rje btsun 'jam dbyangs thob par shog /'phags pa 'jam
82a4(rgyud 'grel): dpal gyi sbyin sreg slob dpon mya ngan med pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ dz+nyA na satwa many+dzu sh+rI a dwa bud+d+ha sA d+ha nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' dang po'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i grub thabs/ 'phags
82a5(rgyud 'grel): pa 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thog ma bar dang thar sangs rgyas/ /srid pa'i dri ma dang bral ba'i/ /rang bzhin gyis ni dag pa'i sku/ /dang po'i sangs rgyas la gtung nas/ /snying po bsdus pa'i mtshan rgyud las/ /ye shes
82a6(rgyud 'grel): lnga'i sgrub thabs 'di/ /ma rig 'phrul pa spangs pa'i phyir/ /gsung gi sgrub thabs gsal phyir bri/ /gnas khang yid du 'ong bar ni/ /bde ba'i ston la nyer 'dug ste/ /tshad med bzhi pa bsgoms byas nas/ /byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed do
82a7(rgyud 'grel): a b+hA wa swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+ha badzra tsakra a A aM a(rgyud 'grel): de nas stong pa'i ting nge 'dzin la/ /a hUM las byung rdo rje ni/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed 'jigs par byed/ /khro bo rgyal po zhal drug ldan/ /me dpung 'bar ba dang bcas pa/ /'jigs pa'i rdo rje
82b1(rgyud 'grel): bskyed par bya/ /dang po yi ni dbyangs yig las/ /thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin gyi/ /ye shes mig cig e yi nang/ /nyon mongs dri med pad+ma'o/ /dang po'i dbyangs yig las byung ba'i/ /paM las byung ba'i pad+ma'i nang/ /rdo rje skyil krung rdzogs sangs rgyas
82b2(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas 'gro ba'i chos 'dzin pa/ /dpal ldan sangs rgyas pad+ma skyes/ /kun mkhyen ye shes mdzod 'dzin pa/ /rdo rje gnon po rang bzhin zhal/ /tshig gi dbang phyug smra ba che/ /rnam dag shes rab ye shes zhal/ /smra ba'i skyabs mchog dam
82b3(rgyud 'grel): pa yi/ /bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal gcod pa'i zhal/ /stobs dang ldan pa smra ba'i rgyal/ /gsung dbyangs rdo rje chos kyi zhal/ /smra ba'i dam pa mchog gi gnas/ /rdo rje zab mo sku'i zhal/ /smra ba'i seng ge nyon mongs sel/ /kha dog so so mtshungs
82b4(rgyud 'grel): med zhal/ /kun tu bltas pa mchog tu dga' / /sku ni gzi brjod phung po yis/ /mtshan dang dpe byang lta na sdug /'od bzang rin chen 'bar ba ste/ /g.yon pa'i phyag bzhi po ti 'dzin/ /g.yas pa yi ni phyag bzhi yis/ /'ong dang bcas pa'i
82b5(rgyud 'grel): ral gri 'phyar/ /sman pa che mchog gzhon nu'i sku/ /ljon pa'i shing dang bcas pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sku che ba/ /sangs rgyas sku lnga'i bdag nyid can/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung che ba/ /rtsibs pa zhi mu khyud gsung yang yin/ /oM badzra tik+Sh+Na nub
82b6(rgyud 'grel): tu'o/ /du(rgyud 'grel): khats+tshe da shar du'o/ /pradz+nyA dz+nyA na murta ye dbus su'o/ /wa gi shwa ra lho ru'o/ /? na grA ya byang du ste/ a ni dbus su dkar po'o/ /pa ni shar du mthing ka'o/ /tsa ni lho ru ser po'o/ /ra ni nub tu dmar po'o/ /na ni byang du ljang gu'o/ /
82b7(rgyud 'grel): gsal byed dang ni dbyangs yig ni/ /mu khyud bzhi la bsam pa ste/ /de ltar shes rab 'khor lo'o/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs che ba/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs la gnas/ /rdo rje nyi ma shes rab che/ /rdo rje zla ba thabs kyi bdag /chags dang
83a1(rgyud 'grel): chags bral yig 'bru mchog /kha dog sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od/ /oM pra kri ta pa ri shud+d+ha/ sarba d+harmA ya tu ta/ sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na kA ya/ many+dzu sh+rI mu pa ta ye ti a/ a A a a'i u a'u e i o o aM
83a2(rgyud 'grel): a(rgyud 'grel): s+thisto? h+ri ti dz+nyA na murti ra haM bud+d+ho bud+d+ha naM/ trya? twa birta naM/ oM badzra d+hu pe swAhA/ oM badzra puShpe swAhA/ oM badzra A lo ke swAhA/ oM badzra gand+he swAhA/ /oM badzra nai we te swAhA/ /oM badzra shapta swAhA/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta h+ri da ya/ ha ra ha ra/ oM hUM h+ri/
83a3(rgyud 'grel): b+ha ga waM dz+nyA na murti wA gi shwa ra/ mahA pa tsa/ a sarba ta thA ga ta h+ri da ya/ ha ra ha ra/ ga ya na/ a mA la su pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma d+hA tu dz+nyA na garbba a/ de ltar bskyed nas bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas gsang sngags bzlas par bya/ /oM badzra tik+Sha du:
83a4(rgyud 'grel): khats+tshe da/ pradz+nyA dz+nyA na murta ye/ dz+nyA na kA ya/ kA gi shwa ra/ a ra pa tsa na ya te na ma/ da ni mtshan nas brjod pa ni/ /sdug gu 'jig rten gsum gyi mchog dpal ldan rgyu skar dkyil 'khor can/ /phyogs bcu nam mkha' i mthas gtugs par/ /chos kyi
83a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo legs par bskor/ /'gro dang 'dug pa yangs pa ste/ /byams dang snying rje'i dkyil 'khor can/ /de ltar bsgoms nas mtshan brjod do/ /gtor ma phul nas gshegs su gsol/ /bdag nyid spyod lam gnas par bya'o/ /mdo
83a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyun snying po'i don las ni/ /man ngag la brten gzhung 'di brtsams/ /de yi bsod nams gang bsags pa/ /'gro rnams 'jam dbyangs thob par shog /slob dpon a Sha d+hu tis mdzad pa'i dang po'i sangs rgyas kyi sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
83a7(rgyud 'grel): d+harmA sh+rI mi tra dang/ lo tsA ba chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o// // */ (/mchod rten bsgrub pa'i chog mdor bsdu ba'i a ba d+hu tis mdzad pa bzhugs so/) /rgya gar skad du/ tsa do sA d+ha pany+tsi tri ta/ bod skad du/ mchod rten gyi sgrub pas
83b1(rgyud 'grel): cho ga mdor bsdus la/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos nyid dang bsdus rtog pa'i dri ma bral/ /rang bzhin yongs dag yon tan ldan pa'i sku/ /thugs rjes sprul sku 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa/ /sku gsum ye shes mchod pa'i rten la
83b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dud/ /de don 'gro la phan pa'i phyir/ /rgyud don la rten bdag gis brtsams/ /mchod cing brjod pa drang srong che/ /sa rnams kun gyi rgyan ldan bskyed/ /ces bya ba ni sa blang zhing byin gyis brlab pa bstan nas/ kong bu byin gyis brlab cing gdab pa ni/ /
83b3(rgyud 'grel): shes rab chen po'i skad cig la/ /chos kun khong du chud pa 'chang/ /zhes bya bas thabs dang shes rab gnyis byin gyis brlab bo/ /oM badzra tik+Sh+Na du(rgyud 'grel): khats+tshe da pradz+nyA dz+nyA na murti ye dz+nyA na kA ya wA gi shwa ra/ a ra pa tsa na a/ zhes byas gdab bo/ /
83b4(rgyud 'grel): btab pa de ji ltar zhe na/ pha rol phyin pa kun rdzogs pa/ /rnam par dag pa bdag med chos/ /yang dag ye shes zla 'od bzang/ /brtson chen sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/ /rgyud kun gyis ni bdag po mchog /rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur gnas/ /mchod 'os
83b5(rgyud 'grel): bstod 'os phyag gi gnas/ /rtag tu rim gro smon lam gdab/ /rgyu pha rol tu byin pa 'bras bu chos kyi sku'i bdag nyid/ /ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid kyi sku bum pa na 'od dang bcas pa/ sems can rgyud smin pa 'od 'phro ba bsam mo/ /dge ba
83b6(rgyud 'grel): dri med gang thob des/ /'gro kun sku gsum thob par shog /a ba d+ha tis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ Arya many+dzu sh+rI sA d+ha nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ 'jam
83b7(rgyud 'grel): dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal ldan sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag /rigs gsum bdag po ye shes sku/ /rje btsun 'jam dpal phyag 'tshal te/ /de nyid rjes dran cho ga bshad/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i lugs nyid kyis/ /gang
84a1(rgyud 'grel): zhig yang dag mngon dbang bskur/ /rjes gnang thob pa'i grub pa po/ /deng 'dir yid la gnas dag tu/ /bde ba'i stan la nyer 'dug ste/ /gshin rje'i dgra 'am zhal drug la/ /khro bo'i rgyal pos bsrung bar bya/ /oM h+ri kA la
84a2(rgyud 'grel): ru pa hUM kha hUM swAhA/ a ya mAn+ta ka hUM/ de nas gshin rje gshed po'i sngags/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM zhes bya ba 'dis/ /mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag mchod/ /tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi yang bsgom/ /de nas chos kun dngos med par/ /rang gi blo yis rnam
84a3(rgyud 'grel): par bsgom/ /oM pra kri ta pa'i shud+d+ha/ sarba d+harmA ya hu ta/ sarba ta thA ga tadznA na kA ya/ many+dzu sh+rI pa ri shud+d+hi ta mu ta ye ti/ de nas thams cad stong pa las/ /de las byung ba pad+ma las/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor a las byung/ /de dbus yi ge a
84a4(rgyud 'grel): dkar las skyes pa/ /rnam par snang mdzad che mchog zhi ba sku mdog dkar/ /byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya mnyam par 'dzin/ /sangs rgyas seng ge'i gdan bzhugs bdag nyid bsgom/ /de'i thugs khar d+hi las byung ba yi/ /pad+ma'i sangs rgyas rnam par
84a5(rgyud 'grel): bsam par bya/ /gdong lnga gtsug phud lnga dang ldan/ /zur phud lnga pa me tog thod/ /dang po sangs rgyas de'i thugs kar yang/ /shes rab 'khor lo nyes kun sel ba bsgom/ /pad+mar gyur pa 'khor lo de dbus su/ /ye shes sems dpa' rnam
84a6(rgyud 'grel): par bsgom par bya/ /s+thi sto h+ri twIM dz+nyA na murti ra haM bud+d+ho bud+d+hA nAM/ trya twa birta naM/ zhes bya ba dang/ lte ba dang bcas mu khyud nang ma gnyis/ /de nas rtsibs rnams rim par ldan pa la/ /de nas yang ni phyi'i mu khyud gnyis/ /de la rtsa ba'i la sogs rim
84a7(rgyud 'grel): bzhin dgod/ /ye shes sems dpa' pad+ma zla bar gnas/ /de steng rdo rje skyil krung legs bzhugs pa/ /phyag gnyis ting 'dzin phyag rgya utpa la mtshan/ /de steng shes rab po tis gnyis kha brgyan/ /nyi ma 'char ka'i dkyil ltar mdzes/ /sen
84b1(rgyud 'grel): mo'i 'od ni shas cher dmar/ /cod pan bzang po thon ka'i rtse/ /skra mchog thon ka chen po can/ /nor bu chen po 'od chags dpal/ /sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyan dang ldan/ /zhes pa'o/ /oM sarba d+harmA b+ha wA/ swa b+hA wA/ bi shud+d+ha badzra a A aM a(rgyud 'grel): nang gi mu
84b2(rgyud 'grel): khyud mchog la'o/ /a A i a'i u u e i o aau aM a(rgyud 'grel): phyi rol ma la'o/ /de nas 'khor lo rtsibs drug la shar nas brtsams te sngags kyi rgyal po drug drug go /a A sarba ta thA ga ta h+ri ya/ ha ra ha ra/ oM hUM h+rI/ b+ha ga waM/ dz+nyA na murti wa gi shwa
84b3(rgyud 'grel): ra/ mahA pa tsa sarba d+harma ga ga na/ a mA la su pa ri shud+d+ha/ d+harmA d+hA tu dz+nyA na garbba a(rgyud 'grel): mu khyud phyi rol ma la'o/ /de'i phyi rol ka la sogs pa'o/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): sa dgu pa la sogs pa'o/ /oM a(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ de nas mngon par dbang bskur te/ mi bskyod
84b4(rgyud 'grel): pas ni dbu brgyan pa'o/ /ye shes sems dpa' i thugs ka'i sa bon las 'od zer 'phros te/ slar bsdu bar bya'o/ /dngos po thams cad kyi de kho na lhag par rtogs pas chos thams cad la yang 'jam pa'i dpal du byed cing/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan
84b5(rgyud 'grel): 'das/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pas snying ka'i ye shes sems dpa' dang mnyam par sbyor zhing sngags kyi tshig ming dag gdon no/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM mu(rgyud 'grel): slar yang khro bo gnyis gang yang rung bas bsrungs la langs te/ phyi rol du a kA ro la sogs pas
84b6(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma sbyin no/ /'di ltar dus gsum du ste/ rnal 'byor gyi dus ma yin par ni 'jam pa'i dpal gyi sngags gang 'dod pa bzlas pa 'am/ mchod rten bya zhing bskor ba la sogs par bya'o/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi sgrub thabs mya ngan
84b7(rgyud 'grel): med pa'i dpal gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po ya shwa sh+rI ri/ lots+tsha pa ? zha rgya gar brtsegs gyis bsgyur ba'o/ /badzra tik+Sh+Na dmar/ du(rgyud 'grel): khats+tshe da sngo/ pradz+nyA dz+nyA na murta ya dkar/ dz+nyA na ka ya ljang/ wa gi shwa re ser/
85a1(rgyud 'grel): a ra pa tsa na dkar/ i ti// // */ /rgya gar skad du/ badzra b+hai ra ba sA d+ha nA ma/ bod skad du/ rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ /'jam dpal rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rab tu khros shing gdug pa 'dul/ /
85a2(rgyud 'grel): ma lus log pa'i bdud 'dul ba/ /zhal dang phyag drug mtshon cha 'dzin/ /ma he'i zhal la phyag 'tshal te/ /de yi sgrub pa'i rim pa zhig /bdag gis dran nas brtsam par bya/ /dang por yid dang mthun pa'i gnas su bdag nyid khrus byas te stan bde ba la
85a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dug nas/ /oM badzra b+ha ra ba dzwa la dzwa la hUM/ zhes bas lus bsrungs nas/ bla ma dkon mchog la mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod nas sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa bya'o/ /oM a b+hA wa swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+ha badzra tsakra a A(rgyud 'grel): aM a:
85a4(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya bas stong pa ? sgom mo/ /de nas bdag nyid yi ge ar gnas pa las de'i 'od zer gyis tshangs pa dang brgya byin gyi steng du nyi zla'i steng du a zhu ba utpal 'khor los mtshan pa de zhu ba las bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba sku mdog mthing nag
85a5(rgyud 'grel): g.yas na rdo rje g.yon na utpal 'dzin pa/ gzhon nu'i cha lugs la rgyan gyis brgyan pa bsam mo/ /de'i thugs kha na nyi ma la hUM gnas pa can du bsams te/ hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra rgyun mi 'chad par byung bas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad mchod/
85a6(rgyud 'grel): tshur hUM? la thim pas zhe sdang gi skur gyur pa ni/ zhal drug phyag rnam pa drug dang ldan pa stobs che ba/ ma he'i zhal can sku mdog mthing nag /mi mgo brgya'i do shal can/ zhabs brkyang skum du bzhugs pa/ phyag drug g.yas g.yon gyi dang po keng rus
85a7(rgyud 'grel): kyi dbyung ba dang rdo rje bsnams pa/ g.yas g.yon gyi bar ba na mda' gzhu dang ral gri /tha ma na sna tshogs rdo rje dang mdung bsnams pa'o/ /de las tshad med pa bzhi'i khro bo 'phro ba can no/ /zhabs bzhi brkyang skum du bzhugs pa bsgoms/ /de'i thugs
85b1(rgyud 'grel): kar nyi ma'i steng du hUM bsams la/ /spyan drang ba la sogs pa rdzogs pa dang/ gsang sngags bzlas pa ni/ oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TE(rgyud 'grel): wi kri tE? na na hUM hUM zhes pa 'am/ oM du(rgyud 'grel): khats+tshe da hUM hUM zhes pa bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas mtshan gyi sgo nas bstod do/ /gtor ma
85b2(rgyud 'grel): gtang nas gshegs su gsol te ldang bar bya'o/ /bdag gis dge ba 'di byas pas/ /bla med byang chub thob par shog /rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub thabs slob dpon a sho ka sh+rIs mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta d+harma sh+rI mi tra dang lots+tsha ba chos
85b3(rgyud 'grel): kyi bzang bas bsgyur ba'o// // */ /rgya gar skad du/ ya ma a ri kA la sA d+ha nA ma/ bod skad du/ gshin rje dgra nag po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab ye shes la phyag 'tshal lo/ /log pa'i
85b4(rgyud 'grel): lta ba gcod mdzad cing/ /shes rab snying rjes rab tu khros/ /mche ba gtsigs shing bshad mdzad pa/ /gshin rje'i dgra la phyag 'tshal nas/ /rgyud chen sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/ /bla ma'i man ngag la brten nas/ /bdag gis sgrub
85b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rim pa bzhin/ /sgrub la phan phyir brtsam par bya/ /dben zhing me tog bcal bkram pa'i/ /bde ba'i stan la nyer 'dug ste/ /lha dang dkon mchog spyan drangs nas/ /mchod dang sdig bshags la sogs bya/ /a b+hA wa swa b+hA wa bi
85b6(rgyud 'grel): shud+d+ha badzra tsakra a A aM a(rgyud 'grel): de nas stong pa'i ting 'dzin las/ /nam mkhar a ni bsam par bya/ /rdo rje me dpung rab tu 'phros/ /rdo rje'i steng du a bsams te/ /gyur pas shes rab ye shes ni/ /mdog dkar 'khor lo ral gri 'dzin/ /nyi steng hUM
85b7(rgyud 'grel): gi 'phro 'du las/ /gyur pas gshin rje'i gshed po ni/ /bgegs kyi rgyal po chen po ni/ /lus ni rdo rjes rnam par brgyan/ /phyag na rdo rje be con dang/ /shugs dang bcas pa'i sprul zhags bsnams/ /tshad med bzhi ldan khro bo ni/ /shin tu khros pa rnam
86a1(rgyud 'grel): bar bsgom/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya bas dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang/ /bcing ba dang dgyes pa bskyed nas/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs nas dbang bskur bya'o/ /de nas bsgom pas skyo na bzlas pa bya ste/ /oM pradz+nyA dz+nyA na
86a2(rgyud 'grel): murta ye ya mAn+ta ka hUM zhes brjod nas/ mtshan brjod de gtor ma btang bar bya'o/ /de ltar bstod nas gshegs su gsol lo/ /bdag gis 'gro la phan phyir brtsams/ /dge bas 'bras bu tshad med shog /gshin rje'i gshed kyi sgrub thabs slob dpon a sho ka
86a3(rgyud 'grel): sh+rIs mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta d+harmA sh+rI mi tra dang lots+tsha ba chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o// //rgya gar skad du/ Arya tsa la sA d+ha nAM/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i bsgrub thabs/ rdo rje rnon po la
86a4(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal lo/ /gsung sgra zab mo'i sgra sgrogs shing/ /'jam pa'i mgon la phyag 'tshal nas/ /mtshan gyi don la rab brten te/ /bdag gis sgrub thabs rab tu bshad/ /me tog khang pa mdzes par ni/ /bde ba'i stan la nyer 'dug ste/ /rang
86a5(rgyud 'grel): gi snying kha'i a las ni/ /dkon mchog la sogs spyan drangs te/ /phyag 'tshal mchod pa sogs pa bya/ /byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed do/ /oM a b+hA wa swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+ha badzra tsakra a A aM a(rgyud 'grel): de nas a las byung ba yi/ /rdo rje rnon por rab
86a6(rgyud 'grel): bskyed de/ /sku mdog pad+ma ral gri bsnams/ /glang chen steng du rab tu bsam/ /nyi steng ral gri 'phro 'du las/ /mi g.yo bar ni rab tu gyur/ /ral pa gcig bsdus 'gyid bag can/ /sku mdog dmar nag 'jigs byed che/ /glang chen ko ba rlon pas
86a7(rgyud 'grel): brgyan/ /shugs dang bcas pa'i klu yis brgyan/ /zhags pa ral gri phyag na bsnams/ /ha ha hi hi rdo rje'i sgra/ /me'i phung po rab 'phro bas/ /tshad med bzhi ldan bsgom par bya/ /nyi ma a'i sa bon las/ /bde gshegs spyan drangs rab tu mchod/ /
86b1(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya bzhi yis rgyas btab nas/ /dbang bskur byin brlabs la sogs bya/ /de nas skyon bzlas pa bya ste/ oM badzra tik+Sh+Na a tsa la d+hi/ de nas gtor ma btang bar bya'o/ /oM badzra mu(rgyud 'grel): spyod lam gyis gnas par bya'o/ /dri med ye shes las byung 'di
86b2(rgyud 'grel): bdag gis sgrub thabs las byung ba/ /dge ba zla ltar gsal ba gang/ /de yis sku gsum thob par shog /mi g.yo ba'i sgrubs thabs/ /slob dpon a sho ka sh+rIs mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta d+harmA sh+rI mi tra dang/ lots+tsha ba dge
86b3(rgyud 'grel): slong chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o// // */ /rgya gar skad du/ ba liM bi ti/ bod skad du/ gtor ma'i cho ga /'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yid bzhin nor bu chen po 'chad/ /dpag bsam shing
86b4(rgyud 'grel): chen rgyas 'dra ste/ /bum pa bzang po che ba'i mchog /sems can kun don byed la 'dud/ /gtor ma'i rim pa bshad par bya/ /dang por lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan par sngags pas rin po che'i snod mdzes pa'i nang du kha zas kyi 'byor ba dri dang kha dog dang
86b5(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa sna tshogs bcug? la/ /gtor ma'i nang du yi ge a las yid bzhin gyi nor bu 'bar ba zla ba'i steng du rnam par bsams la/ de las bdud rtsi chu rgyun dang/ 'dod pa'i yon tan gyi rnam par spras pas snod dang bcud chos kyi dbyings khyab par
86b6(rgyud 'grel): bsam zhing bsgom pa ni/ /yid bzhin nor bu chen po 'chang/ /khyab bdag rin chen kun gyi mchog ces bya'o/ /bdag nyid kyi snying kha'i d+hi las/ /dpag bsam shing chen rgyas pa ste/ /bum pa bzang po che ba'i mchog /ces bya ba ni/ dpag bsam
86b7(rgyud 'grel): gyi shing nam mkha' i mdza' dang mnyam pa/ bum pa bdud rtsis gang ba'i 'bras bu smin pa bdud rtsi rnam par 'dzag pa yis gtor ma'i rgyun rgyas par bsam mo/ /thugs kha'i 'od zer gyis ye shes kyi bdud rtsi dbab te/ gnyis su med par bsam mo/ /
87a1(rgyud 'grel): oM sarba ta thA ga ta h+ri dA ya/ ha ra ha ra/ oM hUM h+rI b+ha ga waM d+ha dz+nyA na murti wa gi shwa ra mahA pa tsa sarba d+harmA/ ga ga na/ a ma la su pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma d+hA tu a/ oM hUM h+rI/ zhes pas byin gyis brlab bo/ /sna tshogs gzugs can yid
87a2(rgyud 'grel): las skyes/ /'jig rten gsum na gzhon lus gcig /ces bya ba ni/ de nas snying khar 'od zer gyis/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pa dang/ khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad bkug ste/ de dag thams cad snying
87a3(rgyud 'grel): gar yi ge a bkod pa'i 'od zer gyis rnam par sbyangs te/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal du bsam mo/ /gsum sel mdza' yas grol gsum thob/ /sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyan dang ldan/ /zhes bya ba ni yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs la/
87a4(rgyud 'grel): dngos sam yid kyi lus dpag tu med pa sprul la mchod do/ /nam mkha' i mdza' la longs spyod cing/ /sems can kun yid tshim par byed/ /ces bya ba ni der ljags kyi 'od zer gyis bdud rtsi'i rgyun la zhugs te/ /kun gyi yid tshim par dmigs shing
87a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa'i longs spyod kyis tshim par bya'o/ /de nas chos kyi sbyin bdag chen po ste/ /mchod 'os bstod 'os phyag gis gnas/ /zhes pas phreng ba'i sngags dang/ a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harma NAM adyA nutpan+na twa da oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM zhes pa dang/ tshigs su
87a6(rgyud 'grel): bcad pa'i bstod pas chos kyi sbyin pa bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /shes rab kyis ni de thob shog /byang chub chen por sngo zhing smon lam rgya chen po gdab/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM mu(rgyud 'grel): zhes pas gshegs su gsol lo/ /pha rol phyin
87a7(rgyud 'grel): dang rgyud rnams ma lus dang/ /bde gshegs rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus kyi/ /kun gyi bdag nyid khyab par thugs la gnas/ /ye shes lus can mtshan don rgya che ba/ /sna tshogs tshul las bstod kyis di ring bdag gis 'dir/ /dam
87b1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i gdams ngag nyer bstan rnal 'byor lam du sbyar/ /'di la dge ba dri med gang thob des/ /bdag sogs 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' 'drar gyur cig /'jam pa'i mgon po'i gtor ma'i cho ga zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ Arya  
87b2(rgyud 'grel): many+dzu sh+rI tsArya marga bi d+hi/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi spyod lam gyi cho ga /'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zab mo'i don ldan bde gshegs chos kyi sku/ /thugs rje rang byung ye shes sku lnga'i bdag /gnyis med don ldan
87b3(rgyud 'grel): spros med bdag nyid can/ /rje btsun 'jam pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba la brten nas/ /sgrub pa po la phan gdags phyir/ /gdams ngag sgrub pa'i rim pa cig /legs par btus te bshad par bya/ /lam gyi yan lag brgyad
87b4(rgyud 'grel): tshul rig /yang dag sangs rgyas lam rigs go /rigs dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor bas/ /dbang thob dam tshig ldan par bya/ /de nyid 'dod pa'i gnas btsal nas/ /de mdun maN+Dal legs par bya/ bla ma dkon mchog yi dam lha/ /cho ga shes pas
87b5(rgyud 'grel): me tog bkram/ /b+h+ruM las gzhal yas khang bskyed do/ /gshin rje gshed dam rdo rje gur/ /me ri la sogs bsrung ba byas/ /bar chad zhi byed gtor ma dang/ /dang por khrus byas gos rgyan gdags/ /stan bde ba la 'dug byas te/ /tshad med bzhi la
87b6(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa bya/ /oM A b+hA wa swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+ha badzra tsakra a A aM a(rgyud 'grel): zhes pas so/ /d+hi pas dang po bdag nyid bskyed/ /dgug pa la sogs pa'i gsang sngags ni/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa dang/ byin brlabs dbang bskur mi bskyod pa'o/
87b7(rgyud 'grel): des ni bskyed pa'i rnal 'byor ro/ /khrus ni dang po bum pa stong/ /stong pa nyid las a de skyed/ /nang du bdud rtsi 'od kyis dgang/ /ye shes bdud rtsi dbab cing bstim/ /dang por sgo lnga'i rnam shes bkru /ye shes sems dpa' bcom ldan
88a1(rgyud 'grel): 'das/ /dang po'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ /rnam par snang mdzad bcom ldan 'das/ /sku gsung thugs kyis byin brlabs kyis/ /bag chags dri ma dag gyur cig /de ni khrus kyi cho ga'o/ /bzlas pa'i rnal 'byor ni/ /
88a2(rgyud 'grel): sa bon yig 'bru'i rnam pa dang/ d+hi badzra tik+Sh+Na/ du(rgyud 'grel): khats+tshe da/ pradz+nyA dz+nyA na murta ye/ dz+nyA na ka ye/ wA gi shwa ra/ a ra pa tsa na d+hI(rgyud 'grel): ye shes sems pa zla ba'i gdan bcas thugs khar ro/ /phyag mtshan ral gri yu pa d+hi(rgyud 'grel): yig 'bru dang bcas pa'o
88a3(rgyud 'grel): bzlas pa yi'o/ /gtor ma a las rin chen 'bru lnga bcud/ /as bskyed yid bzhin nor bu can/ /ye shes bdud rtsi dpag bsam las/ /'gron ni 'jam dpal rang bzhin na/ /zas ni mi dmigs stong pa las/ /paM las pad+ma a las
88a4(rgyud 'grel): nor bu'o/ /ye shes bdud rtsi dgu bstim mo/ /de nas rang nyid lhar gsal bas/ /thugs kha'i lha mchod mnyes par bsgom/ /de nas zas kyi rnal 'byor ro/ /dang po byams dang snying rje dang ldan pas lus ngag byin brlab bo/ /de nas spyan drang
88a5(rgyud 'grel): phyag bstod bya/ /mchod cing sdig bshags rjes yi rang/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bskul dang/ /mya ngan mi 'da' gsol ba gdab/ /skyabs 'gro sems bskyed la sogs bya'o/ /de nas stong pa'i ting 'dzin bsgom/ /de nas a las chos 'byung
