88a6(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /dkar po gru gsum 'bar ldan pa/ /de nas pad+ma zla steng du/ /d+hi las dang po sangs rgyas bskyed/ /dgug dang dbab sogs rdzogs pa dang/ /bstod pa'i tshul du gdon pa'o/ /nyal dang 'gro dang 'dug pa dang/ gzhan yang bskor ba bya ba ni/ mya ngan
88a7(rgyud 'grel): 'das par bzhugs pa dang/ /de nas thon pa lta bu dang/ /pha rol phyin drug bden pa bzhi/ /tsha tsha 'debs dang klog dang shad/ /kha ton 'dri dang spyod dus su/ /'jam dpal sku dang 'bral mi bya'o/ /sgyu ma lta bus gnas par bya'o/ /sdug
88b1(rgyud 'grel): bsngal can dag mthong gyur na/ /byams sems ldan pas dag par bsngo/ /rnal 'byor mi gtsang 'dor ba kun/ /bdud rtsir byin brlabs gnyis med bstim/ /'byung po yi dags kun la sbyin/ /tshim par byas la gshegs su gsol/ /dpe med gcig gcig
88b2(rgyud 'grel): mthong ba na/ /bde dang sdug bsngal du mar snang/ /sems kyi rnam 'gyur brtan pa yin/ /zhes spyod lam gyi rim pa'o/ /bsgom pa'i rim pa brtan pa ni/ /mtshan ma dang bcas mtshan med pa'o/ mtshan ma sku dang yig 'bru dang/ /phyag mtshan la ni dmigs
88b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /mtshan ma med pa bstan pa ni/ /shes rab ral gri mda' gzhu ste/ /zhes pa ni shes rab 'khor lo thabs dang shes rab gnyis la dmigs pa'o/ /yang na sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin 'chang/ /zhes pas tshogs bsags pa'o/ /rnam par
88b4(rgyud 'grel): gnon zhes pa ni/ /bsod nams kyis bsod nams ma yin pa gnon/ /ye shes te nam mkha' dang 'dra bas mkha' ltar mdza' med do/ /gsum rig ste sku'i bskyed pa'o/ /'bras bu mngon par shes pa lnga phra men bcu drug go /gnas pa rtsa/ g.yo ba rlung/ bgrod
88b5(rgyud 'grel): pa byang chub ste/ byang chub sems pa sems pa che/ /zhes pa dang rdzu 'phrul chen po zhes pa'o/ /de yang mthar yang dag par stong pa ste/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i mdza' / /de las de nyid de chos sku'o/ /gzhan rig pa ste/ /longs sku dang sprul
88b6(rgyud 'grel): sku'o/ /dpe byad ces pa dang/ /gtso bo zhes pa gnyis kyi don no/ /de na bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor ro/ /bla ma'i gdams ngag rgyud 'grel la brten nas/ dri ma med pa'i dge ba gang brtsams pa/ /des ni dge ba gang thob des/ /'gro kun 'jam dbyangs
88b7(rgyud 'grel): thob par shog /rgya gar gyi mkhan po a shwa ka sh+ris mdzad pa rdzogs so// //shAkya'i dge slong chos kyi bzang pos dri ma d+ha ra dang nye ba'i rtsar zhus te bsgyur ba'o// //*/ /rgya gar skad du/ badzra many+dzu sh+rI b+ha? bi ti//
89a1(rgyud 'grel): bod skad du/ 'jam dpal rdo rje'i bum pa'i cho ga /'phags pa 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sgrub pa po la phan gdags phyir/ /nyon mongs dri ma kun dag phyir/ /mtshan nyid ldan pa'i gang zag la//
89a2(rgyud 'grel): bum pa'i cho ga bshad par bya/ /dang por mtshan nyid ldan gnas su/ /sa bslang sbyang zhing maN+Dal bya/ /thig gdab tshon ni byin gyis brlab/ /tshom bu lnga ldan 'khor lo bcu drug ldan/ /gru chang bzhi ldan sgo bzhi rta babs ldan/ /'khor lo
89a3(rgyud 'grel): bcu drug gru chang bzhi dang ldan/ /pany+tsa ratna 'dod yon snam bu dang/ /rin chen pa gu sgo bzhi rta babs bri/ /rin chen bdun las byas pa'i mchod pa'i rten/ /gdugs dang ba dan cod pan dril bus brgyan/ /gser dang dngul dang zangs dang lcags
89a4(rgyud 'grel): las byas/ /bum pa kha dog lnga dang ldan pa'o/ /rin chen sna lnga 'bru sna lnga dang ni/ /sman lnga dri lnga dkar la sogs pa'i rdzas/ /bdud rtsi'i chus gang la rgyan 'bras bu can/ /mgul chings gzungs thag bum pa'i rigs dang sbyar/ /so so'i
89a5(rgyud 'grel): gdan du gnyis po dgod/ /dang por bla ma dkon mchog spyan drang ste/ /phyag mchod sdig bshags yi rang bskor bar bskul/ /mya ngan mi 'da' lus dbul dge rtsar bsngo/ /tshad med bzhi ldan byang chub mchog tu bsngo/ /stong pa'i ting nge
89a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin sngags kyis kun nas bskul/ /de nas gur dang dra ba'i steng du ni/ /hUM las rdo rje b+h+ruM las mchod rten ni/ /h+ri las chos 'byung a las rdo rje'o/ /de steng b+h+ruM las gzhal yas khang pa'o/ /gdan lnga zla ba'i gdan ni so sor gsal/ /yi ge
89a7(rgyud 'grel): a las rnal 'byor rnam gsum bsgom/ /dam tshig 'khor lo a las sku skyed do/ /ye shes 'khor lo dgug cing bstim par bya/ /sku gsum byin brlabs dbang bskur nyid kyi mtshan/ /thabs dang shes rab bum pa rab tu don/ /thabs dang
89b1(rgyud 'grel): shes rab 'od zer bdud rtsi dbab/ /mchod rten rnams ni lha'i rang bzhin gsal/ /so so'i thabs dang shes rab ma lus ldan/ /thugs ka'i a las rgyud ni gdon par bya/ /de las dang po'i sangs rgyas 'dud bstod bya/ /de'i thugs 'od mchod pa
89b2(rgyud 'grel): rnam lnges mchod/ /bum pa bzang po che ba'i mchog /rnam par dag pa bdag med chos/ /yang dag ye shes zla 'od bzang/ /brtson chen sgyu 'phrul 'dra ba las/ /rdo rje'i gdan ni ma lus ldan/ /ye shes sku rnams ma lus 'chang/ /nyon mongs
89b3(rgyud 'grel): khams rnams dag pa'i bdag /las kyi khams rnams zad byed cing/ /chu bo rgya mtsho kun las rgal/ /nyon mongs nye ba kun nyon mongs/ /bag chags bcas pa gtan du spangs shes so/ /lung dang man ngag dag la rab brten nas/ /bdag
89b4(rgyud 'grel): gis 'di 'dra'i phan gdags cho ga brtsams/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba dri med gang thob pa/ /des ni 'jam dpal rdo rje thob par shog /dpal 'jam pa'i mgon po'i bum pa'i cho ga /slob dpon chen po mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //  
89b5(rgyud 'grel): dpal u rgyan gyi mkhan po chen po d+harmA sh+rI mi tra'i zhal snga nas dang/ zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba bod kyi shAkya'i dge slong dpal gyi bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //*/ (/'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' i sgrub thabs slob dpon gnyis med
89b6(rgyud 'grel): spas pas mdzad pa bzhugs so/) /rgya gar skad du/ dz+nyA na satwa sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ ye shes sems dpa' i sgrub thabs/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos kun rang bzhin ye shes sems dpa' yis/ /ma lus
89b7(rgyud 'grel): bde gshegs kun gyi mtshan gyur pa/ /rdo rje 'chang chen kun gyi glu /zab cing rgya che byang chub sems dpa' nyon/ /byang chub sems bskyed lhag pa'i sku ru bsgom/ /sgyu ma rten 'brel rnam gsum sbyor ba la/ /ma lus gnyis med mkha' khyab 'khor lo
90a1(rgyud 'grel): sgom/ /ma skyes mi 'gag rnam gsum sgyu ma ni/ /shes rab mig gis gsal bar blta bar bya/ /sgyu ma brag cha nam mkha' las byung bzhin/ /yongs su shes nas ma zhes sems kyi bklag /rnal 'byor lam chen gsang sngags
90a2(rgyud 'grel): 'di yin te/ /ji ltar dngos rnams mkhas la gnas pa bzhin/ /dam tshig dkyil 'khor phyag rgya che la gnas/ /don ni mi shes pa dag pa'i las gzhan gyis/ /'byor ba'i grong gsum dag las de mi g.yo/ /de lta'i don shes rang bzhin nyes pa
90a3(rgyud 'grel): spangs/ /spos kyi glang po ke ta dug zos bzhin/ /nyes? pa'i tshogs bcoms gzhung tshogs yon tan ldan/ /'gag pa med pa'i chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur/ /thugs kyi gsang mdzod gtsug gi rin po che/ /rang bzhin 'gro kun chos rnams ma lus bcad
90a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyud don dbang po rdo rje'i tshig tu gnas/ /mkha' 'gro'i rjes 'brang nye bar bsdus pa yin/ /slob dpon gnyis su med pa'i sbas pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar skad du/ nA ma saM gI ti sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ mtshan yang dag par brjod
90a5(rgyud 'grel): pa sgrub pa'i thabs/ /ngag gi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dang por ro shig sgrub pa pos spar langs te/ kha la sogs pa dag par byas la/ bsam gtan gyi khang par rab tu zhugs te/ bde ba'i stan la nye bar gnas nas/ snying kha pad+ma dang zla ba la
90a6(rgyud 'grel): dmar zhing dkar ba'i muM bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas 'od zer gyi tshogs lcags kyu'i rnam pa can gyis dkug pa'i bcom ldan 'das 'od 'byung ba'i mdog dang zhal dang phyag mtshan dang gdan dang nye bar ldan pa mdun du rnam par bsgoms te/ yid kyi rang bzhin
90a7(rgyud 'grel): gyi me tog dang bdug pa la sogs pa yang dag par mchod la/ de'i mdun du sdig pa bshags pa la sogs bya zhing/ byams pa la sogs pa tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi da sgoms nas chos thams cad stong pa nyid mngon du byas te/ oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na
90b1(rgyud 'grel): badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma konyahaM zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /de nas nam mkha' la hUM las byung ba'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa sa bon dang bcas pa rnam par bsgoms la/ de'i 'od zer gyis ji lta ba'i sbyor bas/ /rdo rje'i ra ba dang rdo rje'i gur dang sa 'og
90b2(rgyud 'grel): kun rdo rje'i sa gzhir dmigs la/ rdo rje yang 'od zer du kun nas rdo rje'i ra ba las phyi rol du phyogs bcing ba la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis nye bar gnas pas lta'o/ /de'i rjes su rdo rje'i nang du h+rI(rgyud 'grel): dmar po yongs su gyur pa las pad+ma'o/ /pad+ma'i
90b3(rgyud 'grel): steng du a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /de'i steng du dmar zhing dkar ba'i muM las sangs rgyas mang po spro ba dang bsdu ba'i rnam par bsgoms la/ de yongs su gyur pa las rje btsun 'jam pa'i dbyangs dmar zhing dkar ba pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng na rdo rje'i skyil
90b4(rgyud 'grel): krung gis bzhugs pa zhal dang po dmar po g.yas sngon po g.yon dkar po zhes bya ba'i zhal gsum pa bsgom par bya'o/ /phyag bzhi ji lta ba'i sbyor bas shes rab kyi po ti dang/ ral gri dang gzhu dang/ mda' dang ldan pa'o/ /rdo rje'i dbu rgyan can/ mtshan
90b5(rgyud 'grel): sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus rnam par mdzes pa/ /gzhon nu'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i bdag nyid du bsams la/ snying gar pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du rdo rje sems dpa' dkar po sems dpa' i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ g.yon
90b6(rgyud 'grel): pa dril bu dkul brten cing 'chang ba/ /g.yas na rang gi snying gar 'degs par byed pa'i sbyor bas rdo rje 'chang ba'o/ /de bzhin du smin mtshams su rin chen rdo rje sems ma phyag gnyis kyis spyi bor me tog gi phreng bas 'ching zhing gnas pa'o/ /
90b7(rgyud 'grel): mgrin par pad+ma rdo rje dmar zhing dkar ba/ g.yon pa pad+ma'i sdong bu 'gying bag dang bcas pa bzung ba g.yas pa de'i 'dab ma kha 'byed cing sngon bzhin du nye bar gnas pa'o/ /spyi bor las kyi rdo rje ma mdog ljang gu rdo rje rtse gsum pa dang ldan pa'i phyag
91a1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis bdag nyid kyi spyi bor 'chang zhing de kho na bzhin du nye bar gnas pa bsgom par bya'o/ /oM badzra aM ku sha dza(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra pA sha hUM oM badzra spho Ta paM/ oM badzra a be sha ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du go rims
91a2(rgyud 'grel): ji lta bar ye shes kyi 'khor lo dgug pa dang/ gzhug pa dang/ /bcing ba dang/ dbang du bya'o/ rdo rje'i khu tshur gnyis bcings te sdigs mdzub dang mthe'u chung lcags sgrog tu byas shing sprad pa bkan te rang gi kha ru nye bar bzhag pa ni rdo rje 'khor lo'i
91a3(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya ste/ arga dang/ zhabs bsil dang/ me tog dang/ bdug spos la sogs pas yang dag par mchod la skad cig gis rang gi lus la gzhug par bya'o/ /de'i rjes su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag la dbang bskur ba sngon du 'gro bas mi bskyod
91a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bdag nyid kyi rnam pas dbu brgyan par bsam la/ oM sarba d+harmA(rgyud 'grel): a b+hA wa swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+ha/ badzra a A aM a(rgyud 'grel): pra kri ti pa ri shud+d+ha sarba d+harma(rgyud 'grel): ya tu ta/ sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na kA ya many+dzu sh+rI pa ri shud+d+hi ta/ mu pa ta ye ti a A/ sarba ta thA ga ta h+ri da ya ha ra ha
91a5(rgyud 'grel): ra ha/ oM hUM h+ri(rgyud 'grel): b+ha ga waM dz+nyA na murta wA gi shwa ra mahA pa tsa sarba d+harmA ga ga na a mA la su pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma d+hA tu dz+nyA na garb+ha a(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis dang po dang bar dang tha mar byin gyis brlab pa sngon du 'gro bas rje btsun gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa sngon du
91a6(rgyud 'grel): 'gro bas nyi ma re re zhing so so'i thun mtshams su lan gsum mam gcig tu skyil krung ma bshig pas mnyam par bzhag pas klag par bya'o/ /de ltar ji srid sgrub pa'i mtshan ma ma thon gyi bar du klag par bya'o/ /de'i rjes su rgyud ji lta ba bzhin du dngos grub kyi thabs
91a7(rgyud 'grel): la rjes su gnas par bya'o/ /mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgrub thabs/ /slob dpon mi g.yo seng+ges mdzad pa rdzogs so// //mar pa do pas bsgyur ba'o// //rgya gar skad du/ nA ma saM gAM ti sA d+ha naM nA ma/ bod skad du/ mtshan
91b1(rgyud 'grel): yang dag par brjod pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sgrub pa pos dang por shig snga bar langs te/ kha la sogs pa gtsang bar byas nas bsam gtan gyi khyad par rab tu zhugs nas bde ba'i stan la rdo rje skyil krung gis
91b2(rgyud 'grel): nye bar 'dug ste/ rang gi snying khar pad+ma dang zla ba la mu(rgyud 'grel): yig dmar ser bsgom par bya'o/ /de'i 'od kyi tshogs lcags kyu'i rnam pa rnams kyis bkug ste/ 'chad par 'gyur ba'i bcom ldan 'das kyi sku mdog phyag mtshan bzhugs tshul mdun du bsgoms te/
91b3(rgyud 'grel): de'i mdun du me tog dang gdug spos la sogs pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod/ /sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa byas nas byams pa la sogs pa tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom par bya'o/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid du mngon sum du byas nas/ oM shu n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra
91b4(rgyud 'grel): swa b+hA wA at+ma konyahaM/ zhes pa'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /de nas nam mkha' hUM yi ges rdo rje rtse lnga pa sa bon dang bcas pas bsgom mo/ /de'i 'od rnams kyis ji ltar rigs par rdo rje'i ra ba dang/ rdo rje'i dra ba dang rdo rje'i sa gzhis bdud 'joms par dmigs
91b5(rgyud 'grel): te/ rdo rje'i 'od kyang rdo rje'i sa gzhi dang ra ba las phyi rol phyogs dang phyogs bral gyi gzugs kyis gnas par blta'o/ /de nas bar ma chad par rdo rje'i ra ba'i nang du pad+ma'i steng du oM yi ges bzla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du mu(rgyud 'grel): yi ge kha dog dmar ser la ma lus pa'i sangs
91b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyas spro ba dang bsdu ba'i rnam pa bsgom par bya'o/ /de yongs su gyur pa la rje btsun 'jam dpal sku mdog dmar ser pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du rdo rje skyil krung gis bzhugs pa/ zhal dang po dmar pa g.yas sngo ba/ g.yon dkar ba/ des na zhal gsum pa phyag
91b7(rgyud 'grel): bzhi pa/ ji ltar rigs par shes rab ral gri dang/ po ti dang/ mda' dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /rin po che'i cod pan can/ /mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dbye byad bzang po brgyad cus rnam par mdzes pa/ gzhon nu gzhon nu'i rgyan gyis brgyan par bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o/
92a1(rgyud 'grel): thugs khar pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du/ sems dpa' i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa'i rdo rje sems ma sku mdog dkar mo g.yon na dril bu dang g.yas na rdo rje bzung ste rang gi thugs khar bslad nas sbyor ba'o/ /sngar bzhin mdzod spur gnas
92a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rin chen rdo rje ma sku mdog ser mo phyag gnyis kyis dbu la me tog gi phreng ba 'ching ba can no/ mgrin par pad+ma rdo rje ma sku mdog dmar ser g.yon na snying po dang bcas pa'i pad+ma/ /g.yas kyis de'i 'dab ma kha 'byed pa'o/ /sngar bzhin gnas pa'o//
92a3(rgyud 'grel): spyi bor las kyi rdo rje ma sku mdog ljang gu phyag gnyis kyis rang gi spyi bor rdo rje rtse gsum 'dzin pa/ de ltar gnas pa bsgom par bya'o/ /oM badzra aM ku sha dza(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra pA sha hUM/ oM badzra spho Ta baM/ oM badzrA be sha ho/ zhes pa'i sngags rnams kyis pad+ma
92a4(rgyud 'grel): dang zla ba'i steng du ji lta ba'i rim pas ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang/ dbang du bya ba'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings sdigs mdzub dang mthe bo chung dag lu gu rgyud ltar byas pa'i rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya gan rkyal
92a5(rgyud 'grel): du bya'o/ /rang gi kha la bzhag la mchod yon dang zhabs bsil la sogs pa rnams kyis legs par mchod la skad cig la gzhug par bya'o/ /de'i rjes su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur te/ sngar bzhin mi bskyod pa spyi bor
92a6(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid kyis bsgom par bya'o/ /oM sarba d+harmA swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+ha badzra a A aM a(rgyud 'grel): pra kri ta pa ri shud+d+ha(rgyud 'grel): sarbba d+harmA ya tu ta sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na ka ya many+dzu sh+rI pa ri shud+d+hi ta mu pA dA ye ti a A(rgyud 'grel): sarbba ta thA ga ta h+ri da ya ha ra ha ra oM hUM h+ri/ b+ha ga waM
92a7(rgyud 'grel): dz+nyA na murti bA gi shwa ra mahA pA tsa sarba d+harmA ga ga na a mA la pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma d+hA tu dz+nyA na garb+ha A(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa'i sngags kyis dang po dang bar dang tha mar byin gyis brlabs pa sngar ltar rje btsun mtshan yang dag par nyin re bzhin thun gsum du lan gsum mam lan cig 'don
92b1(rgyud 'grel): bar dga' ba'i mthar thug pa'i phan yon dang bcas pa klag par bya'o/ /de ltar ji srid klag pa'i de srid du grub pa'i rtags mthong ngo/ /de ma thag tu ji lta ba'i sngags kyis grub pa'i tshul rjes su sngags so/ /mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgrub thabs mkhas pa chen
92b2(rgyud 'grel): po pra b+ha ka ras mdzad pa rdzogs so/ //lots+tsha ba shAkya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos dge slong gzhon rin chen gyi don du dpal thar pa gling gi gtsug lag khang du legs par bsgyur ba'o// //rgya gar skad du/ nA ma saM gI
92b3(rgyud 'grel): ti sA d+ha naM nA ma/ bod skad du/ mtshan yang dag par brjod pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /re shig dang por sgrub pa po snga bar langs te/ gdong la sogs pa dag par byas te/ sgom pa'i khang par bzhugs te
92b4(rgyud 'grel): bde ba'i stan la skyil mo krung gis 'dug ste/ rang gi snying khar zla ba dang pad+ma la mu(rgyud 'grel): yig dmar ser bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas de'i 'od zer gyi phung po lcags kyu rnam pas 'chad par 'gyur ba'i bcom ldan 'das kha dog dang zhal dang phyag dang gdan dang
92b5(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa bkug ste/ mdun du bsam par bya'o/ /de la yid la bya ba'i me tog dang bdug pa la sogs pas yang dag par mchod de/ mdun du sdig pa bshegs pa la sogs pa thams cad bya ste/ byams pa la sogs pa tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom par
92b6(rgyud 'grel): byas la/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid mngon du byas te sngags 'dis byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /oM shu'n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa at+ma konyahaM/ de nas nam mkha' la hUM yig las rdo rje rtse lnga pa sa bon dang bcas pa bsgom par bya'o/ /de'i steng du a yig la
92b7(rgyud 'grel): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor/ de'i 'od zer rnams kyis rdo rje ra ba dang rdo rje'i gur dang/ rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi sa gzhi gser gyi sa gzhi la thug pa bsgom par bya'o/ /rdo rje yang 'od zer du gyur nas rdo rje ra ba'i phyi ngos su phyogs bcing ba la sogs pa'i gzugs su
93a1(rgyud 'grel): gnas par blta'o/ /de'i rjes la rdo rje ra ba'i nang du h+rI(rgyud 'grel): yig las pad+ma/ de'i steng du a yig las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor/ de'i steng du mu(rgyud 'grel): yig dmar ser sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa spro ba dang sdu bar byed pa bsams la /de yongs su
93a2(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa las rje btsun 'jam dpal dmar ser pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du rdo rje'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ shes rab kyi po ti dang ral gri dang gzhu dang mda''dzin pa rin po che'i dbu rgyan can/ /mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan pa
93a3(rgyud 'grel): gzhon pa gzhon nu'i rgyan gyis brgyan par bdag nyid bsam mo/ /snying khar pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du sems dpa' i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa'i rdo rje sems ma dkar mo g.yon pa dril bu dkur rten pa/ g.yas pa'i snying khar bstod pa'i tshul gyis rdo rje 'dzin pa'o
93a4(rgyud 'grel): dpral bar de bzhin du yang dag par gnas pa'i rin chen rdo rje sems ma ser mo phyag gnyis kyis spyi bor me tog gi phreng ba 'ching ba'o/ /mgrin par pad+ma'i rdo rje ma dmar ser g.yon 'gying bag gi tshul gyi pad+ma'i rtsa ba 'dzin pa/ g.yas kyis de'i 'dab ma 'byed
93a5(rgyud 'grel): pa sngar bzhin du gnas par bya'o/ /spyi bor las kyi rdo rje ma ljang gu rdo rje rtse gsum lag pa gnyis kyis spyi bor 'dzin pa/ de bzhin du yang dag par bsgom par bya'o/ /oM badzra aM gu sha dza/ oM badzra pA sha hUM/ oM badzra spho Ta baM/ oM badzra be sha ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya
93a6(rgyud 'grel): pa 'di rnams kyi sngags kyis pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du go rim bzhin du ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang/ bcing ba dang dbang du byas te/ rdo rje khu tshur bcangs te mdzub mo dang mthe'u chung gnyis lcags sgrogs tu byas te/ rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya spras
93a7(rgyud 'grel): pas gan rkyal du byas pas rang gi snying kha ru bzhag pas/ yon chab dang/ zhabs bsil dang/ me tog dang spos la sogs pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod la/ des blag tu rang gi lus la gzhug par bya'o/ /de'i rjes la de bzhin gshegs pa thams
93b1(rgyud 'grel): cad kyis dbang bskur ba sngon du song bas bdag nyid kyi spyi bor mi bskyod pa bsams la/ oM sarba d+harma a b+hA wa swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+ha badzra a A aM a(rgyud 'grel): pra kri ti pa ri shud+d+ha sarba d+harmma ya tu ta satwa ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na kA ya many+dzu sh+rI pa ri shud+d+ha mu pa ta ye ti a A(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga ta h+ri da ya
93b2(rgyud 'grel): ha ra ha ra/ oM hUM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): b+ha ga waM dz+nyA na murti thA gi shwa ra ma hA pa tsa sarba d+harmma ga ga na a mA la su pa ri shud+d+ha d+harmma d+hA tu dz+nyA na garbba a(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa'i sngags 'das dang po dang tha ma dang dbus su byin gyis brlab pa sngon du song bas/ rje btsun mtshan yang dag par brjod pa rtag tu
93b3(rgyud 'grel): thun mtshams su lan gsum mam du ma yang rung/ rdo rje skyil mo krung bcas te mnyam par bzhag pas klag par bya'o/ /'di ji srid du klags pa de srid du grub pa'i mtshan ma rnams mthong ngo/ /de lta bas na sgrub thabs nyams su blang bar bya'o/ /mtshan yang dag par
93b4(rgyud 'grel): brjod pa'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// /dar ma grags kyis rang 'gyur byas/ /de yis bsod nams gang thob des/ /chos dbyings dag gi dbang phyug gis/ /'gro ba byin gyis brlab par shog/ // */ /rgya gar
93b5(rgyud 'grel): skad du/ nA ma saM gI ti ba tsa no pa de sha /bod skad du/ mtshan brjod klog pa'i man ngag ces bya ba/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dus gang yang rung bar khrus dag par byas la/ bsam gtan gyi khang par stan bde ba la 'dug ste/ rang gi snying
93b6(rgyud 'grel): khar pad+ma'i steng du yi ge muM(rgyud 'grel): dmar ser bsgom mo/ /de las 'od zer lcags kyu'i dbyibs can 'phros pas 'og nas 'chad pa'i sku mdog phyag mtshan dang ldan pa'i 'phags pa 'jam dpal spyan drangs la/ yan lag bdun pa rgyas par bya/ tshad med pa bzhi bsgom/
93b7(rgyud 'grel): 'di dag snying rje'i sa bon no/ /shes rab kyi sa bon gyis brlob pa'i sngags swa b+hA wa brjod la/ /nam mkha' lta bu'i stong pa nyid la yun ring du gnas par bya'o/ /stong pa'i ngang las yi ge hUM mthing nag bsam zhing de yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i lte pa
94a1(rgyud 'grel): la zla ba'i steng na hUM gnas pa bsam/ /de 'od du zhu ba las logs rnams la rdo rje'i ra ba steng du dra ba 'og tu gser gyis gzhi la thug pa'i rdo rje'i rang bzhin du yod pa/ rdo rje'i 'od kyis ra ba'i phyi rol gyi phyogs mtshams bcing ngo/ /'di ni srung
94a2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i 'khor lo ste phyi rol 'od kyis bgegs sreg par byed la nang gi rdo rjes 'bigs pa la sogs pas/ ra ba'i nang du bgegs kyis mi thar par bsams/ /de nas rdo rje'i ra ba'i nang du h+rI(rgyud 'grel): dkar po yongs su gyur pa las pad+ma/ de'i steng du A(rgyud 'grel): yongs su
94a3(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa las zla ba/ de'i steng du yi ge muM/ dmar ser zhig bsam/ de las 'od zer rgyal ba rigs lnga'i dbyibs can dpag tu med pa 'phros pas snod bcud thams cad la reg pas de dag kyang 'jam dbyangs su gyur nas tshur 'dus muM(rgyud 'grel): la thim par
94a4(rgyud 'grel): bsam/ de yongs su gyur pa las 'jam dbyangs sku mdog dmar ser zhabs rdo rje'i skyil krung du bzhugs pa phyag bzhi pa zhal gsum pa'i zhal g.yas nag po g.yon dkar bo dbus dmar po spyan gnyis gnyis yod pa/ phyag g.yas kyi dang
94a5(rgyud 'grel): po na ral gri gnyis pa na mda' bsnams pa/ g.yon gyi dang po na po ti gnyis pa na gzhu bsnams pa/ dbu la rin po che'i thor tshugs yod pa/ mchan sum cu rtsa gnyis mda' ba/ /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus spras pa/ rin po che'i rgyan du mas
94a6(rgyud 'grel): mdzes pa/ shin tu gzhon sha dang bcas pa'i sku 'od kyi phung po rab tu 'bar bar bsgom mo/ /de'i thugs khar pad zla'i steng du rdo rje sems ma dkar mo phyag g.yon pa dril bu dkur brten pa g.yas kyis rdo rje thugs khar bsnams pa/ mdzod pu la rin 
94a7(rgyud 'grel): chen rdo rje ma sku mdog ser mo phyag gnyis kyis dbu la me tog gi phreng ba 'dogs pa/ mgrin par pad+ma rdo rje ma/ sku mdog dmar ser phyag g.yon gyi pad+ma kha zum pa'i yu ba nas bzung zhing g.yas kyi rgyas par mdzad pa/ skra mtshams su las kyi
94b1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje ma sku mdog ljang gu phyag gnyis kyi rdo rje dpral bar bsten par bsgom mo/ /de nas thugs ka nas 'od zer 'phros nas ngag tu oM badzra aM ku sha dza(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod la/ ye shes sems dpa' mdun gyi nam mkha' la spyan drangs te/ mchod pas mnyes par byas la
94b2(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra aM gu sha dza(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod pas dgug /oM badzra pA sha hUM/ zhes dgug /oM badzra spho Ta baM zhes pas tha mi dad par bsam oM badzra be sha ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes pas dgyes par bsam mo/ /yang 'od zer 'phros te rgyal ba rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa spyan
94b3(rgyud 'grel): drangs la sangs rgyas rnams kyi phyag tu rin po che'i bum pa bsnams te spyi bo nas bdud rtsis dbang bskur bas nang du zag med kyi bde ba chen po skyas/ phyir chu lhag ma yongs su gyur pa las mi bskyod pa sku mdog nag po rigs kyis dbu brgyan no/ /de nas rdo rje khu tshur
94b4(rgyud 'grel): dang rdo rje'i phyag rgya bya/ 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas snying kha dang mgrin pa dang dpral bar rab bo/ /de dag char nas gzhung klog pa la 'jug par bya ste/ phan yon dang bcas te 'don na lags/ med kyang rung ste/ thog mar zhabs kyi sngags tshar gcig gdon/ dkyil
94b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gsum pa'i rjes la sngags tshar gcig /mjug tu tshar gcig ste/ mtshan brjod tshar re la sngags lan gsum gsum gdon/ mtshan brjod klog pa'i man ngag kha che'i paN+Di ta shAkya sh+rI b+ha dras mdzad pa rdzogs so// //*/ /rgya gar
94b6(rgyud 'grel): skad du/ bi sha tya kA ra b+hi saM shud+d+he kra ma na b+ha ga wa many+dzu sh+rI sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ rnam pa nyi shus byang chub pa'i rim pas bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal sgrub pa'i thabs/ 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de dang de yi theg pa yis/ /
94b7(rgyud 'grel): thabs kyis 'gro ba'i don byed pa/ /theg pa gcig gi bdag nyid can/ /dpal ldan de la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /shin tu dang ba'i ro gcig pa/ /mi g.yo dus kyi rtog bya ba/ /bdag nyid chen po gang yin pa/ /su zhig de la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /dad pa'i khyad bar
95a1(rgyud 'grel): ma rtogs kyang/ /chags ba'i dbang gis sems can bzhin/ /'dod chags la sogs la gnas kyang/ /gang yin de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi bdag nyid can/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi don byed mgon/ /kun tu
95a2(rgyud 'grel): don byed bltos med par/ /skyob pa de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de'i stobs kyis da ltar bdag /'jam dpal gnyis su med pa yi/ /rnam pa nyi shus mngon rtogs pa/ /sems can don du bshad par bya/ /dang por langs nas rnal 'byor ni/ /rang gi lha'i nga rgyal can
95a3(rgyud 'grel): rnam dag cho ga bzhin byas nas/ /mchod pa sman ma bsdu bar bya/ /oM badzra bi ga hUM/ dri ma yang ni bsal bar bya/ /oM sa mAn+ta pa rik+Sha gu hya tsa ri tsa ra tsa ra hUM/ de'i rjes la skyang nul bya/ /oM ne rma ni sho d+ha hUM/ drir bcas chu'i thig pa yis/ /skyob
95a4(rgyud 'grel): pa la yang maN+Dal bya/ /oM ma hA maN+Dal li hUM/ sngar nyid langs pa'i gnas dag tu/ /'jam pa'i stan la gnas bar bya/ /oM a mu ka padmo b+ha sund+ha ra d+ha re ne maN+Dal hUM/ snying kha'i sa bon 'od zer gyis/ /sangs rgyas mthong nas 'dud par bya/ /oM
95a5(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya wA kItNa? pra na me na badzra band+ha na ka ro mi/ sna tshogs mchod yi? de ga la/ /dang por phyag 'tshal gzhan yang bya/ /de nas skal dang ldan pa ni/ /sprul zhing rnam par mchod par bya/ /nyes pa byas pa'i mchod pa yis/ /sdig pa bshags
95a6(rgyud 'grel): pa la sogs bya/ /bdag gis bgyis dang bgyid stsal gang/ /chung ngu 'am ni tshad med pa/ /gang yang rjes su yi rang ba/ /de dag skyob pas bshags par mdzad/ /bdag gis 'jug par bya ba yis/ /de dag sems can rang nyid kyis/ /las la 'jug pa
95a7(rgyud 'grel): de dag gis/ /byas pa rnams la legs shes gsol/ /sangs rgyas rnams la skyabs su gsol/ /de bzhin chos kyi dkon mchog la/ /sangs rgyas kyis gang gdul bya ba/ /blon chen mgon po de la yang/ /sdug bsngal rgyal par dka' ba ni/ /gzhan
95b1(rgyud 'grel): gyi bdag gis bzod mi nus/ /dre na de nyid sel bar byed/ /bdag ni 'jig rten mgon por shog /sems can bla ma sangs rgyas dang/ /byang chub sems dpa' de ci bzhin/ /de bzhin slob ma rjes mthun ma/ /bdag gi lam la 'jug par bya/ /gang yang
95b2(rgyud 'grel): bdag gi dge ba'i cha/ /dri med gnas par gyur ba ni/ /de yis sems can gyi don du/ /rgyun tu rjes su mthun bar shog /oM mahA sarba bA paM kA ya wIk+tsat+ta sa ma na surd+hu t+taM ra ga d+hi sha mu ha da ma da ma ne biSh+Ti na yaM kret+taM ta t+twe ka le kaM hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT/ sarba pA paM spho Ta ya me
95b3(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ oM sarba pA paM pra hi di shi ya me swAhA/ oM sarba ta thA ga tA nAM at+ma b+ha baM ni ra tA ya me/ sarba ta thA ga ta pra ti gri ha na swA maM swAhA/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza na saM b+ha rA nu mut+ta ye swAhA/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta sa man+ta b+ha dra mahA badzra sa ma yaM mahA bo d+hi tsit+tu twa mutpa
95b4(rgyud 'grel): da ya mi swAhA/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta shi? se te sarba satwA nAM sarba sid+d+ha ya si sat+twan+ti sarba ta thA ga ta shwA te shan+taM/ oM sarba shud+d+ha sarba d+harmA swa b+hA wa shu n+ya hyi/ sems can 'di dag bde bar shog /sdug bsngal kun yang sel bar shog /de dag bde bas bdag
95b5(rgyud 'grel): nyid tshim/ /'di dag nyon mongs bral bar shog /rang bzhin med dang gtsang la sogs/ /mtshan ma med dang yid mi 'byung/ /'di dag thams cad de yi phyir/ /bdag gis gang las rnam par 'khrul/ /oM shu n+ya ta dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa at+ma konyrahaM/ de
95b6(rgyud 'grel): nas rgyal ba'i bka' lung gis/ /zla ba gnyis su mthong bar bya/ /de yang bstan nas gcig 'gyur zhing/ /de'i bdag nyid du gyur pa/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam nyid du/ /blo gros chen po bzhug par bya/ /oM bo d+hi tsit+ta ? da ya mi/ /oM dz+nyA na rasme
95b7(rgyud 'grel): be sre dza hUM/ oM ti? Sh+Ta sta badzra hUM/ oM pa ra na badzra/ sa ha ra na badzra/ oM dz+nyA na badzra/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na badzra/ oM badzra tA konyahaM/ oM ya ta sarba ta thA ga ta ta tha a hi/ de nas gzhan don byed pa'i phyir/ /slar yang 'di ltar bsgom bar bya/ /khro
96a1(rgyud 'grel): bo'i gzugs ni 'chang ba yis/ /snying khar pad+ma nyi hUM las/ /khro bo bcu yis bgegs kyi gtso/ /lus ngag yid gsum phur bus gdab/ /phyi rol rdo rje ra ba sogs/ /rnam par sprul pa byas nas ni/ /hUM yig gnyis kyis dbus
96a2(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i/ /'og tu yaM baM raM dag las/ /rlung dang chu dang me dag ni/ /dkyil 'khor de nyid rim pas bsgom/ /nam mkha' la b+h+ruM yig las byung ba'i/ /rtag pa'i yan lag las skyes pa/ /bdud rtsi'i rgyun gyis tshogs kyis ni/ /gang ba'i snod kyi bdag
96a3(rgyud 'grel): nyid gyur/ /hUM gnyis dbus su baM yig las/ /sku'i rdo rje'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /brtan zhing sra bar gyur pa yi/ /gser gyi dkyil 'khor nyid du 'gyur/ /ngos gnyis rnam pa'i hUM yig dang/ /sum las skyes pa'i lhun po'i steng/ /b+h+ruM las gyur pa
96a4(rgyud 'grel): dpal dang ldan/ /gzhal yas khang brtsegs bsgom bar bya/ /de'i dbus su sna tshogs pa'i/ /chu skyes steng du seng ge'i gdan/ /der ni dbyangs yig dang po las/ /kun 'di'i 'od ldan rnam snang mdzad/ /bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i//
96a5(rgyud 'grel): zhal bzhi mnyam gzhag phyag rgya can/ /de'i mdun du mi bskyod pa/ /rdo rje'i dril bu dang ldan pa'i/ /glang po'i steng du zla ba la/ /nam mkha' i mdog can bsam par bya/ /lho ru rdo rje nyi ma yang/ /rta'i steng du zla ba la/ /rin chen dril bu dang ldan pa/ /
96a6(rgyud 'grel): gser gyi mdog ni rnam par bsam/ /nub tu pad+ma gar dbang yang/ /rma bya'i steng gi zla ba la/ /pad+ma'i dril bu dang bcas pa/ /pad+ma ra ga'i mdog can bsam/ /byang gi phyogs su rta mchog kyang/ /mkha' lding bsil 'od la gnas pa'i/ /sna
96a7(rgyud 'grel): tshogs rdo rje dril bu mdzes/ /sna tshogs pa yi mdog can bsgom/ /de dag gi yang thugs khar ni/ /dang po sangs rgyas bsgom bya ste/ /dpal ldan zhal lnga phyag brgyad ba/ /a dza na'i sku mdog 'chang/ /ngo mtshar drag po sgeg pa dang/ /rgod dang
96b1(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa'i zhal snga ba/ /g.yas g.yon ral gri po ti dag /bdag nyid chen pos bzhi bzhi bsnams/ /'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs kyis ni/ /sems can rnams ni tshim par byed/ /re re'i thugs khar 'khor lo ni/ /rtsibs bcu gnyis la dpyangs yig ldan/ /phyi
96b2(rgyud 'grel): rol ka liM nang na yang/ /oM sarba d+harma'i sngags su bcas/ /thams cad la yang khyad med bar/ /de stang shes rab 'khor lo ste/ /phyi rol a A sogs kyis mtshan/ /nang gi mu khyud a li ldan/ /khyad par gtso bo'i 'khor lo ni/ /rtsibs drug gsang
96b3(rgyud 'grel): sngags drug dang ldan/ /gzhan dag gi yang rang dang mtshan/ /oM dang ya te na mar bcas/ /na ma brtsibs gcig la sdongs nas/ /lhag ma yi ge'i grangs bzhin brtsigs/ /gnyis med 'jam dpal gtso bo ni/ /ye shes sems dpa' bsgom par bya/ /
96b4(rgyud 'grel): rang rigs phyag rgya can gnyis gnyis/ /utpa la dang po ti 'chang/ /gzhan dag la yang khyad med par/ /ral gri g.yas pa la mtshan no/ /g.yon pas rdo rje rin chen dang/ /chu skyes sna tshogs rdor dril 'chang/ /de yang gnyis pa lnga pa dang/ /dang po
96b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhi pa ye shes sku/ /kun kyang gzhon nu'i rgyan dang ldan/ /kunda'i kha dog gzugs 'chang ba/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dkar po ste/ /rdo rje dang ni dril bu 'chang/ /rgyal po ser pa lcags kyu 'chang/ /chags pa dmar po mda' gzhu can/ /legs pa
96b6(rgyud 'grel): ljang gu legs sbyin pa/ /mi bskyod pa yi 'khor du gnas/ /rin chen dril 'chang rin chen ser/ /nyi ma nyi bzhin g.yas nyi 'dzin/ /ljang gu tog ni rgyal mtshan 'dzin/ /g.yon pa gdan la gnyi ka yang/ /bzhad pa dkar po so phreng 'dzin/ /snga
96b7(rgyud 'grel): ma bzhin du g.yon pa yis/ /rin chen 'byung ba'i 'khor du gnas/ /chos dmar pad+ma'i sdong bu 'dzin/ /rnon po ral gri po ti dkar/ /'khor lo ser po 'khor lo 'dzin/ /smra ba ljang gu ljags 'dzin pa/ /gnyi ka g.yon pa gdan la brten/ /pad+ma 
97a1(rgyud 'grel): gar gyi 'khor du gnas/ /las ni ljang gu rgya gram gyis/ /bsrung ba ser po go cha can/ /gnod sbyin nag po mche ba 'dzin/ /khu tshur ser po khu tshur 'dzin/ /don yod grub pa'i 'khor du gnas/ /de ltar 'khor lo chen po
97a2(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /bsams nas rims bzhin mchod par bya/ /mchod pa'i rim pa dkyil 'khor gyi/ /cho ga nyid las shes par bya/ /snying po dang ni nye snying po/ /rgyal ba kun kyang mnyes par bya/ /lhag ma kun gyi zlas pa'i sngags/ /yi ge gsum
97a3(rgyud 'grel): po shes par bya/ /gzhan dag rgyal ba'i 'khor dang bcas/ /rang rang gnas su bsangs nas ni/ /de yi nga rgyal dang ldan pas/ /ci rigs par ni spyad par bya/ /rnal 'byor ldan pa'i dus su yang/ /mtshan brjod dang ni bstod pa yis/ /rgyal ba
97a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bcas bstod nas ni/ /dus gsum du tshe don mtshan bya/ /rnam pa nyi shus byang chub pa'i sgrub thabs/ /dpal ldan so ma sh+rIs mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po ma hA dz+nyA na dang/ /lots+tsha ba gzhon nu 'od kyis bsgyur// //
97a5(rgyud 'grel): 'phags pa 'jam dpal sgrub thabs slob dpon so ma shIs mdzad pa bzhugs so/ /rgya gar skad du/ Arya many+dzu sh+rI nA ma saM gI ti sA d+ha nA ma/ bod skad du/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ nyes
97a6(rgyud 'grel): pa thams cad sel bar byed pa'i 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang phyir dpal dang de nyid kyi phyir byang chub dang/ /grol dang gang phyir don rtogs bsam pa ji ltar bar/ /skye bo kun la rtag tu skyed par byed pa yi/ /
97a7(rgyud 'grel): dpal ldan 'jam dpyangs gang yin de la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /thams cad mkhyen pas bstod pa dang/ /rgyal sras rnams kyis bkur ba dang/ /lha rnams 'dud pa gang yin la/ /rtag par kun tu bdag phyag 'tshal/ /mthong na sdig pa zhi bar byed pa dang
97b1(rgyud 'grel): reg na bde ba bskyed byed skyon med dang/ /brten la srid pa'i 'khrul spong dge ba yi /bshes gnyen zhabs la lus ngag yid kyis 'dud/ /zab pa'i snying po yon tan rin chen gter gyi mdzod/ /gang zhig bla ma mchog gis yun ring rgyas btab bzhag pa yi/ /mtshungs
97b2(rgyud 'grel): med sgrub thabs de 'dir bdag gis dbye bar bya/ /brtson 'grus mdza' med ston pa'i rgya mtsho yi/ /grangs med pa de yi grangs las 'das pa yi/ /bskal par sgrab nas rgyal bas pha rol tu/ /phyin nas de 'dir rab tu bshad pa'ang yin/ /dngos grub bkra shis kun
97b3(rgyud 'grel): gyi khang chen 'di/ /'jam dbyangs sgrub thabs 'di ni sangs rgyas kun gyi nor/ /gzugs med chos kyang gzugs dang ldan pa nyid ston pa/ /gang 'khrul ba kun gyi sman chen gcig bu yin/ /'di yis bskyed pa'i rin chen ni/ /tshogs gnyis gzi brjid ldan
97b4(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen mig gis ni/ /bltas ba'i skye med chos nyid do/ /byang chub sems dpas yun ring du/ /goms pa yid la 'dod pa yi/ /yal ga thabs shes bya ba 'di/ /'bras bu bde ba ster ba yin/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan par ni//
97b5(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kun gyis gang gsungs pa/ /bla ma bsten pa'i rim pa yis/ /de 'dir dngos su myong ba yin/ /'khrul pa yang dag spangs pas na/ /rnal 'byor shes rab pha rol 'gro /'di 'dra'i phyag rgya chen po yi/ /bdud rtsi ro mchog myong bar byed/ /'khor
97b6(rgyud 'grel): ba dang ni mya ngan 'das/ /'di dag rnam par dpyad pa dang/ /'di'i snying po cung zad kyang/ /bde bar gshegs pas ma gzigs so/ /snying po las kyang snying po che/ /shin tu phul du byung ba ste/ /'di ltar cher 'os sna tshogs pa'i/ /bde ba ster bar bshad
97b7(rgyud 'grel): pa 'di yin/ /de 'dir las dang po dag ni/ /ji ltar yang ni nyams gyur nas kyang/ /de las ngan song med bde ba/ /khams gsum rgyal po gtso bor gyur/ /rnam kun shin tu zab pa dang/ /rnam kun rnam par dag pa ster/ /rnam kun bdud rtsi 'dzag
98a1(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ /rnam pa kun gyi don chen byed/ /rnam kun mngon par byang chub dang/ /rnam pa kun gyi bla med pa'i/ /rnam pa kun mkhyen ye shes ni/ /lhan skyes shin tu 'od gsal ba/ /de 'dra'i dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i bdag /nga ni yang dag gsal
98a2(rgyud 'grel): bar bya/ /bshes gnyen dam pa bsten pa las/ /rjes gnang thob pa rang nyid ni/ /shes rab bdud rtsi'i rgyun dag gis/ /yid kyi dri ma 'khrud pa yin/ /chos rnams thams cad stong pa'i phyir/ /bdag 'dzin shes rab ldan na yang/ /srog las lhag pa'i sems can rnams
98a3(rgyud 'grel): mthong ba'i sgrub pa po dag yin/ /rang gi dam bcas rjes zhugs pa/ /dri med dang dad pa rgyan yid kyis/ /dga' bas phun tshogs dang por ni/ /mtshan ma'i skyil krungs bcas nas su/ /sna yi rtse mo drang po la/ /mig gtang nas ni yid brtan bya/ /lus drang ba dang
98a4(rgyud 'grel): dran pa dang/ /shes rab bsam gtan phyag rgyar ldan/ /dang por stong pa'i zla tshos bcas/ /rang gi mtshan gyi yi ge gnas/ /snying khar paM skyes pad+ma dang/ /gus pas glu ni len pa yi/ /gzugs brnyan de dbus rnam par lta/ /ye shes dag pa'i nam mkha' la/ /sangs
98a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyas kyis gang bltas nas ni/ /de mthong mngon gsal dad pa yis/ /snying po pad+ma rgyas gnas las/ /yid tshim pa'i lus kyis ni/ /dpal las yang dag byung ba yi/ /'jam dpal bdag nyid chen po yi/ /sna tshogs lha mo rnam sprul zhing/ /mchod pa'i sprin
98a6(rgyud 'grel): ni rnam spros pa/ /sangs rgyas sras dang bla ma rnams/ /de yis ma lus mchod byas nas/ /bdag gzhan sdig pa thams cad ni/ /bshags pa'i me yis bsreg par bya/ /rje yi rang bas de nyid shes/ /bsod nams thams cad bdag gis 'gyur/ /dkon mchog
98a7(rgyud 'grel): gsum la skyabs song bas/ /de 'dir gang las 'jigs pa 'byung/ /byang chub sems ni bskyed pa las/ /rin chen sems 'dra sems can la'o/ /rgyal ba'i bdag nyid las gnas pas/ /rang dka' spyod dang thar pa yin/ /smon lam dag ni yang nas yang/
98b1(rgyud 'grel): ston pas de dngos len par bya/ /rang bzhin mi dmigs pa yis ni/ /stong nyid rgyu dang bral ba las/ /mtshan ma med pa de nas ni/ /gsal bar smon pa spangs pa'o/ /de ltar bsgoms pas brtan pa ni/ /de nyid rgya mtshor 'jug pa yin/ /rang bzhin gnyis med ye
98b2(rgyud 'grel): shes kyi/ /rang bzhin rnam mar ltas nas ni/ /sngags kyi 'di ltar bstan par bya/ /bsod nams rgya mtsho 'phel ba yi/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis legs bzlas pas/ /dpag med mthu ni 'phel bar 'gyur/ /oM ma hA sarba pA paM ka ye kaM bak+tsa ka ma na sod bud+d+ha taM ra ga d+hi sha mu
98b3(rgyud 'grel): ha da ma d+ha/ ma nA biShti/ yatkrit+taM/ tit+ta ka le kaM hUM hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT phaT/ sarba pA paM spho Ta ya me swAhA/ oM sarba pAM pa pra hi d+ha ni ye me swAhA/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta na mA ta ma ba ba ne rya ta ya me/ sarba ta thA ga ta pre te grih+naM twa mi maM swAhA/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pu n+ye
98b4(rgyud 'grel): dz+nyA na saM pa rA nu mu ta ya swAhA/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta sa mandA b+ha dra ma dA badzra sa ma yaM ma hA bo d+hi tsit+to pA da mu pa ta ya me swAhA/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta shaM sa te sa sarba satwA nAM sa ba si d+ha ya saM pat+tyan+ti sarba ta thA ga ta sha a a de sha na ti/ oM swa b+hA wa shud+d+ha sarba d+harmA swa b+ha wa
98b5(rgyud 'grel): shud+d+honyahaM/ oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa at+ma konyahaM/ oM 'jig rten 'das pa'i bde myang dang/ /sdug bsngal rtsa ba mi mnyam med/ /dga' ba 'o ma rgya mtsho'i rlabs/ /thams cad btang snyoms 'od gsal ba'i/ /tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi la gnas pa'i//
98b6(rgyud 'grel): bya ba byas pa bla med de/ /de nas mthong ba'i lam byon pa'i/ /sangs rgyas de'i rjes bzung ba/ /bu yis byang chub thob par ni/ /gyis la sogs pa gdam ngag yin/ dad pa brtan pa'i shugs kyis ni/ /phyag 'tshal gsol ba gdab pa'ang bya/ /mgon po gang gi
98b7(rgyud 'grel): lam zhugs pa/ /bdag la rjes su gnang bar mdzad/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya wAk+tsit+ta?/ pra Na me na badzra band+ha nAM ka ro mi zhes phyag 'tshal ba'i sngags so/ /rang bzhin grub pa'i sngags 'di ni/ /ci gar bzlas la blta bar gyis/ /phung po khams dang skye mched
99a1(rgyud 'grel): sogs/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa'i/ /rang bzhin mya ngan 'das pa yi/ /rang sems zhes ni des gsungs so/ /phyag rgya dang po'i sems dag la/ /so sor rtog pa byed bdag yin/ /'dir ni sngags 'dis mthong ba dang/
99a2(rgyud 'grel): de mthong zhes ni gsol ba dang/ /bla ma de yis slar gsungs pa/ /zla ba'i gzugs su rnam par ltos/ /de 'dir snying rje'i sems kyis ni/ /dmigs pa med par byas nas ni/ /dngos dang dngos med rnam rtog gi /mun sel shin tu 'od gsal ba'o/ /rang
99a3(rgyud 'grel): gi nyams myong dga' mthong nas/ /rang gzhan don ni gsal ba yin/ /khyod kyi mthu yis mthong ngo zhes/ /de yis slar yang gsol ba dang/ /de yis brtan par gyis gsungs nas/ /rjes su brtan pa pha rol 'gro /oM dz+nyA na raSh+me pi sre dza hUM/ /rnam
99a4(rgyud 'grel): pa lnga yi 'od zer ni/ /phyogs mtshams kun tu spro ba yis/ /'dod chags sems can kun gyi ni/ /mi zad sdug bsngal bsregs nas ni/ /rnal 'byor pa yis de dag kun/ /sangs rgyas nyid bkod gcig gyur las/ /de yis rdo rje rtogs pa yin/ /
99a5(rgyud 'grel): oM tiShtha badzra/ oM spha ra Na badzra/ oM saM ha ra na badzra/ oM dz+nyA na badzra oM sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na badzra/ rdo rje dbyings zhes yang dang yang/ sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs rje yi/ /rang bzhin bdag nyid dbang bskur ro/ /oM badzra at+ma konyahaM/ zhes ni yang dag par ni
99a6(rgyud 'grel): brjod par bya/ /brtse ldan 'gro la phan pa dag /gyur phyir byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ zhes ni gsol gdab skad cig la/ /de dag rab tu zhugs nas ni/ /de yi bdag nyid rang nyid gyur/ /oM ya thA sarba ta thA ga ta ta thA a haM/ rdo rje rin chen
99a7(rgyud 'grel): sogs mnyam nyid/ /rnam pa kun tu 'od gsal ba/ /chos kyi rgyal pa dpal 'byung ba'i/ /dang po'i sangs rgyas shes bstod do/ /de las sangs rgyas kun bdag nyid/ /'gro bsang ba'i brtul zhugs yin/ /dang por snod kyi 'jig rten ni/ /
99b1(rgyud 'grel): rnam par dag par bya ba ni/ /gang la mngon par byang chub pa/ /'di rnams gus pa'i gnas yin te/ /de ni gzhan don bla med pa'i/ /rgyal ba gcig pu ngo mtshar che/ /'bar ba'i hUM gyi rnam pa yi/ /bdud kyi cho 'phrul sreg par byed/ /'bar pa'i phreng bas khyab
99b2(rgyud 'grel): pa ru/ /bltas nas phyogs rnams kun tu ni/ /de yi rdo rje'i ra ba bsam/ /yi ge hUM gi dbus gsal la/ /yaM paM raM sa bon gsum las byung ba yi/ /rlung dang chu ma'i dkyil 'khor rnams/ /de nyid rig pas lta bar bya/ /mkha' la b+h+ruM yig las byung ba'i/ /rtag
99b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i yan lag las byung ba'i/ /bdud rtsi sprin rgyun yongs gang bas/ /snod ni de yi bdag nyid 'gyur/ /hUM gnyis dbus su b+h+ruM yig la/ /sku yi rdo rje yang dag byung/ /gnas pa mkhrang bar gyur pa las/ /gser gyi dkyil 'khor nyid du 'gyur/ /hUM gi yi ge
99b4(rgyud 'grel): ngos gnyis la/ /sum las byung ba'i lhun po ste/ /de ru hUM yig las byung ba'i/ /dpal ldan gzhal yas khang brtsegs bsam/ /bla re dra ba dpyangs pa dang/ /rin chen ka ba 'od zer dang/ /rta babs khyams dang ldan pa yin/ /'khor ba thogs ma med pa
99b5(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /gdung ba chen po zhi ba'i phyir/ /zla ba dkar ltar mdzes pa yis/ /me tog phreng ba dpyangs pa'i tshogs/ /phyogs rnams kun tu gzhan pa yin/ /dam chos zab mo'i sgra sgrogs pa/ /seng ge'i kha na rin po che'i/ /phreng ba'i sprin ni nges 'byung ba'i/ /
99b6(rgyud 'grel): brgya byin mtshon cha rnams brtsegs pa'i/ /tshon rtsi rnam lnga sar pa yis/ /phyogs bcur 'khor bar bskor ba yin/ /mdzes po'i yan lag dang ldan pa'i/ /g.yer ga dag las yang dag par/ /dam pa chos kyi sgra dag ni/ /khyad par du ni sgrogs pa
99b7(rgyud 'grel): yin/ /stegs bur gar gyi lha mo mchog /tshogs nas glu ni yang dag len/ /dad ldan lha mo'i mchog rnams ni/ /phyi rol gnas la rnam gnas nas/ /'gro dang 'ong bar byed pa dag /lha yi me tog phreng 'dzin pa'i/ /mdzes pa'i mchod pa rgyas
100a1(rgyud 'grel): par byed/ /gang yang phyogs kun spros pa las/ /shin tu mi zad 'khyud pa yis/ /dar dpyangs sor mo 'khor ba yin/ /nyi ma'i mdog ltar snang ba yi/ /dpag med rgyal mtshan sna tshogs pa'i/ /gar byed mchog gi phyag
100a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin no/ /kun tu 'gro ba kun bdag nyid/ /thub pa chen po rnams kyis ni/ /gang du mdzad pa thams cad dag /grangs med mtshungs pa med pa ni/ /rnam dbyer ni chen snang ba yis/ /de ni chos dbyings dkyil 'khor ro/ /h+rI(rgyud 'grel): las sna tshogs mchod skyes
100a3(rgyud 'grel): 'di/ /dbus su nyi ma gnas pa lta/ /gang gi ge sar rdul gyi phyogs/ /btsom gser gyi mdog bzhin mdzes/ /phyogs brgyad dag gi 'dab ma la/ /a yig gnyis kyi dbus gnas pa/ /si las seng ge'i nga'i sgra/ /bdud kyi glang po 'bros par byed/
100a4(rgyud 'grel): de'i lte bar ri rab las/ /nyi ma'i dbus su maM 'od kyis/ /sems can byang chub la bkod nas/ /de bzhin gshegs kun bsdu bar bya/ /de las byung ba'i sdug bsngal gcod/ /rtog pa'i dra ba 'joms pa'i 'od/ /stong nyid shes rtse rdo rje dang/ /ral
100a5(rgyud 'grel): gri'i chu la 'khor lo snang/ /de las spros pa'i 'jam pa'i dpal/ /zla rgyas 'od kyis rig pa bsdu/ /gzhon nu 'od pa bla med pa/ /gang 'di dpal rnams spros pas bsten/ /mgul rgyan dang ni dpung rgyan dang/ /rna rgyan dang ni lag gdub
100a6(rgyud 'grel): sogs/ /rgyan de rnams kyi rab tu brgyan/ /de ni byang chub snying po yin/ /de las byung ba'i 'od zer gyis/ /'khor ba'i 'ching ba sreg pa dang/ yon tan rgya chen rgyun rgyas pa'i/ /gzhon nu'i sku mdzes legs pa'i dpal/ /mtshan dang dpe
100a7(rgyud 'grel): byad brgyan pa yi/ /de ltar rab tu snang ba yin/ /ji ltar rang bzhin dag pa yi/ /yid kyi rgya mtsho'i gnas de ru/ /sbyin pa la sogs rin chen tshogs/ /thugs rje'i yon tan chu bzhin no/ /rdo rje dkyil krung zhabs gnyis kyis/ /pad gsal
100b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo'i mtshan ma las/ /byung ba'i 'od zer 'bar ba'i tshogs/ /mun pa ma lus 'joms pa'o/ /rin chen mdzes pa'i ska rags la/ /lte ba zab pa 'phro ba dang/ /sku las rgyas pa sna tshogs pa'i/ /lha mo de ru gsal bar snang/ /gang gi brang ni mthon mthong
100b2(rgyud 'grel): thir/ /'od kyi sna tshogs do shal ldan/ /byang chub yon tan phun tshogs pa'i/ /lha mo zur ltar khra bo bzhin/ /phyag gi gdu bu sor gdub bzhin/ /ri rgyal dpag bsam shing bzhin du/ /gang yang chos kyi phyag rgyar ldan/ /mnga' gzhus mtshan pa'i ches
100b3(rgyud 'grel): dbyings sa/ /g.yas kyi phyag gi ral gri dang/ /rdo rje bsnams pas bdud sde 'joms/ /g.yon gyi phyag gnyis dril bu dang/ /rin chen po ti bsnams pa yi/ /'jig rten 'das dga' zla de nyid/ /bdud rtsi yang rgyas lta bu bzhin/ /g.yas g.yon steng
100b4(rgyud 'grel): zhal gser ston po/ /dmar po phyogs bzhir gsal ba yi/ /rdo rje pad phreng sangs rgyas lnga'i/ /rin chen 'od 'bar dbu la brgyan/ /lha mo byang chub me tog sogs/ /mchod pas mdog sngon gtsug phud lnga/ /dpral bar mnyam pa'i thig les brgyan
100b5(rgyud 'grel): smin ma sdong bu utpal mig /dpe med rol pa sna tshogs te/ /zhal ni pad+ma rgyas pa bzhin/ /mchu ni bim pa lta bur dmar/ /bzhad pa mu tig ltar dkar ba/ /mdzes pa rnam par bsam par bya/ /brtse bas sems can thams cad kyi/ /phyin ci log ni nyer
100b6(rgyud 'grel): zhi ba'i/ /chos dbyangs gnas pa'i sku de ni/ /de bzhin nyid la legs par bzhugs/ /mkha' la sprin med bdud rtsi ni/ /'dzag pa pad+ma rgyas pa bzhin/ /rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa/ /de 'dir sangs rgyas gang yin no/ /sngags kyang 'di ru bzlas byas te/
100b7(rgyud 'grel): oM d+harma d+hA tu swa b+hA wa at+ma konya zhes so/ /rdo rje 'ching ba bsgrengs nas ni/ /ral gri rnam par 'dzin pa yin/ /gsum pa nyid kyi tshigs ngag gi /dbu ma gnyis ni gsum pa dang/ /mthe bong gnyis ni brkyang ba dang/ /sor mo dag ni bskum pa'o/ /'khor lo mgon 
101a1(rgyud 'grel): po'i phyag rgya ni/ /don grub pa yis mchog yin no/ /'khor lo'i rgyal po gsang sngags rgyal/ /lugs las bzlog pa bris pa yin/ /a b+ha bar+Na dz+nyA/ tu d+harma d+ha/ d+ha shu ri pa su la mA na ga ga /rmA d+ha d+ha sarba tsa ba ha ma ra shwa gi wa/
101a2(rgyud 'grel): b+hi mu na dz+nyA/ wI ga b+ha/ h+rI(rgyud 'grel): hUM oM/ ha ra ha ra/ ya da h+ri/ ta ga thA ta rbas/ A a ti ye ta pa mu ta d+hi shu dri pa sh+rI ny+dzuM/ ya ka na dz+nyA/ ta ga thA ta rbas/ ta du yarma d+ha rbas d+ha shu bri pa/ ti kri pra a i A a/ k+Shu ga tsa rmA d+ha/ d+ha shu twi/ ba b+hA swa/ ba b+hA
101a3(rgyud 'grel): a/ rmA b+ha rbas oM/ gzhan kun yi ge sum nyid kyis/ /dkyil 'khor pa kun spro ba 'am/ /kun gyi thun mong yin pa'i phyir/ /so sor nges pa nyid kyis so/ /dang por phyag 'tshal tha ma h+ri/ /cha bzhi dbus su gnas pa dang/ /yi ge gsum sngags
101a4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyis/ /bdag po nyid du gnas pa yin/ /de la go rim ji bzhin du/ /shar dang lho dang nub dang byang dang/ /me dang bden bral dang rlung dang dbang ldan gyi phyogs dang mtshams su 'am/ /phyogs bzhi'i rdo rje 'khor los sgyur ba dang/ /rin chen 'khor
101a5(rgyud 'grel): los sgyur pa dang/ /pad+ma'i 'khor los sgyur ba dang/ /las kyi 'khor los sgyur ba dang/ /phyag rgya chen po'i 'khor los sgyur ba dang/ /dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i 'khor los sgyur ba dang/ /chos kyi phyag rgya'i 'khor lo'i sgyur ba dang/ /las kyi phyag
101a6(rgyud 'grel): rgya'i 'khor los sgyur ba dang brgyad do/ /gzhan dag gi gtsug tor chen po'i yi ge gcig /shar gyi 'dab mar yang dag bri/ /gtsug tor gdugs ni dkar bo yang/ /nub kyi phyogs su dgod par bya/ /gzi brjid phung po lho phyogs su/ /gtsug
101a7(rgyud 'grel): tor rnam rgyal byang phyogs su/ /rnam par 'thor ba dbang ldan phyogs/ /me'i phyogs su gen 'byung po/ /gen 'byung chen po bden bral phyogs/ /rgyal ba rnam rgyal phyogs su bkod/ /g.yas kyi phyag gis 'khor lo bsnams shing de las gzhan sgag dang
101b1(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa rang gi mdun la reg par mdzad/ /seng ge'i gdan la nyi dkyil rdo rje skyil krung ni/ /bcings zhugs rin chen cod pan bcom gser mdog 'dra/ /go rim bzhin du 'di rnams kyi sngags 'di/ /oM b+h+ruM/ /oM maM maM maM maM hUM ne/ oM u dzur she swAhA/ oM bi
101b2(rgyud 'grel): dza ya swAhA/ oM kri sha a sha ne hUM phaT/ oM dzwa la dzwa la/ di bya di bya/ u ga tuSh+Na/ du na du na hUM/ oM tri band+ha hUM/ oM ?? dzwa la dzwa la band+ha da ma da ma/ du ma du ma/ ha na ha na/ hUM/ de la 'khor song bar phyug sku yis ni/ /'khor lo 'di dag mdzes
101b3(rgyud 'grel): par snang ba yin/ /rang gdan mtsho skyes ji ltar 'dab ma las/ /de yi ge sar de yang snang ba yin/ /hUM yig gnyis kyi dbus gnas pa'i/ /gaM yig dag las glang po'i gdan/ /hUM las byung ba sngon po'i mdog /mi bskyod rdo rje'i zhal dag ni/ /
101b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhi dang gnyis 'gyur phyag rnams la/ /khro dang sgeg pa'i nyam dang lan/ /mche ba cung zad gtsigs pa ste/ /'khor lo'i shar gyi phyogs su bsgom/ /g.yas dang g.yon nang steng gnas pa'i/ /bstan pa zla ba'i zhal dang ni/ /ljang dang ser bo rang bzhin no/ /
101b5(rgyud 'grel): g.yas kyi ral gri rdo rje dang/ /mda' dang lcags kyu bsnams pa yin/ /g.yon pa sdigs mdzub bcas dril bu/ /gzhu dang zhags pa rang las kyis/ /khyab pa'i 'od zer tshogs kyis ni/ /phyogs kun gyi ni gdug pa 'joms/ /hUM yig gnyis kyis
101b6(rgyud 'grel): dbus gnas pa'i/ /paM yig dag las rta yi gdan/ /rin chen 'byung ldan gser gyi mdog /lho yi phyogs su bsgom par bya/ /g.yas dang cig shos stang gi zhal/ /nag dang dkar po dmar po yi/ /traM yig las byung 'od zer tshogs/ /g.yas kyi
101b7(rgyud 'grel): dang po dag la no/ /nor bu'i rgyal mtshan bsgom bya ltar/ /mi bskyod phyag brgyad las khyad yin/ /h+rI(rgyud 'grel): gnyis dbus na shin tu gsal ba yin/ /mi las 'byung ba rma bya'i gdan gnas pa/ /h+rI(rgyud 'grel): las phyung ba pad+ma rA ga yi/ /'od kyis phyags rnams snang bar
102a1(rgyud 'grel): byed pa yin/ /nub tu tshe dpag med mgon lha/ /khyad par rin chen rdo rje dang/ /steng zhal ser po sku mdog dmar/ /phyag g.yon dang po pad+ma bsnams/ /a yig gnyis kyis dbus gnas pa'i/ /gaM yig las byung
102a2(rgyud 'grel): mkha' lding gdan/ /a las byung ba'i don yod grub/ /sku mdog ljang gu byang du bsgom/ /phyag gnyis mi bskyod bzhin du lha/ /g.yas dang cig shos steng gi zhal/ /mche ba gtsigs shing ser ba dang/ /dkar dang dmar zhal pad+ma yis/ /dpa' dang
102a3(rgyud 'grel): ngo mtshar zhi ba dang/ /sgeg ba la sogs nyams kyi gnas/ /bar steng nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la/ /rdo rje'i skyil krung gis legs bzhugs/ /rin chen cod pan snang ba yis/ /phyogs kun snang bar byed pa yin/ /'di rnams so so'i gtso bo yi/
102a4(rgyud 'grel): rjes su 'brangs nas phyogs su bzhag/ /rdo rje sems sogs bsgom bya ba/ /rang 'od nam mkhar snang ba yin/ /pad+ma nyi mar sems dpa' yi/ /dkyil 'khor gyis zhugs mchog gis brgyan/ /de la mi bskyod dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dkar
102a5(rgyud 'grel): por lta/ /g.yon gyi dril bu dkur brten cing/ /g.yas kyi thugs kha rdo rje gsor/ /rdo rje rgyal po gser gyi mdog/ /lcags kyus bdud la 'debs pa yin/ /rdo rje chags pa sku mdog dmar/ /mda' gzhu mchog gi bsnams pa yin/ /rdo rje legs pa sku
102a6(rgyud 'grel): mdog ljang/ /phyag gnyis legs pa sbyin pa'o/ /rin chen 'byung ldan dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje rin chen sogs bsgoms pa'ang/ /rdo rje rin chen sku mdog ser/ /phyag gnyis dar dpyangs 'ching ba baM/ /rin chen dril bu bsnams pa'o/ /rin chen nyi ma mdog ser po//
102a7(rgyud 'grel): snying kha nyi ma bstan pa'o/ /rdo rje rgyal mtshan sku mdog ljang/ /rin chen rgyal mtshan bsnams pa'o/ /rdo rje bzhad pa sku mdog dkar/ /phyag gnyis so'i phreng ba 'dzin/ /snang ba mdza' yas dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje chos sogs bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje chos
102b1(rgyud 'grel): ni sku mdog dmar/ /phyag g.yon pad+ma bsnams nas ni/ /g.yas pas 'byed par mdzad pa yin/ /rdo rje rnon po gur gum mdog /phyag g.yon thugs khar po ti dang/ /g.yas kyis shes rab ral gri bsnams/ /rdo rje rgyu ni gser gyi mdog /chos kyi 'khor lo
102b2(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa yin/ /rdo rje smra ba dmar la ljang/ /lce yi phyag rgya bsnams pa dang/ /g.yas kyis chos kyi dung sgrogs pa'o/ /yang na gdan la brten pa'o/ /don yod grub pa'i dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje la sogs rgyal ba rnams/ /rdo rje las ni sku mdog ljang/ /phyag gnyis
102b3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dril bsnams nas/ /de yi steng du gar mchog mdzad/ /rdo rje srung ba gser gyi mdog/ rdo rje 'bar ba'i go cha bsnams/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin sku mdog gnag /phyag gnyis mche ba bsnams nas ni/ /gdug pa rnams ni 'jigs bar byed/ /rdo rje khu tshur dung gi mdog /rdo rje khu
102b4(rgyud 'grel): tshur 'ching ba'o/ /'di rnams rim bzhin sa bon ni/ /a dza/ ho sa oM aM traM ha h+ri daM maM raM/ kaM haM hUM baM/ dkyil 'khor bzhi po 'di dag tu/ /mkhas pas sems dpa' bcu drug bsgoms/ /'gro ba'i dbang phyug 'di thob pas/ /skad cig tsam gyis 'khrul
102b5(rgyud 'grel): pa sel/ phyogs bzhi dag tu sems ma sogs/ /rgyan de dag las byung ba'i sgras /phyogs kun snang bar byed pa yin/ /de la rdo rje sems ma ni/ /'jam dpal bzhin du shes par bya/ /rin chen sems ma mi bskyod bzhin/ /chos ma snang ba mdza' 
102b6(rgyud 'grel): yas bzhin/ /las kyi sems ma don grub bzhin/ /laM maM paM taM kun la chos kyi gter chen 'byung ba mthon pa'o/ /nu ma gnyis la nor bu'i do shal gsal bar byas/ /'di ltar snying gi pad+mar gnas pa 'dir/ /rgyal ba'i byang chub sems kyi mu tig
102b7(rgyud 'grel): brgyan/ /zab mo'i chos sgrogs zab pa lta bur gyur pa yi/ /ska rags sil sil nang nas snang ba ni/ /rgyal ba'i bdag nyid 'khor lo ni/ /snang bas de rnams dpag tu med par 'gyur/ /rdo rje lcags kyu dkar la dmar/ /g.yas rkyang ba yi gnas pa zhugs
103a1(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /shar sgor g.yas dang g.yon gyi ni/ /lcags kyu sgreng nas gnas pa yin/ /lho sgor rdo rje 'dags pa ni/ /sku mdog ser po rjes bran bya/ /g.yas rkyang ba yi gnas pa de'i/ /zhags pas 'gugs shing 'dul ba yin/ /nub sgor
103a2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje lcags sgrog ni/ /sku mdog dmar por 'jigs byed pa/ /sa ga'i 'dug stangs bzhugs pa dang/ /phyag gnyis rdo rje lcags sgrog bsnams/ /byan sgor rdo rje dril bu ni/ /sku mdog ljang gu dang ldan pa/ /dril bu'i sgra yis bdud rnams 'joms/ /zlum
103a3(rgyud 'grel): po'i 'dug stangs su bzhugs pa /rdo rje 'bebs pa zhes grags te/ /pad+ma nyi dkyil dbus gnas pa/ /nyi ma bye ba'i 'od pas lhag /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba'i/ /'phro ba'i sa bon bla med pa'o/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus/ /bsam gtan de
103a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin shes rab dang/ /stobs dang de bzhin thabs dang ni/ /smon lam ye shes zhes bya ba/ /'bras bu'i gnas kyi pha rol phyin/ /rdo rje dril bu yang dag ldan/ /mdog dkar rdo rje sems dpa' yi/ /'khor du de dag gnas pa yin/ /de nyid rnam par dag
103a5(rgyud 'grel): ngo bor/ /mnga' dang gzhu yis rnam brgyan pa/ /mdog dmar rdo rje chags pa ni/ /thams cad dkyil 'khor yongs su bskor/ /gzhan don ngo bor gnas de nyid/ /phyag gnyis legs so sbyin pa dang/ /sku mdog ljang gu 'khor rnams kyis/ /rdo rje legs
103a6(rgyud 'grel): par bskor ba'o/ /rab tu dga' dang dri ma med/ /gsum pa de bzhin 'od byed dang/ /'od 'phro sbyang dka' de bzhin du/ /mngon gyur ring song mi g.yo ba/ /legs pa'i blo gros chos kyi sprin/ /sku mdog ser mo 'bras bdag nyid/ /dar dpyangs 'ching
103a7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i tshul gnas pa/ /rdo rje rin chen 'khor du gnas/ /de nyid lam gyi grangs kyis ni/ /nyi ma'i mdog can nyi ma bsnams/ /rdo rje nyi ma nyid bzhin pa/ /rjes su byed par gnas pa yin/ /sdug bsngal dang ni kun 'byung dang/ /'gog dang lam yang de bzhin du//
103b1(rgyud 'grel): chos shes rjes su shes pa dang/ /kun rdzob shes dang de bzhin du/ /don dam de bzhin mi skye ba/ /zad pa shes pa'i ye shes ni/ /rang don phun sum tshogs dge ba'i/ /rin chen rgyal mtshan bsnams pa dang/ /mdog ljang rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyis/ /phun sum tshogs par
103b2(rgyud 'grel): bsgom par bya/ /gzhan don phun tshogs bdag nyid kyis/ /de bzhin zla ba'i 'od zer mdog /rdo rje bzhad pa la rten pa/ /so yi phreng ba rnam par brgyan/ /phung po khams dang skye mched dang/ /bden pa rten 'brel thub pa yi/ /gnas dang gnas ming bdag po dang
103b3(rgyud 'grel): dus gsum bden pa rnam pa bzhi/ /'dus byas 'dus ma byas dge ba/ /rdo rje chos kyis bsgom par bya/ /mdog dmar phyag g.yon pad+ma ni/ /bsnams nas g.yas pas 'byed par mdzad/ /gcig dang rgyu dang za ba dang/ /byed pa dang ni dbang sgyur dang/ /bdag po'i
103b4(rgyud 'grel): don dang rtag pa dang/ /nyon mongs pa dang dag pa'i gnas/ /rnal 'byor can dang ma grol grol/ /bdag tu 'dzin pa skye ba nyid/ /de dag spyod pa sku mdog gnag /phyag na po ti bsnams pa dang/ /nyon mongs gcod pa'i ral gri bsnams/ /rdo rje rnon bo
103b5(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod do/ /dad dang brtson 'grus dran bsam gtan/ /shes rab de bzhin sha yi spyan/ /lha dang shes rab chos dang ni/ /sangs rgyas spyan dang dbang po yi/ /rdo rje 'khor lo sku mdog ser/ /lha mo 'khor lo bsnams pas bskor/ /gnas dang gnas min rnam
103b6(rgyud 'grel): smin dang/ /mos pa dang ni sna tshogs khams/ /dbang po kun 'gro lam dag dang/ /nyon mongs rnam par byang ba dang/ /sngon gnas rjes dran skye 'chi dang/ /zag pa zad pa nyid kyang ste/ /rdo rje smra ba zangs kyi mdog /phyag gis lce bsnams 'khor gyis bskor
103b7(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' rnam shes mdza' yas dang/ /de las gzhan pa zil gnon brgyan/ /rdo rje las ni sku mdog ljang/ /sna tshogs rdo rje dril bu snams/ /'byung ba rnam pa bzhi dag dang/ /sngon po ser po dkar dmar dang/ /nam mkhar de bzhin sems dang ni/ /zad par
104a1(rgyud 'grel): rnam par dag ldan pa'i/ /bsrung ba ser po go cha bsnams/ /rtsa ba'i mtshan nyid de kho na/ /phyin ci ma log mtshan nyid dang/ /'bras bu rgyu'i de kho na/ /phra ba dang ni rags pa dang/ /grags dang rnam par dag yul dang/ /bsdu dang dbye ba'i mtshan nyid
104a2(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /mkhas de kho na rnam bcu ni/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin sku mdog gnag /phyag gnyis mche ba bsnams pa'o/ /tshe dang sems dang yo byad dang/ /las dang skye bo mos pa dang/ /smon lam dang ni rdzu 'phrul dang/ /ye shes chos la dbang 'di rnams/ /rdo rje khu tshur sku
104a3(rgyud 'grel): mdog dkar/ /phyag gnyis khu tshur bsnams pa'o/ /so so'i gtso bo'i sngags kyis bskyed/ /rang rang sngags kyis mchod pa dang/ /rdo rje skyil krung phyed kyis ni/ /'di dag rim bzhin gnas pa yin/ /'di ltar bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /yon tan phun sum tshogs pa ni/
104a4(rgyud 'grel): 'di skad gsungs pa bzhin du thob/ /dngos grub gzhan ni smos cing gos/ /me mtshams sgeg mo sku mdog dkar/ /phyag gnyis rdo rje bsnams nas ni/ /sgeg dang bcas pas dkur brtan nas/ /skal bzang thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas/ /bden bral rdo rje
104a5(rgyud 'grel): phreng ba ma/ /mdog ser rin chen phreng ba bsnams/ /rlung du glu ma sku mdog dmar/ /pi wang brdung ba'i mchog yin no/ /dbang ldan gar ma rdo rje ni/ /rtse gcig bsnams nas gar mdzad do/ /bdug pa me tog mar me dri/ /spos khang me tog phreng ba dang/ /mar me
104a6(rgyud 'grel): dri yi dung chos bsnams/ /sku mdog sgeg mo la sogs bzhin/ /de yi phyi rol dkyil 'khor du/ /sems can kun don byed bdag nyid/ /dpag med gzi brjid rnyed dka' ba'i/ /gang 'di byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /sku la mdzes shing nyer zhi ba/ /
104a7(rgyud 'grel): phyag gnyis pa la zhal gcig pa/ /pad+ma zla ba'i dbus su na/ /sems dpa' i skyil krung gis legs zhugs/ /mgon po byams pa la sogs pa/ /rin chen cod pan snang bar bsgom/ /de la byams pa phyag g.yas kyis/ /mchod sbyin dpung rgyan mdzes pa dang
104b1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa phyag gnyis klu shing ni/ /mdzes pa yang dag bsnams pa yin/ /'jam dbyangs phyag na ral gri ni/ /rin po che yi mdzes pa rnams/ /chos kyi sbyin pa rjes byed pa'i/ /gzhan gyi shes rab po ti bsnams/ /spos kyi glang po gsal byed pa/ /dri yi dung
104b2(rgyud 'grel): chos bsnams pa dang/ /g.yas pa'i phyag gi mchod sbyin dang/ /spyi bor 'od dpag med rol ldan/ /ye shes rtog ces bya ba ni/ /thod kyis mtshan pa'i cod pan bsnams/ /zla rgyas rnam par mdzes pa yi/ /bzhi po dri ma med pa'i 'od/ /gti mug mun pa lta bu ni/ /
104b3(rgyud 'grel): 'joms par byed pa ? gyi yi/ /dpal ldan bzang skyong zhes bya ba/ /sku mdog gser gyi mdog 'dra ba'i/ /rin chen 'bar ba lho phyogs/ /nor bu rgyal mtshan phyag na bsnams/ /phyag g.yon de bzhin nam mkha' yi/ /mdzod ni rgya cher snang ba'o/ /blo gros rgya mtsho
104b4(rgyud 'grel): gser gyi mdog /phyag gnyis bskal pa bzang po yi/ /dpag bsam shing dang bum pa bzang/ /sems can don mchog 'dzin pa yin/ /blo gros mi bzang phyag g.yon gyis/ /po tis mtshan pa'i ral gri bsnams/ /spobs pa brtsegs pa de bzhin
104b5(rgyud 'grel): du/ /phyag na ral gri mtshan pa yin/ /gshin rje'i phyogs su bzhugs pa rnams/ /sku mdog ser po 'od zer ldan/ /byang chub phun tshogs mi zad pa'i/ /'di dag sems can rnams la bstan/ /mthu chen thob pa ral gri dang/ /rgyal mtshan dag
104b6(rgyud 'grel): gis legs par brgyan/ /ngan song kun 'dren zhes bya ba/ /dpal be'u 'dzin cing byams par byed/ /mya ngan kun 'joms blo gros ni/ /phyag na g.yu drung 'khyil ba rnams/ /zla bas mtshan pa'i dril bu dang/ /dril bu'i sgra yi rnam pa yis/ /mtshan
104b7(rgyud 'grel): ma'i gdugs ni 'dzin pa dang/ /dman pa dga' ba phun tshogs pa'i/ /skyed pa'i lus kyi dra ba can/ /pad+ma ge sar ltar dmar ba/ /nub kyi phyogs su zhugs pa'o/ /zla 'od gzhon nu gsal ba yin/ /po tis mtshan pa ral gri bsnams/ /skal ldan rin
105a1(rgyud 'grel): chen mdzod chen po/ /'od dpag med ni bsnams pa yin/ /nam mkha' i snying po phyag g.yas kyis/ /rin po che ni btegs nas bsnams/ /sgrib pa thams cad rnam sel ba/ /phyag g.yas ral gri bsnams pa dang/ /
105a2(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs rdo rje g.yon na bsnams/ /mya ngan thams cad sel ba yin/ /byang gi phyogs su bzhugs pa rnams/ /thams cad sku mdog ljang gu yin/ /yang na thams cad rims bzhin du/ /g.yas pa'i phyag na rdo rje dang/ /rin po che dang chu skyes
105a3(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /sna tshogs rdo rje bsnams pa dang/ /ji ltar rang gi phyag rgyas mtshan/ /phyag g.yon dril bu bsnams pa yin/ /'di rnams rim bzhin sngags kyis ni/ /nyon mongs ma lus sel ba yin/ /oM mai tri ya saM hA ra na ya swAhA/ /oM many+dzu sh+rI ye
105a4(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ oM h+ri gand+ha ha hi ye swAhA/ oM dz+nyA na ge tu ye swAhA/ oM ba tra la ye swAhA/ oM swA ka ra ma ti ye swAhA/ oM ak+Sha ye h+ri/ ak+Sha ya karma a pa ra na bi shud+d+ha ne swAhA/ oM pa te pa na kun+te hUM swAhA/ oM s+tha mi ma ha s+tha ma ba d+hi swAhA/ oM A karya swAhA/
105a5(rgyud 'grel): oM sarba ku sha ta nerg+ha ta naM d+hi hUM swAhA/ oM dzwa len ma hA dzwa la ni hUM swAhA/ /oM tsand+ha su tsan+t+ri tsanda bya ba la ki na swAhA/ oM a mi tA b+hA to hUM swAhA/ oM kha A ka sha g+harba ya swAhA/ oM sarba ne pa ra ni sh+ka ne swAhA/ /rdo rje hUM mdzad dbang ldan du/ /sku mdog nag po
105a6(rgyud 'grel): zhal bzhi pa/ /dang po khro zhing sgeg pa dang/ /g.yas pa drag po 'jigs rung dang/ /de las gzhan pa dpa' ba dang/ /steng gi zhal ni rngam pa yin/ /snying khar khams gsum rnam rgyal gyi/ /phyag rgya bcings pa'i phyag gnyis ni/ /rdo rje khu tshur
105a7(rgyud 'grel): gnyis bcings pa/ /rgyab tu sbyar nas mthe'u chung gnyis/ /rdo rje lu gu rgyud bcings nas/ /mdzub mo gnyis ni legs par sbyar/ /g.yas na ral gri lcags kyu mnga' / /gzhu dang sprul zhags rdo rje g.yon/ /de yi zhabs kyi skod pa yis/ /dregs pa
105b1(rgyud 'grel): dbang phyug chen po'i dang/ /u ma'i nu ma g.yas pa yi/ /zhabs kyis gnon pa bzhugs pa yin/ /rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba ni/ /mi thung dud ba'i mdog can no/ /g.yas na rdo rje ral gri dang/ /de bzhin du ni 'khor lo bsnams/ /g.yon na dril bu zhags pa
105b2(rgyud 'grel): gzhu/ /ba dan sna tshogs g.yon pas brgyan/ /kha TwAM ga yi g.yeng ka yi/ /sgra yis phyogs kun khyab pa dang/ /khyab 'jug chung mar bcas pa la/ /g.yas brkyang ba'i dga' bas bzhugs/ /'khrul pa rnam par dag ngo bo/ /de ni spangs pa'i mchog yin no/ /
105b3(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin bden bral mtshams su ni/ /dpal ldan dpa' khrag 'thung rgyal/ /dang po'i zhal ni drag po dang/ /g.yas zhal dga' ba'i rgyal ba dang/ /steng ma za bar byed pa dang/ /g.yon pa mchog tu sgeg bar gnas/ /'bar ba'i rdo rje sna tshogs kha TwAM sgeg pa
105b4(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /'jigs byed lpags dmar rlon pa rim par ni/ /g.yas dang g.yon gyi phyag gis mda' dang gzhu/ /phyag gnyis kyis ni khrag gis bkad pa'i thod pa bsnams/ /g.yas rkyang zhabs kyis 'jigs byed chung mar bcas pa mnan/ /'gro ba'i byed
105b5(rgyud 'grel): po ked rus rgyan dang ska rags dang/ sangs rgyas mtshan ma nang gnas pa'i/ /thod pa lnga yi cod pan gsal/ /bgegs tshogs ma lus rengs byed pa'i/ /sprin nag po yi sku 'chang ba/ /rnam par dag byed mgon po yis/ /phreng ba rus pa'i dum bu
105b6(rgyud 'grel): yis/ /sprul nag po'i ngo bos ni/ /'jigs pa ma lus sel ba yin/ /'dod chags nye bar zhi ba'i mi bzang sgeg pa'i spyod pa dang/ /chags dang bral ba spong bas sgyu ma'i phreng ba 'chang ba yin/ /mang po ji ltar gcig yin gcig tu rtogs nas gzhan
105b7(rgyud 'grel): pa yin/ /de yang skye ba de nyid dngos kun bdag po nyid kho na/ /rnal 'byor sgom par byed pa mya ngan 'das mchog yin/ /'od zer 'bar ba dpal ldan khrag mthung ye shes phyag rgya yin/ /rlung gi phyogs kyi rta mchog ni/ /de ni zhabs bzhir/ yang dag ldan
106a1(rgyud 'grel): spyan gsum khro bo sgeg pa yis/ /gtso bo'i zhal gsum g.yas pa ni/ /drug po g.yon pa tshangs pa ni/ /rta gdong ste ma ljang gu'o/ /ba dan sum ldan g.yas pa ni/ /steng du slong bar byed pa'i tshul/ /ral gri mda' ni
106a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa gzhan/ /thod pa sna tshogs chu skyes dang/ /mdung thung dang ni dbyig pa dang/ /bzhi ni g.yon pa'i phyag bzhi la'o/ /g.yas kyi gtso bo'i zhabs kyis ni/ /dpal mo dbang mo gzhan gyis ni/ /chags ma dga' ma mnan pa yin/ /
106a3(rgyud 'grel): ting 'dzin reg pa thob byed yin/ /g.yon gyi dbang po myos byed dang/ /myos dang brgyal byed de bzhin du/ /rjes su 'dzin par byed pa dang/ /'di yis rta skad 'tsher ba yis/ /bdud rnams snying ni 'gas pa dang/ /spros pas byang chub 'gro bar byed/ /bzhi
106a4(rgyud 'grel): po 'di dag 'bar ba yis/ /lus mdza' i me yis kun khyab dang/ /spro zhing gyen du 'bar bo'o/ /gtsug gi nor bus gsal ba'i sku/ /oM sum b+ha ni suM b+ha hUM/ grih+Na grih+Na hUM/ grih+NA pa ya grih+NA pa ya hUM/ A na ya ho b+ha ga bAM bi dyA rA dza hUM phaT/ oM
106a5(rgyud 'grel): badzra dzwa la a na lArka hUM/ oM he ru ka badzra sa ma ya hi/ sarba duSh+Ta sa ma ya mu ta pany+tsa ka hUM phaT/ oM sum b+ha ni suM b+ha hUM phaT/ zhes bya ba rgyal po'i sras kyi dkyil 'khor ni/ /gang gi sems kyi spro ba 'jug pa yin/ /lha yi dbang po mchod pa byed pa
106a6(rgyud 'grel): 'di/ /thos pa'i lam du song bas spos chu'i char 'bebs pas/ /'jig rten kun gyi sdig pa'i me dpung zhi bar byed/ /de nas rdo rje shugs kyis ni/ /phyi rol dbang ldan la sogs nas/ /brtsams nas cho ga bzhin bltas nas/ /mchod pa
106a7(rgyud 'grel): la sogs rnal 'byor rgyal/ /sngags na dang por phyag 'tshal dang/ /swAhA'i mdza' can gzi brjid che/ /bzhi pa'i mdza' can rang rang min/ /dbus su de ni sbyar bar bya/ /phyag 'tshal thal mo sbyar byas nas/ /spyi bor thal mo 'jog pa yin/ /mdog
106b1(rgyud 'grel): dang phyag la sogs pa dag /chung ma rang rang bdag po mtshungs/ /rtse gsum thod pa 'dzin pa dang/ /phyag bzhi pa la spyan gsum pa/ /cod pan ral gri khyu mchog gdan/ /lha mo nye bar gnas pa'ang yin/ /phyag gnyis pad+ma phreng ba dag /tshangs pa'i spyi bo
106b2(rgyud 'grel): thal mo sbyar/ /mdog ser zhal bzhi dang pa'i gdan/ /phyag gnyis dbyug pa spyi blugs bsnams/ /phyag gnyis 'khor lo dang bcas dung/ /mgo la legs bcing thal mo sbyar/ /mdog nag mda' gzhu be con bsnams/ /mkha' lding gdan la be'us
106b3(rgyud 'grel): mtshan/ /'di dag 'khor dang bcas pa ni/ /sha rtsi dpa' bo gser glang po/ /gshin rje ma he'i gdan la bzhugs/ /nag po dbyug pa mdung thung bsnams/ /chu lha chu srin steng du ni/ /dkar po dung dang sprul zhags 'dzin/ /g.yas g.yon lcags kyu dbyug
106b4(rgyud 'grel): to dang/ /lus ngan ser ro mi la bzhugs/ /phyag gnyis phreng ba blugs gzar dang/ /spyi bor thal sbyar me lha ni/ /mdog ser ra skyes dag la bzhugs/ /dbyug pa gund+he 'dzin pa'o/ /bden bral mi ro'i gdan la bzhugs/ /ral gri dang ni phug 'dzin pa'o/ /rlung
106b5(rgyud 'grel): lha ba dan bsnams pa dang/ /ri dags gdan la sngo bsangs mdog /khyu mchog la gnas dbang ldan ni/ /spyi bor thal mo sbyar ba 'ching/ /rtse gsum thong 'dzin kha dog dkar/ /'di kun 'khor la phyogs pa'o/ /pad+ma nyi ma 'chang ba ni/ /nyi ma stag gi gdog
106b6(rgyud 'grel): la bzhugs/ /zla ba dang ba la gnas pa/ /dkar po zla ba chu skyes bsnams/ /mig dmar mdog dmar pad+ma'i gdan/ /g.yas pa'i lag gis chu gri dang/ /de las gzhan pa mi mgo rba/ /pad+ma la gnas gza' lag ni/ /mdog ser mda' gzhu bsnams
106b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /bla ma dkar po chu skyes gdan/ /phreng ba dang ni spyi blugs bsnams/ /de bzhin ba bsangs spen pa/ /mdog nag rus sbal la gnas pa/ /lag na dbyug pa thogs pa'o/ /sgra gcan zla ba nyi ma thogs/ /'jug rings ral gri zhags pa thogs/ /rgyu skar dkyil
107a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bud med gzugs/ /lha mo'i rnam par mdzes pa yin/ /spyi bo thal mo sbyar ba ru/ /bsgom bya sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan/ /dkar po dang po bzhi pa dang/ /drug pa bdun pa 'ang de bzhin no/ /dgu pa dang ni bcu pa dang/ /bcu
107a2(rgyud 'grel): gsum pa'ang de bzhin no/ /bco lnga pa dang bco brgyad pa/ /nyi shu gnyis pa'ang de bzhin no/ /nyi shu gcig dang nyi shu dgu /nyi shu brgyad pa'ang de bzhin no/ /sngo sangs dag ni gsum pa dang/ /de bzhin lnga dang brgyad pa dang/ /bcu gcig pa dang bcu drug
107a3(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /de nas yang ni bcu bdun pa/ /nyi shu nyi shu gsum pa dang/ /nyi shu bzhi pa'ang de bzhin no/ /ljang gu dag ni gnyis pa dang/ /bdun pa dang ni bcu bzhi pa/ /bcu gnyis bcu dgu nyi shu la/ /nyi shu drug pa'ang ser po ni/ /gzhon nu gser gyi mdog can
107a4(rgyud 'grel): gdong drug rma bya'i gdan la bzhugs/ /mdung thung rdo rje dril bu dang/ /khyim bya dag ni phyag na bsnams/ /glang sna dkar po lag bzhi pa/ /sbrul gyis mchod phyir thogs 'chang zhing/ /la tu la phug tri shul/ /de bzhin du ni gri khug thogs/ /byi ba la
107a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas nag po ni/ /dga' byed rdza rnga brdung bar byed/ /rtse gsum thod pa 'dzin par ni/ /nag po ma hA ka lar grags/ /ma mo'i dkyil 'khor mtshungs pa yis/ /b+h+ring gi ri ti de bzhin mchod/ /tshangs ma dang ni go cham/ /drag po dbang mo gzhon nu
107a6(rgyud 'grel): rang gi bdag po ji bzhin no/ /yi dags la gnas phag mo ni/ /mdog nag pa la thod pa 'chang/ /mdog dmar mche ba gtsigs pa yi/ /yi dags gdan la gnas pa ni/ /chu gri dang ni thod pa dag /de ni gtum mo yis ni 'dzin pa yin/ /mkha' ldings
107a7(rgyud 'grel): pa pus mo'i bar/ /dkar ser de nas lte ba'i bar/ /de nas mgrin pa nyi ma'i mdog /kha ni mig sman nag po'i mdog /stobs bzang glang po la gnas pa/ /ral gri gshol 'dzin dkar po yin/ /rgyal bar byed pa kha dog ljang/ /khu byug shing rta la gnas
107b1(rgyud 'grel): me tog phreng dang mda' gzhu dang/ /kham por lag na thog pa yin/ /sbrang rtsir byed pa kha dog dkar/ /ne tso la gnas kham por dang/ /mda' gzhu chu srin rgyal mtshan bsnams/ /dpyid lha skal ldan mdzes pa ni/ /dre'u la gnas kha dog
107b2(rgyud 'grel): dkar/ /mda' dang gzhu dang kham phor dang/ /ral gri de ni 'dzin pa yin/ /sprul gyis bdun bdun ldan pa'i klung/ /thal mo sbyar ba byas nas 'dug /mdza' yas rigs ldan mdog dmar po/ /bram ze'i rigs te me las skyes/ /rgyal rigs dbang chen
107b3(rgyud 'grel): las skye ser/ /dung skyong dang ni nor rgyas bu/ /'jog po dang ni pad+ma che/ /nag po rje'u rigs rlung las skyes/ /stobs kyi rgyu dang pad+ma ni/ /dmar rigs dkar po chu las skyes/ /stobs bzangs? ni thags bza' rigs/ /rab dgar dang ni rnam snang mdzad
107b4(rgyud 'grel): khrab dang go cha ral gri dang/ /phub dang g.yul la 'jug pa yin/ /gser gyi mdog can bu dang bcas/ /gter ni spro ba'i phyogs byed pa'o/ /gnod sbyin bdag po na ku la/ /sa bon grong khyer 'dzin pa yi/ /nor bu bzang po gser gyi mdog /gang ba
107b5(rgyud 'grel): bzang po sngon po yin/ /nor sbyin kha dog dmar po yin/ /de bzhin rnam thos sras ser po/ /rtse gcig thun dang kha dog dmar/ /ki li mi li de bzhin gnag /sgo dbang spyod pa'i dbang po ni/ /ser po rgyud mang rdung ljon pa/ /chung ma dang bcas dkar po ni//
107b6(rgyud 'grel): gtsug phud lnga pa de bzhin no/ /bdag gi don kun grub pa dang/ /don med thams cad sel ba'o/ /rtsa bzhin rnyad bla'i thar pa ni/ /thams cad sangs rgyas bstan las yin/ /dkyil 'khor 'di yi 'khor lo yi/ /ming tsam yang ni rnyed par dka' / /
107b7(rgyud 'grel): spu ba chu bur snying po med pa yi/ /'khor ba chos gyi rin chen ldan/ /skal ldan 'ga' zhig nyid 'dir ni/ /mtho ris 'dod pa de las thob/ /'ga' zhig tshangs pa'i 'jig rten dang/ /de las mya ngan 'das mchog yin/ /de las snying po snying po mchog
108a1(rgyud 'grel): bsgrubs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /bde gshegs kun gyis gang gsungs pa'i/ /zab cing rgya che'i chos rnams 'thob/ /yon tan de las kyang 'byung ba/ /'di ltar de la mchod pa rnams/ /mchod dang bzhugs gsol
108a2(rgyud 'grel): dga' ba dang/ /ting nge 'dzin la mnyam gnas gzhan/ /mtshungs med mchod pa byed pa dag /des ni ting 'dzin thams cad 'grub/ /'di ni mchod dang mchod byed pa/ /lha mchog rnams kyis de mchod yin/ /dga' chen rgya mtsho rlabs kyis ni/ /
108a3(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten bsil bar byed pa yin/ /mchod dang bsnyen bkur bcas pa dang/ /sna tshogs bkod pa'i khyad par ldan/ /de ni nam mkhar byed pa 'di/ /de skad cig gis ni ngo mtshar rtogs/ /gzhan dang gzhan ni grangs med spro/ /nam mkha' shin tu rgya chen
108a4(rgyud 'grel): po/ /mchod pa'i sprin mi khyab pa yi/ /rin chen me tog sogs char gyis/ /dpag bsam shing rgyas skyed mos tshal/ /gnas 'di 'byor pa'i bdag nyid 'di/ /'di ltar sngon med sna tshogs gzugs/ /yongs su bzung nas spro bar bya/ /dang bas snying ga'i
108a5(rgyud 'grel): pad rgyas pa'i/ /bde ba'i dpal ni 'byung ba'i gnas/ /sgeg pa'i ro yis bcus pa yis/ /rab tu spros pa rgyas pa yin/ /de dus yun ring gnas pa yi/ /drag po'i byang chub sems de ni/ /lus las ba sbu ldang ba dang/ /rdo rje mchog ni skye ba yin/ /spos
108a6(rgyud 'grel): lha'i me tog rgyas tshogs kyis/ /gnas kun sprin gyi dra bas khyab/ /'khor lo'i sems ni sna tshogs ro myong ba'i/ /g.yo dang mi g.yo 'khor lo'i bdag nyid ni/ /rnam pa sna tshogs 'byor pa'i gnas 'di ni/ /mchog gi mthu yis rgyas par spyod bzang po/ / pi wang rdza rnga rnga rings la sogs mnyam 'jug pa/ /gsang bar
108a7(rgyud 'grel): sgrogs pa chos kyi de ni mchog yin no/ /nyon mongs dri ngan rnam par spong byed gar 'byung ba'i/ /phyag rgya rgyun gyi sgeg pas lhan skyes rjes su byed/ /lha mo phyag gis pad+ma rnam par 'jug pa
108b1(rgyud 'grel): yis/ /rdzing bu rlung gis bskyod pa'i pad+mar mnyam par byed/ /rgod dang lta dang lag bcangs dang ni gnyis gnyis khyud/ /mthong ba bdud rtsi dam pa bde ba gtso bo yin/ /gang zhig 'dir ni phyag rgya'i thabs ni chen po yi/ /'bras bu thams cad ston pa yongs
108b2(rgyud 'grel): su spro ba yin/ /'di ltar cho ga ngo mtshar chen po'i gnas sna tshogs/ /phun tshogs sgeg pa'i rgyas pa nyams myong 'byung/ /dkyil 'khor bdag po nas brtsams dkyil 'khor lta/ /'khor lo grangs med rnam par 'byung ba yin/ /'di ltar so sor bdud
108b3(rgyud 'grel): rtsi dpag med de 'di rgyas pa las/ /lhan skyes yon tan brgya 'gyur gnas pa yin/ /des na 'di ltar phan tshun lhag par spros pa yis/ /khyad 'phags kun gyis ma byas chos ro 'byung ba yin/ /'di ltar sgrub pa dge ba rab 'byam bdag nyid ni/ /
108b4(rgyud 'grel): gang zhig rang bzhin rtogs pa'i rang bzhin no/ /des na de nyid bdud rtsi rgyas kun 'jug pa yin/ /lhan skyes mi g.yo rtogs pa'i mya ngan 'das/ /mchod pa'i so sor ting 'dzin thabs thob pa/ /thog ma med pa'i gter rnams sangs rgyas kun gyi bsngags/
108b5(rgyud 'grel): rig pa dang ni gzhan dag de bzhin nyid stong pa/ /shes rab byang chub chos dang bdag med ces/ /'di 'dra'i phyi rol mchod pa chung gyur kyang/ /mchod pa'i tshogs kyis mchog 'gyur de nyid mthong ba nyid/ /'di'i sgrub pa sems can mchog ni rnyed
108b6(rgyud 'grel): par dka' ba yin/ /'di ni bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin las gzhan ces na 'gyur/ /gang dag thub pa'i sku gzugs ras bris glegs bam sogs/ /de nyid mngon par rlon zhing zhi bar 'dod pa nyid/ /de nyid phal du gnyis las yun ring nyams par 'gyur/
108b7(rgyud 'grel): dge ba'i las bral stong pa nyid la dgongs pa med/ /mun nag thibs po zla ba'i 'od dang bral ba las/ /pad+ma rgyas bral kha bas g.yogs pa'i mtsho bzhin no/ /rig pa dang bral nor dang dka' thub sred pa dang/ /thub pa mchod bral de nyid shes pa yis//
109a1(rgyud 'grel): des ni lha rnams dga' bar byed min de su zhig /des na yon tan nyid thob min ba de gang zhig /gang du 'di ma gtogs par 'gro bar gtso bo gang/ /gang zhig mchod pa 'ang de bzhin mthong bar 'gyur/ /chu bo bab pa rgya
109a2(rgyud 'grel): mtsho'i ngang ba dang/ /sa la me tog rgyas par 'byung ba dang/ nyi ma shar bas don dam bsten pa dang/ /mchod pa byed pa mchog de'i stobs kyis ni/ /ngan pas gzhan la gnod pa byas pa las/ /mi gtsang ba nyid cis ni byung mi 'gyur/ /
109a3(rgyud 'grel): de'i dag pa'i bdag nyid lag pa las/ /lha rnams me tog dag ni len pa yin/ /gang zhig sdig pa spangs pa dang/ /lan gsum la gnas brtan pa ni/ /'jig rten gsum dag 'di dag gi /bsod nams chen po 'byung bar 'gyur/ /
109a4(rgyud 'grel): 'di'i sgra las de las gzhan/ /phal ba 'di dag 'jug pa yin/ /'di gtso nyid du mngon rlom pa/ /chos kyi lam las ltung ba yin/ /dam pa'i chos dang glegs bam dag /mdun du so sor byas nas ni/ /sngar bshad pa yi sngags kyis ni
109a5(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal mchod pa la sogs bya/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes yul/ /sngags kyi bsod nams phung po 'di/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal ba/ /sngon du 'don pa'i rim pa yis/ /lce zla hUM yig la 'byung ba'i/ /rdo rje dbus
109a6(rgyud 'grel): su h+rI(rgyud 'grel): yig las/ /byung ba'i chu skyes dbus ram dzi/ /dkar po 'od zer 'khrugs pa las/ /sngags pas snang ba mdza' yas bsgom/ /sngags bskul nas ni bzlas pa bya/ /de la sngags ni 'di yin te/ /oM pad+ma sa ra satwa sarba pra barta ya
109a7(rgyud 'grel): shud+d+ha ya/ hUM h+ri ri dzi/? chos rnams kun la chags med par/ /sems can thams cad gyur cig ces/ /bsams nas de'i snying po bsal/ /'di yi sngags dang dad ldan pa/ /oM badzra bi ga hUM/ sems can rnams kyi dri ma rnams/ /gsal lo zhes ni
109b1(rgyud 'grel): rnams bsams nas/ /'di yis sngags pa yid gzhug pas/ /dri ma thams cad bsal bar bya/ /oM sa man+ta pa rik+Sha ku hya tsa ri tsa ra hUM/ pad+ma 'dam gyis ma gos ltar/ /'gro la phan tshun 'grogs par shog /chags pa med par byung ba'i phyir/ /sngags
109b2(rgyud 'grel): pas dag pa rnam bsam bya/ /oM ne rma ni sha d+ha hUM/ rnam pa thams cad yongs gcod pa/ chos dbyings rang bzhin 'od gsal ba/ /bsgoms nas gang 'di dkyil 'khor 'di/ /byed pa sngags pa mkhas pa yin/ /oM mahA maN+Dal hUM/ /rang bzhin
109b3(rgyud 'grel): stong par bsgoms pa'i bdag kun la chags pa med sems kyis/ /sngags kyi chu yi thig le yis/ /rang gi spyi bor dbang bskur bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi Shiny+tsa sa ma ya sh+ri ye hUM/ chos rnams thams cad rang bzhin gyis/ /gnas pa med par bsgom
