109b4(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni/ /sngags pas mchod pa brtsam par bya/ /oM a mo g+ha pad+ma ba sund+ha ri d+ha ra da re maN+Da hUM/ /las kyi dkyil 'khor sbyor bdag nyid/ /de nas dad pa'i mchod pa brtsam/ /bgegs mthar byed pa 'am  
109b5(rgyud 'grel): bgegs 'joms pa/ /bgegs rnams zhi bar bya phyir mchod/ /mchod pa'i lha mo rnam pa brgyad/ /ji lta bzhin du sbyor rigs pas/ /g.yon pa la gnas dri gzungs dang/ /g.yas pa la gnas gzhan g.yon no/ /dang po la dbul ba bya ba
109b6(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /arga'i gnod ni dag byed dang/ /pad+ma phyag rgya ldan g.yos pas/ /de la ba dan gsum pa dag /de nyid shes pas yi ge ni/ /gsum gyis byin gyis brlab par bya/ /arga'i snod chu thogs pa yis/ /me tog la sogs bsangs nas ni/
109b7(rgyud 'grel): me tog la sogs lha mo yis/ /sngags ni ji lta bzhin du brjod/ /de nyid mngon sum byas bdag nyid/ /bsngags pa bla ma mchod par bya/ /brtul zhugs nyams pa la gzhan du/ /'dir ni gang du 'gro bar 'gyur/ /dbang po la sogs rnyed dka' ba/ /
110a1(rgyud 'grel): gang zhig byin gyis brlabs las thob/ /'dir thal mo sbyar byas nas/ /de'i sngags kyis spyan drang ngo/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra ny+dza li sa ma ye hUM/ zhes bya ba'i thal mo'i sngags so/ /phyogs rnams kun gyi sangs rgyas rnams/ /
110a2(rgyud 'grel): sras bcas 'jig rten rab grags pa/ /rdo rje rin chen rigs dang ni/ /pad+ma las kyi rigs de bzhin/ /snying po phyag rgya rim pa rnams/ /lha'i tshogs kyi thams cad dag /de dag bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa rnams//
110a3(rgyud 'grel): bdag ming che ge zhes bya ba/ /chos dbyings bdag nyid grong khyer ni/ /de ring dkyil 'khor mchad par bgyi/ /yo byad ci 'byor pa yis mchod/ /sems can rnams la brtse ba dang/ /khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir/ /rjes su brtsebs nyer dgongs la/
110a4(rgyud 'grel): byin gyis brlabs pa mdzad par rigs/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta bo d+hi satwa pa ri shud+d+ha swa b+hA ba At+mA nAM shud+d+hi saM pU ra ya hUM/ zhes bya ba 'di ni spyan 'dren pa'i sngags so/ /mchod cing bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir/ /de nas bdag nyid dbul bar bya/ /de la sngags
110a5(rgyud 'grel): ni/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza pas+tha na ya At+mA NI nirya ta ya mi/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pra ti grih+na tu maM/ oM sarba ta thA ga tA d+hi tiSh+Tha tu maM/ oM a mo g+has n+tiSh+ThaM tu hUM/ zhes byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags so/ /sngags kyi don ni 'di lta bu/ /bsgoms la bdag nyid
110a6(rgyud 'grel): de mchod do/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma konyahaM/ zhes so/ /sdig pa mthu mo'i bag gi tshogs/ /dril bu'i sgra yis bdud tshogs 'dzoms/ /sngags kyi grub pa 'dzin pa ni/ /phyag rgya dang por chen po'i tshig /zhes grub pa'i dpal
110a7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dril bus kyang ni mchod pa yin/ /oM d+hi byA mo b+ha b+hi pu la s+tha ra/ ma d+hu ra nerg+hu sha ru ti ra na ra na hUM/ /ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid cig /gnyis med gnyis su ji ltar 'gyur/ /'di ltar rang bzhin spros pa las/ /sgyu 'phrul rdo rje rtogs pa yi/ /de nyid blo
110b1(rgyud 'grel): yi mchod par bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta sid+d+hi badzra sa ma ya tiSh+The Sha/ twaM d+ha ra ya mi ho hi hi hUM/ de la gnas pa 'ga' zhig ni/ /mchod pa de yang lhag par gus/ /sems can dang ni sangs rgyas rnams/ /rang bzhin don dam yin pa'i phyir/ /de yang dman dang lhag pa
110b2(rgyud 'grel): la/ /sgra yi rdo rjes mchod par bya/ /dril bu'i sgra ni sgrogs pa dang/ /sngags dang gdug pa bstod pa dag /'don pa rjes su sgrogs pa yis/ /dad pa'i rgya mtsho sna tshogs pa'i/ /brlabs kyi mgon po mngon dgongs mdzod/ /'khor lo'i rtsa ba'i sngags kyis ni//
110b3(rgyud 'grel): yang dag 'das pa spyan drang ngo/ /dkyil 'khor pa kun rang sngags kyi/ /de nas bum pa gang ba yis/ /mgul chings phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /'dab ma dang bcas dpal 'bras bu/ /gsang sngags kyi ni dbul bar bya/ /oM badzrad+da ka hUM/ gang pa'i snod
110b4(rgyud 'grel): kyis de bzhin mchod/ /'gro ba rgyas pa'i yid dga' ba/ /oM ba tra bu ra ya a a mo g+ha ba ti sa man+ta pra ni swAhA/ de nas me tog rgya bcings la/ /me tog char rgyun 'jug pa yis/ /spyi bor thal mo sbyar byas la/ /badzra band+ha zhes brjod nas/ /gang 'jig
110b5(rgyud 'grel): rten gyi khams 'di 'am/ /gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na/ /lha dang mi rnams kyi me tog gi bye brag yid las byung ba dang/ /chu las skyes pa 'am/ thang las skyes pa gang dag yod pa de rnams 'di lta ste/ ma lus shing lus
110b6(rgyud 'grel): pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir ro/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rigs lnga dang bcas par bzhugs pa thams cad dang/ snying po dang/ phyag rgya dang/ gsang sngags dang rig sngags
110b7(rgyud 'grel): kyi lha'i khyad par thams cad la dbul bar bgyi'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta puShpa pu dza me g+ha sa mu dra spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas bdug pa'i phyag rgya bcings nas ni/ /tshul khrims kyi ni bdug pa yis/ /'gro ba bdug par gyur cig ces/ /mkhas pas 'di ltar
111a1(rgyud 'grel): brjod par bya/ /gang yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'am/ gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na lha dang mi rnams kyi bdug pa'i bye brag /lhan cig skyes pa 'am/ /yang dag par sbyar ba 'am/ /yongs su gyur pa gang dag
111a2(rgyud 'grel): yod pa de rnams 'di lta ste/ ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rigs lnga dang bcas pa bzhugs pa thams cad dang/ snying po dang phyag rgya dang
111a3(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags dang rigs sngags kyi lha'i khyad par thams cad la dbul bar bgyi'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+huA pa pU dza me g+ha sa mu tra spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ mar me phyag rgya snying kha ru/ thal mo sbyar la mthe bo gnyis/ /mnyam du sgreng bar byas nas ni/ /'di
111a4(rgyud 'grel): ltar 'das pa yang dag pa'i/ /ye shes khyad par dang ldan pa'o/ /gang yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'am/ gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na/ /lha dang mi rnams kyi snang ba'i bye brag yid las byung ba 'am/ rin po che'i 'od
111a5(rgyud 'grel): dam mar me'i snang ba la sogs pa gang dag yod pa 'di lta ste/ ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rigs lnga dang bcas par bzhugs
111a6(rgyud 'grel): pa thams cad dang/ snying po dang phyag rgya dang/ gsang sngags dang rig sngags kyi lha'i khyad par thams cad la dbul bar bgyi'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta A lo ka pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ dri rnams bkod la gar dang ni/ /dri yi phyag rgya
111a7(rgyud 'grel): bcings nas ni/ /dri ma med pa'i bdag nyid la/ /bltas nas brjod par bya ba ste/ /gang yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'am/ /gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na/ /lha dang mi rnams kyi dri'i bye brag lhan cig skyes pa 'am/
111b1(rgyud 'grel): yang dag par sbyar ba 'am/ yongs su gyur pa can gang dag yod pa de rnams 'di lta ste/ ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rigs lnga dang
111b2(rgyud 'grel): bcas par bzhugs pa thams cad dang/ /snying po dang phyag rgya dang gsang sngags dang rig sngags kyi lha'i khyad par thams cad la dbul bar bgyi'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta gand+he pU dza me/ g+ha sa mu dra spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ thal mo spyi bor bzhag
111b3(rgyud 'grel): nas ni/ /'di skad ces ni brjod par bya/ /gang yang 'jig rten khams 'di 'am/ gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na/ lha dang mi rnams kyi rin po che'i ri bo 'am/ rgya mtsho rin po che'i tshogs gang dag yod pa de dag
111b4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad 'di lta ste/ ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rigs lnga dang bcas par bzhugs pa thams cad dang/ snying po dang
111b5(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya dang/ gsang sngags dang/ rig sngags kyi lha'i khyad par thams cad la dbul bar bgyi'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta nai bi dyaM ka ratNA laM ka ra pU dzA me g+ha sa mu dra spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ gar skor thal sbyar spyir bzhag la/ /bzhad pa'i phyag rgya bcings nas
111b6(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /'khor ba nang 'khor rnams kyang ni/ /bzhad pa nyid 'gyur ces brjod la/ /gang yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'am/ gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na/ lha dang mi rnams kyi rgod pa dang sgeg pa dang/ dga' ba dang rtse 'jo bde
111b7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i bye brag gang dag yod pa de rnams 'di lta ste/ ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rigs lnga dang bcas par bzhugs pa thams cad
112a1(rgyud 'grel): dang/ snying po dang phyag rgya dang gsang sngags dang rig sngags kyi lha'i khyad par thams cad la dbul bar bgyi'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta hA sya lA sye ra ti kri Taswa khya nu t+ta ra pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ thal mo spyi bor bzhag
112a2(rgyud 'grel): nas ni/ /mkhas pas 'di skad brjod par bya/ /gang yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'am/ gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na/ lha dang mi rnams kyis dpag bsam gyi shing dang gos kyi shing gang dag yod pa de rnams 'di
112a3(rgyud 'grel): lta ste/ ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rigs lnga dang bcas par bzhugs pa thams cad dang/ snying po dang phyag rgya dang/
112a4(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags dang rig sngags kyi lha'i khyad par thams cad la dbul bar bgyi'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga tA nut+ta ra bo d+hya laM ka ka ra ba sta pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM snying khar rdo rje thal sbyar la/ sgeg mo'i phyag rgya rnam bcings nas/
112a5(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya gar dang bcas pa dang/ ji bzhin don rig 'di ltar brjod/ sems can thams cad yo byad thams cad kyis yang dag par 'byor cing phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 'dod pa tsam la rag lus par gyur cig /oM sarba ta thA ga tA nut+ta ra ma
112a6(rgyud 'grel): hA badzrodb+ha wa dA na pA ra mi ta pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ spyi bor thal sbyar la phreng ba yi/ /phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad brjod/ sems can thams cad mi dge ba'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las thams cad dang yang dag par bral bar
112a7(rgyud 'grel): gyur cig /dge ba'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las thams cad dang yang dag par ldan par gyur cig /oM sarba ta thA ga tA nut+ta ra ma hA bo d+hi ha ra shI la pA ri mi ta pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ thal mo sbyar ba nyid dang ni/ /glu'i
112b1(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya bcings nas ni/ /sems can thams cad mtshan dang dpe byad thams cad kyi lus yang dag par brgyan par byas pa dang/ rtag tu phan tshun 'jigs pa med pa dang/ zhe 'gras pa med par zhugs shing/ mig dang yid mngon par dga' ba dang/ chos zab
112b2(rgyud 'grel): mo la bzod pa dang ldan par gyur cig /oM sarba ta thA ga ta mahA d+harmA ba bo d+hi k+Shan+ti pa ra mi ta pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ dang por gar skor byas nas ni/ /de nas gar gyi phyag rgya bcings nas/ sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa' i spyod pa la mngon
112b3(rgyud 'grel): par brtson pa dang ldan pa dang/ sangs rgyas nyid du yongs su bzhol zhing 'khor ba yongs su mi spong ba'i brtson 'grus dang ldan par gyur cig /oM sarba ta thA ga ta saM sa rA pa ri tyaM gA nut+ta ra ma hA bidya pA ra mi tA pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ dang por
112b4(rgyud 'grel): gar bskor bya ba dang/ me tog phyag rgya bcings nas ni/ sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams dang bral bar gyur cig /bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ mngon par shes
112b5(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams dang/ rig pa thams cad dbang du gyur pa phun sum tshogs par gyur cig /oM sarba ta thA ga tA nut+ta ra mahA so khya bi ha ra d+ha na pA ra mi ta pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ shes rab pha rol phyin 'gro ba'i/ /bdug pa'i phyag rgya bcings
112b6(rgyud 'grel): nas ni/ sems can thams cad 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab dang ye shes rnams dang yang dag par ldan par gyur cig /so so yang dag phyir rig pa bzhi thob ste/ bzo dang bstan bcos thams cad shes shing sgyu rtsal dang ldan par gsang ba'i cho gas
112b7(rgyud 'grel): shes pa dang de kho na nyid mthong ste/ nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa thams cad yang dag par gcod pa'i ye shes thob par gyur cig /oM sarba ta thA ga tA nut+ta ra kE sha /ts+tshe da sarba d+harmA sa man+ta dz+nyA na ma hA pradz+nyA pa ra mi ta pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra spha ra Na sa
113a1(rgyud 'grel): ma ye hUM/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan sogs/ /bza' dang bca' sogs dang pa yis/ /phyi rol ji lta ba bzhin bzhag /dpag tu med pa dbul bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor dbang phyug gsang sngags ni/ /bzlas pa dag kyang legs
113a2(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /yi ge brgya pa lan gsum bzlas/ /mtshan brjod pa dang dkyil 'khor bstod/ /'bad pa yis ni smon lam dag /de nyid rig pas 'don par bya/ /yo byad thams cad 'byor pa yis/ /yongs su gang ba'i gtor ma sbyin/ /oM a kA ro
113a3(rgyud 'grel): mu khaM sarba d+ha rmA NAM a d+hya nutpan+na? twa ta swAhA/ /zhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis so/ /gal te go skabs yod gyur na/ /phyogs bcur snod rnams bsam pa la/ /'jig rten gsum rgyal phyag rgya ni/ /bcings pa bla na med pa'o/ /khur ba 'bras chen 'bras
113a4(rgyud 'grel): yos dang/ /til rnams kyis ni gtor ma sbyin/ /de la sngags ni 'di yin te/ /lha dang lha min gnod sbyin lto 'phye grul/ /nam mkha' lding dang 'dab bzangs lus srul po/ /dri za srin po gdon gyis rigs rnams dang/ /gang dag sa la gnas
113a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rdzu 'phrul can/ /bdag cag pus mos la btsugs nas ni/ /thal sbyar khyed rnams la ni gsol 'debs kyis/ /bu smad bcas shing g.yogs 'khor bcas pa rnams/ /gsan nas phan gdags slad du 'dir gshegs shig /'byung po gang
113a6(rgyud 'grel): dag ro rab steng gnas dang/ /dga' ba'i tshal dang lha yi gnas rnams dang/ /shar nub ri dang nyi zla'i khyim rnams dang/ /ri bo kun la gang dag gnas pa dang/ /chu bo kun dang chu yi mdo rnams dang/ /rin chen gnas na lhag par gang gnas dang/ /
113a7(rgyud 'grel): mtsho dang rdzing bu steng ka chu dogs dang/ /g.ya' chu sil ma can na gang gnas dang/ /grong dang grong khyer phyugs lhas stong pa dang/ /khang stong dang ni lha'i khang pa dang/ gtsug lag khang dang grong khyer gnas dag gam/ /dka' thub gnas dang
113b1(rgyud 'grel): glang chen bres dang ni/ /rgyal po'i dkor khang dag na gang gnas dang/ /lam srang sum mdo dang ni bzhi mdo dang/ /gang dag lam po che dang shing cig drung/ /dur khrod chen po nags tshal chen po dang/ /seng+ge ded dang gcan gzan gnas rnams dang/ /'brog
113b2(rgyud 'grel): chen 'jigs su rung par gang gnas dang/ /gang dag gling mchog dag na gnas pa dang/ /lhun po dur khrod dag na gnas pa rnams/ /rab tu dgyes shing go bar gyur nas su/ /phreng ba dri dang me tog bdug pa dang/ /bstod dang gtor ma mar me
113b3(rgyud 'grel): gus 'bul ba/ /'di dag bzhes nas btung zhing bsnams nas su/ /las 'di rnams kyi 'bras bu mchis par mdzod/ /de ltar gdon la mchod pa byas nas ni/ /des nas phyogs skyong rnams la gtor ma sbyin/ /shar phyogs rdo rje can
113b4(rgyud 'grel): de lta tshogs bcas/ /gtor ma phul ba 'di dag pa zhes su gsol/ /me dang gshin rje bden bral srin po'i bdag /chu bdag rlung bdag nor gyi bdag po dang/ /dbang ldan lha ste 'byung pa'i bdag po dang/ /steng gi nyi zla tshangs pa chen
113b5(rgyud 'grel): po dang/ /lha rnams kun dang gang dag sa stengs klu/ /ri'i lha dang gsang ba'i tshogs 'dus pa/ /so so so sor gtor ma phul ba 'di/ /rab tu dgyes pa yis ni bzhes nas kyang/ /rang rang phyogs su legs par bzhugs nas su/ /rang gi bu
113b6(rgyud 'grel): smad mdza' bshes gnyen 'dun dang/ /nad maM dmag dang dpung bcas thabs gcig tu/ /me tog dri dang byug pa gtor ma bcas/ /'di dag gtung zhing legs par gsol nas kyang/ /bdag gi las 'di'i 'bras bu mchis par mdzod
113b7(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra shi kha re ru Da sa ma Ta/ oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hUM/ oM grih+na griha hUM/ oM grih+NA pa la grih+NA ba ya hUM/ A na ya ho b+ha ga wA bi d+hya rA dza hUM/ oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NAM/ A dya nutpn+na twat swAhA/ /phyi rol lha yi 'khor lo dang/ /byang chub sems
114a1(rgyud 'grel): dpa' i dkyil 'khor mchog /rim gyis de ru gzhug par bya/ /de nas snying po'i 'khor lo dang/ /de yang gtsug gtor dkyil 'khor la/ /de ni 'khor lo dbang phyug la/ /de yang phyag mtshan dang thig lar/ /de ltar snang ba sogs
114a2(rgyud 'grel): rim gyis/ /spros pa thams cad zhi ba dang/ /stong nyid la sogs rim thob pa'o/ /rnal 'byor ldan skyes mdzes pa yin/ /de ltar goms pas 'jug pa rnams/ /mi shes chu bo mi lus pa/ /bskams shing sems kyi zla ba ni/ /shar ba bskal pa
114a3(rgyud 'grel): bzang po yin/ /rim pa 'di yis 'khor lo rnams/ /thams cad spro ba'ang shes par bya/ /thig le'i sbyor ba 'di nyid kyis/ /yun ma ring bar grub par 'gyur/ /yang na mdor bsdus sngags kyis ni/ /ji skad bshad pa'i me tog sogs/ /gang
114a4(rgyud 'grel): zhig zung cad dbul bar bgyi/ /me tog chung na'ang 'dir nyon mongs/ /dus mdza' i me ni 'joms pa yin/ /de la mdor bsdu ba'i sngags ni/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta puShpa pU ji ma g+ha sa mu dra spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ de bzhin du bdug pa la
114a5(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa la yang ngo/ /'khor lo'i dbang phyug 'ba' zhig gam/ /yan na 'khor los sgyur ba ni/ /rgyud dang bcas pa 'am snying po'am/ /'khor lo'am phyi nang thams cad la/ /dang ba dag par ldan rnams dang/ /sems dpa' chen pos
114a6(rgyud 'grel): mchod par bya/ /mchod pa bshad par byas pa las/ /mtho ris thar pa'i snying po thob/ /de dang de las sgro 'dogs yongs 'khrul pa/ /sdug bsngal 'jigs pa'i ngo po yis/ /lha yi 'khor lo chen po dag / ster ba/ /thugs rje rnam pa sna tshogs
114a7(rgyud 'grel): spros pa yin/ /de ltar cig mchod 'khor lo ma lus pa/ /mchod rgyas 'di nyid rtag tu sbyor ba yin/ /shi bar gyur kyang bla yi dang med par/ /mchod bral? skad cig ma yin sdig thob 'gyur/ /'khor lo 'di dag rnam bsams nas/ /me tog
114b1(rgyud 'grel): thal mos gtor ba dang/ /gang de 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rnams/ /des ni til gyi thal mo sbyin/ /skye ba dang ni 'jigs pa rnams/ /sna tshogs shes rab kyis mnyam pas/ /sdug bsngal thar med byed par 'gyur/ /yi ge gsum gyis gshegs su
114b2(rgyud 'grel): gsol/ /'jig rten gsum gyi spyi bo yis/ /mi yi nor bu'i tshogs rnams ni/ /mtshungs med mi yi seng ge yis/ /'dud bzhi glang po 'joms bar byed/ /ma rig sdong po gcod pa yi/ /thub pa'i yon tan tshogs 'khor lo/ /phyag 'tshal bstod dang
114b3(rgyud 'grel): kha zas kyis/ /dge 'dun dag ni mchod par bya'o/ /bdag gi bsod nams 'di yis ni/ /shes rab ye shes mi zad med/ /rtog pa shing gi rtsa ba dag/ /sreg pa'i rdo rje rdung bar shog /rdo rje'i rigs ni rtogs pa dang/ /rin chen rigs ni thob pa dang/ /don dam?
114b4(rgyud 'grel): rtogs pa pad+ma'i rigs/ /las kyi rigs kyi don chen byed/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rim pa las/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gyi sgrub pa'i thabs/ slob dpon so ma sh+rIs mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhas pa chen po
114b5(rgyud 'grel): paN+Di ta ma hA dz+nyA na dang/ bod kyi lots+tsha ba dge slong gzhon nu 'od kyis bsgyur ba'o// //rgya gar skad du/ A rya many+dzu sh+rI nA ma saM gI ti maN+Dal lo pi ka /bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dkyil
114b6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyi cho ga /bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal ye shes sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rang 'byung rnam par dag pa dang/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i gsung dbang phyug /rmad du byung dang brtson 'grus 'dzin/ /sna tshogs bdag nyid phyag 'tshal lo/ /spangs dang
114b7(rgyud 'grel): ye shes phun tshogs pa'i/ /gang gi drin gyis rnyed bla ba'i/ /dbyangs kyi rjes 'jug bdag nyid kyi/ /de'i rgyu la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyag brgyan bzhin du dngos grub ni/ /gang gi drin gyis rnyed sla ba'i/ /thugs rje khyab pa'i bdag nyid kyis/ /bla ma'i zhab
115a1(rgyud 'grel): dag rgyal gyur cig /srid pa'i bcings pas khyab pa yi/ /'khor ba'i 'khor lo rnams 'joms pa'i/ /gang de 'jam dpal dkyil 'khor ni/ /yang dag lta bas 'jug pa bshad/ /de la rnal 'byor tshangs gnas la/ /gnas
115a2(rgyud 'grel): dang gsum la skyabs gnas dang/ /sems bskyed pa yi stobs kyis ni/ /ngang gi sdom pa la gnas dang/ /rmi lam lta bur rtogs pa las/ /sems gnyis dge ba mi rtogs nor/ /shin tu bde ba'ang rtogs pa dang/ /the tshom med dang chags
115a3(rgyud 'grel): med dang/ /dngos po lnga la mkhas pa dang/ /pha rol phyin tshol mngon dga' ba dang/ /de las gzhan pa'i ngo bo ni/ /yon tan ldan? pa mkhas pa yin/ /yid ches pa yi khyad par gyis/ /byang chub sems ni phul byung dang/ /thabs
115a4(rgyud 'grel): dang shes rab gnyis med dang/ /mos pa yang dag ldan pa dang/ /ji bzhin dbang ni thob pa dang/ /bla ma sems can mnyen pa dang/ /ltung ba sna tshogs spang ba'i phyir/ /gus pa'i blo yis bskal bar ldan/ /de nyid rnam bcu rtag tu ni/ /
115a5(rgyud 'grel): yid la byed pa mngon bzhog ba/ /sngags dang rgyud dang de nyid shes/ /sgrub byed thub pa'i dbang por brjod/ /dkyil 'khor las la 'jug 'dod pas/ /'bad pas bsnyen pa la gnas bya/ /dang por bsnyen pa ma byas par/ /lha rnams byin gyis
115a6(rgyud 'grel): rlob mi 'gyur/ /yid mthun pa'i gnas rnams su/ /snying kha'i pad+ma'i zla ba la/ /'od zer 'bar ba'i ma yig dgod/ /rang sems dag pa'i nam mkha' la/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas dang bla mar bcas/ /yang dag bltas la phyag 'tshal dang/ /
115a7(rgyud 'grel): dang pa rgyas po'i yid kyis kyang/ /'khor lo mchod pas dang por mchod/ /de la sngags brjod sngon song ba'i/ /dang po'i mgon la phyag bzhi bya/ /chu gtsang pa'i rnam pa dang/ /snod rgyas pa yang dbul bar bya/ /me tog dang ni bdug pa dang/ /mar me dri
115b1(rgyud 'grel): yis mchod par bya/ /de las gzhan yang mchod pa'i tshogs/ /me tog spos dang dang mar me dri/ /rgyan gyi rang bzhin mchod pa ni/ /rin chen bzhi ni dbul bar bya/ /gzhan dang sgeg dang dga' ba dang/ /rtse 'jo'i bye brag bde ba dang/ /dpag bsam shing dang
115b2(rgyud 'grel): gos gyi shing/ /shing dang bcas pa de rnams dbul/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus/ /bsam gtan shes rab de bzhin du/ /ji ltar rang sangs bzlas pa dang/ /phyag rgya yis ni dbul bar bya/ /ngan par byas pa sun phyung nas/ /de rnams mdun
115b3(rgyud 'grel): du bshags par bya/ /g.yo med pa yi sems kyis kyang/ /gzhan gyi bsod nams rjes yi rang/ /dkon mchog gsum la brten tshobs kyis/ /gnas pa gang las 'jigs pa 'byung/ /de nas rang gzhan don gyi phyir/ /byang chub sems ni bskyed
115b4(rgyud 'grel): par bgyi/ /sems bskyed pa dang mthun par ni/ /blo ldan lam la gnas par bgyi/ /dge brgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir/ /smon lam dag kyang gdon par bya/ /sems can kun la brten nas ni/ /tshang ba'i gnas ni yongs su bsgom/ /rang bzhin med
115b5(rgyud 'grel): dang dge la sogs/ /bral phyir mtshan ma med pa dang/ /yid mi 'jug ces bya ba dang/ /shes rab ting 'dzin gsum la 'jug /ji ltar rang sngags bzlas pa yis/ /byin gyis brlabs pa'i bya bar ldan/ /mthong ba'i lam byin rdzogs sangs
115b6(rgyud 'grel): kyis/ /bu la sogs pa bstan pa yin/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas bdag gis bstan pas/ /phyag 'tshal gsol ba 'debs pa ni/ /skyob pa ji ltar bdag la ni/ /bstan pa yang dag bshad du gsol/ /rang bzhin grub pa bzlas pa yis/ /rang gi sems
115b7(rgyud 'grel): ni sgom par bgyis/ /sla gsol zla ba'i gzugs lta bu/ /mthong ngo zhes ni gsol ba dang/ /sems bskyed ces ni bya ba yi/ /dang por phyag 'tshal ldan pa dang/ /dbus su byang chub yang dag ldan/ /sems bskyed pa ni bstan pa las/ /bdab?
116a1(rgyud 'grel): bskyed pa'i rjes la ni/ /zla ba'i gzugs ni mthong ngo zhes/ /gsol bas brtan par gyis shig ces/ /gsungs pa de ni brtan pa yin/ /oM dz+nya na raSh+mi bi sri dza hUM/ rnam pa sna tshogs 'od zer gyis/ /sems can byang chub la bkod
116a2(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /de dag gcig bur gyur pa las/ /rdo rje rtogs par mngon par 'dod/ /oM tiSh+Tha badzra/ oM sha ra Na badzra/ oM saM ha ra na badzra/ oM dz+nyA na badzra/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na badzra/ /rdo rje dbyings shes yang dang yang/ /zhes ni bdag nyid dbang
116a3(rgyud 'grel): bskur ro/ /oM badzrAt+ma konyaraM ha/ /brtser ldan 'gro la phan pa dag /gyur phyir byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ /zhes ni gsol btab skad cig la/ /de dag rab tu zhugs nas ni/ /de yi bdag nyid rang nyid gyur/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta ta sta a haM/ rdo
116a4(rgyud 'grel): rje rin chen sogs mnyam nyid/ /rnam pa kun tu 'od gsal ba/ /chos kyi rgyal po dpal 'byung ba'i/ /dang po'i sangs rgyas zhes bstod do/ /de nas gzhan don byed pa'i phyir/ /slar yang 'di ltar bsgom par bya/ /khro bo'i gzugs ni 'chas
116a5(rgyud 'grel): pa yis/ /snying kar pad+ma nyi hUM las/ /khro bo bcu po bgegs kyi gtso/ /lus ngag yid gsum phur bus gdab/ /phyi rol rdo rje dra ba dang/ /dra ba la sogs rnam bsgom nas/ /yi ge hUM gnyis dbus gnas pa'i/ /'og tu yi paM raM dag las/ /
116a6(rgyud 'grel): rlung chu me yi dkyil 'khor rnams/ /de nyid rig pas de ltar bya/ /mkha' la bruM yig las byung ba/ /rtag pa'i yan lag las byung ba'i/ /bdud rtsi'i rgyun ni yongs gang bas/ /snod ni de yi bdag nyid 'gyur/ /hUM yig gnyis su baM las ni/ /sku yi rdo rje
116a7(rgyud 'grel): yang dag 'byung/ /gnas pa 'khrad bas gyur ba las/ /gser gyi dkyil 'khor nyid du 'gyur/ /hUM yig ngos gnyis ldan pa yi/ /dbus su suM las lhun po ste/ /de ru hUM las byung ba yi/ /dpal ldan gzhal yas khang brtsegs sam/ /phyir? nas
116b1(rgyud 'grel): nang du sgo bzhi dang/ /gru bzhi stegs bur yang dag ldan/ /dra ba dra phyed phreng ba dang/ /dril bu me long gis gsal ba'o/ /ka ba brgyad dang ldan pa dang/ /nam mkha' bla res snang ba yin/ /'og gi sa gzhi mtho ba dang/ /yangs la rnam par mdzes pa yin/ /de dbus
116b2(rgyud 'grel): h+rI(rgyud 'grel): las sna tshogs pa'i/ /chu skyes nyi mar seng ge'i gdan/ /dang po dbyangs las byung ba yi/ /rgyal ba rnam snang sku mdog dkar/ /'khor lo dril bu phyag na bsnams/ /nyi ma la bzhugs bsgom par bya/ /de yang snying khar sna tshogs pa'i/ /pad+ma nyi ma d+hI(rgyud 'grel): las byung
116b3(rgyud 'grel): dang po'i sangs rgyas mig sman mdog /zhal lnga phyag ni brgyad dang ldan/ g.yas brtsams ser po dmar po dang/ /ljang gu dkar po pad+ma'i zhal/ /nam mkha' 'dra ba'i ral gri dang/ /shes rab po ti bzhi bzhin/ /g.yas dag g.yon gyi phyag rnams kyis/ /sgeg dang/
116b4(rgyud 'grel): bcas pas bsnams pa yin/ /oM sarba d+harmA b+ha ba/ /nang gi mu khyud dag la dgod/ /phyi rol ka la sogs bkod pa/ /sgeg dang mdzes par snang ba yin/ /snying khar srid ba'i 'khor lo ni/ /rten 'brel bcu gnyis ston pa'o/ /de'i lte ba'i 'khor lo ni/ /rtsibs
116b5(rgyud 'grel): bcu pa yis brgyan pa yin/ /oM pra dz+nyA la sogs pa yi/ /gti mug sel bar byed pa yis/ /lhag mnye snying sngags phyed kyis/ /nang gi mu khyud rnam par bskor/ /mu khyud A li bcu gnyis kyis/ /'khor lo 'di yang rnam par gsal/ /zla ba gzhon nu ltar bsam pa
116b6(rgyud 'grel): gzhon nu sgeg pa'i cha byad can/ /sna tshogs kyis ni rtse bran? dang/ /gdong lnga zur phung lnga dang ldan/ /dpung rgyan do shal yan lag mdzes/ /dpal 'phro ba yi zhabs gdub spras/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa/ /shin tu dbugs 'byin byed pa yin
116b7(rgyud 'grel): gang zhig shes rab ye shes sku/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gdan la bzhugs/ /dang po'i dbyangs las byung ba yi/ /dpal ldan 'jam dbyangs zhes dran bya/ /seng+ge'i gdan la gser gyi mdog/ phyi rol shar sogs phyogs dgod pa/ /nyi mar rdo rje skyil
117a1(rgyud 'grel): krung bzhugs/ /rin chen cod pan gyis mdzes pa/ /g.yas kyi 'od zer bcas 'khor lo/ /g.yon pa gdan la brten pa'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sogs ming can/ /'khor los sgyur ba brgyad shes bya/ /de la rig pa'i lha mo bzhi/ /de yi
117a2(rgyud 'grel): mtshams bzhi shes bya ste/ /rdo rje sems ma sku mdog sngo/ /phyag gis pad+ma rdor dril bsnams/ /rin chen sems ma gser gyi mdog /rin chen dril bu nye bar mdzes/ /chos kyi sems ma gur gum mdog /pad+ma dril bus mtshan pa yin/ /las kyi sems
117a3(rgyud 'grel): ma ljang gu ste/ /sna tshogs rdo rje bsnams mdzes dang/ /'gro ba sdud par byed pa yi/ /g.yon pa snang ba chen po yin/ /shar du rdo rje hUM mdzad ni/ /mdog nag rnam rgyal phyag rgya dang/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgyar ldan/ /'jigs rung sa bon hUM las gyur
117a4(rgyud 'grel): glang po'i gdan la gnas pa dang/ /khro dang sgeg pa'i nyams dang ldan/ /lho ru rdo rje nyi ma ni/ /traM byung rmad byung rta yi gdan/ /yid bzhin nor bu ma lus pa'i/ dbul ba sel bar byed pa dang/ /dril bu sgra yis sems can la/ /dpal rnams 'gugs par
117a5(rgyud 'grel): byed pa yin/ /pad+ma gar dbang sku mdog dmar/ /nub tu rma bya'i gdan la bzhugs/ /chu skyes dril bu bsnams pa dang/ /taM yig baM la sngon phyogs byed/ /byang du rta mchog sku mdog ljang/ /nam mkha' lding gi gdan la bzhugs/ /a byung sna tshogs
117a6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dang/ dril bu'i sgra yis phyogs kun khyab/ /saM gaM baM maM g+haM sa bon rnams su/ /oM hUM traM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa las/ /gdan 'di dag ni go rims bzhin/ /mkhas pas grangs bzhin shes par bya/ /zla ba'i gdan gnas 'di rnams kyi/ /dang po'i sangs
117a7(rgyud 'grel): rgyas gong ma bzhin/ /srid pa'i 'khor lo tshangs pa ste/ /snga ma las khyad med phyir ro/ /zhi ba'i 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa/ /mi bskyod sogs rigs rim bzhin du/ /oM du(rgyud 'grel): khats+tshe da la sogs dgod/ /rigs ni ji ltar de na gnas/ /nam zhes bya rtsibs zhig
117b1(rgyud 'grel): la/ /mkhas pas kun la shes par bya/ /sdug bsngal gcod pa rdo rje dang/ /rin po che ni gsung dbang phyug /rdo rje rnon po pad+ma dang/ /ye shes sku can zhes bya ba/ /sna tshogs rdo rje g.yon pa la/ /g.yas pa ral gri khyad par med/ /kun kyang zla ba'i gdan la
117b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs/ zla ba ltar 'jam cha byad can/ /dang po'i dbyangs byung bzlas pa yang/ /snying po nye snying rim pa bzhin/ /de la lnga po rim bzhin du/ /snying po dang ni nye snying po/ /oM badzra dz+nyA ma murta ye na ma/ oM du(rgyud 'grel): khats+tshe da ya te na ma/ oM wA gi shwa ra ya te na ma/ oM
117b3(rgyud 'grel): badzra tik+Sh+Na ya te na ma/ oM dz+nyA na kA ya ya te na ma/ nye ba'i snying po thun mong ste/ /oM sarba d+harmA b+hA wa swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+ha badzra a A aM a(rgyud 'grel): pra kri ta pa ri shud+d+ha sarba d+harma/ pa ri shud+d+ha sarba d+harmA/ ya bu ta sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na kA ya many+dzu sh+rI pa ri shud+d+hi ta mu
117b4(rgyud 'grel): pa ta ye ti a A sarba ta thA ga ta h+ri da ya ha ra ha ra oM hUM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): b+ha ga waM dz+nyA na murti wA gi shwa ra ma hA pa tsa sarba d+harmA ga ga nA mA la su pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma d+hA tu dz+nyA na garb+ha a:/ /'di rnams kyang ni rim bzhin du/ /shar la sogs par bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje sems
117b5(rgyud 'grel): dpa' sogs dbye bas/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnam bcu drug /rdo rje sems dpa' sku mdog dkar/ /rdo rje dril bu bsnams par 'dod/ /rdo rje rgyal po gser gyi mdog /phyag gnyis rdo rje lcags kyu bsnams/ /chags pa pad+ma rA ga'i mdog /mda'
117b6(rgyud 'grel): dang gzhu ni bsnams pa yin/ /rdo rje legs pa sku mdog ljang/ /phyag gnyis legs sbyin pa'o/ /rin po che dang dril bu bsnams/ /rdo rje gzi brjid nyi ma'i mdog /g.yas pa nyi ma'i gzugs 'dzin pa/ /rdo rje dpal ni mar gang mdog /
117b7(rgyud 'grel): g.yas ni rgyal mtshan bsnams pa yin/ /bzhad pa kun da zla ba'i mdog /g.yas pa so yi phreng ba bsnams/ /'di gsum po yi g.yon pa ni/ /skyil krung gdan la brten nas so/ /chos ni pad+ma rA ga'i mdog /g.yon pa pad+ma dmar po bsnams
118a1(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pas rnam par 'byed pa yin/ /de ni rgyas par byed pa yin/ /rnon po bdud rtsi 'od zer mdog /ral gri ni po ti bsnams/ /rgyu dang smra ba g.yas pa na/ /'khor lo ni lce bsnams pa/ /bdag nyid mdzes pa g.yon pa yi/
118a2(rgyud 'grel): phyag gis pad+ma gdan la brten/ /las ni sngo ljang sna tshogs pa'i/ /rdo rje dang ni dril bu bsnams/ /bsrung ba gser gyi mdog 'dra ba/ /phyag gnyis go cha 'bar ba'o/ /gnod sbyin mig sman nag po'i mdog /phyag gnyis mche ba bsnams pa mdzes//
118a3(rgyud 'grel): khu tshur rmad byung mdzes pa'i mdog /phan tshun khu tshur rdo rje 'dzin/ /bdag po rnam pa bzhi yi phyir/ /bzhi bzhi ru ni dran par bya/ /lha mo bcu bcu 'di rnams kyis/ /'khor du yang dag dran par bya/ /skyil krung phyed mar ldan pa yi/ /rang
118a4(rgyud 'grel): rang bdag po'i mdog bzhin no/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus/ /bsam gtan de bzhin shes rab dang/ /smon lam ye shes shes bya ba/ /'bras bu gnas kyi pha rol phyin/ /rdo rje dril bu yang dag ldan/ /'dog dkar rdo rje sems
118a5(rgyud 'grel): dpa' yi/ /'khor du de dag gnas pa yin/ /de nyid lam gyi ngo bor ni/ /bdud la lcags kyu 'debs pa gzhan/ /ser po rdo rje rgyal po yi/ /'khor du de dag gnas pa yin/ /de nyid rnam par dag ngo bor/ /mda' dang gzhu yis rnam brgyan
118a6(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /mdog dmar rdo rje chags pa ni/ /thams cad dkyil 'khor yongs su bskor/ /gzhan don ngo bor gnas de nyid/ /phyag gnyis legs pa byin pa dang/ /sku mdog ljang gu'i 'khor rnams kyis/ /rdo rje legs pa bskor ba'o/ /rab tu dga' 
118a7(rgyud 'grel): dang dri ma med/ /gsum pa de bzhin 'od byed dang/ /'od 'phro sbyang dka' de bzhin du/ /mngon gyur ring song mi g.yo ba/ /legs pa'i blo gros chos kyi sprin/ /sku mdog ser por 'bras bdag nyid/ /dar dpyangs bcing ba'i tshul gnas pa//
118b1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje rin chen 'khor du gnas/ /de nyid lam gyis grangs kyi ni/ /nyi ma'i mdog can nyi ma bsnams/ /rdo rje nyi ma nyid bzhin du/ /rjes su byed par gnas pa yin/ /sdug bsngal dang ni kun 'byung dang/ /'gog pa lam dang de bzhin du/ /chos shes rjes su
118b2(rgyud 'grel): shes pa dang/ /kun rdzob shes dang de bzhin du/ /don dam de bzhin mi skye ba/ /zad pa shes pa'i ye shes ni/ /rang bzhin phun sum tshogs dge ba'i/ /rin chen rgyal mtshan bsnams pa dang/ /mdog ljang rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi/ /phun sum
118b3(rgyud 'grel): tshogs pa bsgom par bya/ /gzhan don phun sum bdag nyid kyi/ /de bzhin zla ba'i 'od zer mdog /rdo rje bzhad pa la brten pa/ /so yi phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /phung po khams dang skye mched dang/ /bden pa rten 'brel thub pa yi/ /gnas
118b4(rgyud 'grel): dang gnas min bdag po dang/ /dus gsum bden pa rnam pa bzhi/ /'dus byas 'dus ma byas dge ba/ /rdo rje chos kyi 'khor du bsgom/ /don dang phyag g.yon pad+ma ni/ /bsnams nas g.yas pas 'byed par mdzad/ /gcig dang rgyu dang
118b5(rgyud 'grel): za ba dang/ /byed pa dang ni dbang sgyur dang/ /bdag po'i don dang brtag pa dang/ /nyon mongs pa dang dag pa'i gnas/ /rnal 'byor can dang ma grol bkrol/ /bdag tu 'dzin pa skye ba nyid/ /de dag gcod pa'i sku mdog nag /phyag na po
118b6(rgyud 'grel): ti bsnams pa dang/ /nyon mongs gcod pa'i ral gri bsnams/ /rdo rje rnon po'i 'khor du brjod/ /dad dang brtson 'grus dran bsam gtan/ /shes rab de bzhin sha yi spyan/ /lha dang shes rab chos dang ni/ /sangs rgyas spyan drang dang po yi/ /rdo rje 'khor
118b7(rgyud 'grel): lo sku mdog ser/ /lha mo 'khor lo bsnams par bskor/ /gnas dang gnas min rnam smin dang/ /mos pa dang ni sna tshogs khams/ /dbang po kun 'gro lam dag dang/ /nyon mongs rnam par sbyang ba dang/ /sngon gnas rjes dran skye 'chi dang/ /zag pa zad
119a1(rgyud 'grel): pa nyid kyang de/ /rdo rje smra ba zangs kyi mdog /phyag gis lce bsnams 'khor gyis bskor/ /nam mkha' rnam shes mdza' yas dag /de las gzhan pa'i zil gnon brgyad/ /rdo rje la ni sku mdog ljang/ /sna tshogs rdor dril
119a2(rgyud 'grel): thogs pas bskor/ /'byung pa rnam pa bzhi po dang/ /sngon po ser po dkar dmar dang/ /nam mkha' de bzhin sems dang ni/ /zad par rnam dag ldan pa yin/ /bsrung ba ser po go cha bsnams/ /rtsa ba'i mtshan nyid de kho na/ /phyin ci ma log mtshan
119a3(rgyud 'grel): nyid dang/ /'bras bu rgyu'i de kho na/ /phra ba dang ni rags pa dang/ /grags dang rnam par dag yul dang/ /sdud dang dbye ba'i mtshan nyid dang/ /mkhas de kho na rnam bcu ni/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin sku mdog nag /phyag gnyis mche ba bsnams pa'o/ /tshe dang?
119a4(rgyud 'grel): sems dang yo byad dang/ /las dang skye ba mos pa dang/ /smon lam dang ni rdzu 'phrul dang/ /ye shes dang ni dbang ba dang/ /rdo rje khu tshur sku mdog dkar/ /phyag gnyis khu tshur bsnams pa'o/ /so sor gtso bo'i sngags kyis bskyed/ /rang rang sngags
119a5(rgyud 'grel): kyis mchod pa dang/ /rdo rje skyil krung phyed kyis ni/ /'di dag rim bzhin gnas pa yin/ /'di ltar bsgoms pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /yon tan phun sum tshogs pa ni/ /ji skad gsungs pa bzhin du thob/ /dngos grub gzhan ni smos ci dgos/ /'di
119a6(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi ni grwa bzhi ru/ /mkhas pas sgeg mo'i la sogs bsgom/ /sgeg mo mdog dkar rdo rje bsnams/ /phreng ba ma ni gser gyi mdog /rin chen phreng ba bsnams pa yin/ /glu ma sku mdog dmar po ste/ /pi wang rdeb pa'i mchog yin no/ /gar ma
119a7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje ljang gu ni/ /rtse gcig bsnams nas gar mdzad do/ /spos dang me tog mar me dri/ /de rnams rjes la dran par bgyi/ /spos khang me tog snod dang ni/ /mar me yi ni mchod sdong dang/ /dri yi dung chos rim bzhin no/ /'di rnams kha dog sgeg
119b1(rgyud 'grel): sogs bzhin/ /lcags kyu dang ni zhags pa dang/ /lcags sgrog dril bu zhes grags pa/ /dkar po ser po dmar po ljang/ /shar la sogs pa'i sgo la rten/ /ming dang mthun pa'i phyag mtshan gnas/ /phyi rol skal pa bzang po ni/ /shar la sogs pa bsgom par bya/
119b2(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa bzhi yi dbye ba yi/ /de dag bcu drug yang dag 'dod/ /rang gi bdag po'i rjes mthun par/ /sku mdog phyag mtshan mdzes pa yin/ /yang na gzhan du phyag mtshan rnams/ /rim pa bzhin du bsam par bya/ /de la mgon po byams pa ni/ /phyag na klu
119b3(rgyud 'grel): shing bsnams pa yin/ /'jam dpal ral gri po ti dag /ji ltar rim bzhin mtshan ma yin/ /spos kyi glang po spos chu yi/ /dri yi dung chos char 'bebs pa'i/ /thod dang bcas pa'i cod pan ni/ /ye shes rtog ni bsgreng nas bsnams/ /bzang skyong ba ni nam mkha' i
119b4(rgyud 'grel): mdzod/ /bslang na mtshan par byed pa'o/ /blo gros rgya mtsho yid bzhin nor/ /phyag gi pad+ma mdzes pa yin/ /dpag bsam shing dang bum pa bzang/ /blo gros mi bzad phyag g.yon na/ /po tis mtshan pa'i pad+ma ni/ /spobs pa brtsegs pa de bzhin du/ /
119b5(rgyud 'grel): phyag na ral gri bsnams pa yin/ /mthu chen thob pa ral gri bsnams/ /ngan song kun 'dren rgyal mtshan no/ /mya ngan mun pa nges 'joms ni/ /dpal pa g.yu drung 'khyil pa ni/ /dra ba can gyi 'od rnams so/ /zla 'od gzhon nu zhes bya ba/ /zla tshes g.yar ka rgyal
119b6(rgyud 'grel): mtshan 'dzin/ /'od dpag med pa po ti dang/ /ral gri rin chen mdzod 'dzin pa/ /nam mkha' i snying por shes par bya'o/ /sna tshogs rdo rje ral gri ni/ /bsnams pa sgrib pa rnam par sel/ /byang chub sems dpa' zhes 'dod do/ /'di rnams phyi'i? sgo skyod? dag /sngar
119b7(rgyud 'grel): ni ji skad smos pa bzhin/ /de ltar bsgoms pa'i rjes la ni/ /ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs nas/ /de nyid gsum gyi yi ge yi/ /rnal 'byor rig pas byin brlobs bya/ /de la rim pa 'di yin te/ /spyan drang sngon 'gro phyag 'tshal te/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta pa
120a1(rgyud 'grel): da band+ha na ka ro mi/ /e ma kun tu bzang po yi/ /byang chub sems dpa' i sbyor ba mchog /de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo yi/ /dbus na de bzhin gshegs pa mdzes/ de nas 'khor lo'i dbang phyug la/ /de bzhin gshegs
120a2(rgyud 'grel): pa kun zhugs nas/ /byung na rang rang rig pa ni/ /byin gyis brlabs pa mdzad pa yin/ /e ma sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /rgya chen gdod nas skye ba med/ /rdul bral thams cad ji snyed kyi/ /sangs rgyas thams cad gcig tu gyur/ /de nyid gsum gyi byin brlabs
120a3(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /'khor lo'i bdag nyid dbang bskur nas/ /rang bzhin dag par bsgom par bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka sa ma ya sh+rI ye hUM/ de ltar ting 'dzin gsum dang ni/ /mkhas pas cho ga byas nas ni/ /de nas rang lha'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /mchod
120a4(rgyud 'grel): pa yang dag brtsam par bya/ /pad+ma'i phyag rgya ldan g.yo bas/ /arga'i snod ni bzang ba yis/ /g.yas pa ba dan gsum dang ni/ /de nyid gsum gyis bsam par bya/ /de nas mkhas pas me tog sogs/ /de yi chu yis bsang bar bya/ /oM badzra bu
120a5(rgyud 'grel): puShpe hUM/ oM badzra d+hu pe hUM/ oM badzra A lo ke hUM/ oM badzra gand+he hUM/ oM badzra a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA nAM/ Adya nutpan+na twat/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ phyag 'tshal rdo rje ldan pa yi/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa dang/ /se gol brdabs la dgug pa dang/ /phyag byas nas ni
120a6(rgyud 'grel): arga dbul/ /oM badzra a ku sha dza:/ oM badzra pA sha hUM/ oM badzra spho Ta paM/ oM badzra A be sha a/ zhugs nas yi ge gsum gyis ni/ /byin gyis brlab la dbang bskur ro/ /de nas sngar bshad rim pa yis/ /mchod pa rnams kyis mchod
120a7(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ /de las gzhan pa'i rigs ma ni/ /bcu drug gis ni mchod bstod bya/ /dkyil 'khor rnam gsum phyag mtshan dang/ /ji srid thig le'i rim pa dang/ /snang ba la sogs rim pa yi/ /spros pa thams cad zhi ba dang/ /stong nyid
120b1(rgyud 'grel): sogs rim thob pa yi/ /rnal 'byor lhan skyes mdzes pa yis/ /de ltar gom pa 'jug pa rnams/ /mi shes chu bo ma lus pa/ /bskams shing sems kyi zla ba ni/ /shar bskal pa bzang po yin/ /spros dang bsdu ba'i rim pa yis/ /ji srid sgrub pa mi
120b2(rgyud 'grel): skyo'i bar/ /de ltar yang dang yang du bya/ /langs nas sangs rgyas spyan drangs nas/ /de nas gtor ma sbyin par bya/ /de la rdo rje dpa' ni/ /'khor los sgyur bar 'dod pa las/ /a las byung zhing sku mdog dkar/ /rdo rje dang ni dril bu bsnams/ /thugs kar
120b3(rgyud 'grel): dang po sangs rgyas ni/ /sngar ni ji skad bshad pa bzhin/ /de la mya ngan 'das 'khor lo/ /a ra la sogs yi ger ldan/ /de steng a ra pa tsa na/ /phyag gnyis rdo rje dril bu bsnams/ /'di yi nye ba'i snying po ni/ /sngar ni bstan zin gang yin pa'o/ /oM a ra
120b4(rgyud 'grel): pa tsa na ya te na ma/ /sngags kun rigs kyi bdag nyid kyi/ /rnam par snang mdzad chen po yang/ /zhal bzhi sku mdog dung 'dra zhing/ /bsam gtan phyag rgyar ldan pa'o/ /dang por sangs rgyas thugs ka ru/ /zhi ba'i 'khor lo 'di rnams kyang/
120b5(rgyud 'grel): rtsibs drug pa la ris drug gis/ /yongs su bskor bar ldan pa'o/ /de la gnyis med 'jam pa'i dpal/ /mdog dkar zhal drug a las byung/ /phyag gnyis ral gri po ti bsnams/ /gnyis kyis utpal bsnams pa dang/ /gnyis ni ting 'dzin
120b6(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya ni/ /yang dag snang ba snang ba che/ /'di dag so so'i snying po ni/ /sgrub pa'i thabs las gsal bar bstan/ /bshad pa'i 'khor lo bdag nyid ni/ /lha rnams nyi shur mnyam pa la/ /gcig gi bdag nyid chen po ni/ /blo chen rnams kyis mchod par
120b7(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /rdo rje hUM mdzad gtso bo yis/ /'khor lo bsgyur bar 'dod pa la/ /'di rnams rang gi ngo bo ni/ /kho bos sngar ni bstan zin to/ /'on kyang 'di yi khyad par ni/ /da ni rab tu bshad par bya/ /mda' dang gzhu ni 'gengs pa dang/ /rnam rgyal phyag rgya rdor dril 
121a1(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /ral gri rdo rje zhags pa dang/ /lcags kyu dang ni lcags sgrogs bsnams/ /lha chen sum mnan pa ni/ /rdo rje hUM mdzad ces brjod do/ /'di yi rin chen hUM mdzad ni/ /phyag drug rnam rgyal phyag rgya med/ /zhal drug zhal ni re re la
121a2(rgyud 'grel): spyan ni gsum gsum ldan pa'o/ /'di ni pad+ma'i hUM mdzad ni/ /mche gtsigs ha la ha lar ldan/ /'di yi las kyi hUM mdzad ni/ /rnal rgyal rang gi phyag rgyar ldan/ /lcags kyu zhags pa ral gri dang/ /gtun shing lhag ma phyag na bsnams/ /gang yang
121a3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje rin chen ni/ /'khor los sgyur bar 'dod pa la/ /ser po rin chen gyis mtshan pa/ /kun kyang rin chen cod pan can/ /de la rnam snang sngar bshad bzhin/ /don kun grub pa mi bskyod pa/ /rdo rje bsnams nas sa gnon no/ /rin chen gtsug phud
121a4(rgyud 'grel): snga ma bzhin/ /rin chen pad+ma ku mdog ser/ /pad+ma'i phyag rgyas ldan pa dang/ /laM las byung pa'i sa bon ni/ /dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pad+ma la/ /g.yas pa bkod nas g.yon pa la/ /bsam gtan dang po'i bar du gnon/ /rin chen don/
121a5(rgyud 'grel): yod don yod do/ /rdo rje'i tshig ni thams cad la/ /rang ming rin chen sgra dang ni/ /yang dag ldan pa'i sku yin no/ /rin chen rdo rje'i rdor tshig la/ /khro gnyer ldan par shes par bya/ /g.yon pas rdo rje gnon pa dang/ /g.yas pas 'dod pa gnon
121a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /rdo rje rin chen nyi ma 'od/ /rin chen dpal ni rgyal mtshan brjod/ /gang yang pad+ma gar dbang phyug /'khor los sgyur bar 'dod pa la/ /rdo rje'i gnas su pad+ma'i tshig /lha gzhan kun la shes par bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i
121a7(rgyud 'grel): tshig /sngon sod rnam par snang mdzad brjod/ /rin chen rin chen gtsug phud dang/ /pad+ma gar gyi dbang la yang/ /ting 'dzin sgra yi sngon du ni/ /pad+ma zhes ni brjod pa yin/ /pad+ma nges pa'i dbang phyug ni/ /pad+ma'i don yod grub pa yin/
121b1(rgyud 'grel): gzhan gyi khyad par 'di dag kyang/ /nor bus byas pa'i rin po che/ /nyi ma nyi ma'i gzugs 'dzin pa/ /dpal ni zla ba'i dang pa las/ /gnas pa ku mu ta la ni/ /zla bas mtshan pa'i gdugs bsnams pa'o/ /bzhad pa la ni zhal bcu gcig /pad+ma'i
121b2(rgyud 'grel): sgrol ma brgya byin mdog /pad+ma'i 'khor lo khyab 'jug 'dra/ /smra ba tshangs pa'i rjes su byed/ /las ni gzhon nu lta bu ste/ /de las gzhan pa khyad par med/ /rta mchog gsum gyi bdag nyid dam/ /rnam pa lnga 'am rnam pa gcig /sngon po gsum gyi
121b3(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid ni/ /ral gri mda' gzhu utpal bsnams/ /'di yi lha mo gnyis po ni/ /g.yas pa sna tshogs rdo rje bsnams/ /de la gtsang ma sku mdog dkar/ /pad+ma sngon pos rnam par mdzes/ /dag ma pad+ma rang gi mdog /pad+ma dmar pos rnam par
121b4(rgyud 'grel): mdzes/ /'di yi nang gi skye mched rnams/ /sa snying la sogs byin gyis brlabs/ /phyi yi skye mched rnams la ni/ /gzugs rdo rje sogs byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ /g.yon pas 'dod pa'i 'jig rten gnon/ /g.yas pas mnan pa bsam gtan
121b5(rgyud 'grel): yin/ /rta skad 'tsher ba phyogs kyi zhal/ /bsam gtan dang po'i bar du reg /lnga yi bdag nyid snga ma bzhin/ /yang na 'od dpag med pa bzhin/ /po ti dang ni ral gri dang/ /mda' gzhu bsnams pa yid 'phrog pa'o/ /tshangs pa brgya byin khyab
121b6(rgyud 'grel): 'jug ni/ /pa ba sangs dang skar ma'i dgra /zhabs kyi pad+ma bskor ba yis/ /grong khyer sum rtsegs pa gnon pa/ /'phrog ma'i lha mo rnams kyang ni/ /'di dag 'khyud nas bzhugs pa'o/ /rta yi gdong can thams cad kyang/ /'khor kun yongs su shes
121b7(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /de ltar zla gcig zla drug gam/ /lo gcig mtshan ma thob bar du/ /de srid bsnyen pa byas nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor las la 'jug par bya/ /gtsug lag khang la sogs pa yi/ /yid du 'ong ba'i sa phyogs su/ /tshad ldan tsha rgod med par ni/ /
122a1(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor dam pa bri bar bya/ /rgyal pos khru ni lnga brgya bcu/ /blon po chen pos nyi shu lnga/ /tshong dpon ded dpon nyi shu 'phyed/ /sgrub pos bcu gnyis sam de'i phyed/ /der ni mngon spyod sbyin sreg dang/ /zhi ba yi ni sbyin sreg
122a2(rgyud 'grel): dag /byas nas sa ni sbyang bar bya/ /yongs su bzung bar bya ba yin/ /der ni dkyil 'khor yongs sprul nas/ /gong du ji skad bshad pa bzhi/ /phyag 'tshal la sogs sngon song nas/ /mchod pa yongs su rgyas par bya/ /de nas sgrub pa'i grogs
122a3(rgyud 'grel): mchog gis/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstod nas/ /sa yi lha mo spyan drangs la/ /sna tshogs mchod pas mchod nas ni/ /skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par gyis/ /sa dang pha rol phyin pa dang/ /lha mo khyod
122a4(rgyud 'grel): ni dbang du gyur/ /skyob pa shAkya'i seng ge yis/ /ji ltar bdud kyi sde bcom pa/ /de bzhin bdag gi sa bdud las ni/ /rgyal bar bya ste dkyil 'khor bri/ /mig gnyis nyi zla rkang mthil ni/ /rdo rje rgya gram byin brlabs nas/ /zhal nas hUM gi?
122a5(rgyud 'grel): sgra sgrogs shing/ /yongs su bskyod pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /phyogs rnams rdo rje'i sa gzhi dang/ /rdo rje dra ba ra ba bsam/ /lag gnyis rdo rje dril ldan dag /g.yas pa rdo rje bsnun pa yis/ tshul gyis bgegs la bka' bsgo dang/ /phur
122a6(rgyud 'grel): bus btab pa la sogs bya/ /de nas de nyid dris byugs la/ /lha yi gnas su tsan dan las/ /sogs pa'i dri yi thig le dang/ /me tog sna tshogs dgram par bya/ /de rjes nam mkha' la gnas pa/ /dkyil 'khor lha rnams bkug nas ni/
122a7(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa lnga dang brgyad rnams kyang/ /mchod nas 'di ltar brjod par bya/ /rnam par snang mdzad bcom ldan 'das/ /rigs lnga rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ bdag la brtse bar gyur nas ni/ slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang/ /khyed rnams
122b1(rgyud 'grel): la yang mchod pa'i phyir/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag ni gus pa la/ /de bas gnang ba mdzad par rigs/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten mgon brtse dang/ /byang chub sems dpa' dgra bcom dang/ /gsang sngags lha gzhan gang bzhugs dang/ /'jig rten
122b2(rgyud 'grel): skyong ba'i lha rnams dang/ /gang yang 'byung po mthu chen dang/ /gang du lha'i spyan mnga' ba/ /sems can bstan la dga' ba rnams/ /bdag la dgongs pa mdzad du gsol/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis/ /sad ni dkyil 'khor bzang po'i ming/
122b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dis zhes bya ba ci nus kyi/ /cho ga bzhin du 'bri lags na/ /bdag dang slob mar bcas pa la/ /thugs ni brtse bar dgongs su gsol/ /tshogs pa thams cad dkyil 'khor du/ /byin gyis brlab par mdzad du gsol/ /zhes ni lan gsum
122b4(rgyud 'grel): brjod pa yis/ /lha rnams lhag par gnas pa'o/ /de nas 'og nas 'chad pa yi/ /bum pa mtshan nyid ldan pa dang/ /'bru la sogs pa thams cad dang/ /bcas pa lhag par gnas par bya/ /gzhan yang sbyin sreg cho ga dang/ /gtor
122b5(rgyud 'grel): ma shin tu rgya chen po/ /slob ma lhag par gnas pa dang/ /rim pa bzhin du shes par bya/ /de la khrus byas gtsang ma yi/ /gos gon nas ni slob ma yin/ /thal mo me tog bcas pa dang/ /phyag byas nas ni 'di skad brjod/ /dga' chen
122b6(rgyud 'grel): khyod bdag ston pa po/ /slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol/ /byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pas/ /mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo/ /dam tshig de nyid stsal du gsol/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /skyabs gnas dag kyang bdag
122b7(rgyud 'grel): la stsal/ /thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu/ /mgon pos bdag ni 'jug par 'tshal/ /bu tshur shog cig theg chen po/ /khyod ni tshul chen snod yin te/ /gsang sngags spyod pa'i cho ga 'di/ /khyod la yang dag bstan par bya/ /rdzogs
123a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sangs rgyas gang 'das dang/ /de bzhin gang dag ma byon dang/ /da ltar bzhugs pa'i mgon po rnams/ /'gro la phan phyir bzhugs pa dag /de dag kun gyi gsang sngags kyi/ /cho ga bzang po 'di mkhyen nas/ /dpa' bos
123a2(rgyud 'grel): byang chub shing drung du/ /thams cad mkhyen pa mnyam med rnyes/ /gsang sngags spyod pa mnyam med pa/ /skyob pa shAkya seng ge yis/ /bdud sde shin tu mi bzad pa/ /dpung chen dag kyang de yis bcom/ /de bas kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir
123a3(rgyud 'grel): bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig /de nas cho ga'i yan lag kun/ /byas la byin gyis brlab pa dang/ /mchod nas a shwat+tha sogs pa'i/ /so shing ku sha srung skud byin/ /rig sngags ldan pa'i srad bu ni/ /tshad dang ldan par skal pa dang
123a4(rgyud 'grel): phan tshun legs par sgril ba yis/ /mkhas pas dkyil 'khor thig gdab po/ /oM a n+yo? n+yA nu ga ta sarba d+harmA/ spa ra spa rA nu ga ta/ sarba d+harmA/ A dya ndA nu pra biSh+Ta sarba d+harmA hUM/ oM badzra sa ma ya sU tra ma tri kra ma hUM/ /shar nub byang dang lho
123a5(rgyud 'grel): phyogs dang/ /mngon par bltas la tshangs thig gnyis/ /me dang gnod sbyin dbang ldan dang/ /gshin rje mngon par phyogs pa dang/ /rlung dang gshin rje bden bral dang/ /gnod sbyin phyogs su kha bltas la/ /shar dang nub tu thig
123a6(rgyud 'grel): gdab pa/ /me dang bden bral srin po dang/ /dbang po rlung dang dbang ldan dang/ /rlung gi phyogs su kha bltas la/ /go rims bzhin du lho byang gi /thig gnyis de bzhin gdab par bya/ /slob dpon slob ma bskor phyogs su/ /'gro zhing
123a7(rgyud 'grel): me dang rlung mtshams dang/ /bden bral dbang ldan mtshams su ni/ /gnas nas thig gnyis gdab par bya/ /gsar pa las ni skal nas kyang/ /tshad dang mthun par mdzes pa yi/ /thig ni mkhas pas ci nus kyi/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni thig gdab
123b1(rgyud 'grel): po/ /gru bzhir bya zhing bsgo bzhi dang/ /rta babs bzhi yis mdzes byas la/ /thig bzhi dang ni ldan gyur pa/ /dar dang me tog phreng bas brgyan/ /grwa yi phyogs ni thams cad dang/ /sgo khyud kyi ni mtshams rnams su/ /rdo rje rin chen spras par ni/ /dkyil 'khor phyi rim
123b2(rgyud 'grel): thig gdab bo/ /de yi rim pa'i nang zhugs la/ /'khor lo 'dra ba'i rdo rje yis/ /thig gis yongs su bskor bya zhing/ /ka ba brgyad kyis mdzes byas la/ /phyogs kun mnyam pa nyid dmigs la/ /shes rab can gyis thig gdab bo/ /shar dang nub dang byang dang lhor/
123b3(rgyud 'grel): thig bzhi btab pas dkyil 'khor brgyad/ /de ltar lung dang bla ma yi/ /gdams ngag dag la brten nas ni/ /cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i thig gdab bo/ /oM tsi tra sa ma ya hUM/ zhes ni lan gsum mngon bzlas pa'i/ /sngags
123b4(rgyud 'grel): dang phyag rgya bcas pa dang/ /byin gyis brlabs nas tshon rtsi ni/ /cho ga bzhin du bri bar bya/ /sngon po rdo rje rtse rang bzhin/ /gnyis pa gser la dmigs pa ste/ /pad+ma rA ga'i rang bzhin gzhan/ /de bzhin gzhan ni margad 'dra/ /dkar po'i nang du shes
123b5(rgyud 'grel): bya ste/ /de ni tshon gyi rim par bshad/ /shar phyogs su ni sngon po ste/ /lhor ni ser po dang ldan pa/ /nub kyi cha ni dmar po ste/ /byang ni ljang gur yang dag ldan/ /dbus kyi sa yi cha nyid ni/ /shel ltar dkar ba bla na med/ /rtag tu rdo rje dril 'chang
123b6(rgyud 'grel): zhing/ /rab? mnyam gzhag pa'i slob dpon gyis/ /lha rnams rang rang gnas su ni/ /gzugs dang phyag rgya sogs pa yi/ /kha dog dbyibs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi/ /bris nas sngon gsungs mchod pa rnams/ /rgya chen po yis mchod bya zhing/ /gzhan yang
123b7(rgyud 'grel): zhal zas sna tshogs dang/ /'dod yon lnga dang rin chen dang/ /gos kyi bye brag sna tshogs dang/ /rta dang glang po'i tshogs kyis mchod/ /mtshan nyid ldan pa'i bum pa rnams/ /mgrin pa'i ras kris tsu ta las/ /sogs par lo mar bcas pa yis/ /shing
124a1(rgyud 'grel): gi kha brgyan rin chen dang/ /'bru dang sman lnga dri zhim pa'i/ /spos chu me tog la sogs pas/ /rab tu bkang nas rang rigs kyis/ /mtshan mas mtshan nas bum pa la/ /rang rang rigs kyi lhar bskyed nas/ /ye shes sems dpa' 
124a2(rgyud 'grel): zhugs pa dang/ /mchod pa la sogs byin brlabs nas/ /cho ga bzhin du gnas par bya/ /'bras chan nas chan snum khur sogs/ /bza' ba shin tu rgya chen po/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas byin brlabs nas/ /gtor ma shin tu rgya chen btang/ /lha dang
124a3(rgyud 'grel): lha min gnod sbyin lto 'phye grul/ /nam mkha' lding dang 'dabs bzangs lus srul po/ /dri za srin po gdon gyi rigs rnams dang/ /gang dag sa la gnas pa'i rdzu 'phrul can/ /bdag cag pus mos la btsugs nas su/ /thal sbyar khyed rnams la
124a4(rgyud 'grel): ni gsol 'debs kyis/ /bu smad bcas shing g.yogs 'khor bcas pa rnams/ /gnas dang phan gdags slad du 'dir sbyon cig /'byung po gang dga' i rab ste gnas dang/ /dga' ba'i tshal dang lha yi gnas rnams dang/ /shar nub ri dar nyi zla'i
124a5(rgyud 'grel): khyim rnams dang/ /ri bo kun la gang dag gnas pa dang/ /chu bo kun dang chu yi mdo rnams dang/ /rin chen gnas na lhag par gang gnas dang/ /mtsho dang rdzing dang lter ka chu dogs dang/ /g.ya' chu sil ma dag na gang dag gnas pa dang/ /
124a6(rgyud 'grel): grong dang grong khyer phyugs lhas stong pa dang/ /khang stong dag dang lha yi khang pa dang/ /gtsug lag khang dang grong khyer gnas dag gam/ /dka' thub gnas dang glang chen bres dang ni/ /rgyal po'i dkor khang dag na gang gnas dang/ /lam
124a7(rgyud 'grel): srad bzhi mdo dang ni mdun sa dang/ /gang dag lam po che dang shing gcig drung/ /dur khrod chen po nags tshal chen po dang/ /seng ge dreng dang gcan zan gnas rnams dang/ /'brog chen 'jigs su rung bar gang gnas dang/ /gang dag gling
124b1(rgyud 'grel): ? tshig dag na gnas pa dang/ /lhun po dur khrod dag na gnas pa rnams/ /rab tu dgyes shing go bar gyur nas su/ /phreng ba me tog dri dang bdug pa dang/ /gtod dang gtor ma mar me gus phul nas/ /'di dag bzhes te btung zhing bsnams nas su/ /las?
124b2(rgyud 'grel): 'di rnams kyi 'bras bu mchis par mdzod/ /shar phyogs rdo rje can de lha tshogs 'khor dang bcas/ /gtor ma phul ba 'di dag bzhes su gsol/ /me dang gshin rje bden bral srin pa'i bdag /chu bdag rlung bdag nor gyi bdag po dang/ /dbang ldan lha
124b3(rgyud 'grel): ste 'byung po'i bdag po dang/ steng gi nyi zla tshangs pa chen po dang/ /lha rnams kun dang gang dag sa steng klu /ri'i lha dang gsang ba'i tshogs 'dus pa/ /so sor so sor gtor ma phul ba 'di/ /rab tu dgyes pa'i yid kyis bzhes nas kyang/ /rang rang phyogs su la
124b4(rgyud 'grel): par bzhugs nas su/ /rang gi bu smad mdza' bshes gnyen bdun dang/ /nang mi? dmag dang dpung bcas thabs gcig tu/ /me tog dri dang byug pa gtor mar bcas/ /'di dag btung zhing legs par gsol nas kyang/ /bdag gi las kyi 'bras
124b5(rgyud 'grel): bu mchis par mdzod/ /zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang ni/ /mngon spyod kyi ni dbye ba yi/ /thabs khung mchod rdzas rnal 'byor dang/ /'dug stangs tshul bzhin shes par bya/ /de la re shig zhi ba ni/ /sa gzhi dkar po thab khung ni/ /zlum po'i chur ni khru gang
124b6(rgyud 'grel): zabs/ /khru? ni phyed kyi tshad/ /sor bzhi dor la spangs su ni/ /sor bzhi stong la sor bzhi smad/ /phyi rol kun nas gru bzhi ma/ /cho ga bzhin du bri bar bya/ /u dum wa ra pa la sha /a mra blags sha kar smra rgya/ /a shwad tha la sogs pa yi/ /yam shing
124b7(rgyud 'grel): sor ni bcu gnyis dang/ /nam zho 'o ma 'bras yos dang/ /til dang dur ba ku sha sngo/ /sa la 'bras chen me tog dkar/ /spos dang sbrang rtsi mar la sogs/ /srog chags med pa'i mchod sbyin shing/ /dgon pa'i lci ba 'o ma shing/ /gos dkar go rnams 
125a1(rgyud 'grel): snying rje'i sems/ /rnal 'byor pad+ma'i 'dug stangs so/ /rang gi sa bon las byung ba/ /las dang rjes mthun b+ha ba ka /rdo rje rtse gsum phreng ba dang/ /dbyug pa 'gun te 'dzin bsams nas/ /ye shes me lha dgug pa dang/ /gzhu
125a2(rgyud 'grel): dang bcing dang dbang byas nas/ /phyag rgya bzhis gdab dbang bskur ba/ /oM ratnA b+hi ShI ny+tsa/ b+hasmi ku ru sarba/ de nas mchod yon sngon song ba'i/ /las dang rjes su mthun pa yi/ /mchod pa lnga dang sgeg mo sogs/ /gsang ba'i mchod pa rnams kyis
125a3(rgyud 'grel): mchod/ /de rjes gsang sngags 'di dag gis/ /mar gyi dgang blugs gsum phul nas/ /bgegs ni yod med brtag par bya/ /oM a na la ma hA b+hu ta dzwa la ya sarba duSh+TaM hUM phaT/ 'bar ba'i me la yam shing ste/ /de nas mar dang de 'og til/ /
125a4(rgyud 'grel): de nas 'bras chan la sogs pa'o/ /cho ga 'di ni mdor bsdus pa'o/ /de nas me yi dbus nyid du/ /dkyil 'khor lha rnams dmigs pa dang/ /ye shes sems dpa' bcug nas ni/ /mchod pa yongs su rgyas par bya/ /ma la bsang gtor 'thor 'thur
125a5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /dgang blugs dang ni mchog pa dag /byas nas 'dod pa'i dngos grub phyir/ /gsol ba btab la gshegs su gsol/ /de nas dge bsnyen dge tshul dang/ /dge slong sdom pa 'dzin pa yi/ /slob ma dag la cho ga bzhin/ /rim bzhin gzhug
125a6(rgyud 'grel): cing dbang bskur ro/ /stod g.yogs smad g.yogs ldan pa dang/ /lag na me tog bcos pa dang/ /phyag 'tshal gsol ba gdab pa dang/ /bshags pa la sogs byas nas ni/ /gtso bo bdag la sdom pa gsol/ /thub pa nyi ma ma lus pa//
125a7(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba ni/ /slob dpon dbang du gnas pa la/ /sangs rgyas rol mo las byung ba/ /mi ldog 'khor lo'i 'byor par ldan/ /thar pa chen po'i grong khyer mchog /gsang ba chen por
125b1(rgyud 'grel): 'jug par bgyi/ /gsang ba'i rigs mchog thams cad du/ /slob dpon chen po bdag 'jug mdzod/ /mi ldog pa yi dbang bskur ba/ /skal pa chen po bdag la gsol/ /mtshan rnams kun gyi rgyas btab cing/ /dpe byad rnams dang yang dag ldan/ /sangs rgyas
125b2(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi yid 'ong ba/ /slob dpon chen po bdag la gsol/ /dbang bskur ba ni rmad byung che/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /bdag ni rtag tu slob dpon 'gyur/ /slob dpon chen po bdag la gsol/ /che ge zhes bya ba 'di nyid ni/ /byang chub sems
125b3(rgyud 'grel): ni yongs 'dzin cing/ /dam tshig sdom dang gsang ba yi/ /'khor lo 'di la gzhug par 'tshal/ /gsang ba chen po'i rigs dag pa'i/ /gsang ba yongs su 'dzin par ni/ /bdag nyid chen po khyed 'dod dam/ /'tshal zhes brjod pa 'di skad ces/ /sangs rgyas
125b4(rgyud 'grel): chos dang dge 'dun te/ /dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song/ /'di ni sangs rgyas rigs dag pa'i/ /dam tshig brtan par gyur pa'o/ /rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya yang/ /blo chen khyed kyis gzung bar gyis/ /byang chub sems gang de rdo rje/ /shes rab dril bu
125b5(rgyud 'grel): zhes bshad do/ /slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi/ /bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/ /'di ni rdo rje'i rigs dag pa'i/ /sdom pa dam tshig yin par gsungs/ /rin chen rigs mchog chen po la/ /nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du/ /zang zing mi
125b6(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs chos dang 'byams/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi rab tu sbyin/ /phyi nang gsang ba theg par gsum/ /dam pa'i chos kyang bzung bar bgyi/ /'di ni pad+ma rigs dag pa'i/ /sdom pa dam tshig yin par gsungs/ /las kyi rigs mchog chen po la
125b7(rgyud 'grel): sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni/ /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ /mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bya/ /slob dpon 'dir ni bdag la gson/ /gtso bos ji ltar bka' stsal pa/ /de ltar bdag gis bgyid par 'tshal/ /ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams
126a1(rgyud 'grel): byang chub tu ni ngas mdzad pa'i/ /byang chub sems ni bla med pa/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi/ /la sogs tshig ni brjod nas ni/ /oM sarba yo ga tsit+totpa da yA mi/ /byang chub sems ni bla med pa/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed bgyis nas/ /
126a2(rgyud 'grel): su tra sa ma yastwaM ho badzra sid+d+hi ya thA su khaM/ rdo rje lcags kyu sogs sngags kyis/ /dgug gzhug bcing dang dbang byas nas/ /de khyod ces bya la sogs pa dang/ /ya ma na yi snying po brjod par bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyis/ /snying la yang dag gzhug par
126a3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /gal te tshul 'di smras gyur na/ /de ma thag tu bral te gshegs/ /oM badzrotka tha/ /de nas ye shes dbab pa dang/ /me tog dor dang gdong g.yogs ni/ /bkrol nas dkyil 'khor bstan par bya/ /de nas chu dang cod pan dang/ /rdo rje'i bdag po ming
126a4(rgyud 'grel): dang ni/ /brtul zhugs rjes gnang la sogs pa/ /cho ga bzhin du sbyin par bya/ /de nas slob dpon la ni yon/ /rjes su mthun par dbul byas la/ /dkyil 'khor lha yi 'khor lo rnams/ /ma lus par ni gshegs su gsol/ /lung dang bla ma dam pa
126a5(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi gdams ngag rjes 'brangs nas/ /rgyud rnams kun gyi snying por gyur pa 'jam dpal mtshan brjod kyi/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga tshul bzhin byas las bdag gi dge ba ni/ /thob pa gang des 'gro kun 'jam dpal ye shes zhal mthong shog /'phags
126a6(rgyud 'grel): pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga slob dpon so ma sh+ris mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po ma hA dz+nyA na dang/ lots+tsha ba dge slong gzhon nu 'od kyis bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o// //
126a7(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ Arya many+dzu sh+rI nA ma saM gI ti/ sarba maN+Dal stwat+twa/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad la bstod pa/ /phyi dang nang dang de'i nang na/ /sku gsung bdag nyid la bzhugs pa/ /
126b1(rgyud 'grel): snying rje shes rab rjes zhugs pa/ /gzhon nu khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnam kun rnam par byang chub dang/ /rnam kun dri ma med pa dang/ /chos rnams kun la gnas pa dang/ /chos kun gcig tu ston pa dang/ /rnam kun tshul la 'jug pa dang/ /rnam kun tshul la
126b2(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa dang/ rnam pa kun gyi don tshul cig /'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /sgeg dang bzhad dang mi sdug dang/ /drag po'i ngo mtshar nyams bdag nyid/ /nyon mongs gcod dang shes rab can/ /dang po'i sangs rgyas khyod la 'dud/ /
126b3(rgyud 'grel): srid dang zhi ba spangs pa dang/ /srid dang zhi bar bzhugs pa mdzad/ /zla ba gzhon nu ltar mdzes pa/ /chos sku de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos rnams thams cad stong nyid kyi/ /srog tu khyod ni zhugs pa yin/ /mtshan ma la yang mtshan ma med/ /dbang phyug
126b4(rgyud 'grel): che la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /khyod mi bzhugs na spros 'di la/ /ji ltar yang ni smon pa yin/ /khyed 'dir rjes su zhugs na ni/ /'di la smon lam phyag 'tshal bstod/ /thog ma bar dang thar dge ba/ /'di ni rang nyid 'od gsal ba/ /'phrin las rjes su 'jug pa yin
126b5(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs ston la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /lta ba rtog ngag las 'tsho ba/ /rtsol dang dran dang ting 'dzin gyi/ /'phags pa'i yan lag 'khor lo mdzes/ /'khor los sgyur la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rang bzhin gyis ni kun rdzob dang/ /sems can rnams
126b6(rgyud 'grel): kyi bsdu ba dang/ /dge ba dri med snang ba dang/ /smin byed de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zang zing mi 'jigs sbyin byed dang/ /byams pa sbyin byed mchog dang ni/ /chos sbyin chos kyi dbang phyug gi/ chen po de la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /zhi gnas lhag mthong cag gis
126b7(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /shes rab pha rol phyin par 'gro /nyon mongs spyod pa'i shes rab kyi/ /ral gri bsnams la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /sems can khams ni mgu ba dang/ /rdzu 'phrul rkang pa chen pos gnon/ /bstan pa so so rang rig gis/ /skyob pa'i mgon la
127a1(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal bstod/ /go cha chen po bgos pa dang/ /'jug pa che la gnas pa dang/ /so sor rtog pa byed pa dang/ /bya ba nan tan de la bstod/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus/ /bsam gtan shes rab stobs
127a2(rgyud 'grel): chen dang/ /thabs dang smon lam ye shes kyis/ /pha rol phyin la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /brgya dang drug cu grangs kyi ni/ /dpal gyi byang chub 'gro ba'i gtso/ /gang zhig cig kyang rnam bcu drug /'dod chags che la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /byams
127a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i ya lang bgos pa dang/ /shes rab go cha bgos pa dang/ /snying rje chen po blo ldan dang/ /ye shes tog la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bzang po'i lam la sems can rnams/ /'jig cing skyob par byed pa dang/ /zab pa'i blo dang rgya mtsho bzhin/ /
127a4(rgyud 'grel): mi bzad blo yi gter la 'dud/ /dbyer med spobs pa dag gis ni/ /stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin la 'dud/ /bgrod dka' i ngan song chen po las/ /kun tu 'dren la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /mya ngan mun pa sel 'joms dang/ /dra ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal
127a5(rgyud 'grel): bstod/ /rnam kun bdud rtsir 'dzag pa yi/ /zla ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /'od dpag med dang sprin med pa'i/ /nam mkha' i snying po phyag 'tshal bstod/ /sgrib pa thams cad sel ba la/ /phyag 'tshal 'dud cing phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /
127a6(rgyud 'grel): dad dang brtson 'grus dran bsam gtan /shes rab kyis ni rjes bsrungs pa/ /srung ba med kyang 'od dag ni/ /gnon pa rmad byung rgyal la 'dud/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi bdag nyid kyi/ /la lar rdo rje sems dpa' dang/ /nyon mongs shes bya spangs
127a7(rgyud 'grel): ba yis/ /la lar rnam par snang mdzad dang/ /la lar rdo rje hUM mdzad dang/ /la lar pad+ma gar dbang phyug/ /la lar rdo rje nyi ma ni rgya chen rmad du byung chen pos mdzes/ /gcig gi bdag nyid rta mchog dang/ /la lar gsum gyi bdag nyid dang/ /gang zhig rnam lnga'i sna tshogs
127b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i/ /skyob pa de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnyis med 'byung ba'i chos nyid phyir/ /'khor los sgyur gyi rigs 'dzin pa/ /gcig kyang sna tshogs bdag nyid kyi/ /rnam par snang mdzad che la 'dud/ /mtshan brjod dkyil 'khor ma lus la/ /bstod
127b2(rgyud 'grel): pas bsod nams gang skyes pa/ /dge ba 'di yis sems can rnams/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs ni 'grub par shog /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad la bstod pa/ /slob dpon so ma sh+rI mdzad pa rdzogs
127b3(rgyud 'grel): so/ //rgya gar gyi mkhan po mahA dz+nyA na dang/ bod kyi lots+tsha ba dge slong gzhon nu 'od kyis bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ pi laM bi d+hi/ bod skad du/ gtor ma'i cho ga /'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag
127b4(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo /yid bzhin nor bu chen po 'chang/ /dpag bsam shing chen rgyas 'dra ste/ /bum pa bzang po che ba'i mchog go /sems can kun don byed la 'dud/ /gtor ma'i rim pa bshad par bya/ /dang po lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i
127b5(rgyud 'grel): sngags pas rin po che'i snod mdzes pa'i nang du/ /kha zas kyi 'byor pa dri dang kha dog dang ldan pa sna tshogs bcug la/ /gtor ma'i nang du yi ge a las yid bzhin gyi nor bu 'bar ba zla ba'i steng du rnam par bsams la/ /de las bdud
127b6(rgyud 'grel): rtsi'i chu rgyun dang/ /'dod pa'i yon tan gyis rnam par spras pas snod dang bcud chos kyi dbyings khyab par bsam zhing bsgom pa ni/ /yid bzhin nor bu chen po 'chang/ /khyab bdag rin chen kun gyi gdugs zhes bya'o/ /bdag nyid kyi snying kha'i d+hi? las
127b7(rgyud 'grel): dpag bsam shing chen rgyas pa ste/ bum pa bzang po che ba'i mchog /ces bya ba ni dpag bsam gyi shing nam mkha' i mdza' dang mnyam pa bum pa bdud rtsis bkang ba'i 'bras bu smin pa bdud rtsi rnam par 'jog pa'o/ /gtor ma'i rgyud rgyas
128a1(rgyud 'grel): bar bsam mo/ /thugs kha'i 'od zer gyis ye shes bdud rtsi dbab ste/ /gnyis su med par bsam mo/ /a A sarba ta thA ga ta h+ri da ya ha ra ha ra oM hUM h+ri b+ha ga waM dz+nyA na murti bA gi shwa ra ma hA pa tsa sarba d+harmA ga ga na a ma la su pa
128a2(rgyud 'grel): ri shud+d+ha d+harma d+hA tu oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM zhes pas byin gyis brlab bo /sna tshogs gzugs can yid las skyes/ /'jig rten gsum yang gzhon lus gcig /ces bya ba ni de nas snying kha'i 'od zer gyis yang dag pa'i sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pa
128a3(rgyud 'grel): dang khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad bkug ste/ /de dag thams cad snying khar yi ge a bkod pa'i 'od zer gyis rnam par sbyangs te/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal du bsam mo/ /gsum sel mdza' yas grol gsum 'thob/ /sangs
128a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyas sprul pa'i rgyan dang ldan/ /zhes bya ba ni yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs la/ /dngos sam yid kyis lus dpag med sprul la mchod do/ /nam mkha' i mdza' la longs spyod cing/ /sems can kun yid tshim par byed/ /de ltar
128a5(rgyud 'grel): ljags kyi 'od zer gyis bdud rtsa'i rgyun la zhugs te/ /kun kyang tshim par dmigs shing 'dod pa'i longs spyod kyis tshim par bya'o/ /de nas chos kyi sbyin bdag chen po ste/ /mchod 'os bstod 'os phyag gi gnas/ /zhes pas phreng ba'i
128a6(rgyud 'grel): sngags dang/ /a kA ro ma khaM sarba d+harmA NAM Adya nutpa n+na twat/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM zhes pa dang/ tshigs su bcad pa'i bstod pas chos kyi sbyin pa bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /shes rab kyis ni de thob shog /byang chub chen por bsngo zhing
128a7(rgyud 'grel): smon lam rgya chen por gdab/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): muM(rgyud 'grel): zhes pas gshegs su gsol/ /pha rol phyon dang rgyud rnams ma lus dang/ /bde gshegs rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor ma lus kyi/ /kun gyi gtso bor khyab pas thugs la gnas/ /ye shes
128b1(rgyud 'grel): lus can mtshan don rgya che bas/ /sna tshogs tshul can bstod kyis deng 'dir bdag gis 'dir/ /dam pa'i gdams ngag nyer bstan rnal 'byor lam dang sbyar/ /sbyar ba 'di la dge ba gang yod 'dis/ /bdag sogs 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' 'dra
128b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur shog /gtor ma rdzogs so// // */ (/dpal thams cad gsang ba'i rgyud kyi bshad sbyar gsang ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba slob don rin chen 'byung ba nas zhi bas mdzad pa bzhugs so//) rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI sarba ra ha sya ni band+he ra ha pra dI po nA ma/ bod
128b3(rgyud 'grel): skad du/ dpal thams cad gsang ba'i bshad sbyar gsang ba'i sgron ma'o/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig rnal 'byor rgyud du gsar byas pa/ /rang gi sku gsung thugs dngos sna tshogs pa/ /thams cad gsang ba'i
128b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyud ni de brten nas/ /gsang ba'i sgron ma bshad sbyar brtsam par bya/ /las kyi cho gas rgyas par gyur pa rnams ni sbyin pa la sogs pa dka' ba'i spyod pa rnams kyis yun ring por byang chub par 'dod pa rnams la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
128b5(rgyud 'grel): tu spros pa bskyed pa'i phyir mi rnams kyis lus ni phyag dar gyi phung po dang mtshungs pa yin gyi/ /sems ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu lta bu dang mtshungs pa yin no zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir/ /'byung lnga nyid kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin te/ 'byung
128b6(rgyud 'grel): ba zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa dang las kyis bskyed pa sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyi rgyur gyur pa sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha' i khams te lnga bo nyid kyis so/ /nges pa ni rtag mi dgos pa'o/ /mthong ba dag ces bya ba ni tshad mar grub pa'o/ /mi rnams
128b7(rgyud 'grel): kyi lus de lta bu yin du zin kyang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes bya bar sbyar ro/ /ci zhig byas pas zhen rang sems rang du bsgom pa ste/ mthar thug par bsgoms pas so/ /ji ltar bsgoms pas zhe na dngos der bsgoms pas zhes bya ba ste dngos po der 'gyur
129a1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i phyir te sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur ba'i phyir/ dngos po gang sems kyi de kho na nyid sgom pa gang yin pas so/ /nges par zhes bya ba ni gdon mi za bar sangs rgyas te de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro/ /sems kyi che ba'i bdag nyid gzhan
129a2(rgyud 'grel): dag kyang bstan par bya ba'i phyir/ /rang shes gsang ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ rang gi ye shes te rang sems nyid ni dpal gyi yon tan dang ldan pas na sangs rgyas rnams kyang rab tu 'dud cing/ phyag 'tshal bar mdzad do/ /rang gi sems
129a3(rgyud 'grel): ji lta bu zhe na/ gsang ba zhes bya ba ste/ 'jig rten las 'das pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/ /dam pa ni 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad las mchog tu gyur pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas ye shes bla med de zhes bya ba gsungs te/ /gang gi
129a4(rgyud 'grel): phyir rang gi sems nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i bla na med pa'i ye shes yin pas so/ /dris pa gnyis su snang ba nyid kyis 'khrul cing/ /kun nas nyon mongs pa'i so so skye bo'i sems te/ ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yin zhe na/ gnyis med
129a5(rgyud 'grel): gnyis kyi tshul can zhes bya ba gsungs te/ de ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes yin te/ gnyis su snang ba stong pa nyid kyi rang gi ngo bor gyur par yang dag par rtogs pa'i phyir ro/ /de lta bu yin du zin kyang gnyis kyi tshul can te zhes bya ba ste/ rdzun
129a6(rgyud 'grel): yin du zin kyang gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i tshul du so sor snang ba'i phyir/ /de ni mi bden pa yin glo bur gyi 'khrul pa can gyi de ni rang bzhin gyis gnyis su med pa'i ye shes yin pas/ /rang bzhin gyis sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yin no/ de lta bu'i ye
129a7(rgyud 'grel): shes nyid la ni sangs rgyas rnams kyang 'dus par mdzad te/ chos kyi sku la sogs pas gtso bor gyur pa'o zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis so/ /de bas na rang gi sems nyid la phyag 'tshal ba yin te/ de ltar phyag 'tshal ba ni rtag par rab tu 'dud ces bya ba
129b1(rgyud 'grel): ste/ 'di ni khyad par du 'phags pa nyid du gsungs pa yin te/ 'dis ni shin tu myur du byang chub ma thob cing bskal pa grangs med pa gsum 'am/ mang po rab tu 'dud do zhes bya ba'i don to/ /yang dag par phyag 'tshal ba rnams ni myur pa nyid du byang chub
129b2(rgyud 'grel): rtogs pas yang phyag 'tshal bar mi byed do zhes dgongs so/ /de nyid kyi dbang du mdzad nas gang yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ chos thams cad dmigs pa la rang gi sems ni gnyis su snang bar ni bdag med pa ste rgyu nyid kyi sbyor pa'o/ /
129b3(rgyud 'grel): de las yang dag par byung ba ni yang dag par shes pas sangs rgyas kyi ngo bor byung ba ste/ 'bras bu 'di kho na nyid kyi sbyor ba la gnas pa zhes bya ba'i don to/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu'i de kho na nyid dbyer med pa'i ye shes ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes te/ smra
129b4(rgyud 'grel): bsam las 'das pa'o/ /de las byung ba ni 'di dag ma lus par rdzogs par gyur pa yin pas na/ /gnyis med ye shes las byung ba zhes bya ste/ de ri 'og tu sdug dang mi sdug rnam spangs pa zhes bya ba ste/ sdug pa ni thob par bya ba'i chos rnams so
129b5(rgyud 'grel): mi sdug pa ni spang bar bya ba'i chos rnams te de ma lus pa rnam par spangs pa ni thob pa dang spangs pa mthar thug pa'i bdag nyid 'thob pa'o/ /de ltar gyur pa'i rnal 'byor pa gang yin pa de ni ci la yang phyag ni mi 'tshal lo zhes bya ba ste/ bya ba byas pa'i
129b6(rgyud 'grel): sgrub pa la sbyor ba yin pa'i phyir ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dag par phyag 'tshal ba de nyid gsal bar mdzad cing de nyid la 'jig rten rnams nges par sbyar ba'i phyir/ ma skyes pa ni ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ rang gi shes pa te
129b7(rgyud 'grel): rang gi sems gnyis su snang ba dang bral ba'i tshul gyis sngar ma skyes pa'i de'i tshul du bskyed la/ skyes par gyur pa'i pha rol te/ rjes la sangs rgyas skur ni zhes bya ba sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rtag tu zhes bya ba rtag pa nyid kyis bsgom par bya
130a1(rgyud 'grel): ste/ phyag 'tshal ba de la rang nyid de nyid la rang gi lus dang ngag dang yid kyis zhugs par bya'o/ /zhes bya ba'i don to/ /de la lus kyi rab tu zhugs pa ni sangs rgyas kyi sku las tha dad pa'i rang gi lus mi dmigs pa'o/ /tshig
130a2(rgyud 'grel): gis rab tu zhugs pa ni sangs rgyas ni bdag go zhes smra'o/ /'di gnyis las gzhan du yid mi g.yeng ba ni/ /sems kyi rab tu 'jug pa'o/ /lus la sogs pa'i rab tu 'jug pa 'di nyid ni de'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi phyag 'tshal ba'i mchog yin
130a3(rgyud 'grel): te/ myur ba nyid byang chub sgrub par byed pa yin no zhes bya bar dgongs so/ /'dir yang sangs rgyas kyi sgras byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa rnams kyang bzung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsdus pa nyid ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
130a4(rgyud 'grel): dpa' la sogs pa'i tshul gyis rnal 'byor gyi rgyud la bsgom par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro/ /rnal 'byor 'di la 'di'i skal ba dang ldan pa ma yin no zhe na/ rnal 'byor pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ 'dir rnal 'byor ni gnyis su med
130a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i ye shes so/ /de nyid ni sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis rtag tu yod pa yin pas na rnal 'byor pa ste/ sems can thams cad do/ /gal te thams cad rnal 'byor pa yin na/ /'dir skal pa med pa ni 'ga' yang med pas/ /'khor bar ga
130a6(rgyud 'grel): la 'khor bar 'gyur zhe na/ de'i phyir nyon mongs zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ ni zhes bya ba'i sgra ni dkar ba'i don te/ nyon mongs pa dang bag chags kyis sun phyung bas 'gro ba de dang der 'khor bar gyur pa'o/ /lus can zhes bya
130a7(rgyud 'grel): ba ni lus thob pa rnams so/ /rgyu gang gis nyon mongs pa dang bag chags kyi lus 'thob ce na/ de'i phyir sdug dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ sdug pa ni gnas dang longs spyod la sogs pa'o/ /mi sdug pa ni de dag gi rnam par
130b1(rgyud 'grel): 'byed pa'i khyad par la yongs su rtogs pa'o/ /de las ni bag chags te/ de nas yang sdug pa dang mi sdug pa'i rnam par 'byed pa'o/ /de nas ni gnyis thob par dang spangs par srid par skye la/ de nis lus 'thob pa yin no/ /dris pa lha'i lus
130b2(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pa rnams dga' ba'i tshal la sogs par 'khor ba na/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal yin ci zhig yod ji ltar na 'khor ba yin zhe na/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ 'di na nyon mongs pa dang las las byung ba'i zag pa dang
130b3(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa'i lus dang longs spyod dang gnas rnams ni/ gang gis spyod pa dang gang la spyod pa dang/ gang du spyod pa ste/ de ni lus dang lhan cig 'byung ba na/ lus 'byung ba'o/ /gang sems dang sems las byung ba'i tshogs de nyid ni sdug bsngal lo/ /
130b4(rgyud 'grel): de skad du gang zhig zag bcas nyer len pa'i/ /phung po de dag thabs bcas kyang/ /sdug bsngal kun 'byung 'jig rten dang/ /lta gnas srid pa'ang de dag yin/ /zhes bshad pa'i phyir ro/ /de ltar yin na go /'jig rten rnams sdug
130b5(rgyud 'grel): bsngal yin na ji ltar thar bar 'gyur zhe na/ sems de zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ sdug bsngal de gnon cing shes pa'i 'gro ba ni sems kyis so sor rtogs shing yongs su shes pas brten pa ni rtogs pa yin te/ gdams pa'i rtsa ba
130b6(rgyud 'grel): yin no/ /de bas na gdabs pa po ni 'khor ba las sgrol bar byed pa yin no/ /de su zhig yin zhe na/ rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ thams cad du thog pa med cing shin tu rnam par dag la rtag pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi tshul can yin pas
130b7(rgyud 'grel): na// khyab pa rnam par snang mdzad pas na rnam par snang mdzad do/ /rnam pa thams cad du chos kyi longs spyod bskyed par mdzad pas na rgyal ba'o/ /rnam pa thams cad du 'gro ba'i don mdzad pas na mgon po ste ngo bo nyid dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul pa
131a1(rgyud 'grel): sku dang rim bzhin du sbyar ro/ /de ltar dang po'i tshig ni bstan pa yin la 'og ma gsum ni bshad pa yin te/ sangs rgyas thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ste/ de rnams kyi ro cig pa na bsdus pa zhes bya ste/ de ni rnam
131a2(rgyud 'grel): snang mdzad kyi don yin no/ /sangs rgyas thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams te/ de nyid sangs rgyas rnams la sogs shig tu byas nas bshad pa yin te/ 'dis na sangs rgyas thams cad rtogs 'gyur ba zhes bya ste/ 'di ni rgyal ba'i don yin no/ /
131a3(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas 'khor ba sgrol ba po zhes bya ba ni mgon po'i don yin no/ /dris pa bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi don gyi mthar byon pa yin nam/ 'o na te gzhan dag kyang sgrol bar mdzad pa yin nam/ 'on te ltes par mdzid pa yin zhe na/ de'i phyir sems can
131a4(rgyud 'grel): kun la zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ sems can kun la phan pa de nyid ni don yin te/ 'dod pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de la thugs rje 'byung ba gang yin pa de nyid ni nyams yin te/ /rab kyi mthar thug pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de dang yang dag par
131a5(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa ni rtag tu bcas pa ste/ de bas na btang snyoms med pa yin no zhes bya bar dgongs so/ /gdams pa bstan pa'i phyir rgyu'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ shin tu myur ba dang shin tu bde bar byang chub sgrub par byed pa'i sbyor ba ni rgyu'i de
131a6(rgyud 'grel): kho na nyid do/ /de'i mnyam par sbyor ni snyoms par 'jug pa'o/ /de las gong du zhes bya ba ni bstan pa de'i gong du zhes bya ba'i don to/ /'bras bu'i de nyid ni sangs rgyas kyi sku'o/ /de ston pa ni de'i sbyor ba ston par mdzad pa'o/ /ci bcom ldan 'das de
131a7(rgyud 'grel): gzhan dag kyang ston par mdzad dam zhe na/ 'bad de zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ 'bras bu'i de nyid yang dag par zhugs zhes bya ba ni rgyu dang 'bras bu mi phyed pa'i ye shes la sogs pa yongs su rdzogs pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rnal
131b1(rgyud 'grel): 'byor pa ni rgyu'i de kho na nyid mi 'dod te/ bya ba byas pa nyid rtogs pa yin pa'i phyir slar 'dod par mi byed do/ /de bas na thun mtshams su gnyis pa la sogs par ni 'bras bu'i rnal 'byor nyid bya'i/ rgyu'i rnal 'byor ni ma yin no/ /rgyu'i rnal 'byor ni so sor
