283b2(rgyud 'grel): las lkog ma dang snying kha dang/ lte ba 'am/ sta zur dang pus mo nub tsam du dong ste de dang 'tsham ba'i rgyar brkos te/ skra dang rus pa dang rdo la sogs pa bsal te/ dri zhim po'i chu rdo rje khro bo'i sngags kyi gtab pa gtor te/ gtor ma byin la zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya ste/
283b3(rgyud 'grel): dong gi steng du rin po che lnga dang 'bru lnga dang/ sman lnga ras dkar pos so sor phur te/ bum pa sar pa'i nang du bcug ste bzhag la/ song ste sa de nyid kyis bgang ste/ gal te mtho bar gyur na rab tu 'grub par ston cing/ thad kar khengs kyang brtsam par bya'o//
283b4(rgyud 'grel): kha ma khengs na brtsam par mi bya ste/ lngar lung gis kyang bstan to/ /mkhas pas rin chen la sogs pas/ /sa gzhi snying ba ldan par bya/ /thad bu la yang ci rigs par/ /rdzas bzhag pa'i 'og tu ste/ /cho ga de ni phyi rol du'o zhes pa dang/ yang 'bras
283b5(rgyud 'grel): so ba dang mon sran gre'u nas dang gro dang til dang lnga/ /'bru rnams kun ces bya ba ni/ /las rnams kun la 'di dag gsungs/ /siM ha bya kri ka ni/ /sa ha de ba ha sa te/ /sman rnams kun ces bya ba la/ /lnga po 'di rnams shes par bya/ /byi ru dang ni sa
283b6(rgyud 'grel): le sbram/ /dung dang mu tig nor bu ste/ /rin chen kun ces bya ba la/ /lnga po 'di dag shes par bya zhes so/ /de nas rdul mtshon ji tsam du/ /dgye bar 'dod pa'i nyis 'gyur du/ /sa gzhi de rab tu mthas par bcags pas/ /lag thil ltar mnyam par byas ta/ /de nas
283b7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i lnga dang dri zhim pa'i chus byug par bya ba ni/ ji skad du dkyil 'khor bri ba'i sa gzhi ni/ /byi dor legs byas legs par byugs/ /khro bo chen pos bzlas pa yis/ /spos chus bsang gtor byas pa la zhes pa lta bu'o/ /sa'i bye brag kha cig la ni
284a1(rgyud 'grel): de ltar bya ba mi sbyar te/ ji skad du sa gzhi gang na mthas pa dang/ khang thog dang ni rdo leb dang/ /mchod rten drung dang 'bab chu 'gram/ /mtsho rnams kyi ni 'gram dag tu/ sa gzhi sbyang zhing brtag pa dag /nan tan du ni bya mi dgos/ /der ni zug rdu
284a2(rgyud 'grel): dbyung mi dgos/ /'thas pas bcag kyang der mi dgos/ /mtho dman la sogs skyon rnams kyang/ de ni dgos pa bskyed mi dgos/ /rang bzhin gnas pa'i sa gzhi la/ /byi dor legs par byas nas su/ /lag pas byabs nas gsang sngags bzlas/ /de
284a3(rgyud 'grel): yi sbyang ba de yin no/ /zug rdu'i nyes pa thams cad ni/ /gal te dbyung bar mi nus na/ de ni gsang sngags nyid kyis su/ /sbyang ba legs par byas par 'gyur/ /btad pa yi ni las rnams dang/ /gdon rnams tshar gcod la sogs dang/ drag
284a4(rgyud 'grel): shul spyod pa dag la yang/ /sa ni rab tu sbyang mi dgos/ /khro bo kI li kI lA yis/ /gsang gtor byas na sbyangs par 'gyur/ /zhes pa dang/ yang khang pa 'am dri gtsang khang du ni/ /gsang gtor byas pas dag par bshad/ /de bas der
284a5(rgyud 'grel): ni sa mi brko/ /zhes gsungs pas so/ /de nas sa'i lha mo bstim la/ /sa'i dbus su pad+ma dang zla ba dang sna tshogs rdo rje'i steng gi hUM las byung ba'i rdo rje phra mo spros pas/ sa phyogs de rdo rjer gyur par bsams la/ sna tshogs rdo rje nas
284a6(rgyud 'grel): rigs kyis sa la bstim la/ oM me di ni badzri b+ha ba badzra band+ha hUM zhes bzlas te/ 'di ni phyi'i sa sbyang ba'o/ /de nas slob dpon dkyil 'khor gyi dbus der/ stan 'jam zhing bde ba la 'dug ste/ gtor ma byin la bdag nyid gzengs bstod
284a7(rgyud 'grel): par bya ste/ deng du bdag tshe 'bras bu yod/ /bdag gi bson pa 'ang 'bris bur bcas/ /lha dang dam tshig gis mnyam par/ gyur par bdag ni som nyid med/ /byang chub sems dang sems gcig par/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs
284b1(rgyud 'grel): su ni/ /der bdag skye bar the tshom med/ /der bdag nyi ma dam pa ste/ /bdag gi mchod sbyin bla na med/ /sangs rgyas thams cad spyan 'dren pas/ /deng bdag 'dus pa'i mchog yin no/ /zhes pas so/ /de nas yan lag thams cad kyis phyag byas
284b2(rgyud 'grel): la/ spos snod lag tu thogs te/ sangs rgyas rnams la gsol ba gdab pa ni/ mgon po thugs rje'i bdag nyid can/ /thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /sras bcas lnga ni gdugs 'das nas/ /sa gzhi yongs su bzung bar mdzod/ /na ma:
284b3(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ sarba ta thA ga tA b+hiSh+ThA nA tISh+Thi te/ a tsa le bi ma le/ pra kri te pa ri shud+d+ha swAhA/ zhes pas so/ /de nas de rnams kyi spyan sngar/ /phyag 'tshal ba nas bzung ste cho ga ma lus par byas la/ /de nas rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs bzhir dmigs
284b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i slobs ma 'am/ mi bskyod pa gzhir dmigs pa'i slob mas/ phyogs bzhi nas rnal 'byor gyi rgyun thams cad kyi rtsa ba lta bu dpal gsang ba 'dus pa las gsungs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis/ shar nas brtsams te
284b5(rgyud 'grel): gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhi ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ /chos kun bdag med pa yi mchog /dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ /mtshan rnams thams cad yang dag rdzogs/ /mtshan min
284b6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad rnam spangs pa/ /kun tu bzang po sku'i mchog /dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ /zhi ba'i chos ni mchog las byung/ /ye shes spyod pa rnam sbyor ba/ /kun tu bzang po gsung gi mchog /dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ /
284b7(rgyud 'grel): sems can kun gyi sems chen po/ /rang bzhin dag pa dri ma med/ /kun bzang thugs mchog kha lo bsgyur/ /dkyil 'khor dag pa bshad du gsol/ /zhes pa 'am/ yang na tshigs su bcad pa dang po nyid bzlas shing brjod par bya'o/ /yang na rgyud 
285a1(rgyud 'grel): 'di nyid las ji ltar gsungs pa nyid lan gsum du brjod do/ /de nyid kyis ni rdo rje gzung/ /chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya/ /dam tshig gis ni phyag rgya cher/ /byin gyis brlabs nas snying po bzlas/ /'khor lo kun gyi cho ga ni//
285a2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pas byas/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad sgrub byed pa'i/ /rtog pa kun la yang dag 'jug /dam tshig che gsum zhes bya ba/ /brgya 'di sangs rgyas sgrub byed yin/ /dngos grub kun gyi cho ga la/ /rdo rje dril bu rab tu bskul/ /cho ga
285a3(rgyud 'grel): lhag gam ma tshang yang/ /'grub 'gyur smad par mi bya'o/ /zhes bya bar sbyar bar bya'o/ /de nas bdag nyid gzeng bstod de/ /bdag ni rang nyid rdo rje can/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag rang nyid/ /bdag ni sangs rgyas rgyal po che/ /stobs chen rdo rje
285a4(rgyud 'grel): can bdag yin/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug rgyal po bdag /phyag na rdo rje bstan bdag ste/ /bdag po rdo rje chen por bdag /byin gyis brlab pa mi 'dor ro/ /zhes brjod de/ hUM badzro t+tiSh+Tha zhes brjod pas ji ltar bskyed pa'i dkyil 'khor nam mkha' la gnyis?
285a5(rgyud 'grel): ste/ stan las langs nas bdag nyid khams gsum rnam par rgyal bar gyur pa'i mig gnyis su ma dang Ta las mig g.yas g.yon nyi zla ser por byas te/ bgegs la bka' sgo nas/ rkang mthil gnyis su hUM las byung ba'i sna tshogs rdo
285a6(rgyud 'grel): rje ma'i 'od 'phro ba bsams te/ rkang pa gang du bor ba de dang 'dir rdo rje kun tu rtse mo 'bar bar 'khrigs par bsams te/ stang stabs bya'o/ /de ni ji skad du rnam par snang mdzad sgyu 'phrul dra ba las gsungs pa/ dang po kho nas yongs su bzung
285a7(rgyud 'grel): bar bya ste/ slob dpon gyis lha nyid kyi stang stabs la 'dug la/ lag pa g.yas pas bsgrims te/ rdo rje gsor zhing/ lag pa g.yon pas dril bu bsil nas/ rdo rje'i 'gros kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi brjid bag gis yongs su bskor bar bya'o//
285b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i khro bo'i nga rgyal gyis hUM zhes brjod cing/ dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi brjid bag gis bskor nas kyang/ khro bo'i skur bsgoms pas/ sdang ba'i lha dang lha ma yin dang/ gsang ba pa rnams la tshig 'di brjod par bya'o/ /slob dpon
285b2(rgyud 'grel): ming 'di zhes bya bas/ /slob ma che ge mo zhig gis rdzogs pa'i byang chub rdzogs par bya ba dang/ sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir/ sa phyogs 'dir dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po mtshan 'di zhes bya ba 'dri yis/ /lha dang
285b3(rgyud 'grel): lha ma yin dang gnod sbyin dang srin po dang/ yi dags dang sha za dang brjod byed dang/ 'byung po dang mkha' 'gro ma dang/ gnon po dang nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang rig sngags 'chang grub pa rgan po 'am rgan mo 'am/ g.yog dang 'khor
285b4(rgyud 'grel): du bcas pa gang dag 'khod pa rnams dengs shig /'di ltar rdo rje 'chang gi bka' thob nas myur ba nyid du dengs shig /gang dag mi 'gro ba de dag ni/ phyag na rdo rje hUM zhes bya bar khros pa'i bzhin 'bar ba can gyis ye shes kyi rdo rje chen po 'bar
285b5(rgyud 'grel): bsam go tshal ba brgyar 'gas par 'gyur ro/ /zhes lan gsum brjod nas/ stang stabs la gnas bzhin du sa gzhi rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /g.yas brkyang ba dang g.yon bskum pa dang/ sa gzhi 'dug stangs dang/
285b6(rgyud 'grel): zlum po'i bdug stangs dang/ 'thun pa'i rkang stabs dang/ rus sbal gyi rkang stabs dang/ rdo rje gdengs pa dang/ rdo rje 'jo tshul dang/ rkang pa ya gcig gis stangs dang/ seng+ge'i stangs dang/ seng+ge glal ba dang/ bung pa 'phung ba'i stangs dang/ rdo rje'i sgrog
285b7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ rdo rje gsor ba dang/ rdo rje'i stang stabs dang/ rdo rje gar dang/ rdo rje 'jigs su rung ba dang/ rdo rje ro langs dang/ rdo rje tho ba dang/ sgo bzhi byin gyis brlab pa dang/ rdo rje gdu bu dang/ bud med kyi sgyu 'phrul gyi stang stabs dang/ rdo rje dral ba dang/ stobs chen
286a1(rgyud 'grel): gdengs pa dang/ rdo rje mche ba dang/ rdo rje gang mo dang/ rdo rje sgra dang/ ral gri'i thabs dang/ rdo rje'i thabs dang/ 'khor lo'i thabs dang/ gtun shing gi thabs dang/ ba dan gyi thabs dang/ gzhu'i thabs dang/ zhags
286a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i thabs dang/ pad+ma'i tshul dang/ be con gyi tshul dang/ mi 'jigs pa'i tshul dang/ lcags kyu'i thabs dang/ gshol gyi tshul dang/ mdung gi thabs dang/ mda' gzung ba'i thabs dang/ mda''phang ba'i thabs dang/ thag mdung
286a3(rgyud 'grel): bskor ba'i thabs dang/ mchog sbyin pa'i tshul dang/ mdung thung gi thabs dang/ mtshon rtse gcig pa'i thabs dang/ phyag 'tshal ba'i tshul dang/ rdo rje'i 'dug stangs dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi 'dug stangs dang/ pad+ma'i 'dug stangs dang/ sems
286a4(rgyud 'grel): dpa' i skyil mo krung dang/ dpa' bo'i 'dug stangs dang/ bzang po'i 'dug stangs dang/ cog bu'i 'dug stangs dang/ brtse ba'i stangs stangs dang/ mdun du bsnur ba dang/ phyir 'gyed pa dang/ mdza' yas dang/ rnam par rgyal
286a5(rgyud 'grel): ba dang/ sprin sgra dang/ gsus po che dang/ rgyal ba'i phur bus gnas lngar bcing ba dang/ phur bus brdung ba dang/ dra ba dang ra bas mtshams bcad pa dang/ phyogs bcing ba de lta bus/ sa gzhi rdo rje'i rang bzhin du 'od 'bar bas bkra shis
286a6(rgyud 'grel): bar bsgoms te gtan la dbab par bya'o/ /zhes gsungs pa'i tshul gyis bya ste/ 'di ni sa yongs su gzung ba'i cho ga'o/ /de nas mtshan ma nang gi sa sbyang bar bya ste/ oM b+hu khaM zhes brjod pas sa gzhi nam mkhar byas te/ hUM laM hUM zhes
286a7(rgyud 'grel): ?? gser gyi rang bzhin du byas la/ de'i dbus su pad+ma nas badzra band+ha hUM zhes ci nus bzlas pa'i bar du bya ste/ de nas yang sa gzhi dri dang pa'i lci bas byugs la/ phyogs mtshams brgyad du mar me brgyad rang bdug spos du ba 'thul ba brgyad
286b1(rgyud 'grel): bkod de/ dkyil 'khor gyis la lag pa reg bzhin du bdag gi bdag po'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad dang/ yi ge brgya pa lan brgya bzlas te/ de nas de'i nub mo ni slob dpon rmi lam lta zhing/ sta gon la gnas pa'i nub mo slob ma rmi lam blta'o/ /de ltar
286b2(rgyud 'grel): yang rnam par snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pa las/ de nas sngags pas langs nas su/ /snying rjer gyur pa'i yid kyis ni/ /nub kyi phyogs su gnas nas su/ /nang gi bdag nyid rnam dag pas/ /byang chub sems ni dran byed cing/ /de nyid du ni nyal bar bya/ /de
286b3(rgyud 'grel): nas sngags pas rmi lam lta/ /byang chub sems dpa' grags chen rnams/ /yang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ /sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ /dkyil 'khor bri ba'i las rnams bya/ /bdag nyid kun brtsom 'bad pa 'am/ /bdag nyid la ni 'di skad du//
286b4(rgyud 'grel): sems can chen po bu khyod legs/ /dkyil 'khor myur du bris shig ces/ /spro ba skyed pa mthong yang rung/ /gal te mtshan ma ngan pa zhig mthong na/ /byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa la sogs pas bsrung ngo/ /slob ma rmi lam lta ba 'og nas 'chad do/ /'di ni nang
286b5(rgyud 'grel): gis sbyang ba'i cho ga'o/ /byin gyis brlab pa'i gnas der ni/ /zhes bya ba nas rta babs bzhi dang ldan pa dang zhes bya ba'i bar ni go sla'o/ /them skas bzhi'i phreng ba dang zhes bya ba ni sgo'i nye 'khor ri mo'i phyi rol cha chung gcig la mtshon nag po ma yin pa'i ri mo
286b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhi bris te/ kha cig na re mnga' yab kyi phyi rol cha chung gcig la'o/ /zhes zer la gzhan dag ni bsgom pa'i dbang du bya'i/ /'di bri ba ma yin no zhes zer te/ seng+ge ba lang rnams kyi brgyan/ /ces bya ba ni rta babs kyi cha dang po'i phyi rol gyi cha chung gnyis
286b7(rgyud 'grel): la mchod rten yin la/ de'i 'og tu cha 'bring po gnyis la g.yas g.yon du seng+ge dang glang po che cha chung re res mchod rten dang ma 'brel bar bya'o/ /kha cig na re rta babs kyi sang nges pas bzhon pa las 'bar ba yang/ rje btsun mchod rten gyi dbang las so
287a1(rgyud 'grel): zhes zer te/ de ni ma yin te/ 'gro thams cad la de med kyang rta babs yod na nges par 'babs par rigs pa ni/ 'jig rten nye bar spyod pa las yin la/ blo dang ldan pa gus shing nga rgyal spangs pa ni/ de gnyi ka med kyang de bas ches
287a2(rgyud 'grel): ring pa nas babs te/ 'dir ni ma lus par myur du 'babs pas na/ twa ra na ti ru ri ya tsa lan+ti zhes grags so/ /dar dang lda ldi do shal phreng zhes bya ba la/ dar dkar po srid du khru nyi shu rtsa lnga zheng du bru gang ba 'phyang ba yin la/ lda ldi ni de nyid kha dog
287a3(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs pa bar bar du gcus shing rtsibs la btags pas gzhal yas khang gi 'gul ba 'khor ba'o/ /do shal gyi phreng ba ni mu tig gi do shal dbus na rin po che yod pa dang med pa 'am dbus dang mdza' na yod pa spel ba 'chad ba ste/ do shal
287a4(rgyud 'grel): gyis do shal phyed pa yang mtshon pa'o/ /de yang de dag gi bar na dar dang lda ldi dang dril bu dang ni rnga yab brgyan ces sbyar te/ de la dril bu ni sngar smos pa'i dar gyi rtse mo la btags pa'o/ /rnga ma ni rnga yab dkar po gser gyi yu ba can no/ /rdo rje rin
287a5(rgyud 'grel): chen pad+ma dang/ /rgya gram pa yi phyag rgyas brgyan/ /ces bya ba ni phyogs bzhi'i dbus kyi do shal bzhi'i dbus su/ /phyag rgya re re ste rang rang gi rigs phyogs der brten par ston pa'o/ /kha cig na red dag nang du'o zhes zer ro/ /srad bu brgyad dang ldan
287a6(rgyud 'grel): pa dang zhes bya ba ni phyogs dang dbus dang gwa rnams kyi cha la 'dres par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /phyi'i sgo khyud rnams kyis brgyan ces bya ba ni/ 'gram zhes bya ba 'phyar bya'i ngo bo ni/ 'dir phyi'i sgo khyud yin la/ sgo khyud nang ma ni gang du 'khyams kyi mthar
287a7(rgyud 'grel): thug pa'o/ /dgu yi char ni gos pa la/ /sgo dang sgo khyud sum char bya zhes bya ba la /'khor lo rtsibs tshun chad la cha chen po dgur byas pa las sgo'i phyi'i sgo khyud dang bcas pa la ni cha chen po gsum ste/ cha chung bcu gnyis btang ngo/ /de
287b1(rgyud 'grel): yang phye na sgo la ni cha chen phyed dang gnyis yin la/ phyi'i sgo khyud la ni cha chen phyed dang gnyis la/ logs re la cha chung gsum gsum yin te/ de nas dkyil 'khor 'di ni thig gi bya ba lugs gzhan kho na yin pas/ gang du yang gzhan du grang bar mi bya'o/ /
287b2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje srad bus thig gdab bo/ /zhes bya ba ni ye shes kyi thig ma btab par sa'i thig 'ba' shig 'debs pa srid pa dang/ sa la thig ma btab par dkyil 'khor 'dri ba srid pas de bzlog pa'i phyir/ rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byas pa'i srad bus nam mkha' i thig gdab
287b3(rgyud 'grel): par ston cing/ sras bus phal bas sa la thig gdab par yang ston la/ de dag kyang rab tu 'bad pas bag yod par byas te/ de ltar yang dkyil 'khor spyi'i cho ga gsang ba'i rgyud las dkyil 'khor gyi ni gsang sngags kun/ /rnam par rjes su dran byed
287b4(rgyud 'grel): cing/ /gos dkar bgos shing ma yengs par/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni nang du 'gro /las kun byed pa'i gsang sngags kyis/ /thog ma nyid du gsang gtor bya/ /tshon sna lnga yi srad bu la/ /de dag nyid kyis brgyar bzlas te/ /sar ba shin tu gtsang ba dang/ /mdzes
287b5(rgyud 'grel): shing shin tu ran pa dang/ /dri zhim reg na bde ba dang/ /legs par bskal dang sra ba dang/ /sbom phra la sogs bkal nyes dang/ /'jur mdud med par gyur pa yi/ /thig skud me tog spos mchod pas/ /shes rab can gyis thig gdab po/ /bzang po'i
287b6(rgyud 'grel): brtags ni brtags nas su/ /mkhas pas dkyil 'khor thig gdab bo/ /dkar po dmar po de bzhin ser/ /sngon po dang ni gnag dang lnga/ /mtshon sna lnga yi srad bu bzhin/ /phye ma'i tshon rtsi de bzhin bya/ /dkon mchog gsum la mchod bya zhing/ /lha
287b7(rgyud 'grel): rnams la yang phyag byas nas/ /mkhas pas srad bu bre bar bya/ /nang par nyi ma shar ba'i tshe/ /blo yi phyogs cha legs brtags la/ /dang po shar nas mnyam sto gzung/ /slob dpon byang du kha bltas te/ /srad bu 'dzin pa de la blta/ /de nas phyogs bskor
288a1(rgyud 'grel): byas nas ni/ /bdag nyid nub phyogs kha bltas te/ /bdag nyid kyis ni bri bar bya/ /de yi 'og tu byang phyogs su/ /mkhas pas srad bu bre bar bya/ /dang po bdag nyid me phyogs su/ /'dug na phyogs gnyis brtag par bya/ /de yi 'og tu rlung phyogs
288a2(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /phyogs gnyis su ni srad bu bre/ /bden bral dbang ldan gra gnyis nas/ /srad bu 'dzin pa lta bur bya/ /gru bzhi lham pa bsnyams nas su/ /rgya gram du ni srad bu bre/ /rgya gram thams cad bsnyam par bya/ /de ltar srad bu gtan la dbab/ /de nas dbus
288a3(rgyud 'grel): kyi dkyil 'khor du/ /spur? bu gcig kyang gdab par bya/ /grwa bzhir phur bu bzhi gdab bo/ /zhes pa dang yang mchod sbyin shing gi phur bu dag /thur du rtse bstan mngon bsngags pa/ /dkyil 'khor bri ba'i cho ga la/ /phyogs cha bzhin du gdab par bya//
288a4(rgyud 'grel): ltas ngan byung na dngos mi grub/ /srad bu chad na bla ma 'chi/ /ring thung khyer nan? bar 'gyur/ /phyogs 'khrul slob ma myos par 'gyur/ /de bas thams cad nan tan bya/ /mkhas pas legs par thig gdab bo/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de ltar spyir gyur
288a5(rgyud 'grel): pa lung gis brjod nas/ /de ni rang gi gzhung gis ye shes kyi thig ji ltar gdab ce na/ de bshad pa gdul bya'i dbang las dkyil 'khor dag /khru gang sogs gzung ji srid du/ /rgyang grags dpag tshad la sogs mthar/ /tshad des pa ni med
288a6(rgyud 'grel): par bstan/ /de dag tu yang slob dpon gyis/ /ye shes thig bral bri mi bya/ /de phyir ye shes thig gdab rim/ /mkhas pas dga' skyid byed par bshad/ /de la ye shes kyi thig 'debs par 'dod pa'i bla mas dang por ras bal dang bal sogs pa
288a7(rgyud 'grel): gtsang ma blangs te/ grong gi chos kyis sma ma bab pa'i bu mo 'khal du gzhug pa 'am bdag nyid kyis bkal te/ srid du dkyil 'khor las nyis 'gyur la/ sboms su sgo'i nyi shu cha yod par ro/ /de yang lnga sgril lam nyi shu rtsa lnga sgril lam
288b1(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor de nyid lha mo ji snyed yod pa de snyed du bsgril ba'o/ /de nas so sor dri/ zhim de'i phye ma dang/ yungs kar gyi phye ma dang ldan pa'i tshon dkar po dang ser po dang dmar po dang ljang gu dang/ nag po rnams bsgongs pa'i gru gur byas la/
288b2(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid mnyam par bzhag pa'i phyag rgya bzhag ste/ de nas snga ma'i mdog gi rim pas gru gu de dag rtag pa dang/ rin chen 'byung ldan dang/ tshe dpag med dang/ don yod par grub pa dang/ mi bskyod pa rnams bsgrub ste/ de yang dang por
288b3(rgyud 'grel): oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko ho?/ zhes pas/ de dag stong pa nyid du byas la/ de nas snga ma'i gnas su pad+ma dang zla ba la gnas pa'i yi ge b+h+ruM AM dzi khaM hUM zhes pa lnga/ dkar po dang ser po dang dmar po dang ljang gu dang nag po rnams kyis
288b4(rgyud 'grel): mdog can rnams bsam mo/ /de nas de la 'od zer spro ba 'am/ bsdu ba'i rim pas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa sngar rim bzhin du bskyed de/ de nas rang gi snying kha'i sa bon las 'od 'phros pas snang bar byas pa 'am/ nam
288b5(rgyud 'grel): mkha' la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i thugs kar yang b+h+rUM la sogs pa'i sa bon lnga bltas te/ de dag yongs su gyur pa las rang rang gi mdog dang 'thun pa'i ye shes kyi srad bu gnas par bsams te/ de'i 'og tu de dag
288b6(rgyud 'grel): la ye shes kyi srad bu sngags 'dis bslang bar bya'o/ /oM a sa ta badzra sU traM me pra yats+tsha ma hA maN+Da la sU tra na ya hUM zhes pa dang/ de bzhin du ming gi gzhi brje ba'i sngags lngas bslang zhing/ de ltar bslang ma thag tu rang gi phyag la gnas
288b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lnga srad bu lngar gyur par bsam mo/ /de nas rang gi mig gnyis su dza las byung ba'i nyi ma zla ba g.yas dang g.yon du bkod de/ rab tu g.yo zhing 'bar ba'i mig gi sta stangs las byung ba'i 'od kyi lcags kyus/ de bzhin gshegs
289a1(rgyud 'grel): pa lnga'i thugs ka na gnas pa'i ye shes kyi srad bu rnams bkug ste/ phyag rgya la gnas pa'i srad bu la sogs so so bstim mo/ /de nas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i gzugs can gyi slob ma zhig gis srad
289a2(rgyud 'grel): bu lnga'i sna nas bzung ste/ slob dpon gyis kyang sna lnga nas bzung la bsnyams te/ 'ju bur dang mdud pa med par byas la/ oM chos kun tha dad rjes su 'jug /chos kun phan tshun rjes su 'jug /chos kun rjes su zhugs pa ste/ /mdza' 
289a3(rgyud 'grel): bral rjes su 'gro ba'o/ /hUM zhes brjod de bsgrim mo/ /bsgrims nas dri zhim po'i chus spangs te/ yi ge gsum nang bsres la/ gser la sogs pa'i snod du bzhag ste/ me tog dang dri la sogs pas mchod la lag pas bkag ste/
289a4(rgyud 'grel): oM A(rgyud 'grel): bI g+hAM ta kri ta hUM phaT/ ces pas mang du bzlas te/ de nas srad bu rdo rje la dkris la/ slob dpon bdag nyid kyi lte ba'i thad kar bzung la/ slob ma de nyid kyis lhan cig gdab bo/ /'debs na oM badzra su tra sa ma ya ma ti kra ma hUM/
289a5(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das 'di ni sems can gyi don byed pa'i dus lags so zhes brjod cing gdab bo/ /des kyang sangs rgyas thams cad bskul te/ byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir byon par bsam mo/ /de la bdag cag gis bla ma'i zhal
289a6(rgyud 'grel): snga nas ni/ ye shes kyi thig la tshangs thig gcig tsam 'am/ tshangs thig dang zur thig tsam gyis chog par gsungs so/ /gzhan dag ni phyogs thig dang rdo rje ra bas bskor ba yang bzhed do/ /de dag gi lugs las ni thig
289a7(rgyud 'grel): bskor ba dang/ 'gro ba dang btang ba la sogs pa yang bya'o/ /sa'i thig gzhung rgyas par gzhan du rtogs par sla bas/ /bdag gi 'dir mi bsam mo/ /ye shes kyi thig de ni oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM mu(rgyud 'grel): bya bas gshegs su gsol bar
289b1(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /re zhig rgyud 'di nyid kyi dbang du byas te/ sa'i thig ji lta bzhig yin pa cung zad dpyad de/ de la 'di'i tshul ni dkyil 'khor de'i tshad ji tsam pa la phyogs re re la yang cha chung brgyad cu rtsa brgyad par bya zhing/ de la rim pa gsum par bya'o//
289b2(rgyud 'grel): de'i phyir dbus? kyi dkyil 'khor thig gdab pa zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo rtsibs tshun chad kyi thig gdab pa'o/ /chos kyi 'khor lo 'dra ba la zhes bya ba ni/ bslab pa gsum ston par byed pa'i lte ba dang/ rtsibs rten dang/ rtsibs rnams dang ldan pa'o//
289b3(rgyud 'grel): de nyid gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir lte bar bcas shing rtsibs bcu drug rim pa gsum dang ldan pa la/ rtsibs ni nyis 'gyur nyid du bya zhes bya ba smos te/ lte ba dang rtsibs rten dang rtsibs ni rim pa gsum mo/ /de dang ldan par bya ba ni bslab pa
289b4(rgyud 'grel): gsum mtshon pa yin pas so/ /rtsibs ni zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo'i lte ba la 'byar brtse mo zhum pa'o/ /nyis 'gyur nyid du bya ba ni lte ba'i phyed kyi phyed la cha chung drug yod pa las/ nyis 'gyur te phyed kyis chung bar byas te/ de bzhin du
289b5(rgyud 'grel): rtsibs rten kyang de dang 'dra bar bya'o/ /des na rtsibs rten dang rtsibs dag la/ cha chung gsum gsum btang zhing/ lte ba la cha chung nyi shu rtsa bzhi btang zhes bya ba'i don to/ /'dir slob dpon kha cig na re lugs gzhan du/ dkyil
289b6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor nyi rims sum rim 'am/ /bzhi 'am mang por byas pa la/ /phyi rim gang yin de la ni/ /sgo gcig pa dang rgya ched bya/ /gzhan gyi phyogs kyi cha bzhin du/ /sgo bzhi sgo khyud bcas par bya/ /yang na thams cad dgos med
289b7(rgyud 'grel): par/ /sgo re re zhig bya ba yin/ /snying po'i dkyil 'khor nges par ni/ /rab tu bzang po sgo bzhir bya/ /zhes bya ba gsungs pa la bden pas so/ rim pa gsum lung tha ma 'dod do/ /dbus kyi phyogs su kun rigs ni/ /zhes bya ba la sogs
290a1(rgyud 'grel): pa ni ma lus par brjod zin mod kyi/ rdul tshon gyi dbang du byas te yang brjod par bya'o/ /de la 'di'i tshul ni rdul tshon ji srid du dgye bar 'dod pa'i sa'i cha la phyogs thams cad du cha chen po nyi shu rtsa
290a2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis gnas par re zhig de snyed kyi mtshan ma tsam gdab par bya'o/ /de rnams re re la yang cha bar ma re re'i re mo bya'o/ /de rnams re re la yang cha chung re re'i ri mo bya ste/ de ltar phyogs re re la yang cha chen po nyi shu rtsa gnyis dang/ cha bar ma
290a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi dang/ cha chung brgyad cu rtsa brgyad du yang 'gyur ro/ /de yang nad gi dkyil 'khor ni cha chen po dgu'o/ /ri mo'i sa nas gzung ste/ me 'od kyi bar du ni cha chen po lnga dang cha chung gcig go /phyi'i dkyil 'khor khor
290a4(rgyud 'grel): yug chen po dang bcas pa la ni cha chung bzhi dang yang cha chung gcig go /de la snying po la ni cha chung nyi shu rtsa bzhi ste/ de nas cha chung gsum rtsibs rten du bskor zhing/ cha chung gsum la rtsibs bya'o/ /de'i phyir dbus kyi dkyil 'khor thig gdab pa
290a5(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi 'khor lo 'dra ba la/ lte bar bcas shing rtsibs bcu drug /rim pa gsum dang ldan pa la/ /rtsibs ni nyis 'gyur nyid du bya/ /zhes gsungs te sngar zhib tu dpyad do/ /de nas cha chung gcig la rdo rje phreng bas
290a6(rgyud 'grel): khor yug chung du ltar skor ro/ /de'i ri mo phyi ma la gru chad byas la/ dbus su sgo dang phyi rol gyi sgo khyud bcas pa la zheng du cha chen po gsum sbyin te/ de nas dgu'i cha ni dgos pa la/ /sgo dang sgo khyud sum char bya zhes gsungs te/
290a7(rgyud 'grel): sngar zhib tu dpyad de yang ri mo'i sa cha chung gcig go /de nas khyams la cha bar ma gcig ste/ rta babs khyams ni thams cad du/ /byams pa la sogs mchog chen rnams zhes gsungs so/ /de nas rin po che'i rtsig pa la
290b1(rgyud 'grel): cha chung gcig go /de'i phyi rol tu dra ba dang/ dra ba phyed pa la cha bar? ma gcig go /de'i phyi rol mnga' yab la cha chung gcig go /de'i cha chung dor ba'i chen po gcig la rta babs te/ bang rim tha ma la cha chen po gsum las lhag ma la re re dbri'o/ /de nas cha chung bzhi
290b2(rgyud 'grel): la 'khor lo dang/ gdugs dag go /de nas de'i phyi rol tu shin tu nye ba yin pas/ me 'od dang pad+ma dang rdo rje cha gsum mo/ /de nas cha chung bzhi po rim pa re re'o/ /de nas cha chung gcig la 'khor yug chen po'o/ /ka ba yang dbus dang mthar cha chung re re
290b3(rgyud 'grel): la'o/ /sgo'i zheng du cha chung drug go /phyi'i sgo khyud kyi cha chung drug go /dbu ma'i dbu mar cha chung brgyad do/ /de ltar mtshan ma la zhib par dpyad de/ ma 'khrul ba lta na tshangs thig dang/ de nas phyogs thig dang/ de nas zur thig dang/ de nas ma lus bar?
290b4(rgyud 'grel): dbus nas gdab bo/ /de ltar thig btab nas rdul tshon dgye ba bsten pa'i phyir/ /dbus kyi phyogs zhes bya ba nas yang na ming yang rung zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs te/ khro bo ni gshin rje gshed do/ /mngag pa ni gzhan gyis mi thub pa'o/ /pho nya ni rta mgrin no/  
290b5(rgyud 'grel): sogs zhes bya ba ni bran zhes bya ba 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'o/ /de las gzhan gyi tshig gi don ni sngar brjod zin te/ de la dkyil 'khor rnams kyi rdul tshon dgye ba ji lta bu yin pa 'dir lung las 'jug par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor dag gi cho ga ni/ /rnam pa
290b6(rgyud 'grel): gsum po ma lus pa/ /lha rnams thams cad dgod pa ni/ /rnam pa gsum du shes bya ste/ /dang po gzugs su bri bar bya/ /gnyis pa phyag rgya'i gzugs su dri/ /gsum pa gnas dang stan dag tu/ /bri ba'i cho ga yongs su bsgrags/ /mi mkhas pa
290b7(rgyud 'grel): ni phyag rgya'i gzugs/ /cho ga bzhin du dgod par bya/ /mkhas pas kyang ni phye ma yis/ /yan lag rdzogs par rab tu dka' / /yan lag rdzogs shing rgyas byas nas/ /cho ga'i las la ring du thogs/ /gzugs rnams legs par bsgrub na ni/ /mang
291a1(rgyud 'grel): po rnams ni zin mi 'gyur/ /yan lag nyams na byin mi rlog /dngos mi grub par rab tu bshad/ /de lta bas na mkhas pa yis/ /phyag rgya'i gzugs su lha rnams dgod ces pa dang/ yang gsungs pa/ gang du lha rnams gzugs
291a2(rgyud 'grel): dag tu/ /dgod par bshad pa de yang ni/ /phyag rgya 'am gnas su nges par bya/ /de la sogs pa'i phyag rgya rnams/ /ji skad bshad pa'i cho ga bzhin/ /dkyil 'khor dag tu ma smos kyang/ /cho ga bzhin du bri bar bshad/ /da ltar phyag rgya
291a3(rgyud 'grel): dgod pa ni/ /dgod pa gnyis par bshad pa yin/ /stan du dgod pa'i cho ga ni/ /'di las gzhan pa gsum pa bshad/ /dkyil 'khor dag gi nang du ni/ /tshon rtsi phye mas thig le bri/ /dkyil 'khor dag gi tshad las ni/ /khor khor yug
291a4(rgyud 'grel): rgya cher bskor/ /rigs kyi bdag po/ lha rnams ni/ /go rim bzhin du de ltar bya/ /lha rnams gzhan gyi gdan rnams kyi/ /phyi yi cho ga bshad pa ni/ /zlum po 'am yang na gru bzhi ru/ /thog mar stan ni dgod par bya/ /de la de yi sngags bzlas
291a5(rgyud 'grel): shing/ /de yi steng du mkhas pas dgod/ /phyi rol tu ni thig le la/ /lha rnams ming gi smos te dgod/ /thams cad thig ler gnas byas nas/ /spyan drang ba ni brtsam par bya/ /'di ni stan du dgod pa ste/ /gsum par yongs su bsgrag
291a6(rgyud 'grel): pa yin/ /rings sam yang na mi nus na/ /stan du dgod pa'i dkyil 'khor bya/ /rigs kyi bdag po gsum rnams kyi/ /gsang sngags thog mar bkod nas su/ /dkyil 'khor nang du mkhas pa yis/ /lhag ma rnams ni phyag rgya bri/ /phyi
291a7(rgyud 'grel): rol tu ni stan rnams bri/ /'di ni spyi'i cho ga yin/ /gzugs rnams legs par ma stsogs na/ /nyes pa sngar ni bshad pa yin/ /lha rnams bstod par 'gyur bas na/ /cho ga tha ma 'ang mi shes so/ /phyag rgya rnams su gang bkod pa/ /bar
291b1(rgyud 'grel): mar rab tu bsgrags pa ni/ /khyad par du ni de bsngags te/ /de la byin gyis rlob par 'gyur/ /phyag rgya bris na 'ang bde bar 'gyur/ /phyag rgya yang ni de nyid lta/ /de bas mkhas pas nan tan du/ /dkyil 'khor du ni phyag rgya bri zhes so/ /yang gsungs pa chags
291b2(rgyud 'grel): pa bsrung bar byas pa'i rnams/ /phyogs gcig tu ni bkod nas su/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa klag /gus par yang ni phyag byas nas/ /'phags pa'i tshogs kun bsams nas ni/ /de nas dkyil 'khor bri ba ni/ /lcags ni sna lnga'i phye ma ste/ /mkhas
291b3(rgyud 'grel): pas dkar po la sogs pa'o/ /dang cing yon tan ldan pa yis/ /slob mas rin chen phye ma bri/ /rin chen lcags rnams ma 'byor na/ /sa lu btags pa'i 'bras phyes bya/ /tshon rtsi zhib mo sngar bshad pas/ /'byung khung nas byung phye ma 'am/ /rdo
291b4(rgyud 'grel): yi khams ni sna tshogs kyang/ /phye ma'i gor ni sbyar bar bya'o/ /de ltar rnam pa bzhi po ni/ /phye ma'i gor ni bsgres pa yin/ /lcags rnams kun dang rin chen dang/ /'byung khungs pa dang 'bras btags pa/ /dkyil 'khor kun gyi las
291b5(rgyud 'grel): rnams la/ /phyi ma'i don du sbyar bar bya/ /dam tshig la ni lcags kyi shing/ /rin chen las byung dbang bskur ba/ /sa lu'i phye ma zhi ba la/ /khams las byung ba rgyas pa la/ /drag shul spyod pa khyad par du/ /thal ba la sogs bya bar shis/ /phye
291b6(rgyud 'grel): ma rnams kyi bye brag gis/ /cho ga'i rim par bstan pa 'di/ /byang shar mtshams nas brtsams nas ni/ /phye ma dag ni dgye bar bya/ /rdo rje khu tshur spyo ba 'am/ /yang na lcags kyu'i phyag rgya 'am/ /lhung bzed phyag rgya'i sbyor ba 'am/ /yang na
291b7(rgyud 'grel): rig byed lag pas bri/ /dkar po dang por dgye bar bya/ /de yi 'og tu dmar po dgye/ /de nas ser po dgye bar bya/ /de'i 'og tu ljang gu dgye/ /sngags pas kun gyi phyi rol tu/ /tshon rtsi nag po dgye bar bya/ /g.yas su bskor zhing rgyun mi 'chad/ /
292a1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad mnyam zhi bar tshad med/ /ngan pa dang ni nyams pa dang/ /ma snyoms pa dang bar chad na/ /gnod pa mang po 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de bas nan tan skyed de bya/ /mkhas pas phye ma dgye par bya/ /phyogs kun
292a2(rgyud 'grel): tu ni mkhas pa yis/ /dbus su sgo ni gdod par bya/ /ngos gnyis su ni cha dag kyang/ /bzhi bzhi dag ni dor bar bya/ /chab sgo chen po steg bur bcas/ /cung zad cig ni lhag par bya/ /chab sgo gzhan rnams bcad pa ni/ /phye ma dkar
292a3(rgyud 'grel): po dag gis su/ /sgo yi dbus kyi cha dag tu/ /ri mo phra mo bri bar bya/ /dang por tshon rtsi sna lnga bri/ /dkyil 'khor gnyis pa sna gsum gyis/ /gsum pa phye ba dkar po yis/ /tshig kyang du ni bri bar bshad/ /gzhan yang
292a4(rgyud 'grel): gang dag kha cig tu/ /ri mo gcig pa'ang de bzhin te/ /phal cher gang dag bshad pa ni/ /de dag thams cad ri mo gcig /ces gsungs pa la/ yang rnam pa gzhan du sems can khams ni zhen byed cing/ /'di ni chos
292a5(rgyud 'grel): dbyings ro yin par/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis mngon gsungs te/ /de phyir 'di ni tshon zhes bya/ /tshon ni nang nas dgye bar bya/ /phyi rol nas ni tshon mi dgye/ /dkar po thog mar btang bar bya/ /de yi 'og tu dmar po ste/ /de nas
292a6(rgyud 'grel): ser po btang bar bya/ /de yi 'og tu ljang gu btang/ /kun gyi nang rol nag po ste/ /tshon gyi cho ga de ltar bshad/ /ces gsungs pa'o/ /de la tshon byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa ni/ /thig skud byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa lta bu
292a7(rgyud 'grel): la/ /oM badzra tsi tra sa ma ya ma ti kra ma hUM zhes bya ba lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcas te/ mdzub mo gnyis bsgrang ste/ sbyar ba'i phyag rgya dang bzhes pas byin gyis brlab cing/ tshon bkye nas tshon gyi cha lhag ma yang oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM mu:
292b1(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya bas gshegs su gsol bar bya'o/ /de la 'dir lung dang rjes su 'thun par phyag rgya dgod par 'dod pa dang/ snying po'i dbus su sna tshogs pad+ma la 'khor lo dkar po'o/ /de bzhin du nang gi dkyil 'khor du lha thams cad kyi gnas su sna tshogs
292b2(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma la/ sngar bshad pa'i mdog dang 'thun pa'i rang rang gi mtshan ma bri ste/ shar gyi re mig la rdo rje 'am ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya'o/ /lhor rin po che margad cha dgu pa'o/ /nub tu lhung bzed do/ /byang du sna tshogs rdo rje'o/ /grwa bzhir ni mig gi
292b3(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu dang/ rdo rje rtse gsum pa dang/ pad+ma'i yan lag dang utpa la'o/ /shar nas brtsams te rtsibs bcu drug la/ /rdo rje lcags kyu mda' gzhu dang/ /rin chen rgyal mtshan nyi ma 'dzum/ /pad+ma ral gri 'khor lo gsum/ /las
292b4(rgyud 'grel): dang go cha/ 'jigs byed bcangs zhes pa rnams so/ /rtsibs mtshan gyi bzhi la rdo rje rtse lnga pa dang/ rin po che'i phreng ba dang/ pi wang dang/ gar gyi lag pa dag go /phyi rol gyi grwa bzhir dri'i dung phor dang/ me tog gi gzhong bu dang/ bog
292b5(rgyud 'grel): por dang/ mar me'i mchod spong dag go /sgo bzhir ni lcags kyu dang/ zhags pa dang/ lcags sgrog dang dril bu dag go /de nas khyams la dgod pa ni/ shar sgo dang 'brel pas sna tshogs pad+ma la tho ba'o/ /de'i rjes su sna tshogs pad+ma
292b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhi la/ rdo rje dkar po bzhi'o/ /ngos cig tu pad+ma'i 'dab ma drug la lhung bzed drug go /de dag dang 'dra ba las/ be con dang rin po che dang/ pad+ma dang ral gri dang/ sna tshogs rdo rje dang bye brag go /de dag gi bar bar du mchod pas lag pa brel ba'i
292b7(rgyud 'grel): lha mo rnams so/ /kha cig na re dkyil 'khor 'di sgo gsum lha'i snam bu dang bcas par bya ba las/ 'di rnams sgo gnyis pa yin la/ de nyid du rdo rje la sogs pa'i phyag rgya dgod do zhes zer ro/ /de nas phyi rol du rim pa dang po'i phyogs
293a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhir gling ri rab mdog dang 'thun pa bzhir/ rdo rje pad+ma dang rtse gsum pa dang/ 'khor lo rnams so/ /rim pa gnyis pa la dbang ldan du rtse gsum dkar po gnyis so/ /shar stod du pi wang dam/ zhags ba dkar po ste/ de dang
293a2(rgyud 'grel): 'brel bar cang te'u dkar po dang/ gdengs ka dkar po dang/ rdo rje dkar po dang/ shar lhor me thab ste/ de nyid du dgos so/ /lho stod du dbyug tho sngon po ste/ de nam mkha' o phyag rgya dang/ rdo rje dra ba can no/ /de nas be con sngon po ste/ de'i
293a3(rgyud 'grel): rjes su thod pa dang tog dang zhags pa dang/ tri shu la dang/ pad+ma dang 'khor lo dang/ mdung thung dang tho ba dang thod pa dang/ rdo rje dang dbyug to 'am/ yang na sor mo bcu bsnol ba 'ba' zhig bri'o/ /de'i rjes nyid du dbyug to dang/
293a4(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma dang 'khor lo dang/ rdo rje bsnams pa'o/ /sring mo bzhi'i 'o/ /de nyid thod pa 'am/ lce rdo rje can te/ 'di dag ni dbang phyug chen po 'am/ chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje'i 'khor du 'ang rung bar bri'o/ /de nas lho nub tu ral gri'o//
293a5(rgyud 'grel): de nyid du yang ral gri dang lce'o/ /nub stod du rdo rje 'am zhags pa ste/ de nas dbyug to dang gshog pa dang utpa la dang/ sbrul mgo dang zhags pa dang/ bum pa 'am mche ba'o/ /nub byang du ba dan dkar po dang/ rtse mo can
293a6(rgyud 'grel): gyi ri dung ka'o/ /byang stod du dbyug to ste/ de nas mche ba rdo rje can/ /yang dbyug to'o/ /de nas rim pa gsum pa la phyogs bzhi dang/ mtshams bzhir dbyug pa brgyad dang/ phyogs bzhir yon chab kyi phyog rgya bdun bdun phyogs kyi
293a7(rgyud 'grel): dbyug pa re re'i rjes su bri'o/ /rim pa bzhi pa la sngar bstan pa rnams ming du bra zhing sngar gzugs dngos su smras pa rnams ni/ gzugs nyid du'o/ /'dir stan dang kha dog dang dbyibs dang tshad kyi man ngag kyang stan zin to/ /phyi rol gyi
293b1(rgyud 'grel): gru rnams pad+ma'i tshal dang shing dang mtsho dang bya bkra shis ba rnams bri'o/ /phyi rol gyi cha chung la ni khor yug chen po ltar rdo rje phreng ba dri'o/ /de ltar dkyil chen po dgod pa byas nas dkyil 'khor gyi yo byad nye bar dgod pa'i phyir/ de nas mkhas pas dkyil
293b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor la/ /rla re rgyal mtshan lhab lhubs dang/ /gdugs dang rnga yab lda ldi dang/ /'phan dang sna tshogs na bza' mchog /ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te go sla'o/ /gser las byas ba'i bya rnams ni/ /brgyad dam bcu drug lhag kyang rung/ /
293b3(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur rin chen chus bkang ba'i/ /bum pa lnga ni bzhag par bya/ /zhes pa dang/ 'og nas rnam rgyal bum pa dri'i chus/ /rab tu bkang ste bzhag par bya/ /zhes bya ba smos pa ni rnam par rgyal ba dang/ /rigs bzhi'i bzhi dang/ /lha mo bzhi'i bzhi
293b4(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /sems dpa' bcu drug gi bzhi dang/ /smeg? mo la sogs pa bzhi'i gcig dang/ bdug pa la sogs pa'i bzhi'i gcig sgo skyong rnams kyi gcig ste/ de ltar bum pa bcu drug gam de ma 'byor na rnam par rgyal ba dang rigs bzhi lha mo
293b5(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas pa'i bzhi dang/ sems dpa' rnams kyi gcig dang/ mchod pa rnams kyi gcig dang/ sgo skyong rnams kyi gcig dang brgyad do/ /de yang ma 'byor na ni spyir rigs re re la re re te lnga'o/ /de yang gal te ma 'byor na rnam par rgyal ba'i bum
293b6(rgyud 'grel): pa gcig bus dbang bskur la/ las kyi bum pa ni thams cad du bzhag ste/ des na bum pa gnyis ni nam yang mi rung ngo/ /mar me me tog bum pa dang zhes bya ba'i bum pa 'di ni bkang ba'i bum pa ste/ ji snyed 'byor pa bzhag par bya'o/ /de la dbang
293b7(rgyud 'grel): bskud pa'i bum pa rnams ni/ dang por stong pa nyid las yi ge paM dkar po las zhabs gdub sor re ba/ lhor chu yul ma ga d+ha'i bre gang shong ga mgrin pa sor bzhi ba la phra rab pa 'khyer sor gnyis 'phyang ba/ sor gcig gdong la yod pa/ dpag bsam
294a1(rgyud 'grel): gyi shing gi yal ga can/ sngar smos pa'i rin po che dang/ 'bru dang sman dang ldan pa/ ras dkar por mgul bcings ba/ spos kyi chu nyung zad dang ldan pa las/ chu la sogs pa stong par byas pa la yang der sa bon lha ji
294a2(rgyud 'grel): snyed pa bskyed de/ ye shes kyi lha rnams bstim la/ mchod pa lngas mchod de/ de ji ltar nus pas bzlas te/ mjug tu dri'i chu blugs pas reg pa las gyur par byas la/ bya ba la zab? kyi bar du thun mtshams gsum du bzlas so/ /
294a3(rgyud 'grel): mdzes pa'i bshos rnams bzhag par bya/ /zhes pa'i bshad pa ni/ bzang dbang btung ba sbyar legs dang/ bca' ba sna tshogs bzhag par bya zhes bya'o/ /gnod sbyin srin po kha zas su/ /gtor ma rnam pa sna tshogs bzhag/ 'byung po
294a4(rgyud 'grel): ba dang klu dang lha mi dang mi min de bzhin te/ /me tog dri rnams sna tshogs dang/ /'o ma mar dang kha rar bcas/ /zhes bya ba la phyogs kyi gtor ma ni/ /rgyu sna tshogs las byas te/ rang rang gi 'dod pa dang 'thun par byas la//
294a5(rgyud 'grel): 'byung po la zhes bya ba la/ /'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor mas gcig char sbyin pa ste kha de bas na 'og nas de nas 'byung po kun gyi gtor ma zhes bya ba ni/ 'di'i 'byung po ba zhes bya ba dang sbyar te/ de yang 'byung po
294a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gtor ma ni/ sa yel dang/ ling ga li dang/ sran chan til gyi bis ta ga /rtsa ba 'bras bu 'bras chen zho/ /cung zad sngon las cung zad dang/ me tog 'bras yos chur bcas pa/ /'dab mar bcas pa'i gtor ma ste/ /phyi
294a7(rgyud 'grel): rol 'byung po thams cad la/ /de ming 'byung po kun gyi'o/ /zhes 'phags pa rab tu grub bar byed pa las gsungs pa'i gtor ma'o/ /sems can dkres shed skom la btung ba dang zhes bya ba ni 'di'i ming dang zhes bya ba smos pa dang sbyar ro/ /phyogs
294b1(rgyud 'grel): la gnas pa rnams la rnam par rtag /de'i gtor ma rjes su 'thun par bya/ /zhes smos pa dang/ 'di'i gnod skye ni srin po'i kha zas su zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i lhag ma rnams sbyar ro/ /de la rjes su 'thun pa'i gtor ma ni 'di lta ste/ shar du na me
294b2(rgyud 'grel): tog phreng dmar de bzhin sros/ /'bras chan dmar po'ang de bzhin te/ /ba dan dmar po'ang sbyin par bya/ /tsan dan dmar po nyid dag dang/ /skud pa dmar po dag dang ni/ /de dag thams cad sbyin par bya zhes pa'o/ /steng du ni me tog dri dang me
294b3(rgyud 'grel): tog phyed/ /mar me yang na de la sbyin/ /pad+ma utpal pu shel rtse/ /chad dang 'bras chan sbyin du gzhug /gdugs dkar bsang byed srad bu dang/ /de bzhin me tog phreng dkar bsnams zhes pa'o/ /lhor ni kri sar dang byug pa'i zas/ /sha btsos de
294b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin rdzin pa dang/ /me tog spos dang gtor ma dang/ /me tog phreng ba sna tshogs pa/ /gtor ma de dag bsdus nas ni/ /lho phyogs su yang sbyin par bya/ /zhes so lho nub tu ni/ bur ba zas dang de bzhin spos/ /de bzhin sha btsos rjen pa dang/ /
294b5(rgyud 'grel): nas dang skom dang kri sa ra/ /sdig med khrag gi gtor ma bya/ /dri zhim po yi me tog rnams/ /kha dog sna tshogs rnams kyis bsres/ /zhes pa'o/ /nub ni bkra shis 'bras yos bu ram dang/ /sa nag kyang ni de bzhin te/ /me tog phreng ba bdug
294b6(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ /na ga pus pa sbyin par bya/ /dri mar dang ni de bzhin du/ /skud pa dmar po sbyin bar bya/ /gu gul dang ni thang shing gi /bdug pa de la sbyin par bya zhes bya'o/ /'og tu ni de dag nyid dang me tog kun dang spos kun dang/ /me tog phreng ba sna tshogs
294b7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /pad+ma utpa la pu sho la rtse/ /utpa la sngon po'i 'dab ma dang/ /sha btsos dang ni rjen pa'i sha/ /zhes pa'o/ /byang du ni zas kun dang ni spos kun dang/ /de bzhin me tog thams cad dang/ /shing thog kun dang kri sar/ /de bzhin 'bras kyi 'o thug dang/
295a1(rgyud 'grel): sha btsos dang ni rjen pa dang/ /til zan dang ni 'byung po'i zas/ /gdugs ser dang ni mchod phyir thogs/ /de bzhin skud pa ser po dang/ /'gron bu dag dang gsar dag dang/ /rin chen rnam pa sna tshogs rnams/ /tshul bzhin du
295a2(rgyud 'grel): ni sprin par bya/ /zhes pa'o/ /byang shar du ni ? rnams dang ni 'bras yos dang/ /bum pa ba dan sngon po dang/ /sha btsos dang ni rjen pa dang/ /de bzhin khur ba zas rnams dang/ /dri dang me tog dkar po dang/ /'bras kyi 'o thug de bzhin sbyar/ /zhes
295a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /shar lho dang nub byang du ni/ /swa ti ka dang u lo pa'i/ /bza' ba ci 'byor bu ram tsan/ /lag pan tsa ba 'bras bu dang/ /'o thug dag ni 'dod pa ste/ /de ni thams cad 'dod ces bya/ /zhes pa thams cad 'dod pa gtor ma bya ste/
295a4(rgyud 'grel): 'di gnyis la nges pa'i kha zas ma gsungs la/ gtor ma 'di nyid snga ma thams cad kyi go sbyar du yang rung ngo/ /'byung po 'di nyid las snga ma rnams lhag par bya'o/ /zhes kha cig rtog /gal te sgrub pa po rab tu rgyas par sbyin par
295a5(rgyud 'grel): 'bod pa na/ rig pa mchog gi rgyud las gsungs pa ltar gdon chen po brgyad la yang gtor ma ma 'dres par sbyin par bya ste/ de yang dang po ni gnod sbyin gyi gtor ma bya ste/ bar chad grag po spang ba'i phyir ro/ /de nas 'byung ba thams
295a6(rgyud 'grel): cad la ste/ /bar chad spang ba dang/ de dag gi bsnab sems dag pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas ni phyogs kyi bdag po'i gtor ma ste/ tshogs rdzogs par bya ba dang las grub pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas zhes bya ba ni don gyi dbang
295a7(rgyud 'grel): gis na/ rdul tshon bkye ste/ nye 'khor ba'i rnam par lngas byugs nas mchod pa dang/ yo byad bkod ma thag tu'o/ /khrus sogs bya la zhes bya ba ni ji skad du 'phags pa dpung bzang gis zhus pa las gsungs pa/
295b1(rgyud 'grel): lus la dril phyis byas nas ni/ /chu chen rnyog pa med par zhugs nas kyang/ /ji tsam 'dod pa'i bar du khrus byas te/ /byung nas shar ram byang du kha bltas te/ /chu yi lag pa brkyang pa bkrus nas ni/ /pus mo phyi rol tu ni bstan byas te/ /bar du
295b2(rgyud 'grel): lag bzhag cig tsog pur 'dug nas/ /sgra med dbu ba med par nye reg bya/ /lan gsum bar du chu ni 'thungs nas kyang/ /mchu la lan gnyis yongs su phyi bar bya/ /so la chags pa lce yi reg pa dang/ /sprid par gyur pa kha yang bkru bar
295b3(rgyud 'grel): bya zhes pa dang/ yang de gnyis las/ sa phung bshad sgo lnga ste mtshan ma gsum/ /g.yon pa gsum ste lag pa gnyis la bdun/ /yang na sa dang mchu yi ji srid du/ /dri ma dri bral de srid bar du bya/ /zhes gsungs
295b4(rgyud 'grel): pas so/ /gal te rnal 'byor pa chos rang bzhin gyis dag par mos pa zhig yin na ni/ de nyid khrus yin pas/ 'jig rten pa dang/ 'thun par bya ba'am/ /lus la phan pa'i ched ma yin par phyi rol gyi khrus la
295b5(rgyud 'grel): la ched du mi bya ste/ /ji skad du 'phags pa de kho na nyid 'dus pa las kyang/ mu stegs can rnams gzhom pa'i phyir/ /'byung ba che las thams cad byung/ /mi gtsang zhes ni gang las
295b6(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /thams cad grub par byed pa'i mchog ces gsungs te/ sogs pa byas la zhes bya ba ni/ ci nas kyang phyis bar chad du mi 'gyur bar/ /bza' ba dang btung ba la sogs spyad pa 'am/ gtam
295b7(rgyud 'grel): gyi bsgo ba la sogs pa bya ba ma lus pa rdzogs par byas pa'o/ /dri dang zhes bya ba ni lus tsan dan dkar po'i bde gus ci rigs su byug cing/ ma 'byor bas kyang bzhin tsam byug bar bya'o/ /phreng mchog phreng ba can zhes bya ba
296a1(rgyud 'grel): ni/ utpal la sogs pa'i phreng ba bzang po mgo la bcings shing mgul du yang 'phyang bar byas pa'o/ /dri zhim kha bkang zhes bya ba ni gla rtsi bzang po ci rigs zhig khang bzung ngam/ zhal kha bsgo ba'i byug pa'i sbyor
296a2(rgyud 'grel): ba byas pas kha bsgo ba'o/ /mchog mdzes pa zhes bya ba ni/ stong g.yogs dang smad g.yogs dmar po gyon la/ sor gdub dang/ mgul rgyan dang rna cha dang/ mu tig gi do shal la sogs pas mdzes par byas shing/
296a3(rgyud 'grel): gtsug tor dang dbu rgyan dang/ dar dbyangs kyis bsgeg pa'o/ /gal te rab tu byung ba zhig na yang chas gos snas sbyar la sogs pa rab tu mdzes pa/ rang gi 'dul ba'i cho ga dang mi 'gal bar byas pa'o/ /de nas dkyil
296a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyi mdza' yol pa chen pos bskor la/ bdag nyid dkyil 'khor gyi shar du stan nang tshangs can la 'dug ste/ sngon bzhin du dam tshig sems pa'i rnal 'byor rdzogs par byas la/ bris pa'i dkyil 'khor de yang
296a5(rgyud 'grel): yid kyis sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor ji lta bar bskyed de/ bdag nyid dbus su gnas pas sgo dbye ba'i phyag rgya rdo rje sor mo gnyis kyis rtse mo yang dag par bsdams zhing/ bsnyams la bkan ste/ oM badzrodg+ha Ta ya sa ma ya pra
296a6(rgyud 'grel): pe sha ya hUM zhes brjod cing rab tu khros la g.yas brkyang ba la sogs pa'i 'dug stangs la brten te/ sgo thams cad dam shar gyi sgo dbye bar bya'o/ /de nas badzra badzra hUM zhes brjod cing phyir 'byung bar bya ste/ yid dang phyag
296a7(rgyud 'grel): rgyas ri mo dang/ rdo rje thig kyang gdag bya ste/ sangs rgyas ri mo dri med pa/ ldan pa 'gongs kyang nyes pa med ces gsungs te/ 'dir yang na ri mos bskor? ma thag tu sbyor ba 'di byas la/ /yang na phyag rgya ma bkod pa la
296b1(rgyud 'grel): bya yang rung ngo/ /de nas rang rang gi sngags brjod pas/ /lha'i tshogs sum cu rtsa bdun 'grub par lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la sogs pa ni/ ched du bskyed pa dang spyan drang mi dgos kyi/ gang du dkyil 'khor chen po gnas pa
296b2(rgyud 'grel): der/ rang bzhin kho nas 'byon no/ /de nas gtso bo rgyal ba sras kyi 'khor/ /mang pa rnams ni spyan drangs te/ /zhes bya ba sbyar te/ gtso bo zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas rje btsun rnams so/ /rgyal ba'i sras zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' dang
296b3(rgyud 'grel): lha mo la sogs pa'o/ /'khor mang po rnams ni zhes bya ba ni/ phyi'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'o/ /spyan drangs te zhes bya ba ni bod pa ste/ ji ltar spyan drang zhe na/ de'i phyir phyag rgya sngags dang bdag ldan zhing/ /lcags kyu la sogs rnams
296b4(rgyud 'grel): 'byor gyis/ /zhes bya ba gsungs te/ de la phyag rgya ni 'og nyid nas/ /gsang ba'i bcing bas bcings nas ni/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pas ston te/ gsang ba'i zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya bcings pa de nyid rab tu gsang zhing sba bar bya ste/
296b5(rgyud 'grel): ji skad du 'phags pa de kho na nyid 'dus pa las/ slob dpon ma yin gzhan dang ni/ /slob ma ma yin bu min pa'i/ /mdun du phyag rgya mi brjod de/ /de dag gsang ba phyag rgyas 'grub ces gsungs la/ zla ba gsang ba'i thig
296b6(rgyud 'grel): le las kyang/ /dam tshig ma yin mi shes la/ /sngags rig pas ni bstan mi bya/ /phyag rgya thams cad gsang ba ste/ dam tshig phyag rgya gsang ba yin/ /zhes gsungs so/ /bcings pa zhes bya ba ni /
296b7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje thal mo'o/ /bcings nas ni zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bsdams pa ste/ /ji skad du 'phags pa de kho na nyid 'dus pa las/ dam tshig phyag rgya thams cad ni/ /rdo rje bsdams las byung bas na/ /zhes gsungs te/ dam tshig gi phyag 
297a1(rgyud 'grel): rgya nye bar mtshon pa'o/ /mdzub gnyis zhes bya ba ni go sla'o/ /sngags ni e hye hi b+ha ga waM mahA ka ru Ni kA t+ma ka dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ste/ lcags kyu la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor ni yud tsam gyis bdag nyid der mos pa'o//
297a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dir don ni bris pa'i dkyil 'khor bskyed cing/ sgo phye nas bdag shar sgo la phyogs par gnas te/ /sngags snga ma brjod pas lha rnams khang pa brtsegs pa'i nyen 'khor du byon par bya ste/ 'phags pa de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i
297a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyud du/ /rdo rje bsdu ba'i tshul lta bu'o/ /de nas rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen por bdag nyid yid la byed cing de dag gis phyag rgya bcings nas oM sarba na ra ka ga tya ka sha ni hUM phaT/ oM sarba na ra gA bud+da ra ni hUM
297a4(rgyud 'grel): phaT/ /oM sarbba pa ya band+ha mo tsa ni hUM phaT/ oM sarbba pa ya ga ti b+ha ga /waM bi na sha ni hUM phaT/ zhes brjod la nang du byon pa dang/ gnyis su med par bya ba dang/ bcing ba dang mnyes par byas nas mchod pa la sogs bya'o/ /de nas
297a5(rgyud 'grel): mtshon ma skyes te zhes bya ba ni 'od zer dang/ mi las 'das pa'i dri la sogs pa mthong nas so/ /mgu nas ni zhes bya ba ni bdag gi nges par slob ma smin par byed nus so zhes bsams te yid spro ba byas nas
297a6(rgyud 'grel): so/ /thog ma tha ma med par zhes bya ba ni/ /dang po dang bar dang tha mar bye brag med par ro/ mngon sum mthong zhes bya ba ni dbang po'i mngon sum dang 'dra bar lha rnams gsal bar bltas te/ sems rtse gcig tu
297a7(rgyud 'grel): byas zhes bya ba'i don to/ /slob dpon kha cig na re/ thog ma bcom ldan 'das thams cad rig pa nas tha ma'i shin tu phyi rol gyi lha rnams kyi bar du byon pa'i tshe bye brag med par mthong bar 'gyur te/ 'di nyid
297b1(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma skyes zhes bya ba yin la/ de ltar mthong bas mgu nas ni mchod pa bya ba ste/ de ltar yang lha chen po dgu'i dkyil 'khor las/ de nas byon pa mthong ba dang dga' ba chen pos mchod par bya zhes gsungs so/ /de ltar mngon
297b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab ste/ mchod pa bya'o/ /'dis nam mkha' i dkyil la 'og min nas spyan drang ba bstim zhing/ de bris pa la thim par bya ba ni man ngag go /da ni mchod pa ston par bzhed nas arga mchog phul zhes bya
297b3(rgyud 'grel): ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ 'dir mchod yon gyi mtshan nyid 'phags pa rab tu grub par byed pa las gsungs pa/ gser dang dngul dang zangs ma dang/ /rdo ba dang ni shing gi 'am/ /kham pa 'am dung ngam nya phyis sam/ /de
297b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin lo ma'i snod kyang rung/ /zhi dang rgyas dang drag spyod dang/ /rab dang 'bring dang tha ma yis/ /las dang dngos grub dag la ni/ /rigs pa'i snod rnams sbyar bar bya/ /kha dog yon tan bshad pa las/ /gzhan dang gzhan yang ci
297b5(rgyud 'grel): rigs pa'i/ /snod rnams ji ltar 'dod pa ru/ /mchod yon phyir ni rab tu sbyar/ /zhi ba'i mchod yon nas dang bcas/ /til dang bcas pa rgyas pa la/ /thams cad dang ni 'gal ba'i phyir/ /ko ta par bcas drag spyod
297b6(rgyud 'grel): la/ /zhi ba'i mchod yon 'o ma can/ /rgyas pa la ni zho can no/ /ba yi gcin nam yang na khrag /drag shul spyod pa'i don du shis/ /rab dang 'bring dang tha ma dang/ /las rnams kun la 'bras yos shis/ /spos dang me tog
297b7(rgyud 'grel): ku sha til/ /chu rnams bye brag med par bshad/ /zangs kyi snod ni mchod yon phyir/ /las rnams kun la rab tu shis/ /'di dag bdag gis ma 'byor gyis/ /bdag la bzod par mdzod ces nas/ /yang na ci 'byor
298a1(rgyud 'grel): pas kyang rung zhes pa las/ /zhi ba la sngags pa'i mchod yon ni/ /'dir arga mchog ste de phul bas mchod pa lhag ma rnams bya/ /glegs bam la la las arga mchog rtags shes 'don te/ de yang snga ma lta bu
298a2(rgyud 'grel): zhi ba'i mchod yon ni mchog tu rtag par bya ba 'am/ rung pa zhes bya'o/ /gsang la sogs pa zhes bya ba la/ gsang ba'i mchod pa ni sgeg mo la sogs pa bzhi ste/ 'di dag gis snying po'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba mchod
298a3(rgyud 'grel): par bya ba'i phyi rol gyi lha rnams ma yin pas so/ /sogs zhes bya ba ni rdo rje me tog la sogs pa bzhi bsdu'o/ /de ltar mchod pa dgus mchod nas mnyam med mi g.yo zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i dbyangs kyis bstod
298a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyir/ /dbyangs snyan pa'i stod pa dang zhes bya ba smos te/ rol mo'i cha byad dam pa dang sbyar ba drug ldan la sogs pa'i nga ros stod par bya ste/ ji skad du zla ba gsang ba'i thig le'i rgyud
298a5(rgyud 'grel): las/ pi wang gling bu yang mtshan sgra snyan gyis/ /glu blangs dngos grub rgya chen 'thob par byed/ /ji snyed yid du 'ong ba'i glu dag ni/ /'jig rten grags pa'i bde ba'i bde ba dag /bden pa'i sgra yis bskyed pa rnams bsgyur ba/ /
298a6(rgyud 'grel): de dag mthun? pa'i dbyangs 'dis sgrub par byed/ /sha ta pa dang sha dza'i dbyangs/ /glu ru blangs pas pad+ma gnas/ /dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur/ /'di yis byin brlabs dag pa dang/ /'di yis byin brlabs bde
298a7(rgyud 'grel): ba rnams/ /sbyor ba 'di yi sbyor ba yis/ /'dod byed thams cad thob par 'gyur zhes gsungs so/ /de nas lha'i gtso bo thams cad la/ /ras ni zung re dbul bar bya/ /sems dpa' chen po phal rnams la/ /ya re phul
298b1(rgyud 'grel): bar rab tu bsgrags shes gsungs pa 'am/ yang na lha thams cad la ras zung re 'bul ba 'am/ ma 'byor na re re 'am/ de yang ma 'byor na thams cad la zur gcig gam/ rab tu 'byor pa dman na thams cad la gcig dang/
298b2(rgyud 'grel): 'byor pa yod na ba lang dang rta dang/ rnga mo dang ra dang lug la sogs pa'i khyu rab tu brtags pa dang/ rin po che'i tshogs dang/ bza' ba dang bca' ba dang bldag pa dang/ btung ba gya nom pa mang po dang/ dril bu g.yer ka
298b3(rgyud 'grel): btags pa'i rta bab dri zhim po dang/ rin po che bdun dang/ nye ba'i rin po che bdun dang/ bkra shis kyi rdzas bcu drug dag kyang rab tu yid du 'thad pa/ 'bul bar ston pa ni lha rdzas dam pa rnams kyis legs par mchod ces
298b4(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa'o/ /de la mchod pa'i cho ga ni bya ba'i rgyud kyi dbang du mdzad de/ 'phags pa rab tu grub par byed pa las/ thal sbyar mchod yon blos mchod dang/ /cho ga'i yan lag nyid dang bzhi/ /ji ltar rigs pa nye bar sbyad?/
298b5(rgyud 'grel): zhes gsungs la/ /spyod pa'i rgyud kyi dbang du mdzod de/ /rnam par snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pa las/ /mchod pa rnam bzhir shes bya ste/ /phyag 'tshal pa yi thal sbyar dang/ /de bzhin byams dang snying rje dang/ /me tog
298b6(rgyud 'grel): bdug spos 'jig rten pa'i/ /sor mo las byung me tog rnams/ /skyob pa kun la dbul bar bya/ /zhes gsungs so/ /rnal 'byor gyi rgyud dag tu ni/ /mchod pa rab tu mang po bstan te/ /lha mo ku ru kul+li 'byung ba las ni/ /me
298b7(rgyud 'grel): tog la sogs pa mchod pa bco brgyad gsungs so/ /'phags pa de kho na nyid 'dul ba las/ /mchod pa phyi dang nang dang gsang ba dang/ /rab tu gsang ba rnams bstan te/ /de bas na mchod pa rnams ni sgrub pa po'i bsam pa'i
299a1(rgyud 'grel): dbang gis rab tu mang mod kyis/ /'di ni mchod pa dgu yan chad dang bcas pa'o/ /de yang ji skad du bshad pa'i yon chab thogs te/ e hye ti b+ha ga waM ni ha wak+te na sa ya me tsam arg+haM d+hu baM pra tits+tsha maM pU dza ni rdza
299a2(rgyud 'grel): tye pra sid+d+ha me/ A ha rA ha ra sarba birya d+ha ra pU dze te swAhA/ /zhes bya ba 'am/ oM badzra arg+haM pra tits+tsha/ A(rgyud 'grel): hUM zhes pas dbul lo/ /mchod yon ni sgrub pa po'i spyi bor bzung ste dbul lo/ /me tog la sogs pa yang snying kha 'am lte
299a3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i thad kar bzung ste dbul lo/ /de yang dang po phyag bzhi byas la/ /de nas mchod yon dbul te/ /de nas bdug pa dang me tog dang mar me dang dri rnams sarba d+harma swa b+hA wa shud+d+ha zhes bya ba rab tu dag par mos par byas la/
299a4(rgyud 'grel): rab tu mang zhing mchog tu bya ba dang/ ji ltar bsngos pa bzhin du 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir/ oM sarba a pa yi ba sho d+ha ni d+ha ma d+ha ma d+hU pa yaM hUM phaT/ oM sarba durga ti pa ri sho d+ha ni puShpa bi lo ka ni hUM phaT/ oM sarba a pa ya
299a5(rgyud 'grel): bi sho d+ha ni dz+nyA nA lo ka ka ri hUM phaT/ /oM sarba a pa ya ga ti gand+ha sha ni gand+ha baM ti hUM phaT/ zhes bya ba rnams snyim pa zed pa las gyen du 'thor ba dang/ de nyid las the bong gnyis gyen du mnyams nas mdun du 'dzin
299a6(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ de nyid las dung dang 'dra bar byas pa'i phyag rgya rnams bcings te phul bas/ rab tu rgyas par tshim par bsam mo/ /de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa bya ste/ rang gi dam tshig sems dpa' i rnal 'byor
299a7(rgyud 'grel): du rab tu gsal bar byas la/ rdo rje'i gar gyis bya ba rdo rje'i khu tshur gnyis dku g.yas g.yon gnyis su sgeg pa'i tshul gyis bzhag la/ byang chub kyi sems yid la byed cing de la rab tu dga' bas spyi bos g.yon du
299b1(rgyud 'grel): cung zad btud de oM badzra lA sye/ oM badzra satwa su saM gra had/ oM badzra ratna ma nut+tA raM/ badzra d+harma ga ya ne/ badzra karma ka radb+ha be zhes glur blang ngo/ /de nas rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis bdag gi spyi bor phreng ba 'dzin pa'i tshul du
299b2(rgyud 'grel): byas la/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bdag dang sems can thams cad la 'byung bar smon pas/ oM badzra mA le zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod do/ /de nas 'gro ba thams cad la mdo sde zab mo la sogs pa bshad pa 'byung ba
299b3(rgyud 'grel): yid la smon pas/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis rang gi kha nas tshig 'thon pa ltar byas te/ oM badzra gI ti zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod do/ /de nas yang rdo rje gar gyis tshul gyi thal mo spyi bor sbyar te/ 'gro ba la des pa'i tshig
299b4(rgyud 'grel): tu chos ston pa dang/ spyod lam sna tshogs kyis 'gro ba'i don la mkhas par gyur cig ces smon pas/ oM badzra nri tri zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod par bya'o/ /yang na de dag gi phyag rgya bstan pas/ de dag nyid kyis de dag
299b5(rgyud 'grel): nyid la rang rang gi mchod pas mos par bya'o/ /yang na dang po yon chab phul la/ de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa brjod de/ gsang ba'i mchod pa de dag gi yon tan yang/ 'phags pa de kho na nyid bsdus pa las/ rdo rje
299b6(rgyud 'grel): 'joms byas nas kyang/ /rdo rje phreng ba 'ching byed cing/ /de nas rdo rje glu blangs la/ /rdo rje gar gyis mchod byas nas/ /'dod pa'i dga' ba dbang bskur mchod/ /glu dang gar gyi bde ba las/ /bde ba gzhan ni yod min te/
299b7(rgyud 'grel): de phyir gsang mchod 'di bla med/ /ces gsungs pa lta bu'o/ /de nas bdug pa la sogs pas mchod pa yang rung ngo/ /de nas oM badzra ba Ta hUM zhes brjod pas ras phul la snyim pa mdzes pa rab tu brkyang ba'i phyag
300a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyas bshos rnams/ /oM a kA ro zhes bya ba la sogs pas dbul lo/ /sngar bshad pa'i yon chab ni rdo rje thal mo brkyang pa las gung mo gnyis nang du bcug pas dbul lo/ /oM badzra bitbu? ra pu ra a barta ya ho zhes
300a2(rgyud 'grel): 'don cing nam mkha' mdzod kyi phyag rgya bcings la/ rta babs la sogs pa dbul lo/ /gal te mchod pa rnams dngos su ma 'byor na/ de'i tshe mchod pa'i gzugs brnyan rnams gro ga la sogs pa la bris ti/ dngos yin par lhag
300a3(rgyud 'grel): par mos par mchod yon tsam du dbul lo/ /de ltar ni 'phags pa rab tu grub par byed pa las/ che ge mo 'di bzhes shig ces/ rdzas kyi ming nas phyung ste dbul lo/ /ma 'byor na yang gzugs brnyan rnams/ /byas nas
300a4(rgyud 'grel): mchod yon dbul bar bya/ /sngags dang mchod pa phul ba yi/ /cho ga thams cad tshogs par 'gyur zhes gsungs so/ /de bzhin du mchod pa ji ltar 'byor pa tsam/ yid kyi mchod pa dang bcas nas mchod pa yang/ de nyid de
300a5(rgyud 'grel): las rnam pa kun la mkhas pas ni/ /rtag tu ci 'byor pas kyang rung/ /yid kyi mchod pa khyad par can/ /yang dag nyid du brtsam par bya/ /chos kyi thog mar yid 'gro zhes/ /thub pa chen pos bka' stsal to/ /yid ni rab
300a6(rgyud 'grel): tu mnyam gzhag nas/ /cho ga lhag ma bya bar bshad ces gsungs so/ /de nas rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin cing/ mnyam med mi g.yo mnyam nyid mchog gi chos nyid can/ /thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel
300a7(rgyud 'grel): bar mdzad/ /yon tan mdza' yas dngos grub thams cad sbyin mdzad pa/ /dri med mi g.yo mnyam med dag pa'i chos nyid can/ /yon tan shin tu phra ba'i cha la'ang tshad med de/ /dpe ni nam mkha' dang yang bskrun du yod
300b1(rgyud 'grel): ma min?/ /dngos grub mdza' yas mnyam med dpe dang bral ba rnams/ /sems can khams la dngos grub nges par stsol mdzad pa/ /rtag tu dri ma med pa'i thugs rjes shugs las byung/ /smon lam grub pa 'gag pa med pa'i chos nyid can
300b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba'i don bsgrub rab tu brtson pa mdza' yas pa/ /thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid rnam par snang/ tshad med tshad dang bral bar shin tu yongs rdzogs pa'i/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i go 'phang dam pa brnyes gyur dang/ /khams gsum
300b3(rgyud 'grel): rnams la dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad pa yi/ /thugs rje'i spyod pa mi g.yo 'gag par yongs mi 'gyur/ /e ma'o shin tu bzang po'i chos nyid mchog dang ldan/ /mchog sbyin rnams kyi nang na go 'phangs mchog brnyes pa/ /
300b4(rgyud 'grel): khams gsum kun la rtag tu dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad/ /mgon po dus gsum sgrib pa med par rab mkhyen pa/ /dam tshig mchog gsum dngos grub dam pa bdag la stsol/ /zhes glus bstod cing/ nus na 'phags pa de kho
300b5(rgyud 'grel): na nyid 'dus pa'i rtsa ba dang/ phyi ma'i phyi ma'i rgyud nas gsungs pa'i rje btsun rnam par snang mdzad kyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa dbyangs su blangs pas bstod cing mnyes par bya/ /byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje yin na/ rgyud
300b6(rgyud 'grel): 'di nyid las gsungs pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod do/ /de nas yi ge brgya pa brjod do/ /bsgrub pa'i grogs mchog dkyil 'khor du bzhag la/ /phyi rol du gtor ma rab tu rgyas pa 'chad par byed pas sbyin no/ /de nas
300b7(rgyud 'grel): nang du 'ongs pa bdag nyid 'jug pa bstan pa'i phyir/ rdo rje 'dzin mas zhugs nas ni me tog thogs te sgo phyogs 'dug ces gsungs pa yang 'dir drangs te/ sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i phyag rgyas me tog phreng ba bzung bar
301a1(rgyud 'grel): bya ba mdun du bzhag la/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya wak+tsit+ta pra na me na badzra banda na ka ro mi zhes brjod cing/ dkyil 'khor la yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i phyag lan gsum byas la phreng ba de blangs te/ dkyil
301a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lan bdun bskor bas/ yang phyag snga ma ltar byas la/ me tog de bdag po la phul te blangs la/ rang gi spyi bor gdags so/ /de nas po ti'i phyag rgya dang/ a zhes pa stong gis bdag gam gzhan la phab la/ rdo rje
301a3(rgyud 'grel): ye shes thob pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi pho brang dkyil 'khor snying po 'dir/ /bdag gi slob ma gzhug par bgyi zhes bka' nos nas/ bdag dang gzhan nges smin par mdzad par bsams la/ /slob dpon
301a4(rgyud 'grel): du bdag por gyur pa las sdom pa dang dbang ma lus pa blo yis blangs te/ de nas phyag chen las byung de kho na/ 'khor lo 'ang gzugs brnyan dag tu mtshungs/ /oM nam mkha' las byung mtshan ldan phyir thog ma tha ma med
301a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mchog sems dpa' rdo rje che rang bzhin/ /rdo rje sems dpar rab grub mdzod/ /kun mchog dngos grub chen po ste/ /dbang phyug chen pho lhag pa'i lha/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal/ /mi 'gyur mchog tu bdag grub mdzod
301a6(rgyud 'grel): nyes pa mi mnga' rtag pa 'ang khyod/ /'dod chags kun gyi rjes su gnyes/ /'dod chags chen po 'ga' ba che/ /bcom ldan 'das nyin kyis grub mdzod/ /shin tu bdag la kun gyi mchog /gdod nas 'gro ba de bzhin gshegs//
301a7(rgyud 'grel): kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid/ /byang chub sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod/ /dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog /dbang phyug che sogs phyag rgya yis/ /grub pa'i rdo rje cher bstod pas/ /rdo rje bsnyems bdag bdag
301b1(rgyud 'grel): mdzod cig /sems can kun gyi yid khyab cing/ /sems can kun gyi snying la gnas/ /sems can kun gyi pha yin te/ /chags pa'i mchog te dam tshig mchog /thabs shes bdag nyid dkyil 'khor te/ /ye shes yin pa'i bden gang gis/ /bden pa
301b2(rgyud 'grel): 'di yis dkyil 'khor kun/ /gzugs brnyan gsal ba'i slob ma yis/ /skyon dang bral bar kun mthong shog /ces bya ba rnams kyis de kho na nyid bden pa dang dam tshig gsum gyi glu dang yang de kho na dang bden pa sgrags so/ /gal
301b3(rgyud 'grel): te zhag du mar dkyil 'khor gyi las byed pa'i tshe na/ gnas skabs dor dge 'dun la mchod ston gsol ba dang/ chos smra ba mchod par bya ste/ ji skad du rnam par snang mdzad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i rgyud
301b4(rgyud 'grel): las slob ma de bos bsgo ba ni/ bsod nams zhing yin zhes sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ skyobs pa rnams ni kun gyi gsungs/ /rnam dag yon tan rgyas pa yi/ /dge 'dun la ni kun gyi phul/ /dge 'dun la phul 'bras
301b5(rgyud 'grel): bu che/ /skyes bu mkhas pa gang zhig gis/ /dge 'dun la ni yon phul na/ /longs spyod chen po mi bzang pa/ /'jig rten 'thab par skye bar 'gyur/ /de bas thams cad mthun par ni/ /sems la dga' ba bskyed nas su/ /sangs
301b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyas bsngags pa'i dge 'dun la/ /ci nus pas ni mchod ston bya/ /zhes gsungs la bya ba'i rgyud gzhan dag las kyang/ /de nas bla mas ci 'byor pas/ /'phags pa dge 'dun mchod rten gsol/ /yang na bslob ma byed du
301b7(rgyud 'grel): bzhug /gal te mi 'byor par gyur na/ /dge 'dun gyi ni bskos pa yin/ /dge slong dag la mchod ston gsol/ /yang na sangs rgyas mchod pa 'am/ /dge 'dun dag la yon yang dbul zhes gsungs la/ phyogs bzhir
302a1(rgyud 'grel): chos glog bzhi bzhag nas/ de la shar gyi phyogs su ni/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa bzhag /byang gi phyogs su bzhag pa ni/ /gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde yin/ /nub kyi phyogs su gzhag pa ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i mdod
302a2(rgyud 'grel): theg pa chen por sdong por bkod/ /lho yi phyogs su bzhag nas su/ /gus par de dag mchod par bya zhes gsungs te/ /gal te dkyil 'khor gyi las kyi dus tha ma zhag gsum du byed na de dag 'jug pa'i nyi ma snga dro bya'o/ /
302a3(rgyud 'grel): yang na chos bsgrags pas gsungs pa ni/ /phyi'i sa sbyang ba nas bzung ste/ /dkyil 'khor bsdus pa'i bar du bya'o/ /de nas 'og nas 'byung ba ltar slob ma bzhugs par bya'o/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor bsgrub par byas nas gtor
302a4(rgyud 'grel): ma sbyin pa'i phyir/ /'byung po kun gyi gtor ma bya/ /sems can bkres shing bskom la btung ba dang/ /phyogs la gnas pa rnams la rnam par brtag /de yi gtor ma rjes su mthun par bya zhes smos te/ de yang dang po ni bza' ba dang
302a5(rgyud 'grel): btung ba mang pos mi'i 'gro ba ji ltar nus pa tshim bar bya ste/ khyad par du ni khye'u dang bu mo gzhon nu 'khrig pa bsten mi nus pa rnams tshim par bya'o/ /de nas 'byung po kun gyi gtor ma la sogs pa bya ste/ /gtor ma'i tshul ji
302a6(rgyud 'grel): lta bu zhe na/ da ni gtor ma rgyas pa'i cho ga bdag gis 'dir brjod par bya ste/ ji skad du bshad pa'i gtor ma shing rta gang la'ang nyung zad kyang rung ste/ ji ltar 'byor ba'i pha rol tu khyer pa bsgrub pa'i grogs mchog dkyil
302a7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor du bzhag ste/ slob dpon bdag nyid kyis sbyin no/ /dang por bsgrub pa pos 'phags pa bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags lan bdun gyi bsrung ste/ de nas gtor ma der mar me dang me tog dang/ bdug pa dang phyug
302b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'ang ? shos rnams rtsal la lag tu spos thogs te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha dang ? btsugs la yid don la bsdus te tshigs su bcad pa 'di brjod do/ /lha dang lha min gnod sbyin lto 'phye grul/ nam mkha' lding dang 'dab bzang lus bsrul
302b2(rgyud 'grel): po/ dri za srin po gdon gyi rigs rnams dang/ gang dag sa la gnas pa'i rdzu 'phrul can/ /bu smad bcas shing g.yog 'khor bcas rnams la/ /bdag ni pus mo sa la btsugs nas su/ /thal mo sbyar nas khyed la gsol 'debs
302b3(rgyud 'grel): kyi/ /gnas nas phan gdags phyir ni 'dir sbyon cig /'byung po gang dag ri rab steng gnas dang/ /dga' ba'i tshal dang lha'i gnas rnams dang/ /shar nub ri dang nyi zla'i khyim rnams dang/ /ri bo kun la gang dag gnas pa dang/
302b4(rgyud 'grel): chu bo kun dang chu yis mdo rnams dang/ /rin chen gnas na lhag par gang gnas dang/ /mtsho dang rdzing dang steng ka chu dogs dang/ /g.ya' chu gsil ma can na gang gnas dang/ /grong dang phyugs lhas grong khyer stong pa dang/ /khang
302b5(rgyud 'grel): stong dang ni lha yi khang pa dang/ /gtsug lag khang dang mchod rten gnas dag gam/ /dka' thub gnas dang glang chen bres dang ni/ /rgyal po dkor khang dag na gang gnas dang/ /lam srang mdun khang dang ni bzhi mdo dang/ /gang dag lam
302b6(rgyud 'grel): pa che dang shing gcig drung/ /dur khrod chen po nags tshal chen po dang/ /seng+ge dred dang gcan zan gnas dag dang/ /'brog tshan 'jigs su rung bar gang gnas dang/ gang dag gling mchog rnams la gnas pa dang/ /lhun po dur
302b7(rgyud 'grel): khrod dag na gnas pa rnams/ rab tu dgyes shing go bar gyur nas su/ /bstod dang gtor ma mar me gus phul ba/ /'di dag bzhes te btung zhing bsnams su gsol/ /las 'di rnams kyi 'bras bu mchis par mdzod/ /ces brjod la
303a1(rgyud 'grel): gtor te/ de phyogs kyi gtor ma bya'o/ /de yang de ltar gdon la mchod pa byas nas su/ /de dag phyogs skyong rnams la mchod par bya zhes gsungs pas so/ /snga ma ltar pus mo gtsugs te/ spos snod thogs la
303a2(rgyud 'grel): dbang po 'byung po'i gdon dang bcas pa yis/ /gtor ma phul ba 'di dag bzhes su gsol/ /me dang gshin rje srin po chu bdag dang/ /rlung dang lus ngan 'byung po gdon dang bcas/ /steng gi nyi zla tshangs pa chen po dang/ /
303a3(rgyud 'grel): lha rnams kun dang sa yi klu rnams dang/ /ri yi lha dang gnod sbyin tshogs rnams la/ /rab tu dgyes pa yis ni bzhes nas kyang/ /rang rang phyogs su legs par bzhugs nas su/ /rang gi bu smad mdza' bshes gnyen
303a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dun dang/ /nang mi dmag dang dpung bcas thabs gcig tu/ /me tog dri dang byug pa gtor ma bcas/ /'di rnams btung zhing legs par gsol nas kyang/ /bdag gi las 'di 'bras bu mchis par mdzod/ /ces
303a5(rgyud 'grel): pas so/ /de nas bstod pa yang bya ste/ /dbang po rdo rje 'chang ba'i lha/ /lha yi rgyal po gdon gyi bdag /shar phyogs gdon gyi tshogs bcas la/ /mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal/ /me te sreg bya za ba'i lha/ /
303a6(rgyud 'grel): 'byung po'i rgyal po gdon gyi bdag /phyogs mtshams gdon gyi tshogs bcas la/ /mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal/ /gshin rje be con thogs pa'i lha/ /lha yi rgyal po gdon gyi bdag /bdag gi gdon gyi tshogs
303a7(rgyud 'grel): bcas la/ /mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal/ bden dang bral pa legs ldan lha/ /srin po'i rgyal po gdon gyi bdag /sna tshogs gdon gyi tshogs bcas la/ /mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal/ /zhags pa thogs
303b1(rgyud 'grel): pa chu yi lha/ /bden pa bsrung ba gdon gyi bdag /nub phyogs gdon dang bcas pa la/ /mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal/ /rlung te srog kyang 'dzin pa'i lha/ /tshig srung gdon gyi bdag po ste/ /rlung gi gdon gyi tshogs bcas la/ /mchod
303b2(rgyud 'grel): pa bgyid de phyag kyang 'tshal/ /gnod sbyin lag na dbyug tho thogs/ /nor srung gdon gyi bdag po ste/ byang phyogs gdon dang bcas pa la/ /mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal/ /dbang dang ldan pa 'dren pa'i lha/ /bgegs kyi rgyal
303b3(rgyud 'grel): po gdon gyi bdag /dbang ldan phyogs kyi gdon bcas la/ /mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal/ /'og gi klu ste sa yi lha/ /sa 'dzin lag pa chen po ste/ /dam tshig shes pa'i gdon bcas la/ /mchod pa bgyid cing phyag
303b4(rgyud 'grel): kyang 'tshal/ /steng gi lha tshogs thams cad kyang/ /zla ba nyi ma bza' chen po/ /gza' skar rgyu skar thams cad la/ /mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal zhes so/ /de ltar gtor ma phul ba'i yon tan ni 'phangs pa dpung
303b5(rgyud 'grel): bzangs kyis zhus pa'i rgyud las/ /de ltar gang zhig mtshan mo rgyu ba las/ /gtor ma gtong ba'i las rnams byed pa de/ /dngos grub shin tu myur zhing bgegs kyang med/ /yid du 'ong ba'i 'dod pa'ang thob par 'gyur zhes
303b6(rgyud 'grel): gsungs so/ de nas gtor ma de dag rang rang gi phyogs su gtor te/ spos chu lag pa g.yon pa'i mthil du blugs la mig gi bltas te/ bdud rtsi 'khyil pas lan bdun bzlas pas/ /rang gi spyi bor blugs pas bsrangs
303b7(rgyud 'grel): te/ dkyil 'khor gang dro bar bya'o/ /yang na tshul 'dis gtor ma sbyin te/ /de nas phyi rol byung nas su/ /mnyam par bzhag pas gtor ma sbyin/ /'bras yos til dang chur bcas shing/ /'bras chan dang ni me tog bcas
304a1(rgyud 'grel): sran chen dag kyang mang du blug /snum dang lo ma dag dang bcas/ /de ltar slob ma slob dpon gyis/ /lag pa gnyis kyis blangs nas su/ /dga' zhing phyogs rnams kun tu gtor/ /bdug spos mchod yon
304a2(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa sbyin/ /dang por dbang ldan phyogs song nas/ /cho ga bzhin du gtor ma bya/ /dbang dang ldan pa gzhu can ni/ /tshogs dang bcas la sbyin par bya/ /de nas dbang po'i tshogs bcas la/ /gsang sngags shes pas sbyin par bya/ /
304a3(rgyud 'grel): sngags pa gtor ma la mkhas pas/ /me yi phyogs su gtor ma sbyin/ /de nas gshin rje'i phyogs dag tu/ /sngags pa mkhas pas sbyin par bya/ /de nas bden bral tshogs bcas la/ /gsang sngags shes pas sbyin par bya
304a4(rgyud 'grel): chu yi phyogs su klu rnams ni/ /bdag por bcas la de bzhin du/ /btsun 'di'i gnas la gnas pa yi/ /sngags rig pas ni tshul bzhin sbyin/ /de nas rlung gi phyogs song nas/ /rlung gi phyogs dang bcas pa la/ /rang gi
304a5(rgyud 'grel): ming nas smos nas su/ /sngags pas gtor ma sbyin par bya/ /byang gi phyogs su song nas ni/ /dngos grub dam pa 'dod byas la/ /yid ni rab tu dang byas la/ /gnod sbyin rnams la gtor ma sbyin/ /srin po rnams dang
304a6(rgyud 'grel): sha za dang/ /'byung po sha rjen za ba dang/ /sems can rnam pa sna tshogs la/ /mkhas pas gtor ma gtor bar bya/ /blo la gang dang gang dran pa/ /de na gnas pa'i sems can ni/ /ljon shing gel pa la gnas pa/ /de
304a7(rgyud 'grel): dang de la rab tu sbyin/ /dbang ldan gyi phyogs su ru tra ye swa hA/ /dbang po'i phyogs su Sha kra ye swA hA/ /me'i phyogs su agna ye swAhA/ /gshin rje'i phyogs su ba'i bai ba swa ta ye swAhA/ /srin po'i phyogs su rak+Sha sA d+hi ba ta ye
304b1(rgyud 'grel): swA hA/ chu'i phyogs su me ka ra shan ye swA hA/ /rlung gi phyogs su ba ya be swA hA/ /lus ngan gyi phyogs su yak+Sha pirya d+ha rA ya swA hA/ /srin po rnams la kraM ka re swA hA/ /sha za rnams la mi tsi mi tsi swA hA/ /'byung po rnams la gung gung swA hA/ /kun
304b2(rgyud 'grel): tu gtor ma byin nas ni/ /lag pa legs par bkrus nas su/ /nye reg tshul bzhin byas nas ni/ /de nas nang du 'jug par bya zhes so/ /yang na 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma phyi rol tu khyed la/ /oM a kA ro mu khaM/
304b3(rgyud 'grel): sarba d+harmA NAM/ adyA nutpan+na twAt oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT swAhA/ zhes sgra chen po lan gsum brjod la/ /'gro ba thams cad la bsngos te gtor ro/ /yang na lugs 'dis gtor ma sbyin te/ dang por maN+Dal zlum po khru gang yan chad bcu
304b4(rgyud 'grel): phyogs brgyad du byed du bcug la/ /maN+Dal re re'i steng du gtor ma sngar bshams pa bzhag la/ /de nas dang por spyan drangs te/ /de nas dam tshig bstan cing mchod yon phul te/ /dri dang me tog dang bdug pa dang/ mar me
304b5(rgyud 'grel): dang bdug pa phul la/ /a kA ro zhes bya ba la sogs pas shar phyogs nas brtsams te/ gsum gtor la yang mchod yon la sogs pa phul te slar gtang ngo/ /de la sngags dang phyag rgya 'di rnams yin te/ shar phyogs su kha
304b6(rgyud 'grel): bltas te/ rkang pa g.yas pa rkyang ba'i tshul gyis 'dug nas/ /lag pa g.yon pa'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya la g.yas pa'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya rta zur logs su bzhag ste/ g.yas pa'i mdzub mo lcags kyus mdrang ba ni/ /brgya byin spyan drang
304b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /de la mdzub mo lcags kyur ma byas pa ni/ brgya byin gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /rkang pa g.yon pa brkyang ba'i tshul gyis 'dug la/ /spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las/ mdzub mo brkyang ba ni slar btang ba'i
305a1(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya'o/ /de nas 'di'i sngags ni na mo badzra sa tsa di shi badzra pA Ni rak+Sha rak+Sha swAhA/ me'i phyogs su kha bltas nas/ lag pa g.yas pa'i mdzub mo zlum por bkug nas/ gung mo'i tshigs gsum par btsugs la/
305a2(rgyud 'grel): mthe bong lag mthil tu bzhag pa ni me lha spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /dgug pa'i phyag rgya las mthe bong ngos la mdzub mo btsugs pa ni me'i lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /phyag rgya de nyid la mdzub mo mthe bo'i ngos
305a3(rgyud 'grel): la btsugs te phyir brag tu brkyang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /de'i sngags ni agna ye ha ka pa li dzwa la dzwa la/ da ha ni khi tho li bi ru pAk+Sha swAhA/ gshin rje'i phyogs su bltas nas/ snyim pa mdun du bzhag ste/
305a4(rgyud 'grel): sor mo phan tshun bsnol la/ khu tshur bcangs nas srin lag gnyis bsgrengs te bshibs la g.yabs te/ nang du bzhugs pa ni gshin rje dgug pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /srin lag gnyis phyi rol tu shin tu bshibs
305a5(rgyud 'grel): te/ bsgrengs la snying khar bzhag pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /'di gnyis las srin lag sbyar ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /sngags ni sa ma ya swAhA/ /bden bral gyi phyogs su rkang pa mnyam par 'dug la/ lag pa
305a6(rgyud 'grel): g.yas kyi khu tshur bcings pa las/ mdzub mo dang gung mo ral gri 'dra bar bshibs la bsgrengs te bzhag /lag pa g.yon pa 'ang de ltar byas te/ sta zur phyogs su bzhag la/ g.yon pa'i mdzub mo bkug ste/ g.yas
305a7(rgyud 'grel): pa ni bden bral dgug pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /phyag rgya de nyid las lag pa g.yon pa sta zur phyogs su ral gri 'dra bar bzhag pa ni bden bral gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /dgug pa'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo brkyang ba
305b1(rgyud 'grel): ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /sngags ni sarba b+hud+da ba ya kA ya ku ru swAhA/ chu lha'i phyogs su rkang pa mnyam pas 'dug la/ lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs la the bo dang/ mdzub mo gcig tu sbyar la zhags mig ltar
305b2(rgyud 'grel): byas te g.yon pa'i khu tshur yang de ltar byas la snying khar bzhag ste/ g.yon pa'i mdzub mo lcags kyu 'dra bar byas pa ni dgug pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /phyag rgya de nyid la g.yon pa'i mdzub mo khu tshur gyi tshul du bzhag pa
305b3(rgyud 'grel): las/ zhags mig ltar byas pa ni chu lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /g.yon pa'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo slar btang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o// //sngags ni ti ti ba ti/ ti ti shi khi tu li pi ru pAk+ShA ya swAhA/ rlung lha'i phyogs
305b4(rgyud 'grel): su bltas te 'dug la/ lag pa g.yon pa khu tshur bcangs te/ gung mo bsgreng ba'i tshigs dang mdzub mo bsgreng ba'i thor tho btsugs la lag pa g.yas pa de bzhin du byas te sta zur logs su bzhag cing mthe
305b5(rgyud 'grel): bos bsgul ba ni rlung lha spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las mthe bong snga ma bzhin du bzhag pa ni rlung lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mthe bong brkyang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o//
305b6(rgyud 'grel): sngags ni oM swa sa kha kha kha khu khu khu swAhA/ lus ngan la mngon du bltas te 'dug nas lag pa gnyis thal mo sbyar la/ /rdo rje bcing ba nang du bzlog ste/ mthe'u chung gnyis bshibs la brkyang/ de'i rgyab tu srin lag gnyis
305b7(rgyud 'grel): so sor bzhag nas/ gung mo gnyis su de ltar bkug te g.yab pa ni lus ngan spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /phyag rgya de nyid las gung mo gnyis nang du rdo rje bcing ba'i tshul du bzhag pa ni lus ngan gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o
306a1(rgyud 'grel): 'gugs pa'i phyag rgya las gung mo gnyis brkyang ba na slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /sngags ni oM ku bai rA ya swAhA/ dbang ldan gyi phyogs su bltas te 'dug la lag pa thal mo gcig tu sbyar ba byas la/ srin
306a2(rgyud 'grel): lag dang mthe bong chung nang du bkug ste bsnol/ gung mo bshibs te bsgreng ba'i rgyab logs su mdzub mo gnyis rdo rje 'dra bar bya/ mthe bong gnyis bar du bshibs te bzhag la/ de nyid la mdzub mo gnyis phan tshun rtse mo sprad
306a3(rgyud 'grel): nas nang du g.yab pa ni/ dbang ldan dgug pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las snga ma ltar mdzub mo rdo rje'i tshul du bzhag pa ni/ dbang ldan gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /dgug pa'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo brkyang ba ni slar
306a4(rgyud 'grel): btang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /sngags ni dzruM dzruM shi ba swAhA/ g.yon brkyang ba'i gnas pas 'dug pas/ lag pa thal mo khong stong du sbyar te bzhag la/ steng du bltas te mdzub mo gnyis kyi lcags kyus/ tshangs pa la sogs
306a5(rgyud 'grel): la dgug par bya'o/ /de nyid las snga ma ltar bzhag pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /dgug pa'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /sngags ni 'di yin te/ a darya pra hma Ne swA
306a6(rgyud 'grel): hA/ surya? gra hA d+hi pa ta ye swAhA/ tsan+d+ra ya nak+Sha ta/ a d+hi pa ta ye swAhA/ rkang pa mnyam par bzhag pas 'dug la/ /lag pa gnyis gcig tu sbyar te/ sor mo rnams bar mtshams med par rtse mor phan tshun sbyar te/
306a7(rgyud 'grel): mthe bo zlum por byas la 'og tu bltas te sa'i lha mo la sogs pa mdzub mo lcags kyu lta bur bkug pa ni/ 'og gi lha dgug pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /dgug pa'i phyag rgya las snga ma bzhin du mdzub mo bzhag ba ni/
