306b1(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /mdzub mo gnyis btang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /sngags ni a d+hi pa ti b+hya swAhA/ a su re b+hya swAhA/ nA ge b+hya swAhA/ de nas rang re'i sngags de dag nyid kyis 'thor 'thung phul la/ bdag dang slob ma'i tshogs su
306b2(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa la/ bgegs med par mdzod cig las dang dngos grub rnams bdag cag la stsol cig ces brjod cing slar gtang ngo/ /de ltar bdag gi rgya cher bkod pa'i gtor ma 'di dag ni gang dga' bas slob ma dbang skur ba dang/
306b3(rgyud 'grel): ro? yongs su sbyang ba la sogs pa'i tshe sbyin no/ /de nas sngags pas bla med byang chub kyi gnas su slob ma yongs su smin par bya zhes bya ba la sogs ba/ slob ma sta gon la gnas pa ston te/ de? nas zhes bya ba ni don gyi na bum pa sta
306b4(rgyud 'grel): gon la gnas ma thag tu 'am/ slob ma smin par bya ba'i dbang du byas pa zhes so/ /sngags pas zhes bya ba ni mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i slob dpon gyis so/ /bla na med byang chub ces bya ba ni mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'o//
306b5(rgyud 'grel): de nyid 'khor ba ji srid du gnas par bya bas na gnas su'o/ /slob ma zhes bya ba ni bla ma la gus pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'o/ /sbyin par bya zhes pa ni dngos grub kyi myu gu 'byin nus pa bya zhes pa'o/ /ji ltar bya zhes na/ 'gro la
306b6(rgyud 'grel): phan phyir myur du byang chub par/ de dag byang chub sems mchog phyed du bzhug ces smos so/ /slob ma sta gon la gnas par bya ba ni/ 'phags pa dkyil 'khor spyi'i bya ba las kyang/ des na slob ma lags brtags nas/ /sta
306b7(rgyud 'grel): gon gnas pas tshul bzhin du/ /de yi nub mo gcig nus bar/ /de bzhin sdom pa 'dzin du 'jug /gtsang ma'i gos dkar bsgos pa yis/ /slob ma de lta bu dag ni/ /shar phyogs kha bltas 'khod ba la/ /sta gon gnas pa
307a1(rgyud 'grel): brtsom par bya/ /dang por gsum la skyabs su btang/ /de nas bla mas byang chub sems/ /ma skyed pa ni bskyed par bya/ /bskyed pa dag kyang dran par bya/ /zhes gsungs pas so/ /de la 'di slob ma sta gon la gnas pa'i
307a2(rgyud 'grel): rim pa rgyas par 'di yin te/ dang por slob ma legs par brtags pa bsmyur ba la gnas pa/ rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams dkyil 'khor gyi gnas su shar du blta bar rgan pa'i rim gyis dgod de lag na me tog thogs pa rnams
307a3(rgyud 'grel): la slob dpon gyis chos bstan te/ de ltar yang yid dga' spro che byas pa gzo/ /ngar 'dzin mi 'byed rigs mtho zhing/ /yon tan dang ldan dad dang bcas/ /gzugs dang kha dog lang tshor ldan/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i gsang
307a4(rgyud 'grel): ba ni/ /sgrub pa don gnyer mngon brtson pa 'am/ /gzugs ngan yon tan med pa 'am/ /dman pa 'am ni lhag par bya/ /rang gi bslab dang legs ldan zhing/ /theg chen la dga' i bdag nyid can/ /'khor ni rnam pa bzhi car
307a5(rgyud 'grel): la 'ang/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga rjes su gnang/ /kha cig gsang sngags bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /'di ni dkyil 'khor 'jug par byed/ /bsod nams 'dod pa de las gzhan/ /'jig rten pha rol don gnyer gzhan/ /'jig rten pha rol
307a6(rgyud 'grel): gnyer pa yi/ /dad pa mang du byed pa 'di/ /blo ldan dkyil 'khor 'jug par bya'i/ /'di yi 'bras bu 'dod pas min/ /'di la 'dod par gyur pa yis/ /'jig rten pha rol don mi 'gyur/ /'jig rten pha rol don gnyer ba'i
307a7(rgyud 'grel): skyes bu de yi 'bras bu rgyas zhes so/ /de nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ci nus kyis bshad do/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis slob ma la dbang bcu gsum bskur la/ de dag slob ma'i lus la
307b1(rgyud 'grel): bsdu'o?/ /de nas slob ma rnams kyis bla ma'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas/ /slob dpon khyod ni bdag la dgongs/ /byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa/ /mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo/ /dam tshig de nyid bdag la
307b2(rgyud 'grel): stsol/ /byang chub sems ni bdag la stsol/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ skyabs gsum de ni bdag la stsol/ /thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu/ mgon po bdag ni 'jug par 'tshal/ /zhes lan gsum gsol ba gdab par
307b3(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /de nas slob ma gcig tsog tsog bur byas te/ de'i ming nas brjod la thams cad gzengs bstod par bya ste/ /khyod ni tshul chen snod yin te/ bu tshur theg pa chen po yis/ /gsang sngags spyod tshul cho ga ni/ /khyod la
307b4(rgyud 'grel): yang dag de bstan bya/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang 'das dang/ /de bzhin gang dag ma byon dang/ /da ltar byung ba'i mgon po rnams/ /'gro la phan phyir bzhugs so pa dag /de dag kun gyi gsang sngags kyi/ /cho ga mchog
307b5(rgyud 'grel): bzang 'di mkhyen nas/ /dpa' bo byang chub shing drung du/ /thams cad mkhyen pa mtshan med brnyes/ /gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam med de/ /shAkya seng+ge skyob pa yis/ /bdud sde shin tu mi bzad pa/ /dpung chen dag kyang de yis
307b6(rgyud 'grel): bcom/ /'jig rten mthun 'jug thugs chud nas/ /'khor lo bskor te mya ngan 'das/ /de pas kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir/ /bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig /ces pa dang/ gzhan rab tu rgya chen brjod de/ /snying rjer gyur
307b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i yid kyis ni/ /de ltar lan mang gzengs bstod de/ /zhes gsungs pas so/ /de nas slob ma rnams kyis 'khor gyi lha rnams la phyag 'tshal ba la yan lag bdun byas la/ ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams/
308a1(rgyud 'grel): byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i/ /bla na med pa'i byang chub sems/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi/ /ma bsgral ba ni bsgral bar bgyi/ /ma grol ba ni grol bar bgyi/ /dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung zhing/ /sems
308a2(rgyud 'grel): can mya ngan 'das la 'god/ /ces lan gsum brjod do/ /'di ni 'gro la phan phyir myur du byang chub par/ /de dag byang chub sems mchog bskyed du bzhug /ces bya'o/ /de nas dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi//
308a3(rgyud 'grel): sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags/ /'gro ba'i dge la rje yi rang/ /sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyi bzung zhes lan gsum brjod do/ /'di ni byang chub smon lam gdab/ /ces bya ba dang/ brtul zhugs gnas zhes bya'o/ /
308a4(rgyud 'grel): de nas dbral ba dang mgrin pa dang/ snying khar thal mo sbyar bas/ slob ma'i gnas de gsum du bzhag la/ /oM bri da brid sarbA ba ra Na ni hUM phaT/ oM tra ta tra ta sarbA ba ra Na ni hUM phaT/ oM tshinda tshinda sarbA ba ra Na ni hUM phaT
308a5(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba'i rim pa sbyar te lan bdun brjod la/ rdo rjes kyang reg par byas la me tog dang/ 'bras bu dang dri dang mar me dang/ spyi bo dang mdun du rang re'i sngags kyis sbyin/ de nas byin gyis brlab ces bya'o/ /de nas
308a6(rgyud 'grel): so shing dor ba dang dri chu sbyin te/ ji skad du so shing u dum ba ra dang/ /a shwat+tha ni rma med pa/ /ha cang mi phra mi sbom zhing/ /sor grangs bcu gnyis tshad du byas/ /spos kyi chus ni legs par bkru/ skrud pa dag gis
308a7(rgyud 'grel): rnam par dkris/ /spos kyis bkru shing bdug pas bdug /lag pas bran zhing 'das pa ni/ /rigs kyi snying po mang du bzlas/ /yang na lan bdun bzlas par bya/ /slob ma rnams kyi grangs las ni so shing la sogs brtsams
308b1(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /so shing mig zhabs gcig byas nas/ /rtse mo nas ni bca' bar bya/ /de nas bdag dang slob ma dang/ /gnas bsrung ba yang brtan byas nas/ /lha rnams thams cad legs mchod de/ /zhes ba dang yang gsungs pa/ /slob ma mthun zhing
308b2(rgyud 'grel): tshogs pa rnams/ byang phyogs su ni kha bltas shing/ /thal mo sbyar te 'khod pa la/ /so shing go rim bzhin du sbyin/ /slob ma shar du kha bltas te/ /mi smra bar ni so shing bca' / /bca' ba zin nas mi dga' zhing/ /phan tshun du yang mi dor ro/ /so
308b3(rgyud 'grel): shing mdun du drang por dor ro/ /de tshe bdag la blta ba dang/ rtse mo gyen du bsgreng gyur na/ /des ni dngos grub mchog ces bya/ /de bzhin shar du bltas na ni/ /de yi dngos grub 'bring du bshad/ /mtshams dang byang du kha bltas na/ /'jig
308b4(rgyud 'grel): rten gyi ni rig sngags grub/ /so shing bor ba brgya zhig la/ /gal te thur du kha bltas na/ /des ni nges par sa 'og gi /dngos grub thob par gdon mi za/ /zhes te gal te ba lang ko ba tsam du lan gsum ma babs na/ /de la dbang
308b5(rgyud 'grel): ni mi bskur ro/ /slob ma nye rig byas nas ni/ /snga ma bzhin du 'khod pa la/ /las kun byed pa'i gsang sngags kyis/ /spos chu bla mas blud pa ni/ /re re la yang blud pa yi/ /khyod par blugs la lan gsum blud/ /der ni 'thungs nas langs
308b6(rgyud 'grel): nas ni/ /phyi rol du ni kha bkru bya zhes te/ 'dir ni oM h+ri su baM shud+d+ha d+harma sarba pA pa ni bi sho d+ha ya swAhA/ sarba bi kAwa na ya hUM zhes pa'i sngags/ /de nas bdud rtsi 'khyil ba bzlas ku sha bstan dang sngas su byin la/ /de bzlas pa'i srad bu mdud pa bdun bdun bor
308b7(rgyud 'grel): dpung pa g.yas par gdags so/ /de nas 'phags pa sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/ ku sha lag tu btang nas su/ /g.yas su skud pa bcings nas su zhes gsungs pa ste/ der ba bca' ba byas nas ni zhes smos pa'o/ /de nas rdo rje sems dpa' i snying po yi ge
309a1(rgyud 'grel): brgya pa lan mang du bzlas nas de dag brtan par bya'o/ /de nas chos bshad par bya ste/ zab cing rgya che'i chos bsgrags la/ zhes gsungs pa'o/ /'di lta ste kun mkhyen rnams ni 'jig rten du/ /'byung 'gyur yang ni mi 'byung
309a2(rgyud 'grel): ngo/ /gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul 'byung ba/ /de bas kyang ni dkon pa ste/ /gang gi mnyam med sems can don/ /mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus/ /bskal pa bye ba du ma ru/ /sdig pa gyis par gyur pa gang/ /de kun dkyil 'khor
309a3(rgyud 'grel): 'di 'dra ba/ /mthong bas 'byad bar 'gyur lags na/ /grags pa mdza' yas sngags spyod pa'i/ /tshul la gnas na smos ci 'tshal/ /skyobs pa'i gsang sngags bzlas na ni/ /go 'phang bla na med par 'gyur/ /gang dag spyad pa
309a4(rgyud 'grel): mchog 'di la/ /bla gres shin tu mi g.yo ba// //'di dag gi ni ngan 'gro'i rgyun/ /sdug bsngal kun 'byung rab tu spyad/ /bdag nyid chen po khyed rnams kyis/ /rnyed pa mnyam pa de de ring rnyed/ /gang
309a5(rgyud 'grel): phyir rgyal ba sras bcas pa/ /bdag nyid chen po kun gyis ni/ /bstan pa 'di la khyed rnams kun/ /yongs su bzung ste skye bzhin pa/ /de phyir khyed rnams theg chen la/ /sang ni rab tu sgye bar 'gyur/ /theg pa chen po cher
309a6(rgyud 'grel): byung ba'i/ /lam mchog 'di ni dpal dang ldan/ /khyed rnams der ni dong bas na/ /rang 'byung skal pa chen po pa/ /'jig rten thams cad mkhyen pa yi/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams su 'gyur/ /yod dang med las rnam
309a7(rgyud 'grel): par 'das/ /nam mkha' bzhin du dri ma med/ /zab mo rtog ge thams cad kyis/ /rab tu me tog gnas med par/ /spros pa kun dang bral ba ste/ /spros pa rnams kyis ma spros pa/ /las dang bya ba la sogs bral/ /bden
309b1(rgyud 'grel): pa gnyis la gnas pa yi/ /theg pa rab kyi mchog 'di ni/ /tshul la gnas na thob par 'gyur zhes so/ /de nas slob ma slob dpon du 'os pas/ /bla ma'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ /gtso bo bdag la sdom pa stsol ces bya ba'i bar
309b2(rgyud 'grel): du khyad par gyi sdom pa gsol ba btab la/ /slob dpon gyis de rnams la rmi lam ji ltar mthong ba nga la nad par bzlos shig ces brjod do/ /de nas rmi lam gyi mtshan nyid ni 'dod chags bral dang ldan pa'i chos/ /slob ma
309b3(rgyud 'grel): rnams la bshad nas ni/ /ku sha bting ba'i sa la ni/ /shar phyogs kha bltas nyal du gzhug /de nas nang bar nam langs nas/ rmi lam ci mthong dri bar bya/ /mthong na bzang ngam mi bzang ngam/ /the tshom med par
309b4(rgyud 'grel): bshad par bya/ /rmi lam rgyas pa mthong na ni/ /yon tan brgya mtsho mngon sum bzhin/ /mchod rten dang ni sku gzugs mthong/ /de la mchod pa rtsom pa dang/ /dge slong dag la chos nyan tam/ /yang na gzhan la nyan kyang rung/ /chos ni rnam
309b5(rgyud 'grel): par spyod pa dang/ /de bzhin glegs bam klog pa dang/ /rmi lam dge 'dun mthong ba dang/ /yang na dge slong gcig pu mthong/ /de dang 'grogs shing gtam zer dang/ /yang na dge slong dngos por gyur/ /gtsug lag khang dag mthong
309b6(rgyud 'grel): ba dang/ /de bzhin dge slong ma dag mthong/ /rgyal ba'i sras rnams mthong ba dang/ /de bzhin pha ma bla ma dang/ /mdza' bo dang ni sna tshogs dang/ /rmi lam dag tu mthong na ni/ /rigs rnams dang ni dngos grub thob/ /de bzhin slab
309b7(rgyud 'grel): pa 'dzin pa dang/ /kun dga' rnam pa sna tshogs dang/ /'bab chu rnams dang rgya mtsho dang/ /ri dang glang po che dag kyang/ /mthong na yang ni bzang bar bsgrags/ /rgyal mdog dang ni mthong na shis/ /bde gshegs spyod dang
310a1(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa yi/ /dka' thub dang ni bram ze dang/ /phyug po skyes bu dam pa dang/ /ba lang rta dang glang po dang/ /seng+ge dang ni ri dags dang/ /rmi lam du ni mthong na shis/ /bkra shis pa'i bya rnams dang/ /gser dag dang
310a2(rgyud 'grel): ni gter rnams dang/ /rin po che dang dngul rnams dang/ /nor ni rnam pa sna tshogs dang/ /mdor na 'byung khungs rnam pa dang/ mtshon cha rnams dang 'bru rnams dang/ /'bras bu rnams dang me tog dang/ /rgyan ni rnam pa
310a3(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs dang/ kha zas dang ni gos rnams dang/ /byis pa dang ni gzhon nu dang/ /bud med gzugs ni bzang po dag /rmi lam du ni mthong ba bzang/ /yang na thob cing reg pa smra/ /rmi lam na ni dbang bskur dang/ /rgyal por
310a4(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa'i 'byor pa dang/ /dmag dpon du ni gyur pa dang/ /g.yul las rgyal zhing dgra gsod dang/ /gnyen dang lhan cig 'grogs pa dang/ /lha rnams kyang ni mthong ba dang/ /theg pa dang ni shing rta zhon/ /de bzhin ri
310a5(rgyud 'grel): dang khang thogs 'dzag /ngo mtshar rnam pa sna tshogs kyang/ /rmi lam na ni mthong na dge /yam shing me la sbyin sreg byed/ /bya ba bzang po dag la 'bad/ /chu la rkyal zhing ro la rgal/ /rkun po dag ni tshar gcod dang//
310a6(rgyud 'grel): stobs 'gyed pa las rgyal ba dang/ /gyang stangs rdob cing 'gying pa dang/ /rtsed mo sna tshogs rmi ba dang/ /de bzhin mthu rtsal gzi byin che/ /bkra shis rnams ni thams cad kyang/ /mthong na rab tu dge bar bshad/ /gsang
310a7(rgyud 'grel): sngags cho ga nyan pa dang/ /dga' ston dge pa mthong ba dang/ /bsgrub la brtson zhing sngags pa dang/ /sgrub pa po rnams mthong ba dang/ /de la sogs pa'i ltas rnams ni/ /dge ba rnam pa du ma dag /blo yi rnam par
310b1(rgyud 'grel): spyad nas ni/ /da nas zlog pa spang bar bya/ /de dag yi ni lha rnams ni/ /rab dang 'bring dang tha ma la/ /dge ba rnams ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /mi dge ba ni mi 'grub bo/ /mi dge ba dag shes nas su/ /de dag mkhas pas spang bar bya/ /gsang sngags
310b2(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub gsum 'grub pa/ /rab dang 'bring dang tha ma'o/ /mi dge ba la zhi ba yi/ /sbyin sreg zhi ba'i gsang sngags kyis/ /ba yi mar las brgya rtsa brgyad/ /cho ga bzhin du zhib par bya/ /zhes gsungs pa ste/ de ltar rmi lam bshad nas  
310b3(rgyud 'grel): de'i 'og tu bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad kyis de dag bsrung ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi mthar thams cad nyal bar bya ba ni/ /tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la mi bya bar glo g.yas pa phab ste'o/ /de nas nad par rmi lam
310b4(rgyud 'grel): gyi tshul shes par bya ste/ 'dod pa'i rgyal pos/ dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su phyogs skyong ba rnams bkug te/ oM badzra kI li zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags kyi phur pas gdab bo/ /'dis don gyi grangs pa'i sta gon la
310b5(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa gzhan ni re shig dang po nyi ma shar ba'i dus su/ /dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su dri zhim pas maN+Dal khru gang chad pa byas la/ sngon bzhin du sa'i lha la mchod pa dang tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis gsol ba btab
310b6(rgyud 'grel): la/ sa'i lha de nyid du yang thim par bya'o/ /de nas rtsa ba'i lha rnams kyi nang du dri zhim pa'i thig le byas la/ /der lha rnams bstim ste mchod pa dang bstod pa dang/ bskor ba byas la gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /ji skad du sa gzhi steng du
310b7(rgyud 'grel): byug spos kyis/ dkyil 'khor sor grangs bcu gnyis bya/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni rigs sngags kyis/ /lag pas grab cing lan bdun bzlas/ /de nas gtso bo'i lha rnams ni/ /ming gis yid la bsams nas su/ /byug spos me tog
311a1(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pas/ /snying po ci rigs mchod par bya/ /lha bshos dag kyang dbul bar bya/ bdug spos mngon par sngags pa 'ang dbul/ /der ni mchod pa yang byas nas/ /bdug spos lag tu thogs Fnas ni/ /blo gros can
311a2(rgyud 'grel): gyis lha rnams la/ /gus par gsol ba gdab par bya/ /gang gi dkyil 'khor yin pa'i sngags/ /de la thogs mar gdags par gsol/ /de yi go rims sbyar ba yis/ /lha rnams kun la gdags par gsol/ /'di zhes
311a3(rgyud 'grel): bya ba bcom ldan 'das/ /rigs lnga rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag ni brtse bar gyur nas su/ /slob ma rnams la rtse ba dang/ /khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir/ /sang ni dkyil 'khor bri bar 'tshal/ /bcom ldan
311a4(rgyud 'grel): bdag ni gus pa la de bas snang ba mdzad pa'i rigs sangs rgyas mgon po brtse ldan pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' dgra bcom dang/ /gang yang gsang sngags lha rnams dang/ /'jig rten skyong ba'i lha rnams dang/ /gang
311a5(rgyud 'grel): yang 'byung po mthu chen dang/ /gang yang lha'i spyan mnga' ba'i/ /sems can bstan la dga' ba rnams/ /bdag la dgongs pa mdzad du gsol/ /bdag gi ming ni 'di zhes bya/ /sangs ni gdugs la dkyil 'khor ni/ /
311a6(rgyud 'grel): bzang po ming ni 'di zhes bgyi/ /yo byad ci yod pas 'bri na/ /bdag dang slob mar bcas pa la/ /thugs ni brtse bas dgongs nas su/ /tshogs pa thams cad dkyil 'khor du/ /byin gyis brlab pa mdzad du gsol//
311a7(rgyud 'grel): de skad lan gsum brjod nas ni/ /bsam pa thag pas phyag byas nas/ /bstod pa'i tshig kyang brjod nas su/ /de nas slar ni gshegs su gsol/ /zhes gsungs pa lta bur bya'o/ /de nas bum pa rnams sngon du bstan
311b1(rgyud 'grel): par ltar ram/ /yang na 'di dag ni rang gi sems snang ba tsam mo zhes smos pas/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la rang rang yi ge las mtshan pa dang de las skur grub cing/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bzhugs nas/ bum par gyur par byas
311b2(rgyud 'grel): la/ grangs dang po'i mtshan ma dang 'grel bar bzhag pa 'ang rung ste/ bum pa ni rab tu ma rnyed na/ rnam par rgyal ba dang las thams cad ba gnyis kyis byas la/ rnam par rgyal ba yang 'dir lha thams cad kyi bdag nyid yin la/ rdo rje sems
311b3(rgyud 'grel): dpa' gnas bzhag go /de la kha cig na re rnal 'byor gyi rgyud du ni sa'i lha sta gon la gnas pa med do/ /zer te/ 'di ni bla ma'i lung tha dad pas nges pa med do/ /sta gon gnas pa'i cho ga'o/ /da ni sdom gnas zhes bya ba la sogs pa
311b4(rgyud 'grel): slob ma 'jug pa ston te/ sdom ni 'dir thun mong gi sdom pa la gnas pa ste/ khyad par gyi sdom pa ni/ gdod dbog par bya ba yin pas so/ /de yang legs par sta gon la gnas pa'i slob ma de dag dkyil 'khor chen por bzhugs
311b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i tshul ni/ sta gon la gnas pa'i phyi de nang par dri'i thig le'i lha rnams la mchod pa dgus mchod nas/ /nam mkha' la bteg la sngar bshad pa ltar nang dang phyi'i thig btab la/ tshon bkye ste khrus byas la dkyil 'khor gyi
311b6(rgyud 'grel): yo byad bkod nas/ bum par bcug ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub pa byas la/ sngon bzhin du phyi rol tu gtor ma sbyin te/ nang du bdag nyid zhugs la/ de nas yol bas bcad pas/ slob ma re re nas pos la/ /'jug pa'i rim pa bya ste/
311b7(rgyud 'grel): bla mas slob ma gcig pu ni dkyil 'khor dag tu dbang bskur bya/ mkhas pas cig char slob ma gnyis dbang bskur bar ni yongs mi bya/ /gnyis sam gsum mam bzhi yang rung/ /thams cad so sor bya ba ni/ /yo byad sngags?
312a1(rgyud 'grel): pa gzhan rnams kyis/ /dbang bskur ba yi bla mas bya/ /rigs sngags dbang ni thob pa la/ /bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor dbang bskur bya/ /dbang bskur ba yi cho ga dang/ /bsgrub pa'i cho ga'ang de bzhin sbyar zhes gsungs
312a2(rgyud 'grel): pas/ 'jug pa ni dbang bskur ba'i dang po nyid du gyur pas so/ /de ltar bos la las kyi bum pa'i chu mchod yon gyi snod du blugs pa/ /ku sha'i bam pos bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags nyi shu rtsa gcig gis/ bsrung ngo/ /de
312a3(rgyud 'grel): ltar yang slob ma re re nas bkug ste/ /gsang gter snga ma bzhin byas nas/ /byug spos la sogs byin nas kyang/ /snying pos mngon par bsngags nas ni/ /zhes gsungs so/ /dar la sogs pas mig gnyis g.yogs
312a4(rgyud 'grel): nas ni zhes bya ba ni/ /las kun byed pa'i gsang sngags kyis/ /btab pa'i gos kyis gdong g.yogs te/ /zhes gsungs pa'o/ /rdo rje 'dzin mas dpal gyi pad+mar lag gnyis bya/ /me tog rin chen la sogs de brgyan
312a5(rgyud 'grel): la/ /zhes bya ba ni de nyid las sngar bstan pa'i phyag rgya la/ me tog dag ni bzhag nas su/ /de nas dkyil 'khor bdag pos sngags/ /phyag rgyar bcas pas spyi bor bzhag /gsang sngags lan gsum bzlas par bya/ /zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o/ /de la rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag
312a6(rgyud 'grel): rgya bcings pa'i sngags ni/ oM badzrA d+hi tiSh+Tha hUM zhes bya ba'o/ /de nas slob dpon gyis bu khyod su yin khyod gang la dga' zhes dri'o/ /slob mas kyang bdag ni skal pa bzang po ste/ sangs rgyas nyid du gyur la dga' o
312a7(rgyud 'grel): zhes smra'o/ /de nas sa ma ye hUM zhes lan gsum bzlas te/ yan lag bdun sngon byas nas/ byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /de nas deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs par gyur gyis/
312b1(rgyud 'grel): khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gsang ba chen po 'di/ dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba su la 'ang ma smra zhig ces brjod la/ /oM badzra pra be sha hUM badzra hUM zhes brjod la yol ba bsal te/ 'di ni rgyud kyi dang por
312b2(rgyud 'grel): rab zhi kha nas sngags brjod/ gzhug par bya zhes bya ba ste/ rab zhi zhes bya ba ste slob ma nges pa'o/ /de nas nga yi de ring de bzhin gshegs/ /kun gyi rigs su khyod bcug gis/ /gang gis shes na de bzhin gshegs/ /kun gyi dngos grub
312b3(rgyud 'grel): thob byed na/ /dngos grub gzhan lta ci smos te/ /de phyir rdo rje ye shes skyed/ /khyod kyis dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba'i/ /mdun du brjod par mi bya ste/ /brjod pa tsam gyis dam tshig nyams par byas par 'gyur ro zhes brjod la rdo rje
312b4(rgyud 'grel): spyi bor bzhag ste/ 'di ni khyod kyi dam tshig rdo rje ste/ /gal te tshul 'di smras na ni/ /rdo rje 'dzin rgyal khros nas ni/ /mdun rgyud rigs rnams brlag par mdzad/ /oM badzra sa ma ye hUM phaT/ ces brjod do/ /de nas rdo rje dral ba'i phyag
312b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyas slob ma'i snying kha'i bu ga phye la slob mas/ oM badzra sa ma ya h+ri da ya me pra be sha dri d+ha tiSh+Tha hUM zhes lan gsum brjod la slob dpon gyi snying kha'i ye shes kyi sku dang/ ye shes sems dpa' las de dang 'dra ba'i tshul 'thon
312b6(rgyud 'grel): te/ /slob ma'i snying khar gnas par bsams la/ /bu ga med par bsams te/ /rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyi/ /snying la kun tu gnas par mdzad/ /ci ste dam tshig 'das nas ni/ /de ma thag tu bkas nas bzhud ces brjod do/ /de
312b7(rgyud 'grel): nas dri zhim po'i chu la oM badzro tkatha zhes lan mang du bzlas te/ 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu/ /dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed/ /dam tshig srung na dngos grub ni/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi chu yi 'grub ces brjod la blud do/ /de bas
313a1(rgyud 'grel): de nas gsang sngags mkhas pa yis/ /sngags 'di dam tshig sbyin par bya/ /zhes bya ba dang/ de nas 'dis dam tshig bsgrag par bya'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas deng phan chad khyod kyi phyag na rdo rje nga yin gyi/ gang ngas
313a2(rgyud 'grel): smras pa'i bya ba de khyod kyis byos shig /gal te ma byas na khyod yang ba ma spangs par 'chi ba'i dus byas nas sems can dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re/ zhes brjod do/ /de nas che ge zhes bya 'di nyid ni/ /byang chub sems
313a3(rgyud 'grel): ni yongs 'dzin pa/ /dam tshig mchog dang gsang ba yi/ /'khor lo 'di ni 'jug par 'tshal zhes rigs thams cad la bsgrags pa gsang ba chen po'i rigs dag pa'i/ /gsang ba yongs su 'dzin par ni/ /bdag nyid
313a4(rgyud 'grel): chen po khyod 'dod dam/ /des kyang 'tshal zhes brjod par bya/ /de nas de bas rtag tu zhes bya ba nas/ bdag nyid de nyid dang ni sngags sogs de bzhin no zhes bya ba'i bar du khyad par gyi sdom pa thun mong ba phog la/
313a5(rgyud 'grel): de nas rtsa ba'i ltung ba bcu bzhi yan lag dang bcas pa'i slob dpon du 'os pa la sbyin te/ dbab pa'i cho gas dbab bo/ /de la dbab pa'i cho ga ni rang dang slob ba'i snying khar sgo dbye ba'i phyag rgyas phye la rang gi
313a6(rgyud 'grel): snying kha nas yi ge a byung ste/ slob ma'i snying kha la gnas pa'i ye shes sems dpa' i sgo skyes la yid kyis bzhag la/ /de'i 'od kyis lus thams cad kun tu gang bar bsams la/ sarba ta thA ga tA
313a7(rgyud 'grel): d+hiSh+Tha ne na taM badzra satwa me a bi sha du zhes brjod do/ /de nas slob dpon gyis ti raM ti ri'i phyag rgya myur du bcings la/ 'di ni rdo rje dam tshig ste/ rdo rje sems dpa' 'ang yin par grags/ /rdo rje ye shes bla med
313b1(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /de ring nyid du 'bab par shog/ ces slob mas brjod do/ /de nas oM badzra a be sha a a zhes bcu nas bzung ste/ nyi shu 'am/ sum cu 'am/ bzhi bcu 'am/ lnga bcu 'am/ drug cu 'am/ bdun cu 'am/ brgyad cu 'am/ dgu bcu
313b2(rgyud 'grel): 'am/ brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bar du bzlas nas/ rdo rje hUM mdzad dmar po kun tu 'khrugs pas yongs su gang par bsams na/ nges par 'babs so/ /gal te ma babs na/ rdo rje 'bebs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya dril bu dang bcas
313b3(rgyud 'grel): pa bcings la/ rkang pa g.yon pas de'i rkang pa g.yas pa mngon nas de nyid la dbab par bya ba'i phyir/ steng gi nam mkha' i phyogs su rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi steng du khros pa'i yi ge 'od zer gyis mnon par
313b4(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa dang/ 'og nas kyang rdo rje rlung gi dkyil 'khor yi ge hUM las 'degs par gyur pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa la sogs par zhugs pas/ hUM traM h+ri a/ zhes bya bar rang gi sa bon gyi 'od kyis
313b5(rgyud 'grel): tshogs yang dag par 'bebs par mdzad par bsams zhing/ hUM a be sha a zhes lan brgya zlos shing de la dbab par bya'o/ /gal te shin tu sdig pa chen pos 'bab par ma gyur na/ sdig pa bral ba'i phyag rgyas sdig pa dral
313b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i bya'o/ /de nas yams shing mngar po rnams kyi me/ raM spar rdo rje khro bo'i me/ /mnyam par bzhag par snyoms zhugs la/ /til bsregs pas ni sdig bsregs shing/ /oM sarba pA paM da ha na badzra ya swAhA/ /zhes bya ba dang/
313b7(rgyud 'grel): lag pa g.yas pa'i mthil du til nag po las sdig pa'i gzugs brnyan byas la dbus su hUM bsams pa'i mdzub mo dang mthe bos sbyin bsreg bya'o/ /de nas sbyin bsreg gi thab khung las byung ba'i 'bar ba'i
314a1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i phreng ba kun tu 'khrigs pa'i rdo rje lus la 'bab pas/ /sdig pa rnams bsreg par bsam par bya'o/ /de nas yang rdo rje 'bebs pa'i phyag rgya de bzhin du bcings pa/ dbab pa byas nges par 'bebs par 'gyur ro//
314a2(rgyud 'grel): de lta bus kyang ma phebs na/ de la dbang mi bskur ro/ /babs na skad cig ma de nyid la mngon par shes pa lnga la sogs pa rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /gal te babs pa de 'bar bar 'gyur ba de mi 'dod na/ /de'i spyi bor ri rab
314a3(rgyud 'grel): dang dbang chen dang rdo rje dang yi ge a dang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad rnams/ kha dogs ser por bsam mo/ /de nas nges par babs pa na/ /oM badzra satwa su saM gra had ces bya ba la sogs pa glur blangs
314a4(rgyud 'grel): la/ /phyag rgya dang phyag rgya'i lan gyis byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /de nas brtan par byas la lce la rdo rje bsams te/ b+h+ruM hi badzra zhes brjod na/ 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar gyi dngos po don dang ldan par ma lus
314a5(rgyud 'grel): par smra'o/ /dgos pa yongs su rdzogs nas ni bzhud par gyur te/ de nas dkyil 'khor la dmigs te/ slob mas yan lag bdun dang ldan pa'i cho ga byas la/ a sa me tri sa me ye hA sa ma ye swAhA/ zhes pa phyag rgya dang
314a6(rgyud 'grel): ldan par byas la/ /bdag dam tshig can du mos par bya'o/ /rdo rje 'dzin ma zhes bya ba nas gzhug par bya zhes bya ba'i bar te/ de nas slob dpon gyis bden pa bsgrags te/ bdag la bden pa'i byin brlabs pa
314a7(rgyud 'grel): bdag gi slob ma dkyil 'khor du/ legs par btsud par gyur pas ni/ /lha yi rigs kyi rim pa dag/ 'di yi bsod nams ci 'dra las/ /de bzhin du ni 'bab par 'gyur/ /'dis ni grub pa gang 'grub pa/ /rigs
314b1(rgyud 'grel): ni gang gi snod du 'gyur/ /bsod nams mthu ni ci yod pa/ /dkyil 'khor 'dir ni de bzhin 'gyur/ /de skad brjod nas de 'og tu //sgo yi phyogs su de bzhag nas/ /de nas me tog 'thor du gzhug /ces gsungs
314b2(rgyud 'grel): pas so/ /de nas sngags 'dis me tog dor bar bya'o/ /sangs rgyas dngos grub thob bya'i phyir/ /bdag la thugs rtser dgongs nas ni/ /'gro la phan pa'i gtso mchog gis/ /sman par dgongs nas bzhes su gsol/ /oM pra ti gri ha hUM zhes pas
314b3(rgyud 'grel): dor ro/ /me tog rin chen la sogs pas/ /gang la babs pa rigs kyi lha/ /gtso bo'i rigs de bsgrubs na ni/ /dngos grub myur te the tshom med/ /ces bya ba ni ji skad du/ gang du me tog babs 'gyur bar/ /de ni de yi rigs kyi lha zhes
314b4(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa lta bu'o/ /de la me tog dor ba'i tshul rgyas pa la ni ji skad du/ dngos grub rab 'bring rnam gsum ni/ /me tog 'bab pa rnams las brtag /lha rnams kyi ni khyad par ni/ /gnas kyis khyad par las kyang brtag/ gang tshe
314b5(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas bcom ldan gyis/ /dbu la me tog babs gyur na/ /de tshe gtsug tor mdzod bu dag/ grub par 'gyur bar gdon mi za/ /spyan la sogs pa'i sngags rnams kyang/ /zhal du babs na 'grub par 'gyur/ /stod du bab na mchog
314b6(rgyud 'grel): rnams 'grub/ /rked par babs na 'bring rnams 'grub/ /ro smad phyogs su babs pa ni/ /dngos grub phal rnams 'grub par 'gyur/ /bar gyi sku la bab na ni/ /snying po la sogs 'grub par 'gyur/ /smad du babs par gyur na ni/ /mngag
314b7(rgyud 'grel): gzhug pa sogs 'grub par 'gyur/ /rim pa de dag thams cad ni/ /pad+ma rdo rje 'dzin rigs la/ /go rim bzhin du shes byas la/ /de bzhin lha rnams gzhan la yang/ /dngos grub rnam pa gsum du bshad/ /gal te lha yi gzugs dag la?
315a1(rgyud 'grel): ring du me tog lhung gyur na/ /de yi dngos grub yun ring grub/ /nye na dngos grub myur du 'grub/ /gsang sngags rnams ni mchod pa dag/ gang du bkram pa tshun chad ni/ /de yi nye 'khor de yin te/ /me tog der lhung de yi rigs
315a2(rgyud 'grel): lha gnyis kyi ni bar dag tu/ /gal te me tog lhung gyur na/ /gal te nye bar gyur pa ni/ /de ni de yi yin par bshad/ /gal te dkyil 'khor 'di nas su/ /la la'i me tog lhung gyur na/ /de la dngos grub phal 'grub cing/ /'di ni dang
315a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'ang rab tu chung/ /gal te me tog dor ba dag /ra ba'i ri mo la bab na/ /zhi ba byas nas de nas gdod/ /nan tan bskyed de 'dor du gzhug /de tshe the tshom gyur na ni/ /mkhas pas bzlas te dor mi bya/ /der ni gar yang nges med
315a4(rgyud 'grel): pas/ /des ni dngos grub thob mi 'gyur/ /gnyis kyi bar du mnyam pa dang/ /don med phyi rol lhung na ni/ /zhi ba'i sbyin bsreg byas nas ni/ /de nas me tog 'dor du gzhug /snying por me tog babs na ni/ /rtag tu don med mi
315a5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur na/ /srad bu dag gi cho ga bzhin/ /de yi nye 'gror shes par bya/ /rig gsum la yang cho ga bzhin/ /dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum du brtag/ ji ltar grags pa'i tshul du brtag /ji ltar grags pa'i tshul dag las//
315a6(rgyud 'grel): gtso bo rnams kyi rigs kyis bskyed/ /gal te me tog dor ba dag /mchod pa'i steng du babs gyur na/ /de ni rgyas pa'i sgrub pa dag /khyad par du ni shes par 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni bdag po la/ /gang gi me tog
315a7(rgyud 'grel): babs gyur na/ /de ni de yi las rnams kun/ /myur du 'grub cing mchog tu gyur/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la ni/ /gang gi me tog babs na ni/ /de la rigs gsum gsang sngags kun/ /gdon mi za bar 'grub par gyur?
315b1(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma la ni rigs gnyis 'grub/ /rdo rje 'dzin la rang rigs nyid/ /gal te gnyis las 'das nas su/ /gang gi gsum pa la bab na/ /dkyil 'khor de nas dbyung bar bya/ /yang na dkyil 'khor gzhan du gzhug /de la sogs pa'i rnam
315b2(rgyud 'grel): pa yi/ /me tog rnams ni dor ba las/ /bdag gi mdun du gang lhung ba/ /de la zhi ba brtsam par bya/ /sbyin sreg gis ni zhi byas nas/ /der ni slar yang mdor du gzhug /lan gsum spos te bor na yang/ /gal te legs par ma
315b3(rgyud 'grel): bab na/ /re thag gcad de slar btang ngo/ /zhes gsungs pa'o/ /de nas slar yon gyis lag pa bkang ste/ /zhes gsungs pa'o/ /yon tan bla ma la dbul te/ /oM pra tits+tsha badzra sa ma ya stwaM zhes brjod la'o/ /lhag ma'i lha'i dbang gi
315b4(rgyud 'grel): ngo bo me tog de slob ma'i spyi bor gzhag ste/ /sems dpa' stobs chen po/ /'di khyod bzhes shig brjod pa'o/ /de nas oM rdo rje sems dpa' dang khyod kyis/ /mig 'byed par ni brtson pa ste/ /mig ni thams cad 'byed par mdzad
315b5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje mig ni bla na med/ /oM badzra tsak+Shwo taka ta ye ti zhes brjod cing/ /gdong g.yogs dgrol lo/ /de nas gdong g.yogs dkrol nas ni/ /slob ma de la 'di skad bsgo/ /dkyil 'khor bzang po 'di la ltos/ /da ni dad pa rab tu
315b6(rgyud 'grel): bskyed/ /khyod ni sangs rgyas rigs su skyes/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs/ /'byor ba thams cad mngon du gyur/ /rten dang dngos grub thams cad kyang/ /khyod la mngon du phyogs gyur gyis/ /dngos grub thob phyir dam
315b7(rgyud 'grel): tshig bskyongs/ /gsang sngags la yang brtson par gyis zhes so/ /de nas slob dpon gyis dkyil 'khor la phyag gsum byas la/ /bskor ba gsum byas te/ /rang gi lha la me tog snyim pa gsum dbul lo/ /de nas slob
316a1(rgyud 'grel): dpon gyis de'i sngags lan bdun me tog la bzlas te/ /slob ma'i lag tu byin la slob mas kyang lan bdun de'i sngags bzlas te/ lha khyod bdag gis ma nos so zhes lan gsum bzlas so/ /de nas zhi ba'i sbyin
316a2(rgyud 'grel): sreg bya ste/ tha ma brtsams la dkyil 'khor ni bstan te// //de nas de la dkyil 'khor ni/ /rab tu rgyas pa bstan par bya/ /phyag rgya chen po dag kyang bstan/ /ces gsungs so/ /de lta bu'i slob ma gzhug
316a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i cho ga ste/ /the tshom la sogs mi bya ste/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gyi dam tshig rnams ni go sla bas ma phye'o/ /bdag gi de nyid sngags sogs de bzhin no zhes bya ba la bdag gi de kho na nyid ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye
316a4(rgyud 'grel): shes te/ /de tsam 'dir bdag tu gdags pas zad do/ /sngags zhes bya bas ni de kho na zhes tshig lhag ma can du byas te/ 'dod pa'i lha rang bzhin gyis grub pa rnams so/ /sogs zhes bya ba ni mngon par byang chub pa 'am
316a5(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' 'byung ba'i rim pas/ bdag nyid ltar byas pa lha'i de kho na nyid do/ /de bas na 'dir ye shes dbab pa dang/ mngon par byang chub pa dang ni bdag gir kho na nyid yin la/ /byang chub pa bzhi yan lag dang bcas pa ni
316a6(rgyud 'grel): lha'i de kho na nyid yin no/ /de bzhin zhes bya ba ni/ de kho na nyid gsum po 'di la yang yid gnyis la sogs pa dang/ smad par mi bya'o zhes bya'o/ /mos pa brtan dang ldan pas/ dam bcas nas zhes bya ba ni/ mos pa dang
316a7(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa nyid bstan pa ste/ mos pa ni mi 'phrogs pa'i las can yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de yang dam bcas nas dbang bskur na mos pa med pa dang pa tsam gyis 'jug pa rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de bas 'phags
316b1(rgyud 'grel): pa de kho na nyid 'dus pa las/ de nas gsang thub pa yin pas de las dang por mna''di'i snying por brjod par byas te/ zhes gsungs la de nyid kyis rgya cher bshad pa las byang/ gsang ba thub pa yin par zhes bya ba ni/ gsang bar
316b2(rgyud 'grel): bya ba'i don gang yin srog gi phyir yang? sum? yang mi smra ste/ de lta bu'i brtan pa dang ldan pa'i sems can ni gsang ba thub zhes bya'o/ /de la dang por mna'i snying po brjod par bya ste/ zhes bya ba ni 'di skad ston te/ de lta bu'i sems can la/
316b3(rgyud 'grel): yang gya tshom du bstan par mi bya'i/ mna' yang bsgags te/ bstan par bya'i zhes bshad do/ /de bas na gsang ba bla na med pa'i lam 'di ni rab tu yang 'bad par brtags shing bstan par byas la sbyin no/ /de bas na gsang
316b4(rgyud 'grel): ba zla ba'i thig le las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la/ /gsang ba yid ni dkyil 'khor 'di/ /ci ste rmongs pas smras byas nas/ /slob dpon gyi ni dam tshig nyams/ /myur du zla ba phyed tshun chad/ /bstan pas rnam par 'jog
316b5(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur/ /dang por dam tshig bzhag bya ste/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bstan par bya/ /gzhan du byas na dpa' o rnams/ /dmyal bar bskal pa grangs med smin/ zhes gsungs so/ /de nas dbang bskur bar bya ste/ /dkyil 'khor
316b6(rgyud 'grel): chen po'i nub tu bar du khrul dos chod par dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i snying po'i phyed kyi tshad la lte ba'i lha'i mtshan ma bkang la/ /me'i 'od kyi bar du rdzogs par byas pa der/ /khri 'am
316b7(rgyud 'grel): khri'u? la stan bzang por bting par slob ma rgyan ma lus brgyan la bzhag /rgyal ba dang bkra shis pa byas la/ /dbang bskur ro/ /de ltar yang slongs la brtags pa dag/ gal te dbang bskur 'dod pa la/ /dbang bskur ta
317a1(rgyud 'grel): yi dkyil 'khor ni/ /phye ma dkar pos bri bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor dag dang rjes mthun par/ /stegs bu gru bzhir byas nas su/ /de yi dbus su mtshon sna lngas/ /pad+ma yongs su rdzogs par bri/ /bkra shis la sogs
317a2(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma rnams/ /der ni ji ltar 'dod pa bri/ /bkra shis phyir ni gang brtan pa/ /yang na dngos grub bgod par bya/ /zhes gsungs la yang gsungs pa/ slob ma dbang bskur 'os rig nas/ /cho ga 'di ni nan tan du/ /
317a3(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur ba'i cho ga bya/ /las kun byed pa'i gsang sngags kyis/ /btab pa'i stan ni gsar bzhag ste/ /bkra shis la sogs kun byas nas/ /bsrung ba nan tan cher bya ste/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni sngags zlos shing/ /
317a4(rgyud 'grel): gdugs ni dkar po bzang po la/ /me tog phreng ba bzang pos brgyan/ /ras phran dkar pos 'phyangs pa gcig /spyi bo'i steng du gzung bar bya/ /slob mas yon ni cher dpul zhing/ /bla ma bsnyen bkur byas pa dag /stan
317a5(rgyud 'grel): de la ni bzhag nas so/ /sngags kyi skyon bsal bkra shis byas/ /bdug spos legs par sbyar ba yis/ /bdug pa khro bo'i rgyal pas bdug /rnga yab la sogs dag kyang bzung/ /rnga ma'i bsil yab bdug pos
317a6(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /zho dang slob ma gos kyis bkang/ /'di rnams kun kyang bshams te dgod/ /de bzhin bum pa bzhi rnams dgod/ /glu dang sil snyan rnga sgra bsgrags/ /shin tu bkra shis tshigs bshad bsgrags/ /de bzhin bkra
317a7(rgyud 'grel): yid ched du brjod/ /cho ga rgyas bar byas bas ni/ /de la sogs par 'dor byas nas/ /yid kyis dkyil 'khor lha kun la/ /mkhas pas gsol ba btab nas ni/ /bum pa bzlas brjod brgya byas la/ /de ni legs
317b1(rgyud 'grel): par blangs nas su/ /dkyil 'khor dal bus lan gsum bskor/ /rtsa ba'i gsang sngags kun 'don cing/ /blo dang ldan pas dbang bskur bya/ /de nas phyag rgya bcings nas su/ /gsang sngags bzlos shing spyi bor gtugs/ /ces gsungs pa
317b2(rgyud 'grel): ste/ 'dir sdom pa gang mi 'dzin pa de ni/ /'jug pa tsam bya yi/ /dbang gang yang mi bskur ro/ /thun mong gi sdom pa 'dzin pa la ni gsang ba'i dbang gi mthar thub pa bskur la/ /khyad par gyi sdom pa 'dzin pa la ni/ /thabs shes rab kyi dbang gi bar du
317b3(rgyud 'grel): bskur zhing dbang dam pa de thob pa'i bya ba yang lung de nyid las gsungs pa/ /de ltar dbang bskur byas nas ni/ /de la sar pa'i gos rnams skon/ /me tog dri la sogs pas mchod/ /mchod phyir thog dang gdu bur bcas/ /de nas bla ma bdag
317b4(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyis/ /de yi spyi bor gdugs kyang bzung/ /thal mo sbyar ba byas nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor legs par bskor du gzhug /gdugs dang bcas par sgo phyogs su/ /spyi bo btud de phyag 'tshal gzhug /slob ma 'di ni phul ba lags/ /gsang
317b5(rgyud 'grel): sngags rgyud ni 'dzin par 'gyur/ /mkhan pos de skad smras nas su/ /gdugs bzhag nas ni slob ma de/ /lag pas legs par blang bar bya/ /de nas 'di skad bsgo bar bya/ /da ni dkyil 'khor slob dpon gyur/ /sangs rgyas byang
317b6(rgyud 'grel): chub sems dpa' dang/ lha rnams kyang ni kun gyis bkur/ /sems can rnams la rtse bas phyir/ /khyod kyis dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhin/ /nan tan bskyed de bri bar byos/ /sgrub pa pos yang rgyud la sbyor/ /zhes so/ /de na rdo rje
317b7(rgyud 'grel): brtul zhugs sbyin te/ /hUM las byung ba'i rdo rje 'dod pa'i rgyal pos lha rnams bstims pa 'dis sbyin te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad te/ rdo rje sems dpa' lag na gnas/ /khyod kyi kyang ni rtag tu bcad/ /phyag na rdo rje'i
318a1(rgyud 'grel): brtul zhugs brtan/ /de slob mas lag tu bzung la/ /oM sarba ta tha ga ta si ta badzra sa ma ye tiSh+The Sha twaM d+ha ra ya mi hI hi hi hi hi hUM/ thog mdza' med pa'i sems dpa' ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che/ /kun tu bzang po
318a2(rgyud 'grel): kun bdag nyid/ /rdo rje sems tshul bdag po'i bdag /ces brjod do/ /de nas a las byung ba'i dril bu 'dod pa'i rgyal pos sangs rgyas thams cad bstims pas 'dis sbyin te/ 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /shes rab
318a3(rgyud 'grel): sgra yi rjes 'gror bshad/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag gu ca/ /byang chub mchog tu rgyal ba ched/ /ces pas so/ /des bzung la srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis bdag /ngo bo nyid kyi srid bral byas/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' 
318a4(rgyud 'grel): mchog /srid pa mchog ni byed pa yin/ /zhes pas bsil lo/ /de nas srid pa'i bde ba shin tu chung/ /sdug bsngal chen po dag bya'i phyir/ /shin tu bde ba dam na'i thabs/ /dam tshig 'di ni rtag tu skyed/ /'dod pa'i longs
318a5(rgyud 'grel): spyod thams cad ni/ /ci 'dod par ni brten bzhin du/ /rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis/ /rang dang gzhan la mchod par bya/ /ji srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni/ /mkhas mchog 'dug par gyur pa'i tshe/ /de srid mtshungs med sems
318a6(rgyud 'grel): can don/ /mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i thabs/ /bsod nams byin brlabs kyis bsgrub pa/ /dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug 'grub/ /sems can don rnams brtan par byed/ /yid kyi gzugs
318a7(rgyud 'grel): ni brtan pa'i phyir/ /phyag rgya dam tshig yin par bshad /gang phyir gzugs kun brtan 'gyur ba/ /de nas phyag rgya rab tu bsgrags/ /zhes pas phyag rgya'i dam tshig sbyin no/ /de nas tshul ji lta ba dang ldan pas/ /oM 'di ni
318b1(rgyud 'grel): ngas khyod lung bstan te/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs / /srid pa shin tu grub pa'i phyir/ /srid pa'i ngan 'gro rnams las ston/ /kye rdo rje zhes bya de bzhin gshegs/ /grub pa'i srid pa gsum gyi bdag /'di yis lung bstan byas pa yis
318b2(rgyud 'grel): sngags pa 'gro ba kun bdag yin/ /zhes pas lung bstan to/ /yan lag de dag ni gsang ba'i dbang gi bar du thob pa la bya zhing/ de nas dbang ngam pa thob pa 'am/ ma yin yang rab tu snod du rung ba la dbugs dbyung ste/ /mchog gsang
318b3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor dam pa ni/ /mthong ba dang ni zhugs gyur pas/ /sdig pa kun las nges grol bar/ /khyed rnams deng nyid legs par gnas/ /bde chen theg pa 'di la ni/ /slar khyed mchi ba yod min te/ /mi tshugs pa dang mi gsod pas/ /cis
318b4(rgyud 'grel): kyang mi 'jigs dga' bar gyis/ /srid pa shin tu dga' ba'i phyir/ /srid pa'i sdug bsngal las khyer 'das/ /srid pa shin tu 'grub ba'i phyir/ /ston pa'i mchog tu gyur ba yin/ /dam tshig sdom ba grub pa 'di/ /rtag tu khyod kyis bsrung bar
318b5(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis mthun par gsungs/ /dam pa rtag pa'i dka' yin no/ /gang zhig bskyed pa tsam gyis ?/ /sangs rgyas nyid du dogs med pa'i/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi'i phyag rgya gang/ /byang chub sems ni btang mi bya/ /dam pa'i chos ni
318b6(rgyud 'grel): nam du yang/ /der ba dag tu mi bya'o/ /mi shes pa 'am/ rmongs pa yis/ /rnam par dbye ba bya ba mon/ /bdag nyid yongs su spangs nas su/ /dka' thub kyi ni ma gdungs shing/ /ci bde bar ni rab tu bzung/ /'di ni ma byon rdzogs sangs rgyas/
318b7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya rnams/ /nam yang yongs su mi 'dor zhing/ /slob dpon smad par mi bya ste/ /'di ni sangs rgyas kun dang 'dra/ /sangs rgyas kun mtshungs bla ma ni/ /slob pa'i dpon la gang smod pa/ /de ni sangs rgyas kun smad pa/
319a1(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu sdug bsngal 'thob 'gyur te/ /rims dang gdon dang yams nad dang/ /byer 'tshe tshom rkun la sogs pas/ /bla ma'i zhabs la smod pa yi/ /rmongs chen de ni gsod par byed/ /rgyal ba'i gyong dang me dang sbrul//
319a2(rgyud 'grel): rkun no chu dang mkha' 'gro dang/ /bgegs dang logs 'dren gtum po yis/ /bsad nas sems dmyal ltung gar 'gyur/ /de bas nan tan thams cad kyis/ /rdo rje slob dpon bla ma che/ /ge ba rab tu mi sbyoms pa/ /nam yang
319a3(rgyud 'grel): smad par mi bya'o/ /bla ma de la gus pas yon/ /rjes su mthun pa dbul bar bya/ /des ni rims sogs gnod pa rnams/ /phyin cad 'gyur bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu rang gi dam tshig bsgrub/ /rtag tu de bzhin gshegs rnams
319a4(rgyud 'grel): mchod/ /rtag tu bla ma la yang dbul/ /'di ni sangs rgyas kun dang 'dra/ /de phul bsod nams tshogs yin pas/ /tshogs las byang chub bla na med pa'o/ /de phul sangs rgyas thams cad la/ /rtag tu phul ba nyid du 'gyur/
319a5(rgyud 'grel): gang phyir 'di ni lags gnas pas/ /deng khyod skye ba 'bras bur bces/ /dam tshig lha rnams kun mnyam par/ /gnas pa gyur par the tshom med/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bcas pa/ /kun gyi tshe ldan dbang bskur te//
319a6(rgyud 'grel): khams gsum rgyal po'i srid che yis/ /rgyal po bdag po bstan pa yi/ /de ni bdud las rnam rgyal te/ /grong khyer mchog tu rab tu zhugs/ /khyed rnams kyis ni sangs rgyas nyid/ /deng nyid thob par the tshom med/ /de ltar
319a7(rgyud 'grel): yid ni dag? dang rdo rje nyid du gyis/ /rang gi dam tshig mi bzad bde skyid bsten par gyis/ /'gro ba myur du bde ba 'dod pa thams cad la/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dang mtshungs rtag par 'gyur zhes pas so//
319b1(rgyud 'grel): de nas chos bstan par bya ba ni/ /snying po bsnyen pa sogs gras pas/ /phyag rgya che la gnas bya zhing/ /dam tshig 'dod chags gzugs sogs pas/ /gsang sngags bzang po bzlas par bya/ /rang lhag lha'i sbyor ba yis/ /rang rig de'i rang
319b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gyis/ /phyogs dus kun na bzhugs pa yi/ /gzhan dang rang la 'ang mchod par bya/ /dka' thub smyung ba bud med nams/ /bsten pas 'grub par mi 'gyur te/ /mi snang mngon shes mkha' spyod kyis/ /dngos grub lus sems
319b3(rgyud 'grel): dag las byung/ /de bas sangs rgyas byang chub sems/ /sngags kyi sbyang mchog spyod pa rnams/ /'dod dang kun la nyer brtan cing/ /chos kyi yi ge mchog brnyes yin/ /zhes pas so/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid ni/ /
319b4(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor ye shes snang ba ste/ /gru bzhi byams sogs bzhi thig ni/ /chos rjes dran pa ltas ngan spangs/ /ngo tsha khrel yod dang dbang sogs/ /ra bar bshad de rnam thar sgo/ /yang dag spong bzhi rta bab ste// //
319b5(rgyud 'grel): dran bzhi 'khyams te rdzu 'phrul rkang/ /bzhi po sgo khyud byang chub lam/ me tog phreng ba lam gnyis ni/ /dra ba dra bar phyed bshad cing/ /de bzhin gshegs lam rnga mo gos/ /rtse dril gsung rab yan lag ston/ /ka ba'i ral
319b6(rgyud 'grel): lam bum pa tshogs/ /gdung sel smin byed nyi zla ste/ /pad+ma la chags chos 'khor lo/ /rdo rje ra ba me 'od ni/ /gdug pa srung ba yin par shes zhes pas so/ /lha'i de kho na nyid ni bdag bsgrubs pa la 'jug par shes par
319b7(rgyud 'grel): bya ste/ /phyi rol dang ni shin tu phyi rol gyi lha rnams la ni/ /de kho na phye ste ma gsungs so/ /de ltar gzhung gzhan la brten pas dbang gi bya ba spyir bstan nas/ da ni rang gi gzhung gi dbang bstan pa'i sarba bid kyi ji ltar
320a1(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur te zhes bya ba ni/ sarba 'di bcus yungs kar dkar po gser gyi snod du gnas pa la/ mang du bzlas te slob ma'i spyi bor byin pas/ de'i 'od zer gyis lus khyab pas ma rig pa dang bral te/ ye shes/ bzhi thob
320a2(rgyud 'grel): par bsam mo/ /'di ni thams cad rig pa'i bang ma rig pa 'joms pa ste dang po'o/ /bum pa la sogs ji snyed mar thogs par/ /bcu po rnams kyis ci dgar dbang bcu bskur/ /zhes bya ba ni brdungs pa 'am/ /bris pa'i dbu rgyan
320a3(rgyud 'grel): la/ zla ba'i steng du sa bon lnga po bruM hUM AM khaM zhes pa las byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa lnga po ji ltar dga' ba'i mdog dang dbyibs can rang rang gi rigs kyi mtshan ma las byung ba rnam la/ /de dang 'dra ba'i de bzhin
320a4(rgyud 'grel): tshe pa rnams bstim la/ ji skad gsungs pa'i sngags lngas byin gyis brlabs pa/ dbur rgyan du gyur par bsams la/ /slob ma'i mgo la bcing ngo/ /de nas sngar ji ltar byin gyis rlabs pa'i bum pa la sogs
320a5(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams las brtsams te/ rang rang gi sngag brjod pa 'am bum pa lnga 'am/ gcig las med na ji ltar bstan pa'i sngags kyi bya ste/ dbu rgyan gyi gnas lngar bum pa'i chu cung zad blugs shing btung bar yang bya'o/ /bum
320a6(rgyud 'grel): pas kyang reg par bya ste/ kha cig na re bum pa ji snyed yod kyang bum pa rnams mi bteg go /mchod yon gyi snod du chu bsdus la des sngags lnga zlos shing dbang bskur ro zhes zer te/ 'di la yang bla ma'i lung gis ma
320a7(rgyud 'grel): gnang ba med do/ /de nas rin po che 'am me tog gi phreng ba dang zla ba dang traM las byung ba'i rin po che de la/ de dang 'dra ba mang po bstim te mthar phreng bar byas la rang gi sngags bzlas pas sbyin no/ /de yang dbus
320b1(rgyud 'grel): kyi cha bas mda' ba tsam du bcing ngo/ /de nas ngar dkar po sngon po bstan pa lta bu zla ba dang traM las rin chen tog tu bskyed la/ de dang 'dra ba rnams bstim te/ mjug tu dar nyid du phyur pas dbu rgyan gyi rtsa ba nas lan mang dus
320b2(rgyud 'grel): sngags zlos shing bcings la/ ra lhag gnyis su mdud pa sor bzhi bzhi tsam gyen du drangs la/ rtse mo 'phyang bas lta zur gnyis nas phyin par slebs pa tsam du 'phyang du gzhug go /de nas rigs lnga'i las kyi phyag rgya slob ma'i
320b3(rgyud 'grel): spyi gtsug dang/ 'tshogs ma dang rna ltag g.yas pa dang/ ltag pa pa dang/ rna ltag g.yon pa dag tu reg cing/ /rang rang gi sngags bzlas so/ /de nas slob dpon gyi rdo rje dril bu slob ma'i mgo la bzhag ste/ lha gang la me tog
320b4(rgyud 'grel): babs pa de'i mtshan ma dang kye rdo rje zhes bya bas drangs la/ /rang gi sngags rjes su bzlas pa bya'o/ /de nas sna tshogs rdo rje zla ba dang kham las byung ba'i don yod grub pa la de dang 'dra ba rnams bstim te/ 'jug tu gyur pa las
320b5(rgyud 'grel): byung ba rang gi sngags kyis slob ma'i lag tu sbyin no/ /de nas rin po che sna bdun thogs la/ /pha rol phyin pa rtag 'byung 'khor lo yin te kyang po mngon par shes pa mchog /ye shes rdzu 'phrul rta ste chags med 'gro
320b6(rgyud 'grel): ba shes rab nor bu dam pa yin/ spyod pa btsun mo bzang mo bsdu ba rnam pa bzhi po khyim bdag dam pa'o/ /thabs la shin tu mkhas pa blon po yin te mkhas pa de dag 'khor los sgyur/ zhes 'phags pa sdong po
320b7(rgyud 'grel): bkod pa las gsungs pa'i yon tan rnams thob par bya ba'i phyir/ slob ma'i lag tu rang rang gi sngags kyis sbyin par bya'o/ /de nas 'khor lo rkang pa'i bar du bsdu'o/ /dung g.yas kyi lag tu'o/ /dril bu dan
321a1(rgyud 'grel): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am rgyud 'di nyid kyi glegs bam lag pa g.yon du byin la rang gi sngags brjod do/ /de nas rdo rje dbyings dbang la sogs pa'i lha mo lnga'i phyag rgya bcings te/ slob
321a2(rgyud 'grel): ma'i snying ka dang/ mgrin pa dang dpral ba dang mtshogs ma dang spyi gtsug du reg pa la rang rang gi sngags brjod do/ /de nas rang sangs rgyas lnga'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya slob ma'i gnas lngar bcings la/ rang
321a3(rgyud 'grel): rang gi sngags brjod do/ /de la dbang bcu gcig nyid la/ ji ltar na dbang bskur zhes gsungs she na/ bden mod kyi 'on kyang 'khor los sgyur ba gnyis so sor yin du zin kyang/ /'khor los sgyur ba zhes bya bar
321a4(rgyud 'grel): gcig pas bsdus te gcig tu bstan pas bcu'o/ /kha cig na re 'khor los sgyur pa'i sngags gong ma ni rgyal po dbang bskur ba rin po che bdun po phal pa'i sngags yin te gnas ma yin par sngags bstan
321a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i skabs su zhal la bstan pa ste/ de ltar na dbang bcu zhes zer ro/ /kha cig na re bcu la sogs pa ni bcu'o zhes zer ro/ /de nas lag tu dril bu dang rdo rje sbyin zhes bya ba ni/ hUM dang a las byung ba'i rdo
321a6(rgyud 'grel): rje dang ? bu rang rang gi sngags bzlas pa slob ma'i lag tu byin la/ tshigs su bcad pa lngas rjes su gnang ba sbyin te/ rang rang gi sngags bzlas so/ /'di ni phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang ste/ dbang 'di nyid la sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu
321a7(rgyud 'grel): ba dang/ byang chub rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i bla ma'i lung gis dang por byas la gnang ba sbyin pa la sogs pa bya'o/ /kha cig na re tshig 'di ni rdo rje brtul zhugs ston pa'o zhes zer ro/ /ci dngos grub 'dod pa'i sngags
321b1(rgyud 'grel): 'ba' shig dbang bskur ram snyam la/ 'khor lo la sogs pa rin chen bdun thogs te/ mi'i dbang phyug 'khor lo thob pa dang/ /sdig pa gzhom phyir dbang ni bskur bar bya/ /zhes gsungs te/ khams kyi rgyal pos 'khor los sgyur ba thob
321b2(rgyud 'grel): par bya ba'i phyir yang slob dpon gyis rin chen sna bdun gyi gzugs brnyan thogs la/ /dang po rgyal ba la dang bkra shis brjod do/ /de nas bum pa bzang pos dbang bskur ba'i khrus byas la/ de'i 'og tu rin po che sna bdun dang nye ba'i
321b3(rgyud 'grel): rin po che bdun lham dang ral gri dang/ bgas pa dang/ khyim dang skyed mos tshal dang/ gos dang stan rnams dang/ dpal be'u dang/ pad+ma dang nya dang dung dang bum pa dang/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang 'khor lo dang/ yang yungs
321b4(rgyud 'grel): kar dang zho dang/ rtsa dung ba dang/ li khri dang me long dang shing bil ba'i 'bras bu dang/ gi wang dag kyang sbyin te/ 'jig rten na bkra shis par grags pa rnams so/ /der yang bkra shis brgyad pa 'don zhing ngo/ /'dir gsum la skyabs
321b5(rgyud 'grel): su 'gro ba dang/ mchod pa la sogs pa'i yan lag bdun dang/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa byas nas 'jig rten pa'i dbang 'di dag bskur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin pas na/ 'di la yang sdig pa gzhom phyir zhes gsungs
321b6(rgyud 'grel): so/ /kha cig na re tshig 'di ni dbang bcu bskur zhes pa'i rjes su sbyor ro zhes zer ro/ /'dis 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dbang gi skabs su/ /kha cig na re 'phags pa de kho na nyid bsdus pa las/ de'i 'og tu dbang bcu gnyis
321b7(rgyud 'grel): rnams sbyin no zhes zer ro/ /'di las ni sgrub par khyad pa med de/ 'di lugs gzhan kho na yin pas so/ /rgyud rnams las rang rang gi lugs kyi dbang bskur pa mi 'dra ba rab tu mang pa 'byung ba yang/ gcig tu mthun par bya
322a1(rgyud 'grel): dgos par 'gyur la/ rtsa ba'i rgyud du yang phyi ma'i rgyud du gsungs pa'i dbang rab tu mang po bsnan pa yin par yang gsungs so/ /'di dbang dang po ni sangs rgyas kyi sa'i chos yid la byed pa'i rgyud dang/
322a2(rgyud 'grel): de'i rgyu rgyud la yod par mtshon pa'o/ /gnyis pa ni de thob pa'i rgyu tshogs gnyis la sbyor pa'o/ /gsum pa ni tshogs sogs pa ni 'gro ba'i spyi bos bskur ba'o/ /zhes sngags pa'o/ /bzhi pa ni tshogs sogs pa rnams mi
322a3(rgyud 'grel): zhum par bya ba dbugs dbyung pa'o/ /lnga po ni ma zhum pa de rgyal ba'i phrin las byed par ston pa'o/ /drug pa ni yan lag de dag gis bdag nges par mtshan 'di zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs
322a4(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur ro/ zhes yid ches par byed pa'o/ /'dun pas ni sangs rgyas su gyur nas rdzu 'phrul dang/ kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul gyis gdul bya gdul bar mtshan pa'o/ /brgyad pas ni rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul
322a5(rgyud 'grel): gyis 'dul bar byed pas mtshon pa'o/ /dgu pas ni bla na med pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba chen po ni de nyid yin no zhes 'jig rten gyi rgyal srid la sred pa chad par byed pa'o/ /bcu pas ni mdza' gnyis ma lhung ba'i
322a6(rgyud 'grel): mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas par ston pa'o/ /bcu gcig pas ni de'i tshe gsang ba gsum bsam gyis mi khyab par shes par byed pa'o/ /bcu gnyis pas ni slob pa dang mi slob pa'i dus kun
322a7(rgyud 'grel): tu thabs dang shes rab tu 'brel bar bstan pa ste/ des na 'di dag tsam gyis don yongs su rdzogs pa yin pas lugs gzhan gyis 'di gang du yang drang bar mi bya'o/ /dbang ji snyed pa de dag yongs su mi nyams
322b1(rgyud 'grel): pa ni lhag pa'i lha yin pas na/ rgyud gang du yang dbang lhag ma rnams kyi rten du gyur ba/ lhag pa'i lha'i dbang me tog gi phreng ba'i dbang ni dang po nyid du sbyin no/ /zhes bya ba ni re shig mthun mong pa'o/ /de'i phyir dbang ni 'di
322b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams go rims dang/ grangs rgyud las ji skad gsungs pa kho na ltar bya'o/ /rang gi rnam par rtog pa'i dbang tsam gyis lung gi don zab mo gud du drang bar mi bya ste/ yid ches lung dang mi ldan par/ /chos rnams ston
322b3(rgyud 'grel): par byed pa na/ /mtshan nyid rnam par rtog pa yis/ /bdag kyang chud gson gzhan chud gson/ /zhes gsungs pas so/ /'jig rten las 'das pa'i dbang gis skabs su rin po che dang/ nye ba'i rin po che dang/ bkra shis dang
322b4(rgyud 'grel): nye ba'i bkra shis rnams mthar sbyin no/ /zhes slob dpon kha cig smra ste/ gdul bya spros pa spyod pa dag gi ngor ni/ /de dag mi dgag cing/ thams cad du nges par sbyin pa yang ma yin te/ ci rigs su sbyor ro/ /sngags grub phyir ni
322b5(rgyud 'grel): mos ldan zla ma la zhes bya ba pa la/ mos ldan zhes bya ba ni yon ma lus pa'i mtshon pa ste/ ji skad du gzhan las slob ma yang bdag nyid kyi dbang bskur ba 'am/ gzhan dag gis dbang bskur ba zhig yin na yang/ ji
322b6(rgyud 'grel): skad gsungs pa'i tshul gyis dad pa dang ldan pa theg pa chen po'i chos la mngon par brtson pa/ gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul la the tshom med pa/ glags kyi skabs mi tshol ba/ slob mar khas len pa/ cad shes
322b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i tshul gyis nga rgyal spangs pa/ bsam pa la g.yo sgyu med pas/ gus pa dang ldan pa ste/ slob ma de yang rnam pa 'di lta bu'i yon tan dang ldan pa zhig yin na/ de ni mdun du phyag rgya bstan par bya'i/ gzhan du ni ma yin
323a1(rgyud 'grel): no zhes rnam par gnas so zhes bshad de phyag rgya ni 'dir mtshon pa'o/ /mos pa la sogs pa'i yon tan de lta bu dang ldan pa la/ yon blangs na dad pa med par 'gyur bas na mos ldan zhes gsungs so//
323a2(rgyud 'grel): sngags pas dka' i rab tu bsgor bar bya/ /zhes bya ba ni yon bslad pa ste/ ji ltar rigs par de dag ni/ /re re la yang yon bslang ngo/ /yang na yid la gang 'dod pa/ /de ni bde bar dbul bar bya zhes gsungs pas so//
323a3(rgyud 'grel): des kyang mos pa'i spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ /ci ste nor yod bla ma dbul bas bya/ /zhes bya ba la ci ste nor yod ces bya ba ni med na bsnyen bkur bya ba ste/ slob ma dbul pos bla ma la/ /bkur sti dag gis mnyes
323a4(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /slob dpon dag ni thams cad la/ /bkur sti bya ba yon du bshad/ /ces gsungs te/ yon ni dad pa'i bye brag yon las shes par bya'i/ /gzhan du ma yin no/ /nor dang gter dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa
323a5(rgyud 'grel): ni yon dbul ba phan yon dang bcas nas bstan pa ste/ go sla'o slob dpon des yon rnyed pa dag ji ltar bya zhe na/ de ni bya ba'i rgyud kha cig las gsungs pa ltar bya ste/ bza' ba dang ni bca' ba rnams/ /phongs
323a6(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams la sbyin par bya/ /khyi dang bya rogs la sogs la/ /cung zad tsam yang mi sbyin no/ /yo byad rdzas rnams thams cad ni/ /slob dpon dag gis bsdu bar bya/ /bdag rang nyid kyis spyad par bya/ /slob ma dag la
323a7(rgyud 'grel): bgor mi rung/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni yo byad kun/ /slob dpon bdag nyid dbang bar bshad/ /gal te slob mas spyad na ni/ /dam tshig las ni 'das par 'gyur/ /gang zhig spyad par mi 'dod na/ /de yi cho ga'i go rims
323b1(rgyud 'grel): 'di'o/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi yo byad du/ /de dag cho ga bzhin du dbul/ /gdugs dang rnga yab dril la sogs/ /sangs rgyas nyid la dbul bar bya/ /gdan dang gdugs spos dri la sogs/ /dam pa'i chos la dbul bar bya/ /gos
323b2(rgyud 'grel): dang yo byad snod la sogs/ /dge 'dun rnams la dbul bar bya/ /de dag las ni slob ma yis/ /cung zad tsam yang mi bkur ro/ /dge 'dun med na dge slong sbyin/ /yang na dge slong ma la sbyin/ /gal te bdag nyid mi 'dod na/ /dge
323b3(rgyud 'grel): bsnyen dag la byin par bya zhes so/ /yang gzhan las rig sngags yon gyi rdzas rnams ni/ /dkon mchog gsum la dbul ba ste/ /rang gis zos na dngos grub mchog /de yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /zhes 'byung ste/ bdag la
323b4(rgyud 'grel): mi dgos pa dag zhing dam pa la dbul zhing/ /mchog las rnyed pa mchog ma yin pa la mi sbyin zhing/ /bdag gis kyang rab tu lhag par mi spyod do/ /sangs rgyas kun dang bla mar mnyam/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ /yon gyi
323b5(rgyud 'grel): mdza' i dam tshig bsgrags pa ste/ de nas bla ma slob ma rnams/ /ma yengs legs par bkod nas su/ /shes rab pha rol phyin klags nas/ /dam tshig 'di dag bsgo bar bya/ /zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o/ /sangs rgyas kun dang bla mar
323b6(rgyud 'grel): mnyams/ rdo rje slob dpon brnyas na ni/ /rtag tu sdug bsngal 'thob 'gyur bas/ /slob dpon la ni brnyas mi bya zhes bya ba la/ 'dir rdo rje'i rang bzhin nam/ /rdo rjes mtshon pa'i bla ma ni/ rdo rje'i slob dpon te/ de yang gang zhig dam chos glog pa
323b7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ 'chad dang man ngag ston pa dang/ /dbang bskur ba dang las byed pa/ /slob dpon zhes ni bya ba yin/ /zhes pa ste 'di dag kyang bsdu ba dang nges par rnam par bzhag pa ni/ ji skad du gzhan las/ slob dpon yang gang gis
324a1(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur ba dang/ rgyud bstan pa dang/ gang gi thad nas las kyi man ngag mnos pa de yang/ slob dpon yin te/ gsum po yang 'di dag kyang/ /phrag dog med cing phan par 'dod pa ni/ /slob dpon yin te zhes bshad
324a2(rgyud 'grel): do/ /yon tan de dag dang ldan pa'i slob dpon ni/ /bsnyen bkur bya bar 'os pas na bla ma ste/ sangs rgyas rnams dang phan 'dogs par mtshungs pas na/ sangs rgyas dus gsum du bzhugs pa kun dang mnyam zhes bya'o/ /de
324a3(rgyud 'grel): dag las kyang gtsor gyur pa ni gang las dbang thob pa ste/ de ltar yang rdo rje slob dpon ni gang gis dbang bskur ba'o/ /de la bsti stang med pa ni drod 'dzin cing brnyas thabs byed pa'o zhes bshad la/ /'phags pa rab tu grub
324a4(rgyud 'grel): par byed pa las kyang bla ma'i dkyil 'khor ston pa ste/ spyod pa ngan par gyur pa la'ang/ /lus sam yang na yid kyis kyang/ /shes nas nam yang smad mi bya/ /zhes gsungs la gzhan las kyang bla ma gang las gdam ngag la
324a5(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa mnos nas/ /da ni gdam ngag thob pas 'dis ci zhig bya zhes bsnyen bkur mi byed pa ni/ snying nas slob dpon smod pa'o zhes bshad do zhes bstan to/ /rdo rje ma rnams nyid la ni zhes bya bar na/ bcom ldan
324a6(rgyud 'grel): 'das ma skul byed ma dang ral pa gcig ma dang/ ma ma kI dang sgrol ma la sogs pa ye shes rdo rje lta bur mi byed pas/ rnal 'byor ma nyid du bstan pa rnams la'o/ /rnal 'byor can gyi zhes bya ba ni sngags so/ /brnyas
324a7(rgyud 'grel): ma yin zhes bya ni bud med du gnas pas smod pa srid pas bgag pa ste/ bud med shes rab rang bzhin pas/ /de la brnyas pa bcu bzhi pa/ /zhes rtsa ba'i ltung bar yang 'di dag la brnyas pa nyid bzhag go/
324b1(rgyud 'grel): //brnyas na ni rtag tu sdug bsngal 'thob 'gyur te/ brnyas mi bya zhes 'dir sbyar te/ /sdug bsngal ni sngar bstan pa rnams so/ /lhag ma ni go sla'o/ /slob ma dag gis kyang phyag 'tshal te gus pas spyi bos gnod do//
324b2(rgyud 'grel): de nas ni kha lag bkrus nas ni/ /lha la mchod yon phul nas su/ /go rim bzhin du thams cad la/ /bdug spos cho ga bzhin du dbul/ /de nas dkyil 'khor rig sngags kyis/ /sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad du bya/ /zhi pa'i sngags
324b3(rgyud 'grel): kyis brgya rtsa brgyad/ /snying pos kyang ni nyi shu gcig /ji skad bstan pa'i gsang sngags kyis/ /mar gyi sbyin sreg so sor bya/ /de yi 'og tu rang sngags kyis/ /sbyin sreg ji snyed 'dod pa bya/ /de nas phyogs kyi gtor ma sbyin
324b4(rgyud 'grel): bsdams shing kha lag yang bkrus nas/ /slob ma dang ni bcas pa yis/ /me tog dri la sogs pas mchod/ /slob ma dang bcas ma yengs par/ /mgo pos gus par phyag 'tshal te/ /so so'i sngags kyis ci rigs par
324b5(rgyud 'grel): de nas slar ni gshegs su gsol/ /dman ma rnams ni phyag nas su/ /mtsho chen rnams su dor bar bya/ /zhes pa sbyar ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhes zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnams ni bri sku'i cho ga ston te/ /de la
324b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dir nus pas ni bri sku'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du bya ste rgyud phyi ma las/ yang na sku gzugs ni dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du bris la zhes gsungs pa ni thun mong du drang bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro/ /'on kyang de ni
324b7(rgyud 'grel): dbul po la sogs pas 'byor pa yang dag par sba ba yang dag ste/ glegs bam dang ni bris sku rnams/ /rmongs pa rnams la stan byas na/ /skye ba 'di la dngos grub med/ /tshe rabs gzhan duAng 'grub mi 'gyur zhes
325a1(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pas/ rab tu yang sba bar bya ba yin pas so/ /de'i phyir dkyil 'khor las gzhan du bstan pa'o/ /bri sku'i skabs 'dir lha tshang bar bya ba'i 'thad pa de lta bu yin du chug na/ ci'i phyir lha'i
325a2(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa gzhan du bstan/ /gtso bo lnga la sogs pa bri bar rigs so zhes na/ mchog tu thugs rje che bas sgo sna tshogs nas bsgrub pa po la dngos grub sbyin par brtson par bstan pa'i phyir ro/ /'o na sangs rgyas sman gyi bla 'dir ci'i
325a3(rgyud 'grel): phyir bri? zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni mchog tu thugs rje chen pos sems can la mnyes gshin cing/ khyad par du sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis bcud kyi len la sogs pa'i sman sna tshogs byin gyis rlob pa ste/ ji
325a4(rgyud 'grel): skad du gang zhig sangs rgyas sman gyi bla 'di yi/ /mtshan rnams dran nam mchod dang bsnyen bskur byed/ /de yi nad rnams 'byed zhing sman rnams ni/ /lhag par mthu dang ldan par 'dis nges 'gyur/ /zhes bshad pa lta
325a5(rgyud 'grel): bu'o/ /'dir ni bris sku'i spyan sngar rdzas bsgrub par rab tu gsal la/ /rdzas kyi bsgrub pa las kyang bcud len ni mchog yin par gsungs pas/ bcud len rab tu 'grub par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas 'di bri'o//
325a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dir bcud len gyi bsgrub par gang las gsal zhe na/ phyag 'tshal dngos grub la sogs blang/ /bla ma dkon mchog gsum dag la/ /skal pa cha re phul nas su/ /de nas rtag tu bdag spyod cig /ces pas dngos
325a7(rgyud 'grel): grub bgo ba gsungs la/ bgo ba'i cho ga ni rdzas rnams la yin pas so/ /rgyud phyi ma las ba dmar ser gyi mar zhes smos pa dang/ mar de 'am mar sar pa 'am/ /til mar ram chu 'am/ 'o ma 'am zho 'am/ chang
325b1(rgyud 'grel): ngam khrag gam zhag gam/ /glad pa 'am sha 'am gang yang rung ba la zhes smos pa'i bcud len gyi rdzas rnams ni 'dir yang sbyar bar rigs pas so/ /tshig gi don rnams ni go sla bas ma phye'o/ /sgrub pa po bdag nyid ces bya ba la sogs
325b2(rgyud 'grel): pa la bdag nyid dbyibs dang sha tshugs dang/ kha dog dang cha lugs ci 'dra ba de ltar bri'o/ /zhes gsungs pa lung gi man ngag go /de nas rim pa'i sku gzugs de mchod de zhes bya ba ni rab gnas kyi dus so/ /bdag nyid kyis zhes bya
325b3(rgyud 'grel): ba ni nus na ste/ /mi nus na slob dpon gzhan bzang po 'ga' zhig gis so/ /spyan dbye zhing zhes bya ba ni rgyal po dbang bskur ba'i lugs ltar go 'phangs brtan po la bzhag ste/ de la 'dir spyan dbye ba'i cho ga ji lta bu bya zhe na/ de'i phyir nges
325b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i tshig dang rnam par dbye ba dang/ cho ga rim pas phye ste rab gnas bshad/ /de la nges pa'i nges tshig ni pra ka ra sha ne na tiSh+Tha/ pra tiSh+Tha zhes pa ste/ mchog tu gnas pas na rab gnas so/ /de yang yun ring bas mchog dang khyad
325b5(rgyud 'grel): par du gyur pas mchog go /de la yun ring ba ni thams cad do/ /khyad par du gyur pa ni mchod pa'i gnas rnams te/ ye shes sems pa'i rang bzhin du byas pa'i phyir ro/ /rnam par dbye ba ni gnyis te/ bzhi rnam par dbye ba dang/
325b6(rgyud 'grel): cho ga rnam par dbye ba'o/ /de la gzhi rnam par dbye ba la gsum ste/ sku'i bdag nyid du rab tu gnas par bya ba dang/ gsung gi bdag nyid du rab tu gnas par bya ba dang/ /rigs so so'i bdag nyid du rab tu gnas par bya ba'o//
325b7(rgyud 'grel): de la sku'i bdag nyid du rab tu gnas par bya ba ni/ mchod rten dang gtsug lag khang dang rdo rings dang shing ljon pa dang khron pa dang chu mig dang steng ka dang rta babs dang/ shing rings rnams so/ /gsung gi bdag nyid du rab tu
326a1(rgyud 'grel): gnas par bya ba ni/ phreng ba dang 'jig rten pa'i glegs bam dang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i glegs bam rnams so/ /rigs so so'i bdag nyid du rab tu gnas par bya ba ni sku gzugs rnams
326a2(rgyud 'grel): rang gi sku gang yin pa de nyid du rab tu gnas par bya ba'o/ /cho ga rnam par bye ba ni/ /cho ga rgyas par bya ba dang/ /mdor bsdus pa gnyis so/ /da ni cho ga rim par phye ste bshad par bya'o/ /de la rab
326a3(rgyud 'grel): gnas byed par 'dod pa'i slob dpon gyis/ /zla ba dang tshes grangs dang gza' dang rgyu skar shis pa la bya ste/ de yang zla ba drug dang gza' bzhi dang/ rgyu skar bcu bzhi gang yin dang/ tshes grangs bdun gyi grangs nyid
326a4(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /rgyal ba'i rab gnas la sogs nyid ces pa rnams so/ /dus de dag la gnas yid du 'ong bar/ /mda' dar dang bla re dang 'phan la sogs pas me tog bkram ste dri zhim por byas la/ gnas der stegs bu
326a5(rgyud 'grel): dpangs su khru ngo yod pa/ rgyar khru bzhi yod pa gru bzhi lham pa mdzes par 'jam pa zur phyin pa ma yod pa zhig /rdo 'am so phag gam sa 'am pha gu las byas la rdo thal gyis dkar por byug go /stegs bu de'i khar
326a6(rgyud 'grel): rab gnas bya ba'i lha la sku khrus gsol ba dang/ mchod pa la sogs pa bya'o/ /de la cho ga'i rim pa ni dang po stegs bu'i khar sku gzugs shar du mngon par phyogs par gzhug la/ ras ser po sku la
326a7(rgyud 'grel): gsol te/ oM badzra ? hUM zhes zlos pas so yungs kar dang chu mer dor ba gsum gyi nges par sbyang ngo/ /de nas ba'i rnam lnga dang/ bdud rtsi lngar bcas pa kham phor du bzhag pa dur ba'i pir gyis blangs
326b1(rgyud 'grel): shing sngags 'di zlos pas bkru'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA yo bi sho d+ha ne swa hA/ de nas dag par gyur na ni til mar dri zhim pos bsgos pa khar ba'i snod du bzhag pa dur pa'i pir gyis blangs shing/ sngags 'di bzlos pas sku legs par
326b2(rgyud 'grel): khyab par byugs te/ oM hUM traM h+ri khaM/ de nas yang til mar gsal ba'i phyir/ shun lags lnga po'i phye ma dang sbyar ba'i chus bkru ste/ u dum ba ra dang rsha shi dang/ a shwa t+tha dang/ rgya gro d+ha dang/ pa ra ka ta'i shun pa dag gis so/ /de nas
326b3(rgyud 'grel): yang skyu ru ra la sogs pa 'dag tshal gyi lde gu la/ bum pa chu gtsang ma dri zhim pa bdud rtsi lnga dang sbyar bas dbang bskur ba'i khrus gsol te/ rgyal ba dang bkra shis pa'i tshigs su bcas pa 'don cing/ /dril bu gsil la glu dang gang
326b4(rgyud 'grel): dang/ sil snyan du ma sgrogs shing chu bum pas blugs so/ /de'i tshe slob dpon gyis nam mkha' la sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang grub pa'i rigs 'dzin dang lha dang lha mo mang pos kyang bdud rtsi'i chu ldugs? par bsams la/
326b5(rgyud 'grel): tshigs su bcad pa dang sngags 'di zlos shing dbang bskur ba'i khrus bya'o/ /ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa khrus gsol ltar/ /lha yi chu ni dag pa yis/ /de bzhin bdag gis khrus gsol lo/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a
326b6(rgyud 'grel): b+hi She ka sa ma ya sh+ri ye hUM a swA hA/ de nas ras 'jam pos sku la chags pa'i chu legs par phyis te 'di ni khrus kyi cho ga'o/ /de nas tsan dan gnyis dang/ gur gum dang la gu dang/ 'gan te ska ste dri snga'i lde gu lha'i thugs khar
326b7(rgyud 'grel): byug te/ sngags 'dis so/ /oM badzra gand+he A hUM swA hA/ de nas me tog dang spos dang mar me dang lha bshos rnams dang rang gi sngags kyis phul lo/ /thugs ka dang ma gur dang/ spyi bo dang 'phrag ka rnams su rdo rje dang bcas pa'i
327a1(rgyud 'grel): lag pas lan gsum reg ste/ lag par spos me thogs nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ lce hUM las rdo rjer byas nas sta gon la gnas par bya ba'i phyir/ 'di skad ces lan gsum brjod do/ /
327a2(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das che ge mo rdo rje pad+ma rig pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /slob ?la ni brtse ba dang/ /khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir/ /mgon po thugs rje chen po bdag /sang ni rab gnas bgyi lags na/ /gus
327a3(rgyud 'grel): pa bdag dang de la ni/ /bcom ldan bka' drin mdzad pa'i rigs/ /'gro la 'khor lo'i bya don sbyin/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni bdag la dgongs/ /dgra bcom byang chub sems rnams dang/ gang yang sngags kyi lha
327a4(rgyud 'grel): gzhan dang/ /lha dang 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi/ /bstan pa la ni mngon dga' zhing/ /byang chub la brten 'byung po dang/ /rdo rje'i spyan ldan sems can gzhan/ /rdo rje 'chang chen che ge bdag /rig pa'i rgyal po 'di yi ni//
327a5(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar nus pa'i mchod pa dang/ /'gro ba zhi bas rab gnas bgyid/ /slob ma mchog dang bdag la ni/ /khyod kyi thugs rtse nyer bzung nas/ /rab gnas 'di la thams cad kyis/ /thugs rjer ldan pas gnas par mdzod
327a6(rgyud 'grel): de skad ces brjod pas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas la sogs pa thams cad rab gnas kyi gnas de'i nam mkha' la 'byon par bsam mo/ /de nas gang la rab gnas bya ba'i gzhi de stong pa nyid du bsgoms la/
327a7(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma dang zla ba la sogs pa'i rim gyis/ sam yang na yig 'bru las yud tsam gyi ltar bskyed do/ /de nas rang gi snying kha'i sa bon las 'od zer byung bas/ /ye shes sems dpa' bkug ste/ /mdun du byon pa
327b1(rgyud 'grel): bsams la/ oM pra tits+tsha arg+haM hUM zhes pas yon chab phul te/ oM ni ri khaM hUM zhes pas zhabs bsil dbul lo/ /oM sarba saM sho d+ha ni hUM phaT zhes pas zhabs bsil dbul lo/ /yang me tog dang/ spos dang mar me dang/ dri dang bshos dang
327b2(rgyud 'grel): dril bu'i spra? dag phul la/ dze:? hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod pas dam tshig sems dpa' la bstim ste/ dbang bskur la rgyas btab te/ yang me tog dang/ spos dang mar me dang dri dang bshos dang/ sil snyan rnams phul la lha de'i sngags
327b3(rgyud 'grel): mang du zlas te/ de nas yi ge brgya ba mu(rgyud 'grel): 'i mdza' can gyis gshegs su gsol lo/ /'di ni sta gon la gnas pa'i cho ga'o/ /de nas nang par stegs bu'i gnas der mchod pa ci 'byor ba dang/ gser gyi mthur ma any+dzA na dang bcas pa
327b4(rgyud 'grel): bshams la/ rab gnas bya ste/ de yang dang por slob dpon gyi lag tu spos snod thogs la/ /pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ lce hUM las rdo rje byas la/ bcom ldan 'das zhes pa nas bzung ste/ thugs brtse ba ldan pas snang
327b5(rgyud 'grel): bar mdzod pa'i bar du brjod pas lha rnams bskul te/ de yang sang ni rab gnas bgyid lags na zhes bya ba la rab gnas bgyid bar 'tshal lags na zhes brjod do/ de nas ye shes sems dpa' yang spyan drangs la yon
327b6(rgyud 'grel): chab dang zhabs bsil dang/ zhal bsil dang mchod pa'i cho gas phul la lha thams cad sku gzugs la bstim ste yang mchod pa byas la/ oM badzra pa ra Na bi b+hu Sha ne swAhA zhes pas rgyan cing 'byor pa dbul lo/ /de nas yang
327b7(rgyud 'grel): bstod pa byas la gsor? gyi thur ma any+dzA na byugs pas spyan dbye ste/ sngags 'dis so/ /oM tsak+Shu tsak+Shu sa man+ta tsak+Shu bi sho d+ha na badzra swAhA zhes blos shing ngo/ /de nas 'di bya a ka ni sa ma d+hi b+hya ne na dra na ne swAhA zhes brjod cing
328a1(rgyud 'grel): bza' ba bzang pos cung zhig ngal zer sku la dbul lo/ /de nas bdud rtsi 'khyil pa zlas shing sku'i zhabs dang skod pa dang dbul la lag pa g.yas pas gcus la rdo rje bzung la lar? gsum bskor te/ brtad par byas la/ stegs
328a2(rgyud 'grel): bu'i steng du sku'i cha gsum pa'i khri la/ ha cang mdud pa dang ma dgye ba dang ma yo bar ci mdzes su bzhugs par bya ba ni/ su dra tiShta badzra swA hA/ zhes brjod do/ /de nas slob ma la brjod pa ni/ khyod kyis nga la gsol btab pa'i
328a3(rgyud 'grel): sku gzugs dang ni/ khyad par du/ /ji skad du gsungs bzhin spyan dbye bas/ /de ni ngas kyang byas gyur ste/ /khyod kyi de ni kun rdzob pas/ /ci bde bar ni mchod pa byos/ /zhes so de nas slob mas kyang sku la mchod pa ci 'byor pa phul
328a4(rgyud 'grel): la/ /bstod pa yang bya ste/ lan du mar bskor ba yang bya'o/ /de nas slob dpon gyis phyogs kyi gtor ma byin la/ sku gzugs byin che zhing bkra shis pa yun ring du bzhugs par bya ba'i phyir/ chos skyong pa'i bsrungs ma rnams
328a5(rgyud 'grel): la gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /'byor ba yod na nal zer zas phul ba'i rjes la rgyal ba'i sbyin sreg bya'o/ /'di ni rab gnas rgyas pa'o/ /mdor bsdus pa ni sta gon la gnas pa mi bya bar nyi ma gcig nyi nga la? khrus la
328a6(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i bya ba kun rdzogs par bya'o/ /de la glegs bam dang bris sku dang lder so la sogs pa ni me long la khrus bya'o/ /lugs ma la sogs pa ni dngos su bkru'o/ /lha khang ni lha'i sku ji snyed pa de snyed la ?
328a7(rgyud 'grel): gnas bya'i/ /spyir 'dril de ni ma yin no/ /mchod rten dang rdo rings dang rta babs dang shing ljon pa dang/ gtsug lag khang dag ni rnam par snang mdzad du bsgrub po/ /chu mig dang khron pa la sogs pa ni rnam par
328b1(rgyud 'grel): snang mdzad tu rab gnas su byas pa las/ 'jug tu de gyur pas chu mig la sogs par gnas par bya'o/ /bzlas pa'i phreng ba dang glegs bam dag ni 'od dpag med du'o/ /rab gnas kyi ched du dkyil 'khor 'bri na/ rab gnas gang la bya ba'i lha de gtso bor bya'o/
328b2(rgyud 'grel): lha khang gang zhig sku mang du bzhugs pa de la ni rnam par snang mdzad gtso bor gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor bri'o/ /gal te de ltar spyan dbye ba ma byas na ci nyes par 'gyur zhe na/ sku gzugs rab gnas ma byas par/ /phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod byed
328b3(rgyud 'grel): de/ /sngags med pas ni thal ga la/ /sbyin sreg byas bzhin 'bras bu med/ /ces pa'i nyes pa'o/ /rnal 'byor kha cig gi dbang du byas te/ /rab gnas rab tu rgya chen sngags dang phyag rgya'i bya ba rab tu rgyas pa dag ni 'dir ma brjod de/ gzhung mang
328b4(rgyud 'grel): po la mi sred pa dang/ phyi rol gyi bya ba ha cang mangs pa ni rab tu g.yeng ba nyid yin pas rnal 'byor gyi rgyud 'dir mi 'dod pa'i phyir ro/ /nang gi bya ba gtso bor byas te brjod pa'o/ bden pa'i byin brlabs dmigs par bya zhes bya ba ni rab 
328b5(rgyud 'grel): gnas byed pa'i dus su sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun yon tan mdza' yas pa yin pa'i byin gyi brlabs des/ bdag gi ri mo 'di spyan dbye ba'i dus 'di nyid du/ dngos grub myur du thob pa lta na mtshan ma 'ga' snang bar gyur cig ces
328b6(rgyud 'grel): bya ba la sogs pa'o/ /de nas ci ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o/ /gal te mtshan ma byung na de shes par bya ba'i phyir bzhad pa dang ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ bzhad pa dang ni rnga sgra dang/ dril bu'i sgra dang 'brug bzhin te zhes pa ni
328b7(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub rab kyi mtshan ma'o/ /dge slong bram ze'i bu mo dang zhes pa ni dngos grub 'bring gi mtshan ma'o/ /'bras bu zhes pa ni dngos grub tha ma'i mtshan ma'o/ /mthong na zhes bya ba ni ma 'khrul pa'i shes pas so/ /myur du zhes pa ni mtshan ma'i 
329a1(rgyud 'grel): dbang gis dus myur ba nyid du'o/ /kha cig na re spyan 'byed pa na mtshan ma 'byung bar 'dod pa na/ myur du zhes gsungs pas dang po 'og nas 'chad pa ltar bsnyen pa byas la/ /bsnyen pa kher ba na bri sku bri zhing de
329a2(rgyud 'grel): nas bsnyen par can de'i spyan sngar bya'i zhes zer ro/ /mtshan ma 'di dag ni 'dor bstan pa dang/ rgyas par ni ji skad du/ /de nas gzhan yang cho ga las/ /ji skad gsungs pa'i cho ga bshad/ /ngal ba'i nyes par 'gyur na yang/ /myur
329a3(rgyud 'grel): par bya ba mi shes so/ /de yi bar du sgrub pa pos/ /bsnyen pa dang ni mchod pa dang/ /sbyin bsreg cho ga bstod pa dang/ /dge ba dag la brtson par bya/ /dkyil 'khor dag ni 'bri ba dang/ /bsnyan pa la yang dus mtshams su/ /mig sman lan brgyar
329a4(rgyud 'grel): sngags pa yis/ /thog mar gnyid ni bsal ba dang/ /bsgrub pa'i tshe dang mig sman des/ /legs par bkru bar rab tu bsgrags/ /lig bu mid dang sug smel dang/ /ga bur shing rtsa po pi ling/ /ta ka ra dang sbyar ba dag/ rta yi kha chu
329a5(rgyud 'grel): dang sbyar na/ /gnyid dang snyoms pa'i 'jigs pa sel/ /'thor thung yang dang byang byas nas/ /kha gdong bkrus nas mig bsku'o/ /mig sman bskus pa'i mig des nis bsgrub pa'i tshe na bgegs kyang mthong/ /oM dza la lo tsa ne swA
329a6(rgyud 'grel): hA de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la'o/ /oM pi lo ki ni swahA/ /pad+ma'i rigs la'o/ /oM bandu ri dIbde swA hA/ /rdo rje'i rigs la lo/ rig gsum la yang rim bzhin mig sman bsku ba'i rigs sngags so/ /dal dang brnye ba gsang
329a7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i phyir/ /spos kyi chu ni khyor ba gang/ /rab tu dri zhim lan bdun bzlas/ /khyor pa nyid kyis btud par bya/ /nye reg byas nas blo can gyis de nas mtshan ma rtag par bya/ /mtshan ma bzang po mthong nas ni/ /bsgrub pa/ /
329b1(rgyud 'grel): gus par brtsam par bya/ /lcags kyi dung dang 'khor lo nya/ /g.yung drung pad+ma rgyal mtshan dang/ /bkra shis bum pa gang ba dang/ /dpal be'u rdo rje phreng ba dang/ /bu mo rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang/ /sbrul mo phang na bu thogs pa/ /gzhon nu dga' zhing rgyas
329b2(rgyud 'grel): pa ste/ /de dag rab tu 'grub par ston/ /bram ze gos dkar gon pa dang/ /shing rta glang po rta rnams dang/ /rtsi thogs 'bras bu sna tshogs dang/ /ngo mtshar dag kyang mthong ba dang/ /'brug gi sgra ni grags pa dang/ /rigs
329b3(rgyud 'grel): byed dbyangs dang rgyal po sgra/ /dung dang rnga dang rdza rnga dang/ /sgra rnams 'grub phyir rab tu shis/ /rma bya khrung khrung ngang mo dang/ /ne tso la sogs bya rnams kyi/ /sgra brnyan rnams ni kun thob nas/ /dngos
329b4(rgyud 'grel): grub phyir ni ma pa rtsam mo/ /smon pa bkra shis thams cad dang/ /bsod nams dang ni bde legs tshig /thos na 'grub pa shes par bya/ /yid du 'ong ba'i tshig rnams dang/ /'brug dang
329b5(rgyud 'grel): sprin dang char 'bab dang/ /ser bu me tog 'bab pa dang/ /'ja' dang dri ni zhim po ste/ /'di 'dra'i mtshan ma lha yi'o/ /bar snang las byung mtshan ma ni/ /thams cad 'bring du shes
329b6(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /sa las byung ba'i mtshan ma gang/ /de dag sa pa'i yin par bshad/ /lha yi dag gis dngos grub mchog /bar snang dag gis 'bring du 'gyur/ /sa pa dag gis dngos
329b7(rgyud 'grel): grub phul/ /gsum pa 'ang gsum gsum dag tu dbye/ /de la sogs pa'i mtshan ma rnams/ /dngos grub phyir ni bsgrags pa'o/ /mdor na gsang sngags thams cad la/ /de
330a1(rgyud 'grel): las zlog na mi 'grub po/ /dang por mtshan ma bzur na ni/ /sems ni rab tu dga' 'gyur nas/ /yongs su mgu ba'i bsam pa yis/ /de nas sgrub pa brtsam
330a2(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o/ /rab dang 'bring dang tha ma 'grub ces bya ba la/ /dngos grub rab dang 'bring dang tha ma'i dbye ba ni/ /ji skad du gang dag bsten du 'gro ba'i las/ /
330a3(rgyud 'grel): de kun mchog tu shes par bya/ /gang yang cung zad mi snang ba/ /de ni 'bring gi cho gar bstan/ /gang yang 'di la sa pa'i las/ /de dag thams cad tha mar bshad/ /de bas rab
330a4(rgyud 'grel): 'bring tha ma yis/ /las rnams kyis ni bye brag las/ /rab dang 'bring dang tha ma yi/ /dngos grub las kyi bye brag las/ /steng dang bar snang sa pa dang/ /gnas ni rnam pa gsum du  bshad/ /rig sngags 'chang dang nam mkhar 'gro /sna tshogs gzugs ni grub pa dang/ /mngon par shes pa 'thob pa dang/ /zhi ba'i blo dang ye shes 'thob/ /bstan bcos thams cad
330a5(rgyud 'grel): shes pa'i ?/ /sku mkhas thos pa 'dzin pa dang/ /yid bzhin nor bu rgyal srid dang/ /gter chen dag ni rnyed pa dang/ /de la sogs pa bstan pa rnams/ /rig sngags dngos grub dam pa
330a6(rgyud 'grel): yin/ /mi snang stobs dang dngos grub dang/ /phug gi dngos grub bcud lan dang/ /mang du thos dang shes thob dang/ /rkang mgyogs pa yi dngos grub dang/ /de la sogs pa'i dngos grub ni/ /
330b1(rgyud 'grel): 'bring rab tu bshad pa yin/ /'gro ba thams cad dga' ba dang/ /drag shul spyod pa'i cho ga dang/ /gzhan yang cung zad phal gyi rnams/ /mkhas pas tha mar rig par bya/ /'bar ba'i rdzas la mchog tu
